text: The book of the generation of Jesus Christ , the son of David , the son of Abraham .
text2: Hagee Daawita zarenne Abrahaama zare gidida Yesuus Kiristtoosa yeletaa yootiya maxaafaa .

text: Abraham begat Isaac ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat Judas and his brethren ;
text2: Abrahaami Yisaaqa yeliis ; Yisaaqi Yaaqooba yeliis ; Yaaqoobi Yihudaanne a ishantta yeliis .

text: And Judas begat Phares and Zara of Thamar ; and Phares begat Esrom ; and Esrom begat Aram ;
text2: Yihudai Ti7imaaro giyo maccaaseeppe Paareesanne Zaraaha yeliis ; Paareesi Hexiroona yeliis ; Hexirooni Raama yeliis .

text: And Aram begat Aminadab ; and Aminadab begat Naasson ; and Naasson begat Salmon ;
text2: Raami Aminadaaba yeliis ; Aminadaabi Na7asoona yeliis ; Na7asooni Solomona yeliis .

text: And Salmon begat Booz of Rachab ; and Booz begat Obed of Ruth ; and Obed begat Jesse ;
text2: Solomoni Ra7aabo giyo maccaaseeppe Boo7eeza yeliis ; Boo7eezi Uruto giyo maccaaseeppe Yobeeda yeliis ; Yobeedi Isseya yeliis .

text: And Jesse begat David the king ; and David the king begat Solomon of her that had been the wife of Urias ;
text2: Isseyi Kawuwaa Daawita yeliis . Kawoi Daawiti Solomona yeliis . Solomona aayyiyaa koiro Ooriyoona giyoogaa machchiyo .

text: And Solomon begat Roboam ; and Roboam begat Abia ; and Abia begat Asa ;
text2: Solomoni Robi7aama yeliis ; Robi7aami Abiiya yeliis ; Abiiyi Asaafa yeliis .

text: And Asa begat Josaphat ; and Josaphat begat Joram ; and Joram begat Ozias ;
text2: Asaafi Yoosaafixa yeliis ; Yoosaafixi Yoraama yeliis ; Yoraami Ooziyaana yeliis .

text: And Ozias begat Joatham ; and Joatham begat Achaz ; and Achaz begat Ezekias ;
text2: Ooziyaani Yo7aataama yeliis ; Yo7aataami Akaaza yeliis ; Akaazi Hizqqiyaasa yeliis .

text: And Ezekias begat Manasses ; and Manasses begat Amon ; and Amon begat Josias ;
text2: Hizqqiyaasi Minaasa yeliis ; Minaasee Amoona yeliis ; Amooni Yoosiyaasa yeliis .

text: And Josias begat Jechonias and his brethren , about the time they were carried away to Babylon :
text2: Israa7eela asai omoodettidi , Baabiloone biitti biido wode , Yoosiyaasi Yo7aakiinanne a ishantta yeliis .

text: And after they were brought to Babylon , Jechonias begat Salathiel ; and Salathiel begat Zorobabel ;
text2: Asai omoodetti Baabiloone biitti biidoogaappe guyyiyan , Yo7aakiini Salaatiyaala yeliis ; Salaatiyaali Zarubaabeela yeliis .

text: And Zorobabel begat Abiud ; and Abiud begat Eliakim ; and Eliakim begat Azor ;
text2: Zarubaabeeli Abiyuuda yeliis ; Abiyuudi Eliyaaqiima yeliis ; Eliyaaqiimi Azoora yeliis .

text: And Azor begat Sadoc ; and Sadoc begat Achim ; and Achim begat Eliud ;
text2: Azoori Xaadooqa yeliis ; Xaadooqi Akiima yeliis ; Akiimi Eliyuuda yeliis .

text: And Eliud begat Eleazar ; and Eleazar begat Matthan ; and Matthan begat Jacob ;
text2: Eliyuudi El77aazara yeliis ; El77aazari Maataana yeliis ; Maataani Yaaqooba yeliis .

text: And Jacob begat Joseph the husband of Mary , of whom was born Jesus , who is called Christ .
text2: Yaaqoobi Kiristtoosa giyo Yesuusa yelida Mairaami azinaa Yooseefa yeliis .

text: So all the generations from Abraham to David are fourteen generations ; and from David until the carrying away into Babylon are fourteen generations ; and from the carrying away into Babylon unto Christ are fourteen generations .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , zare ubbai Abrahaamappe Daawita gakkanaassi tammanne oidda ; Daawitappe doommidi , asai Baabiloone biitti omoodettidi biido wode gakkanaassi tammanne oidda ; asai Baabiloone biitti omoodettidi biido wodeppe Kiristtoosi yelettido wodiyaa gakkanaassi tammanne oidda .

text: Now the birth of Jesus Christ was on this wise : When as his mother Mary was espoused to Joseph , before they came together , she was found with child of the Holy Ghost .
text2: Yesuus Kiristtoosa yeletai hagaa mala ; a aayyiyaa Mairaama Yooseefayyo giigaasu ; a he wode Yooseefaara gaittennan de7aidda , Geeshsha Ayyaanau shahaaraasu .

text: Then Joseph her husband , being a just man , and not willing to make her a publick example , was minded to put her away privily .
text2: O giigissi wottida Yooseefi , xillo asa gididaagee , o kaushshanau koyibeenna ; ibaa qonccissennan o aggi bayanau qoppiis .

text: But while he thought on these things , behold , the angel of the Lord appeared unto him in a dream , saying , Joseph , thou son of David , fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife : for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost .
text2: SHin i hegaa qoppishin , Godaa kiitanchchai aimuwan aara gaittidi , “ Daawita na7au Yooseefaa , Mairaama Geeshsha Ayyaanau shahaarido gishshau , o ekkanaagaa yayyoppa .

text: And she shall bring forth a son , and thou shalt call his name JESUS : for he shall save his people from their sins .
text2: Attuma na7a a yelana ; qassi neeni Yesuusa gaada a sunttana ; aissi giikko , i ba asaa eta nagaraappe ashshana ” yaagiis .

text: Now all this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken of the Lord by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Qassi Godai hananabaa yootiyaagaa baggaara , “ Geela7iyaa shahaarada na7aa yelana ; a sunttai Amaanu7eela geetettana ” giidoogee polettana mala , hagee ubbai haniis ; “ Amaanu7eela ” giyoogee “ Xoossai nunaara de7ees ” giyoogaa .

text: Then Joseph being raised from sleep did as the angel of the Lord had bidden him , and took unto him his wife :
text2: Yooseefi xiskkuwaappe beegottidi , Godaa kiitanchchai bana azazidoogaadan , Mairaamo efiis .

text: And knew her not till she had brought forth her firstborn son : and he called his name JESUS .
text2: SHin ba baira na7aa a yelana gakkanaassi o bochchibeenna ; qassi na7aa Yesuusa giidi sunttiis .

text: Now when Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea in the days of Herod the king , behold , there came wise men from the east to Jerusalem ,
text2: Yesuusi Yihudaa biittan Beetaliheeme giyo kataman Heeroodisi kawotidi de7iyo wode yelettiis ; hegaappe guyyiyan , xoolinttiyaa paidiya asati arshsho baggappe Yerusalaame yiidi ,

text: Saying , Where is he that is born King of the Jews ? for we have seen his star in the east , and are come to worship him .
text2: “ Aihuda kawo gidanau yelettida na7ai awan de7ii ? Aissi giikko , nuuni arshsho baggaara kiyida a xoolinttiyaa be7idi , ayyo goinnanau yiida ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: When Herod the king had heard these things , he was troubled , and all Jerusalem with him .
text2: Kawoi Heeroodisi , hegaa siyidi dagammiis ; Yerusalaamen de7iya asai ubbaikka dagammiis .

text: And when he had gathered all the chief priests and scribes of the people together , he demanded of them where Christ should be born .
text2: Heeroodisi qeese halaqata ubbatanne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeta xeesidi , “ Kiristtoosi awan yelettanddeeshsha ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: And they said unto him , In Bethlehem of Judaea : for thus it is written by the prophet ,
text2: Oichchin eti zaaridi , “ Yihudaa biittan Beetaliheeme kataman yelettana . Hananabaa yootiyaagee , ' Yihudaa biittan de7iya Beetaliheemee , neeni Yihudaa biittaa haariyaageetuppe ainne laafakka . Aissi giikko , ta asaa , Israa7eela haariyaagee neeppe kiyana ' giidi xaafiis ” yaagidosona .

text: Then Herod , when he had privily called the wise men , inquired of them diligently what time the star appeared .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Heeroodisi arshsho baggappe yiida asata geeman xeesidi , xoolinttee etau beettido wodiyaa etappe geeshshidi eriis .

text: And he sent them to Bethlehem , and said , Go and search diligently for the young child ; and when ye have found him , bring me word again , that I may come and worship him also .
text2: Yaatidi Beetaliheeme eta yeddiiddi , “ Biidi na7aa mintti koyite ; a demmido wode taanikka baada ayyo goinnanaadan , tana erissite ” yaagiis .

text: When they had heard the king , they departed ; and , lo , the star , which they saw in the east , went before them , till it came and stood over where the young child was .
text2: Eti kawoi giidoogaa siyidi biidosona ; biiddi ogiyan arshsho baggaara eti kase be7ido xoolinttiyaa be7idosona ; he xoolinttee na7ai de7iyoosaa gakkidi eqqana gakkanaassi , eta kaalettiis .

text: When they saw the star , they rejoiced with exceeding great joy .
text2: Eti he xoolinttiyaa be7ido wode , zawai bainna daro ufaissaa ufaittidosona .

text: And when they were come into the house , they saw the young child with Mary his mother , and fell down , and worshipped him : and when they had opened their treasures , they presented unto him gifts ; gold , and frankincense , and myrrh .
text2: Soo gelidi , na7ai ba aayee Mairaamiira de7iyaagaa be7idosona ; gulbbatidi ayyo goinnidosona ; hegaappe guyyiyan , bantta saaxiniyaa dooyidi , worqqaa , ixaanaanne karbbiyaa ayyo immidosona .

text: And being warned of God in a dream that they should not return to Herod , they departed into their own country another way .
text2: Eti Heeroodisakko simmenna mala , Xoossai aimuwan eta , “ Inttena erite ” gin hara ogiyaara bantta dere simmidosona .

text: And when they were departed , behold , the angel of the Lord appeareth to Joseph in a dream , saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and flee into Egypt , and be thou there until I bring thee word : for Herod will seek the young child to destroy him .
text2: Eti biidoogaappe guyyiyan , Godaa kiitanchchai aimuwan Yooseefayyo beettidi , “ Heeroodisi na7aa woranau koyiyo gishshau , denddada na7aanne na7aa aayyiyo ekkada Gibxxe biitti baqata ; taani neeyyo odana gakkanaassi , yan uttaashsha ” yaagiis .

text: When he arose , he took the young child and his mother by night , and departed into Egypt :
text2: Yaagin Yooseefi qammi denddidi , na7aanne na7aa aayyiyo ekkidi , Gibxxe biitti biis ; Godai hananabaa yootiyaagaa baggaara , “ Taani ta na7aa Gibxxe biittaappe xeesaas ” giidoogee polettana mala , Heeroodisi haiqqana gakkanaassikka i yan de7iis .

text: Then Herod , when he saw that he was mocked of the wise men , was exceeding wroth , and sent forth , and slew all the children that were in Bethlehem , and in all the coasts thereof , from two years old and under , according to the time which he had diligently inquired of the wise men .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Heeroodisi arshsho baggappe yiidaageeti bana cimmidoogaa erido wode , daro hanqqettiis ; hanqqettidi xoolinttee kase beettido wodiyaabaa etappe siyidoogaadankka , wotaaddarata yeddidi , Beetaliheemeeninne Beetaliheeme heeran de7iya naa77u laitta attuma naatanne qassi naa77u laittappe guuxxiya attuma naata ubbaa worissiis .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying ,
text2: Hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasi , “ Yeehoinne zilaassai Raama giyo kataman siyettiis ; Raaheela ba naatuyyo yeekkausu . Eti haiqqiichchido gishshau , agga gin , aggennan ixxaasu ” giidi haasayidoogee polettiis .

text: But when Herod was dead , behold , an angel of the Lord appeareth in a dream to Joseph in Egypt ,
text2: SHin Heeroodisi haiqqidoogaappe guyyiyan , Godaa kiitanchchai Gibxxe biittan de7iya Yooseefayyo aimuwan beettidi

text: Saying , Arise , and take the young child and his mother , and go into the land of Israel : for they are dead which sought the young child ' s life .
text2: a , “ Dendda ; na7aanne na7aa aayyiyo ekkada , Israa7eela biitti simma ; aissi giikko , na7aa woranau koyiyaageeti haiqqiichchidosona ” yaagiis .

text: And he arose , and took the young child and his mother , and came into the land of Israel .
text2: Yaagin Yooseefi denddidi , na7aanne na7aa aayyiyo ekkidi , Israa7eela simmiis .

text: But when he heard that Archelaus did reign in Judaea in the room of his father Herod , he was afraid to go thither : notwithstanding , being warned of God in a dream , he turned aside into the parts of Galilee :
text2: SHin Yooseefi Arkkelawoosi ba aawaa Heeroodisa sohuwan Yihudaa biittan kawotidoogaa siyido wode , yaa baanau yayyiis ; Xoossai ayyo aimuwan yootin , Galiila biitti biis .

text: And he came and dwelt in a city called Nazareth : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophets , He shall be called a Nazarene .
text2: Hananabaa yootiyaageeti , “ Asai a , ' Naazireeta asa ' giidi Xeesana ” giidoogee polettana mala , Naazireeta giyo katamaa biidi de7iis .

text: In those days came John the Baptist , preaching in the wilderness of Judaea ,
text2: He wode Xammaqiya Yohaannisi asaa , “ Saluwaa kawotettai matattido gishshau , intte nagaraappe simmite ” yaagiiddi , Yihudaa Bazzuwan yootiiddi yiis .

text: For this is he that was spoken of by the prophet Esaias , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Aissi giikko , hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi , Yohaannisabaa yootiiddi , “ Issoi bazzon ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , ' Godaa ogiyaa giigissite . I hemettana loossuwaakka ayyo sitti oottite ' giis ” yaagiis .

text: And the same John had his raiment of camel ' s hair , and a leathern girdle about his loins ; and his meat was locusts and wild honey .
text2: Yohaannisau gaameelaa ikisiyan dadettida afalai de7ees ; qassi ba xeessan dafuwaa gixxees ; i miyo qumaikka boolenne degeera eessa .

text: Then went out to him Jerusalem , and all Judaea , and all the region round about Jordan ,
text2: Asai he wode Yerusalaameppe , Yihudaa biitta ubbasaappenne Yorddaanoosa giyo shaafaa heeran de7iya biitta ubbaappe akko yees .

text: And were baptized of him in Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Yiidi ba nagaraa paaxin , Yorddaanoosa giyo shaafan asaa xammaqiis .

text: But when he saw many of the Pharisees and Sadducees come to his baptism , he said unto them , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: SHin Yohaannisi daro Parisaawetinne Saaduqaaweti xammaqettanau baakko yiyaageeta be7idi , eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Ha shooshshatoo , Xoossaa hanqqoi yaana haniyaagaappe baqatana mala , intteyyo oonee odidai ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits meet for repentance :
text2: Simmi intte intte nagaraappe simmidoogaa erissiyaabaa oottite .

text: And think not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , that God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Intte intte wozanan , ' Abrahaami nu aawaa ' giidi qoppoppite . Aissi giikko , taani inttessi yootais ; Xoossai ha shuchchata Abrahaamassi na7a kessanaukka danddayees .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Beexee mittaa xaphuwan qanxxanau giigi uttiis ; lo77o aifiyaa aifenna mitta ubbai qanxxettidi , taman yegettana .

text: I indeed baptize you with water unto repentance : but he that cometh after me is mightier than I , whose shoes I am not worthy to bear : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost , and with fire :
text2: “ Intte intte nagaraappe simmidoogaa erissanau , taani inttena haattan xammaqais ; shin taappe guyyeera yiyaagee , inttena Geeshsha Ayyaanaaninne taman xammaqana . I taappe daro minnees ; taani harai atto a caammaa tookkanaukka bessikke .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and gather his wheat into the garner ; but he will burn up the chaff with unquenchable fire .
text2: A kushiyan kattaa suraggiyo laidai de7ees . Kattaa qoxxiyo audiyaa keehi geeshshees ; ba gisttiyaa gootaran qolana ; shin dalaa to77enna taman xuuggana ” yaagiis .

text: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John , to be baptized of him .
text2: Yesuusi he wode Yohaannisan xammaqettanau , Galiilappe Yorddaanoosa giyo shaafaa akko biis .

text: But John forbad him , saying , I have need to be baptized of thee , and comest thou to me ?
text2: SHin Yohaannisi a , “ Taani nenan xammaqettanau koyiyo wode neeni taakko yai ? ” yaagidi , a qofaa laammanau koyiis .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Suffer it to be so now : for thus it becometh us to fulfil all righteousness . Then he suffered him .
text2: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi a , “ Nuuni xillotetta ooso ubbaa hagaadan polanau bessiyo gishshau , ha77i tau eeno ga ” yaagiis . Yaagin Yohaannisi au eeno giis .

text: And Jesus , when he was baptized , went up straightway out of the water : and , lo , the heavens were opened unto him , and he saw the Spirit of God descending like a dove , and lighting upon him :
text2: Yesuusi xammaqettidoogaappe guyyiyan , sohuwaara haattaappe kiyiis ; saloi dooyettin , Xoossaa Ayyaanai haraphphedan yiishiininne ba bolli wodhdhishin be7iis ;

text: And lo a voice from heaven , saying , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: qassi saluwaappe , “ Taani siiqiyo ta Na7ai , tana ufaissiyaagee hagaa ” yaagiya qaalai yiis .

text: Then was Jesus led up of the Spirit into the wilderness to be tempted of the devil .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , xalahe halaqai Yesuusa paaccana mala , Geeshsha Ayyaanai bazzo Yesuusa efiis .

text: And when he had fasted forty days and forty nights , he was afterward an hungred .
text2: Efin Yesuusi oitamu gallassaanne oitamu qammaa xoomidoogaappe guyyiyan namisettiis .

text: And when the tempter came to him , he said , If thou be the Son of God , command that these stones be made bread .
text2: Xalahe halaqai yiidi a , “ Neeni Xoossaa Na7a gidikko , ane ha shuchchati oitta gidana mala azaza ” yaagiis .

text: But he answered and said , It is written , Man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God .
text2: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Asi Xoossai haasayiyo qaala ubban de7anaappe attin , oitta xalaalan de7enna ' yaagees ” yaagiis .

text: Then the devil taketh him up into the holy city , and setteth him on a pinnacle of the temple ,
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , xalahe halaqai Yesuusa geeshsha katamaa efiidi , Beeta Maqidasiyaa xeeraa kessidi ,

text: And saith unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down : for it is written , He shall give his angels charge concerning thee : and in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: “ Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa gidikko , ane duge guppa . Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Xoossai ba kiitanchchata neeyyo azazana ' qassi ' Eti ne tohoi shuchchan xubettenna mala , bantta kushiyan nena denttana ' yaagees ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus said unto him , It is written again , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi a , “ Qassikka Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Godaa ne Xoossaa paaccoppa ' yaagees ” yaagiis .

text: Again , the devil taketh him up into an exceeding high mountain , and sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world , and the glory of them ;
text2: Qassi xalahe halaqai Yesuusa issi daro gita deriyaa xeeraa kessidi , sa7an de7iya kawotetta ubbaanne eta bonchchuwaa bessiis .

text: And saith unto him , All these things will I give thee , if thou wilt fall down and worship me .
text2: Bessidi a , “ Neeni taayyo gulbbatada goinnikko , taani hagaa ubbaa neeyyo immana ” yaagiis .

text: Then saith Jesus unto him , Get thee hence , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi zaaridi a , “ Laa ha Seexaanau haakka ; aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Godaayyo , ne Xoossaayyo goinna ; a xalaalau ootta ' gees ” yaagiis .

text: Then the devil leaveth him , and , behold , angels came and ministered unto him .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , xalahe halaqai a aggi bayin , kiitanchchati yiidi , ayyo oottidosona .

text: Now when Jesus had heard that John was cast into prison , he departed into Galilee ;
text2: Yohaannisi qashettidoogaa Yesuusi siyido wode , Galiila giyo biitti biis .

text: And leaving Nazareth , he came and dwelt in Capernaum , which is upon the sea coast , in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim :
text2: Naazireeteppe kiyidi , Qifirinaahooma katamaa biidi , yan de7iis ; Qifirinaahoomi Zaabiloona biittaaninne Nifttaaleema biittan abbaa matan de7ees .

text: That it might be fulfilled which was spoken by Esaias the prophet , saying ,
text2: Hegee hanidoogee hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi giidoogee polettanaassa ; hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi hagaadan yaagiis ;

text: The land of Zabulon , and the land of Nephthalim , by the way of the sea , beyond Jordan , Galilee of the Gentiles ;
text2: “ Zaabiloona biittaaninne Nifttaaleema biittan , abbaa ogiyan Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefintta baggan , Aihuda gidenna asai de7iyo Galiilan ,

text: The people which sat in darkness saw great light ; and to them which sat in the region and shadow of death light is sprung up .
text2: xuman de7iya asai wolqqaama poo7uwaa be7iis . Qassi haiquwaa kuwai de7iyo biittan uttidaageetuyyo poo7oi kiyiis ” yaagiis .

text: From that time Jesus began to preach , and to say , Repent : for the kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: He wodiyaappe doommidi Yesuusi , “ Intte nagaraappe simmite ; aissi giikko , saluwaa kawotettai matattiis ” giidi qaalaa yootuwaa doommiis .

text: And Jesus , walking by the sea of Galilee , saw two brethren , Simon called Peter , and Andrew his brother , casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Yesuusi Galiila Abbaa mataara aadhdhiiddi , naa77u ishantti PHeexiroosa giyo Simooninne a ishaa Inddiraasi , moliyaa oiqqiyaageeta gidido gishshau , gitiyaa abban yeggiyaageeta be7iis .

text: And he saith unto them , Follow me , and I will make you fishers of men .
text2: Be7idi eta , “ Tana kaallite ; taani inttena asa oiqqiyoogaa tamaarissana ” yaagiis .

text: And they straightway left their nets , and followed him .
text2: Yaagin eti sohuwaarakka bantta gitiyaa yeggi bayidi , Yesuusa kaallidosona .

text: And going on from thence , he saw other two brethren , James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , in a ship with Zebedee their father , mending their nets ; and he called them .
text2: Yesuusi hegaappe sinttaukko biiddi , hara naa77u ishantta , Zabddiyoosa naata Yaaqoobanne a ishaa Yohaannisa be7iis ; eti bantta aawaa Zabddiyoosaara wolwolo giddon bantta gitiyaa giigissiyaageeta be7idi xeesiis .

text: And they immediately left the ship and their father , and followed him .
text2: Xeesin sohuwaarakka eti wolwoluwaanne bantta aawaa yeggi bayidi , Yesuusa kaallidosona .

text: And Jesus went about all Galilee , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing all manner of sickness and all manner of disease among the people .
text2: Yesuusi Aihuda woosa keettatun tamaarissiiddi , kawotettaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiiddinne qassi hargge ubbaappenne saho ubbaappe asaa pattiiddi , Galiila biitta ubban yuuyiis .

text: And his fame went throughout all Syria : and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments , and those which were possessed with devils , and those which were lunatick , and those that had the palsy ; and he healed them .
text2: A woree Sooriyaa biittaa ubbaa gakkiis ; asai dumma dumma harggiyan ohettidi harggida asaanne sahettida asa ubbaa , xalaheti oiqqido asaa , kaarettai oiqqido asaanne , qassi bollai silido asaa Yesuusakko ehiis ; ehin i eta pattiis .

text: And there followed him great multitudes of people from Galilee , and from Decapolis , and from Jerusalem , and from Judaea , and from beyond Jordan .
text2: Daro asai Galiilappe , tammu katamatuppe , Yerusalaameppe , Yihudaappenne Yorddaanoosappe hefinttan de7iya biittaappe Yesuusa kaalliis .

text: And seeing the multitudes , he went up into a mountain : and when he was set , his disciples came unto him :
text2: Yesuusi daro asaa be7idi , deriyaa huuphiyaa kiyidi uttiis . Bana kaalliyaageeti baakko shiiqin ,

text: And he opened his mouth , and taught them , saying ,
text2: tamaarissuwaa doommidi , eta hagaadan yaagiis .

text: Blessed are the poor in spirit : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Bantta ayyaanan hiyyeesa gididoogaa eriyaageeti anjjettidaageeta ; aissi giikko , saluwaa kawotettai etassa .

text: Blessed are they that mourn : for they shall be comforted .
text2: Kayyottiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta ; aissi giikko , Xoossai eta minttettana .

text: Blessed are the meek : for they shall inherit the earth .
text2: Ashkketi anjjettidaageeta ; aissi giikko , eti sa7aa laattana .

text: Blessed are they which do hunger and thirst after righteousness : for they shall be filled .
text2: Namisettiyaageetinne saamettiyaageeti kattaa haattaa koyiyoogaadan , xillobaa oottanau laamotiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta ; aissi giikko , Xoossai eta kalissana .

text: Blessed are the merciful : for they shall obtain mercy .
text2: Maariyaageeti anjjettidaageeta ; aissi giikko , Xoossai eta maarana .

text: Blessed are the pure in heart : for they shall see God .
text2: Wozanaa geeshshati anjjettidaageeta ; aissi giikko , eti Xoossaa be7ana .

text: Blessed are the peacemakers : for they shall be called the children of God .
text2: Asa sigettiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta ; aissi giikko , Xoossai eta , ba naata giidi xeesana .

text: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness ' sake : for theirs is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Xillotettaa gishshau yedetettiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta ; aissi giikko , saluwaa kawotettai etassa .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall revile you , and persecute you , and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely , for my sake .
text2: “ Intte tana kaalliyo gishshau , asai inttena boriyo wodenne waissiyo wode , qassi intte bolli iitabaa ubbaa wordduwan haasayiyo wode , intte anjjettidaageeta .

text: Rejoice , and be exceeding glad : for great is your reward in heaven : for so persecuted they the prophets which were before you .
text2: Intteyyo saluwan gita woitoi de7iyo gishshau , ufaittite ; hashshu giite ; aissi giikko , asai intteppe kase de7ida hananabaa yootiyaageetakka hegaadan waissiis .

text: Ye are the salt of the earth : but if the salt have lost his savour , wherewith shall it be salted ? it is thenceforth good for nothing , but to be cast out , and to be trodden under foot of men .
text2: “ Asa ubbaassi intte maxine mala ; shin maxinee laqilaqana xayikko , naa77antto a waatidi laqilaqissanee ? Kare olin , asi a yedhdhi hemettanaappe attin , wodeppe ainne go77enna .

text: Ye are the light of the world . A city that is set on an hill cannot be hid .
text2: “ Sa7au intte poo7o mala ; deriyaa huuphiyan keexettida katamai geemmana danddayenna .

text: Neither do men light a candle , and put it under a bushel , but on a candlestick ; and it giveth light unto all that are in the house .
text2: Xomppe oittidi , son de7iya asa ubbau poo7ana mala , xoqqiyaasan wottiyoogaappe attin , kere giddon qum77i wottiya asi baawa .

text: Let your light so shine before men , that they may see your good works , and glorify your Father which is in heaven .
text2: Hegaadankka , asi intte oottiyo lo77o oosuwaa be7idi , saluwan de7iya intte Aawaa galatana mala , intte poo7oi asa sinttan poo7o .

text: Think not that I am come to destroy the law , or the prophets : I am not come to destroy , but to fulfil .
text2: “ Taani Muuse higgiyaanne hananabaa yootiyaageeti tamaarissiyoogaa xaissanau yiidobaa intteyyo milatoppo ; taani polanau yiidoogaappe attin , xaissanau yabeikke .

text: For verily I say unto you , Till heaven and earth pass , one jot or one tittle shall in no wise pass from the law , till all be fulfilled .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; saloinne sa7ai aadhdhana gakkanaassi , qassi ubbabaikka polettana gakkanaassi , higgiyaappe issi qaalaikka woi issi pitaleekka xayenna .

text: Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments , and shall teach men so , he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven : but whosoever shall do and teach them , the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ha azazo ubbaappe guuxxiya issi azazuwaa kanttiya urai ooninne , qassi haratikka baagaadan oottanaadan tamaarissiya urai ooninne , saluwaa kawotettan ubbaappe guutta gidana ; shin higgiyaa oottiyaageenne tamaarissiyaagee ooninne saluwaa kawotettan gita gidana .

text: For I say unto you , That except your righteousness shall exceed the righteousness of the scribes and Pharisees , ye shall in no case enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani intteyyo odais ; intte xillotettai higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetu xillotettaappenne Parisaawetu xillotettaappe darana xayikko , saluwaa kawotettaa intte mulekka gelekketa .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not kill ; and whosoever shall kill shall be in danger of the judgment :
text2: “ Beni asaa , ' Asa woroppa ; asa worida ooninne pirddettana ' giidoogaa siyideta .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment : and whosoever shall say to his brother , Raca , shall be in danger of the council : but whosoever shall say , Thou fool , shall be in danger of hell fire .
text2: SHin taani intteyyo odais ; ba ishaa hanqqettiya ubbai pirddettana ; ba ishaa cayiya ubbai yaa7aa pirddau shiiqana ; qassi ba ishaa , ' Eeyyai ' giya ubbai Gaannabiyaa tamaa pirddau shiiqana .

text: Therefore if thou bring thy gift to the altar , and there rememberest that thy brother hath ought against thee ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , neeni yarshshiyoosan yarshshishin , ne ishaa naaqqidobai neeyyo hegan hassayettikko ,

text: Leave there thy gift before the altar , and go thy way ; first be reconciled to thy brother , and then come and offer thy gift .
text2: ne yarshshuwaa he sohuwankka yegga bayada ba ; kasetada ne ishaara sigettaichcha ; hegaappe guyyiyan yaada , ne yarshshuwaa yarshsha .

text: Agree with thine adversary quickly , whiles thou art in the way with him ; lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and thou be cast into prison .
text2: “ Nena mootiyaagaara pirdda keettaa baidda ogiyan elle aara sigettaichcha ; hegee xayikko , i nena daanna sintti aattana ; qassi daannai nena polisiyau aattidi immin , polisee nena qachchana .

text: Verily I say unto thee , Thou shalt by no means come out thence , till thou hast paid the uttermost farthing .
text2: Taani neeyyo tumaa odais ; neeni issi santtimee attennan , ne maqqaccuwaa wurssada qanxxana gakkanaassi , mulekka qasho keettaappe kiyakka .

text: Ye have heard that it was said by them of old time , Thou shalt not commit adultery :
text2: “ ' SHaaramuxoppa ' giidoogaa siyideta .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever looketh on a woman to lust after her hath committed adultery with her already in his heart .
text2: SHin taani intteyyo odais ; maccaaro xeellidi amottiya ubbai , ba wozana giddon he wode iira shaaramuxiis .

text: And if thy right eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Ne ushachcha aifee nena nagara ootissikko , neeppe shoddada ola baya ; aissi giikko , ne bollai muleera Gaannabiyaa taman olettanaagaappe , appe issoi xayiyoogee neeyyo keha .

text: And if thy right hand offend thee , cut if off , and cast it from thee : for it is profitable for thee that one of thy members should perish , and not that thy whole body should be cast into hell .
text2: Qassi ne ushachcha kushee nena nagara ootissikko , neeppe qanxxada ola baya ; aissi giikko , ne bollai muleera Gaannabiyaa taman olettanaagaappe , appe issoi xayiyoogee neeyyo keha .

text: It hath been said , Whosoever shall put away his wife , let him give her a writing of divorcement :
text2: “ ' Qassi ba machchiyo yeddiya ooninne o yeddiyo paramaa immo ' geetettiis .

text: But I say unto you , That whosoever shall put away his wife , saving for the cause of fornication , causeth her to commit adultery : and whosoever shall marry her that is divorced committeth adultery .
text2: SHin taani intteyyo odais ; ba machchiyaa shaaramuxennan de7ishin yeddiya ooninne o shaaramuxa kessees ; qassi azinai yeddido maccaasiyo ekkiya ooninne shaaramuxees .

text: Again , ye have heard that it hath been said by them of old time , Thou shalt not forswear thyself , but shalt perform unto the Lord thine oaths :
text2: “ Qassi beni asaa , ' Wordduwan caaqqoppa , shin ne Godau caaqqidoogaa pola ' giidoogaa siyideta .

text: But I say unto you , Swear not at all ; neither by heaven ; for it is God ' s throne :
text2: SHin taani intteyyo odais ; mulekka caaqqoppite ; saloi Xoossaa kawotaa araataa gidiyo gishshau , saluwan mulekka caaqqoppitenne ;

text: Nor by the earth ; for it is his footstool : neither by Jerusalem ; for it is the city of the great King .
text2: qassi sa7ai a gedee yedhdhiyoosaa gidiyo gishshau , sa7an caaqqoppite ; qassi Yerusalaamee gita kawuwaa katama gidiyo gishshau , Yerusalaamenkka caaqqoppite .

text: Neither shalt thou swear by thy head , because thou canst not make one hair white or black .
text2: Neeni issi binnaanakka bootta woi karetta kessanau danddayenna gishshau , ne huuphiyankka caaqqoppa .

text: But let your communication be , Yea , yea ; Nay , nay : for whatsoever is more than these cometh of evil .
text2: SHin intte , ' Ee ' woi , ' CHii ' giite ; hageetuppe hara caaqoi xalahe halaqaappe yees .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , An eye for an eye , and a tooth for a tooth :
text2: “ ' Aife gishshaa aife ; achcha gishshaa achcha ' giidoogaa siyideta .

text: But I say unto you , That ye resist not evil : but whosoever shall smite thee on thy right cheek , turn to him the other also .
text2: SHin taani intteyyo odais ; intteyyo iitabaa oottiya uraa diggoppite ; ooninne ne ushachcha bagga qinxxalliyaa baqqikko , ne haddirssa bagga qinxxalliyaakka a bessa ;

text: And if any man will sue thee at the law , and take away thy coat , let him have thy cloke also .
text2: ne qoliyaa ekkanau issi urai nena mootikko , he urai ne kootiyaakka ekko .

text: And whosoever shall compel thee to go a mile , go with him twain .
text2: Ooninne nena issi saate ogiyaa banaara wolqqan efiikko , aara naa77u saate ogiyaa ba .

text: Give to him that asketh thee , and from him that would borrow of thee turn not thou away .
text2: Nena woossiya urau imma ; qassi neeppe tal77ana koyiya uraukka diggoppa .

text: Ye have heard that it hath been said , Thou shalt love thy neighbour , and hate thine enemy .
text2: “ ' Ne shooruwaa siiqa ; ne morkkiyaa morkka ' giidoogaa siyideta .

text: But I say unto you , Love your enemies , bless them that curse you , do good to them that hate you , and pray for them which despitefully use you , and persecute you ;
text2: SHin taani intteyyo odais ; saluwan de7iya intte Aawau naata gidana mala , intte morkketa siiqite ; inttena qanggiyaageetakka anjjite ; inttena ixxiyaageetuyyo lo77obaa oottite ; inttena waissiyaageetuyyookka Xoossaa woossite ; aissi giikko , iita asaukka lo77o asaukka Xoossai ba awaa awaxxissees ; qassi xillotuyyookka nagaranchchatuyyookka ba iraa bukissees .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what reward have ye ? do not even the publicans the same ?
text2: Aissi giikko , intte inttena siiqiyaageetu xalaalaa siiqikko , intteyyo ai woitoi de7ii ? Harai atto , giiraa ekkiyaageetikka hegaadan oottoosona .

text: And if ye salute your brethren only , what do ye more than others ? do not even the publicans so ?
text2: Intte intte ishanttu xalaalaa sarotikko , harati oottiyoogaappe aadhdhiyaabaa ai oottidetii ? Harai atto , Xoossaa ammanenna asaikka hegaadan oottees .

text: Be ye therefore perfect , even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , saluwan de7iya intte Aawai bali bainnaagaa gidiyoogaadan , inttekka bali bainnaageeta gidite .

text: Take heed that ye do not your alms before men , to be seen of them : otherwise ye have no reward of your Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Intte ammano oosuwaa asa bessanau asa sinttan oottenna mala naagettite ; hegee xayikko , saluwan de7iya intte Aawai intteyyo woituwaa immenna .

text: Therefore when thou doest thine alms , do not sound a trumpet before thee , as the hypocrites do in the synagogues and in the streets , that they may have glory of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: “ Hegaa gishshau , intte aibakko hiyyeesau immiyo wode , lo77o milatiya iitati banttana bonchchissanau , Aihuda woosa keettatuuninne ogetun awaajissiyoogaadan awaajissoppite ; taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; eti bantta woituwaa ekkiichchidosona .

text: But when thou doest alms , let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth :
text2: SHin intte hiyyeesau immiyo wode , geeman immanaadan , intte ushachcha kushee oottiyoogaa intte haddirssa kushee eroppo ; geeman be7iya intte Aawai intteyyo qoncciyan immana .

text: And when thou prayest , thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are : for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets , that they may be seen of men . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: “ Xoossaa woossiiddi , lo77o milatiya iitatudan hanoppite ; aissi giikko , banttana asi be7ana mala ; Aihuda woosa keettatuuninne ogetu doonan eqqidi , Xoossaa woossiyoogaa dosoosona ; taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; eti bantta woituwaa muleera ekkiichchidosona .

text: But thou , when thou prayest , enter into thy closet , and when thou hast shut thy door , pray to thy Father which is in secret ; and thy Father which seeth in secret shall reward thee openly .
text2: SHin intte Xoossaa woossiyo wode , intte soo gelite ; kariyaa gorddidi , geeman de7iya intte Aawaa woossite ; geeman be7iya intte Aawai intteyyo qoncciyan immana .

text: But when ye pray , use not vain repetitions , as the heathen do : for they think that they shall be heard for their much speaking .
text2: “ Xoossaa intte woossiyo wode , Xoossaa ammanenna asaagaadan , mela biddoppite ; aissi giikko , Xoossaa ammanenna asai adussidi Xoossaa woossin siyees giidi qoppees .

text: Be not ye therefore like unto them : for your Father knoweth what things ye have need of , before ye ask him .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , he asaagaadan hanoppite ; aissi giikko , intte Aawai inttena koshshiyaagaa intte woossanaappe kasetidi erees .

text: After this manner therefore pray ye : Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name .
text2: Simmi intte hagaadan yaagidi , Xoossaa woossite ; ' Saluwan de7iya nu Aawau , ne geeshsha sunttai anjjetto .

text: Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done in earth , as it is in heaven .
text2: Ne kawotettai yo ; ne shenee saluwan hanidoogaadan , sa7ankka hano .

text: Give us this day our daily bread .
text2: Hachchi hachchi koshshiya qumaa nuuyyo hachchi imma .

text: And forgive us our debts , as we forgive our debtors .
text2: Nuuni nuna naaqqidaageetuyyo atto giyoogaadan , neenikka nu naaquwaa atto ga .

text: And lead us not into temptation , but deliver us from evil : For thine is the kingdom , and the power , and the glory , for ever . Amen .
text2: Nuna iitabaappe ashshanaappe attin , paacen gelissoppa . Kawotettai , wolqqainne bonchchoi merinaukka neessa . Amin77i ' yaagite .

text: For if ye forgive men their trespasses , your heavenly Father will also forgive you :
text2: “ Intte inttena naaqqida hara asaa naaquwaa atto giikko , saluwan de7iya intte Aawaikka intteyyo atto gaana .

text: But if ye forgive not men their trespasses , neither will your Father forgive your trespasses .
text2: SHin intte inttena naaqqida hara asaa naaquwaa atto gaana xayikko , intte Aawaikka intte naaquwaa atto geenna .

text: Moreover when ye fast , be not , as the hypocrites , of a sad countenance : for they disfigure their faces , that they may appear unto men to fast . Verily I say unto you , They have their reward .
text2: “ Qassi intte xoomiyo wode , lo77o milatiya iitatudan , kayyottiyaabaa milatoppite ; aissi giikko , eti xoomiyoogaa asai be7ana mala , bantta som77uwaa bullaalissoosona ; taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; eti bantta woituwaa muleera ekkiichchidosona .

text: But thou , when thou fastest , anoint thine head , and wash thy face ;
text2: “ SHin intte xoomiyo wode , intte Aawai intte xoomiyoogaa eranaappe attin , asi erenna mala , intte som77uwaa meeccite ; intte huuphiyaakka tiyettite ; yaatikko , geeman de7iya intte Aawai intte oottiyoogaa geeman be7idi , intteyyo qoncciyan immana .

text: Lay not up for yourselves treasures upon earth , where moth and rust doth corrupt , and where thieves break through and steal :
text2: “ Bil77i bashshiyoosaaninne birati shiyiyoosan , kaisoikka bookkidi wuuqqiyoosan , sa7an intte huuphessi miishsha dagayoppite .

text: But lay up for yourselves treasures in heaven , where neither moth nor rust doth corrupt , and where thieves do not break through nor steal :
text2: SHin bil77inne qunoi bashshennasan , kaisoikka bookkidi wuuqqennasan intte huuphessi saluwan miishsha dagayite .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Aissi giikko , ne wozanai ne miishshai de7iyoosan de7ana .

text: The light of the body is the eye : if therefore thine eye be single , thy whole body shall be full of light .
text2: “ Bollaa xomppee aifiyaa ; hegaa gishshau , ne aifee payya gidikko , ne bolla ubbai poo7o gidana .

text: But if thine eye be evil , thy whole body shall be full of darkness . If therefore the light that is in thee be darkness , how great is that darkness !
text2: SHin ne aifee payya gidana xayikko , ne bolla ubbai xumana ; simmi ne bolli de7iya poo7oi xumikko , xumai ai keenaa xumanddeeshsha !

text: No man can serve two masters : for either he will hate the one , and love the other ; or else he will hold to the one , and despise the other . Ye cannot serve God and mammon .
text2: “ Naa77u godatuyyo haarettanau danddayiyai ooninne baawa ; aissi giikko , woi issuwaa ixxidi , hinkkuwaa siiqana ; woi issuwaa bonchchidi , hinkkuwaa karana ; Xoossaassinne miishshaassi haarettanau danddayekketa .

text: Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink ; nor yet for your body , what ye shall put on . Is not the life more than meat , and the body than raiment ?
text2: “ Hegaa gishshau , taani intteyyo odais ; intte paxa de7anau maanabaassinne uyanabaassi , woi intte bollau maayanabaassi hirggoppite ; shemppoi qumappe aadhdhennee ? Qassi bollai maayoppe aadhdhennee ?

text: Behold the fowls of the air : for they sow not , neither do they reap , nor gather into barns ; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them . Are ye not much better than they ?
text2: Paalliya kafota xeellite ; eti zerokkona ; cakkokkona ; gootarankka qolokkona ; shin saluwan de7iya intte Aawai eta mizees ; intte etappe keehi aadhdhekketii ?

text: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature ?
text2: Intte giddon keehi qoppidi , ba geesaa bolli issi wara gujjanau danddayiyai oonee ?

text: And why take ye thought for raiment ? Consider the lilies of the field , how they grow ; they toil not , neither do they spin :
text2: “ Aissi maayossi hirggeetii ? Dembban de7iya ciishshati waani dicciyaakko , akeeki xeellite ; eti daafurokkona woi puutto suqqokkona .

text: And yet I say unto you , That even Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: SHin taani intteyyo odais ; harai atto , Solomoni hegaa keena bonchchettidaagaa gidiiddi , he ciishshatuppe issuwaagaa malaa maayibeenna .

text: Wherefore , if God so clothe the grass of the field , which to day is , and to morrow is cast into the oven , shall he not much more clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: SHin laafa ammanoi de7iyoogeetoo , Xoossai , hachchi de7idi , wontto coociyaa taman eexxiya dembbaa maataa maizziyaagee , inttena etaagaappe aattidi waati maizzennee ?

text: Therefore take no thought , saying , What shall we eat ? or , What shall we drink ? or , Wherewithal shall we be clothed ?
text2: Simmi , ' Nuuni ai maanee ? Woi ai uyanee ? Woi ai maayanee ? ' yaagidi hirggoppite .

text: ( For after all these things do the Gentiles seek : ) for your heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things .
text2: Aissi giikko , he ubbabaa Xoossaa ammanennaageeti darissidi koyoosona ; he ubbai inttena koshshiyoogaa saluwan de7iya intte Aawai erees .

text: But seek ye first the kingdom of God , and his righteousness ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: SHin kasetidi , Xoossaa kawotettaanne a xillotettaa koyite ; i intteyyo he ubbabaa immana .

text: Take therefore no thought for the morrow : for the morrow shall take thought for the things of itself . Sufficient unto the day is the evil thereof .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , wonttobau hirggoppite ; aissi giikko , wonttoi bau hirggana ; gallassa ubbaukka gidiya a huuphe waayee de7ees .

text: Judge not , that ye be not judged .
text2: “ Xoossai intte bolli pirddenna mala , inttekka haratu bolli pirddoppite .

text: For with what judgment ye judge , ye shall be judged : and with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you again .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte haratu bolli pirddiyoogaadan , Xoossai intte bolli pirddana ; qassi intte haratuyyo immanau makkiyooban i intteyyo makkana .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but considerest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: Ne aifiyan de7iya tuussaa be7akka ; shin ne ishaa aifiyan de7iya suullaa aissi xeellai ?

text: Or how wilt thou say to thy brother , Let me pull out the mote out of thine eye ; and , behold , a beam is in thine own eye ?
text2: Woi ne aifiyan tuussai de7ishin , neeni ne ishaa , ' Taani ne aifiyaappe suullaa kessoo ' waanada gaanau danddayai ?

text: Thou hypocrite , first cast out the beam out of thine own eye ; and then shalt thou see clearly to cast out the mote out of thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Laa ha lo77o milatiya iitau , kasetada ne aifiyaappe tuussaa kessargga ; hegaappe guyyiyan , ne ishaa aifiyaappe suullaa kessanau geeshshada xeellana danddayaasa .

text: Give not that which is holy unto the dogs , neither cast ye your pearls before swine , lest they trample them under their feet , and turn again and rend you .
text2: “ Geeshshabaa kanatuyyo immoppite ; eti guyye simmidi , inttena saxxana . Qassi inqquwaa giyo intte al77o shuchchaa gudunttatu sintti oloppite ; eti bantta tohuwan yedhdhana .

text: Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you :
text2: “ Woossite ; intte ekkana . Koyite ; intte demmana . Kare yiidi xeesite ; intteyyo karee dooyettana .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Aissi giikko , woossiya ubbai ekkana ; koyiya urai demmana ; qassi kare yiidi xeesiya urau karee dooyettana .

text: Or what man is there of you , whom if his son ask bread , will he give him a stone ?
text2: Woi intte giddon ba na7i , ' Oitta imma ' giikko , shuchcha immiya aawu de7ii ?

text: Or if he ask a fish , will he give him a serpent ?
text2: Qassi , ' Mole imma ' giikko , ayyo shooshsha immanee ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children , how much more shall your Father which is in heaven give good things to them that ask him ?
text2: Intte iita gidiiddi , intte naatussi lo77obaa immiyoogaa erikko , yaatin , saluwan de7iya intte Aawai bana woossiyaageetussi lo77obaa waati darissidi immanddeeshsha !

text: Therefore all things whatsoever ye would that men should do to you , do ye even so to them : for this is the law and the prophets .
text2: “ Hegaa gishshau , hara asi intteyyo oottanau koyiyo ubbabaa inttekka asau oottite ; aissi giikko , Muuse higgiyaa birshshettainne hananabaa yootiyaageeti tamaarissiyoogee hegaa .

text: Enter ye in at the strait gate : for wide is the gate , and broad is the way , that leadeth to destruction , and many there be which go in thereat :
text2: “ Un77o penggiyaara gelite . Aissi giikko , bashshau efiya penggee aaho ; ogeekka woggaa . Hegaara geliya asaikka daro .

text: Because strait is the gate , and narrow is the way , which leadeth unto life , and few there be that find it .
text2: “ Aissi giikko , de7uwau efiya penggee un77o ; ogeekka xuntta . Qassi hegaara biya asatikka amaridaageeta .

text: Beware of false prophets , which come to you in sheep ' s clothing , but inwardly they are ravening wolves .
text2: “ Bolla baggaara dorssa milatidi , inttekko yiya wordduwaa hananabaa yootiyaageetuppe naagettite ; shin tumaappe eti garssa baggaara wanggireellotu mala .

text: Ye shall know them by their fruits . Do men gather grapes of thorns , or figs of thistles ?
text2: Eti aifiyo aifiyan intte eta erana ; aguntti woine giyo turaa aife aifenna ; gom77oreekka balase giyo mittaa aife aifenna .

text: Even so every good tree bringeth forth good fruit ; but a corrupt tree bringeth forth evil fruit .
text2: Hegaadankka , lo77o mitta ubbai lo77o aife aifees ; shin iita mitti iita aife aifees .

text: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit , neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: Lo77o mitti iita aife aifanau danddayenna ; qassi iita mittikka lo77o aife aifanau danddayenna .

text: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Lo77o aife aifenna mitta ubbai qanxxettidi , taman yegettana .

text: Wherefore by their fruits ye shall know them .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte eti aifiyo aifiyan eta erana .

text: Not every one that saith unto me , Lord , Lord , shall enter into the kingdom of heaven ; but he that doeth the will of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Saluwan de7iya ta Aawai giidoogaa oottiya urai saluwaa gelanaappe attin , ' Ta Godau , ta Godau ' giya ubbai gelenna .

text: Many will say to me in that day , Lord , Lord , have we not prophesied in thy name ? and in thy name have cast out devils ? and in thy name done many wonderful works ?
text2: He gallassi daro asai tana , ' Nu Godau , nu Godau , nuuni ne sunttan hananabaa yootibookkonii ? Ne sunttan xalaheta kessibookkonii ? Qassi nuuni Xoossai oottiyo malaataa ne sunttan oottibookkonii ? ' yaagana .

text: And then will I profess unto them , I never knew you : depart from me , ye that work iniquity .
text2: Taani he wode eta , ' Taani inttena mulekka erikke ; iitabaa oottiyaageeti intte ta matappe haakkite ' yaagana .

text: Therefore whosoever heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them , I will liken him unto a wise man , which built his house upon a rock :
text2: “ Hegaa gishshau , hagaa ta qaalaa siyidi oottiya ubbai shuchchan ba keettaa keexxida wozannaama asa mala .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell not : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: Irai bukkiis ; di7oi di77iis ; carkkoikka carkkidi , he keettaa sugiis . SHin keettai shuchchan keexettido gishshau kunddibeenna .

text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine , and doeth them not , shall be likened unto a foolish man , which built his house upon the sand :
text2: “ Hagaa ta qaalaa siyidi oottenna asai ubbai , ba keettaa shafiyan keexxida eeyya asa mala .

text: And the rain descended , and the floods came , and the winds blew , and beat upon that house ; and it fell : and great was the fall of it .
text2: Irai bukkiis ; di7oi di77iis ; carkkoikka carkkidi , he keettaa sugin , keettai kunddiis . He keettai wolqqaama kunddettaa kunddiis ” yaagiis .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had ended these sayings , the people were astonished at his doctrine :
text2: Yesuusi ba haasayiyoogaa wurssido wode , asai i tamaarissiyoogan garamettiis .

text: For he taught them as one having authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Aissi giikko , i eta tamaarissiiddi , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetudan gidennan , bau alaafetettai de7iyo asadan tamaarissees .

text: When he was come down from the mountain , great multitudes followed him .
text2: Yesuusi deriyaappe wodhdhido wode , daro asai a kaalliis .

text: And , behold , there came a leper and worshipped him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Inchchirichchai oiqqido issi bitanee Yesuusakko yiidi , a sinttan gulbbatidi , “ Godau , neeni koyikko , tana pattanau danddayaasa ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will ; be thou clean . And immediately his leprosy was cleansed .
text2: Yesuusi ba kushiyaa yeddidi , a bochchidi , “ Taani koyais ; paxa ” yaagiis . Yaagin sohuwaarakka inchchirichchai bitaniyaa yeddi aggiis .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , See thou tell no man ; but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer the gift that Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Yesuusi a , “ Simmi hagaa ooyyoonne yootoppa ; shin qeesiyaakko baada ne bollaa a bessa ; neeni paxidoogaa asaa erissanau Muusee azazido yarshshuwaa yarshsha ” yaagiis .

text: And when Jesus was entered into Capernaum , there came unto him a centurion , beseeching him ,
text2: Yesuusi Qifirinaahooma katamaa gelido wode , issi mato halaqai akko yiidi , “ Ta Godau , ta ashkkaraa asatettai silin , daro sahettiiddi , son zin77iis ; hai pattarkkiishsha ” yaagidi woossiis .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , I will come and heal him .
text2: Woossin Yesuusi , “ Taani baada a pattana ” yaagiis .

text: The centurion answered and said , Lord , I am not worthy that thou shouldest come under my roof : but speak the word only , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: SHin mato halaqai zaaridi yaagiis ; “ Ta Godau , nena ta soo gelissanau tau bessenna ; shin neeni doona xalaalaa haasaya ; ta ashkkarai paxana .

text: For I am a man under authority , having soldiers under me : and I say to this man , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani taappe bollaara de7iyaageetuyyo haarettiya asa ; qassi taappe garssaara wotaaddarati de7oosona . Taani issuwaa , ' Ba ' giikko bees ; qassi hinkkuwaa , ' Haaya ' giikko yees ; ta ashkkaraa , ' Hagaa ootta ' giikko oottees ” yaagiis .

text: When Jesus heard it , he marvelled , and said to them that followed , Verily I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa siyido wode garamettidi , bana kaalliya asaa hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; taani hagaa mala ammanuwaa harai atto , Israa7eela biittankka be7abeikke .

text: And I say unto you , That many shall come from the east and west , and shall sit down with Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Taani intteyyo odais ; daro asai arshshoppenne arggoppe yiidi , Abrahaamaara , Yisaaqaaranne Yaaqoobaara saluwaa kawotettan issippe uttana .

text: But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: SHin kawotettan de7anau bessiyo asai xumau kare olettana ; hegan eti yeekkananne bantta achchaa garccana ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus said unto the centurion , Go thy way ; and as thou hast believed , so be it done unto thee . And his servant was healed in the selfsame hour .
text2: Yesuusi mato halaqaa , “ Ne soo ba ; neeni ammanidoogaadan neeyyo hanana ” yaagiis ; yaagin mato halaqaa ashkkarai he saatenkka paxi aggiis .

text: And when Jesus was come into Peter ' s house , he saw his wife ' s mother laid , and sick of a fever .
text2: Yesuusi PHeexiroosa soo biidi , a bollotiyaa qoxonne misho harggada zin77idaaro be7iis .

text: And he touched her hand , and the fever left her : and she arose , and ministered unto them .
text2: I kushiyaa i bochchin , qoxoinne mishoi o aggi bayiis ; aggi bayin , a denddada ayyo oottaasu .

text: When the even was come , they brought unto him many that were possessed with devils : and he cast out the spirits with his word , and healed all that were sick :
text2: Sa7ai omariyo wode , asai xalaheti oiqqido daro asaa Yesuusakko ehiis ; hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi , “ I nu sahuwaa bau ekkiis ; qassi nu harggiyaakka tookkiis ” giidoogee polettana mala , Yesuusi tuna ayyaanata ba qaalan kessidi , harggida asa ubbaakka pattiis .

text: Now when Jesus saw great multitudes about him , he gave commandment to depart unto the other side .
text2: Yesuusi daro asai ba matan yuuyi aadhdhidi eqqidoogaa be7idi , abbaappe hefintti pinnana mala , ba erissiyo ashkkarata azaziis .

text: And a certain scribe came , and said unto him , Master , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Higgiyaa tamaarissiya issoi akko yiidi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , neeni biyoosaa ubbaa taani nena kaallana ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , The foxes have holes , and the birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Yesuusi a , “ Worakanatussi ollai de7ees ; kafotussikka keettai de7ees ; shin taani , Asa Na7ai , zin77ada shemppa ekkiyoosikka tau baawa ” yaagiis .

text: And another of his disciples said unto him , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Qassi kaalliyaageetuppe issoi a , “ Godau , taani kaseta baada ta aawaa moogoo ? ” yaagiis .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Follow me ; and let the dead bury their dead .
text2: SHin Yesuusi a , “ Neeni tana kaalla ; haiqqidaageeti bantta haiqqidaageeta moogona ” yaagiis .

text: And when he was entered into a ship , his disciples followed him .
text2: Yesuusi wolwoluwan gelin , erissiyo ashkkarati aara biidosona .

text: And , behold , there arose a great tempest in the sea , insomuch that the ship was covered with the waves : but he was asleep .
text2: Beetai wolwoluwaa kumana gakkanaashin , sohuwaara abban wolqqaama gotee denddiis ; shin Yesuusi xiskkiis .

text: And his disciples came to him , and awoke him , saying , Lord , save us : we perish .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati akko biidi , xiskkuwaappe denttidosona ; denttidi a , “ Godau , nuuni xayoos ; nuna ashsharkkii ” yaagidosona .

text: And he saith unto them , Why are ye fearful , O ye of little faith ? Then he arose , and rebuked the winds and the sea ; and there was a great calm .
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Ha ammanoi paccidoogeetoo , aissi yayyeetii ? ” yaagiis . Hegaappe guyyiyan denddidi , gotiyaanne beetaa aggite gin , goteenne beetai woppu giidosona .

text: But the men marvelled , saying , What manner of man is this , that even the winds and the sea obey him !
text2: Asai garamettidi , “ Hagee laa harai atto , goteenne beetai azazettiyoogee aiba asee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And when he was come to the other side into the country of the Gergesenes , there met him two possessed with devils , coming out of the tombs , exceeding fierce , so that no man might pass by that way .
text2: Yesuusi abbaappe hefinttan de7iya Gerggesenoona giyo biittaa pinniis ; xalaheti oiqqido naa77u asati he biittan de7oosona ; asa moogiyo gonggoluwaappe eti kiyidi , aara gaittidosona . Eti daro wolqqaama gidiyo gishshau , ooninne he ogiyaara aadhdhanau danddayibeenna .

text: And , behold , they cried out , saying , What have we to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God ? art thou come hither to torment us before the time ?
text2: Eti bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Xoossaa Na7au , nunanne nenanne aibee gattiyai ? Wodee gakkennan nuna qaxxayanau yaadii ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And there was a good way off from them an herd of many swine feeding .
text2: Etappe haahuwan gudunttaa wudee heemettees .

text: So the devils besought him , saying , If thou cast us out , suffer us to go away into the herd of swine .
text2: Xalaheti Yesuusa , “ Neeni nuna kessanabaa gidikko , hini gudunttaa wudiyaa giddo yeddarkkii ” yaagidi woossidosona .

text: And he said unto them , Go . And when they were come out , they went into the herd of swine : and , behold , the whole herd of swine ran violently down a steep place into the sea , and perished in the waters .
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Biite ” gin eti bitaniyaappe kiyidi biidi , gudunttatun gelidosona . Gelin gudunttaa wudee ubbai kakaa huuphiyaara jaamiiddi , abban gelidi , meetetti bayiis .

text: And they that kept them fled , and went their ways into the city , and told every thing , and what was befallen to the possessed of the devils .
text2: Gudunttaa wudiyaa heemmiyaageeti baqatidi , katamaa biidosona ; biidi xalaheti oiqqido asati hanidobaa ubbaa yootidosona .

text: And , behold , the whole city came out to meet Jesus : and when they saw him , they besought him that he would depart out of their coasts .
text2: Yootin kataman de7iya asai ubbai Yesuusaara gaittanau kiyiis ; a be7ido wode , ba biittaappe baana mala woossiis .

text: And he entered into a ship , and passed over , and came into his own city .
text2: Yesuusi wolwoluwan gelidi , abbaa pinnidi , ba katamaa biis .

text: And , behold , they brought to him a man sick of the palsy , lying on a bed : and Jesus seeing their faith said unto the sick of the palsy ; Son , be of good cheer ; thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Amarida asati bollai silido issi bitaniyaa halan tookkidi , Yesuusakko ehiidosona ; Yesuusi eta ammanuwaa be7idi , bollai silido bitaniyaa , “ Ta na7au , yayyoppa ; ne nagarai atto geetettiis ” yaagiis .

text: And , behold , certain of the scribes said within themselves , This man blasphemeth .
text2: Yaagin higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuppe issooti issooti bantta wozanan , “ Laa ha bitanee Xoossaa bolli iitabaa haasayeesittennee ! ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus knowing their thoughts said , Wherefore think ye evil in your hearts ?
text2: Yesuusi eta qofaa eridi , eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Intte intte wozanan hegaadan iitabaa aissi qoppeetii ?

text: For whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and walk ?
text2: ' Ne nagarai atto geetettiis ' giyoogee mateeyye ? Woi , ' Dendda eqqada hemetta ' giyoogee matee ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( then saith he to the sick of the palsy , ) Arise , take up thy bed , and go unto thine house .
text2: SHin sa7aa bollan nagara atto gaanau taayyo , Asa Na7aayyo , alaafetettai de7iyoogaa taani inttena erissana ” yaagidi , hegaappe he bollai silido bitaniyaa , “ Dendda eqqa ; yaatada ne halaa tookkada , ne soo ba ” yaagiis .

text: And he arose , and departed to his house .
text2: Yaagin silida bitanee denddi eqqidi , ba soo biis .

text: But when the multitudes saw it , they marvelled , and glorified God , which had given such power unto men .
text2: SHin daro asai hegaa be7idi yayyiis ; yayyidi asaayyo hagaa mala alaafetettaa immida Xoossaa galatiis .

text: And as Jesus passed forth from thence , he saw a man , named Matthew , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he saith unto him , Follow me . And he arose , and followed him .
text2: Yesuusi hegaara aadhdhiiddi , Maatiyoosa giyoogee giiraa giiriyoosan uttidaagaa demmidi a , “ Tana kaalla ” yaagiis . Yaagin Maatiyoosi denddi eqqidi , a kaalliis .

text: And it came to pass , as Jesus sat at meat in the house , behold , many publicans and sinners came and sat down with him and his disciples .
text2: Yesuusi maatiyoosa son qumaa maanau uttidaashin , giiraa ekkiya daro asatinne nagaranchchati yiidi , aaranne i erissiyo ashkkaratuura issippe uttidosona .

text: And when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto his disciples , Why eateth your Master with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Issi issi Parisaaweti hegaa be7idi , Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Inttena tamaarissiyaagee giiraa ekkiyaageetuuranne nagaranchchatuura qumaa aissi issippe mii ? ” yaagidosona .

text: But when Jesus heard that , he said unto them , They that be whole need not a physician , but they that are sick .
text2: SHin Yesuusi eti giyoogaa siyidi , “ Hargganchchatussippe attin , payyatuyyo aakime koshshenna .

text: But go ye and learn what that meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice : for I am not come to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: SHin intte biidi , Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Taani maarotettaa koyaisippe attin , yarshshuwaa koyikke ' giyoogee woigiyoogaakkonne erite ; aissi giikko , taani nagaranchchata xeesanau yiidoogaappe attin , xillota xeesanau yabeikke ” yaagiis .

text: Then came to him the disciples of John , saying , Why do we and the Pharisees fast oft , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: He wode Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Nuuninne Parssaaweti xoomoos ; shin neeni erissiyo ashkkarati aissi xoomokkonaa ? ” yaagidi a oichchidosona .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber mourn , as long as the bridegroom is with them ? but the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken from them , and then shall they fast .
text2: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Bullachchaa yiida asati machchiyo ekkiyaagee banttanaara de7ishin , kayyottanau danddayiyoonaa ? Danddayokkona ; shin machchiyo ekkiyaagaa eta matappe efaana wodee yaana ; eti he wode xoomana .

text: No man putteth a piece of new cloth unto an old garment , for that which is put in to fill it up taketh from the garment , and the rent is made worse .
text2: “ Ceega maayo bolli ooratta woto wotti sikkiya asi baawa ; aissi giikko , he wotoi maayuwaa peererettana ; peerettaikka kaseegaappe darana .

text: Neither do men put new wine into old bottles : else the bottles break , and the wine runneth out , and the bottles perish : but they put new wine into new bottles , and both are preserved .
text2: Ho77o woine eessa ceega ogoron naaqqiya asi baawa . SHin naaqqikko , he woiniyaa eessai ogoruwaa daakkana ; baukka gukkana ; ogoroikka moorettana . SHin , ho77o woine eessa ooratta ogoron naaqqeettees ; naa77aikka moorettokkona ” yaagiis .

text: While he spake these things unto them , behold , there came a certain ruler , and worshipped him , saying , My daughter is even now dead : but come and lay thy hand upon her , and she shall live .
text2: Yesuusi etayyo hegaa odishin , Aihuda halaqatuppe issoi akko yiidi , a sinttan gulbbatidi , “ Ta na7iyaa ha77i haiqqaasu ; shin neeni yaada ne kushiyaa i bolli wottarkkii ; haiquwaappe a paxana ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus arose , and followed him , and so did his disciples .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi denddidi , ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura issippe a kaallidi biis .

text: And , behold , a woman , which was diseased with an issue of blood twelve years , came behind him , and touched the hem of his garment :
text2: Biishin tammanne naa77u laittaasappe doommidi , i bollaappe suuttai goggiyo issi maccaasiyaa guyyeera shiiqada , Yesuusa afalaa macaraa bochchaasu .

text: For she said within herself , If I may but touch his garment , I shall be whole .
text2: Aissi giikko , a ba wozanan , “ Taani a afalaa xalaalaa bochchikko paxana ” yaagada qoppaasu .

text: But Jesus turned him about , and when he saw her , he said , Daughter , be of good comfort ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And the woman was made whole from that hour .
text2: SHin Yesuusi simmidi o xeellidi , “ Ta na7ee , yayyoppa ; nena ne ammanoi pattiis ” yaagiis . He sohuwaarakka maccaasiyaa paxa aggaasu .

text: And when Jesus came into the ruler ' s house , and saw the minstrels and the people making a noise ,
text2: Yesuusi Aihuda halaqaa soo gakkido wode , yeehuwan dinkkiyaa punniya asaanne yeekkiya asaa be7idi ,

text: He said unto them , Give place : for the maid is not dead , but sleepeth . And they laughed him to scorn .
text2: “ Kare kiyite ; guutta na7iyaa xiskkaasuppe attin , haiqqabeikku ” yaagiis . Yaagin asai a bolli keehi miicciis .

text: But when the people were put forth , he went in , and took her by the hand , and the maid arose .
text2: SHin daro asaa kare i kessidoogaappe guyyiyan , soo gelidi , na7ee kushiyaa oiqqiis ; oiqqin na7iyaa dendda aggaasu .

text: And the fame hereof went abroad into all that land .
text2: He odoi he biitta ubbaa gakkiis .

text: And when Jesus departed thence , two blind men followed him , crying , and saying , Thou Son of David , have mercy on us .
text2: Yesuusi hegaara aadhdhidi biishin , naa77u qooqeti bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Daawita na7au , nuna maararkkii ” yaagiiddi a kaallidosona .

text: And when he was come into the house , the blind men came to him : and Jesus saith unto them , Believe ye that I am able to do this ? They said unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: Yesuusi soo gelido wode , qooqeti akko yiidosona ; yin Yesuusi eta , “ Taani hagaa oottanau danddayiyoogaa ammaneetii ? ” yaagiis . Eti , “ Ee Godau ” yaagidosona .

text: Then touched he their eyes , saying , According to your faith be it unto you .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi eta aifiyaa bochchidi eta , “ Intteyyo intte ammanuwaadan hano ” yaagiis .

text: And their eyes were opened ; and Jesus straitly charged them , saying , See that no man know it .
text2: Eta aifee dooyetti aggiis ; Yesuusi etayyo , “ Hagaa ooyyoonne odoppite ” yaagidi minttidi yootiis .

text: But they , when they were departed , spread abroad his fame in all that country .
text2: SHin asati biidi , he biitta ubban Yesuusabaa odidosona .

text: As they went out , behold , they brought to him a dumb man possessed with a devil .
text2: Eti kiyidi biishin , amarida asati xalahee oiqqin duudida bitaniyaa Yesuusakko ehiidosona .

text: And when the devil was cast out , the dumb spake : and the multitudes marvelled , saying , It was never so seen in Israel .
text2: Yesuusi xalahiyaa kessidoogaappe guyyiyan , duude bitanee haasayiis . Asai , “ Hagee oorattabaa ; hagaa malabai Israa7eela biittan mulekka hanibeenna ” yaagiis .

text: But the Pharisees said , He casteth out devils through the prince of the devils .
text2: SHin Parisaaweti , “ I xalahetu halaqaa wolqqan xalaheta kessees ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus went about all the cities and villages , teaching in their synagogues , and preaching the gospel of the kingdom , and healing every sickness and every disease among the people .
text2: Yesuusi eta Aihuda woosa keettatun tamaarissiiddinne kawotettaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiiddi , qassi hargge ubbaappenne saho ubbaappe asa pattiiddi , wogga katamatuuninne qeeri katamatun ubban yuuyiis .

text: But when he saw the multitudes , he was moved with compassion on them , because they fainted , and were scattered abroad , as sheep having no shepherd .
text2: Daro asaa be7idi , heemmiya asi bainna dorssadan asai hirggiyo gishshaunne asaa maaddiyaabi bainna gishshau , asaayyo qarettiis .

text: Then saith he unto his disciples , The harvest truly is plenteous , but the labourers are few ;
text2: Yaatidi ba erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Kattai daro ; shin cakkiya asai guutta .

text: Pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he will send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: Simmi kattaa Godai kattaa cakkanau oosanchcha yeddana mala , a woossite ” yaagiis .

text: And when he had called unto him his twelve disciples , he gave them power against unclean spirits , to cast them out , and to heal all manner of sickness and all manner of disease .
text2: Yesuusi ba tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata xeesidi , eti tuna ayyaanaa kessana mala , qassi hargge ubbaanne saho ubbaa pattana mala , etayyo maataa immiis .

text: Now the names of the twelve apostles are these ; The first , Simon , who is called Peter , and Andrew his brother ; James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother ;
text2: Yesuusi kiittido tammanne naa77atu sunttai , koiroogee PHeexiroosa giyo Simoonanne a ishaa Inddiraasa , Zabddiyoosa naata ishantta , Yaaqoobanne Yohaannisa ,

text: Philip , and Bartholomew ; Thomas , and Matthew the publican ; James the son of Alphaeus , and Lebbaeus , whose surname was Thaddaeus ;
text2: Piliphphoosanne Barttalamoosa , Toomaasanne giiraa ekkiya Maatiyoosa , Ilppiyoosa na7aa Yaaqoobanne Taaddiyoosa giyo Libddiyoosa ;

text: Simon the Canaanite , and Judas Iscariot , who also betrayed him .
text2: ba biittau mishettiya Simoonanne Yesuusa aattidi immida Asqqorootu Yihudaa .

text: These twelve Jesus sent forth , and commanded them , saying , Go not into the way of the Gentiles , and into any city of the Samaritans enter ye not :
text2: Yesuusi ha tammanne naa77ata hagaadan yaagidi kiittiis ; “ Aihuda gidenna asaa biitti booppite ; qassi Samaaretu katamaakka geloppite ;

text: But go rather to the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: hegaa gishshaa bayida dorssaakko , Israa7eela asaakko biite .

text: And as ye go , preach , saying , The kingdom of heaven is at hand .
text2: Biidi , ' Saluwaa kawotettai matattiis ' yaagidi yootite .

text: Heal the sick , cleanse the lepers , raise the dead , cast out devils : freely ye have received , freely give .
text2: Hargganchchata pattite ; haiqqidaageeta haiquwaappe denttite ; inchchirichchai oiqqidoogeetakka pattite ; xalahetakka kessite . Intte coo ekkideta ; coo immite .

text: Provide neither gold , nor silver , nor brass in your purses ,
text2: Worqqa woi bira woi santtime intte kiisiyan oiqqoppite ;

text: Nor scrip for your journey , neither two coats , neither shoes , nor yet staves : for the workman is worthy of his meat .
text2: woi ogiyau qarcciita , woi naa77antto qole , woi caamma woi xam77a oiqqoppite . Aissi giikko , oosanchchau koshshiyaabaa immanau bessees .

text: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter , inquire who in it is worthy ; and there abide till ye go thence .
text2: “ Intte geliyo kataman woi qeeri kataman ubban inttena mokkanau ufaittiyai oonakkonne akeekan xomoosite ; intte hegaappe kiyana gakkanaashin , aagan uttite .

text: And when ye come into an house , salute it .
text2: Qassi soo geliiddi sarotite .

text: And if the house be worthy , let your peace come upon it : but if it be not worthy , let your peace return to you .
text2: He keettan de7iya asai inttena mokkikko , intte sarotido sarotai eta gakko . SHin eti inttena mokkennan ixxikko , intte sarotido sarotai intteyyo guyye simmo .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear your words , when ye depart out of that house or city , shake off the dust of your feet .
text2: Qassi issi issi keettai woi katamai inttena mokkennan woi intte yootiyoobaa siyennan ixxikko , he keettaappe woi he katamaappe kiyiiddi , intte tohuwaappe buhiyaa shocite .

text: Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; Xoossai pirddaa gallassi he katamaa asatuppe , Sadooma katamaa asaunne Gamoora katamaa asau pirddaa kehissana .

text: Behold , I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves : be ye therefore wise as serpents , and harmless as doves .
text2: “ Be7ite ! Taani inttena dorssaa wanggireello giddo yeddiyoogaadan yeddais . Hegaa gishshau , shooshshadan cincca gidite ; qassi haraphphedan , ashkke gidite .

text: But beware of men : for they will deliver you up to the councils , and they will scourge you in their synagogues ;
text2: SHin asappe naagettite . Aissi giikko , asi inttena pirdda keettau aattidi immana ; qassi ba Aihuda woosa keettatunkka inttena lissuwan garafana .

text: And ye shall be brought before governors and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them and the Gentiles .
text2: Deriyaa haariyaageetu sinttaaninne kawotu sinttan ta gishshau intte eqqidi , etassinne Aihuda gidenna asaassi wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootana .

text: But when they deliver you up , take no thought how or what ye shall speak : for it shall be given you in that same hour what ye shall speak .
text2: SHin eti inttena pirddau aattiyo wode , intte haasayanabaa he saatiyan Xoossai intteyyo immiyo gishshau , intte gaanabaunne woi woigi haasayanaakkonne hirggoppite .

text: For it is not ye that speak , but the Spirit of your Father which speaketh in you .
text2: Aissi giikko , inttenan de7idi haasayiyai intte Aawaa Geeshsha Ayyaanaa gidiyoogaappe attin , haasayiyaageeti inttena gidekketa .

text: And the brother shall deliver up the brother to death , and the father the child : and the children shall rise up against their parents , and cause them to be put to death .
text2: “ Ishai ba ishaa , aawai ba na7aa worissana ; naati bantta aawatu bollinne bantta aayetu bolli denddidi , eta worissana .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that endureth to the end shall be saved .
text2: Qassi asai ubbai inttena ta sunttaa gishshau ixxana ; shin wurssettai gakkanaashin gencciyaagee attana .

text: But when they persecute you in this city , flee ye into another : for verily I say unto you , Ye shall not have gone over the cities of Israel , till the Son of man be come .
text2: Eti inttena issi katamaappe yedettikko , hara katamaa baqatite . Aissi giikko , taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; taani , Asa Na7ai , yaana gakkanaashin , intte intte oosuwaa Israa7eela katama ubban ootti wurssekketa .

text: The disciple is not above his master , nor the servant above his lord .
text2: “ Tamaariyaagee bana tamaarissiyaagaappe darenna ; ashkkaraikka ba godaappe darenna .

text: It is enough for the disciple that he be as his master , and the servant as his lord . If they have called the master of the house Beelzebub , how much more shall they call them of his household ?
text2: Tamaariyaagee bana tamaarissiyaagaa keeni gidiyoogee , ashkkaraikka ba godaa keeni gidiyoogee au gidana ; eti keettaawaa Bi7eeli - Zeebula giidi xeesikko , a so asaa ai keenaa mooridi xeesaneeshsha !

text: Fear them not therefore : for there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; and hid , that shall not be known .
text2: “ Simmi asassi yayyoppite ; aissi giikko , gentti wottidobai qoncciyaa kiyennan attenna ; qottidobaikka erettennan attenna .

text: What I tell you in darkness , that speak ye in light : and what ye hear in the ear , that preach ye upon the housetops .
text2: Taani intteyyo xuman odiyoobaa poo7uwan haasayite ; intteyyo haittan saasukkidi odidobaa , keettaa huuphiyan awaajjite .

text: And fear not them which kill the body , but are not able to kill the soul : but rather fear him which is able to destroy both soul and body in hell .
text2: Ashuwaa woriyaageetuyyo yayyoppite ; eti shemppuwaa woranau danddayokkona . SHin shemppuwaanne ashuwaa Gaannabiyan xaissanau danddayiya Xoossaassi yayyite .

text: Are not two sparrows sold for a farthing ? and one of them shall not fall on the ground without your Father .
text2: Naa77u siine kafoti bakkannan baizettokkonaayye ? Intte Aawai gaana xayikko , he siine kafotuppe issinniyaakka sa7an wodhdhukku .

text: But the very hairs of your head are all numbered .
text2: SHin harai atto , intte huuphiyan de7iya binnaana ubbaikka qoodan de7ees .

text: Fear ye not therefore , ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: Simmi yayyoppite ; daro siine kafotuppe intte aadhdheeta .

text: Whosoever therefore shall confess me before men , him will I confess also before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Hegaa gishshau , asa sinttan tabaa markkattiya ooyyo gidikkonne , taanikka saluwan de7iya ta Aawaa sinttan markkattana ;

text: But whosoever shall deny me before men , him will I also deny before my Father which is in heaven .
text2: shin asa sinttan tana kaddiya oonanne taanikka qassi saluwan de7iya ta Aawaa sinttan a kaddana .

text: Think not that I am come to send peace on earth : I came not to send peace , but a sword .
text2: “ Taani sa7aassi sarotettaa ehaanau yiidobaa inttessi milatoppo ; taani tooraa ehaanau yiidoogaappe attin , sarotettaa ehaanau yabeikke .

text: For I am come to set a man at variance against his father , and the daughter against her mother , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani na7aa a aawaappe , na7iyo i aayeeppe , na7aa machchiyookka i bolloteeppe shaakkanau yaas ;

text: And a man ' s foes shall be they of his own household .
