text2: asassi morkketi a so asata gidana .

text: He that loveth father or mother more than me is not worthy of me : and he that loveth son or daughter more than me is not worthy of me .
text2: “ Ba aawaa woi ba aayyiyo taappe aattidi siiqiyaagee tabaa gidanau bessenna ; ba attuma na7a woi ba macca na7iyo taappe aattidi siiqiyaagee tabaa gidanau bessenna .

text: And he that taketh not his cross , and followeth after me , is not worthy of me .
text2: Ba masqqaliyaa tookkidi , ta geeduwaa kaallennaagee tabaa gidanau bessenna .

text: He that findeth his life shall lose it : and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Ba shemppuwaa ashshiyaagee bashshana ; shin ta gishshau ba shemppuwaa bashshiyaagee ashshana .

text: He that receiveth you receiveth me , and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: “ Inttena mokkiyaagee tana mokkees ; qassi tana mokkiyaagee tana kiittidaagaa mokkees .

text: He that receiveth a prophet in the name of a prophet shall receive a prophet ' s reward ; and he that receiveth a righteous man in the name of a righteous man shall receive a righteous man ' s reward .
text2: Hananabaa yootiyaagaa hananabaa yootiyaagaa sunttan mokkiyaagee , hananabaa yootiyaagaa woituwaa aara shaakkana ; qassi xilluwaa xilluwaa sunttan mokkiyaagee , xilluwaa woituwaa aara shaakkana .

text: And whosoever shall give to drink unto one of these little ones a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple , verily I say unto you , he shall in no wise lose his reward .
text2: Ooninne ha ta erissiyo ashkkaratuppe guuxxiya issuwau tana kaalliyaagee a gidiyo gishshau , harai atto bule haatta xalaalaa uyanau immikkokka , taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; i ba woituwaa ekkana ” yaagiis .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had made an end of commanding his twelve disciples , he departed thence to teach and to preach in their cities .
text2: Yesuusi ba tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata azaziyoogaa polido wode , hegaappe denddidi , katamatun tamaarissanaunne yootanau biis .

text: Now when John had heard in the prison the works of Christ , he sent two of his disciples ,
text2: Xammaqiya Yohaannisi qasho keettan de7iiddi , Yesuusi oottidobaa siyidi , ba erissiyo ashkkaratuppe akko kiittidi ,

text: And said unto him , Art thou he that should come , or do we look for another ?
text2: “ Yaanaagee neneeyye ? Woi nuuni haraa naaganee ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Go and shew John again those things which ye do hear and see :
text2: Oichchin Yesuusi zaaridi , etayyo hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Biidi intte be7iyoogaanne siyiyoogaa Yohaannisau yootite ;

text: The blind receive their sight , and the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , and the deaf hear , the dead are raised up , and the poor have the gospel preached to them .
text2: qooqeti xeelloosona ; wobbeti hemettoosona ; inchchirichchai oiqqidoogeeti paxoosona ; tulleti siyoosona ; haiqqidaageeti denddoosona ; hiyyeesati wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa siyoosona .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Tana sirenna urai anjjettidaagaa ” yaagiis .

text: And as they departed , Jesus began to say unto the multitudes concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkarati guyye simmidi biishin , Yesuusi Yohaannisabaa shiiqida asaassi hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis ; “ Ai be7anau bazzo kiyidetii ? Carkkoi qaattiyo shombboquwaa be7anau kiyidetiiyye ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? behold , they that wear soft clothing are in kings ' houses .
text2: Yaatin , ai be7anau kiyidetii ? Lo77iya maayuwaa maayida bitaniyaa be7anau kiyidetiiyye ? Lo77iya maayuwaa maayiyaageeti kawotu keettan de7oosona .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? yea , I say unto you , and more than a prophet .
text2: Yaatin , ai be7anau kiyidetii ? Hananabaa yootiyaagaa be7anau kiyidetii ? Ee , taani intteyyo odais ; hananabaa yootiyaagaappekka aadhdhiyaagaa be7ideta .

text: For this is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafan , ' Xoossai , “ Be7a , ta kiittiyoogaa taani neeppe sinttau yeddana . I neeyyo ogiyaa kessana ” yaagees ' . geetettidi Yohaannisabai xaafettiis .

text: Verily I say unto you , Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist : notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; aayee uluwaappe yelettida asa ubban Xammaqiya Yohaannisappe aadhdhiya ooninne de7ibeenna ; shin saluwaa kawotettan ubbaappe laafiyaageekka appe aadhdhana .

text: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence , and the violent take it by force .
text2: Xammaqiya Yohaannisa wodiyaappe doommidi , hachchi gakkanaashin , saluwaa kawotettai daro naaqettees ; wolqqaama asati wolqqan a ekkoosona .

text: For all the prophets and the law prophesied until John .
text2: Aissi giikko , hananabaa yootiya ubbatinne Muuse higgee Yohaannisa wode gakkanaashin , kawotettaabaa haasayidosona ;

text: And if ye will receive it , this is Elias , which was for to come .
text2: intte eta kiitaa ammananabaa gidikko , yaana giido Eelaasi ha Yohaannisa .

text: He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Simmi siyiya haitti de7iyoogee siyo !

text: But whereunto shall I liken this generation ? It is like unto children sitting in the markets , and calling unto their fellows ,
text2: “ SHin taani ha wodiyaa asaa aibiira leemisoo ? Eti qocan uttiya naata milatoosona ; eti bantta laggeta xeesidi ,

text: And saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned unto you , and ye have not lamented .
text2: ' Nuuni intteyyo cachcha zayiyaa punnida ; shin duribeekketa ; yeeho yettaakka kessida ; shin yeekkibeekketa ' yaagoosona .

text: For John came neither eating nor drinking , and they say , He hath a devil .
text2: Aissi giikko , Yohaannisi xoomiiddinne woine eessa uyennan yin eti , ' A bolli xalahee de7ees ' yaagidosona .

text: The Son of man came eating and drinking , and they say , Behold a man gluttonous , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners . But wisdom is justified of her children .
text2: Taani , Asa Na7ai , maiddanne uyaidda yin , eti tana , ' Ha yoraanne woine eessaa uyiyaagaa be7ite ; giiraa ekkiyaageetuuranne nagaranchchatuura siiqettees ' yaagoosona ; shin Xoossaa aadhdhida eratettai ba oosuwan tuma gididi beettees ” yaagiis .

text: Then began he to upbraid the cities wherein most of his mighty works were done , because they repented not :
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi ba malaataappe dariya baggaa oottido katamatun de7iya asai bantta nagaraappe simmibeenna gishshau , eta hagaadan yaagidi , boruwaa doommiis ;

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works , which were done in you , had been done in Tyre and Sidon , they would have repented long ago in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: “ Koraaziine katamau , neeyyo aayye7ana ; Beetasaida katamau , neeyyookka aayye7ana ; aissi giikko , intte bolli Xoossai oottido malaatai Xiiroosa katamaaninne Sidoona kataman oosettidobaa gidiyaakko , eti waaruwaa maayidi , bidinttaa tisttettidi , beni bantta nagaraappe simmanaagaa shin .

text: But I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the day of judgment , than for you .
text2: Taani intteyyo odais ; pirddaa gallassi Xoossai intteppe Xiiroosa katamaunne Sidoona katamau pirddaa kehissana .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted unto heaven , shalt be brought down to hell : for if the mighty works , which have been done in thee , had been done in Sodom , it would have remained until this day .
text2: Qassi Qifirinaahooma katamau , neeni saluwaa pude xoqqu gaanau koyadii ? Neeni Si7ooliyaa duge yegettana ; aissi giikko , ne bolli Xoossai oottido malaatai Sadooma kataman oosettidobaa gidiyaakko , Sadooma katamai hachchi gakkanaassikka de7anaagaa shin .

text: But I say unto you , That it shall be more tolerable for the land of Sodom in the day of judgment , than for thee .
text2: Taani intteyyo odais ; pirddaa gallassi Xoossai neeppe Sadoomayyo pirddaa kehissana ” yaagiis .

text: At that time Jesus answered and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , because thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes .
text2: Yesuusi he wode zaaridi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Ta Aawau , saluwaa sa7aa Godau , neeni hagaa aadhdhida eranchchatuppenne akeekanchchatuppe genttada , erenna naatussi qonccissido gishshau , nena galatais ;

text: Even so , Father : for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: ee ta Aawau , aissi giikko , hagee ne shenedan oosettiis .

text: All things are delivered unto me of my Father : and no man knoweth the Son , but the Father ; neither knoweth any man the Father , save the Son , and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him .
text2: “ Ta Aawai taassi ubbabaa immiis ; Aawaappe harai Na7aa erenna ; Na7aappenne Na7ai Aawaa bessanau koyiyo asatuppe attin , harai Aawaa erenna .

text: Come unto me , all ye that labour and are heavy laden , and I will give you rest .
text2: “ Daafuranchchatoo , deexuwaa tookkiyaageetoo , ubbati taakko haa yiite ; taani inttena shemppissana .

text: Take my yoke upon you , and learn of me ; for I am meek and lowly in heart : and ye shall find rest unto your souls .
text2: Taani ashkkenne wozanappe kauyyiyaagaa gidido gishshau , ta qambbaran waaxettite ; taappe tamaarite ; intte shemppuwaukka intte shemppo demmana .

text: For my yoke is easy , and my burden is light .
text2: Aissi giikko , ta qambbarai giiga ; qassi taani inttena toossidoogeekka kaushsha ” yaagiis .

text: At that time Jesus went on the sabbath day through the corn ; and his disciples were an hungred , and began to pluck the ears of corn , and to eat .
text2: Yesuusi he wode Sambbata gallassi , tiya bangga giddoora aadhdhees . Aadhdhishin i erissiyo ashkkarati namisettidi , tiya banggaa duuttidi , muussaa doommidosona .

text: But when the Pharisees saw it , they said unto him , Behold , thy disciples do that which is not lawful to do upon the sabbath day .
text2: SHin Parisaaweti hegaa be7idi Yesuusa , “ Be7a , ne erissiyo ashkkarati Sambbata gallassi oottanau higge gidennabaa oottoosona ” yaagidosona .

text: But he said unto them , Have ye not read what David did , when he was an hungred , and they that were with him ;
text2: SHin Yesuusi etassi hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Daawitinne aara de7iyaageeti namisettido wode , Daawiti oottidobaa nabbabibeekketii ?

text: How he entered into the house of God , and did eat the shewbread , which was not lawful for him to eat , neither for them which were with him , but only for the priests ?
text2: Daawiti Xoossaa keettaa gelidi , qeesetu xalaalai maanaappe attin , inne aara de7iyaageeti maanau higge gidennaagaa Xoossaassi yarshshido oittaa miidi , banaara de7iyaageetussikka immiis .

text: Or have ye not read in the law , how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath , and are blameless ?
text2: Woi Sambbata ubban Beeta Maqidasiyan de7iya qeeseti Sambbataa higgiyaa mooriyoogaa , qassi menttidi eti borettennaagaa Muuse higgiyan nabbabibeekketii ?

text: But I say unto you , That in this place is one greater than the temple .
text2: SHin taani intteyyo odais ; Beeta Maqidasiyaappe aadhdhiyaagee hagan de7ees .

text: But if ye had known what this meaneth , I will have mercy , and not sacrifice , ye would not have condemned the guiltless .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Taani maarotettaa koyaisippe attin , yarshshuwaa koyikke ' giyoogee woigiyoogaakko intte eriyaakko , nagari bainna asa bolli pirddekketa .

text: For the Son of man is Lord even of the sabbath day .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani , Asa Na7ai , Sambbataa Godaa ” yaagiis .

text: And when he was departed thence , he went into their synagogue :
text2: Yesuusi hegaappe denddidi , Aihuda woosa keettaa biis .

text: And , behold , there was a man which had his hand withered . And they asked him , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath days ? that they might accuse him .
text2: Hegan kushee gunddido issi bitanee de7ees ; Yesuusa mootana koyiya asati , “ Sambbatan , pattiyoogee higgee ? ” yaagidi a oichchidosona .

text: And he said unto them , What man shall there be among you , that shall have one sheep , and if it fall into a pit on the sabbath day , will he not lay hold on it , and lift it out ?
text2: Oichchin Yesuusi eta , “ Intte giddon issi dorssi de7iyo urai , he dorssai Sambbata gallassi aafuwan kunddikko , oiqqidi kessennai oonee ?

text: How much then is a man better than a sheep ? Wherefore it is lawful to do well on the sabbath days .
text2: Yaatin , asi dorssappe waani keehi darennee ! Hegaa gishshau , Sambbata gallassi lo77obaa oottiyoogee higge ” yaagiis .

text: Then saith he to the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it forth ; and it was restored whole , like as the other .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan bitaniyaa , “ Ne kushiyaa piddi ootta ” yaagin bitanee piddi oottin , a kushee hinkko kushiyaadankka paxi aggiis .

text: Then the Pharisees went out , and held a council against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: SHin Parisaaweti kare kiyidi , Yesuusa waati woranaakko maqettidosona .

text: But when Jesus knew it , he withdrew himself from thence : and great multitudes followed him , and he healed them all ;
text2: SHin Yesuusi eta zoretaa eridi , he sohuwaappe aggidi biishin , daro asai a kaalliis ; harggida ubbaa pattiis .

text: And charged them that they should not make him known :
text2: Xoossai hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasa baggaara giidoogee polettana mala , Yesuusi asatuyyo , “ Tabaa hara asassi yootoppite ” yaagiis .

text: Behold my servant , whom I have chosen ; my beloved , in whom my soul is well pleased : I will put my spirit upon him , and he shall shew judgment to the Gentiles .
text2: Xoossai Isiyaasa baggaara hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Taani doorido ta ashkkarai , taani siiqiyo , tana ufaissiyaagee hageeho . Taani ta Ayyaanaa a bolli wottana . I suure pirddaa Aihuda gidenna asa ubbau yootana .

text: He shall not strive , nor cry ; neither shall any man hear his voice in the streets .
text2: I palamettenna ; woi wocamenna . Ba qaalaakka ogiyan sissenna .

text: A bruised reed shall he not break , and smoking flax shall he not quench , till he send forth judgment unto victory .
text2: Suure pirddaa i xoonissana gakkanaassi , dinccettida shombboquwaa menttenna ; qassi cuwattiya muqaaddaakka i toissenna .

text: And in his name shall the Gentiles trust .
text2: Aihuda gidenna asai ubbai an ammanana ” yaagiis .

text: Then was brought unto him one possessed with a devil , blind , and dumb : and he healed him , insomuch that the blind and dumb both spake and saw .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , amarida asati xalahee oiqqin duudida issi qooqe bitaniyaa Yesuusakko ehiidosona ; Yesuusi he duude bitaniyaa pattidi , haasayissiisinne a aifiyaakka xeelissiisi .

text: And all the people were amazed , and said , Is not this the son of David ?
text2: Asai ubbai garamettidi , “ Laa hagee Daawita na7a gidanddeeshsha ? ” yaagiis .

text: But when the Pharisees heard it , they said , This fellow doth not cast out devils , but by Beelzebub the prince of the devils .
text2: SHin Parisaaweti hegaa siyidi , “ Ha bitanee xalahetu halaqai Bi7eeli - Zeebuli baayyo wolqqaa immin , xalaheta kessees ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus knew their thoughts , and said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and every city or house divided against itself shall not stand :
text2: SHin Yesuusi eta qofaa eridi , eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Ba giddon shaakettiya kawotetta ubbai xayana ; qassi ba giddon shaakettiya katamai woi keetta asaikka eqqenna .

text: And if Satan cast out Satan , he is divided against himself ; how shall then his kingdom stand ?
text2: Qassi Seexaanai Seexaanaa kessiyaabaa gidikko , ba giddon shaakettiis ; yaatin , a kawotettai waanidi eqqanee ?

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your children cast them out ? therefore they shall be your judges .
text2: Tau Bi7eeli - Zeebuli wolqqaa immin , taani xalaheta kessiyaabaa gidikko , intte asau wolqqaa ooni immin xalaheta kessanee ? Hegaa gishshau , eti intte bolli pirddana .

text: But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God , then the kingdom of God is come unto you .
text2: SHin Xoossaa Geeshsha Ayyaanai tau wolqqaa immin , taani xalaheta kessiyaabaa gidikko , simmi Xoossaa kawotettai inttekko yiichchiis .

text: Or else how can one enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he first bind the strong man ? and then he will spoil his house .
text2: “ Woi asi kasetidi , wolqqaama asa qachchennan de7iiddi , a keettaa gelidi , a miishshaa bonqqanau waanidi danddayii ? Qachchidoogaappe guyyiyan , a keettaa bonqqana danddayees .

text: He that is not with me is against me ; and he that gathereth not with me scattereth abroad .
text2: “ Ta bagga gidenna urai tabaa ixxees ; qassi tanaara issippe shiishshennaagee laalees .

text: Wherefore I say unto you , All manner of sin and blasphemy shall be forgiven unto men : but the blasphemy against the Holy Ghost shall not be forgiven unto men .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani intteyyo odais ; Xoossai asayyo ai nagara gidinkka , qassi ai cashsha gidinkka atto gaana ; shin Geeshsha Ayyaanaa cayidaagaayyo atto geenna .

text: And whosoever speaketh a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but whosoever speaketh against the Holy Ghost , it shall not be forgiven him , neither in this world , neither in the world to come .
text2: Ta bolli , Asa Na7aa bolli , iitabaa haasayiya o nagaraanne Xoossai atto gaana ; shin Geeshsha Ayyaanaa bolli iitabaa haasayiya o nagaraanne sa7an gidin , saluwan gidin , Xoossai atto geenna .

text: Either make the tree good , and his fruit good ; or else make the tree corrupt , and his fruit corrupt : for the tree is known by his fruit .
text2: “ Lo77o aifiyaa demmanau lo77o mittaa dichchana bessees ; iita mittaa intte dichchikko , iita aifiyaa demmana ; aissi giikko , mittai erettiyoi ba aifiyo aifiyaana .

text: O generation of vipers , how can ye , being evil , speak good things ? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh .
text2: SHooshshatoo , intte iita gidiiddi , waatidi lo77obaa haasayanau danddayeetii ? Aissi giikko , doonai wozana giddon kumidabaa haasayees .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of the heart bringeth forth good things : and an evil man out of the evil treasure bringeth forth evil things .
text2: Lo77o asi ba lo77o minjjaappe lo77obaa kessees ; qassi iita asi ba iita minjjaappe iitabaa kessees .

text: But I say unto you , That every idle word that men shall speak , they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment .
text2: Taani intteyyo odais ; asi ba haasayido pattenna haasaya ubbau pirddaa gallassi zaaro immana .

text: For by thy words thou shalt be justified , and by thy words thou shalt be condemned .
text2: Aissi giikko , ne haasayai nena xillissana ; woi ne haasayai ne bolli pirddana ” yaagiis .

text: Then certain of the scribes and of the Pharisees answered , saying , Master , we would see a sign from thee .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , higgiyaa tamaarissiya issi issi asatinne Parisaaweti zaaridi Yesuusa , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , neeni malaata oottishin , nuuni be7anau koyoos ” yaagidosona .

text: But he answered and said unto them , An evil and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given to it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas :
text2: SHin i zaaridi , etayyo hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Ha wodiyaa asai iitai , Xoossau ammanettennaagee , malaata koyees ; hananabaa yootiya Yoonaasa malaataappe attin , hara malaati au imettenna .

text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale ' s belly ; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth .
text2: Yoonaasi gita moliyaa uluwan heezzu gallassaanne heezzu qammaa de7idoogaadan , taani , Asa Na7aikka , biitta giddon heezzu gallassaanne heezzu qammaa de7ana .

text: The men of Nineveh shall rise in judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : because they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Nanawe asai Yoonaasi yootidoogan bantta nagaraappe simmido gishshau , pirddaa gallassi denddidi , inttena mootana ; be7ite , Yoonaasappe aadhdhiyaagee hagan de7ees .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for she came from the uttermost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Tohossa bagga biittaa kawiyaa Solomona aadhdhida eratettaa siyanau sa7aa gaxaappe yiido gishshau , pirddaa gallassi denddada , inttena mootana ; be7ite , Solomonappekka aadhdhiyaagee hagan de7ees .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest , and findeth none .
text2: “ Tuna ayyaanai asaappe kiyido wode , baayyo shemppiyoosaa koyiiddi , haatti bainnasaara aadhdhees ; shin demmenna .

text: Then he saith , I will return into my house from whence I came out ; and when he is come , he findeth it empty , swept , and garnished .
text2: He wode , ' Taani aggada yiido ta keettaa simmana ' yaagees ; simmidi yiyo wode , keettai mela de7iyaagaanne pitetti geeyidi , giigi uttidaagaa demmees .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh with himself seven other spirits more wicked than himself , and they enter in and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first . Even so shall it be also unto this wicked generation .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , biidi baappe iitiya laappun hara ayyaanata ehees ; he ayyaanati gelidi , hegan de7oosona . He bitaniyaa de7oi kaseegaappe guyyeegee keehi iitees . Ha wodiyaa iita asaukka qassi hegaadan hanana ” yaagiis .

text: While he yet talked to the people , behold , his mother and his brethren stood without , desiring to speak with him .
text2: Yesuusi daro asaayyo haasayishin , a aayyiyaanne a ishantti aara haasayanau koyidi , karen eqqidosona .

text: Then one said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to speak with thee .
text2: Issoi a , “ Ne aayyiyaanne ne ishantti nenaara haasayanau koyidi , karen eqqidosona ” yaagiis .

text: But he answered and said unto him that told him , Who is my mother ? and who are my brethren ?
text2: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ta aayyiyaa oonee ? Ta ishantti oonee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And he stretched forth his hand toward his disciples , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Ba kushiyan ba erissiyo ashkkaratukko malaatidi , “ Be7ite , ta aayyiyaanne ta ishantti hageetihona .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of my Father which is in heaven , the same is my brother , and sister , and mother .
text2: Aissi giikko , saluwan de7iya ta Aawai koyiyoobaa oottiya ubbai , ta isha ta michchonne ta aayo ” yaagiis .

text: The same day went Jesus out of the house , and sat by the sea side .
text2: Yesuusi he gallassi sooppe kiyidi , abbaa lanqqiyan uttiis .

text: And great multitudes were gathered together unto him , so that he went into a ship , and sat ; and the whole multitude stood on the shore .
text2: Keehi daro asai ba lanqqiyan yuuyi aadhdhidi shiiqettin , wolwoluwaa giddo gelidi uttiis ; asai ubbai abbaa lanqqiyan eqqiis .

text: And he spake many things unto them in parables , saying , Behold , a sower went forth to sow ;
text2: Asaassi leemisuwan darobaa hagaadan yaagidi yootiis ; “ Issi bitanee zerettaa zeranau kiyiis .

text: And when he sowed , some seeds fell by the way side , and the fowls came and devoured them up :
text2: I zerishin , issi issi zerettai ogiyaa doonan wodhdhiis ; wodhdhidaagaa kafoi yiidi miis .

text: Some fell upon stony places , where they had not much earth : and forthwith they sprung up , because they had no deepness of earth :
text2: Qassi issi issi zerettai guutta biittai de7iyo shuchchaa anccuwaa bolli wodhdhiis ; daro biittai bainna gishshau , he zerettai sohuwaara mokkiis .

text: And when the sun was up , they were scorched ; and because they had no root , they withered away .
text2: SHin awai kiyido wode carshshai shulliis ; adussa xaphuwaa yeddibeenna gishshau meli bayiis .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprung up , and choked them :
text2: Issi issi zerettai aguntta giddon wodhdhiis ; wodhdhidi mokkidaagaa agunttai diccidi cuulliis .

text: But other fell into good ground , and brought forth fruit , some an hundredfold , some sixtyfold , some thirtyfold .
text2: Issi issi zerettai aradda biittan wodhdhidi mokkiis ; issoi xeetu aifiyaa , issoi usuppun tammaa , issoi hasttamaa aifiis .

text: Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Siyiyo haitti de7iyo urai siyo ! ” yaagiis .

text: And the disciples came , and said unto him , Why speakest thou unto them in parables ?
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusakko shiiqidi , “ Neeni aissi etassi leemisuwan odai ? ” yaagidosona .

text: He answered and said unto them , Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven , but to them it is not given .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , etassi hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Inttessi saluwaa kawotettaa xuuraa erai imettiis ; shin etassi imettibeenna .

text: For whosoever hath , to him shall be given , and he shall have more abundance : but whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken away even that he hath .
text2: Aissi giikko , de7iyoogau gujettana ; au darana ; shin bainnaagaappe harai atto , he de7iyaageekka ekettiichchana .

text: Therefore speak I to them in parables : because they seeing see not ; and hearing they hear not , neither do they understand .
text2: Taani eti xeelliiddi demmenna gishshaunne siyiiddikka siyenna gishshau , woi qassi eti akeekenna gishshaunne etau leemisuwan odais .

text: And in them is fulfilled the prophecy of Esaias , which saith , By hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and shall not perceive :
text2: “ Isiyaasi etabaa hananabaa yootidoogee polettees ; hananabaa yootidoogee hagaa ; ' Intte sissaa siyana ; shin intteyyo gelenna ; intte xeeluwaa xeellana ; shin be7ekketa .

text: For this people ' s heart is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes they have closed ; lest at any time they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and should understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: Aissi giikko , ha asaa wozanai dammiis ; bantta haittaa tulissidosona ; bantta aifiyaakka qilimmidosona . Hegee bainnaakko , eti bantta aifiyan be7ana ; bantta haittan siyana ; bantta wozanankka akeekana ; eti taakko , Xoossaakko simmana ; taanikka eta pattana , shin attiis ' yaagees .

text: But blessed are your eyes , for they see : and your ears , for they hear .
text2: “ SHin intte aifee xeelliyo gishshaunne intte haittaikka siyiyo gishshau , intte anjjettidaageeta .

text: For verily I say unto you , That many prophets and righteous men have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; hananabaa yootiya darotinne xilloti intte be7iyoogaa be7anau amottidosona ; shin be7ibookkona . Intte siyiyoogaa siyanau amottidosona ; shin siyibookkona .

text: Hear ye therefore the parable of the sower .
text2: “ Simmi kattaa zeriyaagaa leemisuwaa birshshettai giyoogaa siyite .

text: When any one heareth the word of the kingdom , and understandeth it not , then cometh the wicked one , and catcheth away that which was sown in his heart . This is he which received seed by the way side .
text2: Kawotettaa qaalaa siyidi , akeekenna ooninne ogiyaa doonan wodhdhida zerettaa mala ; xalahe halaqai yiidi , eta wozanan zerettidaagaa maxirggees .

text: But he that received the seed into stony places , the same is he that heareth the word , and anon with joy receiveth it ;
text2: SHuchchaa anccoi de7iyo biittan wodhdhida zerettai qaalaa siyidi , sohuwaara ufaissan ekkiyaageeta milatees .

text: Yet hath he not root in himself , but dureth for a while : for when tribulation or persecution ariseth because of the word , by and by he is offended .
text2: SHin hegee ha77issau de7iyoogaappe attin , aani xaphoi baawa ; qaalaa gaasuwan waayee woi yedetai yiyo wode , sohuwaara xubetti aggees .

text: He also that received seed among the thorns is he that heareth the word ; and the care of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , choke the word , and he becometh unfruitful .
text2: Qassi aguntta giddon wodhdhidaagee qaalaa siyiyaagaa milatees ; shin ha sa7aa de7uwau hirggiyoogeenne duretetta siiqiyoogee qaalaa cuullees ; cuullin he zerettai aifennan atti aggees .

text: But he that received seed into the good ground is he that heareth the word , and understandeth it ; which also beareth fruit , and bringeth forth , some an hundredfold , some sixty , some thirty .
text2: Aradda biittan zerettidaagee qaalaa siyidi , akeekiya asa milatees ; yaatidi aifees ; issoi xeetaa , issoi usuppun tammaa issoi hasttamaa aifees ” yaagiis .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field :
text2: Yesuusi etayyo hara leemisuwaa hagaadan yaagidi odiis ; “ Saluwaa kawotettai ba goshshan lo77o zerettaa zerida bitaniyaa milatees .

text: But while men slept , his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat , and went his way .
text2: SHin qammi asai xiskkiichchidaashin , a morkkee yiidi , gisttiyaa zeridoogaa bolli zardduwaa zeridi biis .

text: But when the blade was sprung up , and brought forth fruit , then appeared the tares also .
text2: SHin gisttee mokkidi , aifido wode , zarddoikka a giddon beettiis .

text: So the servants of the householder came and said unto him , Sir , didst not thou sow good seed in thy field ? from whence then hath it tares ?
text2: “ A ashkkarati akko yiidi , ' Godau , neeni ne goshshan lo77o zerettaa zerabeikkii ? Yaatin , zarddoi auppe yiidee ? ' yaagidosona .

text: He said unto them , An enemy hath done this . The servants said unto him , Wilt thou then that we go and gather them up ?
text2: “ Yaagin Godai , ' Hegaa morkkee oottiis ' yaagiis . “ Ashkkarati , ' Nuuni biidi shoddanaagaa dosai ? ' yaagidosona .

text: But he said , Nay ; lest while ye gather up the tares , ye root up also the wheat with them .
text2: “ SHin i , ' CHii , zardduwaa intte shoddiiddi , gisttiyaara shoddana .

text: Let both grow together until the harvest : and in the time of harvest I will say to the reapers , Gather ye together first the tares , and bind them in bundles to burn them : but gather the wheat into my barn .
text2: Bochchoppite ; cakkiyo wodee gakkanaashin , issippe diccona . Cakkiyo wodee gakkin , taani cakkiyaageeta , kasetidi zardduwaa maxite ; maxidi taman xuugganau mirqqiyan mirqqiyan qachchite ; shin gisttiyaa ta gootaran qolite ' gaana ” yaagiis .

text: Another parable put he forth unto them , saying , The kingdom of heaven is like to a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and sowed in his field :
text2: Yesuusi etayyo hara leemisuwaa yaagidi odiis ; “ Saluwaa kawotettai sanaafici giyo qii mittee aifiyo milatees ; he mittee aifiyo asi ekkidi , ba goshshan zeriis .

text: Which indeed is the least of all seeds : but when it is grown , it is the greatest among herbs , and becometh a tree , so that the birds of the air come and lodge in the branches thereof .
text2: He zerettiyaa zeretta ubbaappe guuxxausu ; shin diccido wode , hara ataakiltte ubbaappe gitatausu ; kafoi yiidi , i tashiyan keexxiyoogaa keena gita mitta gidausu ” yaagiis .

text: Another parable spake he unto them ; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven , which a woman took , and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Qassikka Yesuusi hara leemisuwaa etau yaagidi odiis ; “ Saluwaa kawotettai issi mishiriyaa heezzu kere xiilliyaa ekkada , munaqqido munaqai ubbai denddana gakkanaassi , aani tigido irshshuwaa milatees ” yaagiis .

text: All these things spake Jesus unto the multitude in parables ; and without a parable spake he not unto them :
text2: Yesuusi asau he ubbaa leemisuwan odiis ; leemisoi bainnan i issibaakka odenna ; hananabaa yootiyaagee , “ Taani etayyo haasayiyo wode leemisuwan haasayais . Sa7ai merettoosappe doommidi geemmida yohota odais ” giidoogee polettana mala , hegaa i odiis .

text: Then Jesus sent the multitude away , and went into the house : and his disciples came unto him , saying , Declare unto us the parable of the tares of the field .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi asaa yeggi bayidi , soo geliis ; erissiyo ashkkarati akko biidi , “ Goshshan de7iya zardduwaa leemisuwaa birshshettaa nuuyyo oda ” yaagidosona .

text: He answered and said unto them , He that soweth the good seed is the Son of man ;
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Lo77o zerettaa zeriyaagee tana Asa Na7aa .

text: The field is the world ; the good seed are the children of the kingdom ; but the tares are the children of the wicked one ;
text2: Goshshai sa7aa ; lo77o zerettai kawotettaa asaa ; zarddoi xalahe halaqaa asaa .

text: The enemy that sowed them is the devil ; the harvest is the end of the world ; and the reapers are the angels .
text2: Zardduwaa zerida morkkee xalahe halaqaa ; cakkiyo wodee , wodiyaa wurssettaa ; qassi cakkiyaageeti kiitanchchata .

text: As therefore the tares are gathered and burned in the fire ; so shall it be in the end of this world .
text2: “ Hegaa gishshau , zardduwaa maxidi , taman xuuggiyoogaadan , wodiyaa wurssettan hegaa mala gidana .

text: The Son of man shall send forth his angels , and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend , and them which do iniquity ;
text2: Taani , Asa Na7ai , ta kiitanchchata kiittana ; eti ta kawotettaa giddon xube gidiya ubbaanne iitabaa oottiyaageeta shiishshana .

text: And shall cast them into a furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: SHiishshidi to77enna taman olana ; hegan eti yeekkana ; qassi achchaa garccana .

text: Then shall the righteous shine forth as the sun in the kingdom of their Father . Who hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: He wode xilloti bantta aawaa kawotettan awa aifiyaadan poo7ana . Siyiya haitti de7iyo urai siyo !

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field ; the which when a man hath found , he hideth , and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath , and buyeth that field .
text2: “ Saluwaa kawotettai goshshan moogido miishsha milatees ; issi bitanee he miishshaa demmidi , zaarettidi moogiis ; daro ufaittiiddi biidi , baayyo de7iyaabaa ubbaa baizzidi , he goshshaa shammiis .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man , seeking goodly pearls :
text2: “ Qassi saluwaa kawotettai inqquwaa giyo daro al77o shuchchaa koyiya zal77anchchaa milatees .

text: Who , when he had found one pearl of great price , went and sold all that he had , and bought it .
text2: He zal77anchchai daro al77o inqquwaa demmidi , biidi baayyo de7iyaabaa ubbaa baizzidi , a shammiis .

text: Again , the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net , that was cast into the sea , and gathered of every kind :
text2: “ Qassi saluwaa kawotettai ubba qommo moliyaa oiqqiya abban yeggido gitiyaa milatees .

text: Which , when it was full , they drew to shore , and sat down , and gathered the good into vessels , but cast the bad away .
text2: Molee gitiyaa kumido wode , moliyaa oiqqiya asati abbaappe gaxaa kessidi uttidosona ; uttidi lo77o moliyaa qoridi , keeshiyan yeggidosona ; shin iita moliyaa wora olidosona .

text: So shall it be at the end of the world : the angels shall come forth , and sever the wicked from among the just ,
text2: Wodiyaa wurssettan hegaadan hanana ; kiitanchchati yiidi , nagaranchchata xillotu giddoppe qoridi ,

text: And shall cast them into the furnace of fire : there shall be wailing and gnashing of teeth .
text2: to77enna taman olana ; hegan eti yeekkana ; qassi achchaa garccana .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Have ye understood all these things ? They say unto him , Yea , Lord .
text2: “ Hagee ubbai intteyyo gelidee ? ” yaagidi eta oichchiis . Eti , “ Ee ” yaagidosona .

text: Then said he unto them , Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old .
text2: Yaagin i , “ Hegaa gishshau , saluwaa kawotettan erissiyo ashkkara gidida higgiyaa tamaarissiya ubbai , ba minjjidosaappe ooratta miishshaanne gal77a miishshaa kessiya asa milatees ” yaagiis .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these parables , he departed thence .
text2: Yesuusi ha leemisota yootidi wurssidoogaappe guyyiyan , hegaappe denddidi ,

text: And when he was come into his own country , he taught them in their synagogue , insomuch that they were astonished , and said , Whence hath this man this wisdom , and these mighty works ?
text2: ba yelettido katamaa biis . Biidi Aihuda woosa keettan tamaarissiyoogaa siyida asai garamettidi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Hagee ha aadhdhida eratettaanne Xoossai oottiyo malaataa oottanau wolqqaa awappe ekkidee ?

text: Is not this the carpenter ' s son ? is not his mother called Mary ? and his brethren , James , and Joses , and Simon , and Judas ?
text2: Hagee anaaxiyaa na7aa gidennee ? A aayyiyaa Mairaamo gidekkee ? A ishantti Yaaqoobanne Yooseefa , Simoonanne Yihudaa gidokkonaayye ?

text: And his sisters , are they not all with us ? Whence then hath this man all these things ?
text2: A michchentti ubbai nunaara de7okkonaayye ? Yaatin , i hagaa ubbaa awappe demmidee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And they were offended in him . But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , save in his own country , and in his own house .
text2: Eti i giyoobaa ekkennan ixxidosona . SHin Yesuusi he asaassi , “ Hananabaa yootiyaagee ba biittaaninne bantta so asaani bonchchettennaagaappe attin , hara ubbasan bonchchettees ” yaagiis .

text: And he did not many mighty works there because of their unbelief .
text2: Eti ammanibeenna gishshau , Xoossai oottiyo malaataa he sohuwan keehi oottibeenna .

text: At that time Herod the tetrarch heard of the fame of Jesus ,
text2: He wode oiddantto biittaa haariya Heeroodisi Yesuusabaa siyiis ;

text: And said unto his servants , This is John the Baptist ; he is risen from the dead ; and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: siyidi ba ashkkaratussi , “ Hagee haiquwaappe denddida Xammaqiya Yohaannisa ; Xoossai oottiyo wolqqaama malaataa i oottiyoogee hegaassa ” yaagiis .

text: For Herod had laid hold on John , and bound him , and put him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife .
text2: Aissi giikko , Heeroodisi ba ishaa Piliphphoosa machchee Heeroodiyaadi gaasotan Yohaannisa oitti qashissidi , qasho keettan yeggi wottiis .

text: For John said unto him , It is not lawful for thee to have her .
text2: Aissi giikko , Yohaannisi Heeroodisa , “ Neeni Heeroodiyaado ekkanau bessenna ” yaagiis .

text: And when he would have put him to death , he feared the multitude , because they counted him as a prophet .
text2: Heeroodisi Yohaannisa woranau koyiis ; shin Yihudaa asai hananabaa yootiya asadan Yohaannisa xeellido gishshau yayyiis .

text: But when Herod ' s birthday was kept , the daughter of Herodias danced before them , and pleased Herod .
text2: SHin Heeroodisi yelettido gallassai gakkin , Heeroodiyaadi na7iyaa asaa sinttan durada Heeroodisa ufaissaasu ;

text: Whereupon he promised with an oath to give her whatsoever she would ask .
text2: ufaissin Heeroodisi na7iyo , “ Nena lo77idabaa aibanne gidikko , tana oichcha ; taani neessi immana ” yaagidi iyyo caaqqiis .

text: And she , being before instructed of her mother , said , Give me here John Baptist ' s head in a charger .
text2: Na7iyaa ba aayee zoriyaa ekkada Heeroodisa , “ Xammaqiya Yohaannisa huuphiyaa ha soruwan wottada tau imma ” yaagaasu .

text: And the king was sorry : nevertheless for the oath ' s sake , and them which sat with him at meat , he commanded it to be given her .
text2: Kawoi au qarettiis ; shin ba caaquwaa gishshaunne banaara uttida imattaa gishshau , iyyo immana mala azaziis .

text: And he sent , and beheaded John in the prison .
text2: Kawoi kiittidi , Yohaannisa qooriyaa qasho keettan muucissiis .

text: And his head was brought in a charger , and given to the damsel : and she brought it to her mother .
text2: Huuphiyaa soruwan wotti ehiidi , na7eessi immidosona ; na7iyaa he huuphiyaa ba aayeekko efaasu .

text: And his disciples came , and took up the body , and buried it , and went and told Jesus .
text2: Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkarati yiidi , a ahaa efiidi moogidosona ; moogidi Yesuusau biidi odidosona .

text: When Jesus heard of it , he departed thence by ship into a desert place apart : and when the people had heard thereof , they followed him on foot out of the cities .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa siyidi , wolwoluwan gelidi , he sohuwaappe barkka asi bainnasaa biis ; asai hegaa siyidi , katamaappe denddidi , tohuwan a kaalliis .

text: And Jesus went forth , and saw a great multitude , and was moved with compassion toward them , and he healed their sick .
text2: Yesuusi wolwoluwaappe kiyido wode , daro asaa be7idi , he asau qarettiis ; yaatidi etaara de7iya hargganchchata pattiis .

text: And when it was evening , his disciples came to him , saying , This is a desert place , and the time is now past ; send the multitude away , that they may go into the villages , and buy themselves victuals .
text2: Sa7ai omariyo wode , Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Hagee sohoi asi bainna soho ; ha77i sa7aikka qammiichchiis ; asai ubbai qeeri katamata biidi , bau qumaa shammana mala , asaa yedda ” yaagidosona .

text: But Jesus said unto them , They need not depart ; give ye them to eat .
text2: SHin Yesuusi eta , “ Asai baanau koshshenna ; asau miyoobaa intte immite ” yaagiis .

text: And they say unto him , We have here but five loaves , and two fishes .
text2: Eti zaaridi a , “ Nuuyyo hagan ichchashu oittappenne naa77u moleppe attin , hari baawa ” yaagidosona .

text: He said , Bring them hither to me .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi eta , “ Hegeeta tau haa ekki ehiite ” yaagiis .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the grass , and took the five loaves , and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed , and brake , and gave the loaves to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Asai maatan uttana mala , Yesuusi azaziis ; ichchashu oittaanne naa77u moliyaa oiqqidi , saluwaa pude xeellidi , Xoossaa galatiis ; he oittaa menttidi , ba erissiyo ashkkaratussi immin , eti daro asaayyo gishidosona .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the fragments that remained twelve baskets full .
text2: Asai ubbai miidi kalliis ; kallin attida xarzzai tammanne naa77u samppaa kumidaagaa denttidosona .

text: And they that had eaten were about five thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Miida asai maccaasaanne naata paidennan , ichchashu sha7aa gidiyaagaa keena .

text: And straightway Jesus constrained his disciples to get into a ship , and to go before him unto the other side , while he sent the multitudes away .
text2: Yesuusi daro asaa yeddiiddi , ba erissiyo ashkkarati wolwoluwan gelidi , baappe sinttatidi , abbaappe hefintti pinnana mala azaziis .

text: And when he had sent the multitudes away , he went up into a mountain apart to pray : and when the evening was come , he was there alone .
text2: Asaa yeddidi , Xoossaa woossanau deriyaa huuphiyaa barkka kiyiis ; sa7ai qammiichchinkka hegan barkka de7ees .

text: But the ship was now in the midst of the sea , tossed with waves : for the wind was contrary .
text2: SHin wolwoloi he wode abbaa bollan de7ishin , sintta baggaara carkkoi carkkiyo gishshau , beetai wolwoluwaa sugees .

text: And in the fourth watch of the night Jesus went unto them , walking on the sea .
text2: Baira kuttoi waassi simmin , Yesuusi abbaa bolli hemettiiddi , etakko yiis .

text: And when the disciples saw him walking on the sea , they were troubled , saying , It is a spirit ; and they cried out for fear .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati abbaa bolli i hemettishin be7idi dagammidi , “ Hegee moitille gidennee ! ” yaagidi yayyidi waassidosona .

text: But straightway Jesus spake unto them , saying , Be of good cheer ; it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: SHin Yesuusi sohuwaara eta , “ Aikko baawa ; tanattennee ; yayyoppite ” yaagiis .

text: And Peter answered him and said , Lord , if it be thou , bid me come unto thee on the water .
text2: PHeexiroosi zaaridi a , “ Ta Godau , hegee nena gidikko , taani haattaa bollaara neekko baana mala , tana azazarkkii ” yaagiis .

text: And he said , Come . And when Peter was come down out of the ship , he walked on the water , to go to Jesus .
text2: Yesuusi PHeexiroosa , “ Haa ya ” yaagiis . PHeexiroosi wolwoluwaappe wodhdhidi , haattaa bollaara hemettiiddi , Yesuusakko beettaa doommiis .

text: But when he saw the wind boisterous , he was afraid ; and beginning to sink , he cried , saying , Lord , save me .
text2: SHin wolqqaama carkkuwaa be7idi yayyiis ; haattai bana mituwaa doommido wode , ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Ta Godau tana ashsharkkii ! ” yaagiis .

text: And immediately Jesus stretched forth his hand , and caught him , and said unto him , O thou of little faith , wherefore didst thou doubt ?
text2: Sohuwaara Yesuusi ba kushiyaa yeddidi , PHeexiroosa oiqqidi , “ Laa ha ammanoi laafidoogoo ! Aissi siradii ? ” yaagiis .

text: And when they were come into the ship , the wind ceased .
text2: Eti naa77ai wolwoluwan gelido wode , carkkoi woppu giis .

text: Then they that were in the ship came and worshipped him , saying , Of a truth thou art the Son of God .
text2: Wolwoluwaa giddon de7iya erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusa , “ Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa gididoogee tuma ” yaagidi au goinnidosona .

text: And when they were gone over , they came into the land of Gennesaret .
text2: Eti abbaa pinnidi , Genssereexa giyo biittaa gakkidosona .

text: And when the men of that place had knowledge of him , they sent out into all that country round about , and brought unto him all that were diseased ;
text2: He biittaa asai Yesuusa eriis ; eridi hegaa heera biitta ubbaa kiittidi , harggiya asa ubbaa akko ehiis .

text: And besought him that they might only touch the hem of his garment : and as many as touched were made perfectly whole .
text2: Harggiya asai a afalaa macara xalaalaa bochchana mala , a woossiis ; macaraa bochchida ubbaikka paxiis .

text: Then came to Jesus scribes and Pharisees , which were of Jerusalem , saying ,
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , higgiyaa tamaarissiya issi issi asatinne Parisaaweti Yerusalaameppe Yesuusakko yiidi ,

text: Why do thy disciples transgress the tradition of the elders ? for they wash not their hands when they eat bread .
text2: “ Neeni erissiyo ashkkarati aissi nu aawatu wogaa mooriyoonaa ? Aissi giikko , eti qumaa maanaappe kasetidi , bantta kushiyaa meecettokkona ” yaagidosona .

text: But he answered and said unto them , Why do ye also transgress the commandment of God by your tradition ?
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Intte intte wogaa gishshau , Xoossaa azazuwaa poliyoogaa aissi ixxeetii ?

text: For God commanded , saying , Honour thy father and mother : and , He that curseth father or mother , let him die the death .
text2: Aissi giikko Xoossai , ' Ne aawaanne ne aayyiyo bonchcha ' qassi , ' Ba aawaa woi ba aayyiyo cayiyaagee haiqqo ' yaagiis .

text: But ye say , Whosoever shall say to his father or his mother , It is a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ;
text2: SHin intte , ' Issi asi ba aawaa woi ba aayyiyo maaddiyoobi bau de7in , “ Hegee Xoossaabaa ” giikko , ba aawaa woi ba aayyiyo bonchchanau bessenna ' yaageeta ; yaatidi intte intte wogaa polanau Xoossaa qaalaa xaissideta .

text: Ye hypocrites , well did Esaias prophesy of you , saying ,
text2: Ha lo77o milatiya iita asatoo , Isiyaasi balennan inttebau hananabaa yootiiddi ,

text: This people draweth nigh unto me with their mouth , and honoureth me with their lips ; but their heart is far from me .
text2: ' Xoossai hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Hagee asai tana ba bolla doonan bonchchees ; shin eta wozanai taappe haahuwan de7ees .

text: But in vain they do worship me , teaching for doctrines the commandments of men .
text2: Asai tau mela goinnees ; aissi giikko , asi oottido azazuwaa Xoossaa higgiyaa milatissidi tamaarissees ” giis ' yaagiis ” yaagiis .

text: And he called the multitude , and said unto them , Hear , and understand :
text2: Yesuusi daro asaa baakko xeesidi , “ Siyitenne akeekite ;

text: Not that which goeth into the mouth defileth a man ; but that which cometh out of the mouth , this defileth a man .
text2: asa tunissiyaabai doona giddo geliyaabaa gidenna ; shin asa tunissiyaabai doonappe kiyiyaabaa ” yaagiis .

text: Then came his disciples , and said unto him , Knowest thou that the Pharisees were offended , after they heard this saying ?
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , erissiyo ashkkarati akko yiidi , “ Parisaaweti neeni haasayidoogaa siyidi , hanqqettidoogaa akeekai ? ” yaagidosona .

text: But he answered and said , Every plant , which my heavenly Father hath not planted , shall be rooted up .
text2: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Saluwan de7iya ta Aawai tokkibeenna mitta ubbai shodettana .

text: Let them alone : they be blind leaders of the blind . And if the blind lead the blind , both shall fall into the ditch .
text2: Etabau hirggoppite ; eti qooqe kaalettiya qooqeta ; qooqee qooqe kaalettikko , naa77aikka ollan kunddana ” yaagiis .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Declare unto us this parable .
text2: Yaagin PHeexiroosi zaaridi , “ Ha leemisuwaa birshshettaa nuuyyo odarkkii ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus said , Are ye also yet without understanding ?
text2: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Intteyyo qassi ha77i gakkanaashinkka gelibeennee ?

text: Do not ye yet understand , that whatsoever entereth in at the mouth goeth into the belly , and is cast out into the draught ?
text2: Doonan geliya ubbai ulo giddo biidi , qassi uloppe gaxi kiyiyoogaa erekketii ?

text: But those things which proceed out of the mouth come forth from the heart ; and they defile the man .
text2: SHin doonappe kiyiyaabai wozanappe kiyees ; asa tunissiyaabai hegaa malaa .

text: For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts , murders , adulteries , fornications , thefts , false witness , blasphemies :
text2: Aissi giikko , wozana giddoppe iita qofai , woriyoogee , shaaramuxiyoogee , qassi shaaramuxanau qaaqqatiyoogee ubbai , wuuqqiyoogee , wordduwaa markkattiyoogee , cashshai kiyees .

text: These are the things which defile a man : but to eat with unwashen hands defileth not a man .
text2: Hegaa milatiyaabai asa tunissiyoogaappe attin , meeccibeenna kushen miyoogee asa tunissenna ” yaagiis .

text: Then Jesus went thence , and departed into the coasts of Tyre and Sidon .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi hegaappe aggidi , Xiiroosanne Sidoona giyo katamati de7iyo biitti biis .

text: And , behold , a woman of Canaan came out of the same coasts , and cried unto him , saying , Have mercy on me , O Lord , thou Son of David ; my daughter is grievously vexed with a devil .
text2: Kanaane giyo biittaa maccaasa issinniyaa hegaappe Yesuusakko yaada , ba qaalaa xoqqu oottada , “ Ta Godau , Daawita na7au , tana maararkkii ; ta na7iyo xalahee pala ohetta oiqqiis ” yaagaasu .

text: But he answered her not a word . And his disciples came and besought him , saying , Send her away ; for she crieth after us .
text2: SHin Yesuusi iyyo qaalanne qaattibeenna ; erissiyo ashkkarati akko yiidi , “ Ha mishiriyaa nu geeduwaa kaalla kaallada , ba qaalaa xoqqu oottada yootausu ; hegaa gishshau , neeni o yeddarkkii ” yaagidi woossidosona .

text: But he answered and said , I am not sent but unto the lost sheep of the house of Israel .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani bayida dorssau , Israa7eela asaa xalaalau kiitettaas ” yaagiis .

text: Then came she and worshipped him , saying , Lord , help me .
text2: SHin a yaada , “ Ta Godau , tana maaddarkkii ! ” yaagada au goinnaasu .

text: But he answered and said , It is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it to dogs .
text2: Qassi i zaaridi , “ Naatu qumaa ekkidi , zairotuyyo oliyoogee lo77o gidenna ” yaagiis .

text: And she said , Truth , Lord : yet the dogs eat of the crumbs which fall from their masters ' table .
text2: Mishiriyaa , “ Ee ta Godau , hegee tuma ; shin harai atto zairotikka bantta godati miishin , masoofiyaappe laalettida suuppaa moosonattennee ” yaagaasu .

text: Then Jesus answered and said unto her , O woman , great is thy faith : be it unto thee even as thou wilt . And her daughter was made whole from that very hour .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi o , “ Ha mishiree , ne ammanoi gita ; neeni koyidoogaadan neeyyo hano ” yaagiis . I na7iyaa sohuwaarakka paxa aggaasu .

text: And Jesus departed from thence , and came nigh unto the sea of Galilee ; and went up into a mountain , and sat down there .
text2: Yesuusi hegaappe denddidi , Galiila Abbaa mati biis ; qassi issi deriyaa bolli kiyidi , hegan uttiis .

text: And great multitudes came unto him , having with them those that were lame , blind , dumb , maimed , and many others , and cast them down at Jesus ' feet ; and he healed them :
text2: Daro asai wobbeta , qooqeta , quunatanne duudeta , qassi hara darota ekkidi , akko ehiis ; ehiidi a matan wottiis . Yesuusi eta pattiis .

text: Insomuch that the multitude wondered , when they saw the dumb to speak , the maimed to be whole , the lame to walk , and the blind to see : and they glorified the God of Israel .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , asai duudeti haasayishin , quunati sitti giishin , wobbeti hemettishin , qooqeti xeellishin be7idi garamettidi , Israa7eela asaa Xoossaa galatiis .

text: Then Jesus called his disciples unto him , and said , I have compassion on the multitude , because they continue with me now three days , and have nothing to eat : and I will not send them away fasting , lest they faint in the way .
text2: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata baakko xeesidi , “ Ha daro asai tanaara heezzu gallassi gakkanaassi gam77ido gishshau , taani ha asau qarettais ; etau ha77i miyoobi baawa . Qassi eti ogiyan daafuridi kunddenna mala , quma mizennan eta mela yeddanaukka koyikke ” yaagiis .

text: And his disciples say unto him , Whence should we have so much bread in the wilderness , as to fill so great a multitude ?
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati zaaridi Yesuusa , “ Nuuni ha bazzuwan hagaa keena asaa kalissiya quma auppe demmanee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven , and a few little fishes .
text2: Qassi Yesuusi eta , “ Intteyyo aappun oittai de7ii ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Eti , “ Laappun oittainne guutta moletuppe amaridaageeti de7oosona ” yaagidosona .

text: And he commanded the multitude to sit down on the ground .
text2: Yesuusi asaa , “ Sa7an uttite ” yaagiis .

text: And he took the seven loaves and the fishes , and gave thanks , and brake them , and gave to his disciples , and the disciples to the multitude .
text2: Yaagidi he laappun oittaanne moliyaa oiqqidi , Xoossaa galatiis ; menttidi erissiyo ashkkaratussi immiis ; qassi erissiyo ashkkarati daro asaassi immidosona .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets full .
text2: Asai ubbai miidi kalliis ; miishin attida laappun samppaa kumida xarzzaa erissiyo ashkkarati denttidosona .

text: And they that did eat were four thousand men , beside women and children .
text2: Miida asai maccaasaanne naata paidennan , oiddu sha7u attumaasa .

text: And he sent away the multitude , and took ship , and came into the coasts of Magdala ,
text2: Yesuusi asaa yeddidoogaappe guyyiyan , wolwoluwan gelidi , Magedoona giyo biitti biis .

text: The Pharisees also with the Sadducees came , and tempting desired him that he would shew them a sign from heaven .
text2: Issi issi Parisaawetinne Saaduqaaweti Yesuusakko yiidi , a paaccanau koyidosona ; yaatidi banttana saluwaappe malaata bessana mala woossidosona .

text: He answered and said unto them , When it is evening , ye say , It will be fair weather : for the sky is red .
text2: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi , eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Sa7ai qammiyo wode intte , ' Saloi zo77ido gishshau , sa7ai booqallana ' yaageeta ;

text: And in the morning , It will be foul weather to day : for the sky is red and lowring . O ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky ; but can ye not discern the signs of the times ?
text2: wonttimaatti qassi , ' Saloi zo77idi gubbanido gishshau , hachchi irai bukkana ' yaageeta ; saluwaa xeellidi , sa7ai hananabaa eranau danddayeeta ; shin ha wodiyaa malaataa shaakki eranau danddayekketii ?

text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign ; and there shall no sign be given unto it , but the sign of the prophet Jonas . And he left them , and departed .
text2: Ha wodiyaa asai iitai , Xoossau ammanettennaagee , malaata koyees ; hananabaa yootiya Yoonaasa malaataappe attin , hara malaati au imettenna ” yaagiis . Yaagidi , eta yeggi bayidi biis .

text: And when his disciples were come to the other side , they had forgotten to take bread .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati abbaa pinnido wode , qumaa efaanaagaa dogidosona .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Parisaawetu irshshuwaappenne Saaduqaawetu irshshuwaappe inttena eridi naagettite ” yaagiis .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have taken no bread .
text2: Eti bantta giddon , “ I hagaa giyoogee nuuni qumaa ehibeenna gishshaassa ” yaagidi haasayaa doommidosona .

text: Which when Jesus perceived , he said unto them , O ye of little faith , why reason ye among yourselves , because ye have brought no bread ?
text2: SHin eti giyoogaa Yesuusi eridi , “ Ha ammanoi paccidoogeetoo , qumi bainna gishshau , aissi intte giddon haasayeetii ?

text: Do ye not yet understand , neither remember the five loaves of the five thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Ha77ikka intteyyo gelibeennee ? Taani ichchashu oittaa ichchashu sha7u asaayyo battidoogaa , qassi intte aappun samppaa kunttidi denttidaakko hassayekketii ?

text: Neither the seven loaves of the four thousand , and how many baskets ye took up ?
text2: Woi taani laappun oittaa oiddu sha7u asaayyo battidoogaa , qassi intte aappun samppaa kunttidi denttidaakko hassayekketii ?

text: How is it that ye do not understand that I spake it not to you concerning bread , that ye should beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees ?
text2: Taani inttena Parisaawetu irshshuwaappenne Saaduqaawetu irshshuwaappe naagettite giyoogaappe attin , oittabaa intteyyo haasayabeennaagaa intte waanidi akeekekketii ? ” yaagiis .

text: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread , but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusi banttau odidoogee , Parisaawetu timirttiyaappenne Saaduqaawetu timirttiyaappe eti naagettanaagaa gididoogaappe attin , oittan tigiyo irshshuwaappe naagettanaagaa gidennaagaa he wode akeekidosona .

text: When Jesus came into the coasts of Caesarea Philippi , he asked his disciples , saying , Whom do men say that I the Son of man am ?
text2: Yesuusi Piliphphoosi - Qiisaariyaa giyo biittaa gakkido wode , ba erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Asai tana , Asa Na7aa oona gii ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: And they said , Some say that thou art John the Baptist : some , Elias ; and others , Jeremias , or one of the prophets .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati zaaridi , “ Nena issi issi asai , Xammaqiya Yohaannisa yaagees ; harati qassi Eelaasa yaagoosona ; qassi baggati Ermmaasa woi hananabaa yootiyaageetuppe issuwaa yaagoosona ” yaagidosona .

text: He saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ?
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi eta , “ Yaanin intte tana oona geetii ? ” yaagiis .

text: And Simon Peter answered and said , Thou art the Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Simoon PHeexiroosi zaaridi , “ Neeni de7o Xoossaa Na7aa Kiristtoosa ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Blessed art thou , Simon Barjona : for flesh and blood hath not revealed it unto thee , but my Father which is in heaven .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Yoona na7aa Simoonaa , hagaa neessi saluwan de7iya ta Aawai erissidoogaappe attin , asi ooninne nena erissibeenna gishshau , neeni anjjettidaagaa .

text: And I say also unto thee , That thou art Peter , and upon this rock I will build my church ; and the gates of hell shall not prevail against it .
text2: PHeexiroosaa , taani neeyyo odais ; neeni shuchcha ; taani ha zaallaa bolli ta woosa keettaa keexxana ; ta woosa keettaa harai atto , Si7ooliyaa wolqqaikka xoonanau danddayenna .

text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: Taani neessi saluwaa kawotettaa qulppiyaa immana ; neeni sa7an qachchiyo ubbai saluwan qashetti uttiis ; neeni sa7an birshshiyo ubbai saluwankka birshshetti uttiis ” yaagiis .

text: Then charged he his disciples that they should tell no man that he was Jesus the Christ .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Kiristtoosa i gididoogaa erissiyo ashkkarati oossinne odenna mala , eta azaziis .

text: From that time forth began Jesus to shew unto his disciples , how that he must go unto Jerusalem , and suffer many things of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be killed , and be raised again the third day .
text2: He wodeppe doommidi Yesuusi , “ Taani Yerusalaame bin , tana cimati , qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti daro waissanau bessees ; eti tana woranaunne taani heezzantto gallassi haiquwaappe denddanau bessees ” yaagidi , ba erissiyo ashkkaratussi geeshshidi oduwaa doommiis .

text: Then Peter took him , and began to rebuke him , saying , Be it far from thee , Lord : this shall not be unto thee .
text2: PHeexiroosi a issi baggi zaaridi , “ Ta Godau , Xoossai nena hegaappe ashsho ; hagee ne bolli mulekka yeenna ” yaagidi a zoranau doommiis .

text: But he turned , and said unto Peter , Get thee behind me , Satan : thou art an offence unto me : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but those that be of men .
text2: SHin Yesuusi guyye simmidi PHeexiroosa , “ Ha Seexaanau , neeni ta matappe kichcha ; neeni asi dosiyoobaa qoppiyoogaappe attin , Xoossai dosiyoobaa qoppenna gishshau , tau xube gidadasa ” yaagiis .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Tana kaallanau koyiya urai de7ikko , bana yeggi bayo ; yaatidi ba masqqaliyaa tookkidi , tana kaallo .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it : and whosoever will lose his life for my sake shall find it .
text2: Aissi giikko , ba shemppuwaa ashshana koyiya urai bashshana ; shin ba shemppuwaa ta gishshau bashshiya urai ashshana .

text: For what is a man profited , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ? or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Issi urai sa7an de7iya ubbabaa bau shiishshidi , ba shemppuwaa bashshikko , a ai maaddanee ? Woi issi urai ba shemppuwaa wozanau ai immana danddayii ?

text: For the Son of man shall come in the glory of his Father with his angels ; and then he shall reward every man according to his works .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani , Asa Na7ai , ta Aawaa bonchchuwan ta kiitanchchatuura yaana hanais ; asa ubbau he wode a oosuwaa malaa immana .

text: Verily I say unto you , There be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the Son of man coming in his kingdom .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; amarida asati , taani , Asa Na7ai , kawo gidada yiyoogaa be7ana gakkanaassi , haiqqennaageeti hagan de7oosona ” yaagiis .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh Peter , James , and John his brother , and bringeth them up into an high mountain apart ,
text2: Yesuusi usuppun gallassappe guyyiyan , banaara PHeexiroosa , Yaaqoobanne , Yaaqooba ishaa Yohaannisa ekkidi , eta xalaalaa gita deriyaa huuphiyaa kessiis .

text: And was transfigured before them : and his face did shine as the sun , and his raiment was white as the light .
text2: Qassi eti xeellishin , eta sinttan laamettiis ; a som77oi awa aifiyaadan poo7iis ; a maayoikka poo7uwaadan booxxiis .

text: And , behold , there appeared unto them Moses and Elias talking with him .
text2: Muuseenne Eelaasi Yesuusaara haasayishin , ha heezzu erissiyo ashkkarati be7idosona .

text: Then answered Peter , and said unto Jesus , Lord , it is good for us to be here : if thou wilt , let us make here three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: PHeexiroosi Yesuusa , “ Ta Godau , nuuni hagan de7iyoogee nuussi lo77o ; neeni dosikko , nuuni hagan heezzu zamppata issuwaa neessi , issuwaa Muusessi , issuwaa Eelaasassi zamppayana ” yaagiis .

text: While he yet spake , behold , a bright cloud overshadowed them : and behold a voice out of the cloud , which said , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased ; hear ye him .
text2: I haasayishin , poo7iya shaarai yinne eta gentti aggiis ; genttin shaaraappe , “ Hagee taani siiqiyo tana ufaissiya ta Na7aa ; i giyoogaa siyite ” giya qaalai yiis .

text: And when the disciples heard it , they fell on their face , and were sore afraid .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati he qaalaa siyido wode , daro yayyidi , gufanni wodhdhidosona .

text: And Jesus came and touched them , and said , Arise , and be not afraid .
text2: Yesuusi etakko yiidi , eta bochchiis ; bochchidi , “ Denddite ; yayyoppite ” yaagiis .

text: And when they had lifted up their eyes , they saw no man , save Jesus only .
text2: Eti xoqqu giidi xeelliyo wode , Yesuusa xalaalaappe attin , hara asa oonanne be7ibookkona .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , Jesus charged them , saying , Tell the vision to no man , until the Son of man be risen again from the dead .
text2: Eti deriyaappe wodhdhishin , Yesuusi eta , “ Taani Asa Na7ai , haiquwaappe denddana gakkanaassi , ha intte be7idoogaa ooyyoonne odoppite ” yaagidi azaziis .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Why then say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusa , “ Yaatin , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti aissi , ' Eelaasi kasetidi yaanau bessees ' giyoonaa ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Elias truly shall first come , and restore all things .
text2: Oichchin i zaaridi yaagiis ; “ Eelaasi kaseti yiidi , ubbabaa giigissana .

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is come already , and they knew him not , but have done unto him whatsoever they listed . Likewise shall also the Son of man suffer of them .
text2: SHin taani intteyyo odais ; Eelaasi hagaappe kase yiichchiis . Yin asai a ba koyidobaa ubbaa oottidoogaappe attin eribeenna ; hegaadankka , qassi tana , Asa Na7aa , asai waissana ” yaagiis .

text: Then the disciples understood that he spake unto them of John the Baptist .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati he wode banttau Yesuusi Xammaqiya Yohaannisabaa odiyoogaa akeekidosona .

text: And when they were come to the multitude , there came to him a certain man , kneeling down to him , and saying ,
text2: Eti daro asaakko yiido wode , issi bitanee Yesuusakko yiidi , a sinttan gulbbatidi ,

text: Lord , have mercy on my son : for he is lunatick , and sore vexed : for ofttimes he falleth into the fire , and oft into the water .
text2: “ Ta Godau , ta na7aa kaarettai oiqqin , i daro wode taman , qassi daro wode haattan kunddiyo gishshau , i keehi sahettees ; a pattarkkii .

text: And I brought him to thy disciples , and they could not cure him .
text2: Ne erissiyo ashkkaratukkokka a ehaas ; shin pattanau danddayibookkona ” yaagiis .

text: Then Jesus answered and said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him hither to me .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi eta , “ Ammanenna ha wodiyaa geella asau ! Taani inttenaara aude gakkanaassi de7anee ? Qassi inttebaa aude gakkanaassi danddayanee ? Na7aa taakko haa ekki yiite ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus rebuked the devil ; and he departed out of him : and the child was cured from that very hour .
text2: Yesuusi xalahiyaa , “ Appe kiya ” giidi azazin , xalahee na7aappe kiyi aggiis ; sohuwaarakka na7ai paxi bayiis .

text: Then came the disciples to Jesus apart , and said , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , erissiyo ashkkarati banttarkka Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Nuuni xalahiyaa kessanau aissi danddayibookkonii ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Because of your unbelief : for verily I say unto you , If ye have faith as a grain of mustard seed , ye shall say unto this mountain , Remove hence to yonder place ; and it shall remove ; and nothing shall be impossible unto you .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi eta yaagiis ; “ Hegee intte ammanoi guuxxido gishshataassa ; taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; intteyyo sanaafici giyo qii mittee aifee keena ammanoi de7iyaakko , intte ha deriyaa , ' Hagaappe yaa shiiqa ' yaagiyaakko i shiiqana ; intte ai oottanaukka danddayana .

text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting .
text2: SHin hagaa malaa woosappenne xoomappe harabai kessanau danddayenna ” yaagiis .

text: And while they abode in Galilee , Jesus said unto them , The Son of man shall be betrayed into the hands of men :
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati Galiilan , issippe shiiqi uttidaashin , Yesuusi eta , “ Tana , Asa Na7aa , asi asau aattidi immana .

text: And they shall kill him , and the third day he shall be raised again . And they were exceeding sorry .
text2: Asai tana worana ; worin taani heezzantto gallassi haiquwaappe denddana ” yaagiis . Erissiyo ashkkarati daro qarettidosona .

text: And when they were come to Capernaum , they that received tribute money came to Peter , and said , Doth not your master pay tribute ?
text2: Yesuusinne erissiyo ashkkarati Qifirinaahooma katamaa yiido wode , Beeta Maqidasiyaassi giiraa ekkiyaageeti PHeexiroosakko yiidi , “ Inttena tamaarissiyaagee Beeta Maqidasiyaa giiraa giirennee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: He saith , Yes . And when he was come into the house , Jesus prevented him , saying , What thinkest thou , Simon ? of whom do the kings of the earth take custom or tribute ? of their own children , or of strangers ?
text2: I zaaridi , “ Giirees ” yaagiis . PHeexiroosi soo gelido wode , Yesuusi kasetidi a , “ Simoonaa , ne qofai aibee ? Ha sa7aa kawoti qaraxaa woi giiraa ooppe ekkiyoonaa ? Bantta biittaa asaappe ekkiyoonaayye woi hara biitta asaappe ekkiyoonaa ? ” yaagiis .

text: Peter saith unto him , Of strangers . Jesus saith unto him , Then are the children free .
text2: Yaagin PHeexiroosi , “ Hara biitta asaappe ekkoosona ” yaagiis . Yesuusi PHeexiroosa , “ Yaatikko , biittaa asai giiranau bessenna .

text: Notwithstanding , lest we should offend them , go thou to the sea , and cast an hook , and take up the fish that first cometh up ; and when thou hast opened his mouth , thou shalt find a piece of money : that take , and give unto them for me and thee .
text2: SHin nuuni ha asata hanqqetissanau koyokko ; neeni abbaa baada aani piriyaa yegga ; yaatada koiro kiyiya moliyaa oiqqada , a doonaa pooqqiyo wode , giirau gidiya miishshaa neeni demmana . Hegaa ekkada , ta giiraanne ne giiraa etau qanxxa ” yaagiis .

text: At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus , saying , Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven ?
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusakko he wode yiidi , “ Saluwaa kawotettan ubbaappe aadhdhiyaagee oonee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus called a little child unto him , and set him in the midst of them ,
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi issi guutta na7aa xeesidi , eta giddon essidi , hagaadan yaagiis ;

text: And said , Verily I say unto you , Except ye be converted , and become as little children , ye shall not enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; Xoossaakko intte simmidi , guutta naatudan hanana xayikko , saluwaa kawotettaa mulekka gelanau danddayekketa .

text: Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child , the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Simmi ha guutta na7aadan , bana kaushshiya ooninne saluwaa kawotettan ubbaappe aadhdhiyaagaa .

text: And whoso shall receive one such little child in my name receiveth me .
text2: Qassi hagaa mala na7a ta sunttan mokkiya ooninne tana mokkees .

text: But whoso shall offend one of these little ones which believe in me , it were better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and that he were drowned in the depth of the sea .
text2: SHin tana ammaniya ha guutta naatuppe issuwaa balettiya ooninne , gaacciyo wogga woxaa ba qooriyan qachchidi , ciimma abban mitettiyoogee au keha .

text: Woe unto the world because of offences ! for it must needs be that offences come ; but woe to that man by whom the offence cometh !
text2: “ Sa7ai asaa xubbiyo gishshau , sa7aayyo aayye7ana ; aissi giikko , xubbiyaabai yuussaa aggenna ; shin xubee a gaasotan yiyo uraayyo aayye7ana .

text: Wherefore if thy hand or thy foot offend thee , cut them off , and cast them from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life halt or maimed , rather than having two hands or two feet to be cast into everlasting fire .
text2: “ Ne kushee woi ne tohoi nena balettikko , neeppe qanxxa ola ; neeni naa77u kushiyaaranne naa77u tohuwaara merinaa taman olettanaagaappe wobbe woi duuxa kushiyaara merinaa de7uwaa geliyoogee neeyyo keha .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out , and cast it from thee : it is better for thee to enter into life with one eye , rather than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire .
text2: Qassi ne aifee nena balettikko , neeppe wooca ola ; neeni naa77u aifiyaara Gaannabiyaa taman olettanaagaappe issi aifiyaara merinaa de7uwaa geliyoogee neeyyo keha .

text: Take heed that ye despise not one of these little ones ; for I say unto you , That in heaven their angels do always behold the face of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Intte ha guuttatuppe issuwaanne karenna mala , inttena naagite ; aissi giikko , taani intteyyo odais ; saluwan eta kiitanchchati ubba wode , saluwan de7iya ta Aawaa sinttan de7oosona .

text: For the Son of man is come to save that which was lost .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani , Asa Na7ai , bayidaagaa ashshanau yaas .

text: How think ye ? if a man have an hundred sheep , and one of them be gone astray , doth he not leave the ninety and nine , and goeth into the mountains , and seeketh that which is gone astray ?
text2: “ Issi asayyo xeetu dorssati de7iyaageetuppe issoi bayikko , uddufun tammanne uddufunaa deriyan yeggi bayidi , he bayidaagaa koyanau beennee ? Intte woigeetii ?

text: And if so be that he find it , verily I say unto you , he rejoiceth more of that sheep , than of the ninety and nine which went not astray .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; i demmikko , bayibeenna uddufun tammanne uddufun dorssatuppe aattidi , he issi dorssan ufaittees .

text: Even so it is not the will of your Father which is in heaven , that one of these little ones should perish .
text2: Hegaadankka , saluwan de7iya intte Aawai ha guuttatuppe issoi bayyanaagaakka koyenna .

text: Moreover if thy brother shall trespass against thee , go and tell him his fault between thee and him alone : if he shall hear thee , thou hast gained thy brother .
text2: “ Ne ishai nena naaqqikko , nerkka akko baada , a mooruwaa au yoota ; i nebaa siyikko , ne ishaa balaappe zaaradasa .

text: But if he will not hear thee , then take with thee one or two more , that in the mouth of two or three witnesses every word may be established .
text2: SHin i nebaa siyennan ixxikko , naa77u woi heezzu markkai markkattidoogan yoho ubbai tumattiyo gishshau , hara issi woi naa77u asa nenaara ekka efa .

text: And if he shall neglect to hear them , tell it unto the church : but if he neglect to hear the church , let him be unto thee as an heathen man and a publican .
text2: I etabaa siyennan ixxikko , ubbabaa woosa keettaassi oda ; qassi woosa keettai giyoogaakka i siyennan ixxikko , ammanenna asadaaninne giiraa ekkiya asadan a paida .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven : and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven .
text2: “ Taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; sa7an intte qachchiyo ubbai saluwankka qashetti uttiis ; qassi sa7an intte birshshiyo ubbai saluwankka birshshetti uttiis .

text: Again I say unto you , That if two of you shall agree on earth as touching any thing that they shall ask , it shall be done for them of my Father which is in heaven .
text2: “ Qassikka taani intteyyo odais ; intteppe naa77u urai sa7an Xoossaa woossiyooban aibiininne maayettikko , saluwan de7iya ta Aawai hegaa intteyyo immana .

text: For where two or three are gathered together in my name , there am I in the midst of them .
text2: Aissi giikko , naa77u urai woi heezzu urai ta sunttan shiiqiyoosan , taani hegan eta gidduwan de7ais ” yaagiis .

text: Then came Peter to him , and said , Lord , how oft shall my brother sin against me , and I forgive him ? till seven times ?
text2: PHeexiroosi he wode Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Godau , ta ishai tana aapputoo naaqqikko taani ayyo atto gaanau bessii ? Laappuntto gakkanaassi naaqqiineeyye ? ” yaagidi a oichchiis .

text: Jesus saith unto him , I say not unto thee , Until seven times : but , Until seventy times seven .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi a , “ CHii , taani nena laappun tammutoo laappuntto gaisippe attin , laappuntto giikke .

text: Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king , which would take account of his servants .
text2: “ Aissi giikko , saluwaa kawotettai ba ashkkaratuura miishshaa qoodettanau qoppida kawuwaa milatees .

text: And when he had begun to reckon , one was brought unto him , which owed him ten thousand talents .
text2: He kawoi miishshaa qoodettanau doommido wode , daro sha7u paundde acoi de7iyo issi bitaniyaa akko ehiidosona .

text: But forasmuch as he had not to pay , his lord commanded him to be sold , and his wife , and children , and all that he had , and payment to be made .
text2: SHin he ashkkarau acuwaa qanxxiyoobai xayin , a godai he acuwaa qanxxanau , a machchiyaanne inne a naati , qassi au de7iya ubbabai baizettana mala , a azaziis .

text: The servant therefore fell down , and worshipped him , saying , Lord , have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ashkkarai ba godaa sinttan gulbbatidi , ' Ta godau , hai nanggashsharkkii ; taani neeyyo ubbabaakka qanxxana ' yaagidi a woossiis .

text: Then the lord of that servant was moved with compassion , and loosed him , and forgave him the debt .
