text2: Woossin a godai au qarettidi , a yeddi bayiis ; a acuwaakka ayyo maari aggiis .

text: But the same servant went out , and found one of his fellowservants , which owed him an hundred pence : and he laid hands on him , and took him by the throat , saying , Pay me that thou owest .
text2: “ SHin he ashkkarai kiyidi , ba lagge ashkkaratuppe issoi baappe ishatamu bira gidiyaagaa tal77idaagaara gaittidi , ' Ne bolli de7iya ta miishshaa qanxxa ' yaagi oiqqidi , a cuulliis .

text: And his fellowservant fell down at his feet , and besought him , saying , Have patience with me , and I will pay thee all .
text2: “ Cuullin he a lagge ashkkarai a sinttan gulbbatidi , ' Hai nanggashsharkkii ; taani neeyyo ubbabaakka qanxxana ' yaagidi a woossiis .

text: And he would not : but went and cast him into prison , till he should pay the debt .
text2: “ SHin ixxidi ekki efiidi , a laggee he acuwaa qanxxana gakkanaashin , qasho keettaa gelissiis .

text: So when his fellowservants saw what was done , they were very sorry , and came and told unto their lord all that was done .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , a lagge ashkkarati hegaa be7idi , daro yiillotidosona ; bantta godaakko biidi , i oottido ubbabaa au odidosona .

text: Then his lord , after that he had called him , said unto him , O thou wicked servant , I forgave thee all that debt , because thou desiredst me :
text2: “ Hegaappe guyyiyan , godai he ashkkaraa xeesidi , ' Ha iita ashkkarau , neeni tana woossido gishshau , taani he aco ubbaa neeyyo maara aggaas .

text: Shouldest not thou also have had compassion on thy fellowservant , even as I had pity on thee ?
text2: Taani neeyyo he acuwaa maaridoogaadan , neenikka ne lagge ashkkarau maaranau bessennee ? ' yaagiis .

text: And his lord was wroth , and delivered him to the tormentors , till he should pay all that was due unto him .
text2: Yaagidi a daro hanqqettidi , ba acuwaa ubbaa i qanxxana gakkanaashin , paxa kaa7ettana mala , qasho keettaa gelissiis .

text: So likewise shall my heavenly Father do also unto you , if ye from your hearts forgive not every one his brother their trespasses .
text2: “ Intte huuphiyan huuphiyan intte ishau wozanappe atto gaana xayikko , he godai ba ashkkaraa oottidoogaadan , saluwan de7iya ta Aawaikka inttena hegaadan oottana ” yaagiis .

text: And it came to pass , that when Jesus had finished these sayings , he departed from Galilee , and came into the coasts of Judaea beyond Jordan ;
text2: Yesuusi he haasayaa wurssidoogaappe guyyiyan , Galiilappe denddidi , Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefinttan de7iya Yihudaa biittaa biis .

text: And great multitudes followed him ; and he healed them there .
text2: Daro asai a kaallidi biidaagaa hegan pattiis .

text: The Pharisees also came unto him , tempting him , and saying unto him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife for every cause ?
text2: Issi issi Parisaaweti paaccanau Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Issi asi issiban gaasottidi , ba machchiyo yeddanau nu higgee azazii ? ” yaagidi a oichchidosona .

text: And he answered and said unto them , Have ye not read , that he which made them at the beginning made them male and female ,
text2: Oichchin Yesuusi zaaridi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Xoossai koiro eta medhdhiiddi , attumaasanne maccaasa oottiis .

text: And said , For this cause shall a man leave father and mother , and shall cleave to his wife : and they twain shall be one flesh ?
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ' Issi asi ba aawaanne ba aayyiyo aggi bayidi , ba machcheera issippe de7ees ; eti naa77ai issi asa gidoosona ' yaagiya qaalaa nabbabibeekketii ?

text: Wherefore they are no more twain , but one flesh . What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , eti issi asa gidiyoogaappe attin , naa77u asa gidokkona ; hegaa gishshau , Xoossai issippe gattidoogaa asi shaakkoppo ” yaagiis .

text: They say unto him , Why did Moses then command to give a writing of divorcement , and to put her away ?
text2: Parisaaweti Yesuusa , “ Yaatin , Muusee aissi issi urai ba machcheeyyo paramaa immidi yeddana mala azazidee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: He saith unto them , Moses because of the hardness of your hearts suffered you to put away your wives : but from the beginning it was not so .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Intte intte maccaasaa yeddana mala , Muusee inttena azazidoogee , intte yootin siyennaageeta gidido gishshaassappe attin , koiro hegaa mala gidenna .

text: And I say unto you , Whosoever shall put away his wife , except it be for fornication , and shall marry another , committeth adultery : and whoso marrieth her which is put away doth commit adultery .
text2: Taani intteyyo odais ; ba machchiyo shaaramuxennan de7ishin yeddidi , haranno ekkiya ooninne shaaramuxees ; harai yeddidooro ekkiyaageekka shaaramuxees ” yaagiis .

text: His disciples say unto him , If the case of the man be so with his wife , it is not good to marry .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati a , “ Azina giddooninne machchi giddon de7iya wogai hegaa mala gidikko , ekkennaaninne gelennan de7iyoogee keha ” yaagidosona .

text: But he said unto them , All men cannot receive this saying , save they to whom it is given .
text2: SHin Yesuusi eta yaagiis ; “ Hagaa mala timirttee Xoossai immidoogeetussappe attin , asa ubbaassa gidenna ;

text: For there are some eunuchs , which were so born from their mother ' s womb : and there are some eunuchs , which were made eunuchs of men : and there be eunuchs , which have made themselves eunuchs for the kingdom of heaven ' s sake . He that is able to receive it , let him receive it .
text2: aissi giikko , bantta aayee uluwaappe yelettiyo wodekka , attumatetti bainnan yelettidaageeti de7oosona ; qassi asi qaaratidoogeetikka de7oosona ; qassi saluwaa kawotettaa gishshau , banttana qaaratidaageeti de7oosona ; ha timirttiyaa eranau danddayiya ooninne ero ” yaagiis .

text: Then were there brought unto him little children , that he should put his hands on them , and pray : and the disciples rebuked them .
text2: Yesuusi he wode ba kushiyaa guutta naatu bolli wottidi , Xoossaa woossana mala , issi issi asai naata akko ehiis ; shin erissiyo ashkkarati he asaa hanqqettidosona .

text: But Jesus said , Suffer little children , and forbid them not , to come unto me : for of such is the kingdom of heaven .
text2: SHin Yesuusi , “ Guutta naati taakko yiyoogaa diggoppite ; aissi giikko , saluwaa kawotettai hageetu malaassa ” yaagiis .

text: And he laid his hands on them , and departed thence .
text2: Yaagidi ba kushiyaa eta bolli wottidoogaappe guyyiyan , hegaappe aggi bayidi biis .

text: And , behold , one came and said unto him , Good Master , what good thing shall I do , that I may have eternal life ?
text2: Issi bitanee Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , taani merinaa de7uwaa demmanau lo77obaa ai oottoo ? ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God : but if thou wilt enter into life , keep the commandments .
text2: Yesuusi a , “ Lo77obai aibakko tana aissi oichchai ? Issuwaa xalaalai lo77o ; shin neeni merinau de7anau koyikko , azazota naaga ” yaagiis .

text: He saith unto him , Which ? Jesus said , Thou shalt do no murder , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness ,
text2: Bitanee , “ Augeeta ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Oichchin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Woroppa ; shaaramuxoppa ; wuuqqoppa ; worddo markkattoppa ;

text: Honour thy father and thy mother : and , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: ne aawaanne ne aayyiyo bonchcha ; ne shooruwaakka ne huuphedan siiqa ” yaagiis .

text: The young man saith unto him , All these things have I kept from my youth up : what lack I yet ?
text2: He yelaga bitanee Yesuusa , “ Taani hegaa ubbaakka guutta naatettaasappe doommada naagaas ; yaatin , tau pacciyaabi aibee ? ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou wilt be perfect , go and sell that thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come and follow me .
text2: Yesuusi bitaniyaa , “ Neeni polida asa gidanau koyikko , baada neeyyo de7iyaabaa baizzada , he miishshaa hiyyeesau imma ; neeni saluwan duretana ; yaatada yaada tana kaalla ” yaagiis .

text: But when the young man heard that saying , he went away sorrowful : for he had great possessions .
text2: SHin he yelaga bitanee hegaa siyido wode , i daro dure gidiyo gishshau , qarettiiddi aggi bayidi biis .

text: Then said Jesus unto his disciples , Verily I say unto you , That a rich man shall hardly enter into the kingdom of heaven .
text2: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratussi , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; dure asi saluwaa kawotettaa gelanaagee daro meto gidana .

text: And again I say unto you , It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Taani gujjadakka intteyyo odais ; dure asi Xoossaa kawotettaa gelanaagaappe , gaameelai marppiyaa xoo7iyaara aadhdhanaagee matattees ” yaagiis .

text: When his disciples heard it , they were exceedingly amazed , saying , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa siyidi garamettidi , “ Yaatin , ooni attanau danddayii ? ” yaagidosona .

text: But Jesus beheld them , and said unto them , With men this is impossible ; but with God all things are possible .
text2: Yesuusi eta tishshi ootti xeellidi , “ Hagee asau danddayettenna ; shin Xoossau ubbabai danddayettees ” yaagiis .

text: Then answered Peter and said unto him , Behold , we have forsaken all , and followed thee ; what shall we have therefore ?
text2: PHeexiroosi he wode zaaridi Yesuusa , “ Be7a , nuuni nuuyyo de7iya ubbabaa aggi bayidi , nena kaallida ; yaatidi nuuni ai demmaneeshsha ? ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That ye which have followed me , in the regeneration when the Son of man shall sit in the throne of his glory , ye also shall sit upon twelve thrones , judging the twelve tribes of Israel .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; taani , Asa Na7ai , ooratta biittan ta kawotaa araatan uttiyo wode , tana kaallida inttekka tammanne naa77u Israa7eela zaretu bolli pirddanau , tammanne naa77u kawotaa araatan uttana .

text: And every one that hath forsaken houses , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my name ' s sake , shall receive an hundredfold , and shall inherit everlasting life .
text2: Ta sunttaa gishshau , keettata woi ishantta woi michchentta , woi aawaa woi aayyiyo woi machchiyo , woi naata woi gadiyaa aggida ooninne , xeetu kushiyaappe dichchaa ekkana ; qassi merinaa de7uwaakka laattana .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last shall be first .
text2: SHin daroti ha77i sinttan de7iyaageeti guyye aadhdhana ; qassi daroti ha77i guyyen de7iyaageeti sinttau aadhdhana .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder , which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard .
text2: “ Saluwaa kawotettai woiniyaa giyo turaa gidduwaa oosanchchata keraa ootissanau , maallado guuraara kiyida woiniyaa turaa godaa milatees .

text: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day , he sent them into his vineyard .
text2: I he oosanchchatuyyo hachchi hachchi issi shilingge qanxxanau etaara giigidi , ba woiniyaa turaa gidduwaa ootissanau eta yeddiis .

text: And he went out about the third hour , and saw others standing idle in the marketplace ,
text2: “ Qassi heezzu saate gidishin kiyidi , oosoi bainnan qocan eqqida hara asata be7idi ,

text: And said unto them ; Go ye also into the vineyard , and whatsoever is right I will give you . And they went their way .
text2: eta , ' Inttekka qassi ta woiniyaa turaa gidduwaa oottanau biite ; taani intteyyo bessiya waagaa qanxxana ' yaagiis ; yaagin eti biidosona .

text: Again he went out about the sixth and ninth hour , and did likewise .
text2: Naa77anttuwaakka usuppun saatiyaaninne uddufun saatiyan kiyidi , hegaadan oottiis .

text: And about the eleventh hour he went out , and found others standing idle , and saith unto them , Why stand ye here all the day idle ?
text2: Tammanne isiini saatiyan i kiyiyo wode , harati hegan eqqidaageeta demmidi , ' Ooso oottennan kumetta gallassaa hagan aissi eqqi pe7idetii ? ' yaagiis .

text: They say unto him , Because no man hath hired us . He saith unto them , Go ye also into the vineyard ; and whatsoever is right , that shall ye receive .
text2: “ Yaagin eti , ' Nuna ootissiya asi xayido gishshau eqqi pe7ida ' yaagidosona . “ I , ' Inttekka qassi ta woiniyaa turaa gidduwaa oottanau biite ' yaagiis .

text: So when even was come , the lord of the vineyard saith unto his steward , Call the labourers , and give them their hire , beginning from the last unto the first .
text2: “ Sa7ai omariyo wode , woiniyaa turaa godai oosanchchatu halaqaa , ' Oosanchchata xeesada , wurssettan oosuwan gelidaageetuppe doommada koiro gelidaageeta gakkanaassi , eta damoozaa qanxxa ' yaagiis .

text: And when they came that were hired about the eleventh hour , they received every man a penny .
text2: “ Tammanne isiinintta saatiyan oosuwaa doommidaageeti yiidi , huuphiyan huuphiyan issi issi shilinggiyaa ekkidosona .

text: But when the first came , they supposed that they should have received more ; and they likewise received every man a penny .
text2: Koiro oosuwaa doommida asati yiido wode , daruwaa ekkanau qoppidosona ; shin etikka huuphiyan huuphiyan issi issi shilinggiyaa ekkidosona .

text: And when they had received it , they murmured against the goodman of the house ,
text2: Ekkidi , ' Ha guyyeppe yiidaageeti issi saate xalaalaa oottidosona ; kumetta gallassaa daafuraanne hombbiyaa ekkida nuugaara eta damoozaa lagge oottadasa ' yaagidi banttana oosuwan gelissidaagaa bolli zuuzummidosona .

text: But he answered one of them , and said , Friend , I do thee no wrong : didst not thou agree with me for a penny ?
text2: “ SHin i etappe issuwaa hagaadan yaagiis ; ' Ta jaalau , taani nena naaqqabeikke ; issi shilinggiyan tanaara giigabeikkiiyye ?

text: Take that thine is , and go thy way : I will give unto this last , even as unto thee .
text2: Neegaa ekkada ba ; taani ha wurssettan oosuwan gelidaagaassikka neegaa keenaa immanau koyais .

text: Is it not lawful for me to do what I will with mine own ? Is thine eye evil , because I am good ?
text2: Taani ta miishshan ta koyidobaa oottanau tau maati baawee ? Woi taani keha gidido gishshau , neeni qanaatai ? ' yaagiis .

text: So the last shall be first , and the first last : for many be called , but few chosen .
text2: “ Hegaadankka , qassi guyyeegeeti sinttau aadhdhana ; sinttaageeti guyye aadhdhana ; aissi giikko , xeesettidaageeti daro ; shin doorettidaageeti guutta ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus going up to Jerusalem took the twelve disciples apart in the way , and said unto them ,
text2: Yesuusi Yerusalaame biiddi , ogiyan banaara biya tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata gaxaa kessidi , dumma etassi yaagiis .

text: Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be betrayed unto the chief priests and unto the scribes , and they shall condemn him to death ,
text2: “ Be7ite , nuuni Yerusalaame ha77i kiyeettees . Yaani tana , Asa Na7aa qeese halaqatussinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetussi aattidi immana ; eti ta bolli haiqo pirddaa pirddana .

text: And shall deliver him to the Gentiles to mock , and to scourge , and to crucify him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: Qassi Aihuda gidenna asaassikka tana aattidi immana ; he Aihuda gidenna asai ta bolli qilliiccananne tana lissuwan garafana ; yaatidi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi , tana kaqqana ; kaqqin taani heezzantto gallassi haiquwaappe denddana ” yaagiis .

text: Then came to him the mother of Zebedee ' s children with her sons , worshipping him , and desiring a certain thing of him .
text2: He wode Zabddiyoosa naatu aayyiyaa ba naatuura Yesuusakko yaasu ; yaada a sinttan gulbbatada issibaa a woossaasu .

text: And he said unto her , What wilt thou ? She saith unto him , Grant that these my two sons may sit , the one on thy right hand , and the other on the left , in thy kingdom .
text2: Yesuusi o , “ Ai koyai ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . A zaarada , “ Ha ta naa77u naati ne kawotettan issoi neeppe ushachcha baggaara , qassi issoi neeppe haddirssa baggaara uttona garkkii ” yaagada woossaasu .

text: But Jesus answered and said , Ye know not what ye ask . Are ye able to drink of the cup that I shall drink of , and to be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ? They say unto him , We are able .
text2: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi naata , “ Intte ai woossiyaakko erekketa ; taani uyana burccukkuwaappe uyanaunne taani xammaqettana xinqqatiyaa xammaqettanau danddayeetii ? ” yaagiis . Yaagin eti , “ Ee danddayoos ” yaagidosona .

text: And he saith unto them , Ye shall drink indeed of my cup , and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with : but to sit on my right hand , and on my left , is not mine to give , but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared of my Father .
text2: Yesuusi , “ Taani uyiyo burccukkuwaappe tumakka intte uyana ; shin taappe ushachcha baggaaranne haddirssa baggaara uttanaageeta dooranau taayyo maati baawa ; shin he sohoi ta Aawai immanau giigissi wottidoogeetussa ” yaagiis .

text: And when the ten heard it , they were moved with indignation against the two brethren .
text2: Hankko tammu erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa siyido wode , he naa77u ishantta hanqqettidosona .

text: But Jesus called them unto him , and said , Ye know that the princes of the Gentiles exercise dominion over them , and they that are great exercise authority upon them .
text2: SHin Yesuusi eta ubbaa baakko xeesidi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Aihuda gidennaageetu halaqatinne hegeeta kaalettiya asati bantta asaa haariyoogaa ereeta .

text: But it shall not be so among you : but whosoever will be great among you , let him be your minister ;
text2: Intte giddon hegaa mala gidenna ; shin intte giddon gitatana koyiya ooninne intteyyo ashkkara gidanau bessees .

text: And whosoever will be chief among you , let him be your servant :
text2: Qassi intte giddon ubbaappe bolla gidana koyiyai ooninne intteyyo aille gidanau bessees .

text: Even as the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Hegaadan taani , Asa Na7ai , asaayyo oottanaunne daro asaa wozanau ta shemppuwaa immanau yiidoogaappe attin , asi tau oottanau yabeikke ” yaagiis .

text: And as they departed from Jericho , a great multitude followed him .
text2: Yesuusinne erissiyo ashkkarati Yarkkoppe kiyishin , daro asai eta kaalliis .

text: And , behold , two blind men sitting by the way side , when they heard that Jesus passed by , cried out , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Naa77u qooqe asati ogiyaa doonan uttidaageeti Yesuusi hegaara aadhdhiyoogaa siyidi , bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Godau , Daawita na7au , nuna maararkkii ” yaagidosona .

text: And the multitude rebuked them , because they should hold their peace : but they cried the more , saying , Have mercy on us , O Lord , thou Son of David .
text2: Daro asai eta , “ Haizzite ” giidi hanqqettiis ; shin eti bantta qaalaa keehi xoqqu oottidi , “ Godau , Daawita na7au , nuna maararkkii ! ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus stood still , and called them , and said , What will ye that I shall do unto you ?
text2: Yesuusi ogiyan eqqidi , eta xeesiis ; xeesidi , “ Taani intteyyo ai oottanau koyeetii ? ” yaagiis .

text: They say unto him , Lord , that our eyes may be opened .
text2: Qooqeti , “ Godau , nu aifiyaa pattarkkii ” yaagidosona .

text: So Jesus had compassion on them , and touched their eyes : and immediately their eyes received sight , and they followed him .
text2: Yesuusi etau qarettidi , eta aifiyaa bochchiis ; sohuwaarakka eta aifee xeelli aggin , a kaalli bayidosona .

text: And when they drew nigh unto Jerusalem , and were come to Bethphage , unto the mount of Olives , then sent Jesus two disciples ,
text2: Eti Yerusalaame matidi , Dabira Zaite giyo deriyaa lanqqiyan de7iya Beetafaage giyo qeeri katamaa gakkidosona ; Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuppe naa77aa sinttau kiittidi ,

text: Saying unto them , Go into the village over against you , and straightway ye shall find an ass tied , and a colt with her : loose them , and bring them unto me .
text2: eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Intteppe sinttan de7iya qeeri katamaa biite ; biidi issi hariyaa qashuwan de7iyaaro i maraara intte sohuwaara demmana ; eta birshshidi , tau ekki yiite .

text: And if any man say ought unto you , ye shall say , The Lord hath need of them ; and straightway he will send them .
text2: Ooninne inttena oichchikko , ' Godai hageeta koyees ' yaagite ; sohuwaarakka i eta yeddi bayana .

text: All this was done , that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , saying ,
text2: Hananabaa yootiyaagee , “ Xiyoone katamau , ' Be7a , ne kawoi ashkke gididi , hariyaa bolli , hare maraa bolli uttidi , neekko yees ' yaagite ” yaagidi haasayidoogee polettana mala , hagee haniis .

text: And the disciples went , and did as Jesus commanded them ,
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati biidi , Yesuusi banttana azazidoogaadan oottidosona .

text: And brought the ass , and the colt , and put on them their clothes , and they set him thereon .
text2: Hariyoonne hare maraa ehiidi , bantta maayuwaa eta zokkuwan hiixxidosona ; hiixxin Yesuusi toggiis .

text: And a very great multitude spread their garments in the way ; others cut down branches from the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: He daro asaappe dariya baggai ba maayuwaa ogiyan hiixxiis ; qassi harati mittaa tashiyaa kari karidi , ogiyan hiixxidosona .

text: And the multitudes that went before , and that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna to the Son of David : Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord ; Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Yesuusappe sinttaara hemettiya daro asainne qassi a geeduwaa kaalliya daro asai , ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Daawita na7ai galatetto ! Godaa sunttan yiyaagee anjjettidaagaa ! Xoossai galatetto ! ” yaagiis .

text: And when he was come into Jerusalem , all the city was moved , saying , Who is this ?
text2: Yesuusi Yerusalaame katamaa gelido wode , kataman de7iya asai ubbai , “ Hagee oonee ? ” yaagidi shabbirettiis .

text: And the multitude said , This is Jesus the prophet of Nazareth of Galilee .
text2: Asai , “ Hagee Galiilan de7iya Naazireeta giyo katamaappe yiida hananabaa yootiya Yesuusa ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus went into the temple of God , and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ,
text2: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelidi , hegan baizziyaageetanne shammiyaageeta ubbaa kare yedettiis ; qassi miishshaa laammiyaageetu xaraphpheezaanne haraphphiyaa baizziyaageetu oidiyaa aatti yeggidi ,

text: And said unto them , It is written , My house shall be called the house of prayer ; but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: eta , “ Xoossaa maxaafan , ' Ta keettai Xoossaa woossiyo keetta geetettana ' yaagettidi xaafetti uttiis ; shin intte a panggati qosettiyo gonggolo kesseeta ” yaagiis .

text: And the blind and the lame came to him in the temple ; and he healed them .
text2: Qooqetinne tohoi silidoogeeti Yesuusakko Beeta Maqidasiyaa yin , i eta pattiis .

text: And when the chief priests and scribes saw the wonderful things that he did , and the children crying in the temple , and saying , Hosanna to the Son of David ; they were sore displeased ,
text2: SHin qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti Yesuusi oottiyo oorattabaa be7ido wodenne , guutta naati Beeta Maqidasiyan bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Daawita na7ai galatetto ” yaagiyoogaa be7ido wode hanqqettidosona .

text: And said unto him , Hearest thou what these say ? And Jesus saith unto them , Yea ; have ye never read , Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings thou hast perfected praise ?
text2: Hanqqettidi Yesuusa , “ Hageeti giyoogaa siyai ? ” yaagidosona . Yesuusi , “ Ee siyais ; Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Guutta naatinne xammiya naati nena galatana mala , eta erissadasa ' yaagiyaagaa mulekka nabbabibeekketii ? ” yaagiis .

text: And he left them , and went out of the city into Bethany ; and he lodged there .
text2: Yesuusi eta aggi bayidi , he katamaappe Biitaaniyaa giyo katamaa biidi , yaani aqiis .

text: Now in the morning as he returned into the city , he hungered .
text2: Yesuusi maallado katamaa simmidi yiidi namisettiis .

text: And when he saw a fig tree in the way , he came to it , and found nothing thereon , but leaves only , and said unto it , Let no fruit grow on thee henceforward for ever . And presently the fig tree withered away .
text2: Ogiyaa doonan issi balase giyo mittiyo be7idi , ikko biis ; biidi he balasen haitta xalaalappe attin , aife ainne demmibeenna ; o , “ Naa77anttuwaa merinaukka aifoppa ” yaagin , he balasiyaa sohuwaara mela aggaasu .

text: And when the disciples saw it , they marvelled , saying , How soon is the fig tree withered away !
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa be7idi garamettidi , “ Ha balasiyaa waanada issi kuttan mela aggadee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Verily I say unto you , If ye have faith , and doubt not , ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree , but also if ye shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; it shall be done .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; intte ammanoi de7iyoogeetanne sirennaageeta gidikko , ha balasiyo taani oottidoogaa mala xalaalaa oottekketa ; shin harai atto intte ha deriyaa , ' Denddada abban kundda ' giikkokka hanana ;

text: And all things , whatsoever ye shall ask in prayer , believing , ye shall receive .
text2: intte ammanidi Xoossaa woossiyoobaa aiba gidikkokka ekkana ” yaagiis .

text: And when he was come into the temple , the chief priests and the elders of the people came unto him as he was teaching , and said , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority ?
text2: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaa yiidi tamaarissishin , qeese halaqatinne Aihuda cimati akko yiidi , “ Neeni hagaa oottanau neeyyo ai alaafetetti de7ii ? Neeyyo ha alaafetettaa oonee immidai ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I also will ask you one thing , which if ye tell me , I in like wise will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi eta , “ Taanikka inttena issibaa oichchana ; intte tau hegaa odikko , taani hagaa ai alaafetettan oottiyaakko , intteyyo odana ;

text: The baptism of John , whence was it ? from heaven , or of men ? And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say unto us , Why did ye not then believe him ?
text2: Yohaannisi xammaqiyo alaafetettai awappe yiidee ? Xoossaappe yiideeyye asappe yiidee ? ” yaagiis . Eti bantta giddon palamaa doommidi , “ Nuuni , ' Xoossaappe yiis ' yaagikko i nuna , ' Yaatin , Yohaannisi yootidoogaa aissi ammanibeekketii ? ' yaagana .

text: But if we shall say , Of men ; we fear the people ; for all hold John as a prophet .
text2: SHin nuuni , ' Asappe yiis ' yaagikko , asai ubbai Yohaannisi hananabaa yootiyaagaa gididoogaa eriyo gishshau , asau yayyoos ” yaagidosona .

text: And they answered Jesus , and said , We cannot tell . And he said unto them , Neither tell I you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Eti Yesuusayyo , “ Nuuni erokko ” yaagidi zaaridosona . Yesuusi , “ Taanikka hagaa ai alaafetettan oottiyaakko , intteyyo odikke ” yaagiis .

text: But what think ye ? A certain man had two sons ; and he came to the first , and said , Son , go work to day in my vineyard .
text2: “ SHin intte ai qoppeetii ? Naa77u naati de7iyo issi bitanee de7ees ; he bitanee baira na7aakko biidi , ' Ta na7au , hachchi baada ta woiniyaa turaa ootta ' yaagiis .

text: He answered and said , I will not : but afterward he repented , and went .
text2: Na7ai zaaridi , ' Ixxaas ' giis ; shin guyyeppe ba wozanan qoppi ekkidi , woiniyaa turaa oottanau biis .

text: And he came to the second , and said likewise . And he answered and said , I go , sir : and went not .
text2: Aawai hinkko na7aakko biidi , bairau giidoogaadankka au giis ; kaalo na7ai zaaridi , ' Ero ta godau ' yaagiis ; shin bibeenna .

text: Whether of them twain did the will of his father ? They say unto him , The first . Jesus saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That the publicans and the harlots go into the kingdom of God before you .
text2: Ha naa77u naatuppe ba aawai koyidoogaa oottidaagee augee ? ” yaagiis . Yaagin eti , “ Bairaa ” yaagidosona . Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; giiraa ekkiyaageetinne shaaramuxati intteppe sinttatidi , Xoossaa kawotettaa gelana .

text: For John came unto you in the way of righteousness , and ye believed him not : but the publicans and the harlots believed him : and ye , when ye had seen it , repented not afterward , that ye might believe him .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xammaqiya Yohaannisi xillotettaa ogiyaa tamaarissiiddi , inttekko yin , i giyoogaa ammanibeekketa . SHin giiraa ekkiyaageetinne shaaramuxati i giyoogaa ammanidosona ; intte harai atto hegaa be7idikka , intte nagaraappe simmidi , i giyoogaa ammanibeekketa ” yaagiis .

text: Hear another parable : There was a certain householder , which planted a vineyard , and hedged it round about , and digged a winepress in it , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country :
text2: Qassikka Yesuusi hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Hara leemisuwaakka siyite ; woiniyaa giyo turaa tokkida issi bitanee de7ees ; woiniyaa turaa yuushshi aattidi diriis ; qassi he woiniyaa gum77iyo ollaakka bookkiis ; hegaa naagiya asaayyo adussa shuchchaa gimbbiis . Hegaappe guyyiyan , kottaa oottiya asau immidi , hara dere biis .

text: And when the time of the fruit drew near , he sent his servants to the husbandmen , that they might receive the fruits of it .
text2: Woiniyaa aifiyaa maxiyo wodee gakkin , bana gakkiyaagaa ekkidi yaana mala , ba ashkkarata ba kottaawatukko kiittiis .

text: And the husbandmen took his servants , and beat one , and killed another , and stoned another .
text2: Kottaawati a ashkkarata oiqqidi , issuwaa wadhdhidosona ; issuwaa woridi , qassi hinkkuwaa shuchchan caddidosona .

text: Again , he sent other servants more than the first : and they did unto them likewise .
text2: Qassikka he bitanee kaseegeetuppe dariya hara ashkkarata kiittiis ; kottaawati he ashkkaratakka kaseegeetudan oottidosona .

text: But last of all he sent unto them his son , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: “ SHin wurssettan i , ' Ta na7aa eti bonchchana ' yaagidi ba na7aa etakko kiittiis .

text: But when the husbandmen saw the son , they said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and let us seize on his inheritance .
text2: “ SHin kottaawati na7aa be7idi , bantta giddon , ' Gadiyaa laattanaagee hagaa ; hinddite a woridi , gadiyaa nuuni laattoos ' yaagidosona .

text: And they caught him , and cast him out of the vineyard , and slew him .
text2: Na7aa oiqqidi , woiniyaa turaa giddoppe gaxaa kessidi woridosona .

text: When the lord therefore of the vineyard cometh , what will he do unto those husbandmen ?
text2: “ Simmi woiniyaa turaa godai yiyo wode , he kottaawata waatanee ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: They say unto him , He will miserably destroy those wicked men , and will let out his vineyard unto other husbandmen , which shall render him the fruits in their seasons .
text2: Oichchin eti , “ I he iita asata wori wurssidi , woiniyaa turai aifiyo wode bana gakkiyaagaa wodiyan sheedhdhiya hara kottaawatuyyo immana ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Did ye never read in the scriptures , The stone which the builders rejected , the same is become the head of the corner : this is the Lord ' s doing , and it is marvellous in our eyes ?
text2: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ ' Gimbbiyaageeti karidi ixxido shuchchai godaa xaphuwaa minttiya , ubbaappe aadhdhiya shuchcha gidiis . Hagee Godai oottidobaa ; qassi nu aifiyaukka garamissiyaabaa ' yaagiyaagaa Xoossaa maxaafaappe mulekka nabbabibeekketii ?

text: Therefore say I unto you , The kingdom of God shall be taken from you , and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof .
text2: “ Hegaa gishshau , taani intteyyo odais ; Xoossaa kawotettai intteppe ekettidi , lo77o aifiyaa immiya asau imettana .

text: And whosoever shall fall on this stone shall be broken : but on whomsoever it shall fall , it will grind him to powder .
text2: He shuchchaa bolli kunddiya ubbai meqerettana ; qassi he shuchchai asa bolli kunddikko , he kunddido uraa gaaccana ” yaagiis .

text: And when the chief priests and Pharisees had heard his parables , they perceived that he spake of them .
text2: Qeese halaqatinne Parisaaweti Yesuusi odido leemisuwaa siyido wode , banttabaa haasayiyoogaa eridosona .

text: But when they sought to lay hands on him , they feared the multitude , because they took him for a prophet .
text2: Eti Yesuusa oiqqanau koyidosona ; shin Yesuusa daro asai hananabaa yootiyaagaa giidi qoppi uttido gishshau , he asau yayyidosona .

text: And Jesus answered and spake unto them again by parables , and said ,
text2: Yesuusi asaayyo naa77anttuwaa leemisuwan hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis ;

text: The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king , which made a marriage for his son ,
text2: “ Saluwaa kawotettai ba na7aayyo bullachchaa makkida kawuwaa mala .

text: And sent forth his servants to call them that were bidden to the wedding : and they would not come .
text2: He kawoi bullachchaa odi wottido asata xeesanau ba ashkkarata kiittiis ; shin asati yaanau koyibookkona .

text: Again , he sent forth other servants , saying , Tell them which are bidden , Behold , I have prepared my dinner : my oxen and my fatlings are killed , and all things are ready : come unto the marriage .
text2: “ Qassi hara ashkkarata , ' Xeesettidaageeta , “ Taani qumaa giigissaas ; ta sanggatinne ta daddaroti shuhettidosona ; ubbabaikka mahettiis . Bullachchaa haa yiite ” yaagite ' yaagidi kiittiis .

text: But they made light of it , and went their ways , one to his farm , another to his merchandise :
text2: SHin xeesettidaageeti koyennan ixxidi , bantta oosuwau oosuwau biidosona ; issoi ba goshshau bin , hinkkoi ba zal77iyau biis .

text: And the remnant took his servants , and entreated them spitefully , and slew them .
text2: Attidaageeti qassi kawuwaa ashkkarata oiqqidi wadhdhidi woridosona .

text: But when the king heard thereof , he was wroth : and he sent forth his armies , and destroyed those murderers , and burned up their city .
text2: “ Kawoi daro hanqqettiis ; qassi ba wotaaddarata yeddidi , he shemppuwaa woridaageeta worissidi , eta katamaa xuugissiis .

text: Then saith he to his servants , The wedding is ready , but they which were bidden were not worthy .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , ba ashkkarata , ' Bullachchai mahettiis ; shin xeesettidaageeti bullachchau bessiya asa gidokkona .

text: Go ye therefore into the highways , and as many as ye shall find , bid to the marriage .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , wogga ogiyaa biidi , intte demmido asa ubbaa bullachchau xeesite ' yaagiis .

text: So those servants went out into the highways , and gathered together all as many as they found , both bad and good : and the wedding was furnished with guests .
text2: He ashkkarati ogiyaa biidi , bantta demmido asa ubbaa lo77uwaa iitaa shiishshidi , bullachchaa daasiyaa kunttidosona .

text: And when the king came in to see the guests , he saw there a man which had not on a wedding garment :
text2: “ SHin kawoi qumaa maanau uttida asaa be7anau gelido wode , bullachchaa maayuwaa maayibeenna issi bitaniyaa hegan be7idi ,

text: And he saith unto him , Friend , how camest thou in hither not having a wedding garment ? And he was speechless .
text2: ' Ta jaalau , bullachchaa maayuwaa maayennan waanada hagaa geladii ? ' yaagin bitanee co77u giis .

text: Then said the king to the servants , Bind him hand and foot , and take him away , and cast him into outer darkness ; there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: “ Hegaappe guyyiyan , kawoi ba ashkkarata , ' Ha bitaniyaa kushiyaanne tohuwaa qachchidi , kare xumaa kessi olite ; i hegan yeekkananne achchaa garccana ' yaagiis .

text: For many are called , but few are chosen .
text2: “ Aissi giikko , xeesettidaageeti daro ; shin doorettidaageeti guutta ” yaagiis .

text: Then went the Pharisees , and took counsel how they might entangle him in his talk .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Parisaaweti biidi , a haasayaappe bala demmidi , a oiqqana mala maqettidosona .

text: And they sent out unto him their disciples with the Herodians , saying , Master , we know that thou art true , and teachest the way of God in truth , neither carest thou for any man : for thou regardest not the person of men .
text2: Qassi bantta erissiyo ashkkaratuppenne Heeroodisa baggatuppe amaridaageeta akko kiittidosona . Kiittin eti , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , neeni tumaa haasayiyoogaanne Xoossaa ogiyaa tumatettan tamaarissiyoogaa nuuni eroos ; aissi giikko , neeni asappe asa shaakkakkanne dummayakka .

text: Tell us therefore , What thinkest thou ? Is it lawful to give tribute unto Caesar , or not ?
text2: Ne qofai aibakko nuuyyo oda ; nuuni Roome biittaa Kawuwaa Qeesaarayyo giiraa giiriyoogee wogeeyye woga gidennee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: But Jesus perceived their wickedness , and said , Why tempt ye me , ye hypocrites ?
text2: SHin Yesuusi eta iita qofaa eridi , “ Ha lo77o milatiya iita asatoo , aissi tana paacceetii ?

text: Shew me the tribute money . And they brought unto him a penny .
text2: Giiraa qanxxiyo miishshaa tana bessite ” yaagiis . Yaagin eti santtimiyaa au ehiidosona .

text: And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ?
text2: I , “ Ha merainne sunttai oogee ? ” yaagiis .

text: They say unto him , Caesar ' s . Then saith he unto them , Render therefore unto Caesar the things which are Caesar ' s ; and unto God the things that are God ' s .
text2: Yaagidi eta oichchin , eti , “ Roome biittaa Kawuwaa Qeesaaraagaa ” yaagidosona . Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi eta , “ Yaatikko , Qeesaaraagaa Qeesaarassi , Xoossaagaa Xoossaassi immite ” yaagiis .

text: When they had heard these words , they marvelled , and left him , and went their way .
text2: Eti hegaa siyido wode , garamettidi a yeggi bayidi biidosona .

text: The same day came to him the Sadducees , which say that there is no resurrection , and asked him ,
text2: Haiqqida asi denddenna giya Saaduqaawetuppe issi issi asati he gallassi Yesuusakko yiidi , hagaadan yaagidi , a oichchidosona ;

text: Saying , Master , Moses said , If a man die , having no children , his brother shall marry his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , Muusee , ' Issi asi na7a yelennan haiqqikko , he haiqqidaagaa ishai a machchiyo aissidi , ba ishaayyo na7a yelanau bessees ' yaagiis .

text: Now there were with us seven brethren : and the first , when he had married a wife , deceased , and , having no issue , left his wife unto his brother :
text2: Nunaara laappun ishantti de7oosona ; bairai machchiyo ekkidi , na7a yelennan haiqqiis ; haiqqin a machchiyo a ishai aissiis .

text: Likewise the second also , and the third , unto the seventh .
text2: Qassi naa77anttoikka haiqqiis ; heezzanttoikka , laappuntta gakkanaashinkka hegaadan hanidosona .

text: And last of all the woman died also .
text2: Ubbaappe guyyiyan , he maccaasiyaa haiqqaasu .

text: Therefore in the resurrection whose wife shall she be of the seven ? for they all had her .
text2: Yaatin , haiqqida asai haiquwaappe denddiyo gallassi he maccaasiyaa laappunatuppe augaayyo machcho gidanee ? Aissi giikko , laappunati ubbaikka o ekkidosona ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Ye do err , not knowing the scriptures , nor the power of God .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Xoossaa maxaafata woi a wolqqaa intte erenna gishshau baleeta .

text: For in the resurrection they neither marry , nor are given in marriage , but are as the angels of God in heaven .
text2: Aissi giikko , haiqqida asai haiquwaappe denddiyo gallassi , saluwan de7iya kiitanchchatu mala gidanaappe attin , attumaasinne ekkenna ; maccaasinne gelenna .

text: But as touching the resurrection of the dead , have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God , saying ,
text2: SHin haiqqidaageetu dendduwaabaa gidikko , Xoossai , ' Taani Abrahaama Xoossaa , Yisaaqa Xoossaa , Yaaqooba Xoossaa ' yaagidi intteyyo odidoogaa mulekka nabbabibeekketii ? Xoossai paxa de7iyaageetu Xoossaa gidiyoogaappe attin , haiqqidaageetu Xoossaa gidenna ” yaagiis .

text: And when the multitude heard this , they were astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Daro asai hegaa siyidi , a timirttiyan garamettiis .

text: But when the Pharisees had heard that he had put the Sadducees to silence , they were gathered together .
text2: SHin Yesuusi Saaduqaaweta co77u oottidoogaa Parisaaweti siyido wode , issisaa shiiqidosona .

text: Then one of them , which was a lawyer , asked him a question , tempting him , and saying ,
text2: Eta giddoppe higgiyaa tamaarissiya issoi , Yesuusa paaccanau issibaa oichchiis .

text: Master , which is the great commandment in the law ?
text2: “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , higgiyaa giddon ubbaappe aadhdhiya azazoi augee ? ” yaagidi a oichchiis .

text: Jesus said unto him , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind .
text2: Oichchin Yesuusi zaaridi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ ' Neeni Godaa ne Xoossaa ne kumetta wozanaappe , ne kumetta shemppuwaappe , ne kumetta qofaappe siiqa ' yaagiis .

text: This is the first and great commandment .
text2: Hegee ubbaappe gitatiya azazonne qassi ubbaappe aadhdhiya azazo .

text: And the second is like unto it , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Qassi naa77antto azazoikka a mala ; hegee , ' Neeni ne shooruwaa ne huuphedan siiqa ' giyaagaa .

text: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets .
text2: Muuse higge ubbainne hananabaa yootiyaageetu timirttee ha naa77u azazotun qashettees ” yaagiis .

text: While the Pharisees were gathered together , Jesus asked them ,
text2: Parisaaweti issisaa shiiqidaashin Yesuusi eta , “ Kiristtoosabaa woigi qoppeetii ? I o na7ee ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Oichchin eti , “ Kiristtoosi Daawita na7aa ” yaagidosona .

text: He saith unto them , How then doth David in spirit call him Lord , saying ,
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Yaatin , Daawiti bana Geeshsha Ayyaanai haasayissin Kiristtoosa woigidi , ' Goda ' giidi xeesii ?

text: The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: Qassikka Daawiti , ' Godai ta Godaa , “ Taani ne morkketa neeni yedhdha eqqiyoobaa oottana gakkanaassi , hagan taappe ushachcha baggaara utta ” giis ' yaagiis .

text: If David then call him Lord , how is he his son ?
text2: Daawiti Kiristtoosa , ' Godaa ' giidi xeesikko , yaatin , Kiristtoosi waanidi Daawita na7a gidii ? ” yaagiis .

text: And no man was able to answer him a word , neither durst any man from that day forth ask him any more questions .
text2: Yesuusau issi qaala zaaranau danddayida issi asinne baawa ; qassi he gallassappe doommin , hara oisha a oichchanau xalidai oonikka baawa .

text: Then spake Jesus to the multitude , and to his disciples ,
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi shiiqida asaayyoonne ba erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis ;

text: Saying , The scribes and the Pharisees sit in Moses ' seat :
text2: “ Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne Parisaaweti Muuse higgiyaa tamaarissiyo maataara de7oosona .

text: All therefore whatsoever they bid you observe , that observe and do ; but do not ye after their works : for they say , and do not .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte oottana mala , eti inttena azaziyo ubbabaa oottitenne qassi naagite ; shin eti oottiyoogaadan oottoppite ; aissi giikko , eti bantta yootiyoogaa oottokkona .

text: For they bind heavy burdens and grievous to be borne , and lay them on men ' s shoulders ; but they themselves will not move them with one of their fingers .
text2: Tookkanau deexxiya toohuwaa eti qachchidi , asa toossoosona ; shin bantta huuphen harai atto , he toohuwaa biradhdhiyan bochchanaukka koyokkona .

text: But all their works they do for to be seen of men : they make broad their phylacteries , and enlarge the borders of their garments ,
text2: “ SHin eti bantta ooso ubbaa asi be7anaadan oottoosona ; aissi giikko , bantta som77uwaaninne bantta kushiyaa qesiyan qachchiyo xiqisiyaara de7iya kitaafaa aassoosonanne bantta maayuwaa macaraakka adussoosona .

text: And love the uppermost rooms at feasts , and the chief seats in the synagogues ,
text2: Asi banttana imattiyoosan bonchcho sohuwaa dosoosona ; qassi Aihuda woosa keettatunkka daro lo77iya oidiyaa dosoosona .

text: And greetings in the markets , and to be called of men , Rabbi , Rabbi .
text2: Asi giyan banttana bonchchidi sarotanaagaanne ' Tamaarissiyaagoo ' giidi banttana xeesanaagaa koyoosona .

text: But be not ye called Rabbi : for one is your Master , even Christ ; and all ye are brethren .
text2: “ SHin inttena tamaarissiyaagee issuwaa xalaala gidido gishshaunne intte ubbai ishantta gidido gishshau , issoi issuwaa , ' Tamaarissiyaagoo ' giidi xeesoppite .

text: And call no man your father upon the earth : for one is your Father , which is in heaven .
text2: Ha sa7an oonanne ' Aawa ' giidi xeesoppite ; aissi giikko , intteyyo saluwan de7iya issi Aawai de7ees .

text: Neither be ye called masters : for one is your Master , even Christ .
text2: Issoi issuwaa , ' Godau ' giidikka xeesoppite ; aissi giikko , intteyyo issi Godai , Kiristtoosa xalaalai de7ees .

text: But he that is greatest among you shall be your servant .
text2: Intte giddon ubbaappe gitatiyaagee intteyyo ashkkara gidanau bessees .

text: And whosoever shall exalt himself shall be abased ; and he that shall humble himself shall be exalted .
text2: Bana gitayiya oonikka kauyyana ; qassi bana kaushshiya oonikka gitatana .

text: But woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men : for ye neither go in yourselves , neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in .
text2: “ Lo77o milatiya iitatoo , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoonne Parisaawetoo , asaayyo saluwaa kawotettaa intte gorddiyo gishshau , intteyyo aayye7ana ; aissi giikko , intte huuphiyaunne gelekketa ; qassi gelanau koyiyaageetanne gelissekketa .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayer : therefore ye shall receive the greater damnation .
text2: “ Lo77o milatiya iitatoo , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoonne Parisaawetoo am77etu keettaa intte bonqqidi , intteyyo lo77o milatanau Xoossaa woosaa adusseeta ; hegaa gishshau , intteyyo aayye7ana ; ubbaappe aadhdhiya pirddaa intte ekkana .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye compass sea and land to make one proselyte , and when he is made , ye make him twofold more the child of hell than yourselves .
text2: “ Lo77o milatiya iitatoo , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoonne Parisaawetoo intte issi uraa ammanttanau abbaaninne sa7an yuuyiyo gishshaunne qassi intte a ammanttiyo wode , he uraa intteegaappe naa77u kushe iitida Gaannabiyau na7a oottiyo gishshau , intteyyo aayye7ana .

text: Woe unto you , ye blind guides , which say , Whosoever shall swear by the temple , it is nothing ; but whosoever shall swear by the gold of the temple , he is a debtor !
text2: “ ' Ooninne Beeta Maqidasiyan caaqqikko , aibinne baawa ; shin Beeta Maqidasiyan de7iya worqqan caaqqikko , he caaqoi a gakkees ' giya intteyyo qooqi uttidi asa kaalettiyaageetoo , intteyyo aayye7ana .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gold , or the temple that sanctifieth the gold ?
text2: Ha eeyyati , ha qooqeti , worqqai aadhdhiiyye ? Worqqaa geeshsha oottiya Beeta Maqidasee aadhdhii ?

text: And , Whosoever shall swear by the altar , it is nothing ; but whosoever sweareth by the gift that is upon it , he is guilty .
text2: Qassi intte , ' Ooninne yarshsho yarshshiyooban caaqqikko , aikkokka baawa ; shin ooninne a bolli de7iya yarshshon caaqqikko , he caaqoi a gakkees ' yaagidi tamaarisseeta .

text: Ye fools and blind : for whether is greater , the gift , or the altar that sanctifieth the gift ?
text2: Ha eeyyati , ha qooqeti , yarshshoi aadhdhiiyye ? Woi yarshsho geeshsha oottiya a yarshshiyoobai aadhdhii ?

text: Whoso therefore shall swear by the altar , sweareth by it , and by all things thereon .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , yarshsho yarshshiyooban caaqqiya urai he yarshshiyoobankka caaqqees ; qassi a bolli de7iya ubbabankka caaqqees .

text: And whoso shall swear by the temple , sweareth by it , and by him that dwelleth therein .
text2: Beeta Maqidasiyan caaqqiya urai , he Beeta Maqidasiyaaninne a giddon de7iya Xoossan caaqqees .

text: And he that shall swear by heaven , sweareth by the throne of God , and by him that sitteth thereon .
text2: Saluwan caaqqiya urai , Xoossaa kawotaa araataaninne he araatan uttiyaagan caaqqees .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye pay tithe of mint and anise and cummin , and have omitted the weightier matters of the law , judgment , mercy , and faith : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: “ Lo77o milatiya iitatoo , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoonne Parisaawetoo , intteyyo aayye7ana . Aissi giikko , karetta sawuwaappe , katikallaappenne okashiyaappe asirataa intte immeeta ; shin higgiyan de7iya keehi koshshiyaageeta aggi bayeeta ; hegeeti pirddaa , maarotettaanne xillotettaa . Haratakka aggennan , intte oottanau bessiya yohoti hegeeta .

text: Ye blind guides , which strain at a gnat , and swallow a camel .
text2: Intteyyo qooqi uttidi , asa kaalettiyaageetoo , intte ushshaappe udunxxiyaa gaccidi , gaameelaa mitteeta .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye make clean the outside of the cup and of the platter , but within they are full of extortion and excess .
text2: “ Lo77o milatiya iitatoo , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoonne Parisaawetoo , intteyyo aayye7ana . Aissi giikko , intte shaatiyaayyoonne keriyaayyo bolla baggaa geeshsheeta ; shin intteyyo giddoora bonqqiyoogeenne uuzettiyoogee kumi uttiis .

text: Thou blind Pharisee , cleanse first that which is within the cup and platter , that the outside of them may be clean also .
text2: Ha qooqe Parisaawiyau , shaatiyaayyoonne keriyaayyo garssaa kasetada geeshshargga ; hegaappe guyyiyan , bolla baggaikka geeshsha gidana .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are like unto whited sepulchres , which indeed appear beautiful outward , but are within full of dead men ' s bones , and of all uncleanness .
text2: “ Lo77o milatiya iitatoo , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoonne Parisaawetoo , intteyyo aayye7ana . Aissi giikko , kare baggaara aannuwan tiyettidi , lo77i uttidi , qassi garssa baggaara haiqqida asa meqettinne wooqqidabai ubbabai kumido duufota milateeta .

text: Even so ye also outwardly appear righteous unto men , but within ye are full of hypocrisy and iniquity .
text2: Hegaadankka , qassi bolla baggaara asa ubbau xillo milateeta ; shin intteyyo garssa baggaara lo77o milatiya iitatettainne makkalai kumi uttiis .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! because ye build the tombs of the prophets , and garnish the sepulchres of the righteous ,
text2: “ Lo77o milatiya iitatoo , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoonne Parisaawetoo , intteyyo aayye7ana . Aissi giikko , hananabaa yootiyaageetu duufuwaa bolli keettaa keexxeeta ; qassi xillotu duufuwaakka loitteeta .

text: And say , If we had been in the days of our fathers , we would not have been partakers with them in the blood of the prophets .
text2: Qassi intte , ' Nuuni beni nu aawatu wode de7idobaa gidiyaakko , etaara issippe hananabaa yootiyaageeta worokko shin ' yaageeta .

text: Wherefore ye be witnesses unto yourselves , that ye are the children of them which killed the prophets .
text2: Hegaa gidikko , hananabaa yootiyaageeta woridaageetu naata intte gididoogaa intte huuphen markkatteeta .

text: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers .
text2: Simmi intte aawati doommidoogaa polekketii !

text: Ye serpents , ye generation of vipers , how can ye escape the damnation of hell ?
text2: “ Ha shooshshatoo , shooshshaa naatoo , Gaannabiyaa pirddaappe waanidi attuuteetii ?

text: Wherefore , behold , I send unto you prophets , and wise men , and scribes : and some of them ye shall kill and crucify ; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues , and persecute them from city to city :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , be7ite , taani hananabaa yootiyaageeta , aadhdhida eranchchatanne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeta inttekko kiittais . Etappe issuwaa issuwaa intte worananne masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqana ; qassi issuwaa issuwaa intte woosa keettatun lissuwan garafananne katamappe katama yedettana .

text: That upon you may come all the righteous blood shed upon the earth , from the blood of righteous Abel unto the blood of Zacharias son of Barachias , whom ye slew between the temple and the altar .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , xilluwaa Aabeela woroosappe doommidi , Beeta Maqidasiyaappenne yarshshiyoosaappe gidduwan intte worido Baraakiyaa na7aa Zakkaariyaasa wodiyaa gakkanaassi , haiqqida xillo ubbatu suuttaa gishshau , intte qaxxayettana .

text: Verily I say unto you , All these things shall come upon this generation .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; ha ubbabai ha wodiyaa asaa bolli gakkana .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , thou that killest the prophets , and stonest them which are sent unto thee , how often would I have gathered thy children together , even as a hen gathereth her chickens under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: “ Yerusalaame katamaa asau , Yerusalaame katamaa asau , hananabaa yootiyaageeta intte woreeta ; Xoossai inttekko kiittidoogeetakka shuchchan caddeeta ; kuttiyaa ba marata ba qefiyan haphphiyoogaadan , taani intte asaa issi diri shiishshanau aapputoo koyidanaa ! SHin tana diggideta .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate .
text2: Be7ite , intte keettai muleera ona gidana .

text: For I say unto you , Ye shall not see me henceforth , till ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani intteyyo odais ; intte , ' Godaa sunttan yiyaagee anjjettidaagaa ' gaana gakkanaashin , naa77anttuwaa tana be7ekketa ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus went out , and departed from the temple : and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple .
text2: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaappe kiyidi biishin , Beeta Maqidasiyaa dirssa giddon de7iya keettata bessanau erissiyo ashkkarati akko yiidosona .

text: And Jesus said unto them , See ye not all these things ? verily I say unto you , There shall not be left here one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi eta , “ Hagaa ubbaa be7eetii ? Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; ha keettatun de7iya issi shuchchinne attennan ubbai qolettana ” yaagiis .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives , the disciples came unto him privately , saying , Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign of thy coming , and of the end of the world ?
text2: Yesuusi Dabira Zaite giyo deriyaa bollan uttidaashin , erissiyo ashkkarati banttarkka akko yiidi a , “ Hegee aude hananaakko , nuuyyo odarkkii ; qassi ne yuussaayyoonne wodiyaa wurssettaayyo malaatai aiba gidanee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Take heed that no man deceive you .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Inttena ooninne balettenna mala naagettite .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Aissi giikko , daro asati ta sunttan , ' Taani Kiristtoosa ' yaagiiddi yaana ; yiidi daro asaa balettana .

text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars : see that ye be not troubled : for all these things must come to pass , but the end is not yet .
text2: Matan de7iya olaa cenggurssaanne haahuwan de7iya olaa oduwaa siyanau intte de7eeta ; hegaa malabai hananau bessiyo gishshau , naagettite ; hirggoppite ; shin wurssettai biroona .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be famines , and pestilences , and earthquakes , in divers places .
text2: Aissi giikko , issi biittaa asai hara biittaa asaara olettana ; qassi issi kawotettai hara kawotettaara olettana ; koshainne biittaa qaattai ubbasan de7ana .

text: All these are the beginning of sorrows .
text2: Hegee ubbaikka koiro leesso mala .

text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted , and shall kill you : and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name ' s sake .
text2: “ Asai he wode inttena waissananne worana ; ta sunttaa gishshau , dere ubbai inttena ixxana .

text: And then shall many be offended , and shall betray one another , and shall hate one another .
text2: He wode daroti ammanuwaa aggana ; bantta giddon issoi issuwaa aattidi immananne issoi issuwaa ixxana .

text: And many false prophets shall rise , and shall deceive many .
text2: Qassi wordduwaa hananabaa yootiya daroti denddidi , daro asaa cimmana .

text: And because iniquity shall abound , the love of many shall wax cold .
text2: Makkalai dariyo gishshau , daro asaa siiqoi irxxana .

text: But he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: SHin wurssettaa gakkanaashin gencciya urai attana .

text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations ; and then shall the end come .
text2: Asa ubbau markka gidana mala , kawotettaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchoi sa7a ubban odettana ; hegaappe guyyiyan , wurssettai gakkana .

text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , stand in the holy place , ( whoso readeth , let him understand : )
text2: “ Hegaa gishshau , hananabaa yootiya Daaneeli odido bashshaa tunatettai geeshsha sohuwan eqqidaagaa intte be7ana ; hegee woigiyoogaakko , nabbabiyaagee akeeko .

text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains :
text2: Yihudaa biittan he wode de7iyaageeti deriyaakko baqatona .

text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Keettaa huuphiyan de7iya uraikka ba son de7iyaabaa ekkanau wodhdhoppo .

text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes .
text2: Gaden de7iyaagee ba maayuwaa ekkanau guyye simmoppo .

text: And woe unto them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: He wode shahaara maccaasatuyyoonne xanttiya maccaasatuyyo aayye7ana .

text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter , neither on the sabbath day :
text2: Balggon woi Sambbatan intte baqatenna mala , Xoossaa woossite ;

text: For then shall be great tribulation , such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time , no , nor ever shall be .
text2: aissi giikko , sa7ai merettoosappe hachchi gakkanaashin de7ibeennabainne qassi hagaappe sinttaukka mule de7enna iita waayee he wode de7ana .

text: And except those days should be shortened , there should no flesh be saved : but for the elect ' s sake those days shall be shortened .
text2: Xoossai he gallassatu qoodaa guuttiyoi bainnaakko , asa gididai ooninne attenna ; shin i ba doorido asatu gishshau , he gallassatu qoodaa guuttana .

text: Then if any man shall say unto you , Lo , here is Christ , or there ; believe it not .
text2: “ He wode ooninne inttena , ' Be7ite . Kiristtoosi hagan de7ees ' woi , ' Hegan de7ees ' yaagikko abaa ammanoppite .

text: For there shall arise false Christs , and false prophets , and shall shew great signs and wonders ; insomuch that , if it were possible , they shall deceive the very elect .
text2: Aissi giikko , worddanchcha Kiristtoosatinne wordduwaa hananabaa yootiyaageeti denddana ; denddidi banttau danddayettikko , harai atto Xoossai dooridoogeetakka balettanau gita malaataanne garamissiyaabaa bessana .

text: Behold , I have told you before .
text2: Be7ite , taani intteyyo hegaa kasetada yootaas .

text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you , Behold , he is in the desert ; go not forth : behold , he is in the secret chambers ; believe it not .
text2: “ Hegaa gishshau , asai inttena , ' Be7ite , Kiristtoosi bazzon de7ees ' giikko , hegaa booppite ; woi inttena , ' Be7ite , qol77on de7ees ' giikkokka , etabaa ammanoppite .

text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east , and shineth even unto the west ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Aissi giikko , wolqqanttai arshshoppe wolqqammidi , arggo gakkanaassi phooliyoogaadan , ta yuussai , Asa Na7aa yuussai , hegaadan hanana .

text: For wheresoever the carcase is , there will the eagles be gathered together .
text2: “ Gauxai de7iyoosaa ankkoi shiiqana .

text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light , and the stars shall fall from heaven , and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken :
text2: “ He wode waayiyaappe guyyiyan , sohuwaara awai xumana ; aginai poo7iyoogaa aggi bayana ; xoolintteti saluwaappe kunddana ; qassi saluwan de7iya wolqqatikka qaaxettana .

text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven : and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn , and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory .
text2: He wode ta malaatai , Asa Na7aa malaatai , saluwan beettana ; sa7an he wode de7iya asa zare ubbai yeekkana . Qassi taani , Asa Na7ai , wolqqaaranne gita bonchchuwaara saluwaa shaara giddoora yiishin , eti be7ana .

text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet , and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from one end of heaven to the other .
text2: I ba kiitanchchata gita malkkataara kiittana ; kiittin kiitanchchati sa7au ha gaxaappe ya gaxaa gakkanaashin , qassi sa7an oiddu zooziyaappe au doorettida asaa shiishshana .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When his branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is nigh :
text2: “ Leemisuwaa balasiyo giyo mitteeppe akeekite ; balasiyaa aaciyo wodenne i tashee bonccottiyo wode , bonee matattidoogaa intte erana .

text: So likewise ye , when ye shall see all these things , know that it is near , even at the doors .
text2: Hegaadankka , intte he ubbabaa be7iyo wode , i matattidi pengge shiiqidoogaa erite .

text: Verily I say unto you , This generation shall not pass , till all these things be fulfilled .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; ha ubbabai hanana gakkanaassi , ha wodiyaa asai haiqqiichchenna .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away , but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Saloinne sa7ai aadhdhana ; shin ta qaalai mulekka aadhdhenna .

text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels of heaven , but my Father only .
text2: “ SHin he gallassaanne he saatiyaa Aawaa xalaalaappe attin , harai atto saluwan de7iya kiitanchchata gidin , woi tana Na7aa gidinkka ooninne eriyaabi baawa .

text: But as the days of Noe were , so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Ta yuussai , Asa Na7aa yuussai , Nohe wode hanidoogaa mala gidana .

text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking , marrying and giving in marriage , until the day that Noe entered into the ark ,
text2: Aissi giikko , bashshiya haattaa yuussaappe kase wode , Nohee markkabiyan gelido gallassai gakkanaashin , asai meesinne uyees ; qassi attumaasai machcheesinne maccaasai azinaa gelees .

text: And knew not until the flood came , and took them all away ; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be .
text2: Bashsha haattai yiidi , eta ubbaa efaana gakkanaashin , eti akeekibookkona ; taani , Asa Na7ai , yiyo wodee , hegaa mala gidana .

text: Then shall two be in the field ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: “ He wode naa77u asati gaden oottiyaageetuppe issuwaa efaana ; issoi attana .

text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill ; the one shall be taken , and the other left .
text2: Naa77u maccaasati woxan gaacciyaageetuppe issinniyo efaana ; issinniyaa attana .

text: Watch therefore : for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come .
text2: “ Simmi intte Godai ai gallassi yaanaakkonne intte erenna gishshau , naagi uttite .

text: But know this , that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come , he would have watched , and would not have suffered his house to be broken up .
text2: SHin kaisoi qammaappe woqqa wodiyan yaanaakko keettaawai eridaakko , ba keettai bookettenna mala , beegottidi naagi uttanaagaa erite .

text: Therefore be ye also ready : for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , inttekka giigi uttite ; aissi giikko , taani , Asa Na7ai , intte qoppenna saatiyan yaana .

text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant , whom his lord hath made ruler over his household , to give them meat in due season ?
text2: “ Yaatin , ba so asau qumaa koshshiyo wodiyan immana mala , a godai sunttido ammanettida wozannaama ashkkari oonee ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: I hegaadan oottishin , a godai yiidi demmiyo ashkkarai anjjettidaagaa .

text: Verily I say unto you , That he shall make him ruler over all his goods .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; godai he ashkkaraa babaa ubbaa bolli sunttana .

text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ;
text2: SHin ashkkarai iita gidikko , ' Ta godai gam77idi yaana ' yaagidi ba wozanan qoppidi ,

text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants , and to eat and drink with the drunken ;
text2: ba lagge ashkkarata waraa doommikko , mattottiyaageetuura miikkonne uyikko ,

text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him , and in an hour that he is not aware of ,
text2: he ashkkaraa godai i qoppibeenna gallassaaninne i eribeenna saatiyan yaana .

text: And shall cut him asunder , and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Yiidi a qanxxerettidi , lo77o milatiya iita asati de7iyoosan wottana ; hegan i yeekkananne achchaa garccana .

text: Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins , which took their lamps , and went forth to meet the bridegroom .
text2: “ He wode saluwaa kawotettai bantta kuraaziyaa oiqqidi , machchiyo bullachchiyaagaa mokkanau kare kiyida tammu geela7ota milatana .

text: And five of them were wise , and five were foolish .
text2: Etappe ichchashati eeyya ; qassi ichchashati cincca .

text: They that were foolish took their lamps , and took no oil with them :
text2: Eeyyati bantta kuraaziyaa oiqqidosona ; shin lambba oiqqibookkona .

text: But the wise took oil in their vessels with their lamps .
text2: SHin cinccati bantta kuraaziyaanne xaaramusiyan lambbaa oiqqidosona .

text: While the bridegroom tarried , they all slumbered and slept .
text2: Machchiyo bullachchiyaagee yeennan gam77in , he geela7oti banttana xiskkissin zin77i bayidosona .

text: And at midnight there was a cry made , Behold , the bridegroom cometh ; go ye out to meet him .
text2: “ Bilahe gidido wode , ' Be7ite , machchiyo bullachchiyaagee gakkiis ; a mokkanau kare kiyite ' yaagiya gita cabboi denddiis .

text: Then all those virgins arose , and trimmed their lamps .
text2: “ He wode he geela7oti ubbati beegottidi , bantta kuraaziyaa giigissidosona .

text: And the foolish said unto the wise , Give us of your oil ; for our lamps are gone out .
text2: Eeyyati cinccata , ' Nu kuraazee to77ana haniyo gishshau , intte lambbaappe nuuyyo immerkketii ' yaagidosona .

text: But the wise answered , saying , Not so ; lest there be not enough for us and you : but go ye rather to them that sell , and buy for yourselves .
text2: “ SHin cinccati zaaridi eta , ' CHii , nuuyyoonne intteyyo gidenna ; hegaa gishshaa intteyyo baizziyaageetukko biidi shammi ekkite ' yaagidosona .

text: And while they went to buy , the bridegroom came ; and they that were ready went in with him to the marriage : and the door was shut .
text2: Yaagin eeyya geela7oti lambbaa shammanau biichchidaashin , machchiyo bullachchiyaagee puttu gin , giigi uttida ichchashu geela7oti aara issippe bullachchaa keettaa gelidosona ; kareekka gorddetti aggiis .

text: Afterward came also the other virgins , saying , Lord , Lord , open to us .
text2: “ Guyyeppe qassi hinkko geela7oti yiidi , ' Godau , godau , nuuyyo dooyarkkii ' yaagidosona .

text: But he answered and said , Verily I say unto you , I know you not .
text2: “ SHin machchiyo bullachchiyaagee zaaridi , ' Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; taani inttena erikke ' yaagiis .

text: Watch therefore , for ye know neither the day nor the hour wherein the Son of man cometh .
text2: “ Simmi taani , Asa Na7ai , yaana gallassaa woi saatiyaa intte erenna gishshau , naagi uttite .

text: For the kingdom of heaven is as a man travelling into a far country , who called his own servants , and delivered unto them his goods .
text2: “ Aissi giikko , saluwaa kawotettai ba ashkkarata xeesidi , bau de7iyaabaa etau sheedhdhidi , oge baana haniya bitaniyaa milatees .

text: And unto one he gave five talents , to another two , and to another one ; to every man according to his several ability ; and straightway took his journey .
text2: Etau huuphiyan huuphiyan eta wolqqaa keenaa issuwau ichchashu sha7u biraa , issuwau naa77u sha7u biraa , qassi issuwau issi sha7u biraa immidi , ba ogiyaa biis .

text: Then he that had received the five talents went and traded with the same , and made them other five talents .
text2: Ichchashu sha7u biraa ekkida ashkkarai sohuwaara biidi zal77idi , hara ichchashu sha7u biraa worissiis .

text: And likewise he that had received two , he also gained other two .
text2: Hegaadankka , qassi naa77u sha7u biraa ekkida ashkkarai hara naa77u sha7u biraa worissiis .

text: But he that had received one went and digged in the earth , and hid his lord ' s money .
text2: SHin issi sha7u biraa ekkidaagee biidi , ollaa bookkidi , ba godaa miishshaa moogiis .

text: After a long time the lord of those servants cometh , and reckoneth with them .
text2: “ Daro wodiyaappe guyyiyan , he ashkkaratu godai yiidi , ba miishshaa etaara qoodettiis .

text: And so he that had received five talents came and brought other five talents , saying , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me five talents : behold , I have gained beside them five talents more .
text2: Ichchashu sha7u biraa ekkida ashkkarai yiidi , hara ichchashu sha7u biraa sheedhdhiiddi , ' Ta godau , neeni tau ichchashu sha7u biraa immadasa ; be7a , hara ichchashu sha7u biraa worissaas ' yaagiis .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , thou good and faithful servant : thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: A godai a , ' Hayyanaashsho ! Neeni lo77onne ammanettiya ashkkara ; neeni guuttaban ammanettadasa . Taani nena darobaayyo alaafe oottana ; haa gelada ne godaara ufaitta ' yaagiis .

text: He also that had received two talents came and said , Lord , thou deliveredst unto me two talents : behold , I have gained two other talents beside them .
text2: “ Qassi naa77u sha7u biraa ekkidaageekka yiidi , ' Ta godau , neeni tau naa77u sha7u biraa immadasa ; be7a , taani hara naa77u sha7u biraa worissaas ' yaagiis .

text: His lord said unto him , Well done , good and faithful servant ; thou hast been faithful over a few things , I will make thee ruler over many things : enter thou into the joy of thy lord .
text2: A godai a , ' Hayyanaashsho ! Neeni lo77onne ammanettiya ashkkara ; neeni guuttaban ammanettadasa . Taani nena darobaayyo alaafe oottana ; haa gelada ne godaara ufaitta ' yaagiis .

text: Then he which had received the one talent came and said , Lord , I knew thee that thou art an hard man , reaping where thou hast not sown , and gathering where thou hast not strawed :
text2: “ Issi sha7u biraa ekkidaagee qassi yiidi , ' Ta godau , neeni zerabeennasaappe cakkiya asa gidiyoogaanne katta laalabeennasaappe maxiya meqetti bainna asa gidiyoogaa taani erais .

text: And I was afraid , and went and hid thy talent in the earth : lo , there thou hast that is thine .
text2: Taani yayyaas ; yaatada baada ne biraa biittan moogaas ; be7a , ne birai hageeho ' yaagiis .

text: His lord answered and said unto him , Thou wicked and slothful servant , thou knewest that I reap where I sowed not , and gather where I have not strawed :
text2: “ A godai zaaridi , a hagaadan yaagiis ; ' Ha iita azalla ashkkarau , taani zerabeennasaappe cakkiya asa gidiyoogaanne katta laalabeennasaappe maxiya asa gidiyoogaa eradii ?

text: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers , and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury .
text2: Yaatin , neeni ta miishshaa bankkiyan wottidobaa gidiyaakko , taani simmiyo wode ta miishshaa woriyaara ekkanaagaa shin attiis .

text: Take therefore the talent from him , and give it unto him which hath ten talents .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , he miishshaa appe wotti ekkidi , tammu sha7u birai de7iyoogaayyo immite .

text: For unto every one that hath shall be given , and he shall have abundance : but from him that hath not shall be taken away even that which he hath .
text2: Aissi giikko , de7iyo ubbau harai gujettana ; i bau gidiyaagaappe darissidi ekkana ; shin bainnaagaappe harai atto , he au de7iya guuttaikka appe ekettiichchana .

text: And cast ye the unprofitable servant into outer darkness : there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth .
text2: Allaalle kessenna ashkkaraa kare xumaa kessi olite ; hegan i yeekkananne ba achchaa garccana ' yaagiis .

text: When the Son of man shall come in his glory , and all the holy angels with him , then shall he sit upon the throne of his glory :
text2: “ Taani , Asa Na7ai , kiitanchcha ubbatuura bonchchuwan yiyo wode , ta bonchcho kawotaa araatan uttana .

text: And before him shall be gathered all nations : and he shall separate them one from another , as a shepherd divideth his sheep from the goats :
text2: Sa7an de7iya asai ubbai ta sintti shiiqana ; heemmiyaagee dorssata deeshshatuppe shaakkiyoogaadan , taani he asaa naa77u kessada shaakkana .

text: And he shall set the sheep on his right hand , but the goats on the left .
text2: Qassi dorssata taappe ushachcha baggaara essada , deeshshata taappe haddirssa baggaara essana .

text: Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand , Come , ye blessed of my Father , inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world :
text2: “ Hegaappe guyyiyan , taani kawoi taappe ushachcha baggaara de7iyaageeta hagaadan yaagana ; ' Ta Aawai anjjidoogeetoo , haa yiidi sa7ai merettoosappe hachchi gakkanaashin , intteyyo giigida kawotettaa laattite .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me drink : I was a stranger , and ye took me in :
text2: Aissi giikko , taani namisettin mizideta ; saamettin ushshideta ; imatta gidada binkka mokkideta .

text: Naked , and ye clothed me : I was sick , and ye visited me : I was in prison , and ye came unto me .
text2: Taani kallottin maizzideta ; harggin be7ideta ; qashettin taakko gakkideta ' yaagana .

text: Then shall the righteous answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , and fed thee ? or thirsty , and gave thee drink ?
text2: “ Hegaappe guyyiyan , xilloti zaaridi , a hagaadan yaagana ; ' Godau , neeni namisettin , aude be7idi mizidoo ? Woi neeni saamettin , aude be7idi ushshidoo ?

text: When saw we thee a stranger , and took thee in ? or naked , and clothed thee ?
text2: Neeni imatta gidada yin aude be7idi mokkidoo ? Woi neeni kallottin aude maizzidoo ?

text: Or when saw we thee sick , or in prison , and came unto thee ?
text2: Qassi neeni harggin , woi qashettin neekko biidi aude nena be7idoo ? ' yaagana .

text: And the King shall answer and say unto them , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye have done it unto one of the least of these my brethren , ye have done it unto me .
text2: Taani kawoi zaarada , ' Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; intte ha ta ishanttu ubbaappe harai atto , laafiya issuwaayyo oottidobaa gidikkokka , hegaa tau oottideta ' yaagana .

text: Then shall he say also unto them on the left hand , Depart from me , ye cursed , into everlasting fire , prepared for the devil and his angels :
text2: “ He wode , taappe haddirssa baggaara de7iyaageeta taani yaagana ; ' Ha qanggettidaageetoo , ta matappe kichchite ; biidi xalahe halaqaayyoonne a kiitanchchatuyyo giigida merinaa taman gelite .

text: For I was an hungred , and ye gave me no meat : I was thirsty , and ye gave me no drink :
text2: Aissi giikko , taani namisettin , tana mizibeekketa ; saamettin ushshibeekketa .

text: I was a stranger , and ye took me not in : naked , and ye clothed me not : sick , and in prison , and ye visited me not .
text2: Taani imatta gidada bin , tana mokkibeekketa ; kallottin maizzibeekketa ; qassi harggin , qashettinkka tana be7ibeekketa ' yaagana .

text: Then shall they also answer him , saying , Lord , when saw we thee an hungred , or athirst , or a stranger , or naked , or sick , or in prison , and did not minister unto thee ?
text2: “ He wode eti qassi hagaadan yaagidi zaarana ; ' Godau , neeni namisettin woi saamettin , woi imatta gidada bin woi kallottin , woi harggin woi qashettin , aude be7idi , nena maaddennan ixxidonii ? ' yaagana .

text: Then shall he answer them , saying , Verily I say unto you , Inasmuch as ye did it not to one of the least of these , ye did it not to me .
text2: “ He wode taani kawoi zaarada eta , ' Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; intte ha ubbaappe laafiya issuwaa maaddennan ixxidoogee , tana maaddennan ixxidoogaa ' yaagana .

text: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment : but the righteous into life eternal .
text2: Hegeeti merinaa qaxxayuwau baana ; shin xilloti merinaa de7uwau baana ” yaagiis .

text: And it came to pass , when Jesus had finished all these sayings , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Yesuusi ha timirttiyaa ubbaa wurssido wode , ba erissiyo ashkkarata ,

text: Ye know that after two days is the feast of the passover , and the Son of man is betrayed to be crucified .
text2: “ Naa77u gallassappe guyyiyan , Paasikaa Baalaa bonchchiyo gallassa gidiyoogaa ereeta . He gallassi tana , Asa Na7aa , asai masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqanau aatti immana ” yaagiis .

text: Then assembled together the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders of the people , unto the palace of the high priest , who was called Caiaphas ,
text2: He wode qeese halaqatinne dere cimati Qayaafa giyo qeese ubbatu halaqaa gita keettan shiiqidi ,

text: And consulted that they might take Jesus by subtilty , and kill him .
text2: asi erennan Yesuusa oiqqidi , woranau maqettidosona .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar among the people .
text2: SHin eti , “ Asai ooshshaa kessenna mala , Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi hegaa oottokko ” yaagidosona .

text: Now when Jesus was in Bethany , in the house of Simon the leper ,
