text2: Yesuusi Biitaaniyaa kataman inchchirichchaa harggiya Simoona son de7ishin ,

text: There came unto him a woman having an alabaster box of very precious ointment , and poured it on his head , as he sat at meat .
text2: issi mishiriyaa albbasxxiroosa giyo shuchchaappe oottido bilqqaadiyaa kumida daro al77o shittuwaa ekkada yaasu ; yaada qumaa i miishin , he shittuwaa Yesuusa huuphiyan tigaasu .

text: But when his disciples saw it , they had indignation , saying , To what purpose is this waste ?
text2: SHin erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa be7idi hanqqettidosona ; hanqqettidi , “ Ha shittuwaa coo mooriyoogee aibissee ?

text: For this ointment might have been sold for much , and given to the poor .
text2: Aissi giikko , ha shittuwaa al77o waagan baizzidi , miishshaa hiyyeesau immanau danddayettees ” yaagidosona .

text: When Jesus understood it , he said unto them , Why trouble ye the woman ? for she hath wrought a good work upon me .
text2: Yesuusi eti giyoogaa eridi , eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Ha maccaasiyo aissi waisseetii ? A tau lo77obaa oottaasu .

text: For ye have the poor always with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Hiyyeesati ubba wode inttenaara de7oosona ; shin taani inttenaara ubba wode de7ikke ;

text: For in that she hath poured this ointment on my body , she did it for my burial .
text2: a ha shittuwaa ta bolli tigiyoogee tana mooganau giigissanaassa .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached in the whole world , there shall also this , that this woman hath done , be told for a memorial of her .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; sa7a ubban ha wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa odiyoosan awaanikka , asai o hassayana mala , a oottidoogee odettana ” yaagiis .

text: Then one of the twelve , called Judas Iscariot , went unto the chief priests ,
text2: He wode tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi Yihudaa Asqqorootu giyoogee qeese halaqatukko biis .

text: And said unto them , What will ye give me , and I will deliver him unto you ? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver .
text2: Biidi , “ Taani intteyyo Yesuusa oittikko , tau ai immuuteetii ? ” yaagin eti ayyo hasttamu biraa qoppidi immidosona .

text: And from that time he sought opportunity to betray him .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yihudai Yesuusa aattidi immanau injjetiya wodiyaa wochchees .

text: Now the first day of the feast of unleavened bread the disciples came to Jesus , saying unto him , Where wilt thou that we prepare for thee to eat the passover ?
text2: Oittaa miyo gallassaa bonchchiyo koiro gallassi , erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi neeni maana qumaa awan giigissanee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And he said , Go into the city to such a man , and say unto him , The Master saith , My time is at hand ; I will keep the passover at thy house with my disciples .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi eta , “ Katamaa biidi , issi bitaniyaa , ' Tamaarissiyaagee nena , “ Tau wodee gakkiis ; taani ta erissiyo ashkkaratuura Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassaa ne son aattana ” yaagees ' yaagite ” yaagiis .

text: And the disciples did as Jesus had appointed them ; and they made ready the passover .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusi banttana azazidoogaadan oottidi , Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi maana qumaa giigissidosona .

text: Now when the even was come , he sat down with the twelve .
text2: Sa7ai omarido wode , Yesuusi tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuura qumaa maanau uttiis .

text: And as they did eat , he said , Verily I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Eti miishin , Yesuusi eta , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; intteppe issi urai tana aattidi immana ” yaagiis .

text: And they were exceeding sorrowful , and began every one of them to say unto him , Lord , is it I ?
text2: Eti daro dagammidi , huuphiyan huuphiyan , “ Godau , tumu taneeshsha ? ” giyoogaa doommidosona .

text: And he answered and said , He that dippeth his hand with me in the dish , the same shall betray me .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ba kushiyaa tanaara issippe shaatiyan yeddidi tushkkiyaagee tana aattidi immana .

text: The Son of man goeth as it is written of him : but woe unto that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! it had been good for that man if he had not been born .
text2: Taani , Asa Na7ai , Xoossaa maxaafai haiqqana giidoogaadan haiqqana ; shin tana , Asa Na7aa , aattidi immiya urau aayye7ana ; he urai yelettennan attiyaakko au keha shin ” yaagiis .

text: Then Judas , which betrayed him , answered and said , Master , is it I ? He said unto him , Thou hast said .
text2: A oittiya Yihudai zaaridi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , neeni giyoogee tanee ? ” yaagiis . Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi a , “ Neeni ne huuphen gaadasa ” yaagiis .

text: And as they were eating , Jesus took bread , and blessed it , and brake it , and gave it to the disciples , and said , Take , eat ; this is my body .
text2: Eti miishin , Yesuusi oittaa ekkidi , Xoossaa galatiis ; he oittaa menttidi , ba erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo immiiddi , “ Heite ; miite ; hagee ta ashuwaa ” yaagiis .

text: And he took the cup , and gave thanks , and gave it to them , saying , Drink ye all of it ;
text2: Burccukkuwaa ekkidi , Xoossaa galatiis . Etau immiiddi , “ Ubbai hagaappe uyite ;

text: For this is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many for the remission of sins .
text2: aissi giikko , hagee daro asaa nagarai atto geetettana gishshau gukkiya ta suuttaa ; ta suuttai ooratta maachchaa .

text: But I say unto you , I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine , until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father ' s kingdom .
text2: SHin taani intteyyo odais ; taani ta Aawaa kawotettan ooratta woine eessaa inttenaara uyana gallassai gakkanaashin , naa77anttuwaa ha woine eessaa mulekka uyikke ” yaagiis .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Mazamuriyaa yexxidoogaappe guyyiyan , Dabira Zaite giyo deriyaa biidosona .

text: Then saith Jesus unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep of the flock shall be scattered abroad .
text2: Yesuusi he wode eta , “ Hachchi qammi intte ubbai tana yeggi bayidi baqatana ; aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Xoossai dorssaa heemmiyaagaa worana ; worin dorssaa wudee laalettana ' yaagees .

text: But after I am risen again , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: SHin taani haiquwaappe denddidoogaappe guyyiyan , intteppe kasetada Galiilaa baana ” yaagiis .

text: Peter answered and said unto him , Though all men shall be offended because of thee , yet will I never be offended .
text2: PHeexiroosi zaaridi , “ Eti ubbati nena yeggi bayidi baqatikkokka , taani nena mulekka yeggikke ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this night , before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Yesuusi PHeexiroosa , “ Taani neeyyo tumaa odais ; hachchi qammi kuttoi waassanaappe kase , neeni tana heezzutoo kaddana ” yaagiis .

text: Peter said unto him , Though I should die with thee , yet will I not deny thee . Likewise also said all the disciples .
text2: Yaagin PHeexiroosi zaaridi , “ Taani harai atto , nenaara issippe haiqqiyaakkokka , nena mulekka kaddikke ” yaagiis . Qassi erissiyo ashkkarati ubbatikka hegaadan giidosona .

text: Then cometh Jesus with them unto a place called Gethsemane , and saith unto the disciples , Sit ye here , while I go and pray yonder .
text2: Yesuusi he wode ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura Geetesemaane giyo sohuwaa biidi eta , “ Taani hiniyo baada Xoossaa woossishin , intte hagan uttiishshite ” yaagiis .

text: And he took with him Peter and the two sons of Zebedee , and began to be sorrowful and very heavy .
text2: Yaagidi PHeexiroosanne Zabddiyoosa naata naa77aa banaara ekki efiidi , daro kayyuwaanne waayiyaa doommiis .

text: Then saith he unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful , even unto death : tarry ye here , and watch with me .
text2: Qassi eta , “ Taani haiqqana gakkanaassikka kayyottais ; hagan takkidi , tanaara naagite ” yaagiis .

text: And he went a little further , and fell on his face , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if it be possible , let this cup pass from me : nevertheless not as I will , but as thou wilt .
text2: Guuttaa sinttaukko shiiqiiddi , biittan gufannidi , “ Ta Aawau , danddayettiyaabaa gidikko , ha burccukkuwaa taappe digga ; shin neeni koyiyoogaadan hanoppe attin , taani koyiyoogaadan hanoppo ” yaagidi Xoossaa woossiis .

text: And he cometh unto the disciples , and findeth them asleep , and saith unto Peter , What , could ye not watch with me one hour ?
text2: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratukko simmidi yiis ; xiskkidaageeta demmidi PHeexiroosa , “ Intte issi saatekkonne xiskkennan tanaara naaganaukka danddayibeekketii ?

text: Watch and pray , that ye enter not into temptation : the spirit indeed is willing , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Paaciyan intte gelenna mala , naagitenne Xoossaa woossite ; ayyaanai giigi uttiis ; shin ashoi daafuranchcha ” yaagiis .

text: He went away again the second time , and prayed , saying , O my Father , if this cup may not pass away from me , except I drink it , thy will be done .
text2: Yesuusi qassi naa77anttuwaa biidi , “ Ta Aawau , taani ha burccukkuwaappe uyennan de7ishin burccukkuwaa denttanaagee danddayettennabaa gidikko , neeni koyiyoobai hano ” yaagidi Xoossaa woossiis .

text: And he came and found them asleep again : for their eyes were heavy .
text2: Qassikka simmi yiidi , erissiyo ashkkaratu aifiyaa xiskkoi goozi wottido gishshau , xiskkidaageeta demmiis .

text: And he left them , and went away again , and prayed the third time , saying the same words .
text2: Qassikka eta yeggi bayidi biidi , heezzanttuwaa kase qaaliyo zaarettidi , Xoossaa woossiis .

text: Then cometh he to his disciples , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : behold , the hour is at hand , and the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , erissiyo ashkkaratukko yiidi , “ Ha77i gakkanaashinkka xiskkeetiinne shemppeetii ? Be7ite , tana , Asa Na7aa , nagaranchcha asatuyyo aattidi immiyo wodee gakkiis .

text: Rise , let us be going : behold , he is at hand that doth betray me .
text2: Denddidi hinddite ; be7ite , tana aattidi immiyaagee hageeho gakkiis ” yaagiis .

text: And while he yet spake , lo , Judas , one of the twelve , came , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and elders of the people .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa biron haasayishin , tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi , Yihudai , gakki wodhdhiis ; qassi qeese halaqatinne dere cimati kiittin , bisuwaanne dullaa oiqqida daro asai aara issippe yiis .

text: Now he that betrayed him gave them a sign , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he : hold him fast .
text2: Yesuusa aattidi immiyaagee he daro asaa , “ Taani yeriyoogee a ; a oiqqite ” yaagidi malaataa yooti wottiis .

text: And forthwith he came to Jesus , and said , Hail , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Sohuwaarakka Yesuusakko shiiqidi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , saro de7ai ” yaagidi a yeri ekkiis .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Friend , wherefore art thou come ? Then came they , and laid hands on Jesus , and took him .
text2: Yesuusi a , “ Ta jaalau , neeni oottanabaa ootta agga ” yaagiis . Hegaappe guyyiyan , he daro asai shiiqidi , Yesuusa mintti oiqqiis .

text: And , behold , one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand , and drew his sword , and struck a servant of the high priest ' s , and smote off his ear .
text2: Yesuusaara de7iyaageetuppe issoi ba bisuwaa shoddinne qeese ubbatu halaqaa ashkkaraa shocidi , a haittaa qanxxi oliis .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Put up again thy sword into his place : for all they that take the sword shall perish with the sword .
text2: Yesuusi he wode a hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Ne bisuwaa a shoohuwan zaarada wotta ; aissi giikko , biso shoddiya ubbai bison haiqqana .

text: Thinkest thou that I cannot now pray to my Father , and he shall presently give me more than twelve legions of angels ?
text2: Ta Aawai daro sha7u kiitanchchata issi kuttan yeddidi , tana maaddana mala , taani a woossanau danddayiyoogaa erikkiiyye ?

text: But how then shall the scriptures be fulfilled , that thus it must be ?
text2: Yaatin , Xoossaa maxaafati hagaadan hananau bessees yaagidoogee waanidi polettanau danddayii ? ” yaagiis .

text: In that same hour said Jesus to the multitudes , Are ye come out as against a thief with swords and staves for to take me ? I sat daily with you teaching in the temple , and ye laid no hold on me .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi he shiiqida daro asaa hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Tana pangga kessidi , pangga oiqqiyoogaadan oiqqanau bisonne dulla oiqqidi yiidetii ? Taani Beeta Maqidasiyan tamaarissaidda , gallassi gallassi inttenaara oottiyo wode tana oiqqibeekketa ;

text: But all this was done , that the scriptures of the prophets might be fulfilled . Then all the disciples forsook him , and fled .
text2: shin hagee ubbai hanidoogee hananabaa yootiyaageeti Xoossaa maxaafatun xaafidoogee polettanaassa ” yaagiis . Erissiyo ashkkarati he wode ubbati a yeggi bayidi baqatidosona .

text: And they that had laid hold on Jesus led him away to Caiaphas the high priest , where the scribes and the elders were assembled .
text2: Yesuusa oiqqidaageeti qeese ubbatu halaqaa Qayaafakko , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne cimati shiiqidosaa ekki efiidosona .

text: But Peter followed him afar off unto the high priest ' s palace , and went in , and sat with the servants , to see the end .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi qeese ubbatu halaqaa dirssa giddo gakkanaashin , haahuwan a kaalliis ; yohuwaa wurssettaa be7anau dirssa giddo gelidi , naagiyaageetuura utti bayiis .

text: Now the chief priests , and elders , and all the council , sought false witness against Jesus , to put him to death ;
text2: Qeese halaqatinne yaa7aa asai ubbai Yesuusa woranau a bolli worddo markka demmanau koyidosona .

text: But found none : yea , though many false witnesses came , yet found they none . At the last came two false witnesses ,
text2: SHin harai atto daroti yiidi , a bolli wordduwaa markkattinkka appe ainne demmibookkona . Guyyeppe naa77ati yiidi ,

text: And said , This fellow said , I am able to destroy the temple of God , and to build it in three days .
text2: “ Ha bitanee , ' Taani Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyaa qolada , heezzu gallassan zaaretta keexxanau danddayais ' yaagiis ” yaagidosona .

text: And the high priest arose , and said unto him , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Qeese ubbatu halaqai denddi eqqidi Yesuusa , “ Hageeti nena mootiyo mootuwau neeyyo zaariyoobi baawee ? ” yaagiis .

text: But Jesus held his peace . And the high priest answered and said unto him , I adjure thee by the living God , that thou tell us whether thou be the Christ , the Son of God .
text2: SHin Yesuusi co77u giis ; qassikka qeese ubbatu halaqai a , “ Taani nena de7o Xoossaa sunttan callais ; neeni Xoossaa Na7aa Kiristtoosa gidikko nuussi oda ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thou hast said : nevertheless I say unto you , Hereafter shall ye see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Neeni ne huuphenkka gaadasa ; shin taani intteyyo odais ; hagaappe sinttan , intte tana , Asa Na7aa , wolqqaama Xoossaappe ushachcha baggaara uttidaashiininne saluwaa shaaraara yiishin be7ana ” yaagiis .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , saying , He hath spoken blasphemy ; what further need have we of witnesses ? behold , now ye have heard his blasphemy .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , qeese ubbatu halaqai ba maayuwaa pooshshi olidi , “ Hagee cayiichchiis ; nuna hagaappe sinttan aissi hara markka koshshii ? I ha77i cayiyoogaa intte siyideta .

text: What think ye ? They answered and said , He is guilty of death .
text2: Intte qofai aibee ? ” yaagiis . Yaagin eti , “ Au haiqoi bessees ” yaagidi zaaridosona .

text: Then did they spit in his face , and buffeted him ; and others smote him with the palms of their hands ,
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , eti a som77uwan cuchchidi , a dechchidosona ; harati qassi a baqqidi ,

text: Saying , Prophesy unto us , thou Christ , Who is he that smote thee ?
text2: “ Kiristtoosaa ! Nena dechchidai oonee ? Ane nuuyyo hananabaa yoota ” yaagidosona .

text: Now Peter sat without in the palace : and a damsel came unto him , saying , Thou also wast with Jesus of Galilee .
text2: PHeexiroosi keettaappe kareera dirssa giddon uttidaashin , issi ashkkariyaa akko yaada , “ Neenikka Galiilaa Yesuusaara issippe de7aasa ” yaagaasu .

text: But he denied before them all , saying , I know not what thou sayest .
text2: SHin i eta ubbaa sinttan he ashkkariyo , “ Neeni giyoobai aibakko taani erikke ” yaagidi kaddiis .

text: And when he was gone out into the porch , another maid saw him , and said unto them that were there , This fellow was also with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Qassi biidi dirssaa penggekko kiyishin , hara ashkkariyaa a be7ada , hegan de7iya asatuyyo , “ Ha bitanee Naazireeta Yesuusaara de7ees ” yaagaasu .

text: And again he denied with an oath , I do not know the man .
text2: Yaagin PHeexiroosi naa77anttuwaa caaqqidi , “ Taani hegaa bitaniyaa erikke ” yaagiis .

text: And after a while came unto him they that stood by , and said to Peter , Surely thou also art one of them ; for thy speech bewrayeth thee .
text2: Guuttaa gam77ishin , hegan eqqida asati PHeexiroosakko yiidi , “ Neenikka tuma etaara issippe de7aasa ; aissi giikko , neeni haasayiyo haasayaikka nena erissees ” yaagidosona .

text: Then began he to curse and to swear , saying , I know not the man . And immediately the cock crew .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan PHeexiroosi , “ Taani hegaa bitaniyaa erikke ! ” yaagidi , bana qanggettaanne caaquwaa doommiis . He wode sohuwaarakka kuttoi waassi aggiis .

text: And Peter remembered the word of Jesus , which said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice . And he went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: PHeexiroosi bana Yesuusi , “ Neeni kuttoi waassanaappe kase heezzutoo tana kaddana ” giidoogaa hassayidi , kare kiyidi , mishettidi yeekkiis .

text: When the morning was come , all the chief priests and elders of the people took counsel against Jesus to put him to death :
text2: Maallado guuraara qeese halaqati ubbatinne dere cimati Yesuusa woranau maqettidosona ;

text: And when they had bound him , they led him away , and delivered him to Pontius Pilate the governor .
text2: eti Yesuusa qachchidi efiidi , deriyaa haariya PHenxxeniyaa PHilaaxoosayyo aattidi immidosona .

text: Then Judas , which had betrayed him , when he saw that he was condemned , repented himself , and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders ,
text2: Yesuusa he wode oittida Yihudai PHilaaxoosi Yesuusa bolli pirddidoogaa be7idi , “ Aayye7ana ! Oittennan aggarkkinaashsha ! ” yaagidi , he hasttamu biraa qeese halaqatuyyoonne dere cimatuyyo guyye zaaridi ,

text: Saying , I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood . And they said , What is that to us ? see thou to that .
text2: “ Taani geeshsha asa oittada nagaraa oottaas ” yaagiis . SHin eti a , “ Hegee nuuyyo ai metoo ? Hegee ne shene ” yaagidosona .

text: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple , and departed , and went and hanged himself .
text2: Yihudai biraa Beeta Maqidasiyan oli bayiis ; eta matappe aggidi biidi , suletti haiqqiis .

text: And the chief priests took the silver pieces , and said , It is not lawful for to put them into the treasury , because it is the price of blood .
text2: Qeese halaqati biraa ekkidi , “ Ha birai suutta miishsha gidishin , nuuni Beeta Maqidasiyaa miishshaara gattiyoogee higge gidenna ” yaagidosona .

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Yaagidi issippe zorettidi , asa biitta asayyo moogo gade oottanau urqqa miishsha medhdhiyaageetu gadiyaa shammidosona .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , he gadee hachchi gakkanaassikka , suutta gade geetettidi xeesettees .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Hananabaa yootiya Ermmaasi , “ Eti Israa7eela asai au qanxxanau qoppido hasttamu xaqara biraa ekkidi ,

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: Godai tana azazidoogaadan , urqqa miishsha medhdhiyaageetu biittaa shammanau immidosona ” giidoogee he wode polettiis .

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Yesuusi deriyaa haariyaagaa sintti shiiqin , deriyaa haariyaagee a , “ Neeni Aihudatu kawoo ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Yesuusi a , “ Neenikka gaasa ” yaagiis .

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Qeese halaqatinne dere cimati a mootin , etau ainne zaaro immibeenna .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: He wode , PHilaaxoosi Yesuusa , “ Hageeti nena mootiyoobaa ubbaa siyikkii ? ” yaagiis .

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Yesuusi harai atto , issi qaalakka zaarennan ixxin , deriyaa haariyaagee daro garamettiis .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Deriyaa haariyaagee Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassan , asai koyiyo issi uraa qashuwaappe birshshiyo meezee de7ees .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: He wode issi Barbbaana giyo daro erettida iita asi qasho keettan de7ees .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Hegaa gishshau , daro asai issisaa shiiqidaashin PHilaaxoosi , “ Taani intteyyo Barbbaana birshshooyye , woi Kiristtoosa giyo Yesuusa birshshoo ? ” yaagidi asaa oichchiis .

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Aissi giikko , eti qanaatidi Yesuusa oittidoogaa i erees .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: PHilaaxoosi pirdda keettan uttidaashin , a machchiyaa ayyo , “ He xillo bitaniyaa ainne oottoppa ; aissi giikko , taani hachchi qammi aimuwan aban daro waayettaas ” yaagada kiittaasu .

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: SHin qeese halaqatinne dere cimati PHilaaxoosi Barbbaana birshshidi , Yesuusa woranaadan , shiiqida asai a woossana mala , asaa cimmidosona .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: PHilaaxoosi zaaridi eta , “ Taani eta naa77aappe intteyyo oona birshshanau koyeetii ? ” yaagin eti , “ Barbbaana birshshanau koyoos ” yaagidosona .

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: PHilaaxoosi , “ Yaatin , Kiristtoosa giyo Yesuusa waatoo ? ” yaagidi eta oichchin ubbai , “ Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi kaqetto ” yaagidosona .

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: PHilaaxoosi asaa , “ Aissi ? Ai iitabaa oottidee ? ” yaagiis . SHin asai kaseegaappekka ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi i kaqetto ” yaagidosona .

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: Ooshshi denddanaagaappe attin , aibinne polettennaagaa PHilaaxoosi be7idi , haattaa ekkidi , “ Ha bitanee haiqqiyooban taani gelikke ; hegaa intte erite ” yaagidi shiiqida asaa sinttan ba kushiyaa meecettiis .

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: SHiiqida asai ubbai zaaridi , “ A suuttaa gomee nunanne nu naata gakko ” yaagiis .

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , PHilaaxoosi Barbbaana etau birshshiis ; birshshidi lissuwan Yesuusa garafidi , masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqanau etau aattidi immiis .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , PHilaaxoosa wotaaddarati Yesuusa deriyaa haariyaagaa ooso keettaa ekki efin , wotaaddarati ubbai a lanqqiyan yuuyi aadhdhidi eqqidosona .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: A afalaa qaari ekkidi , zo7o afalaa a maizzidosona .

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Qassi agunttaa akiliiliyaa giigissidi , a huuphiyan wottidosona ; a ushachcha kushiyan shombboqo gatimaa oittidi , a sinttan gulbbatidi , “ Aihudatu kawuwau , saro de7ai ! ” yaagidi , a bolli qilliiccidosona .

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: A bolli cuchchidosona ; he shombboqo gatimaa ekkidi , a huuphiyaa shocidosona .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Eti a bolli qilliiccidoogaappe guyyiyan , zo7o afalaa appe qaari ekkidi , a afalaa a maizzidosona ; qassi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi a kaqqanau ekki efiidosona .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Eti kare kiyiiddi , issi Simoona giyo Qareena biitta asa demmidi , Yesuusa masqqaliyaa wolqqan toossidosona .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Golggottaa giyoosaa gakkidosona . “ Golggottaa ” giyoogee “ Guuggiyaa Sohuwaa ” giyoogaa .

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: Hegan eti ciyyee walahettido woine eessaa Yesuusayyo uyanau immidosona ; immin i hegaa ganxxi xeellidi , uyennan ixxiis .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Eti masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi a kaqqidoogaappe guyyiyan , a afalaa shaakkidi , saamaa yeggidi ekkidosona .

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , a naaganau hegan utti bayidosona .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Qassi , “ Hagee Aihudatu Kawuwaa Yesuusa ” yaagidi mootiyo xifatiyaa a huuphessaara wottidosona .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Yesuusaara he wode naa77u panggata issuwaa appe ushachcha baggaara , qassi issuwaa appe haddirssa baggaara , masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqidosona .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Ogiyaara aadhdhiya asai Yesuusa karidi , ba huuphiyaa qaattiiddi cayiis .

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: “ Beeta Maqidasiyaa qolada heezzu gallassa giddon keexxiyaagoo , ne huuphiyaa ashsha ; neeni Xoossaa Na7a gidikko , ane masqqaliyaa bollappe wodhdha ” yaagiis .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Hegaadankka , qeese halaqati higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuuranne cimatuura issippe Yesuusa bolli qilliicciiddi , hagaadan yaagidosona ;

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: “ Harata ashshiis ; shin bana ashshanau danddayenna . I Israa7eela kawo ; ane masqqaliyaa bollappe ha77i wodhdho ; nuunikka qassi a ammanana .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Xoossan i ammanettees ; Xoossai a ashshana koyikko ane ashsho ; aissi giikko , i bana , ' Taani Xoossaa Na7aa ' gees ” yaagidosona .

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Qassi harai atto , aara masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi kaqettida panggatikka hegaadan giidi , a bolli qilliiccidosona .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Usuppun saateppe doommidi , uddufun saate gakkanaashin , biitta ubbai xumiis .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Uddufun saate gidiyo heeran Yesuusi ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Elohee , Elohee , laamaa sabaqitaanii ? ” yaagiis . Hegaa giyoogee , “ Ta Xoossau , ta Xoossau , tana aissi aggadii ? ” giyoogaa .

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Hegan eqqida asaappe issoi hegaa siyidi , “ Ha bitanee Eelaasa xeesees ” yaagiis .

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Sohuwaara etappe issoi woxxidi , gombbilla mala ispponjjiyaa ekkidi , caala woine eessaa kunttiis ; hegaa shombboqo gatimaa xeeran wottidi , ushshanau a doonaakko shiishshiis .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: SHin hankkooti , “ Nangga , Eelaasi a ashshanau yaanaakkonne be7oos ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: Yesuusi naa77anttuwaa ba qaalaa xoqqu ootti waassidi , haiqqi bayiis .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Akeekite ; Beeta Maqidasiyan kaqettida magalashoi qommoppe duge gakkanaassi , naa77u kiyidi , pooshetti wodhdhiis ; biittai qaaxxiis . Qassi zaallaikka phalqqettiis ;

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: duufoti dooyettidosona . Xoossaa asatuppe daroti haiqqidaageeti , haiquwaappe denddidosona .

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: Eti duufuwaappe kiyidi , Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddidoogaappe guyyiyan , geeshsha katamaa biidosona ; hegan eta daro asai be7iis .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Mato halaqainne aara Yesuusa naagiya wotaaddarati biittai qaaxxiyoogaanne hegan hanidabaa ubbaa be7ido wode daro yayyidosona ; yayyidi , “ Tumu hagee Xoossaa Na7aa ” yaagidosona .

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Hegan daro maccaasati , Galiilappe doommidi , Yesuusa maaddiiddi kaallidaageeti , haahuwan eqqidi xeelloosona .

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: Eta giddon Magddala giyo katamaappe yiida Mairaama , Yaaqoobanne Yooseefa aayyiyaa Mairaamanne Zabddiyoosa naatu aayyiyaa de7oosona .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Sa7ai omariyo wode , Yooseefa giyo issi dure bitanee , Armmaatiyaasa katamaa asi yiis ; i ba huuphenkka Yesuusa kaalliyaagaa .

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: Yooseefi PHilaaxoosakko biidi , Yesuusa ahaa ekkanau woossiis ; woossin PHilaaxoosi Yooseefayyo imettana mala azaziis .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: Yesuusa ahaa ekkidi , geeshsha moogo afalan xaaxiis .

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: Xaaxidi baayyo moogettanau shuchchaa woocido ooratta gonggoluwaa giddon a ahaa wottiis ; qassi he gonggoluwaa doonan gita shuchchaa gonddorssi wottidi , aggi bayidi biis .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: Magddala katamaappe yiida Mairaamanne hinkko Mairaama hegan gonggoluwaakko simmidi uttidosona .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: Sambbataassi giigettiyo gallassaappe wonttetta gallassi , qeese halaqatinne Parisaaweti PHilaaxoosaara gaittidi , hagaadan yaagidosona ;

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: “ Godau , he worddoi paxa de7iyo wode , ' Taani heezzu gallassappe guyyiyan , haiquwaappe denddana ' yaagidoogaa nuuni hassayida .

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , a moogido gonggoluwaa heezzu gallassa gakkanaassi , mintti naagana mala azazarkkii ; hegee xayikko erissiyo ashkkarati biidi , a ahaa wuuqqidi asaayyo , ' Haiquwaappe denddiis ' yaagana ; yaagin naa77antto worddoi kase wordduwaappe ubba yaa palattana ” yaagidosona .

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: PHilaaxoosi eta , “ Intteyyo naagiyaageeti de7oosona ; biidi intte danddayiyoogaa keenaa naagissite ” yaagiis .

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: Yaagin eti biidi , shuchchaa bolli maatafaa attamidi , qassi naagiyaagaa yaani wottidi , Yesuusa moogido gonggoluwaa naagissidosona .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: Sambbatai aadhdhin Woggaa gallassi sa7ai wonttishin , Magddala giyo katamaappe yiida Mairaamanne hinkko Mairaama Yesuusi moogettido gonggoluwaa be7anau biidosona .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Godaa kiitanchchai saluwaappe wodhdhido gishshau , biittai daro qaaxxiis ; he kiitanchchai yiidi , shuchchaa gonddorssi olidi , a bolli kiyi uttiis .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: A merai wolqqantta milatees ; a maayoikka shachchaadan bootta .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: Naagiyaageeti kiitanchchau yashshaa kokkoridi , haiqqida asadan hanidosona .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: Kiitanchchai maccaasata hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Yayyoppite ; aissi giikko , masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqido Yesuusa intte koyiyoogaa taani erais .

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: I hagan baawa ; aissi giikko , i ba giidoogaadankka haiquwaappe denddiichchiis ; haa yiidi , i zin77idosaa be7ite .

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: Intte ha77i eesuwan biidi , Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo , ' Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddiichchiis . Qassi i intteppe kasetidi , Galiilaa bees ; intte a yaani be7ana ' yaagidi odite . Be7ite , taani intteyyo odaas ” yaagiis .

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: Eti yayyiiddinne qassi daro ufaittiiddi , Yesuusi moogettido gonggoluwaa matappe eesuwan aggidi , erissiyo ashkkaratukko odanau woxxidosona .

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Sohuwaara Yesuusi etaara gaittinne eta , “ Saro de7eetii ” yaagi aggiis ; eti akko shiiqidi , a tohuwaa oiqqidi , ayyo goinnidosona .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Yesuusi he wode eta , “ Yayyoppite ; ta ishantti Galiilaa baana mala , biidi etau yootite ; eti tana yaani be7ana ” yaagiis .

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: He maccaasati biishin , gonggoluwaa naagiya wotaaddaratuppe amaridaageeti katamaa biidi , hanidabaa ubbaa qeese halaqatuyyo odidosona .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: Qeese halaqati cimatuura issippe shiiqi zorettidi , wotaaddaratuyyo daro miishshaa immidi ,

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
text2: “ ' Nuuni xiskkidaashin erissiyo ashkkarati qammi yiidi , a ahaa wuuqqidosona ' yaagite ;

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: ha yohuwaa deriyaa haariyaagee siyikko , nuuni ayyo yooti maizzana ; qassi inttena aibinne hirggissennaadan oottana ” yaagidosona .

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Wotaaddarati miishshaa ekkidi , banttau odidoogaadan oottidosona . Ha yohoi Aihudatu matan hachchi gakkanaashinkka , odettiiddi de7ees .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: SHin tammanne isiini erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusi banttana biite giido Galiila Deriyaa biidosona .

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: Biidi a be7ido wode ayyo goinnidosona ; shin etappe issooti issooti siridosona .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: Yesuusi etakko shiiqidi , eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Maata ubbai saluwaaninne sa7an taayyo imettiis .

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte biidi , asa ubbaa tana kaalliyaageeta oottite ; Aawaa sunttan , Na7aa sunttaaninne Geeshsha Ayyaanaa sunttan eta xammaqite .

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: Taani inttena azazidobaa ubbaa eti naagana mala , eta tamaarissite ; taani wodiyaa wurssettai gakkanaassikka ubba wode inttenaara de7iyoogaa akeekite ” yaagiis .

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: Xoossaa Na7aa Yesuus Kiristtoosa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa doomettaa .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi xaafido maxaafan Xoossai , “ Be7a , ta kiittiyoogaa taani neeppe sinttau yeddana . I neeyyo ogiyaa kessana .

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Issoi bazzon ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , ' Godaa ogiyaa giigissite . I hemettana loossuwaakka ayyo sitti oottite ' giis ” yaagees .

text: John did baptize in the wilderness , and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
text2: Xammaqiya Yohaannisi asaa xammaqiiddinne , “ Intte nagaraappe simmidi xammaqettite ; Xoossai intte nagaraa atto gaana ” yaagidi qaalaa yootiiddi bazzon kiyi wodhdhiis .

text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea , and they of Jerusalem , and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Yihudaa biittan de7iya asai ubbainne Yerusalaame katamaa asai ubbai Yohaannisakko yees . Yiidi ba nagaraa paaxin , Yohaannisi he asaa Yorddaanoosa SHaafan xammaqees .

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: Yohaannisi gaameelaa ikisiyan daddido afalaa maayidi , ba xeessan dafuwaa gixxees ; qassi booliyaanne degeeraa eessaa mees .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: Yohaannisi qaalaa yootiiddi , “ Taappe guyyeera daro minniyaagee yees ; harai atto , hokkada a caammaa dafuwaa birshshanaukka taayyo bessenna .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Taani inttena haattan xammaqais ; shin i inttena Geeshsha Ayyaanan xammaqana ” yaagees .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: Yesuusi he wode Galiila biittan de7iya Naazireete katamaappe yin , Yohaannisi Yorddaanoosa SHaafan a xammaqiis .

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: Yesuusi haattaappe kiyosaara saloi dooyettishiininne Geeshsha Ayyaanai ba bolli haraphphedan wodhdhishin be7iis .

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Qassi saluwaappe , “ Taani siiqiyo ta Na7ai nena ; tana nebai ufaissees ” yaagiya qaalai yiis .

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Sohuwaarakka Geeshsha Ayyaanai bazzo a yeddiis .

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: Yesuusi bazzon bana Seexaanai paaccishin , oitamu gallassa gattiis ; do7aarakka de7iis ; kiitanchchatikka yiidi , ayyo oottidosona .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: Yohaannisi qashettiichchidoogaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi Xoossaa kawotettaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiiddi , Galiila biitti biis ;

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: biidi , “ Wodee gakkiis ; Xoossaa kawotettaikka matattiis . Intte nagaraappe simmidi , wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa ammanite ” yaagiis .

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Yesuusi Galiila Abbaa lanqqiyaara aadhdhiiddi , moliyaa oiqqiyaageeta , Simoonanne a ishaa Inddiraasa , bantta gitiyaa abban yeggiyaageeta be7iis .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: Be7idi eta , “ Tana kaallite ; taani inttena asa oiqqiyoogaa tamaarissana ” yaagiis .

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Yaagin eti sohuwaarakka bantta gitiyaa yeggi bayidi , Yesuusa kaallidosona .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: Yesuusi guuttaa sinttaukko biidi , Zabddiyoosa naata naa77u ishantta , Yaaqoobanne Yohaannisa wolwolo giddon bantta gitiyaa giigissiyaageeta be7iis .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: I be7osaarakka eta xeesin , bantta aawaa , Zabddiyoosa , a oosanchchatuura wolwolo giddon yeggi bayidi , Yesuusa kaallidi biidosona .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: Eti Qifirinaahooma giyo katamaa gelidosona ; Yesuusi Sambbata gallassi sohuwaara Aihuda woosa keettaa gelidi , tamaarissuwaa doommi aggiis .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Baayyo alaafetettai de7iyo asadan , asaa i tamaarissiyoogaappe attin , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetudan tamaarissenna gishshau , asai a timirttiyan garamettiis .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: He wode iita ayyaanai de7iyo issi bitanee Aihuda woosa keettaa gelosaarakka ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi ,

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: “ Naazireeta Yesuusaa , neeni nuuppe ai koyai ? Nuna xaissanau yaadii ? Neeni oonakko erais ; neeni Xoossaa geeshshaa gidikkii ! ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: Yesuusi he iita ayyaanaa , “ Haizza ; bitaniyaappe kiya ” yaagidi azaziis .

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Iita ayyaanai bitaniyaa daferettinnee , wolqqappe waasissidi , appe kiyi aggiis .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: Asai ubbai garamettidi , “ Hagee aibee ? Ha bitanee ba alaafetettan harai atto , iita ayyaanatakka azazees ; etikka qassi ayyo azazettoosona ; hagee aiba ooratta timirttee ? ” yaagidi , ba giddon issoi issuwaa oichchiis .

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: Yesuusabai sohuwaara Galiila biittan de7iya heera ubbaa gakki aggiis .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: Yesuusi Aihuda woosa keettaappe kiyosaara , Yaaqoobaaranne Yohaannisaara Simoona soonne Inddiraasa soo bi aggiis .

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: Simoona bollotiyaa qoxonne misho harggada zin77idaaribaa i yaa gakkosaarakka ayyo odi aggidosona .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: I ikko shiiqidi , i kushiyaa oiqqidi , o dentti essiis ; qoxoinne mishoi o aggin , a etayyo oottaasu .

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: Harggida asa ubbaanne xalaheti oiqqido asa ubbaa omarssi awai wullidoogaappe guyyiyan , akko ehiidosona .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Kataman de7iya asai ubbai he kare shiiqiis .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Yesuusi dumma dumma harggiyan oiqettida daro asaa pattidi , daro xalahetakka kessiis . Kiristtoosa i gidiyoogaa xalaheti erido gishshau , eta haasayissennan diggiis .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: Yesuusi maallado wonttimaattan denddidi , sooppe kiyidi , asi bainnasaa biis ; biidi yan Xoossaa woossiis .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: Simooninne aara de7iyaageeti a koyiiddi biidosona .

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: Eti a demmidi , “ Asai ubbai nena koyees ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi qassi eta , “ Hegaa heeran de7iya hara katamata hinddite ; taani hegankka qaalaa yootanau bessees ; aissi giikko , taani yiidoogee hegaassa ” yaagiis .

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Yaagidi Aihuda woosa keettatun qaalaa yootiiddinne xalaheta kessiiddi , Galiila biitta ubbaa yuuyiis .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Inchchirichchai oiqqido issi bitanee Yesuusakko yiidi , a sinttan gulbbatidi , “ Neeni koyikko , tana pattanau danddayaasa ” yaagidi woossiis .

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: Yesuusi ayyo qarettiis ; ba kushiyaa yeddidi , a bochchidi , “ Taani koyais ; paxa ! ” yaagiis .

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: Sohuwaarakka inchchirichchai bitaniyaa yeddi aggin , bitanee paxi aggiis .

text: And he straitly charged him , and forthwith sent him away ;
text2: Yesuusi wolqqappe godatidi , sohuwaara a kessi yeddiis .

text: And saith unto him , See thou say nothing to any man : but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Yesuusi a , “ Nena era ! Hagaa ooyyoonne yootoppa ; shin baada ne bollaa qeesiyaa bessa ; qassi neeni ha77i geeshsha gididoogaa asaa erissanau , Muusee azazido yarshshuwaa yarshsha ” yaagiis .

text: But he went out , and began to publish it much , and to blaze abroad the matter , insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city , but was without in desert places : and they came to him from every quarter .
text2: SHin bitanee biidi , yohuwaa ubbasan asa ubbau oduwaanne laalettaa doommiis ; hegaa gishshau , Yesuusi qoncciyaa kiyidi , katama gelanau danddayibeenna ; shin asi bainnasan gaxan de7iis ; qassi asai ubbasaappe akko yees .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: Amarida gallassaappe guyyiyan , “ Yesuusi Qifirinaahooma guyye simmidi , son de7ees ” giyo odoi siyettiis .

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: Keettai ekkennan ixxin , harai atto , kareekka un77ana gakkanaassi daro asai shiiqiis ; shiiqin Yesuusi qaalaa asau yootees .

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: Oiddu asati bollai silido issi bitaniyaa tookkidi , akko ehiidosona .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Asai darido gishshau , bitaniyaa Yesuusakko efaanau etayyo danddayettennan ixxin , Yesuusi de7iyo ginaara keettaa qaaridi , kaaraa lukkidosona ; he lukkidosaara bitaniyaa i zin77ido halaara duge yeddidi , Yesuusa sinttan wottidosona .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: Yesuusi eta ammanuwaa be7idi , he bollai silido bitaniyaa , “ Ta na7au , ne nagarai atto geetettiis ” yaagiis .

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Yaagin higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuppe he sohuwan uttida issooti issooti bantta wozanan ,

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: “ Laa ha bitanee hagaa mala iitabaa Xoossaa bolli aissi haasayii ? Xoossaa xalaalappe attin , harai ooni nagara atto gaanau danddayii ? ” yaagidi qoppidosona .

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: Eti bantta wozanan hegaadan qoppidoogaa Yesuusi sohuwaara ba ayyaanan eridi , eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Intte intte wozanan aissi hegaadan qoppeetii ?

text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Bollai silido bitaniyaa , ' Ne nagarai atto geetettiis ' giyoogee mateeyye ? Woi , ' Dendda eqqada ne halaa tookkada hemetta ' giyoogee matee ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: SHin taayyo , Asa Na7aayyo , sa7aa bollan nagara atto gaanau alaafetettai de7iyoogaa taani inttena erissana ” yaagidi he bollai silido bitaniyaa ,

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: “ Nena gais ; dendda eqqa ; yaatada ne halaa tookkada ne soo ba ” yaagiis .

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: Bitanee sohuwaara denddi eqqidi , ba halaa tookkidi , asai ubbai xeellishin biis ; bin asai ubbai garamettidi , “ Nuuni hagaa malabaa mulekka be7i erokko ” yaagidi Xoossaa galatiis .

text: And he went forth again by the sea side ; and all the multitude resorted unto him , and he taught them .
text2: Yesuusi naa77anttuwaa Galiila Abbaa dooni biis ; asai ubbai akko yiidaagaa tamaarissiis .

text: And as he passed by , he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom , and said unto him , Follow me . And he arose and followed him .
text2: Hegaara aadhdhiiddi , Ilppiyoosa na7aa Leewa , giyoogee giiraa giiriyoosan uttidaagaa demmidi , “ Tana kaalla ” yaagiis . Yaagin Leewi denddi eqqidi , a kaalliis .

text: And it came to pass , that , as Jesus sat at meat in his house , many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples : for there were many , and they followed him .
text2: Yesuusi qumaa maanau Leewi son uttidaashin , giiraa ekkiya daro asainne nagaranchchati aaranne i erissiyo ashkkaratuura issippe uttidosona . Aissi giikko , a kaalliyaageetu giddon hegeetu mala asati daridosona .

text: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners , they said unto his disciples , How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Higgiyaa tamaarissiya issi issi Parisaaweti Yesuusi nagaranchchatuuranne giiraa ekkiyaageetuura qumaa miishin be7idi , “ I aissi nagaranchchatuuranne giiraa ekkiyaageetuura qumaa mii ? ” yaagidi , erissiyo ashkkarata oichchidosona .

text: When Jesus heard it , he saith unto them , They that are whole have no need of the physician , but they that are sick : I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Yesuusi eti giyoogaa siyidi , “ Hargganchchatuppe attin , payyatuyyo aakime koshshenna ; taani nagaranchchata xeesanau yiidoogaappe attin , xillota xeesanau yabeikke ” yaagidi etayyo zaariis .

text: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast : and they come and say unto him , Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Xammaqiya Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkaratinne Parisaaweti xoomoosona ; amarida asati Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkaratinne Parisaaweti erissiyo ashkkarati xoomoosona ; shin neeni erissiyo ashkkarati aissi xoomokkonaa ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ? as long as they have the bridegroom with them , they cannot fast .
text2: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Bullachchaa yiida asati machchiyo ekkiyaagee banttanaara de7ishin , xoomanau danddayiyoonaa ? Machchiyo ekkiyaagee etaara de7ishin , xoomanau danddayokkona .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: SHin machchiyo ekkiyaagaa eta matappe efaana wodee yaana ; eti he wode xoomana .

text: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment : else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old , and the rent is made worse .
text2: “ Ceega maayo bolli ooratta woto wotti sikkiya asi baawa ; wotti sikkikko , ooratta wotoi ceega maayuwaa peererettana ; peerettaikka kaseegaappe darana .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles : else the new wine doth burst the bottles , and the wine is spilled , and the bottles will be marred : but new wine must be put into new bottles .
text2: Qassi ho77o woine eessa ceega ogoron naaqqiya asi baawa ; shin naaqqikko , he woiniyaa eessai ogoruwaa daakkana ; baukka gukkana ; ogoroikka moorettana ; shin ho77o woine eessaa ooratta ogoron naaqqeettees ” yaagiis .

text: And it came to pass , that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day ; and his disciples began , as they went , to pluck the ears of corn .
text2: Yesuusi issi Sambbata gallassi tiya banggaa giddoora aadhdhishin , erissiyo ashkkarati aara biiddi , banggaa tiyaappe duutettaa doommidosona .

text: And the Pharisees said unto him , Behold , why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful ?
text2: Parisaaweti Yesuusa , “ Be7a ; neeni erissiyo ashkkarati Sambbata gallassi higge gidennabaa aissi oottiyoonaa ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And he said unto them , Have ye never read what David did , when he had need , and was an hungred , he , and they that were with him ?
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Daawiti namisettidi , miyoobaa koyido wode , banaara de7iyaageetuura oottidobaa mulekka nabbabibeekketii ?

text: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest , and did eat the shewbread , which is not lawful to eat but for the priests , and gave also to them which were with him ?
text2: Abiyaataari qeese ubbatu halaqa gidido wode , Daawiti Xoossaa keettaa gelidi , qeesetu xalaalai maanaappe attin , ooninne maanau higge gidennaagaa Godaa sinttan wottido oittaa miidi , banaara de7iyaageetuyyookka immiis ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto them , The sabbath was made for man , and not man for the sabbath :
text2: Qassikka Yesuusi eta , “ Sambbatai asau merettidoogaappe attin , asi Sambbatau merettibeenna .

text: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani , Asa Na7ai , harai atto , Sambbataukka Goda ” yaagiis .

text: And he entered again into the synagogue ; and there was a man there which had a withered hand .
text2: Yesuusi Aihuda woosa keettaa naa77anttuwaa geliis ; hegan kushee silido issi bitanee de7ees .

text: And they watched him , whether he would heal him on the sabbath day ; that they might accuse him .
text2: Issi issi asai Yesuusa mootanau koyidi , kushee silido bitaniyaa Sambbatan i pattiyaakko be7anau mintti naagees .

text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand , Stand forth .
text2: Yesuusi he kushee silido bitaniyaa , “ Dendda eqqada sinttau haa ya ” yaagiis .

text: And he saith unto them , Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days , or to do evil ? to save life , or to kill ? But they held their peace .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan asaa , “ Sambbatan lo77obaa oottiyoogee wogeeyye iitabaa oottiyoogee wogee ? Asa shemppo ashshiyoogee wogeeyye woriyoogee wogee ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . SHin asai co77u giis .

text: And when he had looked round about on them with anger , being grieved for the hardness of their hearts , he saith unto the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it out : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Yesuusi hanqqettidi , eta yuushshi aatti xeellidi , eti yootin siyennaageeta gidiyo gishshau , etau keehi qarettiis ; he bitaniyaa , “ Ne kushiyaa piddi ootta ” yaagiis ; bitanee piddi oottin , a kushee paxi aggiis .

text: And the Pharisees went forth , and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: Parisaaweti Aihuda woosa keettaappe kare kiyidi , Yesuusa waati woranaakko maqettanau , Heeroodisa baggatuura sohuwaara issisaa shiiqidosona .

text: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea : and a great multitude from Galilee followed him , and from Judaea ,
text2: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura Galiila Abbaa biis ; Galiilappenne Yihudaappe yiida daro asai a kaalliis .

text: And from Jerusalem , and from Idumaea , and from beyond Jordan ; and they about Tyre and Sidon , a great multitude , when they had heard what great things he did , came unto him .
text2: Qassikka daro asai Yerusalaameppe , Eedomiyaasappe , Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefintta baggappe , Xiiroosa katamaappenne Sidoona katamaappe Yesuusi oottidobaa siyidi , Yesuusakko yiis .

text: And he spake to his disciples , that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude , lest they should throng him .
text2: Yesuusi daro asai bana un77enna mala , ba erissiyo ashkkarati wolwoluwaa baayyo takkissana mala azaziis .

text: For he had healed many ; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him , as many as had plagues .
text2: Daro asaa i pattido gishshau , harggiya asai ubbai a bochchanau sugerettees .

text: And unclean spirits , when they saw him , fell down before him , and cried , saying , Thou art the Son of God .
text2: Iita ayyaanai de7iyo asatikka a be7ido wode ubban a sinttan gufannidi , bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa gidikkii ! ” yaagoosona .

text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known .
text2: Yesuusi he iita ayyaanati babaa asau yootidi , bana qoncciyaa kessenna mala , eta minttidi azaziis .

text: And he goeth up into a mountain , and calleth unto him whom he would : and they came unto him .
text2: Yesuusi deriyaa bolli kiyidi , ba koyido asata baakko xeesiis ; xeesidoogeeti akko biidosona .

text: And he ordained twelve , that they should be with him , and that he might send them forth to preach ,
text2: Eti banaara de7ana malanne qaalaa yootanau eta kiittana mala , xalaheta kessanaukka etayyo maatai de7ana mala , tammanne naa77u asata dooriis .

text: And Simon he surnamed Peter ;
text2: I doorido tammanne naa77ati hageeta : PHeexiroosa yaagidi sunttido Simoona ,

text: And James the son of Zebedee , and John the brother of James ; and he surnamed them Boanerges , which is , The sons of thunder :
text2: Bo7anerggeesa yaagidi sunttidoogeeta , Zabddiyoosa naata Yaaqoobanne Yaaqooba ishaa Yohaannisa . “ Bo7anerggeesa ” giyoogee “ Dadaa milatiya asata ” giyoogaa .

text: And Andrew , and Philip , and Bartholomew , and Matthew , and Thomas , and James the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus , and Simon the Canaanite ,
text2: Inddiraasanne Piliphphoosa , Barttalamoosanne Maatiyoosa , Toomaasanne Ilppiyoosa na7aa Yaaqooba , Taaddiyoosanne ba biittau mishettiya Simoona ,

text: And Judas Iscariot , which also betrayed him : and they went into an house .
text2: Yesuusa aatti immida Yihudaa Asqqoroota .

text: And the multitude cometh together again , so that they could not so much as eat bread .
text2: Yesuusi soo biis ; naa77anttuwaakka qassi daro asai shiiqin , inne erissiyo ashkkarati harai atto , qumaa maanaukka danddayibookkona ;

text: And when his friends heard of it , they went out to lay hold on him : for they said , He is beside himself .
text2: asai a , “ Gooyees ” giyo gishshau , a dabboti hegaa siyidi , a ekkanau biidosona .

text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said , He hath Beelzebub , and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils .
text2: Higgiyaa tamaarissiya issi issi asati Yerusalaameppe yiidi , “ A bolli Bi7eeli - Zeebuli de7ees ” yaagidosona ; qassi harati , “ Xalahetu halaqai baayyo wolqqaa immin , xalaheta kessees ” yaagidi haasayidosona .

text: And he called them unto him , and said unto them in parables , How can Satan cast out Satan ?
text2: Yesuusi asaa baakko xeesidi , leemisuwaa yootiiddi , “ Seexaanai Seexaanaa waati kessanau danddayii ?

text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself , that kingdom cannot stand .
text2: Issi kawotettai ba giddon shaahettikko , he kawotettai eqqana danddayenna ;

text: And if a house be divided against itself , that house cannot stand .
text2: qassi issi keetta asaikka ba giddon shaahettikko , he keettaa asaikka eqqanau danddayenna .

text: And if Satan rise up against himself , and be divided , he cannot stand , but hath an end .
text2: Qassi Seexaanai banaara ooyettidi shaahettikko , xayanaappe attin , de7ana danddayenna .

text: No man can enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he will first bind the strong man ; and then he will spoil his house .
text2: “ SHin wolqqaama asa kasetidi qachchennan de7iiddi , a keettaa gelidi , a miishshaa bonqqanau danddayiya asi baawa ; qachchidoogaappe guyyiyan , a keettaa bonqqana danddayees .

text: Verily I say unto you , All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men , and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme :
text2: “ Taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; Xoossai asa naatuyyo nagara ubbaanne eti cayiyo cashsha ubbaa atto gaana ;

text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness , but is in danger of eternal damnation :
text2: shin Geeshsha Ayyaanaa bolli iitabaa haasayiya ooyyoonne merinau nagara gidanaappe attin , Xoossai mulekka atto geenna ” yaagiis .

text: Because they said , He hath an unclean spirit .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa giidoogee , issi issi asati , “ A bolli iita ayyaanai de7ees ” yaagido gishshaassa .

text: There came then his brethren and his mother , and , standing without , sent unto him , calling him .
text2: A aayyiyaanne a ishantti yiidi , karen eqqidi , akko asa kiittidi , a xeesissidosona .

text: And the multitude sat about him , and they said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee .
text2: Daro asai a matan uttiis ; he kiittidoogee a , “ Be7a ; ne aayyiyaanne ne ishantti karen eqqidi , nenaara gaittanau koyoosona ” yaagiis .

text: And he answered them , saying , Who is my mother , or my brethren ?
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ta aayyiyaa oonee ? Qassi ta ishantti oonee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And he looked round about on them which sat about him , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Ba matan uttida asaa yuushshi aatti xeellidi , “ Be7ite ; ta aayyiyaanne ta ishantti hageetihona .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of God , the same is my brother , and my sister , and mother .
text2: Xoossai koyiyoobaa oottiyai ubbai ta isha , ta michchonne ta aayo ” yaagiis .

text: And he began again to teach by the sea side : and there was gathered unto him a great multitude , so that he entered into a ship , and sat in the sea ; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land .
text2: Yesuusi naa77anttuwaa Galiila Abbaa lanqqiyan tamaarissuwaa doommiis ; keehi daro asai ba lanqqiyan yuuyi aadhdhidi shiiqettin , abban de7iya wolwolo giddo gelidi , aani uttiis ; qassi he asai ubbai abbaa lanqqiyan de7ees .

text: And he taught them many things by parables , and said unto them in his doctrine ,
text2: I eta darobaa leemisuwan tamaarissiis . Tamaarissiiddi hagaadan yaagiis ,

text: Hearken ; Behold , there went out a sower to sow :
text2: “ Siyite ; issi bitanee zerettaa zeranau kiyiis .

text: And it came to pass , as he sowed , some fell by the way side , and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up .
text2: I zerishin , issi issi zerettai ogiyaa doonan wodhdhiis ; wodhdhidaagaa kafoi yiidi miis .

text: And some fell on stony ground , where it had not much earth ; and immediately it sprang up , because it had no depth of earth :
text2: Issi issi zerettai guutta biittai de7iyo shuchchaa anccuwaa bolli wodhdhiis ; daro biittai bainna gishshau , he zerettai sohuwaara mokkiis .

text: But when the sun was up , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
text2: Awai kiyido wode shulliis ; adussa xaphuwaa yeddibeenna gishshau , meli bayiis .

text: And some fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
text2: Issi issi zerettai aguntta giddon wodhdhiis ; wodhdhidi mokkidaagaa agunttai diccidi cuullin , aifennan attiis .

text: And other fell on good ground , and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased ; and brought forth , some thirty , and some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Issi issi zerettai aradda biittan wodhdhidi mokkiis ; diccidi issoi hasttamaa , issoi usuppun tammaa aifin , issoi xeetaa aifiis ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto them , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Yaagidi , “ Siyanau haitti de7iyo urai siyo ” yaagiis .

text: And when he was alone , they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable .
text2: Yesuusi yootidoogaa siyida hara asatinne tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusi barkka de7ishin , akko shiiqidi , he leemisuwaa birshshettaa a oichchidosona .

text: And he said unto them , Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God : but unto them that are without , all these things are done in parables :
text2: Oichchin Yesuusi etassi hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Inttessi Xoossaa kawotettaa xuura yohuwaa erai imettiis ; shin harati kawotettaappe kareera de7iyaageeti , xeeluwaa xeellidi be7enna mala , qassi sissaa siyidikka akeekenna mala , eti naa77anttuwaa Xoossaakko simmin , i eta nagaraa atto geenna mala , etayyo ubbabai leemisuwan odettiis ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto them , Know ye not this parable ? and how then will ye know all parables ?
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Ha leemisuwaa erekketii ? Yaatin , leemiso ubbaa waati eruuteetii ?

text: The sower soweth the word .
text2: Zeriyaagee Xoossaa qaalaa zerees .

text: And these are they by the way side , where the word is sown ; but when they have heard , Satan cometh immediately , and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts .
text2: Qaalai zerettiyo ogiyaa doonan de7iyaageeti hageeta ; eti qaalaa siyiyo wode , Seexaanai sohuwaarakka yiidi , eta wozanan zerettida qaalaa efirggees .

text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground ; who , when they have heard the word , immediately receive it with gladness ;
text2: Hegaadankka qassi shuchchaa anccoi de7iyo biittan zerettidaageeti hageeta ; eti qaalaa siyidi , sohuwaara ufaissan ekkoosona .

text: And have no root in themselves , and so endure but for a time : afterward , when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word ' s sake , immediately they are offended .
text2: Eti ha77issau de7iyoogaappe attin , etau mino xaphoi baawa ; guyyeppe qaalaa gaasuwan waayee woi yedetai yiyo wode , eti sohuwaara xubetti aggoosona .

text: And these are they which are sown among thorns ; such as hear the word ,
text2: Qassi aguntta giddon zerettidaageeti hageeta ; eti qaalaa siyiyaageeta .

text: And the cares of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , and the lusts of other things entering in , choke the word , and it becometh unfruitful .
text2: SHin ha sa7aa de7uwau hirggiyoogee duretettaa siiqiyoogeenne harabaa amottiyoogee eta wozanan gelidi , qaalaa cuullees ; cuullin aifennan atti aggees .

text: And these are they which are sown on good ground ; such as hear the word , and receive it , and bring forth fruit , some thirtyfold , some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: SHin aradda biittan zerettidaageeti qaalaa siyidi ekkiyaageeta ; issoi hasttamaa , issoi usuppun tammaa aifin , issoi xeetaa aifiis ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto them , Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel , or under a bed ? and not to be set on a candlestick ?
text2: Yesuusi gujjidi , “ Xomppe ehiidi , kereppe woi arssappe garssaara wottiya asi de7ii ? Xoqqan wottenneeyye ?

text: For there is nothing hid , which shall not be manifested ; neither was any thing kept secret , but that it should come abroad .
text2: Aissi giikko , qosidobai ubbai qoncciyaa kiyana ; qassi genttidobai ubbaikka beettennan attenna .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Siyanau haitti de7iyo urai de7ikko siyo ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto them , Take heed what ye hear : with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you : and unto you that hear shall more be given .
text2: Qassikka eta , “ Intte siyiyoogaa ezggidi siyite ; Xoossai intte makkido qun77an intteyyo makkana . I intteyyo darissidi immana ; aissi giikko , issibai de7iyo urau gujji immana ; bainnaagaappe harai atto , au de7iya he guuttiyookka ekkirggana ” yaagiis .

text: And he said , So is the kingdom of God , as if a man should cast seed into the ground ;
text2: Yesuusi qassikka yaagiis ; “ Xoossaa kawotettai ba gaden katta zeriya asa mala .

text: And should sleep , and rise night and day , and the seed should spring and grow up , he knoweth not how .
text2: He bitanee qammi xiskkees ; maallado denddees ; i ba huuphen waaniyaakkonne erennan , he zerettai mokkeesinne diccees .

text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , after that the full corn in the ear .
text2: Biittai kattaa barkka mokkeesinne aifees ; koiro carshshai caarees ; guyyeppe aifanau kukkumees ; qassi wurssettan kumetta aifiyaa aifees .

text: But when the fruit is brought forth , immediately he putteth in the sickle , because the harvest is come .
text2: SHin kattai gakkiyo wode , kattaa shiishshiyo wodee gakkido gishshau , bitanee sohuwaarakka baacaara geli aggees ” yaagiis .

text: And he said , Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God ? or with what comparison shall we compare it ?
text2: Yaagidi Yesuusi , “ Nuuni Xoossaa kawotettaa ai milatees gaanee ? Woi aibiira leemisanee ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which , when it is sown in the earth , is less than all the seeds that be in the earth :
text2: Xoossaa kawotettai sanaafici giyo qii mittee aifiyo milatees . He mittee aifiyo zeriyo wode , sa7an de7iya mitta aife ubbaappekka guuxxausu ;

text: But when it is sown , it groweth up , and becometh greater than all herbs , and shooteth out great branches ; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it .
text2: o zerin mokkada ataakiltte ubbaappe gitatausu ; daro daashshaa daayausu . Kafoi i tashiyaa kuwan bau keettaa keexxana danddayees ” yaagiis .

text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them , as they were able to hear it .
text2: Yesuusi hagaa mala daro leemisuwan asau gelana gakkanaassi , ba qaalaa yootiis .

text: But without a parable spake he not unto them : and when they were alone , he expounded all things to his disciples .
text2: Asaayyo leemisoi bainnan yootenna ; shin Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratu xalaalaara de7iyo wode , etayyo ubbabaa birshshidi yootees .

text: And the same day , when the even was come , he saith unto them , Let us pass over unto the other side .
text2: He gallassi sa7ai omarin , Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Abbaa hefintti pinnoos ” yaagiis .

text: And when they had sent away the multitude , they took him even as he was in the ship . And there were also with him other little ships .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati daro asaa yeggi bayidi , Yesuusi kase geli uttido wolwoluwan gelidi , Yesuusa banttanaara efiidosona ; hara wolwolotikka hegan de7oosona .

text: And there arose a great storm of wind , and the waves beat into the ship , so that it was now full .
text2: Wolqqaama gotee denddin , beetai wolwoluwaa shocin , haattai kumana gakkanaassi wolwoluwaa giddo geliis .

text: And he was in the hinder part of the ship , asleep on a pillow : and they awake him , and say unto him , Master , carest thou not that we perish ?
text2: He wode Yesuusi wolwoluwan guyye baggaara borkkotaa borkkotidi xiskkiis . Erissiyo ashkkarati a denttidi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , nuuni xayiyo wode coo xeellai ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And he arose , and rebuked the wind , and said unto the sea , Peace , be still . And the wind ceased , and there was a great calm .
text2: Yaagin i beegottidi gotiyaa , “ Co77u ga ” giidi , abbaakka , “ Woppu ga ” giis ; goteekka co77u gin , ubbabaikka woppu giis .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye so fearful ? how is it that ye have no faith ?
text2: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Aissi hagaadan yayyeetii ? Intte waani ammanekketii ? ” yaagiis .

text: And they feared exceedingly , and said one to another , What manner of man is this , that even the wind and the sea obey him ?
text2: Eti daro yayyidi bantta giddon , “ Hagee laa harai atto , goteenne abbai azazettiyoogee oonee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gadarenes .
text2: Eti abbaappe hefintti pinnidi , Gerggesenoona giyo biitti gakkidosona .

text: And when he was come out of the ship , immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit ,
text2: Asa moogiyo gonggoluwaappe iita ayyaanai de7iyo issi bitanee kiyidi , Yesuusi wolwoluwaappe kiyido wode , Yesuusaara gaittiis ;

text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs ; and no man could bind him , no , not with chains :
text2: bitanee he gonggoluwan aqidi pe7idi , yan de7ees ; a ooninne naa77anttuwaa harai atto , sanssalatan qachchanaukka danddayibeenna .

text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains , and the chains had been plucked asunder by him , and the fetters broken in pieces : neither could any man tame him .
text2: Aissi giikko , i darotoo huqqunnaaninne sanssalatan qashettidi de7ees ; shin sanssalataa duuterettees ; huqqunnaakka mentterettees ; a xoonanau danddayidai ooninne baawa .

text: And always , night and day , he was in the mountains , and in the tombs , crying , and cutting himself with stones .
text2: I ubba wode gallassinne qammi , he gonggoluwaa giddooninne dere bolli waassees ; ba bollaakka shuchchan gaarees .

text: But when he saw Jesus afar off , he ran and worshipped him ,
text2: Yesuusa haahuwan be7ido wode , woxxidi ayyo goinniis .

text: And cried with a loud voice , and said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of the most high God ? I adjure thee by God , that thou torment me not .
text2: He bitanee ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaa Na7au Yesuusaa , nenanne tana aibee gattiyai ? Tana qaxxayenna mala , taani nena Xoossaa sunttan woossais ” yaagiis .

text: For he said unto him , Come out of the man , thou unclean spirit .
text2: I hegaa aissi giidee giikko , Yesuusi a , “ Laa ha iita ayyaanau , ha bitaniyaappe kiya ” yaagidoogaassa .

text: And he asked him , What is thy name ? And he answered , saying , My name is Legion : for we are many .
text2: Yesuusi a , “ Ne sunttai oonee ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Oichchin i , “ Nuuni daro gidiyo gishshau , ta sunttai Leegiyoona ” yaagiis .
