text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country .
text2: Yaagidi iita ayyaanata he biittaappe kessi yeddenna mala , Yesuusa minttidi woossiis .

text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding .
text2: He deriyaa bollan daro gudunttaa wudee heemettees ;

text: And all the devils besought him , saying , Send us into the swine , that we may enter into them .
text2: iita ayyaanati Yesuusa , “ Nuna hini gudunttaa wudiyaakko yeddarkkii ; etan biidi geloos ” yaagidi woossin ,

text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave . And the unclean spirits went out , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea , ( they were about two thousand ; ) and were choked in the sea .
text2: Yesuusi , “ Biite ” yaagiis . Yaagin iita ayyaanati bitaniyaappe kiyidi , gudunttatun gelidosona ; naa77u sha7aa gidiya gudunttaa wudee kakaa huuphiyaara jaamiiddi , abban gelidi , meetetti bayiis .

text: And they that fed the swine fled , and told it in the city , and in the country . And they went out to see what it was that was done .
text2: Gudunttaa wudiyaa heemmiyaageeti baqatidi , hanidabaa katamaaninne katamaappe gaxa biittan yootidosona ; yootin hegaa be7anau asai yiis .

text: And they come to Jesus , and see him that was possessed with the devil , and had the legion , sitting , and clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Asai Yesuusakko yiidi , xalaheti beni oiqqido Leegiyoona giyo bitanee ba wozanai simmin , maayuwaa maayidi , hegan uttidaagaa be7idi , ubbai yayyiis .

text: And they that saw it told them how it befell to him that was possessed with the devil , and also concerning the swine .
text2: Hegaa be7ida asati xalaheti oiqqido bitanee hanidobaanne qassi gudunttaa wudiyaabaa he asaassi yootidosona .

text: And they began to pray him to depart out of their coasts .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , asai bantta biittaappe Yesuusi baana mala , woosaa doommiis .

text: And when he was come into the ship , he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him .
text2: Yesuusi wolwoluwan gelishin , xalaheti oiqqido bitanee Yesuusaara de7ana mala , Yesuusa woossiis .

text: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not , but saith unto him , Go home to thy friends , and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee , and hath had compassion on thee .
text2: SHin Yesuusi ixxidi a , “ Ne soo simmada , Godai neessi waanida gitabaa oottidaakkonne qassi i neessi waanida kehakko ne so asau yoota ” yaagiis .

text: And he departed , and began to publish in Decapolis how great things Jesus had done for him : and all men did marvel .
text2: Bitanee biidi , Tammu Katamaa giyoosan yuuyidi , Yesuusi baassi waanida gitabaa oottidaakko , yootuwaa doommiis ; i yootidoogaa siyida asai ubbai garamettiis .

text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side , much people gathered unto him : and he was nigh unto the sea .
text2: Yesuusi simmidi , wolwoluwan gelidi , abbaa pinnidoogaappe guyyiyan , daro asai abbaa lanqqiyan a mati yuuyi aadhdhidi shiiqiis .

text: And , behold , there cometh one of the rulers of the synagogue , Jairus by name ; and when he saw him , he fell at his feet ,
text2: Yaa7iroosa giyoogee , Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqatuppe issoi , Yesuusa be7ido wode akko yiidi , a tohuwan kunddiis ;

text: And besought him greatly , saying , My little daughter lieth at the point of death : I pray thee , come and lay thy hands on her , that she may be healed ; and she shall live .
text2: kunddidi , “ Ta na7iyaa harggada haiqqana hanausu ; a paxada payya de7ana mala , yaada ne kushiyaa i bolli wottarkkii ” yaagidi Yesuusa minttidi woossiis .

text: And Jesus went with him ; and much people followed him , and thronged him .
text2: Yesuusi Yaa7iroosaara biis ; biishin keehi daro asai a kaalliiddi un77iis .

text: And a certain woman , which had an issue of blood twelve years ,
text2: Tammanne naa77u laittaasappe doommidi , i bollaappe suuttai goggiyo issi maccaasiyaa de7ausu .

text: And had suffered many things of many physicians , and had spent all that she had , and was nothing bettered , but rather grew worse ,
text2: Daro aakimeti o aakimishinkka , a paxa kaa7ettaasu ; ba miishshaa ubbaa wurssinkka iyyo haa iitidoogaappe attin , ainne o maaddibeenna .

text: When she had heard of Jesus , came in the press behind , and touched his garment .
text2: He maccaasiyaa Yesuusabaa siyada , asaa giddoora Yesuusappe guyyeera yaada , a afalaa bochchaasu .

text: For she said , If I may touch but his clothes , I shall be whole .
text2: Aissi giikko a , “ Taani harai atto , a afalaa bochchikko paxana ” yaagada qoppaasu .

text: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up ; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague .
text2: Ippe goggiya suuttai sohuwaarakka aggi bayiis ; a ba waayiyaappe paxidoogaa ba bollan era aggaasu .

text: And Jesus , immediately knowing in himself that virtue had gone out of him , turned him about in the press , and said , Who touched my clothes ?
text2: Yesuusi baappe wolqqai kiyidoogaa ba huuphen eridi , sohuwaara daro asaa giddon guyye simmidi , “ Ta afalaa bochchidai oonee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And his disciples said unto him , Thou seest the multitude thronging thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati a , “ Asai nena sugiyoogaa be7aidda , ' Tana oonee bochchidai ? ' yaagai ? ” giidosona .

text: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa ooni oottidaakkonne be7anau yuushshi aattidi xeelliis ;

text: But the woman fearing and trembling , knowing what was done in her , came and fell down before him , and told him all the truth .
text2: shin mishiriyaa baayyo hanidabaa erada , yashshaa kokkoraidda yaada Yesuusa sinttan gufannaasu ; qassi tumu hanidabaa ubbaa ayyo yootaasu .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace , and be whole of thy plague .
text2: Yootin Yesuusi o , “ Ta na7ee , nena ne ammanoi pattiis ; saruwan ba , ne waayiyaappenne paxa ” yaagiis .

text: While he yet spake , there came from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house certain which said , Thy daughter is dead : why troublest thou the Master any further ?
text2: Yesuusi biron hegaa giishin , Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqaa sooppe kiitettida asati yiidi , “ Ne na7iyaa haiqqaichchaasu ; simmi tamaarissiyaagaa aissi daafurssai ? ” yaagidosona .

text: As soon as Jesus heard the word that was spoken , he saith unto the ruler of the synagogue , Be not afraid , only believe .
text2: SHin Yesuusi eti giyoogaa siyidi , Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqaa , “ Ammano xalaalaa ammanappe attin , yayyoppa ” yaagiis .

text: And he suffered no man to follow him , save Peter , and James , and John the brother of James .
text2: Yesuusi PHeexiroosappe , Yaaqoobappenne Yaaqooba ishaa Yohaannisappe harai ooninne bana kaallenna mala diggiis .

text: And he cometh to the house of the ruler of the synagogue , and seeth the tumult , and them that wept and wailed greatly .
text2: Eti Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqaa soo gakkido wode , Yesuusi asai wozanaa bayidi yeekkiyoogaanne zilaaliyoogaa be7iis .

text: And when he was come in , he saith unto them , Why make ye this ado , and weep ? the damsel is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Gelidi asaa , “ Aissi wozanaa bayidi yeekkeetii ? Na7iyaa xiskkaasuppe attin , haiqqabeikku ” yaagiis .

text: And they laughed him to scorn . But when he had put them all out , he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel , and them that were with him , and entereth in where the damsel was lying .
text2: Yaagin asai a bolli miicciis ; shin asa ubbaa kare kessidi , na7ee aawaanne aayyiyo he banaara de7iya erissiyo ashkkaratanne ekkidi , na7iyaa de7iyoosaa geliis .

text: And he took the damsel by the hand , and said unto her , Talitha cumi ; which is , being interpreted , Damsel , I say unto thee , arise .
text2: Yesuusi na7ee kushiyaa oiqqidi , “ Xaalitaa , quumii ” yaagiis ; hegaa birshshettai , “ Guutta na7ee , taani nena dendda gais ” giyoogaa .

text: And straightway the damsel arose , and walked ; for she was of the age of twelve years . And they were astonished with a great astonishment .
text2: Na7iyaa sohuwaarakka dendda eqqada hemetettaasu ; a tammanne naa77u laitta na7a ; hegee haniyoogan asai keehi daro garamettiis .

text: And he charged them straitly that no man should know it ; and commanded that something should be given her to eat .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa eti ooyyoonne odenna mala , eta mintti azazidi , “ Iyyo miyoobaa immite ” yaagiis .

text: And he went out from thence , and came into his own country ; and his disciples follow him .
text2: Yesuusi hegaappe kiyidi , ba biitti Naazireete katamaa biis ; erissiyo ashkkaratikka a kaallidi biidosona .

text: And when the sabbath day was come , he began to teach in the synagogue : and many hearing him were astonished , saying , From whence hath this man these things ? and what wisdom is this which is given unto him , that even such mighty works are wrought by his hands ?
text2: Sambbata gallassi Aihuda woosa keettan tamaarissuwaa doommiis ; i tamaarissiyoogaa siyida daro asai garamettidi , “ Hagee ha ubbabaa auppe demmidee ? Ha ayyo imettida aadhdhida eratettai aibee ? Xoossai oottiyo malaataa i waatidi oottii ?

text: Is not this the carpenter , the son of Mary , the brother of James , and Joses , and of Juda , and Simon ? and are not his sisters here with us ? And they were offended at him .
text2: Hagee anaaxiyaa gidennee ? Mairaami na7aa , Yaaqooba ishaa , Yoosa ishaa , Yihudaa ishaa , Simoona ishaa gidenneeyye ? A michchentti nunaara hagan de7okkonaayye ? ” yaagidi , i giyoobaa ekkennan ixxiis .

text: But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , but in his own country , and among his own kin , and in his own house .
text2: Yesuusi he asaassi , “ Hananabaa yootiyaagee ba biittan , ba dabbotuuninne bantta so asan bonchchettennaagaappe attin , ubbasan bonchchettees ” yaagiis .

text: And he could there do no mighty work , save that he laid his hands upon a few sick folk , and healed them .
text2: I he sohuwan ba kushiyaa amarida asatu bolli wottidi , eta pattidoogaappe attin , Xoossai oottiyo malaataa oottanau ainne danddayibeenna .

text: And he marvelled because of their unbelief . And he went round about the villages , teaching .
text2: Asai ammanibeenna gishshau garamettiis . Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi hegaa heeran de7iya qeeri katamatun yuuyi yuuyidi , asaa tamaarissees .

text: And he called unto him the twelve , and began to send them forth by two and two ; and gave them power over unclean spirits ;
text2: Yesuusi tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata baakko xeesidi , naa77aa naa77aa kiittiis ; qassi etayyo iita ayyaanata kessiyo wolqqaa immiis .

text: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey , save a staff only ; no scrip , no bread , no money in their purse :
text2: Immidi eta , “ Oge xam77appe attin , quma , qarcciita , intte kiisen miishsha ainnekka oiqqoppite .

text: But be shod with sandals ; and not put on two coats .
text2: Intte tohuwan caammaa wottite ; shin naa77u qole maayoppite ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto them , In what place soever ye enter into an house , there abide till ye depart from that place .
text2: Qassikka eta , “ Inttena asi awan mokkikkokka , katamaappe kiyana gakkanaashin , he keettan utti bayite .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear you , when ye depart thence , shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them . Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Inttena asi mokkennasaa woi intte yootiyoobaa siyennasaa awa gidikkokka , he biittan de7iya asaayyo hegee markka gidana mala , he sohuwaappe kiyidi , intte tohuwaappe buhiyaa shocite ” yaagiis .

text: And they went out , and preached that men should repent .
text2: Tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarati biidi , asai ba nagaraappe simmanaadan , qaalaa yootidosona .

text: And they cast out many devils , and anointed with oil many that were sick , and healed them .
text2: Eti asaappe daro xalaheta kessidi , harggiya asaa daruwaa zaitiyaa tiyidi pattidosona .

text: And king Herod heard of him ; ( for his name was spread abroad : ) and he said , That John the Baptist was risen from the dead , and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Asai Yesuusa sunttaa denttiyo gishshau , Kawoi Heeroodisi hegaa ubbaa siyiis ; issi issi asai , “ Xammaqiya Yohaannisi haiquwaappe denddiis ; Xoossai oottiyo wolqqaama malaataa i oottiyoogee hegaassa ” yaagiis .

text: Others said , That it is Elias . And others said , That it is a prophet , or as one of the prophets .
text2: SHin harati a , “ Hagee Eelaasa gidennee ? ” yaagidosona . Harati qassi , “ Hagee beni wode hananabaa yootiyaageeta milatiya hananabaa yootiyaagaa gidennee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: But when Herod heard thereof , he said , It is John , whom I beheaded : he is risen from the dead .
text2: SHin Heeroodisi hegaa siyido wode , “ Hegee taani qooriyaa muucissido xammaqiya Yohaannisa gidennee ? He i haiquwaappe paxiis ” yaagiis .

text: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John , and bound him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife : for he had married her .
text2: Aissi giikko , Heeroodisi ba ishaa Piliphphoosa machchiyo Heeroodiyaado ekki wottiis ; Heeroodisi i gishshau , ba huuphen asa kiittidi , Yohaannisa oittidi , qashissi wottiis .

text: For John had said unto Herod , It is not lawful for thee to have thy brother ' s wife .
text2: Aissi giikko , Yohaannisi Heeroodisa , “ Neeni ne ishaa machchiyo ekkanau bessenna ” yaagi wottiis .

text: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him , and would have killed him ; but she could not :
text2: Heeroodiyaada Yohaannisau uluwan morkkiyaa oiqqada a worissanau koyaasu ; shin danddayabeikku .

text: For Herod feared John , knowing that he was a just man and an holy , and observed him ; and when he heard him , he did many things , and heard him gladly .
text2: Yohaannisi xillo asanne geeshsha asa gididoogaa Heeroodisi erido gishshau , ayyo yayyidi , loitti naagi wottiis ; Yohaannisi giyoobaa siyidi , ba wozanan keehi metootiiddikka abaa ufaissan siyiis .

text: And when a convenient day was come , that Herod on his birthday made a supper to his lords , high captains , and chief estates of Galilee ;
text2: Heeroodisi ba yelettido gallassi , deriyaa haariyaageetuyyo , shaalaqatuyyoonne Galiilan de7iya gita asaayyo imatuwaa giigissido wode , wurssettan Heeroodiyaada injje gallassaa demmaasu .

text: And when the daughter of the said Herodias came in , and danced , and pleased Herod and them that sat with him , the king said unto the damsel , Ask of me whatsoever thou wilt , and I will give it thee .
text2: Heeroodiyaadi na7iyaa imattaa imattiyoosaa gela durada , Heeroodisanne a imattata ufaissaasu ; ufaissin kawoi na7iyo , “ Nena lo77idabaa aiba gidikkonne tana oichcha ; taani neeyyo immana ” yaagiis .

text: And he sware unto her , Whatsoever thou shalt ask of me , I will give it thee , unto the half of my kingdom .
text2: Qassi iyyo daro caaqqidi , “ Neeni oichchidobaa aiba gidikkokka , taani neeyyo immana ; harai atto , ta kawotettaappe baggaa gidikkokka , taani neeyyo immana ” yaagiis .

text: And she went forth , and said unto her mother , What shall I ask ? And she said , The head of John the Baptist .
text2: Na7iyaa kare kiyada ba aayyiyo , “ Ai imma goo ? ” yaagada oichchaasu . Oichchin , i aayyiyaa , “ Xammaqiya Yohaannisa huuphiyaa imma ga ” yaagaasu .

text: And she came in straightway with haste unto the king , and asked , saying , I will that thou give me by and by in a charger the head of John the Baptist .
text2: Na7iyaa eesuwan kawuwaakko baada a , “ Xammaqiya Yohaannisa huuphiyaa soruwan wottada , neeni ha77i tau immanaagaa koyais ” yaagaasu .

text: And the king was exceeding sorry ; yet for his oath ' s sake , and for their sakes which sat with him , he would not reject her .
text2: Yaagin kawoi daro qarettiis ; shin ba caaquwaa gishshaunne ba imattatu gishshau iyyo caaqqido caaquwaa maanau koyibeenna .

text: And immediately the king sent an executioner , and commanded his head to be brought : and he went and beheaded him in the prison ,
text2: Hegaa gishshau , sohuwaara zabainnaa kiittidi , Yohaannisa huuphiyaa ehaana mala azaziis ; zabainnai qasho keettaa biidi , Yohaannisa qooriyaa muuciis .

text: And brought his head in a charger , and gave it to the damsel : and the damsel gave it to her mother .
text2: He muucidoogaa soruwan wotti ehiidi , na7eeyyo immiis ; na7iyaa qassi ba aayeeyyo immaasu .

text: And when his disciples heard of it , they came and took up his corpse , and laid it in a tomb .
text2: Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa siyido wode yiidi , a ahaa ekki efiidi moogidosona .

text: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus , and told him all things , both what they had done , and what they had taught .
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti simmidi , Yesuusaara gaittidi , bantta oottidobaanne bantta tamaarissidobaa ubbaa Yesuusassi odidosona .

text: And he said unto them , Come ye yourselves apart into a desert place , and rest a while : for there were many coming and going , and they had no leisure so much as to eat .
text2: Biyaabainne yiyaabai darin , harai atto qumaa maanaukka eta gattennan ixxido gishshau , Yesuusi eta , “ Nurkka guuttaa shemppi ekkanau asi bainnasaa hinddite ” yaagiis .

text: And they departed into a desert place by ship privately .
text2: Yesuusinne eti banttarkka wolwoluwan uttidi , asi bainnasaa biidosona .

text: And the people saw them departing , and many knew him , and ran afoot thither out of all cities , and outwent them , and came together unto him .
text2: Eti biishin , daro asai eta be7idi eriis ; eridi katama ubbaappe woxxidi , eti biyoosaa etappe kasetidi gakkiis .

text: And Jesus , when he came out , saw much people , and was moved with compassion toward them , because they were as sheep not having a shepherd : and he began to teach them many things .
text2: Yesuusi wolwoluwaappe kiyidi , daro asaa be7iis ; asai heemmiya asi bainna dorssaa mala gidido gishshau , qarettidi asaa darobaa tamaarissuwaa doommiis .

text: And when the day was now far spent , his disciples came unto him , and said , This is a desert place , and now the time is far passed :
text2: Sa7ai omariyo wode , Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati akko yiidi , “ Hagee sohoi asi bainna soho ; ha77i sa7aikka qammiichchiis ;

text: Send them away , that they may go into the country round about , and into the villages , and buy themselves bread : for they have nothing to eat .
text2: asai dere giddonne qeeri katamatu giddo biidi , bau miyoobaa shammana mala , asaa yedda ” yaagidosona .

text: He answered and said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they say unto him , Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread , and give them to eat ?
text2: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi eta , “ Asau miyoobaa intte immite ” yaagiis . Yaagin eti , “ Nuuni biidi , naa77u xeetu biran oittaa shammidi , asai maanau immanee ? ” yaagidi a oichchidosona .

text: He saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? go and see . And when they knew , they say , Five , and two fishes .
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Intteyyo aappun oittai de7ii ? Biidi be7ite ” yaagiis . Eti be7idi , “ Ichchashu oittanne naa77u mole ” yaagidosona .

text: And he commanded them to make all sit down by companies upon the green grass .
text2: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata asa ubbaa citan citan shaakki shaakkidi , maatan utissana mala azaziis .

text: And they sat down in ranks , by hundreds , and by fifties .
text2: Asai xeetai xeetainne ishatamai ishatamai citan citan uttiis .

text: And when he had taken the five loaves and the two fishes , he looked up to heaven , and blessed , and brake the loaves , and gave them to his disciples to set before them ; and the two fishes divided he among them all .
text2: Yesuusi ichchashu oittaanne naa77u moliyaa oiqqidi , pude saluwaa xeellidi , Xoossaa galatiis ; oittaa menttidi asau gishana mala , erissiyo ashkkaratussi immiis ; qassi naa77u moliyaakka eta ubbau shaakkiis .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled .
text2: Asai ubbai miidi kalliis .

text: And they took up twelve baskets full of the fragments , and of the fishes .
text2: Kallin attida oittaa xarzzainne moliyaa xarzzai tammanne naa77u samppaa kumidaagaa erissiyo ashkkarati denttidosona .

text: And they that did eat of the loaves were about five thousand men .
text2: Oittaa miida attumaasai ichchashu sha7a .

text: And straightway he constrained his disciples to get into the ship , and to go to the other side before unto Bethsaida , while he sent away the people .
text2: Sohuwaara Yesuusi he daro asaa moissiiddi , ba erissiyo ashkkarati wolwoluwan gelidi , abbaappe hefinttan de7iya Beetasaida giyo katamaa baappe sinttatidi baanaadan azaziis .

text: And when he had sent them away , he departed into a mountain to pray .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarata moissidoogaappe guyyiyan , Xoossaa woossanau deriyaa huuphiyaa kiyiis .

text: And when even was come , the ship was in the midst of the sea , and he alone on the land .
text2: Sa7ai qammiyo wode wolwoloi abbau gidduwan de7ishin , Yesuusi abbaappe gaxan barkka de7ees .

text: And he saw them toiling in rowing ; for the wind was contrary unto them : and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them , walking upon the sea , and would have passed by them .
text2: Carkkoi erissiyo ashkkaratukko carkkiyo gishshau , erissiyo ashkkarata abbaa shaariyoogee waissiyoogaa Yesuusi be7idi , kuttoi waassana haniyo wode abbaa bolli hemettiiddi , etakko yiis ; eta yeggidi aadhdhanau koyiis .

text: But when they saw him walking upon the sea , they supposed it had been a spirit , and cried out :
text2: SHin abbaa bolli i hemettishin , eti a be7idi , banttau moitille milatin waassidosona .

text: For they all saw him , and were troubled . And immediately he talked with them , and saith unto them , Be of good cheer : it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Aissi giikko , eti ubbai a be7idi , yashshaa kokkoridosona ; shin sohuwaara Yesuusi eta , “ Aikko baawa ; tanattennee yayyoppite ” yaagiis .

text: And he went up unto them into the ship ; and the wind ceased : and they were sore amazed in themselves beyond measure , and wondered .
text2: Yesuusi etaara issippe wolwoluwan gelin , carkkoi woppu giis ; gin eti daro garamettidosona .

text: For they considered not the miracle of the loaves : for their heart was hardened .
text2: Aissi giikko , eta wozanai dammido gishshau , eti oittaabaa akeekibookkona .

text: And when they had passed over , they came into the land of Gennesaret , and drew to the shore .
text2: Eti abbaa pinnidi , Gennssereexa giyo biittaa gakkidosona ; gakkidi wolwoluwaa gaxaa shiishshi qachchidosona .

text: And when they were come out of the ship , straightway they knew him ,
text2: Eti wolwoluwaappe wodhdhiyoogan , asai sohuwaara Yesuusa erinne

text: And ran through that whole region round about , and began to carry about in beds those that were sick , where they heard he was .
text2: hegaa heeran de7iya biitta ubban woxerettidi , hargganchchata halan tookkidi , “ Yesuusi de7ees ” gin siyidosaa ehuwaa doommiis .

text: And whithersoever he entered , into villages , or cities , or country , they laid the sick in the streets , and besought him that they might touch if it were but the border of his garment : and as many as touched him were made whole .
text2: Yesuusi biido soho ubban qeeri kataman gidin , gita kataman gidin , dere giddon gidinkka , asai hargganchchata giyaa sohuwaa efees . Yesuusi ba afalaa macaraa gidikkonne hargganchchata boshissana mala , asai a woossiis ; woossin bochchida ubbaikka paxiis .

text: Then came together unto him the Pharisees , and certain of the scribes , which came from Jerusalem .
text2: Parisaawetinne Yerusalaameppe yiidi , higgiyaa tamaarissiya amarida asati Yesuusakko shiiqidosona .

text: And when they saw some of his disciples eat bread with defiled , that is to say , with unwashen , hands , they found fault .
text2: SHiiqidi Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issooti issooti geeyenna kushiyan , hegaa giyoogee meecettennan qumaa miyaageeta be7idosona .

text: For the Pharisees , and all the Jews , except they wash their hands oft , eat not , holding the tradition of the elders .
text2: Aissi giikko , Parisaawetinne Aihuda asai ubbai bantta aawatu wogaa naagidi , bantta kushiyaa loitti meecettennan mookkona .

text: And when they come from the market , except they wash , they eat not . And many other things there be , which they have received to hold , as the washing of cups , and pots , brasen vessels , and of tables .
text2: Qassi giyaappe yiidikka meecettennan de7iiddi mookkona . Qassi eti bantta aawatuppe ekkido hara daro wogai de7ees ; hegee siiniyaanne keriyaa nahaasiyaappe medhdhido miishshaanne arssaa meecciyo wogaa .

text: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him , Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders , but eat bread with unwashen hands ?
text2: Parisaawetinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti Yesuusa , “ Ne erissiyo ashkkarati aissi aawatu wogaa kaallennan ixxidi , bantta kushiyaa meecettennan oittaa miyoonaa ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: He answered and said unto them , Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites , as it is written , This people honoureth me with their lips , but their heart is far from me .
text2: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Isiyaasi hananabaa yootido wode , inttebaa , lo77o milatiya iitatubaa xaafidoogaadankka , ' Xoossai , “ Hagee asai tana ba bolla doonan bonchchees . SHin eta wozanai taappe haahuwan de7ees ; asai tau mela goinnees . Aissi giikko , asi oottido azazuwaa Xoossaa higgiyaa milatissidi tamaarissees ” giis ' giidi hananabaa tumaa yootiis .

text: For laying aside the commandment of God , ye hold the tradition of men , as the washing of pots and cups : and many other such like things ye do .
text2: “ Xoossaa azazuwaa intte aggi bayidi , asa wogaa minttidi naageeta ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto them , Full well ye reject the commandment of God , that ye may keep your own tradition .
text2: Qassikka Yesuusi , “ Intte intte wogaa naaganau Xoossaa azazuwaa yeggi bayeeta .

text: For Moses said , Honour thy father and thy mother ; and , Whoso curseth father or mother , let him die the death :
text2: Aissi giikko Muusee , ' Ne aawaanne ne aayyiyo bonchcha . ' Qassi , ' Ba aawaanne ba aayyiyo cayiyaagee haiqqo ' yaagiis .

text: But ye say , If a man shall say to his father or mother , It is Corban , that is to say , a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ; he shall be free .
text2: SHin issi urau ba aawaa woi ba aayyiyo maaddiyoobi de7ishin i , ' Hagee qurbbaane ; hegaa giyoogee Xoossaabaa giyoogaa ' giikko ,

text: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother ;
text2: i ba aawaa woi ba aayyiyo wodeppe maaddanaagaa ainne koyekketa .

text: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition , which ye have delivered : and many such like things do ye .
text2: Hegaadankka qassi intte haratuyyo immido intte wogan Xoossaa qaalaa karidi , hegaa mala darobaa ootteeta ” yaagiis .

text: And when he had called all the people unto him , he said unto them , Hearken unto me every one of you , and understand :
text2: Yesuusi daro asaa qassikka baakko xeesidi , “ Ubbai taani giyoogaa siyitenne akeekite .

text: There is nothing from without a man , that entering into him can defile him : but the things which come out of him , those are they that defile the man .
text2: Asa wozanappe kiyiyaabai asa tunissiyoogaappe attin , kareppe asa wozanan gelidi , asa tunissiyaabi aibinne baawa ;

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: siyanau haittai de7iyo urai ooninne siyo ” yaagiis .

text: And when he was entered into the house from the people , his disciples asked him concerning the parable .
text2: Yesuusi daro asaa yeggi bayidi soo gelido wode , i erissiyo ashkkarati he leemisuwaabaa a oichchidosona .

text: And he saith unto them , Are ye so without understanding also ? Do ye not perceive , that whatsoever thing from without entereth into the man , it cannot defile him ;
text2: Oichchin i eta , “ Intteyyookka qassi gelibeennee ? Kareppe asa wozanan geliyaabai aibinne asa tunissanau danddayennaagaa akeekeetii ?

text: Because it entereth not into his heart , but into the belly , and goeth out into the draught , purging all meats ?
text2: Aissi giikko , qumai asa ulo giddo gelidi , gaxi kiyiyoogaappe attin , asa wozana giddo gelenna ” yaagiis . Hegaadankka Yesuusi quma ubbai geeshsha gidiyoogaa erissiis .

text: And he said , That which cometh out of the man , that defileth the man .
text2: Qassikka Yesuusi hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Asa tunissiyaabai asa wozana giddoppe kiyiyaabaa .

text: For from within , out of the heart of men , proceed evil thoughts , adulteries , fornications , murders ,
text2: Aissi giikko , asa wozana giddoppe kiyiyaabai iita qofa ; shaaramuxanau qaaqqatiyoogaa , wuuqqiyoogaa , woriyoogaa , shaaramuxiyoogaa ,

text: Thefts , covetousness , wickedness , deceit , lasciviousness , an evil eye , blasphemy , pride , foolishness :
text2: duretettaa amottiyoogaa , iitatettaa , geniyaa , amottiyoogaa , qanaatiyoogaa , cashshaa , ayyuwaa , azallatettaa .

text: All these evil things come from within , and defile the man .
text2: Ha iitabai ubbaikka asa wozana giddoppe kiyidi , asa tunissees ” yaagiis .

text: And from thence he arose , and went into the borders of Tyre and Sidon , and entered into an house , and would have no man know it : but he could not be hid .
text2: Yesuusi hegaappe aggidi , Xiiroosanne Sidoona giyo katamatu matan de7iya biitti biidi , issi keettaa geliis ; qassi i yaani de7iyoogaa ooninne eranaagaa koyibeenna ; shin qosettidi gam77anau danddayibeenna .

text: For a certain woman , whose young daughter had an unclean spirit , heard of him , and came and fell at his feet :
text2: SHin ba guutta na7ee bolli iita ayyaanai de7iyo issi maccaasiyaa Yesuusabaa siyada , sohuwaara akko yanne a tohuwan gufanna wodhdhaasu .

text: The woman was a Greek , a Syrophenician by nation ; and she besought him that he would cast forth the devil out of her daughter .
text2: He mishiriyaa Aihuda gidukku ; a yelettidoikka Sirofinqqe giyo biittaana ; a ba na7eeppe xalahiyaa kessana mala , Yesuusa woossaasu .

text: But Jesus said unto her , Let the children first be filled : for it is not meet to take the children ' s bread , and to cast it unto the dogs .
text2: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Naati kasetidi qumaa kallona ; aissi giikko , naatu qumaa ekkidi , zairotuyyo oliyoogee lo77o gidenna ” yaagiis .

text: And she answered and said unto him , Yes , Lord : yet the dogs under the table eat of the children ' s crumbs .
text2: Mishiriyaa zaarada , “ Tumakka ta Godau , harai atto masoofiyaa lanqqiyan de7iya zairotikka naatuppe attida suuppaa moosona ” yaagaasu .

text: And he said unto her , For this saying go thy way ; the devil is gone out of thy daughter .
text2: Yesuusi qassi o , “ Ha ne qaalaa gishshau , ne soo ba ; xalahee ne na7eeppe kiyiis ” yaagiis .

text: And when she was come to her house , she found the devil gone out , and her daughter laid upon the bed .
text2: Mishiriyaa ba soo biyo wode , i na7iyaa xalahee ippe kiyin , hiixan zin77idaaro demmaasu .

text: And again , departing from the coasts of Tyre and Sidon , he came unto the sea of Galilee , through the midst of the coasts of Decapolis .
text2: Yesuusi Xiiroosa biittaappe kiyidi , Sidoonaaranne Tammu Katamaa giyo biittaara kanttidi , Galiila Abbaakko biis .

text: And they bring unto him one that was deaf , and had an impediment in his speech ; and they beseech him to put his hand upon him .
text2: Asai tullenne duude gidida bitaniyaa Yesuusakko ehiidi , ba kushiyaa a bolli wottana mala , Yesuusa woossiis .

text: And he took him aside from the multitude , and put his fingers into his ears , and he spit , and touched his tongue ;
text2: Yesuusi barkka he bitaniyaa daro asaappe gaxaa kessidi , ba biradhdhiyaa a haittan yeddiis ; qassi cuchchaa cuchchidi , a inxxarssaa bochchiis .

text: And looking up to heaven , he sighed , and saith unto him , Ephphatha , that is , Be opened .
text2: Bochchidi saluwaa pude xeellidi , tookki shemppidi , “ Efttah ” yaagiis ; hegaa giyoogee dooyetta giyoogaa .

text: And straightway his ears were opened , and the string of his tongue was loosed , and he spake plain .
text2: Bitaniyaa haittai sohuwaara dooyetti aggiis ; qassi a dooqettida inxxarssaikka birshshetti aggiis ; bitanee ainne waayettennan haasayi bayiis .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man : but the more he charged them , so much the more a great deal they published it ;
text2: Yesuusi asa ubbaa , “ Hagaa ooyyoonne odoppite ” yaagidi odiis ; shin i keehi mintti odin , asai qassi oduwaa yaa darissiis .

text: And were beyond measure astonished , saying , He hath done all things well : he maketh both the deaf to hear , and the dumb to speak .
text2: Hegaa siyida asai ubbai daro garamettidi , “ Ubbabaakka i loitti oottees . Harai atto tulliyaakka sissees ; qassi duudiyaakka haasayissees ” yaagiis .

text: In those days the multitude being very great , and having nothing to eat , Jesus called his disciples unto him , and saith unto them ,
text2: Amarida wodiyaappe guyyiyan , daro asai qassi Yesuusakko shiiqiis ; asaayyo miyoobi xayin , Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata baakko xeesidi yaagiis ;

text: I have compassion on the multitude , because they have now been with me three days , and have nothing to eat :
text2: “ Ha daro asai tanaara heezzu gallassi gakkanaassi gam77idi , miyoobaa ainne demmibeenna gishshau , taani asau qarettais .

text: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses , they will faint by the way : for divers of them came from far .
text2: Taani asaa namisaara soo yeddikko , asai biiddi , ogiyan daafuridi kunddana ; aissi giikko , issoi issoi haahosaappe yiis ” yaagiis .

text: And his disciples answered him , From whence can a man satisfy these men with bread here in the wilderness ?
text2: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati zaaridi Yesuusa , “ Ha bazzuwan ha asa ubbaa mizanau gidiya oitta demmanau danddayiyai oonee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And he asked them , How many loaves have ye ? And they said , Seven .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi eta , “ Inttessi aappun oittai de7ii ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Eti , “ Laappun oittai de7ees ” yaagidosona .

text: And he commanded the people to sit down on the ground : and he took the seven loaves , and gave thanks , and brake , and gave to his disciples to set before them ; and they did set them before the people .
text2: Yesuusi daro asaa , “ Sa7an uttite ” yaagidi azaziis ; qassi laappun oittaa ekkidi , Xoossaa galatiis ; galatidi he oittaa menttidi , asaayyo gishana mala , ba erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo immiis . Erissiyo ashkkarati he daro asaassi gishidosona .

text: And they had a few small fishes : and he blessed , and commanded to set them also before them .
text2: Etayyo qassikka amarida suuppa moleti de7oosona ; Yesuusi hegeetuyyookka Xoossaa galatidi , asau gishana mala , erissiyo ashkkarata azaziis .

text: So they did eat , and were filled : and they took up of the broken meat that was left seven baskets .
text2: Asai ubbai miidi kalliis ; asai miishin attida xarzzai laappun samppaa kumidaagaa erissiyo ashkkarati denttidosona .

text: And they that had eaten were about four thousand : and he sent them away .
text2: Qumaa miida asai oiddu sha7aa gidana ; hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi asaa yeddiis .

text: And straightway he entered into a ship with his disciples , and came into the parts of Dalmanutha .
text2: I qassi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura sohuwaara wolwoluwan gelidi , Dalmmanuta giyo biitti biis .

text: And the Pharisees came forth , and began to question with him , seeking of him a sign from heaven , tempting him .
text2: Parisaaweti yiidi , Yesuusa paaccanau eqqidi , saluwaappe malaataa banttana bessana mala , Yesuusaara palamaa doommidosona .

text: And he sighed deeply in his spirit , and saith , Why doth this generation seek after a sign ? verily I say unto you , There shall no sign be given unto this generation .
text2: Yesuusi keehi tookki shemppidi , “ Ha wodiyaa asai aissi malaata koyii ? Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; ha wodiyaa asau malaati ubbakka imettenna ” yaagiis .

text: And he left them , and entering into the ship again departed to the other side .
text2: Qassi eta hegan yeggi bayidi , naa77anttuwaa wolwoluwan gelidi , abbaappe hefintti pinniis .

text: Now the disciples had forgotten to take bread , neither had they in the ship with them more than one loaf .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati qumaa efaanaagaa dogidosona ; etau wolwoluwaa giddon issi oittappe hari baawa .

text: And he charged them , saying , Take heed , beware of the leaven of the Pharisees , and of the leaven of Herod .
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Inttena erite ; Parisaawetu irshshuwaappenne Heeroodisa irshshuwaappe naagettite ” yaagidi azaziis .

text: And they reasoned among themselves , saying , It is because we have no bread .
text2: Eti bantta giddon , “ I hagaa giyoogee nuussi qumi bainna gishshaassa ” yaagidi haasayaa doommidosona .

text: And when Jesus knew it , he saith unto them , Why reason ye , because ye have no bread ? perceive ye not yet , neither understand ? have ye your heart yet hardened ?
text2: Yesuusi eti giyoogaa eridi , eta yaagiis ; “ Intteyyo oitti bainnaagaa aissi haasayeetii ? Ha77inne erekketii ? Woi akeekekketii ? Yootin siyekketii ?

text: Having eyes , see ye not ? and having ears , hear ye not ? and do ye not remember ?
text2: Intteyyo aifee de7ees ; be7ekketii ? Qassi haittai de7ees ; siyekketii ? Intteyyo hassayettennee ?

text: When I brake the five loaves among five thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? They say unto him , Twelve .
text2: Taani ichchashu oittaa ichchashu sha7u asau battido wode , aappun samppaa kumida xarzzaa denttidetii ? ” yaagiis . Yaagin eti , “ Tammanne naa77u samppaa kumida xarzzaa denttida ” yaagidosona .

text: And when the seven among four thousand , how many baskets full of fragments took ye up ? And they said , Seven .
text2: “ Taani qassikka laappun oittaa oiddu sha7u asau battido wode , aappun samppaa kumida xarzzaa denttidetii ? ” yaagiis . Yaagin eti , “ Laappun samppaa kumida xarzzaa denttida ” yaagidosona .

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye do not understand ?
text2: I qassi , “ Ha77inne akeekibeekketii ? ” yaagiis .

text: And he cometh to Bethsaida ; and they bring a blind man unto him , and besought him to touch him .
text2: Yesuusinne erissiyo ashkkarati Beetasaida giyo katamaa biidosona ; amarida asati qooqe bitaniyaa Yesuusakko ehiidi , he bitaniyaa bochchana mala , a woossidosona .

text: And he took the blind man by the hand , and led him out of the town ; and when he had spit on his eyes , and put his hands upon him , he asked him if he saw ought .
text2: Yesuusi qooqe bitaniyaa kushiyaa oiqqidi , qeeri katamaappe gaxaa kessiis ; a aifiyan cuchchidi , ba kushiyaa a bolli wottidi , “ Neeyyo aibakko beettii ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: And he looked up , and said , I see men as trees , walking .
text2: Bitanee xeellidi , “ Taani asaa be7ais ; shin asai hemettiiddi , mitta milatees ” yaagiis .

text: After that he put his hands again upon his eyes , and made him look up : and he was restored , and saw every man clearly .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi naa77anttuwaa bitaniyaa aifiyan ba kushiyaa wottin , bitanee loittidi xeelliis ; a aifee paxiis ; qassi ubbabaakka geeshshidi be7iis .

text: And he sent him away to his house , saying , Neither go into the town , nor tell it to any in the town .
text2: Yesuusi bitaniyaa a soo yeddiiddi , “ Harai atto qeeri katamaakka geloppa ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus went out , and his disciples , into the towns of Caesarea Philippi : and by the way he asked his disciples , saying unto them , Whom do men say that I am ?
text2: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura Piliphphoosa - Qiisaariyan de7iya qeeri katamata biis ; biishin ogiyan Yesuusi , “ Tana asai oona gii ? ” yaagidi ba erissiyo ashkkarata oichchiis .

text: And they answered , John the Baptist : but some say , Elias ; and others , One of the prophets .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati , “ Issi issi asai nena , ' Xammaqiya Yohaannisa ' gees ; harati , ' Eelaasa ' goosona ; qassi harati , ' Hananabaa yootiyaageetuppe issuwaa ' goosona ” yaagidosona .

text: And he saith unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? And Peter answereth and saith unto him , Thou art the Christ .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi eta , “ Yaanin intte tana oona geetii ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . PHeexiroosi , “ Neeni Kiristtoosa ” yaagidi zaariis .

text: And he charged them that they should tell no man of him .
text2: Yesuusi , “ Tabaa ooyyoonne odoppite ” yaagidi eta azaziis .

text: And he began to teach them , that the Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders , and of the chief priests , and scribes , and be killed , and after three days rise again .
text2: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Taani , Asa Na7ai , daro waayettanau bessees ; cimati , qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti tana ixxanau bessees ; eti tana woranaunne taani heezzantto gallassappe guyyiyan , haiquwaappe denddanau bessees ” yaagidi tamaarissuwaa doommiis .

text: And he spake that saying openly . And Peter took him , and began to rebuke him .
text2: Hegaa i etayyo geeshshidi odiis ; PHeexiroosi a issi baggi zaaridi , zoretaa doommiis .

text: But when he had turned about and looked on his disciples , he rebuked Peter , saying , Get thee behind me , Satan : for thou savourest not the things that be of God , but the things that be of men .
text2: SHin Yesuusi guyye simmidi , ba erissiyo ashkkarata xeellidi PHeexiroosa , “ Kichcha ta matappe ! Ha Seexaanau , neeni asi dosiyoobaa qoppiyoogaappe attin , Xoossai dosiyoobaa qoppakka ” yaagiis .

text: And when he had called the people unto him with his disciples also , he said unto them , Whosoever will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross , and follow me .
text2: Qassi Yesuusi daro asaanne ba erissiyo ashkkarata baakko xeesidi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Tana kaallana koyiya urai de7ikko , bana yeggi bayo ; yaatidi ba masqqaliyaa tookkidi , tana kaallo .

text: For whosoever will save his life shall lose it ; but whosoever shall lose his life for my sake and the gospel ' s , the same shall save it .
text2: Aissi giikko , ba shemppuwaa ashshana koyiya urai bashshana ; shin ta gishshaunne wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa gishshau ba shemppuwaa bashshiya urai ashshana .

text: For what shall it profit a man , if he shall gain the whole world , and lose his own soul ?
text2: Aissi giikko , issi urai sa7an de7iya ubbabaa bau shiishshidi , ba shemppuwaa bashshikko , a ai maaddanee ?

text: Or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul ?
text2: Issi urai ba shemppuwaa wozanau ai immana danddayii ?

text: Whosoever therefore shall be ashamed of me and of my words in this adulterous and sinful generation ; of him also shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he cometh in the glory of his Father with the holy angels .
text2: Xoossaa ammanenna mala diggiya ha nagaranchcha wodiyan , issi urai tanaaninne ta qaalan yeellatikko , taanikka , Asa Na7ai , qassi ta Aawaa bonchchuwan geeshsha kiitanchchatuura yiyo wode , aani yeellatana ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto them , Verily I say unto you , That there be some of them that stand here , which shall not taste of death , till they have seen the kingdom of God come with power .
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; amarida asati Xoossaa kawotettai wolqqaara yiyaagaa be7ennan haiqqennaageeti hagan de7oosona ” yaagiis .

text: And after six days Jesus taketh with him Peter , and James , and John , and leadeth them up into an high mountain apart by themselves : and he was transfigured before them .
text2: Yesuusi usuppun gallassappe guyyiyan , banaara PHeexiroosa , Yaaqoobanne Yohaannisa ekkidi , eta xalaalaa gita deriyaa bolli kessiis ; kessidi eta sinttan laamettiis ;

text: And his raiment became shining , exceeding white as snow ; so as no fuller on earth can white them .
text2: a maayoikka phooliis ; sa7an maayo meecciya ooninne geeshshanau danddayennaagaa keenaa daro booxxiis .

text: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses : and they were talking with Jesus .
text2: He heezzu erissiyo ashkkarati , Eelaasinne Muusee Yesuusaara haasayiyaageeta be7idosona .

text: And Peter answered and said to Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias .
text2: PHeexiroosi Yesuusa , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , nuuni hagan de7iyoogee nuussi lo77o ; nuuni heezzu zamppata issuwaa neessi , issuwaa Muusessi , qassi issuwaa Eelaasassi zamppayana ” yaagiis . I woigiyaakkonne eribeenna ; aissi giikko , ikko hinkkootikka daro yayyidosona .

text: And there was a cloud that overshadowed them : and a voice came out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , shaarai yiidi eta kammin shaaraappe , “ Hagee taani siiqiyo ta Na7aa ; i giyoogaa siyite ” giya qaalai yiis .

text: And suddenly , when they had looked round about , they saw no man any more , save Jesus only with themselves .
text2: Sohuwaara eti yuushshi aatti xeelliyo wode , Yesuusappe attin , haraa oonanne bantta matan be7ibookkona .

text: And as they came down from the mountain , he charged them that they should tell no man what things they had seen , till the Son of man were risen from the dead .
text2: Eti deriyaappe wodhdhishin , Yesuusi eta , “ Taani , Asa Na7ai , haiquwaappe denddana gakkanaassi , intte be7idobaa ooyyoonne odoppite ” yaagidi azaziis .

text: And they kept that saying with themselves , questioning one with another what the rising from the dead should mean .
text2: I azazidoogaa eti , “ Eeno ” giidi , “ Ha haiquwaappe denddiyoogaa giyoogee woigiyoogee ” yaagidi , bantta giddon haasayettidosona .

text: And they asked him , saying , Why say the scribes that Elias must first come ?
text2: Eti Yesuusa , “ Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti aissi , ' Eelaasi kasetidi yaanau bessees ' giyoonaa ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: And he answered and told them , Elias verily cometh first , and restoreth all things ; and how it is written of the Son of man , that he must suffer many things , and be set at nought .
text2: I zaaridi yaagiis ; “ Eelaasi kaseti yiidi , ubbabaa giigissees ; yaatin , aissi Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Asa Na7ai daro waayettananne ixettana ' yaagii ?

text: But I say unto you , That Elias is indeed come , and they have done unto him whatsoever they listed , as it is written of him .
text2: SHin taani intteyyo odais ; Eelaasi yiis ; qassi abai Xoossaa maxaafan xaafettidoogaadankka , asai a ba koyidobaa oottiis ” yaagiis .

text: And when he came to his disciples , he saw a great multitude about them , and the scribes questioning with them .
text2: Yesuusi , PHeexiroosi , Yaaqoobinne Yohaannisi hinkko erissiyo ashkkaratukko simmidi yiyo wode , daro asai eta yuuyi aadhdhi eqqidaagaanne higgiyaa tamaarissiya amarida asati etaara palamettiyaageeta be7idosona .

text: And straightway all the people , when they beheld him , were greatly amazed , and running to him saluted him .
text2: He daro asai Yesuusa be7ido wode dagammidi , sohuwaara akko woxxi yiidi , a sarotiis .

text: And he asked the scribes , What question ye with them ?
text2: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Etaara ai palametteetii ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: And one of the multitude answered and said , Master , I have brought unto thee my son , which hath a dumb spirit ;
text2: He daro asaa giddoppe issi bitanee zaaridi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , ta na7aa bolli haasayaa diggiya iita ayyaanai de7iyo gishshau , a neekko ekkada yaas .

text: And wheresoever he taketh him , he teareth him : and he foameth , and gnasheth with his teeth , and pineth away : and I spake to thy disciples that they should cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Ha iita ayyaanai a oiqqiyo wode ubban , a ooggees ; a doonaarakka hoommoi goppattees ; qassi achchaa garccissees ; bollaakka zoxissees . Appe ha iita ayyaanaa kessana mala , ne erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo odaas , shin kessanau danddayibookkona ” yaagiis .

text: He answereth him , and saith , O faithless generation , how long shall I be with you ? how long shall I suffer you ? bring him unto me .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi eta , “ Ammanenna ha wodiyaa asau ! Taani inttenaara aude gakkanaassi de7anee ? Qassi inttebaa aude gakkanaassi danddayanee ? Na7aa taakko haa ekki yiite ” yaagiis .

text: And they brought him unto him : and when he saw him , straightway the spirit tare him ; and he fell on the ground , and wallowed foaming .
text2: Yaagin eti na7aa akko ehiidosona ; he iita ayyaanai Yesuusa be7idosaarakka na7aa kokkorssi bayiis ; na7ai sa7an kunddidi , doonaara hoommoi goppu giishin gonddorettiis .

text: And he asked his father , How long is it ago since this came unto him ? And he said , Of a child .
text2: Yesuusi he na7aa aawaa , “ Hagee ne na7aa oiqqoosappe woqqa wode gidanee ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Oichchin , na7aa aawai , “ I guuttan de7iyo wodeesappe doommiis .

text: And ofttimes it hath cast him into the fire , and into the waters , to destroy him : but if thou canst do any thing , have compassion on us , and help us .
text2: A woranau daro wode tamaaninne haattan oliis ; shin neeni danddayikko , nuuyyo qarettada nuna maaddarkkii ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus said unto him , If thou canst believe , all things are possible to him that believeth .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi a , “ ' Neeni danddayikko ' gai ? Ammaniya asayyo ubbabai danddayettees ” yaagiis .

text: And straightway the father of the child cried out , and said with tears , Lord , I believe ; help thou mine unbelief .
text2: Sohuwaara na7aa aawai ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Taani ammanais ; shin gujja ammananaadan , tana maaddarkkii ” yaagiis .

text: When Jesus saw that the people came running together , he rebuked the foul spirit , saying unto him , Thou dumb and deaf spirit , I charge thee , come out of him , and enter no more into him .
text2: Yesuusi asai dari dari biyoogaa be7idi , iita ayyaanaa , “ Ha tullenne duude ayyaanau , ha na7aappe kiya gaada nena ta azazais ; qassi naa77anttuwaa aani geloppa ” yaagiis .

text: And the spirit cried , and rent him sore , and came out of him : and he was as one dead ; insomuch that many said , He is dead .
text2: He iita ayyaanai waassidi , na7aa keehi kokkorssidi , appe kiyiis . Na7ai haiqqidabaa milatin , daro asai , “ Na7ai haiqqiis ” yaagiis .

text: But Jesus took him by the hand , and lifted him up ; and he arose .
text2: SHin Yesuusi na7aa kushiyaa oiqqidi denttin , na7ai denddi eqqiis .

text: And when he was come into the house , his disciples asked him privately , Why could not we cast him out ?
text2: Yesuusi soo gelidoogaappe guyyiyan , erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusa dumma , “ Nuuni he iita ayyaanaa kessanau aissi danddayibookkonii ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: And he said unto them , This kind can come forth by nothing , but by prayer and fasting .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Hegaa malai woosappenne xoomappe attin , haraban kiyanau danddayenna ” yaagiis .

text: And they departed thence , and passed through Galilee ; and he would not that any man should know it .
text2: Eti hegaappe denddidi , Galiilaara aadhdhidi biidosona ; Yesuusi ba de7iyoosaa ooninne erana mala koyibeenna .

text: For he taught his disciples , and said unto them , The Son of man is delivered into the hands of men , and they shall kill him ; and after that he is killed , he shall rise the third day .
text2: Aissi giikko , i ba erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Tana , Asa Na7aa , asi asau aattidi immananne worana ; taani qassi heezzu gallassappe guyyiyan , naa77anttuwaa haiquwaappe denddana ” yaagidi tamaarissees .

text: But they understood not that saying , and were afraid to ask him .
text2: SHin etau i giyoogee gelibeenna ; qassi a oichchanaukka yayyidosona .

text: And he came to Capernaum : and being in the house he asked them , What was it that ye disputed among yourselves by the way ?
text2: Eti Qifirinaahooma giyo katamaa biidosona ; biidi soo gelidoogaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi eta , “ Ogiyan ai haasayeetii ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: But they held their peace : for by the way they had disputed among themselves , who should be the greatest .
text2: SHin eti biidi ogiyan , “ Nu giddon nu ubbaappe aadhdhiyaagee oonee ? ” yaagidi palamettido gishshau , co77u giidosona .

text: And he sat down , and called the twelve , and saith unto them , If any man desire to be first , the same shall be last of all , and servant of all .
text2: Yesuusi uttidi , tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata xeesidi eta , “ Ooninne sinttau aadhdhana koyikko , ubbaappe guyye aadhdhidi , he ubbau ashkkara gidanau bessees ” yaagiis .

text: And he took a child , and set him in the midst of them : and when he had taken him in his arms , he said unto them ,
text2: Issi guutta na7aa oiqqidi , eta giddon essiis ; he guutta na7aa qoommidi eta ,

text: Whosoever shall receive one of such children in my name , receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me , receiveth not me , but him that sent me .
text2: “ Hageetu mala guutta naatuppe issuwaa ta sunttan mokkiya ooninne tana mokkees ; qassi tana mokkiya ooninne tana kiittidaagaa mokkiyoogaappe attin , ta xalaalaa mokkenna ” yaagiis .

text: And John answered him , saying , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name , and he followeth not us : and we forbad him , because he followeth not us .
text2: Yohaannisi a , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , issi asi ne sunttan xalaheta kessiyaagaa nuuni be7idi , nu bagga gidenna gishshau , a diggida ” yaagiis .

text: But Jesus said , Forbid him not : for there is no man which shall do a miracle in my name , that can lightly speak evil of me .
text2: SHin Yesuusi yaagiis ; “ Ooninne ta sunttan Xoossai oottiyo malaataa oottidi , sohuwaara ta bolli iitabaa haasayanau danddayiyaabi bainna gishshau diggoppite ;

text: For he that is not against us is on our part .
text2: aissi giikko , nubaa ixxenna urai nu bagga .

text: For whosoever shall give you a cup of water to drink in my name , because ye belong to Christ , verily I say unto you , he shall not lose his reward .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; intte taageeta Kiristtoosaageeta gidiyo gishshau , ooninne intteyyo ta sunttan bule haatta uyanau immikkokka , ba woituwaa ekkana .

text: And whosoever shall offend one of these little ones that believe in me , it is better for him that a millstone were hanged about his neck , and he were cast into the sea .
text2: “ Tana ammaniya ha guuttatuppe issuwaa balettiya oonanne , gaacciyo wogga woxaa a qooriyan qachchidi , abban a oliyoogee au keha .

text: And if thy hand offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter into life maimed , than having two hands to go into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Ne kushee nena balettikko , qanxxa ola ; neeni naa77u kushiyaara guxunee mule haiqqennasaanne qassi mulekka to77enna Gaannabiyaa taman geliyoogaappe , duuxa kushiyaara de7uwaa geliyoogee neeyyo keha .

text: And if thy foot offend thee , cut it off : it is better for thee to enter halt into life , than having two feet to be cast into hell , into the fire that never shall be quenched :
text2: Ne tohoi nena balettikko , qanxxa ola ; neeni naa77u tohuwaara guxunee mule haiqqennasan , qassi mulekka to77enna Gaannabiyaa taman yegettiyoogaappe , wobbe gidada de7uwaa geliyoogee neeyyo keha .

text: And if thine eye offend thee , pluck it out : it is better for thee to enter into the kingdom of God with one eye , than having two eyes to be cast into hell fire :
text2: Ne aifee nena balettikko , wooca ola ; neeni naa77u aifiyaara guxunee mule haiqqennasan qassi mulekka to77enna Gaannabiyaa taman yegettiyoogaappe , issi aifiyaara Xoossaa kawotettaa geliyoogee neeyyo keha .

text: For every one shall be salted with fire , and every sacrifice shall be salted with salt .
text2: “ Aissi giikko , quman maxiniyaa yeggiyoogaadan , tamai asa ubbaa bolli yegettana .

text: Salt is good : but if the salt have lost his saltness , wherewith will ye season it ? Have salt in yourselves , and have peace one with another .
text2: Maxinee lo77o ; shin i mal77ana xayikko , zaaridi a waati mal77ettuuteetii ? Inttenan maxinee de7o ; yaatidi issoi issuwaara sarotettan de7ite ” yaagiis .

text: And he arose from thence , and cometh into the coasts of Judaea by the farther side of Jordan : and the people resort unto him again ; and , as he was wont , he taught them again .
text2: Yesuusi hegaappe denddidi , Yihudaa biitti biis ; biidi Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa pinniis . Daro asai naa77anttuwaa akko shiiqin , kaseegaadankka he asaa tamaarissuwaa doommiis .

text: And the Pharisees came to him , and asked him , Is it lawful for a man to put away his wife ? tempting him .
text2: Issi issi Parisaaweti paaccanau Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Issi asi ba machchiyo yeddanau nu higgee azazii ? ” yaagidi a oichchidosona .

text: And he answered and said unto them , What did Moses command you ?
text2: Oichchin i zaaridi , “ Muusee inttena woigi azazidee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And they said , Moses suffered to write a bill of divorcement , and to put her away .
text2: Eti , “ Muusee , ' Issi asi ba machcheeyyo paramaa immidi yeddo ' giis ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , For the hardness of your heart he wrote you this precept .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Intte yootin siyennaageeta gidiyo gishshau , Muusee ha azazuwaa intteyyo xaafiis .

text: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female .
text2: SHin Xoossai koiro medhdhiyo wode , attumaasanne maccaasa oottidi , eta medhdhiis .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and cleave to his wife ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , issi asi ba aawaanne ba aayyiyo aggi bayidi , ba machcheera issippe de7ees ;

text: And they twain shall be one flesh : so then they are no more twain , but one flesh .
text2: eti naa77ai issi asa gidoosona ; hegaa gishshau , eti issi asa gidiyoogaappe attin , naa77u asa gidokkona .

text: What therefore God hath joined together , let not man put asunder .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Xoossai issippe gattidoogaa asi shaakkoppo ” yaagiis .

text: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter .
text2: Eti soo simmido wode , erissiyo ashkkarati ha yohuwaabaa Yesuusa naa77anttuwaa oichchidosona .

text: And he saith unto them , Whosoever shall put away his wife , and marry another , committeth adultery against her .
text2: Yesuusi eta yaagiis ; “ Ba machchiyo yeddidi , haranniyo ekkiya urai ooninne ba machchen shaaramuxees .

text: And if a woman shall put away her husband , and be married to another , she committeth adultery .
text2: Qassi maccaarakka ba azinaappe kiyada hara azinaa gelikko shaaramuxausu ” yaagiis .

text: And they brought young children to him , that he should touch them : and his disciples rebuked those that brought them .
text2: Yesuusi guutta naata bochchana mala , issi issi asai naata akko ehees ; shin erissiyo ashkkarati he asaa hanqqettidosona .

text: But when Jesus saw it , he was much displeased , and said unto them , Suffer the little children to come unto me , and forbid them not : for of such is the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa be7idi , ba erissiyo ashkkarata hanqqettiis ; eta , “ Guutta naati taakko yiyoogaa diggoppite ; aissi giikko , Xoossaa kawotettai hageetu malaassa .

text: Verily I say unto you , Whosoever shall not receive the kingdom of God as a little child , he shall not enter therein .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; Xoossaa kawotettaa guutta na7adan ekkenna urai ooninne he kawotettaa mulekka gelenna ” yaagiis .

text: And he took them up in his arms , put his hands upon them , and blessed them .
text2: Yaagidi guutta naata qoommidi , ba kushiyaa eta bolli huuphiyan huuphiyan wottidi , eta anjjiis .

text: And when he was gone forth into the way , there came one running , and kneeled to him , and asked him , Good Master , what shall I do that I may inherit eternal life ?
text2: Yesuusi baanau kiyido wode , issi bitanee woxxiiddi yiidi , a sinttan gulbbatidi , “ Lo77o tamaarissiyaagoo , merinaa de7uwaa laattanau taani ai oottoo ? ” yaagidi a oichchiis .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Why callest thou me good ? there is none good but one , that is , God .
text2: Oichchin Yesuusi , “ Aissi tana lo77uwau gai ? Xoossaa xalaalaappe attin , hara lo77oi ooninne baawa .

text: Thou knowest the commandments , Do not commit adultery , Do not kill , Do not steal , Do not bear false witness , Defraud not , Honour thy father and mother .
text2: Xoossaa azazuwaa , ' Woroppa ; shaaramuxoppa ; wuuqqoppa ; wordduwaa markkattoppa ; cimmoppa ; ne aawaanne ne aayyiyo bonchcha ' yaagiyaagaa eraasa ” yaagiis .

text: And he answered and said unto him , Master , all these have I observed from my youth .
text2: Bitanee Yesuusa , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , taani hegaa ubbaa naatettaasappe doommada ha77i gakkanaassikka naagais ” yaagiis .

text: Then Jesus beholding him loved him , and said unto him , One thing thou lackest : go thy way , sell whatsoever thou hast , and give to the poor , and thou shalt have treasure in heaven : and come , take up the cross , and follow me .
text2: Yesuusi bitaniyaa dosiis ; tishshi ootti xeellidi , “ Neeyyo issibai paccees ; baada neeyyo de7iyaabaa ubbaa baizzada , he miishshaa hiyyeesau imma ; neeni saluwan duretana . Yaatada yaada tana kaalla ” yaagiis .

text: And he was sad at that saying , and went away grieved : for he had great possessions .
text2: SHin bitanee hegaa siyidi , i daro dure gidiyo gishshau , ba som77uwaa xumissidi , ufaittennan aggi bayidi biis .

text: And Jesus looked round about , and saith unto his disciples , How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata yuushshi aatti xeellidi , “ Daro dure asi Xoossaa kawotettaa gelanaagee waani metanddeeshsha ! ” yaagiis .

text: And the disciples were astonished at his words . But Jesus answereth again , and saith unto them , Children , how hard is it for them that trust in riches to enter into the kingdom of God !
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati a haasayaa siyidi garamettidosona ; shin Yesuusi qassikka eta , “ Naatoo , miishshan ammanettiya asatuyyo Xoossaa kawotettaa gelanaagee woqqaa metanddeeshsha !

text: It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle , than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Dure asi Xoossaa kawotettaa gelanaagaappe , gaameelai marppiyaa xoo7iyaara aadhdhanaagee matattees ” yaagiis .

text: And they were astonished out of measure , saying among themselves , Who then can be saved ?
text2: Yaagin erissiyo ashkkarati garamettidi , “ Yaatin , ooni attanau danddayii ? ” yaagidi issoi issuwaa oichchidosona .

text: And Jesus looking upon them saith , With men it is impossible , but not with God : for with God all things are possible .
text2: Yesuusi eta tishshi ootti xeellidi , “ Hagee Xoossau danddayettiyoogaappe attin , asau danddayettenna ; aissi giikko , Xoossau ubbabaikka danddayettees ” yaagiis .

text: Then Peter began to say unto him , Lo , we have left all , and have followed thee .
text2: PHeexiroosi Yesuusa , “ Be7a ; nuuni nubaa ubbaa aggi bayidi , nena kaallida ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Verily I say unto you , There is no man that hath left house , or brethren , or sisters , or father , or mother , or wife , or children , or lands , for my sake , and the gospel ' s ,
text2: Yesuusi yaagiis ; “ Taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; ta gishshaunne wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa gishshau , keettaa woi ishantta woi michchentta , woi aawaa woi aayyiyo woi machchiyo , woi naata woi gadiyaa aggida asi ooninne ,

text: But he shall receive an hundredfold now in this time , houses , and brethren , and sisters , and mothers , and children , and lands , with persecutions ; and in the world to come eternal life .
text2: ha77i ha wodiyan xeetutooppe dariya keettata , ishantta , michchentta , aayeta , naata , gadiyaa , qassi waayiyaakka ekkana . Sinttappe yaana wodiyankka merinaa de7uwaa ekkana .

text: But many that are first shall be last ; and the last first .
text2: SHin daroti ha77i sinttan de7iyaageeti guyye aadhdhana ; qassi daroti ha77i guyyen de7iyaageeti sinttau aadhdhana ” yaagiis .

text: And they were in the way going up to Jerusalem ; and Jesus went before them : and they were amazed ; and as they followed , they were afraid . And he took again the twelve , and began to tell them what things should happen unto him ,
text2: Eti Yerusalaame biiddi , ogiyan de7oosona ; Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuppe sinttan hemettees . Eti garamettidosona ; a kaallidaageetikka yayyidosona . Naa77anttuwaa tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata gaxaa kessidi , bana gakkanabaa dumma etassi hagaadan yaagidi odiis ;

text: Saying , Behold , we go up to Jerusalem ; and the Son of man shall be delivered unto the chief priests , and unto the scribes ; and they shall condemn him to death , and shall deliver him to the Gentiles :
text2: “ Be7ite ; nuuni Yerusalaame ha77i kiyeettees ; yaani tana , Asa Na7aa , qeese halaqatussinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetussi aattidi immana . Eti ta bolli haiqo pirddaa pirddana ; qassi Aihuda gidenna asaassikka tana aattidi immana .

text: And they shall mock him , and shall scourge him , and shall spit upon him , and shall kill him : and the third day he shall rise again .
text2: He Aihuda gidenna asai ta bolli qilliiccananne cuchchana ; tana lissuwan garafananne worana ; taani qassi heezzu gallassappe guyyiyan , haiquwaappe denddana ” yaagiis .

text: And James and John , the sons of Zebedee , come unto him , saying , Master , we would that thou shouldest do for us whatsoever we shall desire .
text2: Zabddiyoosa naati Yaaqoobinne Yohaannisi Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , nuuni nena woossiyo ubbabaa nuuyyo oottarkkii ” yaagidosona .

text: And he said unto them , What would ye that I should do for you ?
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Taani intteyyo ai oottoo ? ” yaagiis .

text: They said unto him , Grant unto us that we may sit , one on thy right hand , and the other on thy left hand , in thy glory .
text2: Yaagin eti a , “ Ne bonchcho kawotettan neeni uttiyo wode , nuuppe issuwaa neeppe ushachcha baggaara qassi issuwaa haddirssa baggaara utissarkkii ” yaagidosona .

text: But Jesus said unto them , Ye know not what ye ask : can ye drink of the cup that I drink of ? and be baptized with the baptism that I am baptized with ?
text2: SHin Yesuusi eta , “ Intte ai woossiyaakkonne erekketa ; taani uyanau bessiyo burccukkuwan uyanau danddayeetii ? Qassi taani xammaqettanau bessiyo xinqqatiyaa xammaqettanau danddayeetii ? ” yaagiis .

text: And they said unto him , We can . And Jesus said unto them , Ye shall indeed drink of the cup that I drink of ; and with the baptism that I am baptized withal shall ye be baptized :
text2: Yaagin eti zaaridi , “ Ee danddayoos ” yaagidosona . Yesuusi qassi , “ Taani uyanau bessiyo burccukkuwan intte uyana ; taani xammaqettanau bessiyo xinqqatiyaakka intte xammaqettana .

text: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give ; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared .
text2: SHin taappe ushachcha baggaaranne haddirssa baggaara uttanaageeta dooranau taayyo maati baawa ; shin he sohoi Xoossai immanau giigissi wottidoogeetussa ” yaagiis .

text: And when the ten heard it , they began to be much displeased with James and John .
text2: Hankko tammu erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa siyido wode , Yaaqoobanne Yohaannisa hanqqettidosona .

text: But Jesus called them to him , and saith unto them , Ye know that they which are accounted to rule over the Gentiles exercise lordship over them ; and their great ones exercise authority upon them .
text2: Yesuusi eta ubbaa baakko xeesidi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ ' Aihuda gidennaageeta haariyaageeta ' giidi qoppiyoogeetinne hegeeta kaalettiya asati bantta asaa haariyoogaa ereeta .

text: But so shall it not be among you : but whosoever will be great among you , shall be your minister :
text2: SHin intte giddon hegaa mala gidenna ; intte giddon gitatana koyiyai ooninne intteyyo ashkkara gidanau bessees .

text: And whosoever of you will be the chiefest , shall be servant of all .
text2: Qassi intte giddon ubbaappe bolla gidana koyiyai ooninne intte ubbaayyo aille gidanau bessees .

text: For even the Son of man came not to be ministered unto , but to minister , and to give his life a ransom for many .
text2: Aissi giikko , harai atto taani , Asa Na7aikka , asau oottanaunne darota wozanau ta shemppuwaa immanaunne yiidoogaappe attin , asi tau oottanau yabeikke ” yaagiis .

text: And they came to Jericho : and as he went out of Jericho with his disciples and a great number of people , blind Bartimaeus , the son of Timaeus , sat by the highway side begging .
text2: Eti Yarkko giyo katamaa biidosona ; Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuuranne keehi daro asaara Yarkkoppe kiyishin , Ximoosa na7ai qooqee , Barxximoosa giyoogee , ogiyaa doonan woossiiddi uttiis .

text: And when he heard that it was Jesus of Nazareth , he began to cry out , and say , Jesus , thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Barxximoosi Naazireeta Yesuusa gididoogaa siyidi , ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Daawita na7aa Yesuusaa , tana maararkkii ! ” yaagettaa doommiis .

text: And many charged him that he should hold his peace : but he cried the more a great deal , Thou Son of David , have mercy on me .
text2: Daro asai a , “ Haizza ! ” giidi hanqqettiis . SHin , i ba qaalaa kaseegaappekka keehi xoqqu oottidi , “ Daawita na7au , tana maararkkii ! ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus stood still , and commanded him to be called . And they call the blind man , saying unto him , Be of good comfort , rise ; he calleth thee .
text2: Yesuusi ogiyan eqqidi , “ A haa xeesite ” yaagiis . Yaagin eti qooqiyaa , “ Aikko baawa ; dendda eqqa ; nena xeesees ” yaagidi xeesidosona .

text: And he , casting away his garment , rose , and came to Jesus .
text2: Qooqee ba maayuwaa oli bayidi , guppi denddi eqqidi , Yesuusakko biis .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , What wilt thou that I should do unto thee ? The blind man said unto him , Lord , that I might receive my sight .
text2: Yesuusi a , “ Taani neeyyo ai oottanau koyai ? ” yaagiis . Yaagin qooqee , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , taani xeellanaagaa koyais ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Go thy way ; thy faith hath made thee whole . And immediately he received his sight , and followed Jesus in the way .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi a , “ Ba ; ne ammanoi nena pattiis ” yaagiis . Sohuwaarakka a aifee xeelli aggin , ogiyan Yesuusa kaalli bayiis .

text: And when they came nigh to Jerusalem , unto Bethphage and Bethany , at the mount of Olives , he sendeth forth two of his disciples ,
text2: Eti Yerusalaame matiiddi , Dabira Zaite Deriyaa lanqqiyan de7iya Beetafaaganne Biitaaniyaa giyo katamata gakkidosona ; Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuppe naa77aa sinttau kiittidi ,

text: And saith unto them , Go your way into the village over against you : and as soon as ye be entered into it , ye shall find a colt tied , whereon never man sat ; loose him , and bring him .
text2: “ Intteppe sinttan de7iya qeeri katamaa biite ; biidi yaa gelosaara ooninne mulekka toggibeenna qashuwan de7iya hare maraa intte demmana ; a birshshidi , haa ekkidi yiite .

text: And if any man say unto you , Why do ye this ? say ye that the Lord hath need of him ; and straightway he will send him hither .
text2: Ooninne inttena , ' Hegaa aissi ootteetii ? ' yaagidi oichchikko , ' Godai hagaa koyees ; sohuwaara zaaridi , haa yeddi bayana ' yaagite ” yaagiis .

text: And they went their way , and found the colt tied by the door without in a place where two ways met ; and they loose him .
text2: Eti biidi , hare maraa penggiyaa matan ogiyan qachchi wottidoogaa demmidi birshshidosona .

text: And certain of them that stood there said unto them , What do ye , loosing the colt ?
text2: Hegan eqqida issi issi asati eta , “ Hare maraa waatanau birshsheetii ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And they said unto them even as Jesus had commanded : and they let them go .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusi banttana azazidoogaa yootin , asati yeddi bayidosona .

text: And they brought the colt to Jesus , and cast their garments on him ; and he sat upon him .
text2: Eti hare maraa Yesuusakko ehiidi , bantta maayuwaa a zokkuwan hiixxidosona ; hiixxin Yesuusi he hare maraa toggiis .

text: And many spread their garments in the way : and others cut down branches off the trees , and strawed them in the way .
text2: Daro asai ba maayuwaa ogiyan hiixxiis ; qassi harati mittaa tashiyaa kari karidi , ogiyan hiixxidosona .

text: And they that went before , and they that followed , cried , saying , Hosanna ; Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord :
text2: Yesuusappe sinttaara hemettiya asainne a geeduwaa kaalliya asai ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Xoossai galatetto ! Godaa sunttan yiyaagee anjjettidaagaa .

text: Blessed be the kingdom of our father David , that cometh in the name of the Lord : Hosanna in the highest .
text2: Godaa sunttan yiya nu aawaa Daawita kawotettai anjjettidaagaa . Salo ubbaappe bolla saluwan de7iya Xoossai galatetto ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem , and into the temple : and when he had looked round about upon all things , and now the eventide was come , he went out unto Bethany with the twelve .
text2: Yesuusi Yerusalaame biidi , Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliis ; qassi ubbabaa yuuyi yuuyi xeellidoogaappe guyyiyan , sa7ai qammiyo gishshau , tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuura Biitaaniyaa giyo katamaa biis .

text: And on the morrow , when they were come from Bethany , he was hungry :
text2: Wonttetta gallassi eti Biitaaniyaappe kiyidi biishin , Yesuusi namisettiis .

text: And seeing a fig tree afar off having leaves , he came , if haply he might find any thing thereon : and when he came to it , he found nothing but leaves ; for the time of figs was not yet .
text2: Haahuwan issi balase giyo mittiyo tashiyaa maaya uttidaaro be7idi , geelladan i bolli aifee beettikkonne giidi , be7anau ikko biis ; shin ikko i biyo wode , tashe xalaalaappe attin , ainne aife demmibeenna ; aissi giikko , balasee aifiyo wodee gakkibeenna .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto it , No man eat fruit of thee hereafter for ever . And his disciples heard it .
text2: Yesuusi he balasiyo , “ Neeppe naa77antto merinau asi aife mooppo ” yaagiis . Erissiyo ashkkarati i giyoogaa siyidosona .

text: And they come to Jerusalem : and Jesus went into the temple , and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple , and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers , and the seats of them that sold doves ;
text2: Eti Yerusalaame biidosona ; Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelidi , hegan baizziyaageetanne shammiyaageeta kare yedetaa doommiis ; qassi miishshaa laammiyaageetu xaraphpheezaanne haraphphiyaa baizziyaageetu oidiyaa aatti yeggidi ,

text: And would not suffer that any man should carry any vessel through the temple .
text2: ooninne aibakko tookkidi , Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddoora aadhdhanaagaa diggiis .

text: And he taught , saying unto them , Is it not written , My house shall be called of all nations the house of prayer ? but ye have made it a den of thieves .
text2: Yesuusi asaa hagaadan yaagidi tamaarissiis ; “ Xoossaa maxaafan , ' Ta keettai Aihuda gidenna asai ubbai Xoossaa woossiyo keetta geetettana ' yaagettidi xaafetti uttiis ; shin intte a panggati qosettiyo gonggolo kessideta ” yaagiis .

text: And the scribes and chief priests heard it , and sought how they might destroy him : for they feared him , because all the people was astonished at his doctrine .
text2: Qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti hegaa siyidi , a xaissana ogiyaa koshshaa doommidosona ; shin keehi daro asai i tamaarissiyoogan garamettiyo gishshau , ayyo yayyidosona .

text: And when even was come , he went out of the city .
text2: Sa7ai omarido wode , Yesuusinne erissiyo ashkkarati katamaappe gaxaa kiyidosona .

text: And in the morning , as they passed by , they saw the fig tree dried up from the roots .
text2: Eti wonttetta gallassi maallado ogiyaara aadhdhiiddi , he balasiyaa xaphuwaara melaichchidaaro be7idosona .

text: And Peter calling to remembrance saith unto him , Master , behold , the fig tree which thou cursedst is withered away .
text2: PHeexiroosi hassayidi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , be7a ; neeni qanggido balasiyaa melaichchaasu ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus answering saith unto them , Have faith in God .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Xoossaa ammanite .

text: For verily I say unto you , That whosoever shall say unto this mountain , Be thou removed , and be thou cast into the sea ; and shall not doubt in his heart , but shall believe that those things which he saith shall come to pass ; he shall have whatsoever he saith .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; ooninne ba wozanan sirennan ba giidobai hananaagaa ammanidi , ha deriyaa , ' Denddada abban kundda ' giikko hanana .

text: Therefore I say unto you , What things soever ye desire , when ye pray , believe that ye receive them , and ye shall have them .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani intteyyo odais ; Xoossaa intte woossiyoobaanne oichchiyoobaa ubbaanne ekkirggidobaadan ammanite ; intte ekkana .

text: And when ye stand praying , forgive , if ye have ought against any : that your Father also which is in heaven may forgive you your trespasses .
text2: Xoossaa woossanau intte eqqiyo wode , saluwan de7iya intte Aawai intte nagaraa atto gaana mala , ooninne inttena naaqqidobai de7ikko , au atto giite .

text: But if ye do not forgive , neither will your Father which is in heaven forgive your trespasses .
text2: SHin asa nagara intte atto gaana xayikko , saluwan de7iya intte Aawaikka intte nagaraa intteyyo atto geenna ” yaagiis .

text: And they come again to Jerusalem : and as he was walking in the temple , there come to him the chief priests , and the scribes , and the elders ,
text2: Eti qassikka Yerusalaame biidosona ; Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyan hemetettishin , qeese halaqati , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne cimati akko yiidosona .

text: And say unto him , By what authority doest thou these things ? and who gave thee this authority to do these things ?
text2: Yiidi a , “ Neeni hagaa oottanau neeyyo ai alaafetetti de7ii ? Woi neeyyo ha alaafetettaa immidai oonee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , I will also ask of you one question , and answer me , and I will tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi eta , “ Taanikka inttena issibaa oichchana ; tau odite ; taani qassi hagaa ai alaafetettan oottiyaakko , intteyyo odana .

text: The baptism of John , was it from heaven , or of men ? answer me .
text2: Yohaannisi xammaqiyo alaafetettaa ekkidoi Xoossaappeeyye woi asappee ? Tau odite ” yaagiis .

text: And they reasoned with themselves , saying , If we shall say , From heaven ; he will say , Why then did ye not believe him ?
text2: Eti bantta giddon palamaa doommidi , “ Nuuni , ' Xoossaappe yiis ' yaagikko , i nuna , ' Yaatin , Yohaannisi yootidoogaa aissi ammanibeekketii ? ' yaagana .
