text: But if we shall say , Of men ; they feared the people : for all men counted John , that he was a prophet indeed .
text2: SHin , ' Asappe yiis gaanee ? ' yaagidosona ; qassi asai ubbai Yohaannisi hananabaa yootiyaagaa gididoogaa eriyo gishshau , asau yayyidosona .

text: And they answered and said unto Jesus , We cannot tell . And Jesus answering saith unto them , Neither do I tell you by what authority I do these things .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , eti Yesuusayyo , “ Nuuni erokko ” yaagidi zaaridosona ; Yesuusi , “ Taanikka hagaa ai alaafetettan oottiyaakko , intteyyo odikke ” yaagiis .

text: And he began to speak unto them by parables . A certain man planted a vineyard , and set an hedge about it , and digged a place for the winefat , and built a tower , and let it out to husbandmen , and went into a far country .
text2: Yesuusi etayyo oduwaa leemisuwan yaagidi doommiis ; “ Issi bitanee woiniyaa giyo turaa tokkidi , dirssaa yuushshi aattidi diriis ; qassi he woiniyaa gum77iyo ollaakka bookkiis ; hegaa naagiya asaayyo adussa shuchchaa gimbbiis ; hegaappe guyyiyan , kottaa oottiya asau immidi , hara dere biis .

text: And at the season he sent to the husbandmen a servant , that he might receive from the husbandmen of the fruit of the vineyard .
text2: Woiniyaa aifiyaa maxiyo wodee gakkin , bana gakkiyaagaa ekkidi yaana mala , issi ashkkaraa ba kottaawatukko kiittiis .

text: And they caught him , and beat him , and sent him away empty .
text2: Kottaa oottiyaageeti a ashkkaraa oiqqidi wadhdhidi , kushe mela yedettidosona .

text: And again he sent unto them another servant ; and at him they cast stones , and wounded him in the head , and sent him away shamefully handled .
text2: Naa77anttuwaa hara ashkkaraa etakko kiittiis ; kiittin eti he ashkkaraassi huuphiyaa qoo7idinne kaushshidi yeddidosona .

text: And again he sent another ; and him they killed , and many others ; beating some , and killing some .
text2: Woiniyaa turaa godai qassikka hara ashkkaraa kiittiis ; he ashkkaraa woridosona ; qassi hara darotakka hegaadan oottidosona ; issuwaa issuwaa wadhdhidi , harata woridosona .

text: Having yet therefore one son , his wellbeloved , he sent him also last unto them , saying , They will reverence my son .
text2: “ Woiniyaa turaa godaayyo kiittanau ubbaappe wurssettan i daro siiqiyo a na7aa xalaalai attiis ; i , ' Eti ta na7aa bonchchennan aggokkona ' giidi , ba na7aa etakko kiittiis .

text: But those husbandmen said among themselves , This is the heir ; come , let us kill him , and the inheritance shall be ours .
text2: “ SHin kottaa oottiyaageeti bantta giddon , ' Laattanaagee hagaa ; hinddite a woroos ; a aqoi nubaa gidana ! ' yaagidosona .

text: And they took him , and killed him , and cast him out of the vineyard .
text2: Na7aa oiqqidi woridi , a ahaa woiniyaa turaa giddoppe gaxaa kessi olidosona .

text: What shall therefore the lord of the vineyard do ? he will come and destroy the husbandmen , and will give the vineyard unto others .
text2: “ Simmi woiniyaa turaa godai waatanee ? Yiidi he kottaawata wori wurssidi , woiniyaa turaa kottaa oottiya hara asau immana .

text: And have ye not read this scripture ; The stone which the builders rejected is become the head of the corner :
text2: “ ' Gimbbiyaageeti karidi ixxido shuchchai godaa xaphuwaa minttiya , ubbaappe aadhdhiya shuchcha gidiis . Hagee Godai oottidobaa ; qassi nu aifiyaukka garamissiyaabaa ' yaagiyaagaa Xoossaa maxaafaappe nabbabibeekketii ? ” yaagiis .

text: And they sought to lay hold on him , but feared the people : for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them : and they left him , and went their way .
text2: Qeese halaqati , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne cimati Yesuusi he leemisuwaa banttanan leemisidoogaa erido gishshau , a oiqqanau koyidosona ; shin asau yayyidi , aggi bayidi biidosona .

text: And they send unto him certain of the Pharisees and of the Herodians , to catch him in his words .
text2: Qassi a haasayaappe bala demmidi , a oiqqana mala , Parisaawetuppenne Heeroodisa baggatuppe amaridaageeta akko kiittidosona .

text: And when they were come , they say unto him , Master , we know that thou art true , and carest for no man : for thou regardest not the person of men , but teachest the way of God in truth : Is it lawful to give tribute to Caesar , or not ?
text2: Kiittin yiidi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , neeni tumaa haasayiyoogaanne asappe asa shaakkennaagaa nuuni eroos ; aissi giikko , neeni asa dummayakka ; qassi Xoossaa ogiyaa tumatettan tamaarissaasa . Nuuni Roome biittaa Kawuwaa Qeesaarayyo giiraa giiriyoogee wogeeyye woga gidennee ? Giiraa giiraneeyye digganee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Shall we give , or shall we not give ? But he , knowing their hypocrisy , said unto them , Why tempt ye me ? bring me a penny , that I may see it .
text2: SHin eti lo77o milatiya iita asa gididoogaa Yesuusi eridi , “ Tana aissi paacceetii ? Issi santtimiyaa haa ehiite ; taani be7ais ” yaagiis .

text: And they brought it . And he saith unto them , Whose is this image and superscription ? And they said unto him , Caesar ' s .
text2: Eti au ehiidosona ; “ Ha merainne sunttai oogee ? ” yaagidi eta oichchidosona . Oichchin eti , “ Roome biittaa Kawuwaa Qeesaaraagaa ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Render to Caesar the things that are Caesar ' s , and to God the things that are God ' s . And they marvelled at him .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi eta , “ Yaatikko , Qeesaaraagaa Qeesaarassi , Xoossaagaa Xoossaassi immite ” yaagin eti abaa garamettidosona .

text: Then come unto him the Sadducees , which say there is no resurrection ; and they asked him , saying ,
text2: Haiqqida asi denddenna giya Saaduqaawetuppe issi issi asati Yesuusakko yiidi , hagaadan yaagidi , a oichchidosona ;

text: Master , Moses wrote unto us , If a man ' s brother die , and leave his wife behind him , and leave no children , that his brother should take his wife , and raise up seed unto his brother .
text2: “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , Muusee nuuyyo higgiyaa xaafiiddi , ' Machcho ekkida asi na7a yelennan haiqqikko , he haiqqidaagaa ishai a machchiyo aissidi , ba ishaayyo na7a yelanau bessees ' yaagiyaagaa xaafiis .

text: Now there were seven brethren : and the first took a wife , and dying left no seed .
text2: Issi wode laappun ishantti de7iyaageetuppe bairai machchiyo ekkidi , na7a yelennan haiqqiis .

text: And the second took her , and died , neither left he any seed : and the third likewise .
text2: Haiqqin naa77anttoi o aissiis ; ikka na7a yelennan haiqqiis ; heezzanttoikka hegaadan haniis .

text: And the seven had her , and left no seed : last of all the woman died also .
text2: Laappunatikka o ekkidi , na7a yelennan haiqqidosona ; ubbaappe guyyiyan , qassi he maccaasiyaa haiqqaasu .

text: In the resurrection therefore , when they shall rise , whose wife shall she be of them ? for the seven had her to wife .
text2: Yaatin , haiqqida asai haiquwaappe denddiyo gallassi , a etappe augaayyo machcho gidanee ? Aissi giikko , laappunatikka o ekkidosona ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Do ye not therefore err , because ye know not the scriptures , neither the power of God ?
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Intte baliyoogee , Xoossaa maxaafatanne Xoossaa wolqqaa intte erenna gishshaassa !

text: For when they shall rise from the dead , they neither marry , nor are given in marriage ; but are as the angels which are in heaven .
text2: Aissi giikko , haiqqida asai haiquwaappe denddiyo gallassi , saluwan de7iya kiitanchchatu mala gidanaagaappe attin , attuma asinne ekkenna ; macca asinne gelenna .

text: And as touching the dead , that they rise : have ye not read in the book of Moses , how in the bush God spake unto him , saying , I am the God of Abraham , and the God of Isaac , and the God of Jacob ?
text2: SHin haiqqidaageetu dendduwaabaa gidikko , Muuse maxaafan xaafettida xaragettiya buuraabaa odiya sohuwan , Xoossai Muusa , ' Taani Abrahaama Xoossaa , Yisaaqa Xoossaa , Yaaqooba Xoossaa ' giidoogaa mulekka nabbabibeekketii ?

text: He is not the God of the dead , but the God of the living : ye therefore do greatly err .
text2: I paxa de7iyaageetu Xoossaa gidiyoogaappe attin , haiqqidaageetu Xoossaa gidenna ; intte keehi balideta ” yaagiis .

text: And one of the scribes came , and having heard them reasoning together , and perceiving that he had answered them well , asked him , Which is the first commandment of all ?
text2: Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuppe issoi eti palamettiyoogaa shiiqidi siyiis ; qassi Yesuusi etayyo loitti zaaridoogaa siyidi , “ Azazo ubbaappe aadhdhiya azazoi augee ? ” yaagidi Yesuusa oichchiis .

text: And Jesus answered him , The first of all the commandments is , Hear , O Israel ; The Lord our God is one Lord :
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , a hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Azazo ubbaappe aadhdhiya azazuwaa siyite ; ' Israa7eela asau , Godai nu Xoossai issi Godaa .

text: And thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy mind , and with all thy strength : this is the first commandment .
text2: Intte Godaa intte Xoossaa intte kumetta wozanaappe , intte kumetta shemppuwaappe , intte kumetta qofaappe , intte kumetta wolqqaappe siiqite ' yaagees .

text: And the second is like , namely this , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself . There is none other commandment greater than these .
text2: Qassi azazo ubbaappe aadhdhiya naa77antto azazoi hagaa ; ' Neeni ne shooruwaa ne huuphedan siiqa ' giyaagaa ; hageetuppe aadhdhiya hara azazoi baawa ” yaagiis .

text: And the scribe said unto him , Well , Master , thou hast said the truth : for there is one God ; and there is none other but he :
text2: Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaagee Yesuusa yaagiis ; “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , tumaa gaadasa ; neeni ' Xoossai issi Xoossaa xalaala . Appe attin , hari baawa ' giidoogee tuma .

text: And to love him with all the heart , and with all the understanding , and with all the soul , and with all the strength , and to love his neighbour as himself , is more than all whole burnt offerings and sacrifices .
text2: Xoossaa kumetta wozanaappe , kumetta qofaappenne kumetta wolqqaappe siiqiyoogeenne qassi ba shooruwaakka ba huuphedan siiqiyoogee , xuuggiyo yarshshuwaappenne hara yarshsho ubbaappe aadhdhees ” yaagiis .

text: And when Jesus saw that he answered discreetly , he said unto him , Thou art not far from the kingdom of God . And no man after that durst ask him any question .
text2: Yesuusi higgiyaa tamaarissiyaagaa zaaroi aadhdhida eranchcha asa zaaro gididoogaa be7idi , “ Neeni Xoossaa kawotettaappe haakkabaakka ” yaagiis ; hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusa harabaa oichchanau ooninne xalibeenna .

text: And Jesus answered and said , while he taught in the temple , How say the scribes that Christ is the Son of David ?
text2: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyan tamaarissiiddi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti Kiristtoosa woigidi Daawita na7a giyoonaa ?

text: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost , The Lord said to my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand , till I make thine enemies thy footstool .
text2: Daawiti bana Geeshsha Ayyaanai haasayissin , ' Godai ta Godaa , “ Taani ne morkketa neeni yedhdha eqqiyoobaa oottana gakkanaassi , hagan taappe ushachcha baggaara utta ” giis ' yaagiis .

text: David therefore himself calleth him Lord ; and whence is he then his son ? And the common people heard him gladly .
text2: Daawiti ba huuphen Kiristtoosa , ' Godaa ' giidi xeesikko , yaatin , Kiristtoosi waanidi , Daawita na7a gidii ? ” yaagiis . Daro asai Yesuusi giyoogaa ufaissan siyiis .

text: And he said unto them in his doctrine , Beware of the scribes , which love to go in long clothing , and love salutations in the marketplaces ,
text2: Yesuusi tamaarissiiddi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuppe naagettite ; eti adussa maayuwaa maayidi yuuyiyoogaanne giyaa sohuwankka asai eta bonchchidi sarotiyoogaa dosoosona .

text: And the chief seats in the synagogues , and the uppermost rooms at feasts :
text2: Eti Aihuda woosa keettatun daro lo77iya oidiyaa dosoosona ; qassi asi banttana imattiyoosankka bonchcho sohuwaa dosoosona .

text: Which devour widows ' houses , and for a pretence make long prayers : these shall receive greater damnation .
text2: Eti am77etu keettaa bonqqidi , banttau lo77o milatanau Xoossaa woosaa adussoosona ; eti ubbaappe aadhdhiya pirddaa ekkana ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus sat over against the treasury , and beheld how the people cast money into the treasury : and many that were rich cast in much .
text2: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyan muxuwaataa yeggiyo saaxiniyaa matan uttidi , asai ba miishshaa he saaxiniyan yeggiyoogaa be7iis ; daro dure asai daro miishshaa he saaxiniyan yeggees .

text: And there came a certain poor widow , and she threw in two mites , which make a farthing .
text2: Issi hiyyeesa am77iyaa yaada , issi santtimiyan laamettiya naa77u bakkannata he saaxiniyan yeggaasu .

text: And he called unto him his disciples , and saith unto them , Verily I say unto you , That this poor widow hath cast more in , than all they which have cast into the treasury :
text2: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata xeesidi , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; muxuwaataa saaxiniyan yeggida asa ubbaappe ha hiyyeesa am77iyaa darissada yeggaasu .

text: For all they did cast in of their abundance ; but she of her want did cast in all that she had , even all her living .
text2: Aissi giikko , harati ubbai banttau palahida miishshaappe yeggidosona ; shin a ba pacaappe , bau de7iya aquwaa muleera imma aggaasu ” yaagiis .

text: And as he went out of the temple , one of his disciples saith unto him , Master , see what manner of stones and what buildings are here !
text2: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaappe kiyishin , erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi a , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , hagee aiba lo77o shuchchakkonne qassi aiba lo77o shuchcha keettakko be7ai ! ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Seest thou these great buildings ? there shall not be left one stone upon another , that shall not be thrown down .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ha gita shuchcha keettata be7ai ? Ha keettatun de7iya issi shuchchinne attennan ubbai qolettana ” yaagiis .

text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple , Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately ,
text2: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaappe hini baggaara Dabira Zaite Deriyaa bolli uttidaashin , PHeexiroosi , Yaaqoobi , Yohaannisinne Inddiraasi banttarkka akko yiidi a ,

text: Tell us , when shall these things be ? and what shall be the sign when all these things shall be fulfilled ?
text2: “ Hegee aude hananaakko , nuuyyo odarkkii ; qassi hegee ubbai polettana wodiyaa erissiya malaatai aiba gidanee ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: And Jesus answering them began to say , Take heed lest any man deceive you :
text2: Yesuusi qassi etayyo hagaadan yaagidi , oduwaa doommiis ; “ Inttena ooninne balettenna mala naagettite .

text: For many shall come in my name , saying , I am Christ ; and shall deceive many .
text2: Daro asati ta sunttan , ' Taani Kiristtoosa ' yaagiiddi yaana ; yiidi daro asaa balettana .

text: And when ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars , be ye not troubled : for such things must needs be ; but the end shall not be yet .
text2: Matan de7iya olaa cenggurssaanne haahuwan de7iya olaa oduwaa intte siyiyo wode , hirggoppite ; hegaa malabai hananau bessees ; shin wurssettai biroona .

text: For nation shall rise against nation , and kingdom against kingdom : and there shall be earthquakes in divers places , and there shall be famines and troubles : these are the beginnings of sorrows .
text2: Aissi giikko , issi biittaa asai hara biittaa asaara olettana ; qassi issi kawotettai hara kawotettaara olettana ; biittaa qaattai ubbasan de7ana ; koshaikka de7ana ; shin hegee koiro leesso mala .

text: But take heed to yourselves : for they shall deliver you up to councils ; and in the synagogues ye shall be beaten : and ye shall be brought before rulers and kings for my sake , for a testimony against them .
text2: “ SHin intte intte huuphen naagettite ; aissi giikko , asi inttena oiqqidi , pirdda keettau aattidi immana ; qassi ba Aihuda woosa keettatunkka inttena lissuwan garafana ; deriyaa haariyaageetu sinttaaninne kawotu sinttan ta gishshau intte markkattanau eqqana .

text: And the gospel must first be published among all nations .
text2: Wonggeliyaa mishiraachchoi koiroora dere ubbau odettiichchanau bessees .

text: But when they shall lead you , and deliver you up , take no thought beforehand what ye shall speak , neither do ye premeditate : but whatsoever shall be given you in that hour , that speak ye : for it is not ye that speak , but the Holy Ghost .
text2: Eti inttena pirdda keettaa ehiyo wodenne aattidi immiyo wode , woigidi haasayanaakkonne koiroora hirggoppite ; he saatiyan Xoossai intteyyo immiyoobaa haasayite . Aissi giikko , Geeshsha Ayyaanai haasayanaappe attin , haasayiyaageeti inttena gidekketa .

text: Now the brother shall betray the brother to death , and the father the son ; and children shall rise up against their parents , and shall cause them to be put to death .
text2: “ Ishai ba ishaa , aawai ba na7aa worissana ; qassi naati bantta aawatu bollinne bantta aayetu bolli denddidi , eta worissana .

text: And ye shall be hated of all men for my name ' s sake : but he that shall endure unto the end , the same shall be saved .
text2: Asai ubbai inttena ta sunttaa gishshau ixxana ; shin wurssettai gakkanaashin gencciyaagee attana .

text: But when ye shall see the abomination of desolation , spoken of by Daniel the prophet , standing where it ought not , ( let him that readeth understand , ) then let them that be in Judaea flee to the mountains :
text2: “ SHin hananabaa yootiya Daaneeli odido bashshaa tunatettai eqqanau bessennasan eqqidaashin intte be7iyo wode , hegee woigiyoogaakko , nabbabiyaagee akeeko ; Yihudaa biittan he wode de7iyaageeti deriyaakko baqatona .

text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house , neither enter therein , to take any thing out of his house :
text2: Keettaa huuphiyan de7iya uraikka issibaa ekkanau duge wodhdhidi , ba soo geloppo .

text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment .
text2: Gaden de7iyaageekka ba maayuwaa ekkanau guyye simmoppo .

text: But woe to them that are with child , and to them that give suck in those days !
text2: He wode shahaara maccaasatuyyoonne xanttiya maccaasatuyyo aayye7ana .

text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter .
text2: SHin hagee ubbai haniyo wodee balggo gidenna mala , Xoossaa woossite ;

text: For in those days shall be affliction , such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time , neither shall be .
text2: aissi giikko , Xoossai sa7aa koiro medhdhoosappe doommidi , ha77i gakkanaassi , mulekka de7ibeenna metoi , qassi hagaappe sinttaukka mule de7enna metoi asaa bolli he wode de7ana .

text: And except that the Lord had shortened those days , no flesh should be saved : but for the elect ' s sake , whom he hath chosen , he hath shortened the days .
text2: Godai he gallassatu qoodaa guuttiyoi bainnaakko , asa gididai ooninne attenna ; shin i ba doorido asatu gishshau , he gallassatu qoodaa guuttiis .

text: And then if any man shall say to you , Lo , here is Christ ; or , lo , he is there ; believe him not :
text2: “ He wode ooninne inttena , ' Be7ite ; Kiristtoosi hagan de7ees ' woi , ' Be7ite ; Kiristtoosi hegan de7ees ' yaagikko , hegaa ammanoppite .

text: For false Christs and false prophets shall rise , and shall shew signs and wonders , to seduce , if it were possible , even the elect .
text2: Aissi giikko , worddanchcha Kiristtoosatinne wordduwaa hananabaa yootiyaageeti denddana ; denddidi banttau danddayettikko , harai atto Xoossai dooridoogeetakka balettanau malaataanne garamissiyaabaa bessana .

text: But take ye heed : behold , I have foretold you all things .
text2: SHin intte naagettite ; taani intteyyo ubbabaa kasetada odaas .

text: But in those days , after that tribulation , the sun shall be darkened , and the moon shall not give her light ,
text2: “ SHin he wode he waayiyaappe guyyiyan , awai xumana ; aginai poo7iyoogaa aggi bayana ;

text: And the stars of heaven shall fall , and the powers that are in heaven shall be shaken .
text2: xoolintteti saluwaappe kunddana ; qassi saluwan de7iya wolqqatikka qaaxettana .

text: And then shall they see the Son of man coming in the clouds with great power and glory .
text2: He wode taani , Asa Na7ai , gita wolqqaaranne bonchchuwaara shaaraa giddoora yiishin , eti be7ana .

text: And then shall he send his angels , and shall gather together his elect from the four winds , from the uttermost part of the earth to the uttermost part of heaven .
text2: He wode taani kiitanchchata sa7aa oiddu zooziyaa kiittana ; kiittada sa7aa gaxaappe saluwaa gaxaa gakkanaashin , Xoossai doorido asaa shiishshana .

text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree ; When her branch is yet tender , and putteth forth leaves , ye know that summer is near :
text2: “ Leemisuwaa balasiyo giyo mitteeppe akeekite ; balasiyaa aaciyo wodenne i tashee bonccottiyo wode , bonee matattidoogaa intte ereeta .

text: So ye in like manner , when ye shall see these things come to pass , know that it is nigh , even at the doors .
text2: Hegaadankka intte he ubbabai haniyoogaa be7iyo wode , i matattidi pengge shiiqidoogaa erite .

text: Verily I say unto you , that this generation shall not pass , till all these things be done .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; ha ubbabai hanana gakkanaassi , ha wodiyaa asai haiqqiichchenna .

text: Heaven and earth shall pass away : but my words shall not pass away .
text2: Saloinne sa7ai aadhdhana ; shin ta qaalai mulekka aadhdhenna .

text: But of that day and that hour knoweth no man , no , not the angels which are in heaven , neither the Son , but the Father .
text2: “ SHin he gallassaanne he saatiyaa Aawaa xalaalaappe attin , harai atto saluwan de7iya kiitanchchata gidin , woi tana Na7aa gidinkka ooninne eriyaabi baawa .

text: Take ye heed , watch and pray : for ye know not when the time is .
text2: He wodee aude gidanaakko , intte erenna gishshau , naagettite ; minnite ; Xoossaa woossite .

text: For the Son of man is as a man taking a far journey , who left his house , and gave authority to his servants , and to every man his work , and commanded the porter to watch .
text2: Ta yuussai ba keettaa aggidi , oge biya bitaniyaa mala ; bitanee ba ashkkaratuyyo huuphen huuphen oosuwaa immidi , eta ba oosuwaayyo alaafe oottiis ; qassi kariyaa naagiyaageekka minttidi naagana mala azaziis .

text: Watch ye therefore : for ye know not when the master of the house cometh , at even , or at midnight , or at the cockcrowing , or in the morning :
text2: “ Hegaa gishshau , minnite ; aissi giikko , keettaawai omarssa gidin , woi qamma bilahe gidin , woi kuttoi waassiyo wode gidin , woi maallado guuraara gidin aude yaanaakko , intte erekketa .

text: Lest coming suddenly he find you sleeping .
text2: Intte akeekennan i yiikko , inttena xiskkidaageeta demmenna mala minnite .

text: And what I say unto you I say unto all , Watch .
text2: Taani intteyyo odiyoogaa asa ubbau odais ; minnite ” yaagiis .

text: After two days was the feast of the passover , and of unleavened bread : and the chief priests and the scribes sought how they might take him by craft , and put him to death .
text2: Paasikaa Baalaa giyoogaa bonchchiyo gallassainne oittaa meettaa bonchchiyo gallassai gakkanau naa77u gallassai attiis ; qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti asi erennan Yesuusa oiqqidi woriyo ogiyaa koyoosona .

text: But they said , Not on the feast day , lest there be an uproar of the people .
text2: “ Asai ooshshaa kessenna mala , Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi hegaa oottokko ” yaagidosona .

text: And being in Bethany in the house of Simon the leper , as he sat at meat , there came a woman having an alabaster box of ointment of spikenard very precious ; and she brake the box , and poured it on his head .
text2: Yesuusi Biitaaniyaa kataman inchchirichchaa harggiya Simoona son qumaa maanau uttidaashin , issi mishiriyaa albbasxxiroosa giyo shuchchaappe oottido bilqqaadiyaa kumida narddoosiyaa giyo daro al77o shittuwaa ekkada yaasu ; yaada he bilqqaadiyaa menttada shittuwaa Yesuusa huuphiyan tigaasu .

text: And there were some that had indignation within themselves , and said , Why was this waste of the ointment made ?
text2: He sohuwan de7iya asaappe issoi issoi hanqqettidi , “ Ha shittuwaa coo mooriyoogee aibissee ? Ha shittuwaa xeetanne ishatamu biraappe dariya waagan baizzidi , miishshaa hiyyeesau immanau danddayettees ” yaagidi bantta giddon haasayoosona ; yaatidi he mishiriyo daro boridosona .

text: And Jesus said , Let her alone ; why trouble ye her ? she hath wrought a good work on me .
text2: SHin Yesuusi hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Ha maccaasiyo ainne gooppite ; o aissi waisseetii ? A tau lo77obaa oottaasu .

text: For ye have the poor with you always , and whensoever ye will ye may do them good : but me ye have not always .
text2: Hiyyeesati ubba wode inttenaara de7oosona ; intte koyido wode audenne eta maaddanau danddayeeta ; shin taani ubba wode inttenaara de7ikke .

text: She hath done what she could : she is come aforehand to anoint my body to the burying .
text2: A ba danddayidoogaa oottaasu ; qassi tana mooguwau giigissanau kasetada shittuwaa tiyaasu .

text: Verily I say unto you , Wheresoever this gospel shall be preached throughout the whole world , this also that she hath done shall be spoken of for a memorial of her .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; sa7a ubban wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa odiyoosan awaanikka , asai o hassayana mala , ha a oottidoogee odettana ” yaagiis .

text: And Judas Iscariot , one of the twelve , went unto the chief priests , to betray him unto them .
text2: Tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi Yihudaa Asqqoroota giyoogee , Yesuusa qeese halaqatuyyo aattidi immanau etakko biis .

text: And when they heard it , they were glad , and promised to give him money . And he sought how he might conveniently betray him .
text2: Eti hegaa siyido wode ufaittidi , “ Nuuni neeyyo miishsha immana ” yaagidosona ; yaagin Yihudai Yesuusa aattidi immanau injjetiya wodiyaa wochchees .

text: And the first day of unleavened bread , when they killed the passover , his disciples said unto him , Where wilt thou that we go and prepare that thou mayest eat the passover ?
text2: Oittaa miyo gallassaa bonchchiyo koiro gallassi , Paasikaa qumaa maanau anqqara dorssaa shukkiyo wode , Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati a , “ Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi neeni maana qumaa nuuni awa biidi giigissanee ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: And he sendeth forth two of his disciples , and saith unto them , Go ye into the city , and there shall meet you a man bearing a pitcher of water : follow him .
text2: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuppe naa77ata hagaadan yaagidi kiittiis ; “ Katamaa biite ; intte biishin , otuwan haattaa tookkida issi bitanee inttenaara gaittana ; a kaallite .

text: And wheresoever he shall go in , say ye to the goodman of the house , The Master saith , Where is the guestchamber , where I shall eat the passover with my disciples ?
text2: I biidi geliyo keettaawaa , ' Tamaarissiyaagee nena , “ Taani ta erissiyo ashkkaratuura Paasikaa qumaa maanau ta imatta kifilee awaanee ? ” yaagees ' yaagite .

text: And he will shew you a large upper room furnished and prepared : there make ready for us .
text2: Keettaawai inttena pooqiyaa bollan de7iya giigi uttida aaho kifiliyaa bessana ; hegan nuuyyo giigissite ” yaagiis .

text: And his disciples went forth , and came into the city , and found as he had said unto them : and they made ready the passover .
text2: He naa77u erissiyo ashkkarati kiyidi , katamaa biidosona ; Yesuusi banttau odidoogaadankka ubbabaa demmidi , Paasikaa qumaa giigissidosona .

text: And in the evening he cometh with the twelve .
text2: Sa7ai omariyo wode Yesuusi tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuura yaa biis .

text: And as they sat and did eat , Jesus said , Verily I say unto you , One of you which eateth with me shall betray me .
text2: Eti uttidi masoofiyaappe qumaa miishin , Yesuusi eta , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; intteppe issoi tanaara miyaagee , tana aattidi immana ” yaagiis .

text: And they began to be sorrowful , and to say unto him one by one , Is it I ? and another said , Is it I ?
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati dagammidi , huuphiyan huuphiyan a , “ Tumu taneeshsha ? ” giyoogaa doommidosona .

text: And he answered and said unto them , It is one of the twelve , that dippeth with me in the dish .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ I ha intte tammanne naa77atuppe issuwaa ; i tanaara issippe tushkkanau ba oittaa shaatiyan yeddiyaagaa .

text: The Son of man indeed goeth , as it is written of him : but woe to that man by whom the Son of man is betrayed ! good were it for that man if he had never been born .
text2: Taani , Asa Na7ai , Xoossaa maxaafai haiqqana giidoogaadan haiqqana ; shin tana , Asa Na7aa , aattidi immiya urau aayye7ana ; he urai yelettennan attiyaakko , au keha shin ” yaagiis .

text: And as they did eat , Jesus took bread , and blessed , and brake it , and gave to them , and said , Take , eat : this is my body .
text2: Eti miishin , Yesuusi oittaa ekkidi , Xoossaa galatiis ; he oittaa menttidi , ba erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo immiiddi , “ Heite ; hagee ta ashuwaa ” yaagiis .

text: And he took the cup , and when he had given thanks , he gave it to them : and they all drank of it .
text2: Burccukkuwaa ekkidi , Xoossaa galatidi , etayyo immiis ; immin ubbaikka he burccukkuwaappe uyidosona .

text: And he said unto them , This is my blood of the new testament , which is shed for many .
text2: Yesuusi , “ Hagee ooratta maachchan daro asaa gishshau gukkiya ta suuttaa .

text: Verily I say unto you , I will drink no more of the fruit of the vine , until that day that I drink it new in the kingdom of God .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; taani Xoossaa kawotettan ooratta woine eessaa uyana gallassai gakkanaassi , naa77anttuwaa ha woine eessaa mulekka uyikke ” yaagiis .

text: And when they had sung an hymn , they went out into the mount of Olives .
text2: Mazamuriyaa yexxidoogaappe guyyiyan , Dabira Zaite Deriyaa biidosona .

text: And Jesus saith unto them , All ye shall be offended because of me this night : for it is written , I will smite the shepherd , and the sheep shall be scattered .
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Intte ubbai tana yeggi bayidi baqatana ; aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Xoossai dorssaa heemmiyaagaa worana ; worin dorssai ubbai laalettana ' yaagees .

text: But after that I am risen , I will go before you into Galilee .
text2: SHin taani haiquwaappe denddidoogaappe guyyiyan , intteppe kasetada Galiila baana ” yaagiis .

text: But Peter said unto him , Although all shall be offended , yet will not I .
text2: PHeexiroosi zaaridi , “ Eti ubbati nena yeggi bayidi baqatikkokka , taani nena mulekka yeggikke ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus saith unto him , Verily I say unto thee , That this day , even in this night , before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi PHeexiroosa , “ Taani neeyyo tumaa odais ; hachchi qammi kuttoi naa77utoo waassanaappe kase , neeni tana heezzutoo kaddana ” yaagiis .

text: But he spake the more vehemently , If I should die with thee , I will not deny thee in any wise . Likewise also said they all .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi kaseegaappekka minttidi , “ Taani harai atto , nenaara issippe haiqqiyaakkokka , nena mulekka kaddikke ” yaagiis . Qassi harati ubbatikka hegaadan giidosona .

text: And they came to a place which was named Gethsemane : and he saith to his disciples , Sit ye here , while I shall pray .
text2: Geetesemaane giyo sohuwaa biidosona ; Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Taani Xoossaa woossanaashin , intte hagan uttiishshite ” yaagiis .

text: And he taketh with him Peter and James and John , and began to be sore amazed , and to be very heavy ;
text2: Yesuusi PHeexiroosa , Yaaqoobanne Yohaannisa banaara ekki efiis ; daro gencceeciisinne waayettiis .

text: And saith unto them , My soul is exceeding sorrowful unto death : tarry ye here , and watch .
text2: Qassi eta , “ Taani haiqqana gakkanaassikka kayyottais ; hagan takkishshite ; xiskkoppite ” yaagiis .

text: And he went forward a little , and fell on the ground , and prayed that , if it were possible , the hour might pass from him .
text2: Guuttaa sinttaukko shiiqiiddi , biittan gufannidi , danddayettiyaabaa gidikko , he wodee baappe aadhdhana mala , Xoossaa woossiis .

text: And he said , Abba , Father , all things are possible unto thee ; take away this cup from me : nevertheless not what I will , but what thou wilt .
text2: Qassikka , “ Abbaa , ta Aawau , ubbabai neeyyo danddayettees ; ha burccukkuwaa taappe digga ; shin neeni koyiyoobai hanoppe attin , taani koyiyoobai hanoppo ” yaagiis .

text: And he cometh , and findeth them sleeping , and saith unto Peter , Simon , sleepest thou ? couldest not thou watch one hour ?
text2: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratukko simmi yiidi , xiskkidaageeta demmidi PHeexiroosa , “ Simoonaa , xiskkadii ? Neeni issi saatekkonne naaganau danddayabeikkii ?

text: Watch ye and pray , lest ye enter into temptation . The spirit truly is ready , but the flesh is weak .
text2: Paaciyan intte gelenna mala , naagitenne Xoossaa woossite ; ayyaanai giigi uttiis ; shin ashoi daafuranchcha ” yaagiis .

text: And again he went away , and prayed , and spake the same words .
text2: Qassikka biidi kaseegaadankka Xoossaa woossiis .

text: And when he returned , he found them asleep again , ( for their eyes were heavy , ) neither wist they what to answer him .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkaratukko guyye simmidi i yiyo wode , xiskkidaageeta demmiis ; eta aifiyaa xiskkoi goozi wottido gishshau , ayyo ai haasayiyaakkokka eribookkona .

text: And he cometh the third time , and saith unto them , Sleep on now , and take your rest : it is enough , the hour is come ; behold , the Son of man is betrayed into the hands of sinners .
text2: Heezzanttuwaa etakko yiidi , “ Ha77i gakkanaassikka xiskkeetiinne shemppeetii ? Gidana ; wodee gakkiis ; be7ite , tana , Asa Na7aa , nagaranchcha asatun aattidi immiyo wodee gakkiis .

text: Rise up , let us go ; lo , he that betrayeth me is at hand .
text2: Denddidi hinddite ; be7ite , tana aattidi immiyaagee hageeho gakkiis ” yaagiis .

text: And immediately , while he yet spake , cometh Judas , one of the twelve , and with him a great multitude with swords and staves , from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa biron haasayishin , tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi , Yihudai , sohuwaara gakki wodhdhiis ; qassi qeese halaqati higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne cimati kiittin , bisuwaanne dullaa oiqqida daro asai aara issippe yiis .

text: And he that betrayed him had given them a token , saying , Whomsoever I shall kiss , that same is he ; take him , and lead him away safely .
text2: Yesuusa aattidi immiyaagee he daro asaayyo , “ Taani yeriyoogee a ; a oiqqidi loitti naagidi , ekki efiite ” yaagidi malaataa yooti wottiis .

text: And as soon as he was come , he goeth straightway to him , and saith , Master , master ; and kissed him .
text2: Yihudai gakkosaarakka Yesuusakko shiiqidi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo ” yaagidi Yesuusa yeri ekkiis .

text: And they laid their hands on him , and took him .
text2: He daro asai Yesuusa mintti oiqqiis .

text: And one of them that stood by drew a sword , and smote a servant of the high priest , and cut off his ear .
text2: SHin matan eqqidaageetuppe issoi ba bisuwaa shoddinne qeese ubbatu halaqaa ashkkaraa shocidi , a haittaa qanxxi oliis .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto them , Are ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and with staves to take me ?
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , he shiiqida daro asaa , “ Tana pangga kessidi , pangga oiqqiyoogaadan oiqqanau bisonne dulla oiqqidi yiidetii ?

text: I was daily with you in the temple teaching , and ye took me not : but the scriptures must be fulfilled .
text2: Taani Beeta Maqidasiyan tamaarissaidda , gallassi gallassi inttenaara de7iyo wode tana oiqqibeekketa ; shin Xoossaa maxaafati giidoogee polettanau bessees ” yaagiis .

text: And they all forsook him , and fled .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati ubbati a yeggi bayidi baqatidosona .

text: And there followed him a certain young man , having a linen cloth cast about his naked body ; and the young men laid hold on him :
text2: Naxala xalaalan ba kalluwaa kammida issi yelaga bitanee Yesuusa kaalliyaagaa asai oiqqiis .

text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: SHin he bitanee naxalaa oli bayidi , kallo xiire baqatiis .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Asai Yesuusa qeese ubbatu halaqaa soo , qeese halaqa ubbati , cimatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti shiiqidosaa ekki efiis .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: PHeexiroosi qeese ubbatu halaqaa dirssa giddo gakkanaassi haahuwan a kaalliis ; yan naagiyaagaara tamaa ho77iiddi , utti bayiis .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Qeese halaqatinne yaa7aa asai ubbai Yesuusa woranau a bolli markka koyidosona ; shin ainne demmibookkona .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Aissi giikko , daro asati a bolli wordduwaa markkattidosona ; shin eta markkatettai issi mala gidenna .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Issi issi asati denddi eqqidi Yesuusa bolli , “ I , ' Taani asai keexxido ha Beeta Maqidasiyaa qolada , asai keexxibeenna hara Beeta Maqidasiyaa heezzu gallassa giddon keexxana ' giishin , nuuni siyida ” yaagidi wordduwaa markkattidosona .

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: SHin harai atto eta markkatettai hegankka issi mala gidibeenna .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Qeese ubbatu halaqai asa ubbaa sinttan denddi eqqidi Yesuusa , “ Hageeti nena mootiyo mootuwau neeyyo zaariyoobi baawee ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: SHin Yesuusi co77u giidi , ainne zaaribeenna ; qeese ubbatu halaqai a , “ Anjjettida Xoossaa Na7ai Kiristtoosi nenee ? ” yaagidi naa77anttuwaa oichchiis .

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ee tana ; intte tana , Asa Na7aa , wolqqaama Xoossaappe ushachcha baggaara uttidaashiininne saluwaa shaaraara yiishin be7ana ” yaagiis .

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Qeese ubbatu halaqai ba maayuwaa pooshshi olidi , “ Nuna hagaappe sinttan aissi hara markka koshshii ?

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Intte a cashshaa siyideta ; intte qofai aibee ? ” yaagiis ; yaagin eti ubbai , “ I haiqqana bessees ” yaagidi a bolli pirddidosona .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Etappe issooti issooti a bolli cushettaa doommidosona ; a aifiyaa goozidi dechchidi , “ Nena dechchidai oonee ? Ane hananabaa yoota ! ” yaagidosona ; qassi naagiyaageetikka a qinxxalliyaa baqqiiddi ekki efiidosona .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: PHeexiroosi dirssa giddon hirkkiira de7ishin , qeese ubbatu halaqaa macca ashkkaratuppe issinniyaa yaasu .

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Yaada PHeexiroosi tamaa ho77iyaagaa be7ada , tishshi ootta xeellada , “ Neenikka Naazireeta Yesuusaara issippe de7aasa ” yaagaasu .

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi , “ Neeni giyoobai aibakko taani erikke ; tau akeekettenna ” yaagidi kaddiis ; yaatidi dirssaa penggiyaakko kiyiis ; kuttoikka waassiis .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: He ashkkariyaa PHeexiroosa be7ada , a matan eqqida asata , “ Ha bitaneekka etaara de7ees ” gaada gujjada oduwaa doommaasu .

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi qassikka kaddiis . Guuttaa gam77ishin , matan eqqida asati naa77anttuwaa PHeexiroosa , “ Neeni tuma etaara issippe de7aasa ; aissi giikko , neeni Galiila biitta asa ” yaagidosona .

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi , “ Taani hegaa intte giyo bitaniyaa erikke ! ” yaagidi bana qanggettaanne caaquwaa doommiis .

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Sohuwaarakka kuttoi naa77anttuwaa waassi aggiis ; PHeexiroosi bana Yesuusi , “ Neeni kuttoi naa77utoo waassanaappe kase heezzutoo tana kaddana ” giidoogaa hassayidi , daro yeekkiis .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Maallado guuran sohuwaara qeese halaqati cimatuuranne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuura yaa7aa asa ubbaara maqettidi , Yesuusa qachchidi efiidi , PHilaaxoosayyo aattidi immidosona .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: PHilaaxoosi a , “ Neeni Aihudatu kawoo ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Yesuusi zaaridi a , “ Neenikka gaasa ” yaagiis .

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Qeese halaqati Yesuusa daroban mootidosona .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: SHin PHilaaxoosi naa77anttuwaa Yesuusa , “ Neeyyo zaariyoobi baawee ? Eti ne bolli woqqa mootuwaa ehiyaakko be7ikkii ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: SHin Yesuusi harabaa zaarennan ixxin , PHilaaxoosi garamettiis .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: PHilaaxoosayyo Paasikaa Baalaa bonchchiyo gallassan asai koyiyo issi uraa qashuwaappe birshshiyo meezee de7ees .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: He wode issi Barbbaana giyo bitanee ooshshaa kessidi shemppo worida asatuura issippe qasho keettan de7ees .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: SHiiqida daro asai PHilaaxoosi kaseegaadankka oottana mala , ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , woosaa doommiis .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: PHilaaxoosi asaa zaaridi , “ Taani intteyyo Aihudatu kawuwaa birshshiyoogaa koyeetii ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Aissi giikko , qeese halaqati Yesuusa qanaatidi aatti immidoogaa PHilaaxoosi eriis .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: SHin qeese halaqati Yesuusa gishshaa Barbbaana birshshanaadan , he shiiqida asai PHilaaxoosa woossana mala , asaa maqqidosona .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: PHilaaxoosi zaaridi naa77anttuwaa , “ Yaatin , ha Aihuda kawo intte giyoogaa waatoo ? ” yaagiis .

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Yaagin asai PHilaaxoosayyo naa77anttuwaa ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishada a kaqqa ” yaagiis .

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: PHilaaxoosi asaa , “ Aissi ? I ai iitabaa oottidee ? ” yaagiis . SHin asai kaseegaappekka ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishada a kaqqa ” yaagiis .

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: PHilaaxoosi asaa ufaissanau koyidi , Barbbaana asaayyo birshshiis ; yaatidi lissuwan Yesuusa garafidi , masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqanau etau aattidi immiis .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , wotaaddarati Yesuusa deriyaa haariyaagaa ooso keettaa ekki efiidi , hara wotaaddarata ubbaa issippe xeesidosona .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Qassi zo7o afalaa a maizzidosona ; agunttaa akiliiliyaa giigissidi , a huuphiyan wottidosona .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan a , “ Aihudatu kawuwau saro de7ai ” yaagiiddi , ayyo zigettaa doommidosona .

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: A huuphiyaa shombboqo gatiman shocidosona ; qassi a bolli cuchchidosona ; gulbbatidi ayyo goinnidosona .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: A bolli qilliiccidoogaappe guyyiyan , zo7o afalaa appe qaari ekkidi , a afalaa a maizzidosona ; maizzidi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi , a kaqqanau ekki efiidosona .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Eti biidi , Iskkinddiranne Rufoosa yelida aawaa , issi Simoona giyo Qareena biitta asi , gaxaappe katamaa yiyaagaara gaittidi , Yesuusa masqqaliyaa wolqqan toossidosona .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Yaatidi Golggottaa giyoosaa Yesuusa efiidosona . “ Golggottaa ” giyoogee “ Guuggiyaa Sohuwaa ” giyoogaa .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Karbbiyaa giyo xalee wolahettido woine eessaa Yesuusayyo uyanau immidosona ; shin i uyennan ixxiis .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Eti masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi , a kaqqidosona ; qassi oona gakkanaakko eranau a afalaa shaakkidi , saamaa yeggidosona .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Eti masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi a kaqqiyo wode , maallado heezzu saate .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Eti , “ Aihudatu kawuwaa ” yaagidi a mootiyo xifatiyaa xaafi wottidosona .

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Yesuusaara naa77u panggata issuwaa appe ushachcha baggaara , qassi issuwaa appe haddirssa baggaara masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqidosona .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Iitabaa oottida asatuura i paidettiis ” yaagiyoogee polettiis .

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Ogiyaara aadhdhiya asai Yesuusa karidi , ba huuphiyaa qaattiiddi cayiis ; “ A77a ! Beeta Maqidasiyaa qolada heezzu gallassa giddon keexxiyaagoo , ne huuphiyaa ashsha ;

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: ane masqqaliyaa bollappe wodhdha ” yaagiis .

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Hegaadankka qeese halaqati higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuura issippe Yesuusa bolli qilliiccidi , hagaadan yaagidosona ; “ Harata ashshiis ; shin bana ashshanau danddayenna ;

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: nuuni be7idi ammanana mala , Kiristtoosi Israa7eela kawoi , ane masqqaliyaa bollappe ha77i wodhdho ” yaagidosona . Qassi harai atto , aara masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi kaqettidaageetikka a bolli qilliiccidosona .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Usuppun saateppe doommidi , uddufun saate gakkanaassi , biitta ubbai xumiis .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Uddufun saatiyan Yesuusi ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Elohee , Elohee , laamaa sabaqitaanii ? ” yaagiis . Hegaa giyoogee , “ Ta Xoossau , ta Xoossau , tana aissi aggadii ? ” giyoogaa .

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Hegan eqqida asaappe issoi issoi hegaa siyidi , “ Be7ite ; Eelaasa xeesees ” yaagiis .

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: He asaappe issoi woxxidi , gombbilla mala ispponjjiyan caala woine eessaa kunttiis ; hegaa shombboqo gatimaa xeeran wottidi , “ Nanggite ; Eelaasi masqqaliyaappe a wottanau yaanaakkonne ane be7oos ” yaagiiddi Yesuusa doonaakko ushshanau shiishshiis .

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: SHiishshin Yesuusi ba qaalaa xoqqu ootti waassidi , haiqqi bayiis .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Beeta Maqidasiyan kaqettida magalashoi qommoppe duge gakkanaassi , naa77u kiyidi pooshetti wodhdhiis .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Masqqaliyaappe sintta baggaara hegan eqqida issi mato halaqai , hegaa keenaa Yesuusi waassidi haiqqidoogaa be7ido wode , “ Ha bitanee tumu Xoossaa Na7aa ” yaagiis .

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Hegan haahuwan eqqidi xeelliya amarida maccaasati de7oosona ; eta giddon Magddala giyo katamaappe yiida Mairaama , kaaluwaa Yaaqoobanne Yoosa aayyiyaa Mairaamanne Salooma de7oosona .

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: He macca asati Yesuusi Galiilan de7iyo wode , a kaallidaageetanne a maaddidaageeta ; qassi Yesuusaara issippe Yerusalaame biida hara daro macca asati hegan de7oosona .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Sa7ai omarido wode , yaa7aa asan bonchchettida issi Yooseefa giyo bitanee , Xoossaa kawotettai yaanaagaa naagi uttidaagee , Armmaatiyaasa giyo katamaa asi yiis ; he gallassai wonttetta Sambbataayyo giigettiyo gallassa gidido gishshau , Yooseefi xalidi PHilaaxoosakko biidi , Yesuusa ahaa ekkanau woossiis .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: PHilaaxoosi Yesuusi haiqqidoogaa siyido wode garamettiis ; mato halaqaa xeesidi , “ I haiqqoosappe gam77idee ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: PHilaaxoosi Yesuusi haiqqidoogaa mato halaqaappe siyidi , a ahaa Yooseefayyo imissiis .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Yooseefi moogo afalaa shammiis ; Yesuusa ahaa masqqaliyaappe wottidi , afalan xaaxidi , shuchchaa woocido asa moogiyo gonggoluwaa giddon a ahaa wottiis ; qassi he gonggoluwaa doonan gita shuchchaa gonddorssidi wottiis .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: Magddala katamaappe yiida Mairaamanne Yoosa aayyiyaa Mairaama Yesuusa ahaa eti awan wottiyaakko be7oosona .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Sambbatai aadhdhidoogaappe guyyiyan , Magddala katamaappe yiida Mairaama , Yaaqooba aayyiyaa Mairaamanne Salooma biidi , Yesuusa ahaa tiyanau shittuwaa shammidosona .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Woggaa gallassi maallado daro guuran xalqqee kiyishin , he gonggoluwaa biidosona .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Eti bantta giddon issoi issuwaara , “ Gonggoluwaa doonaappe nuuyyo shuchchaa oonee gonddorssidi digganaishsha ? ” yaagidi haasayoosona .

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Eti xeelliyo wode , he daro gita shuchchaa gonddorssirggidoogaa be7idosona .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Yesuusi moogettido gonggoluwaa giddo geliyo wode , issi wodalla bitanee bootta maayuwaa maayidi , ushachcha baggaara uttidaagaa be7idi dagammidosona .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: SHin i eta , “ Dagammoppite . Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqido Naazireeta Yesuusa intte koyeeta . I hagan baawa ; denddiichchiis . Eti a wottidosaa hagaa be7ite .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: SHin biidi Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuyyoonne PHeexiroosayyo , ' Yesuusi intteppe kasetidi Galiila bees ; i intteyyo odidoogaadankka intte a yaani be7ana ' yaagidi hagaa yootite ” yaagiis .

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Macca asati banttana yashshai kokkorssido gishshau , Yesuusi moogettido gonggoluwaappe kiyidi baqatidosona ; qassi eti yayyido gishshau , asau hegaa ooyyoonne ainne yootibookkona . Maccaasati biidi , banttau odidobaa ubbaa PHeexiroosaunne aara de7iyaageetau qanttan yootidosona ; hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi ba huuphen erissiyo ashkkaratu bolli , merinau ashshiya laamettenna geeshsha wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa , awai mokkiyoosaappe wulliyoosaa gakkanaassi kiittiis .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddidoogaappe guyyiyan , Woggaa gallassi maallado , laappun xalaheta kessido Magddala katamaappe yiida Mairaamiyyo kasetidi beettiis .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: A baada kase aara de7iyaageetuyyo , qarettiiddinne yeekkiiddi uttidaageetuyyo odaasu ;

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: shin Yesuusi paxa de7iyoogaanne iyyo beettidoogaa eti siyido wode , i oduwaa tuma gibookkona .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , etappe naa77ati katamaappe gaxaa kiyidi biishin , ogiyan Yesuusi kaseegaappe dummatidi , etayyo beettiis .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Eti guyye simmidi , haratuyyo odidosona ; shin haratikka eta oduwaa tuma gibookkona .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Guyyeppe tammanne isiini erissiyo ashkkarati qumaa miishin , Yesuusi etayyo beettiis . Etayyo ammanoi bainna gishshau , i eta boriis ; qassi haiquwaappe i denddidoogaa hinkkooti etau yootin , eti ammanennan ixxido gishshaunne yootin siyennaageeta gidiyo gishshau , i eta boriis .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: I eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Sa7a ubbaa biidi , asa ubbau wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootite .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Ammaniyaageenne xammaqettidaagee attana ; shin ammanennaagaa bolli Xoossai pirddana .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Ammaniyaageetuyyo ha malaatati imettana : eti ta sunttan xalaheta kessana ; qassi eti dumma dumma qaalan haasayana .

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: Eti shooshsha oiqqikkokka , woi marzze uyikkokka eta qohenna . Qassi eti bantta kushiyaa hargganchchatu bolli wottana ; wottin he hargganchchati paxana ” yaagiis .

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Godai Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuura haasayidoogaappe guyyiyan , Xoossai a pude saluwaa ekki efin , Xoossaappe ushachcha baggaara uttiis .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati biidi , ubbasan qaalaa yootidosona . Godaikka etaara issippe oottees ; eti yootiyo qaalaikka tuma gididoogaa Xoossai etayyo immiyo malaatatun erissiis .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Bonchcho Tewofiloosaa , koiro bantta aifiyan be7idaageetuppenne Xoossaa qaalaa odidaageetuppe ekkidoogaadan , nu matan polettida Yohuwaassi daroti taarikiyaa maaran maaran xaafanau doommidosona .

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: Hegaa gishshau , neeni tamaarido yohuwaa geeshshada erana mala , taani qassi koiruwaappe doommada , ubbaa akeekan qorada , maaran maaran neessi xaafikko , lo77o yaagada qoppaas .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Yihudaa biittaa kawuwaa Heeroodisa wodiyan , Zakkaariyaasa yaagiyo issi qeesee de7ees . I Abiiya qeesetuppe issuwaa . A machchiyaanne qeesiyaa Aaroona zare ; i sunttai Elssaabeexo .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Eti naa77aikka Xoossaassi xillo gididi , Godaa higgiyaanne azazuwaa ubbaa moorennan , naagidi polidosona .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Elssaabeexa maine gidido gishshau , etassi na7i baawa ; naa77aikka daro cimidosona .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Bantta qeesetu kayan Zakkaariyaasi Xoossaa sinttan oottishin , qeesetu meeziyaadan , Godaa Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelidi , ixaanaa cuwayanau saamai a gakkiis .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Ixaanaa i cuwayiyo wode , asai ubbai karen eqqidi , Xoossaa woossees .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Xoossaa kiitanchchai ixaanaa i cuwayiyo sohuwaappe ushachcha baggaara eqqidi , ayyo beettiis .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: Zakkaariyaasi hegaa be7idi , dagammidi yayyin ,

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: kiitanchchai Zakkaariyaasa hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Yayyoppa ; ne woosai siyettiis . Ne machchiyaa Elssaabeexa neessi attuma na7a yelana ; neeni he na7aa Yohaannisa yaagada sunttana .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: I yelettin , neeni daro ufaittana ; haratikka ufaittana .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Xoossaa sinttan i gita gidana ; mattoyiyaabaanne woine eessa uyenna . Biron ba aayee uluwan de7ishin , Geeshsha Ayyaanai aani kumana .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Israa7eela asaappe daruwaa Godaakko , eta Xoossaakko , zaarana ;

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Godaassi asaa giigissanau , aawatu wozanaa naatukko zaaranau , azazettennaageetakka xillotettaa eraassi zaaranau , Eelaasa ayyaanaaninne wolqqan Godaappe sinttaara bees ” yaagiis .

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: Zakkaariyaasi , “ Taani cima ; ta machchiyaanne ceeggaasu ; hegaa ta aibin eranee ? ” yaagidi , kiitanchchaa oichchiis .

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Kiitanchchai zaarettidi yaagiis ; “ Taani Xoossaa sinttan eqqiya Gabreela ; taani ne sinttan eqqada haasayanau , qassi ha mishiraachchuwaa neessi odanau , tana Xoossai neekko kiittiis .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Ha77i siya ; ba wodiyan polettana ta qaalaa neeni ammanabeenna gishshau , ta neessi odido yohoi polettanaashin , neeni duudana ; ne doonai haasayanau danddayenna ” yaagiis .

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: “ Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon i waanidi gam77idee ? ” yaagidi garamettiiddi , asai zakkaariyaasa naagees .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Kare i kiyido wode , haasayanau danddayibeenna . Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon i aibakko ajjuutan be7idoogaa asai akeekiis ; duudidaagee biradhdhiiddi haasayees .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Ba oosuwaa wodiyaa wurssidi , soo biis .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: He wodiyaappe guyyiyan , a machchiyaa Elssaabeexa shahaarada , ichchashu aginau bana genttaasu .

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: Elssaabeexa , “ Xoossai taakko xeelliis ; asa sinttan tana yeellaappe ashshanau maaddiis ” yaagaasu .

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Usuppuntta aginan Xoossai kiitanchchaa Gabreela Galiila biittan Naazireete giyo katamaa kiittiis .

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: Daawita zare gidiya Yooseefa giyo bitaniyaassi giigida issi geela7eekko Xoossai a kiittiis ; he geela7ee sunttai Mairaamo .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Kiitanchchai ikko yiidi , “ Daro doorettidaaree , saro ; Godai nenaara de7ees ; nena i daro anjjiis ” yaagiis .

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Mairaama hegaa siyada daro dagammaasu . Dagammada , “ Hegee woigiyo sarotee ? ” yaagada qoppaasu .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Kiitanchchai hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Mairaamee yayyoppa ; Xoossan sabettadasa ;

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: be7a ; neeni shahaarada attuma na7a yelana ; a sunttaa Yesuusa yaagada sunttana .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: I gita gidana ; qassi Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaa Na7a geetettana ; Godai ayyo a aawaa Daawita kawotettaa immana ;

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: inne Yaaqoobantta zariyan merinau kawotana ; a kawotettaassi wurssetti baawa ” yaagiis .

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: Mairaama kiitanchchaa , “ Taani geela7o gidishin , hegee waanidi hananee ? ” yaagaasu .

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Kiitanchchai zaaridi Mairaamo , “ Geeshsha Ayyaanai ne bolli yaana ; Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaa wolqqai nenan shemppana ; hegaa gishshau , ne yelana geeshsha na7ai Xoossaa Na7aa geetettana .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Be7a ; ne dabbiyaa Elssaabeexa ceeggikkonne attuma na7a shahaaraasu ; asai beni o maine gees ; shin a ha77i usuppun agina shahaara .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Hegeenne Xoossaassi danddayettennabi bainna gishshaassa ” yaagiis .

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: Mairaama , “ Taani Godaa ailliyo ; ne qaalaadan , taassi hano ” yaagaasu . Kiitanchchainne i matappe biis .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Guutta gallassaappe guyyiyan , Mairaama denddada , deree dariyo Yihudaa giyo biittan de7iya issi katamaa eesuwan baasu .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Qassi Zakkaariyaasa soo gelada , Elssaabeexo sarotaasu .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Elssaabeexa Mairaami sarotaa siyido wode , i uluwan de7iya na7ai qaaxxiis . Elssaabeexin Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumin , qaalaa xoqqissada , “ Neeni maccaasa ubban anjjettidaaro ; ne uluwan de7iya na7ainne anjjettidaagaa ;

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: neeni ta Godaa aayyiyaa taakko yaanau , hegaa mala bonchchoi taassi waanidi bessii ?

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Neeni saro giyo qaalan ta uluwan de7iya na7ai ufaissan qaaxxiis ;

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Godai neeyyo odido qaalai polettanaagaa ammanidaara neeni anjjettidaaro ” yaagada Mairaamissi odaasu .

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Mairaama hagaadan yaagaasu ; “ Taani a ailliyaa tooshettidoogaa i be7ido gishshau , ta shemppoi Godaa bonchchees ; ta ayyaanaikka ta Xoossaa tana ashshiyaagan ufaittees . Be7a ; wolqqaama Xoossai taassi daro gitabaa oottido gishshau , hachchippe sinttan tana asai ubbai anjjettidaaree yaagana . A sunttai geeshsha .

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: I baassi yayyiya ubbaassi yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaashin , maarotettaa immees .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Ba kushiyan wolqqaama oosuwaa oottiis . Otoranchchata eta qofaara laaliis .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Kawota kawotettaappe duge wottidi , ziqqan de7iyaageeta xoqqu oottiis .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Namisettidaageeta lo77obaa kalissidinne dureta mela kushe yedettiis .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Nu aawatussi odidoogaadan , Abrahaamassinne a zariyaassi Xoossai maarotettaa merinau immanau hassayidi , ailliyaa Israa7eela maaddiis ” yaagaasu .

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: Mairaama heezzu agina gidiyaagaa keenaa Elssaabeexi matan uttidoogaappe guyye baggan , ba soo simmaasu .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Elssaabeexissi yeliyo wodee gakkin , attuma na7aa yelaasu .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: I shoorotinne i dabboti Godai maarotettan iyyo oottido lo77obaa siyidi , iira ufaittidosona .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Hosppuntta gallassan , na7aa qaxxaranau yiidosona ; a aawaa sunttaadan , Zakkaariyaasa giidi , sunttanau qoppidosona ;

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: shin a aayyiyaa zaarada , “ CHii ! Yohaannisa giidi sunttana ” yaagaasu .

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Eti zaarettidi , “ Ne dabboppe he sunttan xeesettiyai issoinne baawa ” yaagidosona .

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Qassi , “ Woigi sunttanee ? ” yaagidi , a aawaa biradhdhidi oichchidosona .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Aawai xaafiyoobaa oichchi ekkidi , “ Na7aa sunttai Yohaannisa ” giidi xaafin , ubbai garamettiis .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Sohuwaara a doonai dooyettin , inxxarssai birshshettiis ; Xoossaa anjjiiddi haasayiis .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Eta shooro ubbai yayyiis ; ha ubba yohoi deree dariyo Yihudaa biittaa ubban daro haasayettiis .

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: Siyida asai ubbai hegaa qoppiiddi , Xoossaa wolqqai a bolli de7iyoogaa erido gishshau , “ Ha na7ai wode waananeeshsha ? ” yaagiis .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: Yohaannisa aawaa Zakkaariyaasan , Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumin , hagaadan hananabaa yootiis ;

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: “ Ba asaa maaddanau yiidi , eta wozido gishshau , Godai , Israa7eela Xoossai anjjetto .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Kaseesappe de7iya hananabaa yootiya geeshshatu doonan haasayidoogaadan , ba ashkkaraa Daawita zariyaappe denttidi , nuna ashshiya wolqqaamaa nuukko kiittiis .

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: Xoossai nu morkketuppenne nuna ixxiyaageetu ubbaa kushiyaappe nuna ashshees .

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: Hagaadan nu aawatussi maarotettaa immiis . Nu aawaa Abrahaamassi caaqqido caaquwaa geeshsha maachchaa qoppiis .

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: Aani nu morkketu kushiyaappe nuuni attidi , yayyennan nu de7uwaa wodiyaa ubban Xoossaa sinttan geeshshatettaaninne xillotettan ayyo oottanau , nuna danddayissiis .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: “ Ta na7au , neeni Godaa ogiyaa giigissanau appe sinttau biyo gishshau , Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaassi oottiya hananabaa yootiyaagaa geetettana .

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: Xoossai eta nagaraa atto giyoogan a asai attanau danddayiyoogaa eta erissanau baasa .

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: Hegeenne , nu Xoossaa maarotettainne qaretai daro gidiyo gishshau , saluwaa poo7uwaa i nu bollan poo7issana ;

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: he poo7oi nuna sarotaa ogiyaa kaalettanau , xumaaninne haiquwaa kuwan de7iyaageetussi poo7ana ” yaagiis .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Guutta na7ai diccidi , ayyaanan minniis ; Israa7eelatussi qoncciyan beettana gakkanaassi bazzuwan de7iis .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: He wode , sa7an de7iya asa ubbaa sunttai xaafettana mala , Roome biittaa kawoi , Augisxxoosi azaziis .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Asaa sunttai koiro xaafettiyo wode , Qereneyoosi Sooriyaa biittaa haariyaagaa .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Asa ubbai huuphiyan huuphiyan xaafettanau , ba yelettido biittaa biis .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: Yooseefi qassi Daawitantta keettanne zare gidido gishshau , ayyo giigida Mairaamiira xaafettanau Galiilan de7iya Naazireete katamaappe Yihudaa biittan Beetaliheeme giyo Daawita katamaa issippe biis .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: He wode Mairaama shahaara ; eti yan Beetaliheemen de7ishin , a yeliyo wodee gakkiis ;

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: ba baira na7aa yelaasu ; imattai aqiyo keettan sohoi bainna gishshau , maayuwan na7aa xaaxada , miizzai kattaa wottin miyo qoriyan zin77issaasu .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: He deren dorssaa wudiyaa qamma heemmiiddi , dembban aqiya asati de7oosona .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Godaa kiitanchchai etakko yiis ; Godaa bonchchoi eta yuuyi aadhdhidi poo7iis . Eti daro yayyin ,

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: kiitanchchai eta , “ Hachchi Godai Kiristtoosi , ashshiyaagee Daawita kataman yelettidoogaassi taani asa ubbaa ufaissiya mishiraachchuwaa intteyyo odiyo gishshau , yayyoppite ;

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: maayuwan xaaxettida gacino na7ai miizzai kattaa wottin miyo qoriyan zin77idaagaa demmanaagee intteyyo malaata gido ” yaagiis .

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Akeekennan he kiitanchchaara daro saluwaa kiitanchchati kiyidi beettidosona .

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: Xoossaa galatiiddi , “ Salo ubbaappe bolla saluwan de7iya Xoossaassi bonchchoi gido . Sa7an a ufaissiya asaassi sarotettai gido ” yaagidosona .

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Kiitanchchati etappe shaahettidi , saluwaa biichchidaashin , dorssaa heemmiyaageeti bantta giddon , “ Ane Beetaliheeme gakkanaashin biidi , Xoossai nuussi odido yohoi hanidaagaa be7oos ” yaagidosona .

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Eesuwan yiidi , Mairaamonne Yooseefa demmidi , miizzai kattaa wottin miyo qoriyan gacino na7ai zin77idaagaa be7idosona .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Eti be7ido kiitanchchai ha guutta na7aabaa etassi odidoogaa erissidosona .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Hegaa siyida ubbai dorssaa heemmiyaageeti odido yohuwan garamettiis .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
