text2: Mairaama qassi ha ubba yohuwaa ba wozanaa giddon wottada , qoppaidda de7ausu .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Dorssaa heemmiyaageeti kase etassi kiitanchchai yootidoogaadan hanin , siyido ubbaa gishshaunne be7ido ubbaa gishshau , Xoossaa galatiiddinne bonchchiiddi simmidosona .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Hosppun gallassaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi qaxxarettiyo wodee gakkin , Mairaama a yelanau shahaaranaappe kase kiitanchchai a sunttidoogaadan , a sunttai Yesuusa geetettiis .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Muuse higgee azaziyoogaadan , Mairaamissinne Yooseefassi geeyiyo wodee gakkin , Godaa higgee , “ Baira yelettida attuma ubbai Godaassi dummatidaagaa geetetto ” g iidoogaadan , Godaassi Yesuusa immanau Yerusalaame efiidosona .

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: Qassi Godaa higgee , “ Naa77u buuba haraphpheta woikko naa77u mara haraphpheta ” giidoogaadan , Godaassi yarshshuwaa yarshshanau efiidosona .

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Yerusalaamen Simoona giyo bitanee de7ees ; i Xoossau yayyiya xillo asa ; qassi Israa7eelati attiyo wodiyaa naagiiddi de7ees . He wode , Geeshsha Ayyaanai a bolli de7iyaagee , “ Godai tiyido Kiristtoosa be7ennan haiqqakka ” yaagidi , a erissi wottiis .

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
text2: Simooni ayyaanai kaalettin , Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliis . Aayyiyaanne aawai higgee azaziyoogaadan , guutta na7aa Yesuusa Beeta Maqidasiyaa ehin ,

text: Then took he him up in his arms , and blessed God , and said ,
text2: Simooni he na7aa idimmidi , Xoossaa galatiiddi yaagiis .

text: Lord , now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace , according to thy word :
text2: “ Ubbaa Haariya Godau , neeni asa ubbaa sinttan giigissido ne ashettaa taani ta aifiyan be7ido gishshau , ha77i ne qaalaadan , taani ne aillee sarotan haiqqana .

text: A light to lighten the Gentiles , and the glory of thy people Israel .
text2: He ashettai Israa7eela gidenna asau nebaa bessiya poo7o mala ; qassi ne asaa Israa7eelassi bonchcho ” yaagiis .

text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him .
text2: Yooseefinne Mairaama Simooni Yesuusabaa odidoogan garamettidosona .

text: And Simeon blessed them , and said unto Mary his mother , Behold , this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel ; and for a sign which shall be spoken against ;
text2: Simooni eta anjjiis ; anjjidi a aayyiyo Mairaamo , “ Israa7eelan de7iya darotu kunddettaassinne dendduwaassi a ixissiyaageetussi Xoossaappe malaata gidanau , qassi darota wozanan de7iya geemmida qofai qonccana mala , ha na7ai Xoossaappe doorettiis . Ne wozanaakka qara bisuwaadan , qaretai qanxxana ” yaagiis .

text: And there was one Anna , a prophetess , the daughter of Phanuel , of the tribe of Aser : she was of a great age , and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity ;
text2: Aseera zerettaappe yelettida Panu7eela na7iyaa Haanna hananabaa yootiyaaro . A ba geela7otetta azinaara laappun laittaa de7aasu .

text: And she was a widow of about fourscore and four years , which departed not from the temple , but served God with fastings and prayers night and day .
text2: I azinai haiqqin , hosppun tammanne oiddu laittaa azina gelennan de7aasu . A daro cima ; qassi xoomaiddanne woossaidda gallassinne qammi Xoossau goinnaasu ; Beeta Maqidasiyaappe kiyennan de7aasu .

text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord , and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem .
text2: He saatiyankka shiiqada , Xoossaa galataasu . Qassi Xoossai Yerusalaame wozin be7ana yaagidi naagiya asaa ubbau na7aabaa odaasu .

text: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord , they returned into Galilee , to their own city Nazareth .
text2: Eti Godaa higgee azazidoogaadan , ubbabaa polidoogaappe guyye baggan , Galiila biittan de7iya Naazireete giyo bantta katamaa biidosona .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , filled with wisdom : and the grace of God was upon him .
text2: Na7ai diccidi minniis ; aadhdhida eratettai aani kumiis ; ayyaanan minniis ; Xoossaa aaro kehatettai a bolli de7ees .

text: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover .
text2: Yesuusa aayyiyaanne aawai laittan laittan , Paasikaa gallassaa bonchchiyo wode , Yerusalaame boosona .

text: And when he was twelve years old , they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast .
text2: I yelettoosappe tammanne naa77u laitta gidin , haroodeegaadankka Yerusalaame biidosona .

text: And when they had fulfilled the days , as they returned , the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem ; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it .
text2: Paasikaa gallassaa bonchchiyo wodee wurin , eti guyye bantta soo simuwaa doommidosona ; shin Yesuusi so asai erennan Yerusalaamen attiis .

text: But they , supposing him to have been in the company , went a day ' s journey ; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance .
text2: Eti ogiyaa asaara issippe de7ees giiddi , issi gallassa ogiyaa biidosona . Bantta dabbuwaa giddooninne eriyo asaa giddon a koyidosona .

text: And when they found him not , they turned back again to Jerusalem , seeking him .
text2: Xayin a koyiiddi , Yerusalaame simmidi , Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyan tamaarissiyaageetuppe siyiiddinne eta oichchiiddi eta giddon uttidaagaa heezzantto gallassaappe guyyiyan demmidosona .

text: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers .
text2: A doonaappe kiyiyaabaa siyida ubbai i immiyo era zaaruwan garamettiis .

text: And when they saw him , they were amazed : and his mother said unto him , Son , why hast thou thus dealt with us ? behold , thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing .
text2: Aayyiyaanne aawai a be7idi garamettidosona . Mairaama , “ Ta na7au , nuna aissi hagaadan oottadii ? Ne aawainne taani nena koyiiddi , daro tuggatida ” yaagaasu .

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye sought me ? wist ye not that I must be about my Father ' s business ?
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Tana aissi koyidetii ? Taani ta Aawaa keettan de7anau bessiyoogaa erekketii ? ” yaagiis .

text: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them .
text2: SHin i giidobaa eti akeekibookkona .

text: And he went down with them , and came to Nazareth , and was subject unto them : but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart .
text2: Etaara duge Naazireete biis . Yan etassi azazettees . Mairaama ha ubba yohuwaa ba wozanan wottausu .

text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature , and in favour with God and man .
text2: Yesuusi aadhdhida eratettaaranne geesaara dicciiddi , Xoossaaninne asan sabettiis .

text: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea , and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee , and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis , and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene ,
text2: Xibaariyoosi , Roome biittaa kawoi kawotido tammanne ichchashantta laittan , PHenxxeniyaa PHilaaxoosi Yihudaa haariyo wode , Heeroodisi Galiila haarees ; a ishai Piliphphoosi , Ixuriyaasanne Xiraakonidoosa biittaa haarees ; Lisaaniyoosikka Abilaaniisa biittaa haarees .

text: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests , the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness .
text2: Haanninne Qayaafi qeese halaqa . He wode bazzon de7iya Zakkaariyaasa na7aa , Yohaannisakko Xoossaa qaalai yiis .

text: And he came into all the country about Jordan , preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ;
text2: Yohaannisi Yorddaanoosa SHaafaa heera biittaa ubban , “ Intte nagaraa atto gaanaassi , nagaraappe simmidi xammaqettite ” yaagidi yootiis .

text: As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: Hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi ba maxaafan hagaadan xaafiis ; “ Issoi bazzon ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , ' Godaa ogiyaa giigissite . I hemettana loossuwaakka ayyo sitti oottite .

text: Every valley shall be filled , and every mountain and hill shall be brought low ; and the crooked shall be made straight , and the rough ways shall be made smooth ;
text2: Gisa biitta ubbai kumana . Dereenne kerai ubbai baasettidi giigana . Geella ogee sitta gidana . Moorettida ogee salallana .

text: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God .
text2: Asai ubbai Xoossai ashshiyoogaa be7ana ' giis ” yaagiis .

text: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yohaannisi banan xammaqettana giidi yiida asaa , “ Ha shooshshatoo , Xoossaa hanqqoi yaana haniyaagaappe baqatana mala , intteyyo oonee odidai ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance , and begin not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Intte nagaraappe simmidoogaa erissiyaabaa oottite . Abrahaami nu aawaa giidi , intte giddon haasayanau doommoppite . Aissi giikko , ' Xoossai ha shuchchata Abrahaamassi na7a kessanaukka danddayees ' yaagada , taani inttessi odais .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Beexee mittaa xaphuwan qanxxanau giigi uttiis . Simmi lo77o aifiyaa aifenna mitta ubbai qanxxettidi , taman yegettana ” yaagiis .

text: And the people asked him , saying , What shall we do then ?
text2: “ Yaatin nu ai oottanee ? ” yaagidi , daro asai a oichchiis .

text: He answereth and saith unto them , He that hath two coats , let him impart to him that hath none ; and he that hath meat , let him do likewise .
text2: I asaassi zaaridi , “ Naa77u qolee de7iyo urai issi qoliyaa aibinne bainna urau immo ; qumai de7iyo uraikka hegaadan ootto ” yaagiis .

text: Then came also publicans to be baptized , and said unto him , Master , what shall we do ?
text2: Qaraxaa shiishshiyaageeti xammaqettanau yiidi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , nuuni ai oottanee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And he said unto them , Exact no more than that which is appointed you .
text2: “ Higgee azaziyoogaappe aattidi , ekkoppite ” yaagiis .

text: And the soldiers likewise demanded of him , saying , And what shall we do ? And he said unto them , Do violence to no man , neither accuse any falsely ; and be content with your wages .
text2: Wotaaddarati , “ Qassi nuuni ai oottanee ? ” yaagidi a oichchidosona . Oichchin , “ Wolqqan dafidi , woi wordduwan mootidi , ooppenne miishsha ekkoppite . Intte damoozai intteyyo gidana yaagidi , ufaittidi de7ite ” yaagiis .

text: And as the people were in expectation , and all men mused in their hearts of John , whether he were the Christ , or not ;
text2: Asai Godai tiyido Kiristtoosa naagiiddinne Yohaannisabaa bantta wozanaa giddon qoppiiddi , “ Hagee Kiristtoosa gidennan aggenna ” yaagidi , a mali wottidaashin ,

text: John answered , saying unto them all , I indeed baptize you with water ; but one mightier than I cometh , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire :
text2: Yohaannisi eta ubbaassi zaaridi , “ Taani inttena haattan xammaqais ; shin taappe wolqqaamiyaagee yees . Taani a caammaa qashuwaa birshshanaukka bessikke . I inttena Geeshsha Ayyaanaaninne taman xammaqana .

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and will gather the wheat into his garner ; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable .
text2: A kushiyan kattaa suraggiyo laidai de7ees . Kattaa qoxxidi , audiyaappe geeshshidi pittees ; gisttiyaa gootaran qolees ; shin dalaa to7enna taman xuuggana ” yaagiis .

text: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yohaannisi asaa daro dumma zoriyaa zoriiddi , wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa asau yootees ;

text: But Herod the tetrarch , being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip ' s wife , and for all the evils which Herod had done ,
text2: shin deriyaa haariya Heeroodisi ba ishaa machchiyo Heeroodiyaado ekkido gishshaunne hara iitabaa oottido gishshau , Yohaannisi a hanqqettidi seeriis .

text: Added yet this above all , that he shut up John in prison .
text2: Hegaa ubbaa bolli hara iitabaa gujjidi , Heeroodisi Yohaannisa qasho keettaa gelissiis .

text: Now when all the people were baptized , it came to pass , that Jesus also being baptized , and praying , the heaven was opened ,
text2: Ubba asai xammaqettidoogaappe guyye baggan , Yesuusi qassi xammaqettiis . I woossishin , saloi dooyettiis .

text: And the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him , and a voice came from heaven , which said , Thou art my beloved Son ; in thee I am well pleased .
text2: Geeshsha Ayyaanai haraphphe milatiiddi , a bolli wodhdhiis . Qassi saluwaappe , “ Taani siiqiyo ta Na7ai nena ; tana nebai ufaissees ” yaagiya qaalai yiis .

text: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age , being ( as was supposed ) the son of Joseph , which was the son of Heli ,
text2: Yesuusi yelettoosappe hasttamu laitta keena gidishin , tamaarissanau doommiis .

text: Which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi , which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Janna , which was the son of Joseph ,
text2: Asai a Yooseefa na7aa yaagidi qoppiis .

text: Which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Amos , which was the son of Naum , which was the son of Esli , which was the son of Nagge ,
text2: Yooseefi Eela na7aa ; Eeli Maaxaata na7aa ; Maaxaati Leewa na7aa ; Leewi Milkka na7aa ; Milkki Yoona na7aa ; Yooni Yooseefa na7aa ; Yooseefi Maataatiyu na7aa ; Maataatiyu Amoxa na7aa ; Amoxi Naahooma na7aa ; Naahoomi Esiliima na7aa ; Esiliimi Naage na7aa ;

text: Which was the son of Maath , which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Semei , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Naagee Maa7ata na7aa ; Maa7ati Maataatiyu na7aa ; Maataatiyu Seemeya na7aa ; Seemeyi Yooseefa na7aa ; Yooseefi Yooda na7aa ;

text: Which was the son of Joanna , which was the son of Rhesa , which was the son of Zorobabel , which was the son of Salathiel , which was the son of Neri ,
text2: Yoodi Yoonaana na7aa ; Yoonaani Reesa na7aa ; Reesi Zarubaabeela na7aa ; Zarubaabeeli Salaatiyaala na7aa ; Salaatiyaali Neera na7aa ;

text: Which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Addi , which was the son of Cosam , which was the son of Elmodam , which was the son of Er ,
text2: Neeri Milkka na7aa ; Milkki Hada na7aa ; Hadi Yoosaasa na7aa ; Yoosaasi Qosaama na7aa ; Qosaami Elmmodaama na7aa ; Elmmodaami Eera na7aa ;

text: Which was the son of Jose , which was the son of Eliezer , which was the son of Jorim , which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi ,
text2: Eeri Yoosee7a na7aa ; Yoosee7i El77eezara na7aa ; El77eezari Yoraama na7aa ; Yoraami Maaxaata na7aa ; Maaxaati Leewa na7aa ;

text: Which was the son of Simeon , which was the son of Juda , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Jonan , which was the son of Eliakim ,
text2: Leewi Simoona na7aa ; Simooni Yihudaa na7aa ; Yihudai Yooseefa na7aa ; Yooseefi Yoonaana na7aa ; Yoonaani Eliyaaqiima na7aa ;

text: Which was the son of Melea , which was the son of Menan , which was the son of Mattatha , which was the son of Nathan , which was the son of David ,
text2: Eliyaaqiimi Meliyaa na7aa ; Melee Mainaana na7aa ; Mainaani Maaxaata na7aa ; Maaxaati Naataana na7aa ; Naataani Daawita na7aa ;

text: Which was the son of Jesse , which was the son of Obed , which was the son of Booz , which was the son of Salmon , which was the son of Naasson ,
text2: Daawiti Isseya na7aa ; Isseyi Yobeeda na7aa ; Yobeedi Boo7eeza na7aa ; Boo7eezi Salimoona na7aa ; Salimooni Na7asoona na7aa ;

text: Which was the son of Aminadab , which was the son of Aram , which was the son of Esrom , which was the son of Phares , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: Na7asooni Aminadaaba na7aa ; Aminadaabi Raama na7aa ; Raami Arnna na7aa ; Arnni Hexiroona na7aa ; Hexirooni Paareesa na7aa ; Paareesi Yihudaa na7aa ;

text: Which was the son of Jacob , which was the son of Isaac , which was the son of Abraham , which was the son of Thara , which was the son of Nachor ,
text2: Yihudai Yaaqooba na7aa ; Yaaqoobi Yisaaqa na7aa ; Yisaaqi Abrahaama na7aa ; Abrahaami Taara na7aa ; Taari Naakoora na7aa ;

text: Which was the son of Saruch , which was the son of Ragau , which was the son of Phalec , which was the son of Heber , which was the son of Sala ,
text2: Naakoori Saruuga na7aa ; Saruugi Raa7u na7aa ; Raa7u Peeleega na7aa ; Peeleegi Ebeera na7aa ; Ebeeri SHeela na7aa ;

text: Which was the son of Cainan , which was the son of Arphaxad , which was the son of Sem , which was the son of Noe , which was the son of Lamech ,
text2: SHeeli Qainiima na7aa ; Qainiimi Arifaakisaada na7aa ; Arifaakisaadi Seema na7aa ; Seemi Nohe na7aa ; Nohee Laameeka na7aa ;

text: Which was the son of Mathusala , which was the son of Enoch , which was the son of Jared , which was the son of Maleleel , which was the son of Cainan ,
text2: Laameeki Maatusaala na7aa ; Maatusaali Heenooka na7aa ; Heenooki Yaareeda na7aa ; Yaareedi Malaali7eela na7aa ; Malaali7eeli Qainaana na7aa ;

text: Which was the son of Enos , which was the son of Seth , which was the son of Adam , which was the son of God .
text2: Qainaani Heenoosa na7aa ; Heenoosi Seeta na7aa ; Seeti Addaame na7aa ; Addaamee Xoossaa na7aa .

text: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan , and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness ,
text2: Yesuusi Geeshsha Ayyaanan kumidi , Yorddaanoosappe simmiis .

text: Being forty days tempted of the devil . And in those days he did eat nothing : and when they were ended , he afterward hungered .
text2: Ayyaanai kaalettin , bazzo biidi , oitamu gallassaa xalahe halaqan paacettiis . He gallassatun ainne quma mibeenna gishshau , oitamu gallassaappe guyyiyan namisettiis .

text: And the devil said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , command this stone that it be made bread .
text2: Xalahe halaqai a , “ Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa gidikko ha shuchchaa , ' Oitta gida ' gaada azaza ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus answered him , saying , It is written , That man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word of God .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Asi Xoossaa qaalaa ubban de7anaappe attin , oitta xalaalan de7enna ' yaagees ” yaagiis .

text: And the devil , taking him up into an high mountain , shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time .
text2: Xalahe halaqai a gita deriyaa huuphiyaa kessidi , sa7aa kawotettaa ubbaa issi kuttan bessiis .

text: And the devil said unto him , All this power will I give thee , and the glory of them : for that is delivered unto me ; and to whomsoever I will I give it .
text2: Xalahe halaqai , “ Ha wolqqa ubbainne bonchchoi taassi imettido gishshau , taani dosiyo oossinne immana ; neessikka immana .

text: If thou therefore wilt worship me , all shall be thine .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , neeni taassi goinnikko , ha ubbai neessi gidana ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Get thee behind me , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Godau , ne Xoossau goinna ; a xalaalau ootta ' yaagees ” yaagiis .

text: And he brought him to Jerusalem , and set him on a pinnacle of the temple , and said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down from hence :
text2: Xalahe halaqai Yesuusa Yerusalaame efiidi , Beeta Maqidasiyaa xeeraa kessidi , “ Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa gidikko , ane duge guppa .

text: For it is written , He shall give his angels charge over thee , to keep thee :
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Xoossai nena naagana mala , ba kiitanchchata azazana ' qassi ' Eti ne tohoi shuchchan xubettenna mala , bantta kushiyan nena denttana ' yaagees ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , It is said , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi a , “ Qassikka Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Godaa ne Xoossaa paaccoppa ' yaagees ” yaagiis .

text: And when the devil had ended all the temptation , he departed from him for a season .
text2: Xalahe halaqai Yesuusa paacciyoogaa ubbaa wurssidoogaappe guyye baggan , ha77issau appe shaahettiis .

text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee : and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about .
text2: Yesuusi Ayyaanaa wolqqan Galiila simmiis . Abai hegaa heeran de7iya biitta ubban odettiis .

text: And he taught in their synagogues , being glorified of all .
text2: I bantta Aihuda woosa keettatun tamaarissiiddi , ubban galatettiis . Yesuusi ba diccido Naazireete katamaa yiis .

text: And he came to Nazareth , where he had been brought up : and , as his custom was , he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and stood up for to read .
text2: Haroodeegaadan Sambbata gallassan Aihuda woosa keettaa gelidi , nabbabanau denddiis .

text: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias . And when he had opened the book , he found the place where it was written ,
text2: Hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasan xaafettidi xaaxettida maxaafaa ayyo immidosona . He maxaafaa dooyidi , “ Taani hiyyeesaassi lo77o mishiraachchuwaa yootanau tiyettido gishshau , Godaa Ayyaanai ta bollan de7ees . Qashettidaageetussi birshshettiyoogaa , qooqetussi xeelliyoogaa yootana mala , qassi qohettidaageeta qohuwaappe kessana mala , dosettida Godaa laittaa yootana mala , tana kiittiis ” geetettidi , xaafettida sohuwaa demmiis .

text: And he closed the book , and he gave it again to the minister , and sat down . And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him .
text2: Maxaafaa xaaxidi , Aihuda woosa keettan naagiyaagaassi immidi uttiis . Aihuda woosa keettan de7iya asai a akeekidi xeellees .

text: And he began to say unto them , This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears .
text2: Yesuusi etassi haasayanau doommidi , “ Hachchi nabbabettin , intte siyiyo wode , ha Xoossaa maxaafai giidoogee polettiis ” yaagiis .

text: And all bare him witness , and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth . And they said , Is not this Joseph ' s son ?
text2: Ubbai ayyo markkattidosona . A doonaappe kiyiya aaro kehatettaa qaalaa garamettidi , “ Hagee Yooseefa na7aa gidennee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And he said unto them , Ye will surely say unto me this proverb , Physician , heal thyself : whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum , do also here in thy country .
text2: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Intte taassi , ' Xaliyaa godau , ne huuphiyaa patta ' yaagiyo leemisuwaa yootanaagaa taani geeshshada erais . Qassi , ' Neeni Qifirinaahooma kataman oottidoogaa nuuni siyida ; hegaadan hagan ne biittan ootta ' yaagidi , intte taassi yootana ” yaagiis .

text: And he said , Verily I say unto you , No prophet is accepted in his own country .
text2: Qassikka hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Tumaa gais ; hananabaa yootiyaagee ba biittan bonchchetti erenna .

text: But I tell you of a truth , many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias , when the heaven was shut up three years and six months , when great famine was throughout all the land ;
text2: “ SHin taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; Eelaasa wodiyan heezzu laittanne usuppun agina gakkanaashin , saloi gorddettin , sa7an ubban wolqqaama koshai geliis . Gelido wode , Israa7eelan daro am77e maccaasati de7oosona .

text: But unto none of them was Elias sent , save unto Sarepta , a city of Sidon , unto a woman that was a widow .
text2: Eelaasi Sidoona biittan de7iya Siraafita giyo kataman issi am77e maccaaseekko kiitettoorippe attin , etappe ookkonne kiitettibeenna .

text: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet ; and none of them was cleansed , saving Naaman the Syrian .
text2: Hananabaa yootiya Elssaa7a wodiyan Israa7eelan daro inchchirichchaa harggiya asai de7ees . Sooriyaa Naa7imaanappe attin , etappe harai issoinne paxibeenna ” yaagiis .

text: And all they in the synagogue , when they heard these things , were filled with wrath ,
text2: Aihuda woosa keettan de7iya ubbai hegaa siyidi , daro hanqqettidosona .

text: And rose up , and thrust him out of the city , and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built , that they might cast him down headlong .
text2: Eti denddidi , katamaappe Yesuusa gaxaa efiidosona . Efiidi kakaara duge olanau katamai keexettido deriyaa huuphiyaa a kessidosona .

text: But he passing through the midst of them went his way ,
text2: SHin i eta gidduwaara kanttidi biis .

text: And came down to Capernaum , a city of Galilee , and taught them on the sabbath days .
text2: Galiilan Qifirinaahooma giyo katamaa wodhdhidi , Yesuusi Sambbatan asaa tamaarissees .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for his word was with power .
text2: A qaalai alaafetettai de7iyo asa qaala mala gidido gishshau , asai a timirttiyaa siyidi garamettiis .

text: And in the synagogue there was a man , which had a spirit of an unclean devil , and cried out with a loud voice ,
text2: Aihuda woosa keettan iita ayyaanai de7iyo bitanee ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi ,

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art ; the Holy One of God .
text2: “ Hai aggarkkii ; Naazireeta Yesuusaa , neeni nuuppe ai koyai ? Nuna xaissanau yaadii ? Neeni oonakko erais ; neeni Xoossaa geeshshaa gidikkii ! ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him . And when the devil had thrown him in the midst , he came out of him , and hurt him not .
text2: Yesuusi he iita ayyaanaa , “ Haizza ; bitaniyaappe kiya ” yaagidi azaziis . Iita ayyaanai a eta matan gufantti yeggidi , ainne qohennan bitaniyaappe kiyi aggiis .

text: And they were all amazed , and spake among themselves , saying , What a word is this ! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits , and they come out .
text2: Ubbai garamettidi bantta giddon , “ Hagee aiba qaalee ? Alaafetettaaninne wolqqan iita ayyaanata azazees ; qassi appe kiyidi boosona ” yaagidi haasayidosona .

text: And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about .
text2: Yesuusabai hegaa heeran de7iya biitta ubbaa gakki aggiis .

text: And he arose out of the synagogue , and entered into Simon ' s house . And Simon ' s wife ' s mother was taken with a great fever ; and they besought him for her .
text2: Yesuusi Aihuda woosa keettaappe denddidi , Simoona soo biis . Biyo wode , Simoona bollotiyaa wolqqaama qoxuwaanne mishuwaa harggada zin77idaaribaa Yesuusayyo yootidosona .

text: And he stood over her , and rebuked the fever ; and it left her : and immediately she arose and ministered unto them .
text2: I matan eqqidi , qoxuwaanne mishuwaa agga gin , mishoinne qoxoi o aggiis . Sohuwaara denddada etayyo ootta aggaasu .

text: Now when the sun was setting , all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him ; and he laid his hands on every one of them , and healed them .
text2: Dumma dumma harggiyan ohettida asaa ubbaa awai wullin , akko ehiidosona . Ba kushiyaa eta ubbaa bolli huuphiyan huuphiyan wottidi , ubbaa pattiis .

text: And devils also came out of many , crying out , and saying , Thou art Christ the Son of God . And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak : for they knew that he was Christ .
text2: Pattin xalaheti qassi , “ Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa Kiristtoosa gidikkii ! ” yaagidi waassiiddi , daro asaappe kiyidosona . I Kiristtoosa gididoogaa eti erido gishshau , haasayennaadan Yesuusi eta seeridi diggiis .

text: And when it was day , he departed and went into a desert place : and the people sought him , and came unto him , and stayed him , that he should not depart from them .
text2: Wonttin kiyidi , asi bainnasaa biis . Asai a koyiiddi , akko yiis . I eta matappe beenna mala , digganau koyidosona .

text: And he said unto them , I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also : for therefore am I sent .
text2: SHin i , “ Taani hara kataman de7iya asaukka Xoossaa kawotettaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootanau bessees . Aissi giikko , Xoossai tana kiittidoogee hegaassa ” yaagiis .

text: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee .
text2: Yaagidi , Galiilan de7iya Aihuda woosa keettatun yootiis .

text: And it came to pass , that , as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God , he stood by the lake of Gennesaret ,
text2: Asai Xoossaa qaalaa Yesuusappe siyiiddi a sugin , Yesuusi Genssereexa abbaa lanqqiyan eqqiis .

text: And saw two ships standing by the lake : but the fishermen were gone out of them , and were washing their nets .
text2: Eqqidi abbaa lanqqiyan de7iya naa77u wolwoluwaa be7iis . Hegan moliyaa oiqqiyaageeti wolwoluwaappe kiyidi , bantta gitiyaa meeccoosona .

text: And he entered into one of the ships , which was Simon ' s , and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land . And he sat down , and taught the people out of the ship .
text2: Yesuusi he wolwolotuppe issuwan , Simoonaagan gelidi , “ Ha wolwoluwaa abbaa lanqqiyaappe guuttiyo giddokko shiishsha ” yaagidi Simoona woossiis . He wolwoluwaa giddon uttidi , deriyaa tamaarissiis .

text: Now when he had left speaking , he said unto Simon , Launch out into the deep , and let down your nets for a draught .
text2: Haasayaa wurssidoogaappe guyye baggan Simoona , “ Ciimmatiya sohuwaa shiiqa ; moliyaa oiqqanau intte gitiyaa haattan yeggite ” yaagiis .

text: And Simon answering said unto him , Master , we have toiled all the night , and have taken nothing : nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net .
text2: Simooni zaaridi , “ Godau , qamma ubbaa daafuridi , ainne oiqqibookko ; shin ha77i ne qaalaadan gitiyaa yeggais ” yaagiis .

text: And when they had this done , they inclosed a great multitude of fishes : and their net brake .
text2: Yeggidoogaappe guyye baggan , keehi daro moliyaa oiqqin , gitee daahettana haniis .

text: And they beckoned unto their partners , which were in the other ship , that they should come and help them . And they came , and filled both the ships , so that they began to sink .
text2: Etaara issippe oottiya hara wolwoluwan de7iyaageeti yiidi banttana maaddana mala , eta wuttin , yiidi naa77u wolwoluwaakka haattai mittana gakkanaashin , moliyaa kunttidosona .

text: When Simon Peter saw it , he fell down at Jesus ' knees , saying , Depart from me ; for I am a sinful man , O Lord .
text2: SHin Simoon PHeexiroosi hegaa be7ido wode , Yesuusa tohuwan kunddidi , “ Godau , taani nagaranchcha gidido gishshau , taappe shaahetta ” yaagiis .

text: For he was astonished , and all that were with him , at the draught of the fishes which they had taken :
text2: Simooninne aara de7iya hara asai ubbai bantta oiqqido daro moliyaa be7idi , garamettidosona .

text: And so was also James , and John , the sons of Zebedee , which were partners with Simon . And Jesus said unto Simon , Fear not ; from henceforth thou shalt catch men .
text2: Hegaadankka Simoonaara issippe oottiyaageeti , Zabddiyoosa naati , Yaaqoobinne Yohaannisi garamettidosona . Garamettin Yesuusi Simoona , “ Yayyoppa ; hagaappe sinttan neeni asa oiqqiyaagaa gidana ” yaagiis .

text: And when they had brought their ships to land , they forsook all , and followed him .
text2: Eti wolwolota haattaappe gaxaa kessidoogaappe guyye baggan , ubbabaa aggi bayidi , Yesuusa kaallidosona .

text: And it came to pass , when he was in a certain city , behold a man full of leprosy : who seeing Jesus fell on his face , and besought him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Yesuusi katamatuppe issinnen de7ishin , issi inchchirichchai bolla ubban kumido bitanee Yesuusakko yiidi , a be7idi , a sinttan gulbbatidi , “ Godau , neeni koyikko , tana pattanau danddayaasa ” yaagidi woossiis .

text: And he put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will : be thou clean . And immediately the leprosy departed from him .
text2: Yesuusi ba kushiyaa yeddidi , a bochchidi , “ Taani koyais ; paxa ! ” yaagin , sohuwaarakka inchchirichchai bitaniyaa yeddi aggiis .

text: And he charged him to tell no man : but go , and shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing , according as Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Yesuusi a , “ Hagaa oossinne yootoppa ; shin qeesiyaakko baada ne bollaa a bessa ; neeni geeshsha gididoogaa asaa erissanau Muusee azazidoogaadankka yarshshuwaa yarshsha ” yaagiis .

text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him : and great multitudes came together to hear , and to be healed by him of their infirmities .
text2: SHin Yesuusabai daro sohuwaa gakkiyo wode , cora asai i odiyoogaa siyanaunne bantta harggiyaappe paxanau shiiqoosona .

text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness , and prayed .
text2: SHin Yesuusi asi bainnasaa biidi woossees .

text: And it came to pass on a certain day , as he was teaching , that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by , which were come out of every town of Galilee , and Judaea , and Jerusalem : and the power of the Lord was present to heal them .
text2: Issi gallassi , Yesuusi tamaarissishin , Galiilaaninne Yihudan de7iya katamaa ubbaappenne Yerusalaameppe yiida Parisaawetinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti he sohuwan uttidosona . Yesuusi hargganchchata pattana mala , Godaa wolqqai a bolli de7ees .

text: And , behold , men brought in a bed a man which was taken with a palsy : and they sought means to bring him in , and to lay him before him .
text2: Amarida asati bollai silido issi bitaniyaa halan tookkidi , Yesuusakko ehiidosona ; ehiidi , soo gelissanaunne Yesuusa sinttan a wottanau koyidosona .

text: And when they could not find by what way they might bring him in because of the multitude , they went upon the housetop , and let him down through the tiling with his couch into the midst before Jesus .
text2: Asai darido gishshau , soo a gelissanau etassi ogee xayin , keettaa huuphiyaa kiyidi , kaaraa lukkidi , bitaniyaa a halaara duge yeddidi , Yesuusa sinttan de7iya asaa giddon wottidosona .

text: And when he saw their faith , he said unto him , Man , thy sins are forgiven thee .
text2: Yesuusi eta ammanuwaa be7idi , “ Bitaniyau , ne nagarai atto geetettiis ” yaagiis .

text: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason , saying , Who is this which speaketh blasphemies ? Who can forgive sins , but God alone ?
text2: Yaagin , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne Parisaaweti , “ Laa hagee Xoossaa bolli iitabaa haasayiyaagee oonee ? Xoossaa xalaalaappe attin , harai ooni nagara atto gaanau danddayii ? ” yaagidi , bantta giddon qofaa doommidosona .

text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts , he answering said unto them , What reason ye in your hearts ?
text2: Yesuusi eta qofaa eridi , “ Intte intte wozanan hagaadan aissi qoppeetii ?

text: Whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Rise up and walk ?
text2: ' Ne nagarai atto geetettiis ' giyoogee mateeyye woi ' Dendda eqqada hemetta ' giyoogee matee ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power upon earth to forgive sins , ( he said unto the sick of the palsy , ) I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy couch , and go into thine house .
text2: Qassi sa7aa bollan nagara atto gaanau taayyo Asa Na7aayyo alaafetettai de7iyoogaa taani inttena bessana ” yaagidi , bollai silido bitaniyaa , “ Nena gais ; dendda eqqa . Yaatada ne halaa tookkada ne soo ba ” yaagiis .

text: And immediately he rose up before them , and took up that whereon he lay , and departed to his own house , glorifying God .
text2: Sohuwaara eta sinttan denddi eqqidi , ba zin77ido halaa tookkidi , Xoossaa galatiiddi , ba soo biis .

text: And they were all amazed , and they glorified God , and were filled with fear , saying , We have seen strange things to day .
text2: Bin eti ubbai , garamettidosona . Daro yayyidi , “ Hachchi nuuni oorattabaa be7ida ” yaagidi Xoossaa galatidosona .

text: And after these things he went forth , and saw a publican , named Levi , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he said unto him , Follow me .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi kiyidi , giiraa ekkiya Leewa giyoogee giiraa ekkiyo ba sohuwan uttidaagaa demmidi , “ Tana kaalla ” yaagiis .

text: And he left all , rose up , and followed him .
text2: Yaagin Leewi ubbabaa aggi bayidi , denddi eqqidi , a kaalliis .

text: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house : and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them .
text2: Leewi ba son Yesuusa mokkanau daro imatuwaa makkiis . Hegan giiraa ekkiyaageetinne hara asai etaara issippe uttidosona .

text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples , saying , Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Parisaawetinne higgiyaa tamaarissiya , etaara oottiyaageeti , “ Giiraa ekkiyaageetuuranne nagaranchchatuura intte aissi issippe meetii ? Qassi aissi issippe uyeetii ? ” yaagidi , Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratu bolli zuuzummidosona .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , They that are whole need not a physician ; but they that are sick .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Hargganchchatuppe attin , payyatuyyo aakimee koshshenna .

text: I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Taani nagaranchchati bantta nagaraappe simmanaadan , eta xeesanau yiidoogaappe attin , xillota xeesanau yabeikke ” yaagiis .

text: And they said unto him , Why do the disciples of John fast often , and make prayers , and likewise the disciples of the Pharisees ; but thine eat and drink ?
text2: Eti Yesuusa , “ Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkarati daro wode xoomoosona ; woossoosona ; qassi Parisaaweti erissiyo ashkkaratikka hegaadan oottoosona . SHin ne erissiyo ashkkarati moosona , uyoosona ” yaagidosona .

text: And he said unto them , Can ye make the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ?
text2: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Bullachchaa yiida asata machchiyo ekkiyaagee etaara de7ishin , xoomissanau danddayeetii ? Danddayekketa ;

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: shin machchiyo ekkiyaagaa eta matappe efaana wodee yaana ; eti he wode xoomana ” yaagiis .

text: And he spake also a parable unto them ; No man putteth a piece of a new garment upon an old ; if otherwise , then both the new maketh a rent , and the piece that was taken out of the new agreeth not with the old .
text2: Yesuusi etayyo leemisuwaa odiiddi , “ Ooratta maayuwaappe peeridi , ceega maayo bolli wotti sikkiya asi baawa ; hegaadan oottikko , ooratta maayuwaa peererettana ; ooratta maayuwaappe peeridoogeekka ceega maayuwaassi giigenna .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles ; else the new wine will burst the bottles , and be spilled , and the bottles shall perish .
text2: Ho77o woine eessa ceega ogoron naaqqiya asi baawa ; naaqqikko he woiniyaa eessai ogoruwaa daakkana ; baukka gukkana ; ogoroikka moorettana .

text: But new wine must be put into new bottles ; and both are preserved .
text2: SHin ho77o woine eessa ooratta ogoron naaqqanau koshshees ; eti issoi issuwaa naagoosona .

text: No man also having drunk old wine straightway desireth new : for he saith , The old is better .
text2: Gam77ida woine eessa lo77o yaagiyo gishshau , a uyirggidi , oorattaa uyanau koyiyai ooninne baawa ” yaagiis .

text: And it came to pass on the second sabbath after the first , that he went through the corn fields ; and his disciples plucked the ears of corn , and did eat , rubbing them in their hands .
text2: Yesuusi issi Sambbata gallassi tiya bangga giddoora aadhdhishin , i erissiyo ashkkarati tiya banggaa duuttidi , bantta kushiyan shigichchidi moosona .

text: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them , Why do ye that which is not lawful to do on the sabbath days ?
text2: Issi issi Parisaaweti , “ Sambbatan oottanau woga gidennabaa aissi ootteetii ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus answering them said , Have ye not read so much as this , what David did , when himself was an hungred , and they which were with him ;
text2: Yesuusi etassi zaaridi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Daawitinne aara de7iyaageeti namisettido wode , Daawiti oottidobaa nabbabibeekketii ?

text: How he went into the house of God , and did take and eat the shewbread , and gave also to them that were with him ; which it is not lawful to eat but for the priests alone ?
text2: Daawiti Xoossaa keettaa gelidi , qeesetuppe attin , ooninne maanau higge gidennaagaa Xoossaassi yarshshido oittaa miidi , banaara de7iyaageetussikka immiis ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto them , That the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Qassi Yesuusi , “ Taani Asa Na7ai , Sambbataa Godaa ” yaagidi etassi odiis .

text: And it came to pass also on another sabbath , that he entered into the synagogue and taught : and there was a man whose right hand was withered .
text2: Yesuusi hara Sambbatan Aihuda woosa keettaa gelidi tamaarissiis . Hegan ushachcha kushee gunddido issi bitanee de7ees .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees watched him , whether he would heal on the sabbath day ; that they might find an accusation against him .
text2: Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne Parisaaweti Yesuusa mootiyoobaa demmanau , i Sambbatan asa pattikko be7ana yaagidi naagi uttidosona .

text: But he knew their thoughts , and said to the man which had the withered hand , Rise up , and stand forth in the midst . And he arose and stood forth .
text2: SHin i eta qofaa eridi , kushee gunddido bitaniyaa , “ Denddada , hagan gidduwan eqqa ” yaagin , bitanee denddidi eqqiis .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , I will ask you one thing ; Is it lawful on the sabbath days to do good , or to do evil ? to save life , or to destroy it ?
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi eta , “ ' Higgee Sambbatan lo77obaa oottanaagaa azaziiyye ? Iitabaa oottanaagaa azazii ? Asa shemppo ashshanaagaa azaziiyye woranaagaa azazii ? ' yaagada inttena oichchais ” yaagiis .

text: And looking round about upon them all , he said unto the man , Stretch forth thy hand . And he did so : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Yesuusi eta ubbaa yuushshi aatti xeellidi bitaniyaa , “ Ne kushiyaa piddi ootta ” yaagiis . I piddi oottin , a kushee paxiis .

text: And they were filled with madness ; and communed one with another what they might do to Jesus .
text2: Eti daro hanqqettidosona . Hanqqettidi , “ Nuuni Yesuusa ai oottanee ? ” yaagidi , bantta giddon haasayidosona .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that he went out into a mountain to pray , and continued all night in prayer to God .
text2: He wodiyan Yesuusi Xoossaa woossanau deree de7iyoosaa biis . Biidi qamma ubban Xoossaa woossiiddi aqiis .

text: And when it was day , he called unto him his disciples : and of them he chose twelve , whom also he named apostles ;
text2: Qassi bana kaalliyaageeta wonttin xeesiis ; etappe tammanne naa77aa dooridi , “ Kiitettidaageeta ” yaagidi sunttiis .

text: Simon , ( whom he also named Peter , ) and Andrew his brother , James and John , Philip and Bartholomew ,
text2: Hegeeti PHeexiroosa yaagidi sunttido Simoona , a ishaa Inddiraasa , Yaaqooba , Yohaannisa , Piliphphoosa , Barttalamoosa ,

text: Matthew and Thomas , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon called Zelotes ,
text2: Maatiyoosa , Toomaasa , Ilppiyoosa na7aa Yaaqooba , ba biittaassi mishettiya Simoona ,

text: And Judas the brother of James , and Judas Iscariot , which also was the traitor .
text2: Yaaqooba na7aa Yihudaanne Yesuusa aattidi immida Yihudaa Asqqoroota .

text: And he came down with them , and stood in the plain , and the company of his disciples , and a great multitude of people out of all Judaea and Jerusalem , and from the sea coast of Tyre and Sidon , which came to hear him , and to be healed of their diseases ;
text2: Etaara deriyaappe duge wodhdhidi , kaalliyaageetuppe daruwaara issippe dembba biittan eqqiis . Qassi i giyoobaa siyidi , bantta harggiyaappe paxanau Yihudaa ubbaappe , Yerusalaameppe , abbaa matan de7iya Xiiroosappenne Sidoonappe yiida daro asai he sohuwan de7ees . Tuna ayyaanan waayettiyaageeti bantta harggiyaappe paxidosona .

text: And the whole multitude sought to touch him : for there went virtue out of him , and healed them all .
text2: Wolqqai appe kiyidi , eta ubbaa pattiyo gishshau , asai ubbai a bochchanau keehi koyees .

text: And he lifted up his eyes on his disciples , and said , Blessed be ye poor : for yours is the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratukko xeellidi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Xoossaa kawotettai inttebaa gidiyo gishshau , hiyyeesati intte anjjettidaageeta .

text: Blessed are ye that hunger now : for ye shall be filled . Blessed are ye that weep now : for ye shall laugh .
text2: Intte digin kallana gishshau , ha77i namisettiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta . Intte digin miiccana gishshau , ha77i yeekkiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta .

text: Blessed are ye , when men shall hate you , and when they shall separate you from their company , and shall reproach you , and cast out your name as evil , for the Son of man ' s sake .
text2: Intte tana Asa Na7aa kaalliyo gishshau , asi inttena ixxiyo wode , asappe shaakkiyo wode , boriyo wode , inttena iita sunttan xeegiyo wodekka intte anjjettidaageeta .

text: Rejoice ye in that day , and leap for joy : for , behold , your reward is great in heaven : for in the like manner did their fathers unto the prophets .
text2: “ Intteyyo saluwan gita woitoi de7iyo gishshau , he wode ufaissan guppite ; aissi giikko , eta aawati hananabaa yootiyaageeta hegaadan oottidosona .

text: But woe unto you that are rich ! for ye have received your consolation .
text2: “ SHin duretoo , intte ufaittidi de7iyo gishshau , intteyyo aayye7ana .

text: Woe unto you that are full ! for ye shall hunger . Woe unto you that laugh now ! for ye shall mourn and weep .
text2: Intte digin namisettana gishshau , ha77i kallidaageetoo , intteyyo aayye7ana . Intte qarettana gishshaunne yeekkana gishshau , ha77i miicciyaageetoo , intteyyo aayye7ana .

text: Woe unto you , when all men shall speak well of you ! for so did their fathers to the false prophets .
text2: Asa ubbai inttebaa loittidi haasayiyo wode aayye7ana ; aissi giikko , eta aawati hananabaa yootiya worddanchchatussi hegaadan oottoosona .

text: But I say unto you which hear , Love your enemies , do good to them which hate you ,
text2: “ SHin taani yootiyoogaa siyiyaageetoo , taani intteyyo odais ; intte morkketa siiqite ; inttena ixxiyaageetussi lo77obaa oottite ;

text: Bless them that curse you , and pray for them which despitefully use you .
text2: inttena qanggiyaageeta anjjite ; inttena naaqqiyaageetussi Xoossaa woossite .

text: And unto him that smiteth thee on the one cheek offer also the other ; and him that taketh away thy cloke forbid not to take thy coat also .
text2: Ooninne ne qinxxalliyaa baqqikko , hinkko qinxxalliyaakka bessa ; ooninne ne kootiyaa ekkikko , qoliyaakka diggoppa .

text: Give to every man that asketh of thee ; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again .
text2: “ Nena woossiya ubbau imma ; ne miishshaa ekkiya uraappe guyye zaara yaagada oichchoppa .

text: And as ye would that men should do to you , do ye also to them likewise .
text2: Asi intteyyo oottanau intte dosiyoogaadan , haraukka hegaadan oottite .

text: For if ye love them which love you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also love those that love them .
text2: “ Intte inttena siiqiyaageetu xalaalaa siiqikko , intteyyo ai galati de7ii ? Aissi giikko , nagaranchchatikka banttana siiqiyaageeta siiqoosona .

text: And if ye do good to them which do good to you , what thank have ye ? for sinners also do even the same .
text2: Intte intteyyo lo77obaa oottiyaageetussi lo77obaa oottikko , inttessi ai galati de7ii ? Aissi giikko , nagaranchchatikka qassi hegaadan oottoosona .

text: And if ye lend to them of whom ye hope to receive , what thank have ye ? for sinners also lend to sinners , to receive as much again .
text2: Intte guyye ekkanau qoppidi tal77ikko , inttessi ai galati de7ii ? Nagaranchchatikka guyye ekkanau nagaranchchatussi tal77oosona ;

text: But love ye your enemies , and do good , and lend , hoping for nothing again ; and your reward shall be great , and ye shall be the children of the Highest : for he is kind unto the unthankful and to the evil .
text2: shin Xoossai bana galatennaageetussikka iitatussikka keha gidido gishshau , intte morkketa siiqite ; etayyo lo77obaa oottite ; qassi ainne guyye ekkanau qoppennan tal77ite ; intte ekkana woitoi darana . Qassi intte Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaa naata gidana .

text: Be ye therefore merciful , as your Father also is merciful .
text2: Intte Aawai Xoossai maariyoogaadan maarite .

text: Judge not , and ye shall not be judged : condemn not , and ye shall not be condemned : forgive , and ye shall be forgiven :
text2: “ Haratu bolli pirddoppite ; Xoossai intte bolli pirddenna . Harata iita gooppite ; Xoossai inttena iita geenna . Atto giite ; Xoossai intteyyo atto gaana . Immite ; Xoossai intteyyo immana . Baqqi naaqqidi siilli kunttin , palahidi wora laalettiyaagaa Xoossai intte kiyuwan idinttidi immana . Aissi giikko , intte harau immanau likkidi makkiyooban Xoossai intteyyo likkidi immana ” yaagiis .

text: And he spake a parable unto them , Can the blind lead the blind ? shall they not both fall into the ditch ?
text2: Yesuusi etassi leemisuwaa odiiddi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Qooqee qooqe kaalettana danddayii ? Kaalettikko , naa77ai ollan kunddokkonaa ?

text: The disciple is not above his master : but every one that is perfect shall be as his master .
text2: Tamaariyaagee bana tamaarissiyaagaappe aadhdhenna ; shin tamaaridi wurssida ubbai tamaarissiyaagaa mala gidees .

text: And why beholdest thou the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye , but perceivest not the beam that is in thine own eye ?
text2: “ Ne aifiyan de7iya tuussaa be7akka ; shin ne ishaa aifiyan de7iya suullaa aissi xeellai ?

text: Either how canst thou say to thy brother , Brother , let me pull out the mote that is in thine eye , when thou thyself beholdest not the beam that is in thine own eye ? Thou hypocrite , cast out first the beam out of thine own eye , and then shalt thou see clearly to pull out the mote that is in thy brother ' s eye .
text2: Ne aifiyan de7iya tuussaa be7ennan waanada ne ishaa , ' Ta ishau , taani ne aifiyan de7iya suullaa kessoo ' gaanau danddayai ? Laa ha lo77o milatiya iitau , kasetada ne aifiyaappe tuussaa kessargga . Hegaappe guyyiyan , ne ishaa aifiyan de7iya suullaa kessanau geeshshada xeellana danddayaasa .

text: For a good tree bringeth not forth corrupt fruit ; neither doth a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit .
text2: “ Lo77o mitti iita aife aifenna ; hegaadankka , iita mitti lo77o aife aifenna .

text: For every tree is known by his own fruit . For of thorns men do not gather figs , nor of a bramble bush gather they grapes .
text2: Aissi giikko , mitta ubbai ba aifiyo aifiyan erettees ; agunttappe balase giyo mitta aife , gom77oreppe woine aife maxi erettenna .

text: A good man out of the good treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is good ; and an evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is evil : for of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaketh .
text2: Lo77o asi ba wozana giddon de7iya lo77o minjjaappe lo77obaa kessees ; qassi iita asi ba iita minjjaappe iitabaa kessees ; aissi giikko , asa dooni a wozanan kumidabaappe haasayees .

text: And why call ye me , Lord , Lord , and do not the things which I say ?
text2: “ Taani giyoogaa oottiyoogaa aggi bayidi , aissi tana , ' Godau , Godau ' geetii ?

text: Whosoever cometh to me , and heareth my sayings , and doeth them , I will shew you to whom he is like :
text2: Taakko yiya ubbai qassi ta qaalaa siyidi azazettiyaagee ai mala asakko taani inttena bessana .

text: He is like a man which built an house , and digged deep , and laid the foundation on a rock : and when the flood arose , the stream beat vehemently upon that house , and could not shake it : for it was founded upon a rock .
text2: I gita ollaa bookkidi , aaho shuchchaa hiixxidi , gimbbidi , keettaa keexxida asa mala . Di7oi di77ido wode , he keettaa sugiis ; shin minttidi keexxido gishshau , qaattanau danddayibeenna .

text: But he that heareth , and doeth not , is like a man that without a foundation built an house upon the earth ; against which the stream did beat vehemently , and immediately it fell ; and the ruin of that house was great .
text2: SHin ta qaalaa siyidi oottenna urai , aaho shuchcha hiixxennaaninne gimbbennan biittan keetta keexxida asa mala . Di7oi sugin , keettai sohuwaara kunddi aggiis ; he keettai wolqqaama kunddetta kunddiis ” yaagiis .

text: Now when he had ended all his sayings in the audience of the people , he entered into Capernaum .
text2: Yesuusi ubbabaa asau wurssi odirggidoogaappe guyye baggan , Qifirinaahooma geliis .

text: And a certain centurion ' s servant , who was dear unto him , was sick , and ready to die .
text2: Issi mato halaqai de7iyaagaassi i dosiyo ashkkarai harggidi , haiqqana matiis .

text: And when he heard of Jesus , he sent unto him the elders of the Jews , beseeching him that he would come and heal his servant .
text2: He mato halaqai Yesuusabaa siyido wode , Yesuusi yiidi , ba ashkkaraa pattanau woossana mala , Yihudaa cimata Yesuusakko kiittiis .

text: And when they came to Jesus , they besought him instantly , saying , That he was worthy for whom he should do this :
text2: Etinne Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Neeni hegaa ayyo oottanau bessees .

text: For he loveth our nation , and he hath built us a synagogue .
text2: Aissi giikko , i nu asaa siiqidi , Aihuda woosa keettaa ba miishshan keexxiis ” yaagidi daro woossidosona . Yesuusinne etaara biis .

text: Then Jesus went with them . And when he was now not far from the house , the centurion sent friends to him , saying unto him , Lord , trouble not thyself : for I am not worthy that thou shouldest enter under my roof :
text2: Biidi mato halaqaa keettaa gakkanau matido wode , mato halaqai ba laggeta akko kiittidi , “ Ta Godau , daafuroppa ; aissi giikko , nena ta soo gelissanau tau bessenna .

text: Wherefore neither thought I myself worthy to come unto thee : but say in a word , and my servant shall be healed .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani neekko shiiqanau laafa gidiyoogaa erais ; shin neeni doona xalaalaa haasaya ; ta ashkkarai paxana .

text: For I also am a man set under authority , having under me soldiers , and I say unto one , Go , and he goeth ; and to another , Come , and he cometh ; and to my servant , Do this , and he doeth it .
text2: Taani taappe bollaara de7iyaageetuyyo haarettiya asa ; taappe garssaara wotaaddarati de7oosona . Taani issuwaa , ' Ba ' giikko bees ; qassi hinkkuwaa , ' Haa ya ' giikko yees ; ta ashkkaraa , ' Hagaa ootta ' giikko oottees ” yaagiis .

text: When Jesus heard these things , he marvelled at him , and turned him about , and said unto the people that followed him , I say unto you , I have not found so great faith , no , not in Israel .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa siyido wode , aban garamettidi , guyye simmidi , bana kaalliya daro asaa , “ Inttena gais ; taani hagaa mala ammanuwaa harai atto , Israa7eela biittankka be7abeikke ” yaagiis .

text: And they that were sent , returning to the house , found the servant whole that had been sick .
text2: Kiitettida asati mato halaqaa soo guyye simmidi , a ashkkarai paxidaagaa be7idosona .

text: And it came to pass the day after , that he went into a city called Nain ; and many of his disciples went with him , and much people .
text2: Guyyeppe Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuuranne daro asaara Naina giyo issi katamaa biis .

text: Now when he came nigh to the gate of the city , behold , there was a dead man carried out , the only son of his mother , and she was a widow : and much people of the city was with her .
text2: Yesuusi katamaa dooni shiiqido wode , asai haiqqida asa ahaa tookkidi efees . Haiqqidaageenne ba aayeessi issi na7aa ; a ba azinai haiqqoosappe am77e gidada de7ausu . Katamaa asaappe daroi o kaalliis .

text: And when the Lord saw her , he had compassion on her , and said unto her , Weep not .
text2: Godai o be7idi , iyyo qarettidi , “ Yeekkoppa ” yaagiis .

text: And he came and touched the bier : and they that bare him stood still . And he said , Young man , I say unto thee , Arise .
text2: I shiiqidi , ahaa saaxiniyaa bochchin , tookkida asai eqqiis . Yesuusi , “ Na7au , dendda gais ” yaagin ,

text: And he that was dead sat up , and began to speak . And he delivered him to his mother .
text2: haiqqidaagee xoqqu giidi uttiis . Qassi haasayaa doommin , Yesuusi na7aa a aayeessi immiis .

text: And there came a fear on all : and they glorified God , saying , That a great prophet is risen up among us ; and , That God hath visited his people .
text2: Asa ubbai daro yayyidi , “ Hananabaa yootiya goobai nu giddon beettiis ; qassi Xoossai ba asaa maaddanau yiis ” yaagiiddi Xoossaa galatidosona .

text: And this rumour of him went forth throughout all Judaea , and throughout all the region round about .
text2: Hagee i oottidobai Yihudaa biittaa ubbaaninne hegaa heeran de7iya biitta ubban haasayettiis .

text: And the disciples of John shewed him of all these things .
text2: Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa ubbaa Yohaannisassi yootidosona .

text: And John calling unto him two of his disciples sent them to Jesus , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Yohaannisi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuppe naa77aa baakko xeesidi , “ Yaanaagee neneeyye ? Woikko nuuni haraa naaganee ? ” yaagidi , eti oichchana mala , Yesuusakko kiittiis .

text: When the men were come unto him , they said , John Baptist hath sent us unto thee , saying , Art thou he that should come ? or look we for another ?
text2: Kiittin eti akko yiidi , “ ' Yaanaagee neneeyye ? Woikko nuuni haraa naaganee ? ' yaagidi oichchana mala , Xammaqiya Yohaannisi nuna neekko kiittiis ” yaagidosona .

text: And in that same hour he cured many of their infirmities and plagues , and of evil spirits ; and unto many that were blind he gave sight .
text2: He gallassi Yesuusi daro harggissidi , paxa kaa7iya sahuwaappenne iita ayyaanaappe daro asaa pattiis . Qassi daro qooqe asaa xeelissiis .

text: Then Jesus answering said unto them , Go your way , and tell John what things ye have seen and heard ; how that the blind see , the lame walk , the lepers are cleansed , the deaf hear , the dead are raised , to the poor the gospel is preached .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Biidi intte be7idoogaanne siyidoogaa Yohaannisassi yootite ; qooqeti xeelloosona ; wobbeti hemettoosona ; inchchirichchai oiqqidoogeeti paxoosona ; tulleti siyoosona ; haiqqidaageeti denddoosona ; hiyyeesati wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa siyoosona .

text: And blessed is he , whosoever shall not be offended in me .
text2: Tana sirenna urai anjjettidaagaa ” yaagiis .

text: And when the messengers of John were departed , he began to speak unto the people concerning John , What went ye out into the wilderness for to see ? A reed shaken with the wind ?
text2: Yohaannisi kiittidoogeeti biichchidoogaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi Yohaannisabaa shiiqida asaassi hagaadan yaagidi haasayiis ; “ Ai be7anau bazzo kiyidetii ? Carkkoi qaattiyo shombboquwaa be7anau kiyidetiiyye ?

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A man clothed in soft raiment ? Behold , they which are gorgeously apparelled , and live delicately , are in kings ' courts .
text2: Yaatin ai be7anau kiyidetii ? Lo77iya maayuwaa maayida bitaniyaa be7anau kiyidetiiyye ? Lo77iya maayuwaa maayidaageetinne duretidi ufaissan de7iyaageeti kawo keettan de7oosona .

text: But what went ye out for to see ? A prophet ? Yea , I say unto you , and much more than a prophet .
text2: Yaatin ai be7anau kiyidetii ? Hananabaa yootiyaagaa be7anau kiyidetii ? Ee ; taani intteyyo odais ; hananabaa yootiyaagaappekka aadhdhiyaagaa be7ideta .

text: This is he , of whom it is written , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafan , ' Godai , “ Be7a , ta kiittiyoogaa taani neeppe sinttau yeddana . I neeyyo ogiyaa kessana ” yaagees ' geetettidi Yohaannisabai xaafettiis .

text: For I say unto you , Among those that are born of women there is not a greater prophet than John the Baptist : but he that is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he .
text2: “ Taani intteyyo odais ; aayee uluwaappe yelettida asa ubban Xammaqiya Yohaannisappe aadhdhiya ooninne de7ibeenna ; shin Xoossaa kawotettan ubbaappe laafiyaageekka appe aadhdhana ” yaagiis .

text: And all the people that heard him , and the publicans , justified God , being baptized with the baptism of John .
text2: Siyida asai ubbai harai atto qaraxaa shiishshiyaageeti attennan , Yohaannisan xammaqettidi , Xoossai xillo gidiyoogaa ammanidosona .

text: But the Pharisees and lawyers rejected the counsel of God against themselves , being not baptized of him .
text2: SHin higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne Parisaaweti Yohaannisan xammaqettibeenna gishshau , Xoossai etassi qoppidobaa ixxidosona .

text: And the Lord said , Whereunto then shall I liken the men of this generation ? and to what are they like ?
text2: Yesuusi , “ Yaatin taani ha wodiyaa asaa aibiira leemisoo ? Eti ai milatiyoonaa ?

text: They are like unto children sitting in the marketplace , and calling one to another , and saying , We have piped unto you , and ye have not danced ; we have mourned to you , and ye have not wept .
text2: Eti qocan uttiya naata milatoosona ; bantta giddon issoi issuwaa xeesidi , ' Nuuni intteyyo cachcha zayiyaa punnida ; shin duribeekketa . Yeeho yettaakka kessida ; shin yeekkibeekketa ' yaagoosona .

text: For John the Baptist came neither eating bread nor drinking wine ; and ye say , He hath a devil .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xammaqiya Yohaannisi Xoomiiddinne woine eessa uyennan yin intte , ' A bolli xalahee de7ees ' yaagideta .

text: The Son of man is come eating and drinking ; and ye say , Behold a gluttonous man , and a winebibber , a friend of publicans and sinners !
text2: Taani Asa Na7ai , maiddanne uyaidda yin , intte tana Asa Na7aa , ' Ha yoraanne woine eessaa uyiyaagaa be7ite ! Giiraa ekkiyaageetuuranne nagaranchchatuura siiqettees ' yaageeta .

text: But wisdom is justified of all her children .
text2: SHin Xoossaa aadhdhida eratettai ba oosuwan tuma gididi beettees ” yaagiis .

text: And one of the Pharisees desired him that he would eat with him . And he went into the Pharisee ' s house , and sat down to meat .
text2: Parisaawetuppe issoi banaara laaxaa maanau Yesuusa woossin , Yesuusi a soo yiidi , laaxaa maanau uttiis .

text: And , behold , a woman in the city , which was a sinner , when she knew that Jesus sat at meat in the Pharisee ' s house , brought an alabaster box of ointment ,
text2: He kataman issi nagaranchcha mishiriyaa de7iyaara Yesuusi a son laaxau uttidoogaa erada , albbasxxiroosa giyo shuchchaappe oosettida bilqqaadiyaa kumida shittuwaa ehaasu .

text: And stood at his feet behind him weeping , and began to wash his feet with tears , and did wipe them with the hairs of her head , and kissed his feet , and anointed them with the ointment .
text2: Guyyeera a tohuwaa matan eqqada yeekkishin , i afuttai a tohuwan xokkidi , laagottidoogaa ba huuphiyaa binnaanan quccausu . Tohuwaa quccaiddanne yeraidda shittuwan tiyausu .

text: Now when the Pharisee which had bidden him saw it , he spake within himself , saying , This man , if he were a prophet , would have known who and what manner of woman this is that toucheth him : for she is a sinner .
text2: Yesuusa ba soo xeesida Parisaawee hegaa be7idi , ba wozana giddon qoppiiddi , “ A nagaranchcha gidiyo gishshau , hagee tumu hananabaa yootiyaagaa gidiyaakko , ha bana bochchiya mishiriyaa oonakko erana ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , Simon , I have somewhat to say unto thee . And he saith , Master , say on .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Simoonaa , neessi taani odiyoobai de7ees ” yaagiis . Yaagin , Simooni , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , yoota ” yaagiis .

text: There was a certain creditor which had two debtors : the one owed five hundred pence , and the other fifty .
text2: Yesuusi hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Naa77u asati issi bitaniyaappe miishsha tal77idosona . Issoi naa77u xeetanne ishatamu biraa tal77in , naa77anttoi laatamanne ichchashu biraa tal77iis .

text: And when they had nothing to pay , he frankly forgave them both . Tell me therefore , which of them will love him most ?
text2: Hegaa qanxxanau etassi miishshi xayin , acuwaawai naa77aakka maariis . Yaatin etappe augee a aattidi siiqanai ? ” yaagiis .

text: Simon answered and said , I suppose that he , to whom he forgave most . And he said unto him , Thou hast rightly judged .
text2: Simooni zaaridi , “ Dariya biraa aggido bitaniyaa gidennan aggenna ” yaagiis . Yaagin Yesuusi Simoona , “ Tumu pirddadasa ” yaagiis .

text: And he turned to the woman , and said unto Simon , Seest thou this woman ? I entered into thine house , thou gavest me no water for my feet : but she hath washed my feet with tears , and wiped them with the hairs of her head .
text2: Yesuusi mishireekko xeellidi , Simoona hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Hanno mishiriyo be7ai ? Taani ne soo yin , harai atto haattaa ta tohuwaassi immabaakka ; shin hanna ba afuttan ta tohuwaa laagottada , ba huuphiyaa binnaanan quccaasu .

text: Thou gavest me no kiss : but this woman since the time I came in hath not ceased to kiss my feet .
text2: Neeni tana yerabaakka ; shin a taani soo geloosappe ha77i gakkanaashin , ta tohuwaa yerausu .

text: My head with oil thou didst not anoint : but this woman hath anointed my feet with ointment .
text2: Neeni ta huuphiyaa zaitiyan tiyabaakka ; shin a ta tohuwaa shittuwan tiyaasu .

text: Wherefore I say unto thee , Her sins , which are many , are forgiven ; for she loved much : but to whom little is forgiven , the same loveth little .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani inttessi odais ; a daro siiqido gishshau , i nagarai daroi atto geetettiis ; shin guutta nagaraa atto giido urai guuttaa siiqees ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto her , Thy sins are forgiven .
text2: Yesuusi mishiriyo , “ Ne nagarai attiis ” yaagiis .

text: And they that sat at meat with him began to say within themselves , Who is this that forgiveth sins also ?
text2: Yaagin , aara laaxaa maanau uttidaageeti bantta wozana giddon qoppiiddi , “ Harai atto nagaraakka atto gaanau danddayiyaagee hagee oonee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And he said to the woman , Thy faith hath saved thee ; go in peace .
text2: Yesuusi mishiriyo , “ Nena ne ammanoi ashshiis ; saruwan ba ” yaagiis .

text: And it came to pass afterward , that he went throughout every city and village , preaching and shewing the glad tidings of the kingdom of God : and the twelve were with him ,
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi Xoossaa kawotettaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiiddi , dumma dumma gita katamaanne guutta katamaa bees . Biyo wode , tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratinne

text: And certain women , which had been healed of evil spirits and infirmities , Mary called Magdalene , out of whom went seven devils ,
text2: iita ayyaanaappenne wolqqaama harggiyaappe paxida issi issi maccaasatinne aara issippe de7oosona . Hegeetinne laappun xalaheti kiyido Magddala giyo katamaappe yiida Mairaamo ,

text: And Joanna the wife of Chuza Herod ' s steward , and Susanna , and many others , which ministered unto him of their substance .
text2: Heeroodisa keettan azaziya Kuza machchiyo Yohaano , Sosinonne Yesuusau banttassi de7iyaagaappe immida daro asata .

text: And when much people were gathered together , and were come to him out of every city , he spake by a parable :
text2: Asai katamaappe kataman Yesuusakko shiiqees . Daro asai shiiqidaagau Yesuusi leemisuwaa hagaadan yaagidi odiis ;

text: A sower went out to sow his seed : and as he sowed , some fell by the way side ; and it was trodden down , and the fowls of the air devoured it .
text2: “ Issi bitanee ba zerettaa zeranau kiyiis . Zerishin , issoi issoi ogiyaa doonan wodhdhidi yerettiis . Yaatin , kafoi hegaa miis .

text: And some fell upon a rock ; and as soon as it was sprung up , it withered away , because it lacked moisture .
text2: Harai shuchchaa bolli wodhdhiis . Mokkidi , dubbai bainna gishshau meliis .

text: And some fell among thorns ; and the thorns sprang up with it , and choked it .
text2: Issi issi zerettai aguntta giddon wodhdhiis ; wodhdhidi mokkidaagaa agunttai diccidi cuulliis .

text: And other fell on good ground , and sprang up , and bare fruit an hundredfold . And when he had said these things , he cried , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Issi issi zerettai aradda biittan wodhdhidi mokkiis ; diccidi xeetu kushiyaa aifiis ” yaagiis . Yesuusi hegaa haasayiiddi , “ Siyanau haitti de7iyo urai siyo ! ” yaagidi wolqqappe haasayiis .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , What might this parable be ?
text2: I erissiyo ashkkarati , “ Yaatin , ha leemisuwaa birshshettai aibee ? ” yaagidi Yesuusa oichchidosona .

text: And he said , Unto you it is given to know the mysteries of the kingdom of God : but to others in parables ; that seeing they might not see , and hearing they might not understand .
text2: Oichchin , i hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Inttessi Xoossaa kawotettaa xuuraa erai imettiis , shin harati xeellidi be7enna mala , siyidikka akeekenna mala , taani leemisuwan haasayais .

text: Now the parable is this : The seed is the word of God .
text2: “ Leemisoi hagaa . Zerettai Xoossaa qaalaa . Ogiyaa doonan de7iya zerettai qaalaa siyidaageetu leemisuwaa bessees ; shin hegaappe guyyiyan , eti ammanidi attenna mala , xalahe halaqai yiidi , eta wozanaappe qaalaa efirggees .

text: They on the rock are they , which , when they hear , receive the word with joy ; and these have no root , which for a while believe , and in time of temptation fall away .
text2: SHuchchaa bollan de7iyaageeti siyiiddi , a qaalaa ufaissan ekkiyaageeta milatoosona ; etassi xaphoi baawa . Eti ha77issau ammaniyoogaappe attin , paacee yiyo wode xubettiyaageeta .

text: And that which fell among thorns are they , which , when they have heard , go forth , and are choked with cares and riches and pleasures of this life , and bring no fruit to perfection .
text2: Qassi aguntta giddon wodhdhidaageeti siyiyaageeta milatoosona . Siyidi banttau de7iiddi , de7uwaa wodiyaa qofan duretettaaninne lo77o de7uwan cuulettiyo gishshau , eta aifee bootennan atti aggees .

text: But that on the good ground are they , which in an honest and good heart , having heard the word , keep it , and bring forth fruit with patience .
text2: SHin aradda biittan wodhdhidaageeti hegeeti lo77o wozanaappenne tumu wozanaappe qaalaa siyidi naagidaageeta ; eti danddayaara naagidi aifoosona .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , covereth it with a vessel , or putteth it under a bed ; but setteth it on a candlestick , that they which enter in may see the light .
text2: “ Xomppe oittidi , keren qum77iyai woikko arssa giddon wottiya asi baawa ; shin asai geliiddi , poo7uwaa be7ana mala , xomppiyaa qoncciyan wottees .

text: For nothing is secret , that shall not be made manifest ; neither any thing hid , that shall not be known and come abroad .
text2: Aissi giikko , qosidobai ubbai qoncciyaa kiyana ; qassi genttidobai ubbaikka beettennan attenna .

text: Take heed therefore how ye hear : for whosoever hath , to him shall be given ; and whosoever hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he seemeth to have .
text2: “ Simmi , intte siyiyo yohuwaa ezggidi siyite ; aissi giikko , issibai de7iyo urau gujji immana . Bainnaagaappe harai atto , he au de7iyaabaa milatiyaagaakka ekkirggana ” yaagiis .

text: Then came to him his mother and his brethren , and could not come at him for the press .
text2: Yesuusa aayyiyaanne ishantti akko yiidosona ; shin daro asaa giddoora aadhdhiyo sohoi bainna gishshau , aara gaittanau danddayibookkona .

text: And it was told him by certain which said , Thy mother and thy brethren stand without , desiring to see thee .
text2: Asai Yesuusa , “ Ne aayyiyaanne ne ishantti nenaara gaittana koyidi , karen eqqidosona ” yaagiis .

text: And he answered and said unto them , My mother and my brethren are these which hear the word of God , and do it .
text2: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ta aayyiyaanne ta ishantti Xoossaa qaalaa siyiyaageetanne oottiyaageeta ” yaagiis .

text: Now it came to pass on a certain day , that he went into a ship with his disciples : and he said unto them , Let us go over unto the other side of the lake . And they launched forth .
text2: Issi gallassi , Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura issippe wolwoluwan gelidi , “ Abbaa hefintti pinnoos ” yaagiis ; yaagin biidosona .

text: But as they sailed he fell asleep : and there came down a storm of wind on the lake ; and they were filled with water , and were in jeopardy .
text2: Biishin Yesuusi xiskkiis . Wolqqaama gotee abbaa bolli yiis . Wolwoluwan haattai kumi kumi yees . Yiidi haattai eta mittana hanin ,

text: And they came to him , and awoke him , saying , Master , master , we perish . Then he arose , and rebuked the wind and the raging of the water : and they ceased , and there was a calm .
text2: erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusakko biidi , “ Godau , Godau , nuuni xayoos ” yaagidi , xiskkuwaappe a denttidosona . Yesuusi denddidi , gotiyaanne beetaa aggite gin , goteenne beetai woppu giidosona .

text: And he said unto them , Where is your faith ? And they being afraid wondered , saying one to another , What manner of man is this ! for he commandeth even the winds and water , and they obey him .
text2: Yaatin Yesuusi , “ Intte ammanoi anee ? ” yaagiis . Eti yayyidinne garamettidi bantta giddon , “ Hagee laa harai atto , gotiyaanne haattaa azaziyaagee oonee ? Etikka ayyo azazettoosona ” yaagidosona .

text: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes , which is over against Galilee .
text2: Galiila ginan sinttaara de7iya Gerggesenoona giyo biittaa wolwoluwan biidosona .

text: And when he went forth to land , there met him out of the city a certain man , which had devils long time , and ware no clothes , neither abode in any house , but in the tombs .
text2: Yesuusi abbaappe gaxaa kiyiyoorin , xalaheti de7iyo bitanee katamaappe kiyidi , aara gaittiis ; asa moogiyo gonggoluwan i daro laittaa de7iyoogaappe attin , son de7enna .

text: When he saw Jesus , he cried out , and fell down before him , and with a loud voice said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of God most high ? I beseech thee , torment me not .
text2: Yesuusa be7idi , a sinttan kunddidi , qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Ubbaappe bolla Xoossaa Na7au Yesuusaa , tananne nenanne aibee gattiyai ? Hayyanaa tana qaxxayopparkkii ” yaagiis .

text: ( For he had commanded the unclean spirit to come out of the man . For oftentimes it had caught him : and he was kept bound with chains and in fetters ; and he brake the bands , and was driven of the devil into the wilderness . )
text2: I hegaa aissi giidee giikko , Yesuusi tuna ayyaanai bitaniyaappe kiyidi baana mala azazidoogaassa . Daroto tuna ayyaanai bitaniyaa oiqqi uttido gishshau , sanssalataaninne huqqunna biratan qashettidi naagettees ; shin sanssalataa duuttees . Xalahee a bazzo yedettees .

text: And Jesus asked him , saying , What is thy name ? And he said , Legion : because many devils were entered into him .
text2: Yesuusi a , “ Ne sunttai oonee ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Daro xalaheti an de7iyo gishshau , “ Ta sunttai Leegiyoona ” yaagiis .

text: And they besought him that he would not command them to go out into the deep .
text2: Xalaheti Yesuusa , “ Nuna ciimma ollau yeddopparkkii ” yaagidi woossidosona .

text: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain : and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them . And he suffered them .
text2: He deriyaa bollan daro gudunttaa wudee hemettees ; xalaheti gudunttatu giddo gelana mala Yesuusa woossin , i , “ Biite ” yaagiis .

text: Then went the devils out of the man , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the lake , and were choked .
text2: Yaagin xalaheti bitaniyaappe kiyidi , gudunttatun gelin , wudee kakaara jaamiiddi abban gelidi , meetetti bayiis .

text: When they that fed them saw what was done , they fled , and went and told it in the city and in the country .
text2: Gudunttaa wudiyaa heemmiyaageeti hanidabaa be7ido wode , baqati biidi , katamaaninne katamaappe gaxa biittan yootidosona .

text: Then they went out to see what was done ; and came to Jesus , and found the man , out of whom the devils were departed , sitting at the feet of Jesus , clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Yootin asai hanidabaa be7anau kiyidi , Yesuusakko biis . Xalahee kiyido bitanee ba wozanai simmin , maayuwaa maayidi , Yesuusa gediyaa matan uttidaagaa asai be7idi yayyiis .

text: They also which saw it told them by what means he that was possessed of the devils was healed .
text2: Hegaa be7ida asati xalaheti oiqqido bitanee waani paxidaakko , asaassi yootidosona .

text: Then the whole multitude of the country of the Gadarenes round about besought him to depart from them ; for they were taken with great fear : and he went up into the ship , and returned back again .
text2: Gerggesenoona biittan de7iya asai ubbai daro yayyido gishshau , bantta matappe baana mala , Yesuusa woossidosona . Yesuusi wolwoluwan gelidi simmiis .

text: Now the man out of whom the devils were departed besought him that he might be with him : but Jesus sent him away , saying ,
text2: Xalaheti kiyido bitanee Yesuusaara de7ana mala , Yesuusa woossiis ; shin i , “ Ne soo simmada , Xoossai neessi waanida gitabaa oottidaakko yoota ” yaagidi a yeddiis . Yeddin , bitanee baassi Yesuusi waanida gitabaa oottidaakko , kataman de7iya asa ubbau yootiiddi biis .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Jesus was returned , the people gladly received him : for they were all waiting for him .
text2: Ubba asai Yesuusa naagiiddi uttido gishshau , i simmido wode mokkidosona .

text: And , behold , there came a man named Jairus , and he was a ruler of the synagogue : and he fell down at Jesus ' feet , and besought him that he would come into his house :
