text2: Yaa7iroosa giyoogee Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqai Yesuusakko yiis . Ayyo tammanne naa77u laitta na7iyaa de7iyaara harggada haiqqana haniyo gishshau , Yesuusa tohuwan kunddidi , ba soo gelana mala , a minttidi woossiis . Yesuusi yaa biishin , asai ubbasaara shiiqidi , a un77iis .

text: And a woman having an issue of blood twelve years , which had spent all her living upon physicians , neither could be healed of any ,
text2: Tammanne naa77u laittaasappe doommidi , i bollaappe suuttai goggiyo issi maccaasiyaa de7ausu . Aakimetussi qanxxaidda ba miishsha ubbaa wurssaasu ; shin ooninne o pattanau danddayibeenna .

text: Came behind him , and touched the border of his garment : and immediately her issue of blood stanched .
text2: Guyyeera shiiqada Yesuusa afalaa macaraa bochchaasu ; bochchin i bollaappe goggiya suuttai sohuwaarakka aggi bayiis .

text: And Jesus said , Who touched me ? When all denied , Peter and they that were with him said , Master , the multitude throng thee and press thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Yesuusi , “ Tana bochchidai oonee ? ” yaagiis . Ubba asai , “ Nuna gidokko ” yaagin , PHeexiroosinne aara issippe de7iyaageeti , “ Godau , daro asai nena sugiiddi un77ees ; ' Tana bochchidai oonee ? ' gai ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus said , Somebody hath touched me : for I perceive that virtue is gone out of me .
text2: SHin Yesuusi , “ Taappe wolqqai kiyido gishshau , tana issi urai bochchidoogaa taani erais ” yaagiis .

text: And when the woman saw that she was not hid , she came trembling , and falling down before him , she declared unto him before all the people for what cause she had touched him and how she was healed immediately .
text2: Maccaasiyaa qosettada attanau danddayennaagaa erada , kokkoraidda Yesuusa sinttan gufannaasu ; a Yesuusa aissi bochchidaakkonne qassi waanada sohuwaara paxidaakko asa ubbaa sinttan Yesuusau yootaasu .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , be of good comfort : thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace .
text2: I , “ Ta na7ee , nena ne ammanoi pattiis ; saro ba ” yaagiis .

text: While he yet spake , there cometh one from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house , saying to him , Thy daughter is dead ; trouble not the Master .
text2: Yesuusi biron hegaa giishin , issi asi Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqaa sooppe yiidi , “ Ne na7iyaa haiqqaichchaasu ; simmi tamaarissiyaagaa daafurssoppa ” yaagiis .

text: But when Jesus heard it , he answered him , saying , Fear not : believe only , and she shall be made whole .
text2: SHin eti giyoobaa Yesuusi siyidi , “ Yayyoppa ; ammano xalaalaa ammana ; a paxana ” yaagidi Yaa7iroosassi yootiis .

text: And when he came into the house , he suffered no man to go in , save Peter , and James , and John , and the father and the mother of the maiden .
text2: Yesuusi soo geliiddi , PHeexiroosappe , Yaaqoobappe , Yohaannisappe , na7ee aayeeppenne aawaappe harai ooninne banaara gelenna mala diggiis .

text: And all wept , and bewailed her : but he said , Weep not ; she is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Ubbai na7eessi , “ Aayyee aayyee ! ” yaagidi yeekkoosona . SHin Yesuusi , “ Yeekkoppite ; na7iyaa xiskkausuppe attin , haiqqabeikku ” yaagiis .

text: And they laughed him to scorn , knowing that she was dead .
text2: A haiqqidoogaa eridi , asai a bolli miicciis .

text: And he put them all out , and took her by the hand , and called , saying , Maid , arise .
text2: SHin Yesuusi i kushiyaa oiqqidi , “ Na7ee , dendda ” yaagidi xeesiis .

text: And her spirit came again , and she arose straightway : and he commanded to give her meat .
text2: Na7ee shemppoi simmin , sohuwaara na7iyaa dendda aggaasu . Yesuusi , “ Iyyo miyoobaa immite ” yaagidi azaziis .

text: And her parents were astonished : but he charged them that they should tell no man what was done .
text2: I aawainne aayyiyaa garamettidosona . SHin Yesuusi , “ Hanidaagaa oossinne odoppite ” yaagidi azaziis .

text: Then he called his twelve disciples together , and gave them power and authority over all devils , and to cure diseases .
text2: Yesuusi ba tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata issippe baakko xeesidi , xalahiyaa ubbaa asaappe kessanaunne harggiyaageeta pattanau etassi wolqqaanne alaafetettaa immiis .

text: And he sent them to preach the kingdom of God , and to heal the sick .
text2: Xoossaa kawotettaabaa yootanaunne harggiyaageeta pattanau eta kiittiis .

text: And he said unto them , Take nothing for your journey , neither staves , nor scrip , neither bread , neither money ; neither have two coats apiece .
text2: I eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Gatima woi qarcciita woi quma woi miishsha ainnekka ogiyaa biiddi oiqqoppite ; naa77antto qoliyaakka oiqqoppite .

text: And whatsoever house ye enter into , there abide , and thence depart .
text2: Inttena asi awan mokkikkokka , katamaappe kiyana gakkanaashin , he keettan utti bayite .

text: And whosoever will not receive you , when ye go out of that city , shake off the very dust from your feet for a testimony against them .
text2: Katamaa asai inttena mokkennan ixxikko , he katamaappe kiyite ; kiyiiddi eti inttena mokkennan ixxidoogaassi markka gidana mala , intte tohuwaappe buhiyaa shocite ” yaagiis .

text: And they departed , and went through the towns , preaching the gospel , and healing every where .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati biidi , qeeri katama ubban Xoossaa qaalaa yootiiddinne harggiya asaa ubbasan pattiiddi yuuyoosona .

text: Now Herod the tetrarch heard of all that was done by him : and he was perplexed , because that it was said of some , that John was risen from the dead ;
text2: Galiila biittaa haariya Heeroodisi hanidabaa ubbaa siyiis . Issi issi asai , “ Yohaannisi haiquwaappe denddiis ” yaagees ; hinkko asai , “ Eelaasi kiyidi beettiis ” yaagees ; harati , “ Beni hananabaa yootiyaageetuppe issoi denddiis ” yaagoosona . Hegaa gishshau , Heeroodisi ba wozana giddon metootiis .

text: And Herod said , John have I beheaded : but who is this , of whom I hear such things ? And he desired to see him .
text2: Metootidi , “ Taani Yohaannisa qooriyaa muucissarggaas ; shin hagaadan asai haasayiyo bitanee oonee ? ” yaagidi , Yesuusa be7anau koyiis .

text: And the apostles , when they were returned , told him all that they had done . And he took them , and went aside privately into a desert place belonging to the city called Bethsaida .
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti simmidi , bantta oottidobaa ubbaa Yesuusassi odidosona . Yesuusi eta xalaalaa ekkidi , Beetasaida giyo katamaa matan de7iya bazzuwaa biis .

text: And the people , when they knew it , followed him : and he received them , and spake unto them of the kingdom of God , and healed them that had need of healing .
text2: Asai a eridi kaallin , eta mokkidi , Xoossaa kawotettaabaa yootiis ; harggiyaappe pattanau koshshiyoogeetakka pattiis .

text: And when the day began to wear away , then came the twelve , and said unto him , Send the multitude away , that they may go into the towns and country round about , and lodge , and get victuals : for we are here in a desert place .
text2: Sa7ai omariyo wode , tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Asa ubbai dere giddonne qeeri katamatu giddo biidi , aqiyoosaanne shinqqe demmana mala , asaa yedda ; aissi giikko , nuuni hagan asi bainnasan de7oos ” yaagidosona .

text: But he said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they said , We have no more but five loaves and two fishes ; except we should go and buy meat for all this people .
text2: SHin Yesuusi eta , “ Asau miyoobaa intte immite ” yaagiis . Yaagin eti , “ Nuuyyo ichchashu oittappenne naa77u moleppe hari baawa ; nuuni ha daro asau qumaa shammanau baanaagaa koyai ? ” yaagidosona .

text: For they were about five thousand men . And he said to his disciples , Make them sit down by fifties in a company .
text2: Aissi giikko , he sohuwan ichchashu sha7u gidiya asai de7ees . Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Ishatamu ishatamu asaa citan citan shaakki shaakki utissite ” yaagiis .

text: And they did so , and made them all sit down .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati i giidoogaadan , ubba asaa utissidosona .

text: Then he took the five loaves and the two fishes , and looking up to heaven , he blessed them , and brake , and gave to the disciples to set before the multitude .
text2: Yesuusi ichchashu oittaanne naa77u moliyaa oiqqidi , saluwaa pude xeellidi , Xoossaa galatiis ; he oittaanne moliyaa menttidi , “ Daro asaa sintti aattite ” yaagidi , erissiyo ashkkaratussi immiis .

text: And they did eat , and were all filled : and there was taken up of fragments that remained to them twelve baskets .
text2: Asa ubbai miidi kalliis ; kallin attida xarzzai tammanne naa77u samppaa kumidaagaa denttidosona .

text: And it came to pass , as he was alone praying , his disciples were with him : and he asked them , saying , Whom say the people that I am ?
text2: Issitoo Yesuusi barkka woossiyo wode , i erissiyo ashkkarati a matan de7oosona ; de7ishin , “ Asai tana oona gii ? ” yaagidi eta oichchiis .

text: They answering said , John the Baptist ; but some say , Elias ; and others say , that one of the old prophets is risen again .
text2: Eti zaaridi , “ Asai nena Xammaqiya Yohaannisa yaagees ; hara asai Eelaasa yaagees ; harai qassi beni hananabaa yootiyaageetuppe issoi denddiis yaagees ” yaagidosona .

text: He said unto them , But whom say ye that I am ? Peter answering said , The Christ of God .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi eta , “ Yaanin intte tana oona geetii ? ” yaagiis . PHeexiroosi zaaridi , “ Neeni Xoossai tiyido Kiristtoosa ” yaagidi zaariis .

text: And he straitly charged them , and commanded them to tell no man that thing ;
text2: SHin Yesuusi eta , “ Hagaa oossinne odoppite ” yaagidi , minttidi azaziiddi ,

text: Saying , The Son of man must suffer many things , and be rejected of the elders and chief priests and scribes , and be slain , and be raised the third day .
text2: “ Taani , Asa Na7ai , daro waayettanau bessees ; tana cimati , qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti ixxanau bessees ; eti tana woranaunne taani heezzantto gallassi haiquwaappe denddanau bessees ” yaagiis .

text: And he said to them all , If any man will come after me , let him deny himself , and take up his cross daily , and follow me .
text2: Yesuusi asa ubbaa hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Ba shemppuwaa ashshana koyiya urai bashshana ; shin ba shemppuwaa ta gishshau bashshiya urai ashshana ; hegaa gishshau , tana kaallana koyiya urai de7ikko , bana yeggi bayo ; yaatidi ubba gallassi ba masqqaliyaa tookkidi , tana kaallo .

text: For what is a man advantaged , if he gain the whole world , and lose himself , or be cast away ?
text2: Issi urai ba huuphiyaa bashshidi , woi bau pacissidi , sa7an de7iya ubbabaa bau shiishshikko , a ai maaddanee ?

text: For whosoever shall be ashamed of me and of my words , of him shall the Son of man be ashamed , when he shall come in his own glory , and in his Father ' s , and of the holy angels .
text2: Asi tanaaninne ta qaalan yeellatikko , taani Asa Na7ai , ta bonchchuwaara , ta Aawaa bonchchuwaaranne geeshsha kiitanchchatu bonchchuwaara yiyo wode , aani yeellatana .

text: But I tell you of a truth , there be some standing here , which shall not taste of death , till they see the kingdom of God .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa gais ; amarida asati Xoossaa kawotettaa be7ennan haiqqennaageeti hagan de7oosona ” yaagiis .

text: And it came to pass about an eight days after these sayings , he took Peter and John and James , and went up into a mountain to pray .
text2: Yesuusi hegaadan giidoogaappe guyyiyan , hosppun gallassa gidiyaagaa gam77idi , PHeexiroosa , Yohaannisanne Yaaqooba ekkidi , woossanau deriyaa huuphiyaa kiyiis .

text: And as he prayed , the fashion of his countenance was altered , and his raiment was white and glistering .
text2: I woossishin , a merai laamettiis . A maayoikka phoolidi booxxiis .

text: And , behold , there talked with him two men , which were Moses and Elias :
text2: Akeekennan , Muusanne Eelaasa giyo naa77u asati kiyi beettidi , aara haasayidosona .

text: Who appeared in glory , and spake of his decease which he should accomplish at Jerusalem .
text2: Eti bonchchuwaara beettidi , Yesuusi Xoossaa qofaa polanau Yerusalaamen haiqqanaagaa aara haasayidosona .

text: But Peter and they that were with him were heavy with sleep : and when they were awake , they saw his glory , and the two men that stood with him .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosinne aara de7iyaageeti xiskkuwan kairidosona . SHin beegottidi , Yesuusa bonchchuwaanne aara issippe eqqida naa77u asata be7idosona .

text: And it came to pass , as they departed from him , Peter said unto Jesus , Master , it is good for us to be here : and let us make three tabernacles ; one for thee , and one for Moses , and one for Elias : not knowing what he said .
text2: He naa77u asati Yesuusa matappe biishin , PHeexiroosi Yesuusassi woigiyaakko akeekidi erennan a , “ Ta Godau , nuuni hagan de7iyoogee nuussi lo77o ; nuuni heezzu zamppata issuwaa neessi , issuwaa Muusessi , issuwaa Eelaasassi zamppayana ” yaagiis .

text: While he thus spake , there came a cloud , and overshadowed them : and they feared as they entered into the cloud .
text2: PHeexiroosi hegaa etassi giishin , shaarai yiidi , eta genttiis . Genttishin erissiyo ashkkarati yayyidosona .

text: And there came a voice out of the cloud , saying , This is my beloved Son : hear him .
text2: SHaaraappe , “ Hagee taani doorido ta Na7aa ; i giyoogaa siyite ” giya qaalai yiis .

text: And when the voice was past , Jesus was found alone . And they kept it close , and told no man in those days any of those things which they had seen .
text2: Yiidoogaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi barkka attiis . Eti co77u giidi , oossinne he wode be7ido yohuwaappe ainne odibookkona .

text: And it came to pass , that on the next day , when they were come down from the hill , much people met him .
text2: Wonttetta gallassi , eti deriyaappe duge wodhdhido wode , daro asai Yesuusaara gaittiis .

text: And , behold , a man of the company cried out , saying , Master , I beseech thee , look upon my son : for he is mine only child .
text2: Asai qoppennan asaappe issoi ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , taassi issi na7aa xalaalai de7iyo gishshau , neeni a be7anau nena woossais ;

text: And , lo , a spirit taketh him , and he suddenly crieth out ; and it teareth him that he foameth again , and bruising him hardly departeth from him .
text2: qassi iita ayyaanai au denddees ; denddidi akeekennan a waasissees ; a doonaara hoommoi goppattana gakkanaashin a kokkorssidi , ubba gallassi qohiyoogaappe attin , a elle yeddenna .

text: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out ; and they could not .
text2: Ne erissiyo ashkkarati he iita ayyaanaa kessana mala , taani eta woossaas ; shin danddayibookkona ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus answering said , O faithless and perverse generation , how long shall I be with you , and suffer you ? Bring thy son hither .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi eta , “ Ammanenna ha wodiyaa geella asau ! Taani inttenaara aude gakkanaashin de7anee ? Qassi inttebaa aude gakkanaashin danddayanee ? Ne na7aa haa ekka ya ” yaagiis .

text: And as he was yet a coming , the devil threw him down , and tare him . And Jesus rebuked the unclean spirit , and healed the child , and delivered him again to his father .
text2: Na7ai yiishin , xalahee a sa7an ooggidi kokkorssiis ; shin Yesuusi tuna ayyaanaa agga giidi , na7aa pattidi , a aawaassi zaaridi immiis .

text: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God . But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did , he said unto his disciples ,
text2: Asa ubbai Xoossaa gita wolqqan garamettiis . Eti ubbai Yesuusi oottido ubbaban garamettishin , i ba erissiyo ashkkaratussi yootiiddi ,

text: Let these sayings sink down into your ears : for the Son of man shall be delivered into the hands of men .
text2: “ Tana Asa Na7aa asi asau aattidi immana ; ha yohuwaa dogoppite ” yaagiis .

text: But they understood not this saying , and it was hid from them , that they perceived it not : and they feared to ask him of that saying .
text2: SHin i giyoogaa eti akeekibookkona ; eti akeekenna mala , etappe yohoi geemmiis . He yohuwaa a oichchanau yayyoosona .

text: Then there arose a reasoning among them , which of them should be greatest .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati , “ Nu giddon aadhdhiyaagee oonee ? ” yaagidi palamettidosona .

text: And Jesus , perceiving the thought of their heart , took a child , and set him by him ,
text2: Yesuusi eti qoppiyoogaa eridi , guutta na7aa ehiidi , ba matan essidi ,

text: And said unto them , Whosoever shall receive this child in my name receiveth me : and whosoever shall receive me receiveth him that sent me : for he that is least among you all , the same shall be great .
text2: “ Ha guutta na7aa ta sunttan mokkiya ooninne tana mokkees ; qassi tana mokkiyaagee tana kiittidaagaakka mokkees ; aissi giikko , intte ubbaa giddon guuxxiyaagee ubbaappe gitatees ” yaagiis .

text: And John answered and said , Master , we saw one casting out devils in thy name ; and we forbad him , because he followeth not with us .
text2: Yohaannisi zaaridi , “ Godau , issi asi ne sunttan xalaheta kessiyaagaa nuuni be7idi , nu bagga gidenna gishshau , a diggida ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Forbid him not : for he that is not against us is for us .
text2: SHin Yesuusi a , “ Intte giyoobaa phalqqenna urai intte bagga gidiyo gishshau , a diggoppite ” yaagiis .

text: And it came to pass , when the time was come that he should be received up , he stedfastly set his face to go to Jerusalem ,
text2: Yesuusi saluwaa biyo wodee matin , Yerusalaame baanau denddiis .

text: And sent messengers before his face : and they went , and entered into a village of the Samaritans , to make ready for him .
text2: Qassi ba kiittiyoogeeta baappe sinttau kiittiis ; kiittin eti ayyo ubbabaa giigissanau , Samaariyaa biittan de7iya issi qeeri katamaa biidosona .

text: And they did not receive him , because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem .
text2: SHin i Yerusalaame baanau denddido gishshau , asai a mokkibeenna .

text: And when his disciples James and John saw this , they said , Lord , wilt thou that we command fire to come down from heaven , and consume them , even as Elias did ?
text2: I erissiyo ashkkarati Yaaqoobinne Yohaannisi hegaa be7idi , “ Godau , nuuni Eelaasi oottidoogaadan , ' Tamai saluwaappe yiidi eta mo ' yaagana mala koyai ? ” yaagidosona .

text: But he turned , and rebuked them , and said , Ye know not what manner of spirit ye are of .
text2: SHin guyye simmidi eta , “ Aggite , inttessi ai mala ayyaani de7iyaakko erekketa .

text: For the Son of man is not come to destroy men ' s lives , but to save them . And they went to another village .
text2: Taani , Asa Na7ai , asa shemppo ashshanau yiidoogaappe attin , bashshanau yabeikke ” yaagiis . Eti harasan de7iya qeeri katamaa biidosona .

text: And it came to pass , that , as they went in the way , a certain man said unto him , Lord , I will follow thee whithersoever thou goest .
text2: Eti ogiyaara biishin , issi bitanee a , “ Godau , neeni biyoosaa ubbaa taani nena kaallana ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Foxes have holes , and birds of the air have nests ; but the Son of man hath not where to lay his head .
text2: Yesuusi a , “ Worakanatussi ollai de7ees ; kafotussikka keettai de7ees ; shin taani , Asa Na7ai , zin77ada shemppa ekkiyoosikka tau baawa ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto another , Follow me . But he said , Lord , suffer me first to go and bury my father .
text2: Yesuusi haraa , “ Tana kaalla ” yaagiis . SHin , bitanee “ Godau , taani kaseta baada ta aawaa moogoo ? ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus said unto him , Let the dead bury their dead : but go thou and preach the kingdom of God .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi a , “ Haiqqidaageeti bantta haiqqidaageeta moogona ; nena gidikko baada , Xoossaa kawotettaabaa yoota ” yaagiis .

text: And another also said , Lord , I will follow thee ; but let me first go bid them farewell , which are at home at my house .
text2: Qassi hara bitanee , “ Godau , taani nena kaallana ; shin koiroora ta so asaa saro goo ? ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus said unto him , No man , having put his hand to the plough , and looking back , is fit for the kingdom of God .
text2: SHin Yesuusi a , “ Booraa goyiiddi , guyye xeelliyai ooninne Xoossaa kawotettaassi bessenna ” yaagiis .

text: After these things the Lord appointed other seventy also , and sent them two and two before his face into every city and place , whither he himself would come .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Godai hara laappun tammu asata dooriis . Etappe naa77aa naa77aa bau baanau qoppi uttido katamaanne sohuwaa ubbaa baappe sinttau kiittiis .

text: Therefore said he unto them , The harvest truly is great , but the labourers are few : pray ye therefore the Lord of the harvest , that he would send forth labourers into his harvest .
text2: I eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Kattai daro ; shin cakkiyaageeti guutta ; hegaa gishshau , kattaa Godai kattaa cakkiyaageeta yeddana mala , a woossite .

text: Go your ways : behold , I send you forth as lambs among wolves .
text2: Ha77i biite ; taani inttena wanggireello giddon de7iya dorssa maraadan yeddais .

text: Carry neither purse , nor scrip , nor shoes : and salute no man by the way .
text2: Korjjokka qarcciitakka caammakka oiqqoppite ; ogiyan oonanne sarotoppite .

text: And into whatsoever house ye enter , first say , Peace be to this house .
text2: “ O keettanne intte geliyo wode koiroora , ' Sarotettai ha keettaassi gido ' yaagite .

text: And if the son of peace be there , your peace shall rest upon it : if not , it shall turn to you again .
text2: Sarotettaa koyiya asi hegan de7ikko , sarotettan i de7ana ; shin koyennan ixxikko , sarotettai inttekko simmana .

text: And in the same house remain , eating and drinking such things as they give : for the labourer is worthy of his hire . Go not from house to house .
text2: Oosanchchaassi damoozaa qanxxanau koshshiyo gishshau , eti immiyoobaa miiddinne uyiiddi he keettan utti bayite ; ha sooppe ya soo booppite .

text: And into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you , eat such things as are set before you :
text2: “ Intte ai katamanne geliyo wode , asi inttena mokkikko , intte sinttau aattidobaa miite .

text: And heal the sick that are therein , and say unto them , The kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: Hegan de7iya hargganchchata pattidi eta , ' Xoossaa kawotettai inttekko matiis ' yaagite ;

text: But into whatsoever city ye enter , and they receive you not , go your ways out into the streets of the same , and say ,
text2: shin intte geliyo katama ubbai inttena mokkennan ixxikko , he katamaa ogiyaa kiyidi ,

text: Even the very dust of your city , which cleaveth on us , we do wipe off against you : notwithstanding be ye sure of this , that the kingdom of God is come nigh unto you .
text2: ' Nuuni inttena yeellayanau , harai atto intte katamaappe nu tohuwaa oiqqida buhiyaakka inttessi pittoos ; shin Xoossaa kawotettai inttekko matidoogaa hegaa erite ' yaagite .

text: But I say unto you , that it shall be more tolerable in that day for Sodom , than for that city .
text2: He gallassi Sadooma katamai ekkido pirddaappe aadhdhiya pirddai he katamaa gakkanaagaa taani inttessi odais .

text: Woe unto thee , Chorazin ! woe unto thee , Bethsaida ! for if the mighty works had been done in Tyre and Sidon , which have been done in you , they had a great while ago repented , sitting in sackcloth and ashes .
text2: “ Koraaziine katamau , neeyyo aayye7ana ; Beetasaida katamau , neeyyookka aayye7ana ; aissi giikko , intte bolli Xoossai oottido malaatai Xiiroosa katamaaninne Sidoona kataman oosettidobaa gidiyaakko , eti waaruwaa maayidi , bidinttaa tisttidi , beni bantta nagaraappe simmanaagaa shin ;

text: But it shall be more tolerable for Tyre and Sidon at the judgment , than for you .
text2: pirddaa gallassi Xoossai intteppe Xiiroosa katamaunne Sidoona katamau pirddaa kehissana .

text: And thou , Capernaum , which art exalted to heaven , shalt be thrust down to hell .
text2: Qassi Qifirinaahooma katamau , neeni saluwaa pude xoqqu gaanau koyadii ? Neeni Si7ooliyaa duge wodhdhana .

text: He that heareth you heareth me ; and he that despiseth you despiseth me ; and he that despiseth me despiseth him that sent me .
text2: “ Intte giyoobaa siyiya asi taani giyoobaa siyees ; inttena ixxiya urai tana ixxees ; tana ixxiya urai tana kiittidaagaakka ixxees ” yaagiis .

text: And the seventy returned again with joy , saying , Lord , even the devils are subject unto us through thy name .
text2: Laappun tammu asati , “ Godau , harai atto xalahetikka ne sunttan nuussi azazettidosona ” yaagiiddi ufaissan simmidosona .

text: And he said unto them , I beheld Satan as lightning fall from heaven .
text2: Yesuusi etassi hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Seexaanai wolqqanttadan saluwaappe kunddishin , taani be7aas .

text: Behold , I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions , and over all the power of the enemy : and nothing shall by any means hurt you .
text2: Intte shooshshaanne masimasuwaa yedhdhidi hemettana mala , morkkiyaa wolqqaa ubbaa bolli inttessi godatettaa immaas . Inttena qohiyaabi aibinne baawa .

text: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not , that the spirits are subject unto you ; but rather rejoice , because your names are written in heaven .
text2: Tuna ayyaanai inttessi azazettiyo gishshau ufaittoppite ; shin intte sunttai saluwan xaafettido gishshau ufaittite ” yaagiis .

text: In that hour Jesus rejoiced in spirit , and said , I thank thee , O Father , Lord of heaven and earth , that thou hast hid these things from the wise and prudent , and hast revealed them unto babes : even so , Father ; for so it seemed good in thy sight .
text2: Yesuusi he wode Geeshsha Ayyaanan ufaittidi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Ta Aawau , saluwaa sa7aa Godau , neeni hagaa aadhdhida eranchchatuppenne akeekanchchatuppe genttada , erenna naatussi qonccissido gishshau , nena galatais ; ee , ta Aawau , aissi giikko , hegee ne shenedan oosettiis .

text: All things are delivered to me of my Father : and no man knoweth who the Son is , but the Father ; and who the Father is , but the Son , and he to whom the Son will reveal him .
text2: “ Ta Aawai taassi ubbabaa immiis ; Aawaappe harai ooninne Na7ai oonakko erenna ; Na7aappenne Na7ai Aawaa bessanau koyiyo asatuppe attin , harai ooninne Aawai oonakko erenna ” yaagiis .

text: And he turned him unto his disciples , and said privately , Blessed are the eyes which see the things that ye see :
text2: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratukko guyye simmidi , eta xalaalaa hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Intte be7iyoogaa be7iyaageeti anjjettidaageeta .

text: For I tell you , that many prophets and kings have desired to see those things which ye see , and have not seen them ; and to hear those things which ye hear , and have not heard them .
text2: Taani inttessi yootiyoogee aibee giikko , hananabaa yootiyaageetuppe darotinne kawoti intte be7iyoogaa be7anau koyidosona ; shin be7ibookkona ; intte siyiyoogaakka siyanau koyidosona ; shin siyibookkona ” yaagiis .

text: And , behold , a certain lawyer stood up , and tempted him , saying , Master , what shall I do to inherit eternal life ?
text2: Higgiyaa tamaarissiya issoi Yesuusa paaccanau akko yiidi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , taani merinaa de7uwaa laattanau ai oottoo ? ” yaagidi a oichchiis .

text: He said unto him , What is written in the law ? how readest thou ?
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Higgiyan xaafettidaagee aibee ? Neeni ai nabbabai ? ” yaagiis .

text: And he answering said , Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart , and with all thy soul , and with all thy strength , and with all thy mind ; and thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Bitanee zaaridi , “ Neeni Godaa ne Xoossaa ne kumetta wozanaappenne ne kumetta shemppuwaappe , ne kumetta wolqqaappenne ne kumetta qofaappe siiqa ; ne shooruwaakka ne huuphedan siiqa ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto him , Thou hast answered right : this do , and thou shalt live .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi a , “ Neeni giyoogee tuma ; hegaa ootta ; neeni merinau de7ana ” yaagiis .

text: But he , willing to justify himself , said unto Jesus , And who is my neighbour ?
text2: SHin higgiyaa tamaarissiyaagee bana xillissanau koyidi Yesuusa , “ Ta shooroi oonee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus answering said , A certain man went down from Jerusalem to Jericho , and fell among thieves , which stripped him of his raiment , and wounded him , and departed , leaving him half dead .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Issi bitanee Yerusalaameppe Yarkko bees ; biishin , panggati a bolli kiyidosona . Eti a maayuwaa qaari ekkidi , a shocidi , haiquwaappenne paxaappe gidduwan yeggidi biidosona .

text: And by chance there came down a certain priest that way : and when he saw him , he passed by on the other side .
text2: Issi qeesee qaadadan he ogiyaara biiddi , he bitaniyaa be7iis ; be7idi a yeggi bayidi , harasaara aadhdhiis .

text: And likewise a Levite , when he was at the place , came and looked on him , and passed by on the other side .
text2: Hegaadankka qassi Leewa zaree he sohuwaara biiddi , bitaniyaa be7idi , yeggi bayidi , harasaara aadhdhiis .

text: But a certain Samaritan , as he journeyed , came where he was : and when he saw him , he had compassion on him ,
text2: SHin Samaariyaa asa issoi he ogiyaara biiddi , akko yiis . A be7idi , ayyo qarettiis .

text: And went to him , and bound up his wounds , pouring in oil and wine , and set him on his own beast , and brought him to an inn , and took care of him .
text2: Akko shiiqidi , zaitiyaanne woiniyaa eessaa a masunttaa bolli tigidi , qachchiis . Ba hariyaa togissidi , imattai aqiyo sohuwaa efiis ; efiidi a maaddiiddi aqiis .

text: And on the morrow when he departed , he took out two pence , and gave them to the host , and said unto him , Take care of him ; and whatsoever thou spendest more , when I come again , I will repay thee .
text2: Wonttetta gallassi naa77u shilinggiyaa kessidi , imattai aqiyo sohuwaa naagiyaagaassi immidi , ' A naaga ; neeni aani wurssiyo miishshai aappuna gidikkonne , taani guyye simmiyo wode , neessi qanxxana ' yaagiis .

text: Which now of these three , thinkest thou , was neighbour unto him that fell among the thieves ?
text2: “ Yaatin he panggati shocido bitaniyaassi ha heezzu asatuppe augee shoorotiyai ? ” yaagiis .

text: And he said , He that shewed mercy on him . Then said Jesus unto him , Go , and do thou likewise .
text2: Yaagin higgiyaa tamaarissiyaagee , “ Ayyo kehidaagee shoorotees ” yaagiis . Yaagin Yesuusi a , “ Baada neenikka hegaadan ootta ” yaagiis .

text: Now it came to pass , as they went , that he entered into a certain village : and a certain woman named Martha received him into her house .
text2: Yesuusinne i erissiyo ashkkarati biishin , i issi qeeri katamaa gelin , issi Martto giyo maccaasiyaa a ba son mokkaasu .

text: And she had a sister called Mary , which also sat at Jesus ' feet , and heard his word .
text2: Marttissi Mairaamo giyo michchiyaa de7iyaara Yesuusa tohuwaa matan uttada , a qaalaa siyausu .

text: But Martha was cumbered about much serving , and came to him , and said , Lord , dost thou not care that my sister hath left me to serve alone ? bid her therefore that she help me .
text2: SHin Martta baassi oosoi darido gishshau , ba wozana giddon daro metootaasu . Yesuusakko shiiqada , “ Godau , taani ha ubba oosuwaa oottishin , ta michchiyaa utta bayidoogaa qoppikkii ? Yaatikko o tana maadda ga ” yaagaasu .

text: And Jesus answered and said unto her , Martha , Martha , thou art careful and troubled about many things :
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi o , “ Marttee , Marttee , neeni daroban hirggaasa ; qassi tuggataasa .

text: But one thing is needful : and Mary hath chosen that good part , which shall not be taken away from her .
text2: SHin koshshiyaagee issibaa ; Mairaama baappe ooninne ekkenna lo77obaa dooraasu ” yaagiis .

text: And it came to pass , that , as he was praying in a certain place , when he ceased , one of his disciples said unto him , Lord , teach us to pray , as John also taught his disciples .
text2: Yesuusi issi sohuwan woossees . Woosaa wurssido wode , i erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi , “ Godau , Yohaannisi ba erissiyo ashkkarata tamaarissidoogaadan , nuuni woigi woossanaakko , nuna tamaarissa ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto them , When ye pray , say , Our Father which art in heaven , Hallowed be thy name . Thy kingdom come . Thy will be done , as in heaven , so in earth .
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Xoossaa woossiiddi , hagaadan yaagite ; ' Saluwan de7iya nu Aawau , ne geeshsha sunttai anjjetto . Ne kawotettai yo . Ne shenee saluwan hanidoogaadan , sa7ankka hano .

text: Give us day by day our daily bread .
text2: Hachchi hachchi koshshiya qumaa nuuyyo hachchi imma .

text: And forgive us our sins ; for we also forgive every one that is indebted to us . And lead us not into temptation ; but deliver us from evil .
text2: Nuuni nuna naaqqidaageetuyyo ubbaa atto giido gishshau , neenikka nu naaquwaa atto ga . Nuna iitabaappe ashshanaappe attin , paacen gelissoppa ' yaagite ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto them , Which of you shall have a friend , and shall go unto him at midnight , and say unto him , Friend , lend me three loaves ;
text2: Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Geelladan hai intteppe issoi qamma bilahe ba lagge asa soo biidi , ' Ta ishau , taassi heezzu baso oitta tal77a .

text: For a friend of mine in his journey is come to me , and I have nothing to set before him ?
text2: Aissi giikko , ta laggee ogeppe ta soo yiis ; taani a sintti aattiyoobi baawa ' yaagikko ,

text: And he from within shall answer and say , Trouble me not : the door is now shut , and my children are with me in bed ; I cannot rise and give thee .
text2: a laggee sooppe haasayiiddi , ' Tana daafurssoppa ; karee gorddettiichchiis ; ta naatikka tanaara hiixan de7oosona ; taani denddada , neessi ainne immanau danddayikke ' yaaganee ?

text: I say unto you , Though he will not rise and give him , because he is his friend , yet because of his importunity he will rise and give him as many as he needeth .
text2: Taani inttessi odiyoogee aibee giikko , i a lagge gidido gishshau , denddi eqqidi , ayyo ainne immennan ixxikkokka , a laggee a oichchiiddi waissido gishshau , denddidi i koyiyoobaa ubbaa immana .

text: And I say unto you , Ask , and it shall be given you ; seek , and ye shall find ; knock , and it shall be opened unto you .
text2: “ Taani inttessi odais ; woossite , intte ekkana ; koyite , intte demmana ; kare yiidi xeesite ; karee intteyyo dooyettana .

text: For every one that asketh receiveth ; and he that seeketh findeth ; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened .
text2: Aissi giikko , woossiya ubbai ekkana ; koyiya urai demmana ; qassi kare yiidi xeesiya urau karee dooyettana .

text: If a son shall ask bread of any of you that is a father , will he give him a stone ? or if he ask a fish , will he for a fish give him a serpent ?
text2: “ Intte giddon ba na7i , ' Quma imma ' giikko , shuchcha immana aawi de7ii ? ' Mole imma ' giikko shooshsha immanee ?

text: Or if he shall ask an egg , will he offer him a scorpion ?
text2: Woi , ' PHuuphulle imma ' giikko masimaso immanee ?

text: If ye then , being evil , know how to give good gifts unto your children : how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him ?
text2: Intte iita gidiiddi , intte naatussi lo77obaa immiyoogaa erikko , yaatin saluwan de7iya Aawai bana woossiyaageetussi Geeshsha Ayyaanaa waati darissidi immanddeeshsha ? ” yaagiis .

text: And he was casting out a devil , and it was dumb . And it came to pass , when the devil was gone out , the dumb spake ; and the people wondered .
text2: Yesuusi bitaniyaappe duude xalahiyaa kessiis ; xalahee kiyidoogaappe guyyiyan , bitanee haasayaa doommin , asai garamettiis .

text: But some of them said , He casteth out devils through Beelzebub the chief of the devils .
text2: SHin etappe issoi issoi , “ Xalahetu halaqaa Bi7eeli - Zeebuli baayyo wolqqaa immin , xalaheta kessees ” yaagiis .

text: And others , tempting him , sought of him a sign from heaven .
text2: Harati a paaccanau i saluwaappe malaataa oottana mala koyidosona .

text: But he , knowing their thoughts , said unto them , Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation ; and a house divided against a house falleth .
text2: SHin Yesuusi eta qofaa eridi , eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Ba giddon shaakettiya kawotetta ubbai xayana ; shaakettiya keettaikka kunddana .

text: If Satan also be divided against himself , how shall his kingdom stand ? because ye say that I cast out devils through Beelzebub .
text2: Yaatin Seexaanaa kawotettai ba giddon shaakettikko , he kawotettai waanidi eqqanee ? Intte tana , ' Bi7eeli - Zeebuli neessi wolqqaa immin , xalaheta kessaasa ' yaageeta .

text: And if I by Beelzebub cast out devils , by whom do your sons cast them out ? therefore shall they be your judges .
text2: Tau Bi7eeli - Zeebuli wolqqaa immin , taani xalaheta kessiyaabaa gidikko , intte asau wolqqaa ooni immin , xalaheta kessanee ? Hegaa gishshau , eti intte bolli pirddana .

text: But if I with the finger of God cast out devils , no doubt the kingdom of God is come upon you .
text2: SHin Xoossai tau wolqqaa immin , taani xalaheta kessiyaabaa gidikko , simmi Xoossaa kawotettai inttekko yiichchiis .

text: When a strong man armed keepeth his palace , his goods are in peace :
text2: “ Tooraanne gonddalliyaa oiqqida mino bitanee ba keettaa naagikko , a mehee saro de7ana .

text: But when a stronger than he shall come upon him , and overcome him , he taketh from him all his armour wherein he trusted , and divideth his spoils .
text2: SHin appe minniyaagee yiidi , a xoonidi i ammani uttido tooraanne gonddalliyaa appe wotti ekkidi , a mehiyaa shaakkees .

text: He that is not with me is against me : and he that gathereth not with me scattereth .
text2: “ Ta bagga gidenna urai tabaa ixxees ; qassi tanaara issippe shiishshennaagee laalees .

text: When the unclean spirit is gone out of a man , he walketh through dry places , seeking rest ; and finding none , he saith , I will return unto my house whence I came out .
text2: “ Tuna ayyaanai asappe kiyiyo wode , baayyo shemppiyoosaa koyiiddi , haatti bainnasaara aadhdhees ; au beettennan ixxikko , ' Taani aggada yiido ta keettaa simmana ' yaagees ;

text: And when he cometh , he findeth it swept and garnished .
text2: simmidi yiyo wode , keettai pitettidi , giigi uttidaagaa demmees .

text: Then goeth he , and taketh to him seven other spirits more wicked than himself ; and they enter in , and dwell there : and the last state of that man is worse than the first .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , biidi baappe iitiya laappun hara ayyaanata ehees ; he ayyaanati gelidi , hegan de7oosona ; he bitaniyaa de7oi kaseegaappe guyyeegee keehi iitees ” yaagiis .

text: And it came to pass , as he spake these things , a certain woman of the company lifted up her voice , and said unto him , Blessed is the womb that bare thee , and the paps which thou hast sucked .
text2: Yesuusi hagaa gin , asaa giddoppe issi maccaasiyaa qaalaa xoqqu oottada , “ Nena tookkida uloinne neeni xammido xanttai anjjettidaageeta ” yaagaasu .

text: But he said , Yea rather , blessed are they that hear the word of God , and keep it .
text2: SHin Yesuusi , “ Anjjettidaageeti Xoossaa qaalaa siyidi , he qaalai azaziyoogaadan oottiyaageeta ” yaagiis .

text: And when the people were gathered thick together , he began to say , This is an evil generation : they seek a sign ; and there shall no sign be given it , but the sign of Jonas the prophet .
text2: Daro asai shiiqido wode , Yesuusi hagaadan yaaganau doommiis ; “ Malaataa koyiya ha wodiyaa asai iita ; hananabaa yootiya Yoonaasa malaataappe harai ayyo imettenna .

text: For as Jonas was a sign unto the Ninevites , so shall also the Son of man be to this generation .
text2: Yoonaasi Nanawe katamaa asaassi malaata gididoogaadan , taani Asa Na7ai , ha wodiyaa asaassi malaata gidana .

text: The queen of the south shall rise up in the judgment with the men of this generation , and condemn them : for she came from the utmost parts of the earth to hear the wisdom of Solomon ; and , behold , a greater than Solomon is here .
text2: Tohossa bagga biittaa kawiyaa Solomona aadhdhida eratettaa siyanau sa7aa gaxaappe yiido gishshau , pirddaa gallassi denddada , ha wodiyaa asaa mootana ; be7ite ; Solomonappekka aadhdhiyaagee hagan de7ees .

text: The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation , and shall condemn it : for they repented at the preaching of Jonas ; and , behold , a greater than Jonas is here .
text2: Nanawe asai Yoonaasi yootidoogan bantta nagaraappe simmido gishshau , pirddaa gallassi denddidi , intte bolli pirddana ; be7ite ; Yoonaasappe aadhdhiyaagee hagan de7ees .

text: No man , when he hath lighted a candle , putteth it in a secret place , neither under a bushel , but on a candlestick , that they which come in may see the light .
text2: “ Soo geliya asaassi poo7ana mala , xomppiyaa xomppidi , xoqqan wottanaappe attin , genttidi woikko keriyan qum77idi wottiyai ooninne baawa .

text: The light of the body is the eye : therefore when thine eye is single , thy whole body also is full of light ; but when thine eye is evil , thy body also is full of darkness .
text2: Ne aifee ne bollaassi xomppe mala ; ne aifee payya gidiyo wode ne bolla ubbai poo7o ; shin ne aifee payya gidana xayikko , ne bollai xuma gidana .

text: Take heed therefore that the light which is in thee be not darkness .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ne bolli de7iya poo7oi xuma gidenna mala naagetta .

text: If thy whole body therefore be full of light , having no part dark , the whole shall be full of light , as when the bright shining of a candle doth give thee light .
text2: Simmi ne bolla ubban ainne xumi bainnan kumetta poo7oi de7ikko , xomppee ba wagagga poo7uwaa ne bolli poo7issiyoogaadan , ne bollai wagagga poo7o gidana ” yaagiis .

text: And as he spake , a certain Pharisee besought him to dine with him : and he went in , and sat down to meat .
text2: Yesuusi haasayaa wurssido wode , issi Parisaawee , “ Tanaara laaxaa markkii ” yaagidi a woossiis ; woossin Yesuusi gelidi maanau uttiis .

text: And when the Pharisee saw it , he marvelled that he had not first washed before dinner .
text2: Laaxaa maanaappe kase Yesuusi kushiyaa meecettibeennaagaa be7idi , Parisaawee garamettiis .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Now do ye Pharisees make clean the outside of the cup and the platter ; but your inward part is full of ravening and wickedness .
text2: Garamettin Godai a , “ Parisaawetoo , shaatiyaayyoonne keriyaayyo bolla baggaa geeshsheeta ; shin intteyyo giddoora bonqqiyoogeenne iitatettai kumi uttiis .

text: Ye fools , did not he that made that which is without make that which is within also ?
text2: Eeyyatoo , gaxaa medhdhida Xoossai gidduwaa medhdhibeenneeyye ?

text: But rather give alms of such things as ye have ; and , behold , all things are clean unto you .
text2: SHin intte siiniyaaninne sainiyan de7iyaagaa hiyyeesaassi immite ; inttessi ubbabaikka geeshsha gidana .

text: But woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye tithe mint and rue and all manner of herbs , and pass over judgment and the love of God : these ought ye to have done , and not to leave the other undone .
text2: “ SHin Parisaawetoo , intteyyo aayye7ana ! Aissi giikko , bootta sawuwaappe , karetta sawuwaappe , xalotiyaappenne tokkidobaa ubbaappe asirataa Xoossaayyo intte immeeta ; shin xillotettaanne Xoossaa siiqiyoogaa intte aggi bayeeta ; haratakka aggennan , oottanau bessiya yohoti hageeta .

text: Woe unto you , Pharisees ! for ye love the uppermost seats in the synagogues , and greetings in the markets .
text2: “ Parisaawetoo , Aihuda woosa keettan intte bonchcho sohuwan uttanau koyiyo gishshaunne giyan bonchcho sarotaa koyiyo gishshau inttessi aayye7ana .

text: Woe unto you , scribes and Pharisees , hypocrites ! for ye are as graves which appear not , and the men that walk over them are not aware of them .
text2: Lo77o misatiya iitatoo , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoo , Parisaawetoo , inttessi aayye7ana ; aissi giikko , intte asi erennan yedhdhi hemettiyo beettenna duufo misateeta ” yaagiis .

text: Then answered one of the lawyers , and said unto him , Master , thus saying thou reproachest us also .
text2: Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetuppe issoi a , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , neeni hegaa yaagiyoogan nuna qassi cayaasattennee ” yaagiis .

text: And he said , Woe unto you also , ye lawyers ! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne , and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoo , inttessi aayye7ana ; aissi giikko , tookkanau deexxiya toohuwaa asa toosseeta ; shin tookkiya asa maaddanau harai atto , intte intte huuphen biradhdhiyankka he toohuwaa bochchekketa .

text: Woe unto you ! for ye build the sepulchres of the prophets , and your fathers killed them .
text2: “ Intte aawati worido hananabaa yootiyaageetussi duufuwaa bolli keettaa intte keexxiyo gishshau , inttessi aayye7ana .

text: Truly ye bear witness that ye allow the deeds of your fathers : for they indeed killed them , and ye build their sepulchres .
text2: Simmi intte aawati hananabaa yootiyaageeta worin , intte eta duufuwaa bolli keettaa keexxiyo gishshau , ' Eta oosoi lo77o ' yaagidi , etabaa markkatteeta .

text: Therefore also said the wisdom of God , I will send them prophets and apostles , and some of them they shall slay and persecute :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Xoossaa aadhdhida eratettai , ' Taani hananabaa yootiyaageetanne kiitettidaageeta etakko kiittana ; kiittidoogeetuppe issuwaa issuwaa eti worana ; issuwaa issuwaa tuggayana ' yaagiis .

text: That the blood of all the prophets , which was shed from the foundation of the world , may be required of this generation ;
text2: Aabeela woroosappe doommidi , yarshshiyoosaappenne Beeta Maqidasiyaappe gidduwan worido zakkaariyaasa wodiyaa gakkanaashin , sa7ai merettoosappe doommidi gukkida hananabaa yootiya ubbatu suuttaa gishshau , ha wodiyaa asai qaxxayettanau bessees ; ee , ha wodiyaa asai qaxxayettanau bessees gais .

text: Woe unto you , lawyers ! for ye have taken away the key of knowledge : ye entered not in yourselves , and them that were entering in ye hindered .
text2: “ Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetoo , eraa keettaa dooyiya qulppiyaa intte ekkideta ; intte huuphiyaunne gelibeekketa ; qassi gelanau koyiyaageetanne gelissekketa ” yaagiis .

text: And as he said these things unto them , the scribes and the Pharisees began to urge him vehemently , and to provoke him to speak of many things :
text2: Yesuusi hegaappe biido wode , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne Parisaaweti a daro ixuwaa doommidi , i balabaa haasayikko oiqqanau naagiiddi , daro yohuwaa keehi oichchidosona .

text: In the mean time , when there were gathered together an innumerable multitude of people , insomuch that they trode one upon another , he began to say unto his disciples first of all , Beware ye of the leaven of the Pharisees , which is hypocrisy .
text2: He wode daro sha7u asai issoi issuwaa yedhdhana gakkanaashin shiiqi uttidaashin , Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratussi koiroora odanau doommidi , “ Parisaawetu irshshuwaappe naagettite ; hegeenne , lo77o misatiya iitatettaappe naagettite giyoogaa .

text: For there is nothing covered , that shall not be revealed ; neither hid , that shall not be known .
text2: SHin aibinne gentti wottidobai qoncciyaa kiyennan attenna ; qassi qotti wottidobaikka erettennan attenna .

text: Therefore whatsoever ye have spoken in darkness shall be heard in the light ; and that which ye have spoken in the ear in closets shall be proclaimed upon the housetops .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte xuman haasayidobai ubbai gallassi poo7uwan siyettana ; intte asi bainnasan haittan saasukkidi odidobai ubbai keettaa huuphiyan awaajettana .

text: And I say unto you my friends , Be not afraid of them that kill the body , and after that have no more that they can do .
text2: “ Ta ishatoo , taani intteyyo odais ; ha77i ashuwaa woridi , guyyeppe ainne hegaappe aadhdhiyaabaa oottanau danddayennaageetau yayyoppite .

text: But I will forewarn you whom ye shall fear : Fear him , which after he hath killed hath power to cast into hell ; yea , I say unto you , Fear him .
text2: SHin intte oossi yayyanaakko , taani inttena erissana ; woridoogaappe guyyiyan , Gaannabiyan olanau wolqqai de7iyoogaassi yayyite ; ee assi yayyite gais .

text: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings , and not one of them is forgotten before God ?
text2: “ Ichchashu siine kafoti santtimiyan baizettokkonaayye ? Etappe issinnonne Xoossai dogenna .

text: But even the very hairs of your head are all numbered . Fear not therefore : ye are of more value than many sparrows .
text2: SHin harai atto intte huuphiyan de7iya binnaana ubbaikka qoodan de7ees ; simmi yayyoppite ; daro siine kafotuppe intte aadhdheeta .

text: Also I say unto you , Whosoever shall confess me before men , him shall the Son of man also confess before the angels of God :
text2: “ Taani intteyyo odais ; tabaa asa sinttan markkattiya ooyyookka taanikka Asa Na7ai , qassi Xoossaa kiitanchchatu sinttan markkattana ;

text: But he that denieth me before men shall be denied before the angels of God .
text2: shin asa sinttan tana kaddiyaagaa taanikka Asa Na7ai , qassi Xoossaa kiitanchchatu sinttan a kaddana .

text: And whosoever shall speak a word against the Son of man , it shall be forgiven him : but unto him that blasphemeth against the Holy Ghost it shall not be forgiven .
text2: “ Ta bolli , Asa Na7aa bolli , iitabaa haasayiya ubbaa nagarai atto geetettana ; shin Geeshsha Ayyaanaa cayiya uraa nagarai atto geetettenna .

text: And when they bring you unto the synagogues , and unto magistrates , and powers , take ye no thought how or what thing ye shall answer , or what ye shall say :
text2: “ Inttena Aihuda woosa keettatukko , daannatukkonne deriyaa haariyaageetukko ehiyo wode , ' Waatidi zaaranee ? Woi woigidi haasayanee ? ' yaagidi hirggoppite ;

text: For the Holy Ghost shall teach you in the same hour what ye ought to say .
text2: aissi giikko , intte he wode gaanau bessiyaabaa inttena Geeshsha Ayyaanai tamaarissana ” yaagiis .

text: And one of the company said unto him , Master , speak to my brother , that he divide the inheritance with me .
text2: Daro asaappe issoi a , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , ta aawai aggidi haiqqido aquwaa ta ishai tanaara shaakkana mala , ayyo yoota ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto him , Man , who made me a judge or a divider over you ?
text2: SHin Yesuusi , “ Bitaniyau , tana intte bolli pirddiya daanna woi hegaa inttessi shaakkiyaagaa oottidi sunttidai oonee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto them , Take heed , and beware of covetousness : for a man ' s life consisteth not in the abundance of the things which he possesseth .
text2: Qassi eta , “ Asassi daro miishshai de7ikkokka , a shemppoi he duretettan de7enna gishshau naagettite ; duretetta amo ubbaappekka inttena naagite ” yaagiis .

text: And he spake a parable unto them , saying , The ground of a certain rich man brought forth plentifully :
text2: Etassi leemisuwaa odiiddi , “ Issi dure bitaniyaa biittai daro mokkees .

text: And he thought within himself , saying , What shall I do , because I have no room where to bestow my fruits ?
text2: Bitanee , ' Taassi ta kattaa wottiyo sohoi bainna gishshau waatooshsha ' yaagidi , ba wozanan qoppiis ;

text: And he said , This will I do : I will pull down my barns , and build greater ; and there will I bestow all my fruits and my goods .
text2: ' Taani waatanee giikko , ta gootaraa qolada , hara gitatiyaagaa gootarana ; ta kattaanne tabaa ubbaa hegan wottana .

text: And I will say to my soul , Soul , thou hast much goods laid up for many years ; take thine ease , eat , drink , and be merry .
text2: Yaatada tana , “ Laa tanooshsho , neessi daro laittaassi gidiya daro miishshai de7ees ; shemppa , ma , uya , ufaitta ” gaana ' yaagiis .

text: But God said unto him , Thou fool , this night thy soul shall be required of thee : then whose shall those things be , which thou hast provided ?
text2: “ SHin Xoossai a , ' Laa ha eeyyau , neeni hachchi qamma haiqqaasa ; yaatin , ha neeni shiishshidobai oossi gidanee ? ' yaagiis .

text: So is he that layeth up treasure for himself , and is not rich toward God .
text2: “ Xoossaa matan dure gidennan , bau miishsha shiishshiyai ooninne he bitaniyaa mala ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto his disciples , Therefore I say unto you , Take no thought for your life , what ye shall eat ; neither for the body , what ye shall put on .
text2: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Hegaa gishshau , taani intteyyo odais ; intte paxa de7anau maanabaassinne woi intte bollau maayanabaassi hirggoppite .

text: The life is more than meat , and the body is more than raiment .
text2: Aissi giikko , shemppoi qumappe aadhdhennee ? Qassi bollai maayoppe aadhdhennee ?

text: Consider the ravens : for they neither sow nor reap ; which neither have storehouse nor barn ; and God feedeth them : how much more are ye better than the fowls ?
text2: Qooraaseta xeellite ; eti zerokkona ; cakkokkona ; etau minjjiyo keetti woi gootari baawa ; eta Xoossai mizees ; kafotuppe intte keehi aadhdheeta .

text: And which of you with taking thought can add to his stature one cubit ?
text2: Intte giddon daro qoppidi , ba geesaa bolli issi wara gujjanau danddayiyai oonee ?

text: If ye then be not able to do that thing which is least , why take ye thought for the rest ?
text2: Yaatin intte hegaa mala , guuttabaa oottanau danddayennaageeti aissi harabau hirggeetii ?

text: Consider the lilies how they grow : they toil not , they spin not ; and yet I say unto you , that Solomon in all his glory was not arrayed like one of these .
text2: “ Ciishshati waani dicciyaakko xeellite ; daafurokkona woi puutto suqqokkona . SHin taani intteyyo odais ; harai atto , Solomoni hegaa keena bonchchettidaagaa gidiiddi , he ciishshatuppe issuwaagaa malaa maayibeenna .

text: If then God so clothe the grass , which is to day in the field , and to morrow is cast into the oven ; how much more will he clothe you , O ye of little faith ?
text2: Laafa ammanoi de7iyoogeetoo , Xoossai hachchi de7idi , wontto coociyaa taman eexxiya dembbaa maataa maizziyaagee , inttena etaagaappe aattidi , waati maizzennee ?

text: And seek not ye what ye shall eat , or what ye shall drink , neither be ye of doubtful mind .
text2: “ Intte maanabaanne uyanabaa darissidi koyoppitenne qassi hirggoppite . Aissi giikko , ha sa7an de7iya ammanenna asati he ubbabaa darissidi koyoosona ; qassi he ubbai inttena koshshiyoogaa intte Aawai erees .

text: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God ; and all these things shall be added unto you .
text2: Hegaa aggi bayidi , Xoossaa kawotettaa koyite ; i hegeeta inttessi immana .

text: Fear not , little flock ; for it is your Father ' s good pleasure to give you the kingdom .
text2: “ Amarida dorssa wudiyau , intte Aawai ba kawotettaa inttessi immanau ufaittiyo gishshau yayyoppite .

text: Sell that ye have , and give alms ; provide yourselves bags which wax not old , a treasure in the heavens that faileth not , where no thief approacheth , neither moth corrupteth .
text2: Inttessi de7iyaabaa baizzite ; hiyyeesau immite ; kaisoi shiiqennasan , bil77ai bochchennasan , saluwan wurenna miishshaa dagayidi , ceeggenna korjjuwaa intte huuphessi oottite .

text: For where your treasure is , there will your heart be also .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte wozanai intte miishshai de7iyoosan de7ana .

text: Let your loins be girded about , and your lights burning ;
text2: “ Bantta godai bullachchaappe soo simmidi , kariyaa dooyanau xeegiyo wode , sohuwaara dooyanau naagiya asatudan , intte xeessan qabattuwaa mintti gixxidi , xomppiyaa xomppidi , giigi uttite .

text: Blessed are those servants , whom the lord when he cometh shall find watching : verily I say unto you , that he shall gird himself , and make them to sit down to meat , and will come forth and serve them .
text2: Bantta godai soo yiyo wode , xiskkennan naagiiddi uttida ashkkarati waani anjjettanddonaashsha ! Taani tumaa gais ; i eta , ' Uttite ' giidi , ba qabattuwaa minttidi , eta sinttau qumaa aattana .

text: And if he shall come in the second watch , or come in the third watch , and find them so , blessed are those servants .
text2: Omarssa gidin , woi qamma bilahe gidin , audenne eta godai yiidi , eta giigi uttidaageeta be7ikko , eti waani anjjettanddonaashsha !

text: And this know , that if the goodman of the house had known what hour the thief would come , he would have watched , and not have suffered his house to be broken through .
text2: SHin intte issibaa erite ; hegeenne aibee giikko , kaisoi yaana wodiyaa keettaawai eridaakko , beegottidi kaisuwan ba keettaa bookissenna .

text: Be ye therefore ready also : for the Son of man cometh at an hour when ye think not .
text2: Taani , Asa Na7ai , intte qoppenna wodiyan yaana gishshau , inttekka qassi giigi uttanau bessees ” yaagiis .

text: Then Peter said unto him , Lord , speakest thou this parable unto us , or even to all ?
text2: PHeexiroosi a , “ Godau , neeni ha leemisuwaa nuussi odaiyye ubbaassi odai ? ” yaagiis .

text: And the Lord said , Who then is that faithful and wise steward , whom his lord shall make ruler over his household , to give them their portion of meat in due season ?
text2: Godai zaaridi yaagiis ; “ Yaatin ba so asau qumaa koshshiyo wodiyan immana mala , a godai sunttiyo ammanettiya wozannaama ashkkari oonee ?

text: Blessed is that servant , whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing .
text2: I hegaadan oottishin , a godai yiidi , demmiyo ashkkarai anjjettidaagaa .

text: Of a truth I say unto you , that he will make him ruler over all that he hath .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; godai he ashkkaraa babaa ubbaa bolli sunttana .

text: But and if that servant say in his heart , My lord delayeth his coming ; and shall begin to beat the menservants and maidens , and to eat and drink , and to be drunken ;
text2: SHin he ashkkarai , ' Ta godai gam77idi yaana ' yaagidi , ba wozanan qoppidi , hara ashkkarata , attumaageetanne maccaageeta deshettaa doommikko , qassi meettaanne ushshaa doommikkonne mattottikko ,

text: The lord of that servant will come in a day when he looketh not for him , and at an hour when he is not aware , and will cut him in sunder , and will appoint him his portion with the unbelievers .
text2: he ashkkaraa godai i qoppibeenna gallassaaninne qassi i eribeenna saatiyan yaana . Yiidi a qanxxerettidi , ammanettenna asai de7iyoosan wottana .

text: And that servant , which knew his lord ' s will , and prepared not himself , neither did according to his will , shall be beaten with many stripes .
text2: “ Ba godai dosiyoobaa eriiddi giigettibeenna ashkkarai , woi i dosiyoogaadan oottennan ixxida ashkkarai , lissuwan daro garafettana .

text: But he that knew not , and did commit things worthy of stripes , shall be beaten with few stripes . For unto whomsoever much is given , of him shall be much required : and to whom men have committed much , of him they will ask the more .
text2: SHin ba godai dosiyoobaa erennan lissuwan garafanau bessiyaabaa oottida ashkkarai lissuwan guuttaa garafettana . Daruwaa immido uraappe daroi koyettees . Appekka dariyaagaa immido uraappe keehi daroi koyettees .

text: I am come to send fire on the earth ; and what will I if it be already kindled ?
text2: “ Taani taman sa7aa oittanau yaas ; ha77ikka xuugettappe harabaa ainne koyikke .

text: But I have a baptism to be baptized with ; and how am I straitened till it be accomplished !
text2: Taani xammaqettana xinqqatiyaa de7ausu ; he xinqqatiyaa polettanaashin , taani waana tuggataneeshsha !

text: Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth ? I tell you , Nay ; but rather division :
text2: Taani sa7aassi sarotettaa ehaanau yiidabaa inttessi milatii ? CHii , chii , taani intteyyo odais ; taani asaa gidduwan shaahotettaa medhdhanau yiidoogaappe attin .

text: For from henceforth there shall be five in one house divided , three against two , and two against three .
text2: Aissi giikko , hagaappe sinttan issi keettan ichchashu asati de7ana ; de7ishin heezzai naa77aa bolli , naa77ai heezzaa bolli denddidi , shaahettana .

text: The father shall be divided against the son , and the son against the father ; the mother against the daughter , and the daughter against the mother ; the mother in law against her daughter in law , and the daughter in law against her mother in law .
text2: Aawai ba na7aa bolli , na7ai ba aawaa bolli , aayyiyaa ba na7ee bolli , na7iyaa ba aayee bolli , bollotiyaa ba na7aa machchee bolli , na7aa machchiyaa ba bollotee bolli , denddidi shaahettana ” yaagiis .

text: And he said also to the people , When ye see a cloud rise out of the west , straightway ye say , There cometh a shower ; and so it is .
text2: Yesuusi qassi asaa , “ Awai wulliyo baggaara kiyiya shaaraa intte be7iyo wode , sohuwaara , ' Wolqqaama irai yees ' yaageeta ; tumakka yees .

text: And when ye see the south wind blow , ye say , There will be heat ; and it cometh to pass .
text2: Tohossa baggaara carkkoi carkkiyo wode , ' Hombbana hanees ' yaageeta ; tumakka hombbees .

text: Ye hypocrites , ye can discern the face of the sky and of the earth ; but how is it that ye do not discern this time ?
text2: Intte lo77o misatiya iitati , sa7aanne saluwaa xeellidi , hananabaa eriiddi , ha wodiyaabaa aissi erekketii ?

text: Yea , and why even of yourselves judge ye not what is right ?
text2: “ Yaatin aissi intte intte huuphiyan xilluwaa pirddekketii ?

text: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate , as thou art in the way , give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him ; lest he hale thee to the judge , and the judge deliver thee to the officer , and the officer cast thee into prison .
text2: Nena pirdda keettan mootiyaagee daanna sintti goochchenna mala , qassi daannai nena polisiyau aattidi immenna mala , poliseekka qasho keettaa gelissenna mala , nena mootiyaagaara pirdda keettaa baidda , ogiyan sigettaichcha .

text: I tell thee , thou shalt not depart thence , till thou hast paid the very last mite .
text2: Taani neeyyo odais ; neeni issi santtimee attennan , ne maqqaccuwaa wurssada qanxxana gakkanaassi , mulekka qasho keettaappe kiyakka ” yaagiis .

text: There were present at that season some that told him of the Galilaeans , whose blood Pilate had mingled with their sacrifices .
text2: Issi issi asai he wode yiidi , Galiila asatubaa Yesuusassi odiiddi , “ PHilaaxoosi Galiila asata woridi , eta suuttaa eti yarshshiyoobaara walakkiis ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , Suppose ye that these Galilaeans were sinners above all the Galilaeans , because they suffered such things ?
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Ha Galiila asati haiqqido gishshau , yaatin inttessi hara Galiila asa ubbaappekka nagaranchcha milatiyoonaa ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: CHii , eti gidennaagaa taani inttessi odais ; shin intte nagaraappe simmennan ixxikko , intte ubbaikka hegaadan haiqqana .

text: Or those eighteen , upon whom the tower in Siloam fell , and slew them , think ye that they were sinners above all men that dwelt in Jerusalem ?
text2: Woikko Saliihoomen shuchchan keexxido adussa keettai eta bolli kunddidi , worido tammanne hosppun asati Yerusalaamen de7iya ubbaappe daro naaqqidaageeta inttessi milatiyoonaa ?

text: I tell you , Nay : but , except ye repent , ye shall all likewise perish .
text2: CHii , eti naaqqibeennaagaa taani inttessi odais ; nagaraappe simmennan ixxikko , intte ubbai hegaadan haiqqana ” yaagiis .

text: He spake also this parable ; A certain man had a fig tree planted in his vineyard ; and he came and sought fruit thereon , and found none .
text2: Qassi Yesuusi ha leemisuwaa etassi odiis ; “ Hagee augee giikko , issi bitaniyaassi woiniyaa turaa giddon tokettida balasiyo giyo mittiyaa de7ausu . He bitanee mittiyaa aifidaakkonne giidi yin , aifee i bolli xayiis .

text: Then said he unto the dresser of his vineyard , Behold , these three years I come seeking fruit on this fig tree , and find none : cut it down ; why cumbereth it the ground ?
text2: Woiniyaa turaa oottiyaagaa i , ' Taani ha balaseeppe aife demmana yaagaidda , heezzu laitta gakkanaashinkka ya yaada ainne demmabeikke . He balasiyaa aissi gaden coo eqqa bayadee ? Qanxxa ola ' yaagiis .

text: And he answering said unto him , Lord , let it alone this year also , till I shall dig about it , and dung it :
text2: SHin woiniyaa turaa oottiyaagee zaaridi , ' Godau , taani o bul77ada i xaphuwan oshaa yegganaashin , ha laittikka agga baya .

text: And if it bear fruit , well : and if not , then after that thou shalt cut it down .
text2: Laitti a aifikko lo77o ; shin aifennan ixxikko qanxxettu ' giis ” yaagiis .

text: And he was teaching in one of the synagogues on the sabbath .
text2: Issi Sambbatan Yesuusi Aihuda woosa keettatuppe issuwan tamaarissees .

text: And , behold , there was a woman which had a spirit of infirmity eighteen years , and was bowed together , and could in no wise lift up herself .
text2: Tammanne hosppun laittaasappe doommada , i bolli iita ayyaanai de7iyaagee harggissin , sahettada de7iya issi mishiriyaa de7ausu . Quuna gididaara muleera sitti gaada eqqanau danddayabeikku .

text: And when Jesus saw her , he called her to him , and said unto her , Woman , thou art loosed from thine infirmity .
text2: Yesuusi o be7ido wode , “ Maccaasee , ne harggiyaappe paxadasa ” yaagiis .

text: And he laid his hands on her : and immediately she was made straight , and glorified God .
text2: Ba kushiyaa i bolli wottin , sohuwaara sitti ga eqqada Xoossaa galataasu .

text: And the ruler of the synagogue answered with indignation , because that Jesus had healed on the sabbath day , and said unto the people , There are six days in which men ought to work : in them therefore come and be healed , and not on the sabbath day .
text2: SHin Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqai Yesuusi Sambbata gallassan harggiyaappe mishiriyo pattido gishshau hanqqettidi asaa , “ Ooso oottiyo gallassati usuppuna ; intte yiidi harggiyaappe paxanau bessiyoi he gallassatuunappe attin , Sambbataana gidenna ” yaagiis .

text: The Lord then answered him , and said , Thou hypocrite , doth not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or his ass from the stall , and lead him away to watering ?
text2: Godai zaaridi , “ Ha lo77o milatiya iita asatoo , intteppe issoinne Sambbatan booraa woi hariyaa gaaxaataappe birshshidi , haattaa ushshanau efeennee ?

text: And ought not this woman , being a daughter of Abraham , whom Satan hath bound , lo , these eighteen years , be loosed from this bond on the sabbath day ?
text2: Hanna Abrahaama zariyaa tammanne hosppun laittaasappe Seexaanai qachchidoora qashuwaappe Sambbatan birshshettanau bessekkee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And when he had said these things , all his adversaries were ashamed : and all the people rejoiced for all the glorious things that were done by him .
text2: I immiyo zaaroi a morkketa yeellayiis ; i oottido ooratta yoho ubban asai ubbai ufaittiis .

text: Then said he , Unto what is the kingdom of God like ? and whereunto shall I resemble it ?
text2: Yesuusi , “ Xoossaa kawotettai ai milatii ? I ai milatiyaakko , taani inttena waata bessoo ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which a man took , and cast into his garden ; and it grew , and waxed a great tree ; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it .
text2: Xoossaa kawotettai sanaafici giyo qii mittee aifiyo milatees . He mittee aifiyo asai ekkidi zeriis ; zerin mokkidaara diccada gita mitta gidaasu ; gidin kafoi i tashiyaa bolli baassi keexxiis ” yaagiis .

text: And again he said , Whereunto shall I liken the kingdom of God ?
text2: Qassikka Yesuusi , “ Xoossaa kawotettai ai milatiyaakko , taani inttena waatada bessoo ?

text: It is like leaven , which a woman took and hid in three measures of meal , till the whole was leavened .
text2: Issi mishiriyaa heezzu kere xiilliyaa ekkada , munaqqido munaqai ubbai denddana gakkanaassi , aani tigido irshshuwaa milatees ” yaagiis .

text: And he went through the cities and villages , teaching , and journeying toward Jerusalem .
text2: Yerusalaame biiddi , gita katamaaninne qeeri kataman de7iya asaa tamaarissiiddi aadhdhees .

text: Then said one unto him , Lord , are there few that be saved ? And he said unto them ,
text2: Aadhdhishin issi bitanee a , “ Ta Godau neeni ashshanaageeti amaridaageetee ? ” yaagiis . Yaagin Yesuusi eta ,

text: Strive to enter in at the strait gate : for many , I say unto you , will seek to enter in , and shall not be able .
text2: “ Taani intteyyo odais ; daro asai gelanau koyana shin danddayenna gishshau , un77o penggiyaara gelanau olettite .

text: When once the master of the house is risen up , and hath shut to the door , and ye begin to stand without , and to knock at the door , saying , Lord , Lord , open unto us ; and he shall answer and say unto you , I know you not whence ye are :
text2: Keettaawai denddidi , ba keettaa gorddirggin , karen intte eqqidi , ' Godau , godau , nuussi dooyarkkii ' yaagidi xeessaa doommiyo wode , i zaaridi , ' Intte awappe yiyaakko , taani inttena erikke ' yaagana .

text: Then shall ye begin to say , We have eaten and drunk in thy presence , and thou hast taught in our streets .
text2: “ He wode intte , ' Nuuni nenaara miida ; uyida ; neeni nu biittan tamaarissadasa ' yaagana .

text: But he shall say , I tell you , I know you not whence ye are ; depart from me , all ye workers of iniquity .
text2: “ Yaagin I qassi , ' Taani inttessi odais ; intte awappe yiyaakko , taani inttena erikke ; makkalati ubbaikka ta matappe haakkite ' yaagana .

text: There shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth , when ye shall see Abraham , and Isaac , and Jacob , and all the prophets , in the kingdom of God , and you yourselves thrust out .
text2: “ Abrahaami , Yisaaqi , Yaaqoobinne hananabaa yootiyaageeti ubbai karen intte eqqidaashin , Xoossaa kawotettan de7iyaageeta intte be7iyo wode , intte yeekkananne achchaa garccana .

text: And they shall come from the east , and from the west , and from the north , and from the south , and shall sit down in the kingdom of God .
text2: Asai arshshoppenne arggoppe , qassi huuphessa baggappenne tohossa baggappe yiidi , Xoossaa kawotettan qumaa maanau uttana .

text: And , behold , there are last which shall be first , and there are first which shall be last .
text2: Be7ite ; ha77i guyyen de7iyaageeti sinttau aadhdhana ; ha77i sinttan de7iyaageeti guyye aadhdhana ” yaagiis .

text: The same day there came certain of the Pharisees , saying unto him , Get thee out , and depart hence : for Herod will kill thee .
text2: He wode Parisaawetuppe issoi issoi Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Heeroodisi nena woranau koyiyo gishshau , hagaappe baichcha ” yaagidosona .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye , and tell that fox , Behold , I cast out devils , and I do cures to day and to morrow , and the third day I shall be perfected .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Biidi he worakanaassi , ' Hachchinne wontto xalaheta kessana ; qassi harggida asaakka pattana ; yaatada heezzantto gallassi ta oosuwaa wurssana ' yaagite .

text: Nevertheless I must walk to day , and to morrow , and the day following : for it cannot be that a prophet perish out of Jerusalem .
text2: SHin hananabaa yootiyaagee Yerusalaameppe harasan haiqqanau bessenna gishshau , taani hachchi , wonttonne wonttifen ogiyaa bollan de7anau bessees .

text: O Jerusalem , Jerusalem , which killest the prophets , and stonest them that are sent unto thee ; how often would I have gathered thy children together , as a hen doth gather her brood under her wings , and ye would not !
text2: “ Yerusalaame katamaa asau , Yerusalaame katamaa asau , hananabaa yootiyaageeta intte woreeta ; Xoossai inttekko kiittidoogeetakka shuchchan caddeeta ; kuttiyaa ba marata ba qefiyan haphphiyoogaadan , taani intte naata issi diri shiishshanau aapputoo koyidanaa ! SHin tana diggideta .

text: Behold , your house is left unto you desolate : and verily I say unto you , Ye shall not see me , until the time come when ye shall say , Blessed is he that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Be7ite , Xoossai intte keettaa muleera yeggi bayana ; taani intteyyo odais ; intte , ' Godaa sunttan yiyaagee anjjettidaagaa ' gaana gakkanaashin , tana be7ekketa ” yaagiis .

text: And it came to pass , as he went into the house of one of the chief Pharisees to eat bread on the sabbath day , that they watched him .
text2: Issi Sambbata gallassi Yesuusi Parisaawetu halaqatuppe issuwaa soo laaxaa maanau biis . He wode eti a daro naagoosona .

text: And , behold , there was a certain man before him which had the dropsy .
text2: Bollai kixxido issi bitanee Yesuusa sinttan de7ees .

text: And Jesus answering spake unto the lawyers and Pharisees , saying , Is it lawful to heal on the sabbath day ?
text2: Yesuusi higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetanne Parisaaweta , “ Nu higgee Sambbatan asa pattanau azaziiyye azazennee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And they held their peace . And he took him , and healed him , and let him go ;
text2: SHin eti co77u giidosona . Yesuusi he bitaniyaa bollaa bochchidi , pattidi yeddiis .

text: And answered them , saying , Which of you shall have an ass or an ox fallen into a pit , and will not straightway pull him out on the sabbath day ?
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Intteppe Sambbatan ba boorai woi haree ollan kunddin , Sambbata giidi , sohuwaara ollaappe kessenai oonee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And they could not answer him again to these things .
text2: SHin etau ha yohuwaassi zaaruwaa immanau danddayettennan ixxiis .

text: And he put forth a parable to those which were bidden , when he marked how they chose out the chief rooms ; saying unto them ,
text2: Issi issi imattati bonchcho sohuwaa waatidi dooriyaakko , Yesuusi xeellidi , leemisuwaa odiiddi , hagaadan yaagiis ;

text: When thou art bidden of any man to a wedding , sit not down in the highest room ; lest a more honourable man than thou be bidden of him ;
text2: “ Nena asi bullachchaa xeesikko , bonchcho sohuwan uttoppa . Neeppe bonchchettiya asi xeesettidaakkonne ooni erii ?

text: And he that bade thee and him come and say to thee , Give this man place ; and thou begin with shame to take the lowest room .
text2: Nenanne anne xeesidaagee yiidi nena , ' Ha sohuwaa ayyo imma ' yaagin , neeni yeellatada ziqqiyaasan uttana .

text: But when thou art bidden , go and sit down in the lowest room ; that when he that bade thee cometh , he may say unto thee , Friend , go up higher : then shalt thou have worship in the presence of them that sit at meat with thee .
text2: SHin nena xeesidaagee yiidi nena , ' Ta ishau pude aadhdha ' gaana mala , ubbaappe ziqqiyaasan utta ; he wode neeni imatta ubbaa sinttan bonchchettana .

text: For whosoever exalteth himself shall be abased ; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted .
text2: Aissi giikko , bana xoqqu oottiya urai ziqqi gaana ; bana ziqqi oottiya urai xoqqu gaana ” yaagiis .

text: Then said he also to him that bade him , When thou makest a dinner or a supper , call not thy friends , nor thy brethren , neither thy kinsmen , nor thy rich neighbours ; lest they also bid thee again , and a recompence be made thee .
text2: Yesuusi bana ba soo xeesida bitaniyaa hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Neeni laaxaa woi kahuwaa ne son katissiyo wode , ne laggeta woi ne ishantta woi ne dabbota woi ne dure shoorota xeesoppa ; aissi giikko , eti nena kayan xeesidi , he kushiyaa neessi zaarana .

text: But when thou makest a feast , call the poor , the maimed , the lame , the blind :
text2: SHin neeni qumaa katissiyo wode , hiyyeesata , quunata , wobbeta , qooqeta xeesa .

text: And thou shalt be blessed ; for they cannot recompense thee : for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just .
text2: Eti ne kushiyaa zaaranau danddayenna gishshau , neeni anjjettana . Xilloti haiquwaappe denddiyo wode ne kushiyaa Xoossai zaarana ” yaagiis .

text: And when one of them that sat at meat with him heard these things , he said unto him , Blessed is he that shall eat bread in the kingdom of God .
text2: Qumaa maanau uttida asaappe issoi hegaa siyidi Yesuusa , “ Xoossaa kawotettan qumaa maanau uttanaageeti anjjettidaageeta ” yaagiis .

text: Then said he unto him , A certain man made a great supper , and bade many :
text2: SHin Yesuusi zaaridi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Issi bitanee daro qumaa katissidi , daro asaa xeesiis .

text: And sent his servant at supper time to say to them that were bidden , Come ; for all things are now ready .
text2: Qumaa miyo wodee gakkin , kase xeesetti uttida asaa , ' Ubbabai ha77i giigi uttido gishshau , haa yiite ' gaanau , ba ashkkarata asaakko kiittiis .

text: And they all with one consent began to make excuse . The first said unto him , I have bought a piece of ground , and I must needs go and see it : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: SHin ubbai huuphiyan huuphiyan banttana aggi bayana mala woossidosona . Koiroogee ashkkaraassi yootiiddi , ' Taani biittaa shammaas ; he biittaa baada be7anau koshshees ; hayyanaa tana hanqqettoppa ' yaagiis .

text: And another said , I have bought five yoke of oxen , and I go to prove them : I pray thee have me excused .
text2: “ Hankkoi , ' Taani ichchashu waaxa boorata shammidoogeeta goya be7ana bais ; hayyanaa tana hanqqettoppa ' yaagiis .

text: And another said , I have married a wife , and therefore I cannot come .
text2: “ Harai qassi , ' Taani machchiyo ekkido gishshau , baanau danddayikke ' yaagiis .

text: So that servant came , and shewed his lord these things . Then the master of the house being angry said to his servant , Go out quickly into the streets and lanes of the city , and bring in hither the poor , and the maimed , and the halt , and the blind .
text2: “ Ashkkarai simmidi , hegaa godaassi odiis . Odin godai daro hanqqettidi , ba ashkkaraa , ' Elle katamaa ogiyaanne toho ogiyaa baada , hiyyeesata , quunnida asata , wobbetanne qooqeta ekkada ya ' yaagiis .

text: And the servant said , Lord , it is done as thou hast commanded , and yet there is room .
text2: “ A ashkkarai , ' Ta godau , neeni azazidoogaadan oottaas ; shin ha77ikka sohoi de7ees ' yaagiis .

text: And the lord said unto the servant , Go out into the highways and hedges , and compel them to come in , that my house may be filled .
text2: “ Yaagin godai ashkkaraa , ' Dere garssa ogiyaanne loossuwaa baada , ta keettaa kumana mala , asaa ta soo eha .

text: For I say unto you , That none of those men which were bidden shall taste of my supper .
text2: Aissi giikko , kase ta soo xeesettida asatuppe issoinne ta qumaa meennaagaa taani intteyyo odais ' giis ” yaagiis .

text: And there went great multitudes with him : and he turned , and said unto them ,
text2: Yesuusi daro asaara biidi , asaakko guyye simmidi ,

text: If any man come to me , and hate not his father , and mother , and wife , and children , and brethren , and sisters , yea , and his own life also , he cannot be my disciple .
text2: “ Taakko yiya ooninne ba aawaa , ba aayyiyo , ba machchiyo , ba naata , ba ishantta , ba michchentta , harai atto banakka ixxana xayikko , tana kaalliyaagaa gidanau danddayenna .

text: And whosoever doth not bear his cross , and come after me , cannot be my disciple .
