text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati , “ Godau , hagan naa77u bisoti de7oosona ” yaagin Yesuusi , “ Hegee gidana ” yaagiis .

text: And he came out , and went , as he was wont , to the mount of Olives ; and his disciples also followed him .
text2: Yesuusi katamaappe kiyidi , haroodeegaadan Dabira Zaite Deriyaa kiyiis . Qassi erissiyo ashkkaratikka a kaallidosona .

text: And when he was at the place , he said unto them , Pray that ye enter not into temptation .
text2: He sohuwaa gakkidi , “ Paaciyan intte gelennan attana mala , Xoossaa woossite ” yaagiis .

text: And he was withdrawn from them about a stone ' s cast , and kneeled down , and prayed ,
text2: SHuchchaa olin gakkiyo sohuwaa keenaa etappe haakki biidi gulbbatidi

text: Saying , Father , if thou be willing , remove this cup from me : nevertheless not my will , but thine , be done .
text2: Xoossaa , “ Ta Aawau , neeni koyiyoobaa gidikko , ha burccukkuwaa taappe digga ; shin neeni koyiyoobai hanoppe attin , taani koyiyoobai hanoppo ” yaagidi woossiis .

text: And there appeared an angel unto him from heaven , strengthening him .
text2: Saluwaappe yiidi minttettiya kiitanchchai ayyo beettiis .

text: And being in an agony he prayed more earnestly : and his sweat was as it were great drops of blood falling down to the ground .
text2: Ba wozanaa giddon mishettidi , daro minttidi woossees . I cawattiyo cawai sa7an xokkiya suutta milatees .

text: And when he rose up from prayer , and was come to his disciples , he found them sleeping for sorrow ,
text2: Woosaappe denddidi , ba erissiyo ashkkaratukko guyye biis . Biidi eti daro qarettido gishshau , daafuridi xiskkidaageeta demmidi ,

text: And said unto them , Why sleep ye ? rise and pray , lest ye enter into temptation .
text2: “ Aissi xiskkeetii ? Paaciyan gelennan attana mala , denddidi Xoossaa woossite ” yaagiis .

text: And while he yet spake , behold a multitude , and he that was called Judas , one of the twelve , went before them , and drew near unto Jesus to kiss him .
text2: I biron hegaa haasayishin , asai yiis . Tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issi Yihudaa giyoogee he asaa kaalettiiddi , Yesuusa yeranau akko shiiqiis .

text: But Jesus said unto him , Judas , betrayest thou the Son of man with a kiss ?
text2: SHin Yesuusi a , “ Yihudaa , neeni tana Asa Na7aa yerada aatta immai ? ” yaagiis .

text: When they which were about him saw what would follow , they said unto him , Lord , shall we smite with the sword ?
text2: Yesuusaara de7iya erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa be7ido wode a , “ Godau , nuuni eta bisuwan shocanee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And one of them smote the servant of the high priest , and cut off his right ear .
text2: Etappe issoi qeese ubbatu halaqaa ashkkaraa shocidi , a ushachcha haittaa qanxxi oliis .

text: And Jesus answered and said , Suffer ye thus far . And he touched his ear , and healed him .
text2: SHin Yesuusi , “ Aggite ” yaagidi , a haittaa bochchidi pattiis .

text: Then Jesus said unto the chief priests , and captains of the temple , and the elders , which were come to him , Be ye come out , as against a thief , with swords and staves ?
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi baakko yiida qeese halaqata , Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarata azaziyaageetanne cima asaa hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Tana pangga kessidi , pangga oiqqiyoogaadan oiqqanau bisonne dulla oiqqidi yiidetii ?

text: When I was daily with you in the temple , ye stretched forth no hands against me : but this is your hour , and the power of darkness .
text2: Taani Beeta Maqidasiyan gallassi gallassi inttenaara de7iyo wode tana oiqqibeekketa ; shin hagee intte wodenne xumaa wolqqaa wode ” yaagiis .

text: Then took they him , and led him , and brought him into the high priest ' s house . And Peter followed afar off .
text2: Yesuusa qachchidi , qeese ubbatu halaqaa soo ekki efiidosona . Qassi PHeexiroosi haahuwan kaalliis .

text: And when they had kindled a fire in the midst of the hall , and were set down together , Peter sat down among them .
text2: Eti dirssa giddon tamaa eettidi , issippe uttidaashin , PHeexiroosikka eta giddo gelidi , utti bayiis .

text: But a certain maid beheld him as he sat by the fire , and earnestly looked upon him , and said , This man was also with him .
text2: Issi ashkkariyaa PHeexiroosi tamaa achchan uttidaagaa be7idaara tishshi ootta xeellada , “ Hageekka aara issippe de7ees ” yaagaasu .

text: And he denied him , saying , Woman , I know him not .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi , “ Ha mishiree , taani a erikke ” yaagidi kaddiis .

text: And after a little while another saw him , and said , Thou art also of them . And Peter said , Man , I am not .
text2: Guuttaa gam77ishin , issoi PHeexiroosa be7idi , “ Neenikka etaara issippe de7aasa ” yaagiis . SHin PHeexiroosi , “ Hagoo , taani etaara issippe de7ikke ” yaagiis .

text: And about the space of one hour after another confidently affirmed , saying , Of a truth this fellow also was with him : for he is a Galilaean .
text2: Hara bitanee issi saate gidiyaagaa keenaappe guyyiyan , “ Ha bitaneekka Galiila asa gidiyo gishshau , aara de7iyoogee tuma ” yaagidi minttidi odiis .

text: And Peter said , Man , I know not what thou sayest . And immediately , while he yet spake , the cock crew .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi , “ Hagoo , neeni giyoobai aibakko taani erikke ” yaagiis . I biron haasayishin , sohuwaarakka kuttoi waassi aggiis .

text: And the Lord turned , and looked upon Peter . And Peter remembered the word of the Lord , how he had said unto him , Before the cock crow , thou shalt deny me thrice .
text2: Godai guyye simmidi , PHeexiroosa xeelliis . Xeellin PHeexiroosi Godai bana , “ Neeni hachchi kuttoi waassanaappe kase , heezzutoo tana kaddana ” giidoogaa hassayiis .

text: And Peter went out , and wept bitterly .
text2: PHeexiroosi kare kiyidi , mishettidi yeekkiis .

text: And the men that held Jesus mocked him , and smote him .
text2: Yesuusa oiqqida asati shocoosonanne a bolli qilliiccoosona .

text: And when they had blindfolded him , they struck him on the face , and asked him , saying , Prophesy , who is it that smote thee ?
text2: A aifiyaa goozidi , “ Nena dechchidai oonee ? Ane hananabaa yoota ” yaagidi a oichchidosona .

text: And many other things blasphemously spake they against him .
text2: Qassi a hara daro cashshaa cayidosona .

text: And as soon as it was day , the elders of the people and the chief priests and the scribes came together , and led him into their council , saying ,
text2: Wonttin dere cimati , qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti issisaa shiiqidi , Yesuusa bantta shiiqidosaa efiidi ,

text: Art thou the Christ ? tell us . And he said unto them , If I tell you , ye will not believe :
text2: “ Kiristtoosi nenee ? Nuussi oda ” yaagidosona . SHin i yaagidi zaariis ; “ Taani inttessi odikko , tana ammanekketa .

text: And if I also ask you , ye will not answer me , nor let me go .
text2: Qassi taani inttena oichchikko odekketa ; woi tana qashuwaappe birshshekketa .

text: Hereafter shall the Son of man sit on the right hand of the power of God .
text2: SHin taani Asa Na7ai , ha77ippe doommada , wolqqaama Xoossaappe ushachcha baggaara uttana ” yaagiis .

text: Then said they all , Art thou then the Son of God ? And he said unto them , Ye say that I am .
text2: Eti ubbai Yesuusa , “ Yaatin neeni Xoossaa Na7ee ? ” yaagidosona . Yaagin i zaaridi , “ Intte tana , ' Neeni Xoossaa Na7aa ' giyoogaa tumaa geeta ” yaagiis .

text: And they said , What need we any further witness ? for we ourselves have heard of his own mouth .
text2: Eti , “ Nuuni nu huuphiyan a doonaappe siyida ; simmi hagaappe sinttan nuna ai markka koshshii ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And the whole multitude of them arose , and led him unto Pilate .
text2: Eti ubbai issippe denddidi , Yesuusa PHilaaxoosakko efiidosona .

text: And they began to accuse him , saying , We found this fellow perverting the nation , and forbidding to give tribute to Caesar , saying that he himself is Christ a King .
text2: Efiidi , “ Hagee nu dere asaa balettishin , asai Roome biittaa kawuwaassi giiraa immenna mala diggishiininne qassi , ' Taani kawuwaa ' yaagishin demmida ” yaagidi Yesuusa mootuwaa doommidosona .

text: And Pilate asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answered him and said , Thou sayest it .
text2: PHilaaxoosi Yesuusa , “ Neeni Aihudatu kawoo ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Yesuusi zaaridi a , “ Neenikka gaasa ” yaagiis .

text: Then said Pilate to the chief priests and to the people , I find no fault in this man .
text2: PHilaaxoosi qeese halaqatussinne asaassi odiiddi , “ Ha bitaniyaa bolli taani harai atto issi moorokka demmabeikke ” yaagiis .

text: And they were the more fierce , saying , He stirreth up the people , teaching throughout all Jewry , beginning from Galilee to this place .
text2: SHin eti , “ Hagee Galiilappe doommidi , harai atto hagaa gakkanaashinkka , Yihudaa biitta ubban tamaarissiiddi , asa ooshshees ” yaagidi minttidi yootidosona .

text: When Pilate heard of Galilee , he asked whether the man were a Galilaean .
text2: PHilaaxoosi hegaa siyido wode , “ I Galiila asee ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: And as soon as he knew that he belonged unto Herod ' s jurisdiction , he sent him to Herod , who himself also was at Jerusalem at that time .
text2: PHilaaxoosi Heeroodisi heemmiyo biittan Yesuusi de7iyoogaa eridi , he wode Yerusalaamen de7iya Heeroodisakko a yeddiis .

text: And when Herod saw Jesus , he was exceeding glad : for he was desirous to see him of a long season , because he had heard many things of him ; and he hoped to have seen some miracle done by him .
text2: Heeroodisi Yesuusa be7anau daro wodiyaappe doommidi amotti uttido gishshau , a be7ido wode daro ufaittiis . I amottidoogee kase Yesuusabaa siyidoogaassa . Qassi Yesuusi oottiyo malaataappe be7ana yaagidi , qoppiiddi de7ees .

text: Then he questioned with him in many words ; but he answered him nothing .
text2: Heeroodisi Yesuusa darobaa oichchiis ; shin Yesuusi ayyo ainne zaaribeenna .

text: And the chief priests and scribes stood and vehemently accused him .
text2: Qeese halaqatinne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti a minttidi mootiiddi , hegan eqqi bayidosona .

text: And Herod with his men of war set him at nought , and mocked him , and arrayed him in a gorgeous robe , and sent him again to Pilate .
text2: Heeroodisinne a wotaaddarati Yesuusa karidi , a bolli qilliiccidosona . Alleequwaara de7iya maayuwaa a maizzidi , PHilaaxoosakko zaaridi yeddidosona .

text: And the same day Pilate and Herod were made friends together : for before they were at enmity between themselves .
text2: Hegaappe kase bantta giddon morkketti uttida PHilaaxoosinne Heeroodisi he gallassi dabbotidosona .

text: And Pilate , when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people ,
text2: PHilaaxoosi qeese halaqata , deriyaa haariyaageetanne asaa issippe xeesidi ,

text: Said unto them , Ye have brought this man unto me , as one that perverteth the people : and , behold , I , having examined him before you , have found no fault in this man touching those things whereof ye accuse him :
text2: hagaadan yaagiis ; “ ' Asa balettees ' yaagidi ha bitaniyaa taakko ehiideta ; be7ite ; taani a intte sinttan qoridoogaappe guyyiyan , intte a mootido mootuwan a bolli ainne balabaa demmabeikke .

text: No , nor yet Herod : for I sent you to him ; and , lo , nothing worthy of death is done unto him .
text2: Qassi Heeroodisi a nuukko haa yeddido gishshau , a bolli ainne demmibeennaagee erettees . Be7ite ; ha bitanee bana worissanau bessiyaabaa ainne oottibeenna .

text: I will therefore chastise him , and release him .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani a lissuwan garafada , birshsha yeddana ” yaagiis .

text: ( For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast . )
text2: PHilaaxoosayyo Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassan issi ura qashuwaappe birshshiyo meezee de7ees .

text: And they cried out all at once , saying , Away with this man , and release unto us Barabbas :
text2: SHin eti ubbai issippe , “ Ha bitaniyaa worada nuussi Barbbaana birshsha ” yaagiiddi wocamidosona .

text: ( Who for a certain sedition made in the city , and for murder , was cast into prison . )
text2: Barbbaani kataman ooshshaa kessidi , asa worido gishshau , qasho keettan qashettidi de7ees .

text: Pilate therefore , willing to release Jesus , spake again to them .
text2: PHilaaxoosi Yesuusa birshshanau koyidi , naa77anttuwaa etassi haasayiis .

text: But they cried , saying , Crucify him , crucify him .
text2: SHin eti , “ Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan a xishada kaqqa ! Kaqqa ! ” yaagiiddi wocamoosona .

text: And he said unto them the third time , Why , what evil hath he done ? I have found no cause of death in him : I will therefore chastise him , and let him go .
text2: Heezzanttuwaa PHilaaxoosi eta , “ Aissi ? I ai iitabaa oottidee ? SHemppo worissiya iitabaa a bolli demmabeikke ; hegaa gishshau , lissuwan a garafada , birshsha yeddana ” yaagiis .

text: And they were instant with loud voices , requiring that he might be crucified . And the voices of them and of the chief priests prevailed .
text2: SHin Yesuusi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi kaqettana mala , eti qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , minttidi yootidosona . Eta wocamainne qeese halaqatu qaalai darido gishshau ,

text: And Pilate gave sentence that it should be as they required .
text2: eti woossiiddi uttido pirddaa PHilaaxoosi Yesuusa bolli pirddiis .

text: And he released unto them him that for sedition and murder was cast into prison , whom they had desired ; but he delivered Jesus to their will .
text2: Yaatidi kase eti birshshissarkkii yaagidi woossiiddi uttido bitaniyaa birshshissiis ; birshshettidaagee ooshshaa gishshaunne shemppuwaa worido gishshau qashettida bitaniyaa . SHin eti Yesuusa bantta koyidoogaadan oottana mala , PHilaaxoosi a etassi aattidi immiis .

text: And as they led him away , they laid hold upon one Simon , a Cyrenian , coming out of the country , and on him they laid the cross , that he might bear it after Jesus .
text2: Yesuusa efiiddi , issi Simoona giyo Qareena biitta asi gaxaappe katamaa yiyaagaa oiqqidi , Yesuusappe guyyeera tookkana mala , masqqaliyaa a bolli wottidosona .

text: And there followed him a great company of people , and of women , which also bewailed and lamented him .
text2: Yeekkiiddinne waassiiddi uttida maccaasatinne keehi daro asai issippe a kaalliis .

text: But Jesus turning unto them said , Daughters of Jerusalem , weep not for me , but weep for yourselves , and for your children .
text2: SHin Yesuusi etakko simmidi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Yerusalaame maccaasatoo , taassi yeekkoppite ; shin asai , ' Maine maccaasati , na7a mulekka yelibeenna maccaasati , na7a mulekka xanttibeenna maccaasati bantta hailau ' yaagana gallassai yiyo gishshau , intte huuphessinne intte naatussi yeekkite .

text: Then shall they begin to say to the mountains , Fall on us ; and to the hills , Cover us .
text2: He wode eti dereta , ' Nu bolli kunddite ! ' yaagana . Keratakka , ' Nuna genttite ! ' geettaa doommana .

text: For if they do these things in a green tree , what shall be done in the dry ?
text2: Aissi giikko , eti qayye mittaa hagaadan oottiyaageeta gidikko , mela mittaa waataneeshsha ? ” yaagiis .

text: And there were also two other , malefactors , led with him to be put to death .
text2: Iitabaa oottida naa77u asatakka Yesuusaara gattidi woranau efiidosona .

text: And when they were come to the place , which is called Calvary , there they crucified him , and the malefactors , one on the right hand , and the other on the left .
text2: Guuggiyaa giyo sohuwaa gakkidi , masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan Yesuusa xishidi kaqqidosona . He iitabaa oottidaageetakka he sohuwan issuwaa Yesuusappe ushachcha baggaara , issuwaa haddirssa baggaara , masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqidosona .

text: Then said Jesus , Father , forgive them ; for they know not what they do . And they parted his raiment , and cast lots .
text2: Yesuusi , “ Ta Aawau , eti bantta oottiyoogaa erenna gishshau , eta nagaraa atto ga ” yaagiis . A maayuwaa shaakkidi , saamaa yeggidosona .

text: And the people stood beholding . And the rulers also with them derided him , saying , He saved others ; let him save himself , if he be Christ , the chosen of God .
text2: Asai eqqidi xeellishin , deriyaa haariyaageeti , “ Harata ashshiis ; Xoossai doorido a i gidikko , ane bana ashsho ” yaagiiddi a karidi qilliiccoosona .

text: And the soldiers also mocked him , coming to him , and offering him vinegar ,
text2: Qassi wotaaddarati akko shiiqidi , woiniyaa eessaa caalaa ehiidi , “ Neeni Aihudatu kawo gidikko , ane ne huuphiyaa ashsha ” yaagidi a bolli qilliiccoosona .

text: And a superscription also was written over him in letters of Greek , and Latin , and Hebrew , THIS IS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Qassi , “ Hagee Aihudatu kawuwaa ” giidi , Giriike qaalan , Roomaisxxe qaalaaninne Ibraisxxe qaalan xaafido xifatee a huuphessaara de7ees .

text: And one of the malefactors which were hanged railed on him , saying , If thou be Christ , save thyself and us .
text2: Iitabaa oottidi masqqaliyan kaqettida asatuppe issoi , “ Neeni a gidikko , ane nenanne nunanne ashsha ” yaagidi Yesuusa naassiis .

text: But the other answering rebuked him , saying , Dost not thou fear God , seeing thou art in the same condemnation ?
text2: SHin hankkoi a , “ Neeni hagaa mala pirddan de7aiddakka Xoossaassi yayyikkii ?

text: And we indeed justly ; for we receive the due reward of our deeds : but this man hath done nothing amiss .
text2: Nuuni nu oosuwaa malaa ekkiyo gishshau , nuussi imettida pirddai bessiyaagaa ; shin hagee ainne iitabaa oottibeenna ” yaagidi a hanqqettiis .

text: And he said unto Jesus , Lord , remember me when thou comest into thy kingdom .
text2: I Yesuusa , “ Yesuusaa , neeni ne kawotettaa wolqqan yiyo wode , tana dogoppa ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Verily I say unto thee , To day shalt thou be with me in paradise .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Taani neessi tumaa odais ; hachchi neeni tanaara gannatiyan de7ana ” yaagiis .

text: And it was about the sixth hour , and there was a darkness over all the earth until the ninth hour .
text2: He wode usuppun saate heera gidin , awai xumiis ; uddufun saate gakkanaashin , biitta ubban sa7ai xumiis .

text: And the sun was darkened , and the veil of the temple was rent in the midst .
text2: Xumin Beeta Maqidasiyan kaqettida magalashoikka naa77u kiyidi , pooshetti wodhdhiis .

text: And when Jesus had cried with a loud voice , he said , Father , into thy hands I commend my spirit : and having said thus , he gave up the ghost .
text2: Yesuusi qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Ta Aawau , taani ta shemppuwaa ne kushiyan wottais ” yaagidi haiqqi bayiis .

text: Now when the centurion saw what was done , he glorified God , saying , Certainly this was a righteous man .
text2: Mato halaqai hegaa be7idi , “ Hagee tumu xillo asa ” yaagidi Xoossaa galatiis .

text: And all the people that came together to that sight , beholding the things which were done , smote their breasts , and returned .
text2: Hegaa be7anau issisaa shiiqi uttida asai ubbai hegaa be7ido wode , bantta tiraa bubbuxiiddi , soo simmidosona .

text: And all his acquaintance , and the women that followed him from Galilee , stood afar off , beholding these things .
text2: Yesuusa eriya asai ubbainne Galiilappe a kaallida maccaasati hegaa be7iiddi , haahuwan eqqidosona .

text: And , behold , there was a man named Joseph , a counseller ; and he was a good man , and a just :
text2: Yaa7aa alaafetuppe issi Yooseefa giyo lo77o xillo bitanee de7ees .

text: ( The same had not consented to the counsel and deed of them ; ) he was of Arimathaea , a city of the Jews : who also himself waited for the kingdom of God .
text2: Yooseefi eta zoretaanne eta oosuwaa dosibeenna . I Armmaatiyaasa geetettiya Aihudatu katamaa asa ; qassi Xoossaa kawotettaa naagiiddi uttiis .

text: This man went unto Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus .
text2: He bitanee PHilaaxoosakko biidi , Yesuusa ahaa ekkanau woossiis .

text: And he took it down , and wrapped it in linen , and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone , wherein never man before was laid .
text2: Yooseefi masqqaliyaappe ahaa wottidi , moogo afalan xaaxiis . Xaaxidi shuchchaa woocido asa moogiyo gonggoluwaa giddon kase ooninne moogettibeennaagan ahaa wottiis .

text: And that day was the preparation , and the sabbath drew on .
text2: Hegee Sambbataassi giigettiyo gallassa ; Sambbatai doommana hanees .

text: And the women also , which came with him from Galilee , followed after , and beheld the sepulchre , and how his body was laid .
text2: Galiilappe Yesuusaara yiida maccaasati Yooseefa kaalliiddi , Yesuusi moogettido gonggoluwaanne a ahaa waati wottidaakko be7idosona .

text: And they returned , and prepared spices and ointments ; and rested the sabbath day according to the commandment .
text2: Be7idi soo simmidi , shittuwaanne tiyettiyoobaa giigissidosona . Higgee azaziyoogaadan , Sambbatan shemppidosona .

text: Now upon the first day of the week , very early in the morning , they came unto the sepulchre , bringing the spices which they had prepared , and certain others with them .
text2: SHin woggaa gallassi wonttimaattan maccaasati bantta giigissido shittuwaa ekkidi , Yesuusi moogettido gonggoluwaa biidosona .

text: And they found the stone rolled away from the sepulchre .
text2: Biidi , gonggoluwaa doonaappe shuchchaa gonddorssidoogaa be7idosona .

text: And they entered in , and found not the body of the Lord Jesus .
text2: SHin giddo gelidi , Godaa Yesuusa ahaa demmibookkona .

text: And it came to pass , as they were much perplexed thereabout , behold , two men stood by them in shining garments :
text2: Maccaasati , “ Haha ! Laa hagee waaniichchidee ? ” yaagishin , phooliya maayuwaa maayida naa77u asati eti akeekennan eta matan eqqidosona .

text: And as they were afraid , and bowed down their faces to the earth , they said unto them , Why seek ye the living among the dead ?
text2: Eti yayyidi , sa7aa xeellidaashin , asati eta yaagidosona ; “ Paxa de7iyaagaa haiqqida asaa sohuwan aissi koyeetii ?

text: He is not here , but is risen : remember how he spake unto you when he was yet in Galilee ,
text2: I denddiichchiis ; hagan baawa . Yesuusi , ' Tana Asa Na7aa asai nagaranchchatussi aattidi immin , masqqaliyaa bolli tana misimaariyan xishin , taani kaqettanaunne heezzantto gallassi denddanau bessees ' yaagidi kase Galiilan de7iyo wode , inttessi odidoogaa hassayite ” yaagiis .

text: And they remembered his words ,
text2: Yaagin maccaasati Yesuusi giidoogaa hassayidi , i moogettido gonggoluwaappe simmidi , hegaa ubbaa tammanne isiini erissiyo ashkkaratussinne haratu ubbaassi odidosona .

text: It was Mary Magdalene , and Joanna , and Mary the mother of James , and other women that were with them , which told these things unto the apostles .
text2: Hegaa Yesuusi kiittidoogeetussi odidai Magddala katamaappe yiida Mairaamo , Yohaano , Yaaqooba aayyiyoo Mairaamonne , qassi etaara de7iya hara maccaasata .

text: And their words seemed to them as idle tales , and they believed them not .
text2: He maccaasatu qaalai pattenna haasaya misatin , Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti ammanibookkona .

text: Then arose Peter , and ran unto the sepulchre ; and stooping down , he beheld the linen clothes laid by themselves , and departed , wondering in himself at that which was come to pass .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi denddidi , gonggoluwaa woxxiis ; hokkidi gonggoluwaa giddo xeellidi , moogido afalaa xalaalaa be7iis . Hegaa be7idi garamettiiddi , ba soo biis .

text: And , behold , two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus , which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs .
text2: Yesuusa kaalliyaageetuppe naa77ati hanidabaa ubbaa bantta giddon haasayiiddi , he gallassi Yerusalaameppe naa77u saate keenaa haakkiya Emaahuusa giyo qeeri katamaa boosona .

text: And it came to pass , that , while they communed together and reasoned , Jesus himself drew near , and went with them .
text2: Biiddi eti issippe haasayishiininne zorettishin , Yesuusi ba huuphen etakko shiiqidi , etaara bees .

text: But their eyes were holden that they should not know him .
text2: SHin eti a erenna mala , eta wozanaa jallissiis .

text: And he said unto them , What manner of communications are these that ye have one to another , as ye walk , and are sad ?
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Ha intte kayyottidi hemettiiddi , issoi issuwaara haasayiyo yohoi aibee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And the one of them , whose name was Cleopas , answering said unto him , Art thou only a stranger in Jerusalem , and hast not known the things which are come to pass therein these days ?
text2: Etappe issoi Qalayoopha giyoogee zaaridi , “ Ha giddon Yerusalaamen hanidabaa erennan Yerusalaame be7anau biida imatti ne xalaalee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And he said unto them , What things ? And they said unto him , Concerning Jesus of Nazareth , which was a prophet mighty in deed and word before God and all the people :
text2: Yesuusi , “ I aibee ? ” yaagiis . Eti hagaadan yaagidosona ; “ Xoossaa sinttaaninne asa ubbaa sinttan oosuwaaninne qaalan hananabaa yootiya mino gidida Naazireeta Yesuusabaa .

text: And how the chief priests and our rulers delivered him to be condemned to death , and have crucified him .
text2: Nu qeese halaqatinne deriyaa haariyaageeti haiquwaa pirddaassi a aatti immidi , masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi , a kaqqidosona .

text: But we trusted that it had been he which should have redeemed Israel : and beside all this , to day is the third day since these things were done .
text2: SHin nuuni , ' Israa7eelata ashshanaagee a ' yaagidi ufaissan naagoos . Qassi hegee ubbai hanoosappe hachchi heezzu gallassa gidiis .

text: Yea , and certain women also of our company made us astonished , which were early at the sepulchre ;
text2: Qassi nunaara de7iya issi issi maccaasati garamiyaabaa nuuyyo odidosona . Yesuusa moogido gonggoluwaa wonttimaattan biidi ,

text: And when they found not his body , they came , saying , that they had also seen a vision of angels , which said that he was alive .
text2: a ahaa demmibookkona ; ' “ I paxa de7ees ” yaagiya kiitanchchatu ajjuutaa be7ida ' yaagiiddi guyye simmidosona .

text: And certain of them which were with us went to the sepulchre , and found it even so as the women had said : but him they saw not .
text2: Nunaara de7iyaageetuppe issoi issoi gonggoluwaa biidi , maccaasati etassi giidoogaadan hanidaagaa be7idosona ; shin Yesuusa be7ibookkona ” yaagidosona .

text: Then he said unto them , O fools , and slow of heart to believe all that the prophets have spoken :
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Intte aiba eeyya asee ? Hananabaa yootiyaageeti odido ubbabaa intte wozanan ammananau waanidi gam77eetii ?

text: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things , and to enter into his glory ?
text2: I ha waayiyaa ekkanaunne ba bonchchuwaa bonchchettanau bessennee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And beginning at Moses and all the prophets , he expounded unto them in all the scriptures the things concerning himself .
text2: Yaagidi Muuse maxaafaappenne hananabaa yootiyaageetu maxaafaappe doommidi , Xoossaa maxaafatu ubban babai xaafettidaagaa etassi birshshiis .

text: And they drew nigh unto the village , whither they went : and he made as though he would have gone further .
text2: Eti bantta biyo qeeri katamaakko matishin , Yesuusi etassi haaho sohuwaa baanabaa milatiis ;

text: But they constrained him , saying , Abide with us : for it is toward evening , and the day is far spent . And he went in to tarry with them .
text2: shin eti Yesuusa , “ Sa7ai omariyo gishshau , nunaara aqa ; sa7ainne qammana hanees ” yaagidi teqqidosona . Hegaa gishshau , Yesuusi etaara aqanau geliis .

text: And it came to pass , as he sat at meat with them , he took bread , and blessed it , and brake , and gave to them .
text2: Etaara qumaa maanau uttidi , oittaa ekkidi anjjiis ; menttidi etassi immiis .

text: And their eyes were opened , and they knew him ; and he vanished out of their sight .
text2: Eti a akeekana mala , eta aifee dooyettin , Yesuusa gididoogaa eridosona ; erin i eta aifiyaappe geemmiis .

text: And they said one to another , Did not our heart burn within us , while he talked with us by the way , and while he opened to us the scriptures ?
text2: Eti bantta giddon , “ I nuussi ogiyan odishiininne Xoossaa maxaafata birshshishin , nu wozanai mishettidi xuugettibeennee ? ” yaagidi haasayettidosona .

text: And they rose up the same hour , and returned to Jerusalem , and found the eleven gathered together , and them that were with them ,
text2: Eti sohuwaara denddidi , Yerusalaame simmidosona ; tammanne isiini erissiyo ashkkaratinne etaara de7iyaageeti , “ Godai tumu denddiis ; Simoonikka a be7iis ” yaagiiddi issippe shiiqi uttidaageeta demmidosona .

text: And they told what things were done in the way , and how he was known of them in breaking of bread .
text2: He naa77ati ogiyan hanidabaanne Yesuusi oittaa menttiyo wode , eti a waati eridaakkonne etassi odidosona .

text: And as they thus spake , Jesus himself stood in the midst of them , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Eti hegaa odishin , Yesuusi ba huuphen eta giddo yiidi eqqidi , “ Sarotettai inttessi gido ” yaagiis .

text: But they were terrified and affrighted , and supposed that they had seen a spirit .
text2: SHin eti dagammidi yayyidosona . Qassi etassi moitillee beettiyaabaa milatiis .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye troubled ? and why do thoughts arise in your hearts ?
text2: Milatin i eta , “ Aissi dagammeetii ? Intte wozanan aissi sireetii ?

text: Behold my hands and my feet , that it is I myself : handle me , and see ; for a spirit hath not flesh and bones , as ye see me have .
text2: Taani tana gididoogaa , ta kushiyaanne ta tohuwaa be7ite ; tana oiqqi xeellite ; aissi giikko , moitillessi ashoinne meqetti baawa ; shin intte be7iyoogaadan , taassi de7ees ” yaagiis .

text: And when he had thus spoken , he shewed them his hands and his feet .
text2: Hegaa yaagidi , ba kushiyaanne ba tohuwaa eta bessiis .

text: And while they yet believed not for joy , and wondered , he said unto them , Have ye here any meat ?
text2: Hegee eta ufaissin , eti garamettidi , biron ammananau danddayibeenna gishshau i , “ Hagan aibakko inttessi miyoobi de7ii ? ” yaagiis .

text: And they gave him a piece of a broiled fish , and of an honeycomb .
text2: Xiixxido moliyaappe issi muxuwaanne eessaa ililuwaappe eti ayyo immin ,

text: And he took it , and did eat before them .
text2: ekkidi eta sinttan miis .

text: And he said unto them , These are the words which I spake unto you , while I was yet with you , that all things must be fulfilled , which were written in the law of Moses , and in the prophets , and in the psalms , concerning me .
text2: I eta , “ Taani inttenaara de7aidda , ' Muuse higgiyan , hananabaa yootiyaageetu maxaafaaninne Daawita mazamuriyaa maxaafan tabai xaafettidaagee ubbai polettanau bessees ' yaagada , inttessi yootido yohoi hagaa ” yaagiis .

text: Then opened he their understanding , that they might understand the scriptures ,
text2: He wode , Xoossaa maxaafati giyoogee etassi gelana mala , eta wozanaa dooyiis .

text: And said unto them , Thus it is written , and thus it behoved Christ to suffer , and to rise from the dead the third day :
text2: Dooyidi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ ' I waayettanaunne heezzantta gallassi haiquwaappe denddanau bessees .

text: And that repentance and remission of sins should be preached in his name among all nations , beginning at Jerusalem .
text2: Qassi nagaraappe simmiyoogeenne nagaraa atto giyoogee Yerusalaameppe doommidi , Aihuda gidenna asa ubbaassi a sunttan odettanau bessees ' geetettidi xaafettiis .

text: And ye are witnesses of these things .
text2: Ha yohuwaassi intte markka .

text: And , behold , I send the promise of my Father upon you : but tarry ye in the city of Jerusalem , until ye be endued with power from on high .
text2: Ta Aawai immana giidoogaa taani inttessi yeddana ; shin Xoossai saluwaappe yiya wolqqaa inttena afaladan maizzana gakkanaassi , Yerusalaame kataman naagite ” yaagiis .

text: And he led them out as far as to Bethany , and he lifted up his hands , and blessed them .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Biitaaniyaa giyo katamaa gakkanaashin eta kaalettiis ; ba kushiyaa sinttau yeddidi , eta anjjiis .

text: And it came to pass , while he blessed them , he was parted from them , and carried up into heaven .
text2: Anjjiiddi etappe shaahettidi , saluwaa biis .

text: And they worshipped him , and returned to Jerusalem with great joy :
text2: Eti ayyo goinnidi , daro ufaissan Yerusalaame simmidosona .

text: And were continually in the temple , praising and blessing God . Amen .
text2: Xoossaa galatiiddi , paccennan Beeta Maqidasiyan de7idosona .

text: In the beginning was the Word , and the Word was with God , and the Word was God .
text2: Qaalai koiro de7ees ; qaalaikka Xoossaara issippe de7ees ; qassi qaalai Xoossaa .

text: The same was in the beginning with God .
text2: Qaalai Xoossaara issippe koiro de7ees .

text: All things were made by him ; and without him was not any thing made that was made .
text2: Xoossai ubbabaa qaalaa baggaara medhdhiis . Merettidabai ubbai i bainnan aibinne merettibeenna .

text: In him was life ; and the life was the light of men .
text2: Aani de7oi de7ees ; de7oi asau poo7o .

text: And the light shineth in darkness ; and the darkness comprehended it not .
text2: Poo7oi xuman poo7ees ; xumai poo7uwaa xoonibeenna .

text: There was a man sent from God , whose name was John .
text2: Xoossai kiittido issi asi de7ees ; a sunttai Yohaannisa .

text: The same came for a witness , to bear witness of the Light , that all men through him might believe .
text2: Asai ubbai poo7uwaa baggaara ammanana mala , poo7uwaabaa markkattanau markka gididi yiis .

text: He was not that Light , but was sent to bear witness of that Light .
text2: Poo7uwaabaa markkattanau i yiidoogaappe attin , i ba huuphen poo7o gidenna .

text: That was the true Light , which lighteth every man that cometh into the world .
text2: Asa ubbau poo7issiya tumu poo7oi sa7aa yees .

text: He was in the world , and the world was made by him , and the world knew him not .
text2: Qaalai sa7an de7iis ; Xoossai Qaalan sa7aa medhdhiis ; shin sa7ai a eribeenna .

text: He came unto his own , and his own received him not .
text2: I baageetukko yiis ; shin aageeti a shiishshi ekkibookkona .

text: But as many as received him , to them gave he power to become the sons of God , even to them that believe on his name :
text2: SHin i bana shiishshi ekkida ubbatuyyo , ba sunttan ammanidaageetuyyo , Xoossaa naata gidana mala , maataa immiis .

text: Which were born , not of blood , nor of the will of the flesh , nor of the will of man , but of God .
text2: Eti Xoossaappe yelettidoogaappe attin , asi yeliyo maaran woi asa sheniyan woi attumaasa sheniyan yelettibookkona .

text: And the Word was made flesh , and dwelt among us , ( and we beheld his glory , the glory as of the only begotten of the Father , ) full of grace and truth .
text2: Qaalai asa gididi , nu giddon de7iis . Nuuni a bonchchuwaa aaro kehatettainne tumatettai kumidoogaa be7ida . Aawaayyo issi Na7aa xalaala gidida i ekkido bonchchoi hagaa .

text: John bare witness of him , and cried , saying , This was he of whom I spake , He that cometh after me is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Yohaannisi abaa markkattiis ; ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Taani , ' Taappe guyyeera yiyaagee taappe wolqqaamees ; aissi giikko , taappe i kase de7iis ' gaada markkattidoogee hagaa ” yaagiis .

text: And of his fulness have all we received , and grace for grace .
text2: Nuuni ubbai a kumetta aaro kehatettaappe anjjuwaa ekkida .

text: For the law was given by Moses , but grace and truth came by Jesus Christ .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai higgiyaa Muuse baggaara immiis ; shin aaro kehatettainne tumatettai Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara yiis .

text: No man hath seen God at any time ; the only begotten Son , which is in the bosom of the Father , he hath declared him .
text2: Xoossaa be7ida asi mulekka baawa ; ba Aawaa lanqqiyan de7iya issi Na7aa xalaalai abaa markkattiis .

text: And this is the record of John , when the Jews sent priests and Levites from Jerusalem to ask him , Who art thou ?
text2: Yerusalaamen de7iya Aihudati qeesetanne Leewata , “ Neeni oonee ? ” giidi Yohaannisa oichchana mala , Yohaannisakko kiittin , Yohaannisi etau markkattido markkatettai hagaa .

text: And he confessed , and denied not ; but confessed , I am not the Christ .
text2: Yohaannisi , “ Taani Kiristtoosa gidikke ” yaagidi geeshshidi markkattidoogaappe attin , markkattiyoogaa ixxibeenna .

text: And they asked him , What then ? Art thou Elias ? And he saith , I am not . Art thou that prophet ? And he answered , No .
text2: Eti , “ Yaatin , neeni oonee ? Neeni Eelaaseeyye ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona . Oichchin Yohaannisi , “ Akkai gidikke ” yaagiis . Qassikka eti , “ Neeni hananabaa yootiyaagee ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona . Oichchin Yohaannisi , “ Akkai ” yaagidi zaariis .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? that we may give an answer to them that sent us . What sayest thou of thyself ?
text2: Yaatin , “ Neeni oonee ? Nuuni nuna kiittidaageetuyyo yootana mala , neeni nebaa woigai ? ” yaagidosona .

text: He said , I am the voice of one crying in the wilderness , Make straight the way of the Lord , as said the prophet Esaias .
text2: Yohaannisi zaaridi , “ Hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi giidoogaadan , bazzon ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , ' Godaa ogiyaa sitti oottite ! ' giya cenggurssai taagaa ” yaagiis .

text: And they which were sent were of the Pharisees .
text2: Qassi Parisaaweti kiittido asati

text: And they asked him , and said unto him , Why baptizest thou then , if thou be not that Christ , nor Elias , neither that prophet ?
text2: Yohaannisa , “ Neeni Kiristtoosa woi , Eelaasa woi hananabaa yootiyaagaa gidana xayikko , yaatin aissi xammaqai ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: John answered them , saying , I baptize with water : but there standeth one among you , whom ye know not ;
text2: Oichchin Yohaannisi zaaridi , “ Taani haattan xammaqais ; shin intte erenna asi intte giddon eqqiis .

text: He it is , who coming after me is preferred before me , whose shoe ' s latchet I am not worthy to unloose .
text2: I taappe guyyeera yees . Taani a caammaa qashuwaa birshshanaukka bessikke ” yaagiis .

text: These things were done in Bethabara beyond Jordan , where John was baptizing .
text2: Hagee ubbai Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefinttan Biitaaniyaa giyo biittan , Yohaannisi xammaqiyoosan haniis .

text: The next day John seeth Jesus coming unto him , and saith , Behold the Lamb of God , which taketh away the sin of the world .
text2: Yohaannisi wonttetta gallassi Yesuusi baakko yiishin be7idi yaagiis ; “ Xoossaa dorssai , sa7aa nagaraa xaissiyaagee , hageeho !

text: This is he of whom I said , After me cometh a man which is preferred before me : for he was before me .
text2: Taani , ' Taappe guyyeera issi asi yaana ; i taappe wolqqaama ; aissi giikko , taappe kase de7iis ' gaada haasayidoogee hagaa .

text: And I knew him not : but that he should be made manifest to Israel , therefore am I come baptizing with water .
text2: I oonakko taani erikke ; shin Israa7eela asau a qonccissanaassi haattan xammaqaidda yaas ” yaagiis .

text: And John bare record , saying , I saw the Spirit descending from heaven like a dove , and it abode upon him .
text2: Yohaannisi hagaadan yaagidi markkattiis ; “ Geeshsha Ayyaanai saluwaappe haraphphedan wodhdhishiininne a bolli uttishin , taani be7aas .

text: And I knew him not : but he that sent me to baptize with water , the same said unto me , Upon whom thou shalt see the Spirit descending , and remaining on him , the same is he which baptizeth with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Taani a erikke ; shin haattan xammaqanau tana kiittidaagee , ' Geeshsha Ayyaanai wodhdhidi , issi asa bolli uttishin , neeni be7ana ; Geeshsha Ayyaanan xammaqanaagee a ' yaagidi taayyo yootiis .

text: And I saw , and bare record that this is the Son of God .
text2: Taani hegaa be7ada , Xoossaa Na7aa i gididoogaa markkattais ” yaagiis .

text: Again the next day after John stood , and two of his disciples ;
text2: Qassi wonttetta gallassi Yohaannisi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuppe naa77atuura issippe eqqiis ;

text: And looking upon Jesus as he walked , he saith , Behold the Lamb of God !
text2: eqqidi Yesuusi aadhdhishin be7idi , “ Xoossaa dorssai hageeho ! ” yaagiis .

text: And the two disciples heard him speak , and they followed Jesus .
text2: Yohaannisi erissiyo naa77u ashkkarati Yohaannisi giyoogaa siyidi , Yesuusa kaallidosona .

text: Then Jesus turned , and saw them following , and saith unto them , What seek ye ? They said unto him , Rabbi , ( which is to say , being interpreted , Master , ) where dwellest thou ?
text2: Yesuusi bana kaalliyaageeta guyye simmi be7idi , “ Ai koyeetii ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Eti zaaridi , “ Rabii , neeni awan de7ai ? ” yaagidosona . “ Rabii ” giyoogee “ Tamaarissiyaagoo ” giyoogaa .

text: He saith unto them , Come and see . They came and saw where he dwelt , and abode with him that day : for it was about the tenth hour .
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Haa yiidi be7ite ” yaagiis . Yaagin eti biidi , i de7iyoosaa be7idosona ; he gallassi eti sa7ai tammu saate heera gidiyo gishshau , a matan pe7idosona .

text: One of the two which heard John speak , and followed him , was Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother .
text2: Yohaannisi giidoogaa siyidi , Yesuusa kaallida naa77u asatuppe issoi , Simoon PHeexiroosa ishaa Inddiraasa .

text: He first findeth his own brother Simon , and saith unto him , We have found the Messias , which is , being interpreted , the Christ .
text2: Inddiraasi koiro ba ishaa Simoonaara gaittidi , “ Nuuni Masiyaara gaittida ” yaagiis . “ Masiyaa ” giyoogee “ Kiristtoosa ” giyoogaa .

text: And he brought him to Jesus . And when Jesus beheld him , he said , Thou art Simon the son of Jona : thou shalt be called Cephas , which is by interpretation , A stone .
text2: Inddiraasi Simoona Yesuusakko ekki ehiis . Ehin Yesuusi Simoona be7idi , “ Neeni Yoona na7aa Simoona ; ne sunttai Keefa gidana ” yaagiis . “ Keefa ” giyoogaa birshshettainne “ PHeexiroosa ” giyoogaa birshshettai issuwaa ; hegaa giyoogee “ SHuchchaa ” giyoogaa .

text: The day following Jesus would go forth into Galilee , and findeth Philip , and saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Wonttetta gallassi Yesuusi Galiila giyo biitti baanau qofaa qachchiis ; i Piliphphoosaara gaittidi , “ Tana kaalla ! ” yaagiis .

text: Now Philip was of Bethsaida , the city of Andrew and Peter .
text2: Piliphphoosi Inddiraasinne PHeexiroosi de7ido Beetasaida giyo katamaappe yiida asa .

text: Philip findeth Nathanael , and saith unto him , We have found him , of whom Moses in the law , and the prophets , did write , Jesus of Nazareth , the son of Joseph .
text2: Piliphphoosi Naatinaa7eelaara gaittidi , “ Higgiyaa maxaafan Muusee abaa xaafidogaa , qassi hananabaa yootiyaageetikka abaa xaafido Yooseefa na7aa Yesuusaara , Naazireete kataman de7iyaagaara , nuuni gaittida ” yaagiis .

text: And Nathanael said unto him , Can there any good thing come out of Nazareth ? Philip saith unto him , Come and see .
text2: Naatinaa7eeli zaaridi , “ Naazireete katamaappe payyabi kiyanau danddayii ? ” yaagiis . Yaagin Piliphphoosi , “ Yaada be7a ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus saw Nathanael coming to him , and saith of him , Behold an Israelite indeed , in whom is no guile !
text2: Naatinaa7eeli baakko yiyaagaa Yesuusi be7idi , “ Genee bainna tumu Israa7eela asi hagaa ! ” yaagiis .

text: Nathanael saith unto him , Whence knowest thou me ? Jesus answered and said unto him , Before that Philip called thee , when thou wast under the fig tree , I saw thee .
text2: Yaagin Naatinaa7eeli Yesuusa , “ Neeni tana awan erai ? ” yaagiis . Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Piliphphoosi nena xeesanaappe kase , neeni balasiyaa giyo mittaa garssan de7ishin , taani nena be7aas ” yaagiis .

text: Nathanael answered and saith unto him , Rabbi , thou art the Son of God ; thou art the King of Israel .
text2: Naatinaa7eeli zaaridi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , neeni Xoossaa Na7aa ! Neeni Israa7eela kawuwaa ! ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Because I said unto thee , I saw thee under the fig tree , believest thou ? thou shalt see greater things than these .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Taani nena balasiyo giyo mittee garssan be7aas giido gishshau ammanai ? Neeni hagaappe aadhdhiyaabaa be7ana ! ” yaagiis .

text: And he saith unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Hereafter ye shall see heaven open , and the angels of God ascending and descending upon the Son of man .
text2: Qassikka Yesuusi , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; saloi dooyettin , Xoossaa kiitanchchati ta bolli , Asa Na7aa bolli , pude kiyishiininne duge wodhdhishin , intte be7ana ” yaagiis .

text: And the third day there was a marriage in Cana of Galilee ; and the mother of Jesus was there :
text2: Heezzantto gallassi Galiila biittan Qaana giyo kataman bullachchi bullashettiis ; Yesuusa aayyiyaa he bullachchan de7ausu .

text: And both Jesus was called , and his disciples , to the marriage .
text2: Yesuusikka ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura issippe he bullachchaa xeesettiis .

text: And when they wanted wine , the mother of Jesus saith unto him , They have no wine .
text2: Woiniyaa eessai wuriichchin , Yesuusa aayyiyaa Yesuusa , “ Etau woiniyaa eessai wuriichchiis ” yaagaasu .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , what have I to do with thee ? mine hour is not yet come .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ha maccaasee , nena gattiyaabi aibee ? Ta wodee birooni gakkibeenna ” yaagiis .

text: His mother saith unto the servants , Whatsoever he saith unto you , do it .
text2: Yesuusa aayyiyaa ashkkarata , “ I intteyyo odiyoobaa aiba gidikkonne oottite ” yaagaasu .

text: And there were set there six waterpots of stone , after the manner of the purifying of the Jews , containing two or three firkins apiece .
text2: Aihudati haimaanootiyau oottiyoogaadan , meechchaa wogaayyo issoi issoi heezzu heezzu oto oiqqiya usuppun shuchcha baattati hegan de7oosona .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Fill the waterpots with water . And they filled them up to the brim .
text2: Yesuusi ashkkarata , “ Baattatun haattaa kunttite ” yaagiis ; yaagin eti baattatuyyo doonaa gakkanaassi haattaa kunttidosona .

text: And he saith unto them , Draw out now , and bear unto the governor of the feast . And they bare it .
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Ha77i duuqqidi , bullachchaa alaafiyau immite ” yaagiis ; eti ayyo efiidi immidosona .

text: When the ruler of the feast had tasted the water that was made wine , and knew not whence it was : ( but the servants which drew the water knew ; ) the governor of the feast called the bridegroom ,
text2: Bullachchaa alaafee woine eessa gidida haattaa ganxxi xeellidi , auppe yiidaakkonne eribeenna ; shin haattaa kunttida ashkkarati eroosona . Bullachchaa alaafee machchiyo ekkiyaagaa xeesidi ,

text: And saith unto him , Every man at the beginning doth set forth good wine ; and when men have well drunk , then that which is worse : but thou hast kept the good wine until now .
text2: “ Ooninne aife woine eessaa asaa kasetidi ushshees ; yaatidi bullachchaasai daro uyidoogaappe guyyiyan , qiraariyaa ushshees . SHin neeni aife woine eessaa hanno gakkanaassi wotta bayadasa ! ” yaagiis .

text: This beginning of miracles did Jesus in Cana of Galilee , and manifested forth his glory ; and his disciples believed on him .
text2: Yesuusi ba oottido wolqqaama malaatatuppe hagaa koiruwaa Galiila biittan Qaana giyo kataman oottiis ; hegan ba bonchchuwaa qonccissiis . Qassi erissiyo ashkkaratikka a ammanidosona .

text: After this he went down to Capernaum , he , and his mother , and his brethren , and his disciples : and they continued there not many days .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi ba aayeera , ba ishanttuuranne ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura issippe Qifirinaahooma giyo katamaa biis ; biidi amarida gallassaa takkiis .

text: And the Jews ' passover was at hand , and Jesus went up to Jerusalem ,
text2: Aihudati bonchchiyo Paasikaa Baalaa gallassai matattin , Yesuusi Yerusalaame biis .

text: And found in the temple those that sold oxen and sheep and doves , and the changers of money sitting :
text2: Biidi Beeta Maqidasiyan miizzaa , dorssaanne haraphphiyaa baizziya asaa demmiis ; qassi harati bantta oidiyan uttidi , miishshaa laammiyaageeta demmiis .

text: And when he had made a scourge of small cords , he drove them all out of the temple , and the sheep , and the oxen ; and poured out the changers ' money , and overthrew the tables ;
text2: I golaa xurqqayyiyaa dooqqidi , eta ubbaa dorssaaranne miizzaara Beeta Maqidasiyaappe kare kessidi yedettiis . Miishshaa laammiyaageetu xaraphpheezaakka aatti yeggidi , eta miishshaa laaliis .

text: And said unto them that sold doves , Take these things hence ; make not my Father ' s house an house of merchandise .
text2: Haraphphiyaa baizziyaageeta i , “ Ha haraphpheta hagaappe kessite ; ta Aawaa keettaa giya oottoppite ! ” yaagiis .

text: And his disciples remembered that it was written , The zeal of thine house hath eaten me up .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati Xoossaa maxaafan , “ Taani ne keettau mishettiyo mishoi tana tamadan xuuggees ” geetettidi xaafettidaagaa hassayidosona .

text: Then answered the Jews and said unto him , What sign shewest thou unto us , seeing that thou doest these things ?
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Aihudati zaaridi , “ Neeni hagaa oottana danddayiyoogau nuna ai malaata bessuutee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Destroy this temple , and in three days I will raise it up .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Ha Beeta Maqidasiyaa qolite ; taani heezzu gallassan zaarettada keexxana ” yaagiis .

text: Then said the Jews , Forty and six years was this temple in building , and wilt thou rear it up in three days ?
text2: Qassikka Aihudati , “ Ha Beeta Maqidasiyaa keexxanau oitamanne usuppun laittaa ekkiis ; shin neeni heezzu gallassan keexxuutee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: But he spake of the temple of his body .
text2: SHin i haasayiyo Beeta Maqidasee ba asatettaa .

text: When therefore he was risen from the dead , his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them ; and they believed the scripture , and the word which Jesus had said .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddidoogaappe guyyiyan , erissiyo ashkkarati i hegaa giidoogaa hassayidosona . Qassi eti Xoossaa maxaafaagaanne Yesuusi haasayidoogaa ammanidosona .

text: Now when he was in Jerusalem at the passover , in the feast day , many believed in his name , when they saw the miracles which he did .
text2: Paasikaa bonchchiyoosan Yesuusi Yerusalaamen de7ishin , i oottido malaataa be7idi , daro asai a ammaniis .

text: But Jesus did not commit himself unto them , because he knew all men ,
text2: SHin Yesuusi he asaa ubbaa eriyo gishshau , eta ammanibeenna .

text: And needed not that any should testify of man : for he knew what was in man .
text2: Asabaa ooninne ayyo markkattana mala koyibeenna ; aissi giikko , asa wozanan aibi de7iyaakko , i ba huuphen erees .

text: There was a man of the Pharisees , named Nicodemus , a ruler of the Jews :
text2: Parisaawetu baggan Aihudatuyyo halaqa gidiya Niqoodimoosa giyo issi bitanee de7ees .

text: The same came to Jesus by night , and said unto him , Rabbi , we know that thou art a teacher come from God : for no man can do these miracles that thou doest , except God be with him .
text2: Niqoodimoosi qammi Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , neeni Xoossai kiittido tamaarissiyaagaa gidiyoogaa nuuni eroos ; aissi giikko , Xoossai aara de7iyo asappe attin , ha neeni oottiyo wolqqaama malaatata oottanau danddayiya asi baawa ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born again , he cannot see the kingdom of God .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani neeyyo tumaa odais ; ooninne naa77antto yelettana xayikko , Xoossaa kawotettaa be7anau danddayenna ” yaagiis .

text: Nicodemus saith unto him , How can a man be born when he is old ? can he enter the second time into his mother ' s womb , and be born ?
text2: Niqoodimoosi , “ Cima asi waanidi naa77antto yelettanau danddayii ? Ba aayee uluwaa simmi gelidi , naa77anttuwaa yelettanau asi danddayii ? ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus answered , Verily , verily , I say unto thee , Except a man be born of water and of the Spirit , he cannot enter into the kingdom of God .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani neeyyo tumaa odais ; ooninne haattaappenne Geeshsha Ayyaanaappe yelettana xayikko , Xoossaa kawotettaa gelanau danddayenna .

text: That which is born of the flesh is flesh ; and that which is born of the Spirit is spirit .
text2: Asappe yelettidaagee asa ; Ayyaanaappe yelettidaagee ayyaana ;

text: Marvel not that I said unto thee , Ye must be born again .
text2: ' Intte naa77antto yelettanau bessees ' gaada taani intteyyo odido gishshau , neeni garamettoppa .

text: The wind bloweth where it listeth , and thou hearest the sound thereof , but canst not tell whence it cometh , and whither it goeth : so is every one that is born of the Spirit .
text2: Carkkoi ba koyidosaa carkkees . Neeni a kooshinchchaa siyaasa ; shin i auppe yiyaakko woi au biyaakko , neeni erakka . Ayyaanaappe yelettida ubbai hegaa mala ” yaagiis .

text: Nicodemus answered and said unto him , How can these things be ?
text2: Yaagin Niqoodimoosi , “ Hagee waanidi hananau danddayii ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , Art thou a master of Israel , and knowest not these things ?
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Neeni Israa7eelata tamaarissiyaagaa gidaidda hagaa erikkii ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , We speak that we do know , and testify that we have seen ; and ye receive not our witness .
text2: Taani neeyyo tumaa odais ; nuuni eriyoogaa haasayoosinne be7idoogaa markkattoos ; shin nuuni markkattiyoogaa intte ekkekketa .

text: If I have told you earthly things , and ye believe not , how shall ye believe , if I tell you of heavenly things ?
text2: Taani intteyyo sa7aabaa yootin , intte ammanennaageeta gidikko , saluwaabaa yootin waani ammanuuteetii ?

text: And no man hath ascended up to heaven , but he that came down from heaven , even the Son of man which is in heaven .
text2: Saluwaappe wodhdhida taappe Asa Na7aappe attin , saluwaa kiyidabi ooninne baawa ; saluwan de7iya Asa Na7ai tana ” yaagiis .

text: And as Moses lifted up the serpent in the wilderness , even so must the Son of man be lifted up :
text2: Muusee bazzon shooshshaa kaqqidoogaadan , tana ammanida ubbai merinaa de7uwaa ekkana mala , taani Asa Na7ai kaqettanau bessees .

text: For God so loved the world , that he gave his only begotten Son , that whosoever believeth in him should not perish , but have everlasting life .
text2: Xoossaa Na7aa ammaniya ubbai merinaa de7uwaa ekkanaappe attin , xayenna mala , Xoossai ha sa7aa keehi siiqido gishshau , ba mexi issi Na7aa immiis .

text: For God sent not his Son into the world to condemn the world ; but that the world through him might be saved .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai ba Na7aa ha sa7aa pirddanau kiittibeenna ; shin sa7aa a baggaara ashshanau kiittiis .

text: He that believeth on him is not condemned : but he that believeth not is condemned already , because he hath not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God .
text2: Na7aa ammaniya ooninne pirddettenna ; shin Na7aa ammanenna ooninne , Xoossaa Na7aa issuwaa ammanibeenna gishshau , ha77ikka pirddetti uttiis .

text: And this is the condemnation , that light is come into the world , and men loved darkness rather than light , because their deeds were evil .
text2: Asaa bolli pirddiyo pirddai hagaa ; poo7oi sa7aa yiis ; shin asaa oosoi iita gidiyo gishshau , asai poo7uwaappe aattidi , xumaa siiqees .

text: For every one that doeth evil hateth the light , neither cometh to the light , lest his deeds should be reproved .
text2: Iitabaa oottiya ooninne poo7o ixxees ; aissi giikko , ba oosoi qonccenna mala , poo7uwaakko shiiqenna .

text: But he that doeth truth cometh to the light , that his deeds may be made manifest , that they are wrought in God .
text2: SHin tumaa oottiya ooninne Xoossai azazidoogaadan , i oottidoogaa poo7oi qonccissana mala , poo7uwaakko shiiqees .

text: After these things came Jesus and his disciples into the land of Judaea ; and there he tarried with them , and baptized .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusinne erissiyo ashkkarati Yihudaa biitti biidosona ; Yesuusi he biittan etaara amarida wodiyaa uttidi , asaa xammaqiis .

text: And John also was baptizing in Aenon near to Salim , because there was much water there : and they came , and were baptized .
text2: Qassi Yohaannisi Saleema matan de7iya Henoona giyoosan gooba haattai de7iyo gishshau , asaa xammaqees ; asai yi yiidi xammaqettees .

text: For John was not yet cast into prison .
text2: Yohaannisi biron qashettiichchibeenna .

text: Then there arose a question between some of John ' s disciples and the Jews about purifying .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yohaannisi erissiyo ashkkaratinne amarida Aihudati meechchaabaa palamettidosona .

text: And they came unto John , and said unto him , Rabbi , he that was with thee beyond Jordan , to whom thou barest witness , behold , the same baptizeth , and all men come to him .
text2: Eti Yohaannisakko biidi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefinttan nenaara de7iyaagee , neeni abaa markkattidoogee , be7a ha77i xammaqees ; asai ubbaikka akko bees ” yaagidosona .

text: John answered and said , A man can receive nothing , except it be given him from heaven .
text2: Yohaannisi zaaridi , “ Xoossai immana xayikko , asi ainne ekkanau danddayenna .

text: Ye yourselves bear me witness , that I said , I am not the Christ , but that I am sent before him .
text2: ' Taani Kiristtoosa gidikke ; shin taani appe sinttau kiitettaas ' giidoogau taayyo intte intte huuphen markka .

text: He that hath the bride is the bridegroom : but the friend of the bridegroom , which standeth and heareth him , rejoiceth greatly because of the bridegroom ' s voice : this my joy therefore is fulfilled .
text2: Bullachchiyo maccaasiyaa de7iyo urai bullachchiyaagaa ; he bullachchiyaagaa laggee eqqidi , i giyoogaa siyiyaagee bullachchiyaagaa haasayan daro ufaittees . Hegaa gishshau , hagee ta ufaissai polettiis .

text: He must increase , but I must decrease .
text2: I gitatana bessees ; taani qassi guuxxana bessees ” yaagiis .

text: He that cometh from above is above all : he that is of the earth is earthly , and speaketh of the earth : he that cometh from heaven is above all .
text2: Bollappe yiyaagee ubbaappe bolla . Sa7aappe beettidaagee sa7aabaa ; i qassi sa7aabaa haasayees . Saluwaappe yiyaagee ubbaappe bolla .

text: And what he hath seen and heard , that he testifieth ; and no man receiveth his testimony .
text2: I ba be7idobaanne siyidobaa markkattees ; shin a markkatettaa ekkiyai baawa .

text: He that hath received his testimony hath set to his seal that God is true .
text2: A markkatettaa ekkiya ooninne Xoossai tumanchcha gidiyoogaa hegan markkattees .

text: For he whom God hath sent speaketh the words of God : for God giveth not the Spirit by measure unto him .
text2: Xoossai kiittidoogee Xoossaa qaalaa yootees ; aissi giikko , Xoossai ba Geeshsha Ayyaanaa palahissidi immees .

text: The Father loveth the Son , and hath given all things into his hand .
text2: Xoossai ba Na7aa siiqees ; siiqidi ubbabaa a kushiyan wottiis .

text: He that believeth on the Son hath everlasting life : and he that believeth not the Son shall not see life ; but the wrath of God abideth on him .
text2: Na7aa ammaniya urau merinaa de7oi de7ees ; shin Na7aa ammanennaagaa bolli Xoossaa hanqqoi de7anaagaappe attin , i de7o be7enna .

text: When therefore the Lord knew how the Pharisees had heard that Jesus made and baptized more disciples than John ,
text2: Yesuusi Yohaannisaagaappe dariya kaalliyaageeta baakko shiishsheesinne xammaqees giyoogaa Parisaaweti siyidoogaa Yesuusi erido wode , Yihudaappe aggidi , Galiila biis ; gidikkokka , erissiyo ashkkarati xammaqidoogaappe attin , Yesuusi ba huuphen oonanne xammaqibeenna .

text: And he must needs go through Samaria .
text2: Galiila biiddi , Samaariyaara aadhdhanaagee a ashshennabaa gidiis .

text: Then cometh he to a city of Samaria , which is called Sychar , near to the parcel of ground that Jacob gave to his son Joseph .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yaaqoobi ba na7aa Yooseefayyo immido gadiyaa matan de7iya Sikaara giyo Samaariyaa katamaa biis .

text: Now Jacob ' s well was there . Jesus therefore , being wearied with his journey , sat thus on the well : and it was about the sixth hour .
text2: He sohuwan Yaaqooba haattaa ollai de7ees ; Yesuusi hemetan daafuridi , he haattaa ollaa matan uttiis . He wode sa7ai usuppun saate heera .

text: There cometh a woman of Samaria to draw water : Jesus saith unto her , Give me to drink .
text2: Samaariyaa katamaa maccaasa issinniyaa haattaa duuqqanau yaasu ; Yesuusi he maccaasiyo , “ Tana haattaa ushsharkkii ! ” yaagiis .

text: ( For his disciples were gone away unto the city to buy meat . )
text2: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati quma shammanau katamaa biidosona .

text: Then saith the woman of Samaria unto him , How is it that thou , being a Jew , askest drink of me , which am a woman of Samaria ? for the Jews have no dealings with the Samaritans .
text2: He maccaasiyaa zaarada , “ Neeni Aihuda asa gidaidda , Samaariyaa maccaasa gidiya tana , waata haattaa ushsha gai ? ” yaagaasu ; aissi giikko , Aihudati Samaaretuura giigettokkona .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , If thou knewest the gift of God , and who it is that saith to thee , Give me to drink ; thou wouldest have asked of him , and he would have given thee living water .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi o , “ Neeni Xoossai immiyoobaanne qassi nena haattaa ushsha giyaagee oonakko eriyaabaa gidiyaakko , a woossana shin ; i neeyyo de7o haattaa immana ” yaagiis .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , thou hast nothing to draw with , and the well is deep : from whence then hast thou that living water ?
text2: Maccaasiyaa zaarada , “ Godau , neeyyo duuqqiyoobi baawa ; ollaikka ziqqa . Yaatin , de7o haattaa auppe ekkuutee ?

text: Art thou greater than our father Jacob , which gave us the well , and drank thereof himself , and his children , and his cattle ?
text2: Nuuyyo ha haattaa ollaa immida nu aawaa Yaaqoobappe neeni gitatai ? I , a naatinne a mehee hagaappe uyidosona ” yaagaasu .

text: Jesus answered and said unto her , Whosoever drinketh of this water shall thirst again :
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Ha haattaappe uyida ooninne naa77anttuwaa saamettana .

text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst ; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life .
text2: SHin taani immana haattaa uyiya ooninne mulekka saamettenna . Taani immana haattai he aawu giddon merinaa de7uwau pulttiya pultto gidana ” yaagiis .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , give me this water , that I thirst not , neither come hither to draw .
text2: Maccaasiyaa zaarada , “ Godau , taani saamettenna malanne haattaa tikkanaukka ha sohuwaa yeenna mala , taayyo he haattaa imma ! ” yaagaasu .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Go , call thy husband , and come hither .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi o , “ Baada ne azinaa xeesada haa ya ” yaagiis .

text: The woman answered and said , I have no husband . Jesus said unto her , Thou hast well said , I have no husband :
text2: Maccaasiyaa zaarada , “ Tau azini baawa ” yaagaasu . Yaagin Yesuusi o , “ Tau azini baawa giyoogaa balabaakka .

text: For thou hast had five husbands ; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband : in that saidst thou truly .
text2: Neeni ichchashu azinaa geladasa ; ha77i nenaara de7iya bitanee ne azina gidenna . Neeni ha77i tau odidoogee tuma ” yaagiis .

text: The woman saith unto him , Sir , I perceive that thou art a prophet .
text2: Maccaasiyaa zaarada , “ Godau , neeni hananabaa yootiyaagaa gidennan aggakka ;

text: Our fathers worshipped in this mountain ; and ye say , that in Jerusalem is the place where men ought to worship .
text2: nu aawati ha deriyan goinnidosona ; shin Aihudati intte asi Xoossau goinnanau bessiya sohoi Yerusalaameena yaageeta ” yaagaasu .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , believe me , the hour cometh , when ye shall neither in this mountain , nor yet at Jerusalem , worship the Father .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Ha maccaasee tana ammana ; ha deriyan woi Yerusalaamen Aawaayyo intte goinnenna wodee yaana .

text: Ye worship ye know not what : we know what we worship : for salvation is of the Jews .
text2: Intte Samaariyaa asai intte erennabau goinneeta ; atotettai Aihudatuppe yiyo gishshau , nuuni Aihudati nu eriyoogau goinnoos .

text: But the hour cometh , and now is , when the true worshippers shall worship the Father in spirit and in truth : for the Father seeketh such to worship him .
text2: SHin Aawau tumaappe goinniyaageeti ayyaanaaninne tumatettan goinniyo wodee matattiis ; ha77ikka gakkiichchiis . Aissi giikko , asi baayyo goinnana mala , Aawai koyiyoogeeti hageetu malaa .

text: God is a Spirit : and they that worship him must worship him in spirit and in truth .
text2: Xoossai ayyaana ; qassi au goinniyaageeti ayyaanaaninne tumatettan goinnanau bessees ” yaagiis .

text: The woman saith unto him , I know that Messias cometh , which is called Christ : when he is come , he will tell us all things .
text2: Maccaasiyaa zaarada , “ Kiristtoosa giyo masee yaanaagaa taani erais . I yiyo wode nuuyyo ubbabaa yootana ” yaagaasu .

text: Jesus saith unto her , I that speak unto thee am he .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Ha nenaara haasayiya taani a ” yaagiis .

text: And upon this came his disciples , and marvelled that he talked with the woman : yet no man said , What seekest thou ? or , Why talkest thou with her ?
text2: Hinno eti haasayishin , Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati biidosaappe simmidosona . Yesuusi maccaaseera haasayishin , eti be7idi daro garamettidosona ; shin maccaasiyo , “ Ai koyai ? ” giidai woi Yesuusa , “ Iira aissi haasayai ? ” giidai ooninne baawa .

text: The woman then left her waterpot , and went her way into the city , and saith to the men ,
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , maccaasiyaa ba haatta otuwaa agga bayada , guyye katamaa baasu ; baada asau ,

text: Come , see a man , which told me all things that ever I did : is not this the Christ ?
text2: “ Taani oottidobaa ubbaa taayyo yootida bitaniyaa be7anau hinddite ; hegee Kiristtoosa gidanddeeshsha ? ” yaagaasu .

text: Then they went out of the city , and came unto him .
text2: Asai katamaappe kiyidi , Yesuusakko biis .

text: In the mean while his disciples prayed him , saying , Master , eat .
text2: Hegee hanishin , erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusa , “ Guuttabaa markkii ! ” yaagidi woossidosona .

text: But he said unto them , I have meat to eat that ye know not of .
text2: SHin i , “ Taayyo intte erenna qumai taani maanaagee de7ees ” yaagiis .

text: Therefore said the disciples one to another , Hath any man brought him ought to eat ?
text2: Hegaa gishshau , erissiyo ashkkarati bantta giddon , “ Ayyo miyoobaa ehiida asi de7anddeeshsha ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus saith unto them , My meat is to do the will of him that sent me , and to finish his work .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi etau , “ Ta qumai tana kiittidaagee koyiyoobaa oottanaagaanne a oosuwaa polanaagaa .

text: Say not ye , There are yet four months , and then cometh harvest ? behold , I say unto you , Lift up your eyes , and look on the fields ; for they are white already to harvest .
text2: Intte , ' Oiddu aginappe guyyiyan , kattai cakettana ' geekketiiyye ? Taani intteyyo odais ; goshshaa loitti xeellite ; kattai cahaa bessiis .

text: And he that reapeth receiveth wages , and gathereth fruit unto life eternal : that both he that soweth and he that reapeth may rejoice together .
text2: Zeriyaageenne cakkiyaagee issippe ufaittana mala , cakkiyaagee damoozaa ekkeesinne kattaa merinaa de7uwau shiishshees .

text: And herein is that saying true , One soweth , and another reapeth .
text2: Aissi giikko , ' Issoi zerees ; qassi issoi cakkees ' giyo haasayai tuma .

text: I sent you to reap that whereon ye bestowed no labour : other men laboured , and ye are entered into their labours .
text2: Intte daafuribeennaagaa cakkana mala , taani inttena kiittaas ; harati ootti daafuridosona ; intte haratu daafuran gelideta ” yaagiis .

text: And many of the Samaritans of that city believed on him for the saying of the woman , which testified , He told me all that ever I did .
text2: Maccaasiyaa , “ I taani oottido ubbabaa yootiis ” gaada markkattido gishshau , he kataman de7iya Samaariyaa asaappe daroi Yesuusa ammaniis .

text: So when the Samaritans were come unto him , they besought him that he would tarry with them : and he abode there two days .
text2: Samaariyaa asai Yesuusakko yiido wode , bantta matan takkana mala , Yesuusa woossidosona ; woossin i yaani naa77u gallassaa uttiis .

text: And many more believed because of his own word ;
text2: I yootiyo qaalaa gishshau , kaseegaappe daro asai ammaniis ;

text: And said unto the woman , Now we believe , not because of thy saying : for we have heard him ourselves , and know that this is indeed the Christ , the Saviour of the world .
text2: qassi eti maccaasiyo , “ Nuuni nu huuphen i giyoogaa siyidi ammanidoogaappe attin , neeni markkattido gishshassa gidenna ; qassi i tumu ha sa7aa ashshiyaagaa gidiyoogaakka nuuni eroos ” yaagidosona .

text: Now after two days he departed thence , and went into Galilee .
text2: Naa77u gallassappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi yaappe kiyidi , Galiila biitti biis .

text: For Jesus himself testified , that a prophet hath no honour in his own country .
text2: Aissi giikko , Yesuusi ba huuphen , “ Hananabaa yootiyaagee ba biittan bonchchettenna ” yaagiis .

text: Then when he was come into Galilee , the Galilaeans received him , having seen all the things that he did at Jerusalem at the feast : for they also went unto the feast .
text2: Yesuusi Galiila gakkido wode , Galiila asai a mokkiis ; aissi giikko , Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi eti Yerusalaamen de7iyo gishshau , i oottido ubbabaa be7idosona .

text: So Jesus came again into Cana of Galilee , where he made the water wine . And there was a certain nobleman , whose son was sick at Capernaum .
text2: Yesuusi haattaa woine eessa kessido , Galiilan de7iya Qaana katamaa biis . Qifirinaahooman a na7ai sahettiyo kawo keettan oottiya issi halaqai de7ees .

text: When he heard that Jesus was come out of Judaea into Galilee , he went unto him , and besought him that he would come down , and heal his son : for he was at the point of death .
text2: Yesuusi Yihudaappe Galiila yiidoogaa he halaqai siyidi , akko yiis . Yiidi haiquwau matida ba na7aa biidi pattana mala , Yesuusa woossiis .

text: Then said Jesus unto him , Except ye see signs and wonders , ye will not believe .
text2: Yesuusi halaqaa , “ Xoossai oottiyo malaataanne garamissiyaabaa be7ennan de7iiddi , intte mulekka ammanekketa ” yaagiis .

text: The nobleman saith unto him , Sir , come down ere my child die .
text2: Halaqai zaaridi , “ Godau , ta na7ai haiqqennan de7ishin , tanaara hinddarkkii ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Go thy way ; thy son liveth . And the man believed the word that Jesus had spoken unto him , and he went his way .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Ba ; ne na7ai paxana ! ” yaagiis . He halaqai Yesuusi giidoogaa ammanidi , aggidi biis .

text: And as he was now going down , his servants met him , and told him , saying , Thy son liveth .
text2: I ba soo biishin , a ashkkarati aara ogiyan gaittidi a , “ Ne na7ai paxa de7ees ” giidosona .

text: Then inquired he of them the hour when he began to amend . And they said unto him , Yesterday at the seventh hour the fever left him .
text2: I ba ashkkarata ba na7au ai saatiyan kehidaakkonne oichchin eti , “ Zine laappun saatiyan mishoi a aggiis ” yaagidosona .

text: So the father knew that it was at the same hour , in the which Jesus said unto him , Thy son liveth : and himself believed , and his whole house .
text2: Yaagin na7aa aawai Yesuusi baayyo , “ Ne na7ai paxana ” giidoogee likke he saatiyaana gididoogaa hassayiis . Hegaa gishshau , inne a so asai ubbai ammaniis .

text: This is again the second miracle that Jesus did , when he was come out of Judaea into Galilee .
text2: Hagee Yesuusi Yihudaappe Galiila yiidi oottido naa77antto wolqqaama malaataa .

text: After this there was a feast of the Jews ; and Jesus went up to Jerusalem .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi Aihudati bonchchiyo baalaayyo Yerusalaame biis .

text: Now there is at Jerusalem by the sheep market a pool , which is called in the Hebrew tongue Bethesda , having five porches .
text2: Yerusalaamen dorssaa penggiyaa matan Ibraisxxe qaalan Beetasaida giyo dagatti uttida haattai de7ees ; he dagatti uttida haattaa yuuyi aadhdhida ichchashu baranddai de7ees .

text: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk , of blind , halt , withered , waiting for the moving of the water .
text2: Hegan haattai qaaxxiyoogaa naagiya daro hargganchcha asati , qooqeti , wobbetinne silati zin77i uttidosona .

text: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool , and troubled the water : whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had .
text2: Aissi giikko , issi issitoo Godaa kiitanchchai dagattida haattaakko biidi , haattaa qaattees ; haattai qaaxxidoogaappe guyyiyan , koiro gelida urai bana oiqqida ai harggiyaappekka paxees .

text: And a certain man was there , which had an infirmity thirty and eight years .
text2: He sohuwan hasttamanne hosppun laitta sahettida issi bitanee de7ees .

text: When Jesus saw him lie , and knew that he had been now a long time in that case , he saith unto him , Wilt thou be made whole ?
text2: He bitanee hegan zin77idaagaa Yesuusi be7idi , qassi daro wodiyaa sahettidoogaa eridi bitaniyaa , “ Paxanau koyai ? ” yaagiis .

text: The impotent man answered him , Sir , I have no man , when the water is troubled , to put me into the pool : but while I am coming , another steppeth down before me .
text2: Sahettiya bitanee zaaridi , “ Godau , haattai qaaxxiyo wode , tana dagattida haattan yeggiya asi baawa ; shin taani gelana haniyo wode , hara urai taappe kasetidi geliichchees ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Rise , take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi a , “ Dendda eqqa ; ne arssaa tookkada ba ” yaagiis .

text: And immediately the man was made whole , and took up his bed , and walked : and on the same day was the sabbath .
text2: Bitanee sohuwaarakka paxi aggiis ; ba arssaa tookkidi biis . Hegee hanidoogee Sambbata gallassaana .

text: The Jews therefore said unto him that was cured , It is the sabbath day : it is not lawful for thee to carry thy bed .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Aihudati paxida bitaniyaa , “ Hachchi sa7ai Sambbata ; neeni ne arssaa tookkiyoogee higge gidenna ” yaagidosona .

text: He answered them , He that made me whole , the same said unto me , Take up thy bed , and walk .
text2: SHin bitanee , “ Tana pattidaagee , ' Ne arssaa tookkada ba ' yaagiis ” yaagidi etau zaariis .

text: Then asked they him , What man is that which said unto thee , Take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Eti a , “ Nena , ' Ne arssaa tookkada ba ' giidaagee i oonee ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: And he that was healed wist not who it was : for Jesus had conveyed himself away , a multitude being in that place .
text2: SHin Yesuusi he sohuwan daro asai de7iyaagaa giddo gelidi geemettido gishshau , bitanee bana pattida asi oonakkonne erenna .

text: Afterward Jesus findeth him in the temple , and said unto him , Behold , thou art made whole : sin no more , lest a worse thing come unto thee .
text2: Yesuusi guyyeppe he bitaniyaa Beeta Maqidasiyan demmidi , “ Be7a , neeni paxadasa ; hagaappe iitabai nena gakkenna mala , naa77antto nagara oottoppa ” yaagiis .

text: The man departed , and told the Jews that it was Jesus , which had made him whole .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , bitanee biidi , bana pattidaagee Yesuusa gididoogaa Aihudatuyyo odiis .

text: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus , and sought to slay him , because he had done these things on the sabbath day .
text2: Yesuusi hagaa Sambbatan oottido gishshau , Aihudati Yesuusa waisuwaa doommidosona .

text: But Jesus answered them , My Father worketh hitherto , and I work .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi etayyo , “ Ta Aawai ubba wode oottees ; taanikka oottanau bessees ” yaagiis .

text: Therefore the Jews sought the more to kill him , because he not only had broken the sabbath , but said also that God was his Father , making himself equal with God .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yesuusi Sambbata gallassaa bonchchenna gishsha xalaalaassa gidennan , bana Xoossaara giigissidi , “ Xoossai ta Aawaa ” giido gishshau , Aihudati a woranau kaseegaappe minttidi koyoosona .

text: Then answered Jesus and said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , The Son can do nothing of himself , but what he seeth the Father do : for what things soever he doeth , these also doeth the Son likewise .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi etau , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; Na7ai barkka ainne oottenna . I ba Aawai oottishin be7iyoogaa xalaalaa oottees ; Aawai oottiyoogaa Na7aikka oottees .

text: For the Father loveth the Son , and sheweth him all things that himself doeth : and he will shew him greater works than these , that ye may marvel .
text2: Aissi giikko , Aawai ba Na7aa siiqees ; qassi i oottiyo ooso ubbabaa ba Na7aa bessees . Intte garamettana mala , i hagaappe aadhdhiya oosuwaakka ba Na7aa bessana .

text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead , and quickeneth them ; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will .
text2: Aissi giikko , Aawai haiqqidaageeta haiquwaappe denttidi , paxa wottiyoogaadan , Na7aikka qassi ba siiqiyoogeeta paxa wottees .

text: For the Father judgeth no man , but hath committed all judgment unto the Son :
text2: Asai ubbai Aawaa bonchchiyoogaadan , Na7aakka bonchchana mala , Aawai pirdda ubbaa Na7au immidoogaappe attin , i oonanne pirddenna ; Na7aa bonchchenna uri , Na7aa kiittida Aawaakka bonchchenna .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that heareth my word , and believeth on him that sent me , hath everlasting life , and shall not come into condemnation ; but is passed from death unto life .
text2: “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; ta qaalaa siyiyaagaunne tana kiittidaagan ammaniyaagau merinaa de7oi de7ees . Haiquwaappe de7uwau i pinnidoogaappe attin , pirddettenna .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The hour is coming , and now is , when the dead shall hear the voice of the Son of God : and they that hear shall live .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; haiqqida asai Xoossaa Na7aa cenggurssaa siyiyo wodee yaana ; ha77ikka yees . He cenggurssaa siyiyaageeti paxa de7ana .

text: For as the Father hath life in himself ; so hath he given to the Son to have life in himself ;
text2: Aissi giikko , Aawai banan de7oi de7iyoogaadan , ba Na7aanikka de7oi de7ana mala oottiis .

text: And hath given him authority to execute judgment also , because he is the Son of man .
text2: Aawai Na7aayyo pirddiyo maataa immiis ; aissi giikko , Na7ai Asa Na7aa .

text: Marvel not at this : for the hour is coming , in the which all that are in the graves shall hear his voice ,
