text2: “ Hagan garamettoppite ; aissi giikko , duufuwan de7iyaageeti a cenggurssaa siyiyo wodee yees .

text: And shall come forth ; they that have done good , unto the resurrection of life ; and they that have done evil , unto the resurrection of damnation .
text2: Siyidi eti duufuwaappe gaxi kiyana ; lo77obaa oottidaageeti de7anau denddana ; qassi iitabaa oottidaageeti pirddettanau denddana .

text: I can of mine own self do nothing : as I hear , I judge : and my judgment is just ; because I seek not mine own will , but the will of the Father which hath sent me .
text2: “ Taani tarkka ainne oottanau danddayikke ; Xoossai tau odidoogaadan pirddais . Ta pirddai tuma ; aissi giikko , taani tana kiittidaagee dosiyoobaa oottiyoogaappe attin , taani dosiyoogaa oottikke .

text: If I bear witness of myself , my witness is not true .
text2: “ Taani tabaa markkattikko , ta markkatettai tuma gidenna .

text: There is another that beareth witness of me ; and I know that the witness which he witnesseth of me is true .
text2: Tabaa markkattiya harai de7ees ; qassi i tabaa markkattiyoogee tuma gidiyoogaa taani erais .

text: Ye sent unto John , and he bare witness unto the truth .
text2: “ Intte Yohaannisakko asa kiittin , i tumau markkattiis .

text: But I receive not testimony from man : but these things I say , that ye might be saved .
text2: Taani hegaa inttena attona gaada giyoogaappe attin , asa markkatetti tana koshshiina gidenna .

text: He was a burning and a shining light : and ye were willing for a season to rejoice in his light .
text2: Yohaannisi muqaaddadan , eexxiisinne poo7issiis ; qassi intte amarida wodiyaa a poo7uwan ufaittanau koyideta .

text: But I have greater witness than that of John : for the works which the Father hath given me to finish , the same works that I do , bear witness of me , that the Father hath sent me .
text2: “ SHin tau Yohaannisaagaappe aadhdhiya markkatettai de7ees ; aissi giikko , taani wurssanau Aawai taayyo immido oosoi , ha taani oottiyoogee , Aawai tana kiittidoogaa tabaa markkattees .

text: And the Father himself , which hath sent me , hath borne witness of me . Ye have neither heard his voice at any time , nor seen his shape .
text2: “ Qassi tana kiittida Aawaikka ba huuphen tabaa markkattees . Intte a cenggurssaa mulekka siyibeekketa ; a meraakka be7ibeekketa .

text: And ye have not his word abiding in you : for whom he hath sent , him ye believe not .
text2: I kiittidoogaa intte ammanenna gishshau , a qaalai intte wozanan baawa .

text: Search the scriptures ; for in them ye think ye have eternal life : and they are they which testify of me .
text2: “ Xoossaa maxaafatuppe merinaa de7uwaa demmiyoobaa intteyyo milatin , eta xanna7eeta ; etikka tabaa markkattoosona .

text: And ye will not come to me , that ye might have life .
text2: SHin de7uwaa demmanau taakko yiyoogaa intte koyekketa .

text: I receive not honour from men .
text2: “ Asi tana bonchchanaagaa koyikke .

text: But I know you , that ye have not the love of God in you .
text2: SHin taani intte wozanan Xoossaa siiqoi bainnaagaa erais .

text: I am come in my Father ' s name , and ye receive me not : if another shall come in his own name , him ye will receive .
text2: Taani ta Aawaa sunttan yaas ; shin tana mokkibeekketa . Hara asi ba sunttan yiyo wode , a mokkeeta .

text: How can ye believe , which receive honour one of another , and seek not the honour that cometh from God only ?
text2: Intte issoi issuwaa bonchcheeta ; shin issi Xoossaappe yiya bonchchuwaa koyekketa . Yaatin , waanidi ammananau danddayeetii ?

text: Do not think that I will accuse you to the Father : there is one that accuseth you , even Moses , in whom ye trust .
text2: “ Taani Aawan inttena mootiyoobaa intteyyo milatoppo ; inttena intte demmana giidi ufaissan naagiyo Muusee mootana .

text: For had ye believed Moses , ye would have believed me : for he wrote of me .
text2: Intte Muusa ammanidabaa gidiyaakko , tanakka ammanana ; aissi giikko , tabaa xaafidai a .

text: But if ye believe not his writings , how shall ye believe my words ?
text2: SHin intte i xaafidoogaa ammanennan ixxikko , taani giyoogaa waanidi ammanuuteetii ? ” yaagiis .

text: After these things Jesus went over the sea of Galilee , which is the sea of Tiberias .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi Galiila abbaappe woi Xibiriyaadoosa abbaappe hefintti pinniis .

text: And a great multitude followed him , because they saw his miracles which he did on them that were diseased .
text2: I hargganchchatu bolli oottido wolqqaama malaataa be7ido gishshau , daro asai a kaalliis .

text: And Jesus went up into a mountain , and there he sat with his disciples .
text2: Yesuusi deriyaa kiyidi , yaani ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura issippe uttiis .

text: And the passover , a feast of the Jews , was nigh .
text2: Aihudati bonchchiyo Paasikaa gallassai gakkiis .

text: When Jesus then lifted up his eyes , and saw a great company come unto him , he saith unto Philip , Whence shall we buy bread , that these may eat ?
text2: Yesuusi sinttaukko xeellidi , daro asai baakko yiyaagaa be7iis ; be7idi Piliphphoosa , “ Ha asaa ubbaa mizanau gidiya qumaa auppe shammanee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And this he said to prove him : for he himself knew what he would do .
text2: I hegaa Piliphphoosa paaccanau giis ; aissi giikko , i ba huuphen ai oottanaakkonne erees .

text: Philip answered him , Two hundred pennyworth of bread is not sufficient for them , that every one of them may take a little .
text2: Piliphphoosi zaaridi Yesuusa , “ Huuphiyan huuphiyan , harai atto issi issi barssa gattanau , naa77u xeetu biran shammido oittaikka gidenna ” yaagiis .

text: One of his disciples , Andrew , Simon Peter ' s brother , saith unto him ,
text2: Qassi Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi , Simoon PHeexiroosa ishai Inddiraasi ,

text: There is a lad here , which hath five barley loaves , and two small fishes : but what are they among so many ?
text2: “ Bangga oitta ichchashainne naa77u molee de7iyo issi na7ai hagan de7ees ; shin ha asa ubbau hegee ai maaddanee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus said , Make the men sit down . Now there was much grass in the place . So the men sat down , in number about five thousand .
text2: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Asaa utissite ” yaagiis . He sohuwan daro maatai de7ees . Asai ubbai uttiis ; attumaasaa qoodai ichchashu sha7aa gidana .

text: And Jesus took the loaves ; and when he had given thanks , he distributed to the disciples , and the disciples to them that were set down ; and likewise of the fishes as much as they would .
text2: Yesuusi oittaa ekkiis ; Xoossaa galatidi , hegan uttida asaayyo gishiis . Moliyaakka hegaadan oottiis ; oottin asai ba koyidoogaa keenaa miis .

text: When they were filled , he said unto his disciples , Gather up the fragments that remain , that nothing be lost .
text2: Eti ubbai kallidoogaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Issibaikka moorettenna mala , attida xarzzaa shiishshite ” yaagiis .

text: Therefore they gathered them together , and filled twelve baskets with the fragments of the five barley loaves , which remained over and above unto them that had eaten .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , eti ubbaakka shiishshidosona ; asai miishin attida bangga oittaa xarzzaa shiishshidi , tammanne naa77u samppaa kunttidosona .

text: Then those men , when they had seen the miracle that Jesus did , said , This is of a truth that prophet that should come into the world .
text2: Asai Yesuusi oottido wolqqaama malaataa be7ido wode , “ Hagee tumaappe ha sa7aa yaana giido hananabaa yootiyaagaa ” yaagidosona .

text: When Jesus therefore perceived that they would come and take him by force , to make him a king , he departed again into a mountain himself alone .
text2: Eti yiidi bana oiqqidi , wolqqan kawo oottanau haniyoogaa Yesuusi eridi , barkka deriyaa bolli naa77anttuwaa kiyiis .

text: And when even was now come , his disciples went down unto the sea ,
text2: Sa7ai omarido wode , Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati abbaakko biidosona ;

text: And entered into a ship , and went over the sea toward Capernaum . And it was now dark , and Jesus was not come to them .
text2: wolwoluwan gelidi , abbaa pinnidi , Qifirinaahooma biidosona . Sa7aikka qammiichchiis ; shin Yesuusi biron etakko yibeenna .

text: And the sea arose by reason of a great wind that blew .
text2: Wolqqaama carkkoi carkkido gishshau , abbai qaaxxees ;

text: So when they had rowed about five and twenty or thirty furlongs , they see Jesus walking on the sea , and drawing nigh unto the ship : and they were afraid .
text2: ichchashu woikko usuppun kilo meetire gidiyaagaa keenaa eti abbaa shaaroogaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi abbaa bollaara hemettiiddi yiyaagaa be7idi yayyidosona .

text: But he saith unto them , It is I ; be not afraid .
text2: SHin i , “ Yayyoppite ; tanattennee ! ” yaagiis .

text: Then they willingly received him into the ship : and immediately the ship was at the land whither they went .
text2: Eti wolwoluwan a gelissanau koyidosona ; sohuwaarakka wolwoloi eti biyoosaa abbaa gaxaa gakki aggiis .

text: The day following , when the people which stood on the other side of the sea saw that there was none other boat there , save that one whereinto his disciples were entered , and that Jesus went not with his disciples into the boat , but that his disciples were gone away alone ;
text2: Wonttetta gallassi , abbaappe hefinttaara attida daro asai issi wolwolo xalaalai de7iyaagaa be7iis ; Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura wolwoluwan gelidi , etaara beennan , eti banttarkka biidoogaa akeekidosona .

text: ( Howbeit there came other boats from Tiberias nigh unto the place where they did eat bread , after that the Lord had given thanks : )
text2: SHin Xibiriyaadoosappe hara wolwoloti Yesuusi Xoossaa galatin , asai oittaa miidosaa heeraa yiidosona .

text: When the people therefore saw that Jesus was not there , neither his disciples , they also took shipping , and came to Capernaum , seeking for Jesus .
text2: Asai Yesuusi woi erissiyo ashkkarati hegan bainnaagaa be7idi , Yesuusa koyanau wolwoluwan gelidi , Qifirinaahooma biidosona .

text: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea , they said unto him , Rabbi , when camest thou hither ?
text2: Asai Yesuusa abbaappe hefinttan demmido wode , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , hagaa aude yaadii ? ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus answered them and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Ye seek me , not because ye saw the miracles , but because ye did eat of the loaves , and were filled .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; intte tana koyiyoogee oittaa miido gishshassanne kallido gishshassa gidiyoogaappe attin , wolqqaama malaata be7ido gishshassa gidenna .

text: Labour not for the meat which perisheth , but for that meat which endureth unto everlasting life , which the Son of man shall give unto you : for him hath God the Father sealed .
text2: Merinaa de7o qumau , taani Asa Na7ai intteyyo immanaagau , oottiteppe attin , samiya qumau oottoppite ; aissi giikko , Aawai Xoossai a bolli gido giyo paramaa parami wottiis ” yaagiis .

text: Then said they unto him , What shall we do , that we might work the works of God ?
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan eti , “ Nuuni Xoossaa oosuwaa oottanau ai oottanee ? ” yaagidi Yesuusa oichchidosona .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , This is the work of God , that ye believe on him whom he hath sent .
text2: Oichchin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Intte oottana mala , Xoossai koyiyo oosoi hagaa ; i kiittidoogaa ammanite ” yaagiis .

text: They said therefore unto him , What sign shewest thou then , that we may see , and believe thee ? what dost thou work ?
text2: Eti zaaridi , “ Nuuni be7idi , nena ammanana mala , ai wolqqaama malaata oottuutee ? Ai oottuutee ?

text: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert ; as it is written , He gave them bread from heaven to eat .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Eti maanau saluwaappe oittaa immiis ' giyoogaadan , nu aawati bazzon mannaa miidosona ” yaagidosona .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Moses gave you not that bread from heaven ; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; intteyyo saluwaappe tumu oittaa immiyaagee ta Aawaa gidiyoogaappe attin , intteyyo saluwaappe oittaa immidaagee Muusa gidenna .

text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven , and giveth life unto the world .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa oittai saluwaappe wodhdhiyaagee sa7au de7uwaa immees ” yaagiis .

text: Then said they unto him , Lord , evermore give us this bread .
text2: Eti zaaridi , “ Godau , nuuyyo he oittaa ubba wode imma ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus said unto them , I am the bread of life : he that cometh to me shall never hunger ; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Taani de7o oitta ; taakko yiya urai mulekka namisettenna . Qassi tana ammaniya urai mulekka saamettenna .

text: But I said unto you , That ye also have seen me , and believe not .
text2: SHin taani intteyyo odaas ; intte tana be7ideta ; shin ammanekketa .

text: All that the Father giveth me shall come to me ; and him that cometh to me I will in no wise cast out .
text2: Ta Aawai tau immiyo ubbai taakko yaana ; qassi taakko yiya oonanne mulekka taani wora yeddikke .

text: For I came down from heaven , not to do mine own will , but the will of him that sent me .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani tana kiittidaagee koyiyoogaa oottanau saluwaappe yaasippe attin , ta koyiyoogaa oottanau yabeikke .

text: And this is the Father ' s will which hath sent me , that of all which he hath given me I should lose nothing , but should raise it up again at the last day .
text2: Tana kiittidaagee koyiyoogee hagaa ; taani i tau immido ubbatakka wurssettaa gallassi denttanaappe attin , issuwaakka bashshana mala koyenna .

text: And this is the will of him that sent me , that every one which seeth the Son , and believeth on him , may have everlasting life : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Aissi giikko , ta Aawai koyiyoogee hagaa ; tana Na7aa be7idi , ammaniya ubbati merinaa de7uwaa ekkana ; taanikka he ubbata wurssettaa gallassi denttana ” yaagiis .

text: The Jews then murmured at him , because he said , I am the bread which came down from heaven .
text2: Yesuusi , “ Taani saluwaappe wodhdhida oittaa ” giido gishshau , Aihudati a bolli zuuzummidosona .

text: And they said , Is not this Jesus , the son of Joseph , whose father and mother we know ? how is it then that he saith , I came down from heaven ?
text2: Eti , “ Hagee nuuni a aawaanne a aayyiyo eriyo Yooseefa na7aa Yesuusa gidennee ? Yaatin , i woigidi , ' Taani saluwaappe wodhdhaas ' gaanau danddayii ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus therefore answered and said unto them , Murmur not among yourselves .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Issoi issuwaara zuuzummiyoogaa aggite .

text: No man can come to me , except the Father which hath sent me draw him : and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Tana kiittida ta Aawai taakko ehiido asappe attin , taakko yaanau danddayiya asi baawa ; taanikka wurssettaa gallassi a denttana .

text: It is written in the prophets , And they shall be all taught of God . Every man therefore that hath heard , and hath learned of the Father , cometh unto me .
text2: Hananabaa yootiyaageeti , ' Xoossai asa ubbaa tamaarissana ' yaagidi xaafidosona ; Aawai giyoogaa siyiyaageenne Aawaappe tamaariyaagee ooninne taakko yees .

text: Not that any man hath seen the Father , save he which is of God , he hath seen the Father .
text2: Xoossaa matappe yiidaagaappe attin , Xoossaa be7ida asi baawa ; a xalaalai Xoossaa be7iis .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me hath everlasting life .
text2: “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; tana ammaniya urau merinaa de7oi de7ees .

text: I am that bread of life .
text2: Taani de7o oitta .

text: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness , and are dead .
text2: Intte aawati bazzon mannaa miidosona ; shin haiqqidosona .

text: This is the bread which cometh down from heaven , that a man may eat thereof , and not die .
text2: Asi appe miidi haiqqenna oittai saluwaappe yiyaagee hagaa .

text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven : if any man eat of this bread , he shall live for ever : and the bread that I will give is my flesh , which I will give for the life of the world .
text2: Saluwaappe wodhdhida de7o oittai tana ; ooninne ha oittaappe miikko , merinau de7ana ; qassi ha sa7ai de7ana mala , taani immana oittai ta ashuwaa ” yaagiis .

text: The Jews therefore strove among themselves , saying , How can this man give us his flesh to eat ?
text2: Aihudati , “ Ha bitanee ba ashuwaa nuuni maana mala , nuuyyo waatidi immanau danddayii ? ” yaagidi bantta giddon palamettidosona .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except ye eat the flesh of the Son of man , and drink his blood , ye have no life in you .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yesuusi eta , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; ta ashuwaa , Asa Na7aa ashuwaa , intte maana xayikko , qassi ta suuttaakka intte uyana xayikko , inttenan de7oi baawa .

text: Whoso eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , hath eternal life ; and I will raise him up at the last day .
text2: Ta ashuwaa miya uraunne , ta suuttaa uyiya uraunne merinaa de7oi de7ees . Taani wurssettaa gallassi a denttana .

text: For my flesh is meat indeed , and my blood is drink indeed .
text2: Aissi giikko , ta ashoi tumu quma ; ta suuttaikka tumu ushsha .

text: He that eateth my flesh , and drinketh my blood , dwelleth in me , and I in him .
text2: Ta ashuwaa miya urainne ta suuttaa uyiya urai tanaara de7ees ; taanikka aara de7ais .

text: As the living Father hath sent me , and I live by the Father : so he that eateth me , even he shall live by me .
text2: De7o Aawai tana kiittin , taani a gaasuwan de7iyoogaadan , tana miya uraikka ta gaasuwan de7ana .

text: This is that bread which came down from heaven : not as your fathers did eat manna , and are dead : he that eateth of this bread shall live for ever .
text2: Saluwaappe wodhdhida oittai hagaa ; intte aawati miidi haiqqido mannaa mala gidenna ; ha oittaa miya urai merinau de7ana ” yaagiis .

text: These things said he in the synagogue , as he taught in Capernaum .
text2: Yesuusi Qifirinaahooma kataman Aihuda woosa keettan tamaarissiiddi , hagaa yaagiis .

text: Many therefore of his disciples , when they had heard this , said , This is an hard saying ; who can hear it ?
text2: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuppe dariya baggai hegaa siyido wode , “ Hagee gelenna timirtte ; hagee ooyyo gelii ? ” yaagidosona .

text: When Jesus knew in himself that his disciples murmured at it , he said unto them , Doth this offend you ?
text2: SHin Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarati hegau zuuzummidoogaa eridi , “ Hagee inttena xubbii ?

text: What and if ye shall see the Son of man ascend up where he was before ?
text2: Yaatin taani , Asa Na7ai , kase de7iyoosaa pude kiyishin be7iyaakko waanuuteetii ?

text: It is the spirit that quickeneth ; the flesh profiteth nothing : the words that I speak unto you , they are spirit , and they are life .
text2: Geeshsha Ayyaanai de7uwaa immees ; ashoi ainne go77enna . Taani intteyyo yootido qaalai ayyaananne de7o .

text: But there are some of you that believe not . For Jesus knew from the beginning who they were that believed not , and who should betray him .
text2: SHin intte giddon ammanennaageeti de7oosona ” yaagiis ; aissi giikko , ammanennaageeti augeetakko Yesuusi kaseesappe doommidi erees . Qassi bana aatti immanaageetakka erees .

text: And he said , Therefore said I unto you , that no man can come unto me , except it were given unto him of my Father .
text2: Qassikka Yesuusi , “ Aawai ba geennan ooninne taakko yaanau danddayenna taani giidoogee hegaa gishshassa ” yaagiis .

text: From that time many of his disciples went back , and walked no more with him .
text2: Hegaa gaasuwan , Yesuusa kaalliyaageetuppe daroti a aggi bayidi , guyye simmidosona ; naa77antto a kaallibookkona .

text: Then said Jesus unto the twelve , Will ye also go away ?
text2: Yesuusi qassi ba tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Inttekka aggi bayidi baanau koyeetii ? ” yaagiis .

text: Then Simon Peter answered him , Lord , to whom shall we go ? thou hast the words of eternal life .
text2: Simoon PHeexiroosi zaaridi , “ Godau , nuuni ookko baanee ? Neeyyo merinaa de7uwaa qaalai de7ees .

text: And we believe and are sure that thou art that Christ , the Son of the living God .
text2: Neeni Xoossaa geeshshaa gidiyoogaa nuuni ammanoosinne eroos ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus answered them , Have not I chosen you twelve , and one of you is a devil ?
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi eta , “ Taani inttena tammanne naa77ata doorabeikkinaa ? Qassi intteppe issoi xalahe ” yaagiis .

text: He spake of Judas Iscariot the son of Simon : for he it was that should betray him , being one of the twelve .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa Simoona na7aa Yihudaa Asqqoroota gees ; aissi giikko , Yihudai tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issuwaa ; i Yesuusa aatti immanaagaa .

text: After these things Jesus walked in Galilee : for he would not walk in Jewry , because the Jews sought to kill him .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi Galiilan yaa haa yuuyiis ; Aihudati a woranau koyiyo gishshau , Yihudan yuuyana koyibeenna .

text: Now the Jews ' feast of tabernacles was at hand .
text2: Aihudati bonchchiyo Daase Baalai gakki uttiis .

text: His brethren therefore said unto him , Depart hence , and go into Judaea , that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yesuusa ishantti a , “ Ne erissiyo ashkkarati neeni oottiyoogaa be7ana mala , hagaappe denddada Yihudaa biitti ba .

text: For there is no man that doeth any thing in secret , and he himself seeketh to be known openly . If thou do these things , shew thyself to the world .
text2: Aissi giikko , baayyo erettanau koyiya asi ooninne ba ooso genttenna . Neeni hageeta oottiyaabaa gidikko , nebaa sa7aa erissa ! ” yaagidosona .

text: For neither did his brethren believe in him .
text2: Aissi giikko , harai atto a ishanttikka a ammanibookkona .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , My time is not yet come : but your time is alway ready .
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Tau injjetiya wodee gakkibeenna ; shin intteyyo ai wodeekka injjetees .

text: The world cannot hate you ; but me it hateth , because I testify of it , that the works thereof are evil .
text2: Sa7ai inttena ixxanau danddayenna ; shin taani sa7aa oosoi iita gidiyoogaa markkattiyo gishshau , tana ixxees .

text: Go ye up unto this feast : I go not up yet unto this feast ; for my time is not yet full come .
text2: Baalaa bonchchiyoosaa intte biite ; tau injjetiya wodee gakkibeenna gishshau , taani baalaa bonchchiyoosaa baanaagee biroona ” yaagiis .

text: When he had said these words unto them , he abode still in Galilee .
text2: I hagaa giidi , Galiilan attiis .

text: But when his brethren were gone up , then went he also up unto the feast , not openly , but as it were in secret .
text2: SHin a ishantti baala gallassaa bonchchiyoosaa biidoogaappe guyyiyan , ikka asi be7ennan geeman he sohuwaa biis .

text: Then the Jews sought him at the feast , and said , Where is he ?
text2: Aihudati baala gallassaa bonchchiyoosan a koyoosonanne , “ I awan de7ii ? ” yaagiiddi , a lal77oosona .

text: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him : for some said , He is a good man : others said , Nay ; but he deceiveth the people .
text2: Asaa giddon daro zuuzunttai denddiis . Amarida asai , “ I lo77o asa ” yaagees ; harati qassi , “ Akkai ; i asa balettees ” yaagoosona .

text: Howbeit no man spake openly of him for fear of the Jews .
text2: SHin Aihudatuyyo yayyido gishshau , ooninne abaa qoncciyan haasayenna .

text: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple , and taught .
text2: Baala gallassaa bonchchiyoogee baggettin , Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyaa biidi , tamaarissuwaa doommiis .

text: And the Jews marvelled , saying , How knoweth this man letters , having never learned ?
text2: Aihudati garamettidi , “ Ha bitanee ainne tamaarennan hagaa keeni waani eridee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus answered them , and said , My doctrine is not mine , but his that sent me .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani tamaarissiyoogee tana kiittida Xoossaa matappe yiyoogaappe attin , tabaa gidenna .

text: If any man will do his will , he shall know of the doctrine , whether it be of God , or whether I speak of myself .
text2: Xoossaa sheniyaa oottanau dosiya ooninne ha taani tamaarissiyoogee Xoossaa matappe yiyaakko woi qassi taani ta huupheppe haasayiyaakko erana .

text: He that speaketh of himself seeketh his own glory : but he that seeketh his glory that sent him , the same is true , and no unrighteousness is in him .
text2: Babaa haasayiya urai ba huuphessi bonchcho koyees ; shin bana kiittidaagaa bonchchuwaa koyiya urai tumanchcha ; aani worddoi baawa .

text: Did not Moses give you the law , and yet none of you keepeth the law ? Why go ye about to kill me ?
text2: Muusee intteyyo higgiyaa immibeennee ? SHin intteppe issoinne higgiyaa naagenna . Tana aissi woranau koyeetii ? ” yaagiis .

text: The people answered and said , Thou hast a devil : who goeth about to kill thee ?
text2: Asai zaaridi , “ Nenan xalahee de7ees ; nena woranau oonee koyidai ? ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , I have done one work , and ye all marvel .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Taani issi wolqqaamabaa oottin , intte ubbai garamettideta .

text: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision ; ( not because it is of Moses , but of the fathers ; ) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man .
text2: Qaxxarai intte aawatuura yiidoogaappe attin , Muuseera yibeenna ; shin intte naata intte qaxxarana mala , Muusee inttena azazido gishshau , intte Sambbatan naata qaxxareeta .

text: If a man on the sabbath day receive circumcision , that the law of Moses should not be broken ; are ye angry at me , because I have made a man every whit whole on the sabbath day ?
text2: Muusee higgee azazido gishshau , intte Sambbatan qaxxariyaabaa gidikko , yaatin taani issi asayyo kumetta bollaa pattido gishshau , tana aissi hanqqetteetii ?

text: Judge not according to the appearance , but judge righteous judgment .
text2: Tumu pirddaa pirdditeppe attin , asa som77o xeellidi pirddoppite ” yaagiis .

text: Then said some of them of Jerusalem , Is not this he , whom they seek to kill ?
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yerusalaame asaappe issooti issooti , “ Eti woranau koyiyo bitanee hagaa gidennee ?

text: But , lo , he speaketh boldly , and they say nothing unto him . Do the rulers know indeed that this is the very Christ ?
text2: Be7ite , qoncciyan i haasayees ; eti a ainne gookkona . Hagee Kiristtoosa gidiyoogaa halaqati tumu eriyoonaashsha ?

text: Howbeit we know this man whence he is : but when Christ cometh , no man knoweth whence he is .
text2: SHin nuuni i auppe yiidaakko eroos ; Kiristtoosi yiyo wode , i auppe yiyaakkonne ooninne erenna ” yaagidosona .

text: Then cried Jesus in the temple as he taught , saying , Ye both know me , and ye know whence I am : and I am not come of myself , but he that sent me is true , whom ye know not .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyan tamaarissiiddi , ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Intte tana ereeta ; qassi taani awappe yiidaakkokka ereeta . Taani ta shenen yabeikke ; shin tana kiittidaagee tumanchcha ; intte a erekketa .

text: But I know him : for I am from him , and he hath sent me .
text2: SHin taani a erais ; aissi giikko , i tana kiittin , taani a matappe yaas ” yaagiis .

text: Then they sought to take him : but no man laid hands on him , because his hour was not yet come .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , eti a oiqqanau koyidosona ; shin a wodee birooni gakkibeenna gishshau , ooninne a bolli kushe wottibeenna .

text: And many of the people believed on him , and said , When Christ cometh , will he do more miracles than these which this man hath done ?
text2: SHin daro asai Yesuusa ammanidi , “ Kiristtoosi yiyo wode , ha bitanee oottido malaataappe xoqqiyaagaa oottaneeyye ? ” yaagidosona .

text: The Pharisees heard that the people murmured such things concerning him ; and the Pharisees and the chief priests sent officers to take him .
text2: Parisaaweti daro asai Yesuusabaa zuuzummiyoogaa siyidosona ; qeese halaqatinne Parisaaweti a oitti qashissanau amarida wotaaddarata kiittidosona .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Yet a little while am I with you , and then I go unto him that sent me .
text2: Yesuusi , “ Taani inttenaara guuttaa takkana ; hegaappe guyyiyan , tana kiittidaagaakko baana .

text: Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come .
text2: Intte tana koyana ; shin demmekketa ; aissi giikko , taani de7iyoosaa intte baanau danddayekketa ” yaagiis .

text: Then said the Jews among themselves , Whither will he go , that we shall not find him ? will he go unto the dispersed among the Gentiles , and teach the Gentiles ?
text2: Aihudati issoi issuwaara , “ Hagee nuuni demmennasaa awa baana hanii ? Aihudati de7iyo Giriike katamaa biidi , Giriiketa tamaarissanau haniiyye ?

text: What manner of saying is this that he said , Ye shall seek me , and shall not find me : and where I am , thither ye cannot come ?
text2: I , ' Intte tana koyana ; shin demmekketa ' qassi , ' Taani de7iyoosaa intte baanau danddayekketa ' yaagees ; hegaa giyoogee woigiyoogee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: In the last day , that great day of the feast , Jesus stood and cried , saying , If any man thirst , let him come unto me , and drink .
text2: He baala gallassaa bonchchiyo gallassaappe waannatiya wurssetta gallassan Yesuusi denddi eqqidi , ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Saamettida urai ooninne taakko yiidi uyo .

text: He that believeth on me , as the scripture hath said , out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water .
text2: Tanan ammaniyaagau , Xoossaa maxaafai giyoogaadan , a uluwaappekka de7o haattaa shaafai goggana ” yaagiis .

text: ( But this spake he of the Spirit , which they that believe on him should receive : for the Holy Ghost was not yet given ; because that Jesus was not yet glorified . )
text2: I hegaa a ammanidaageeti ekkana Geeshsha Ayyaanaabaa haasayiis . Yesuusi biron bonchchettiichchibeenna gishshau , he wode Geeshsha Ayyaanai imettiichchibeenna .

text: Many of the people therefore , when they heard this saying , said , Of a truth this is the Prophet .
text2: He asaappe dariya baggai i giyoogaa siyidi , “ Tumu hagee hananabaa yootiyaagaa ! ” yaagiis .

text: Others said , This is the Christ . But some said , Shall Christ come out of Galilee ?
text2: Harati , “ Hagee Kiristtoosa ” yaagidosona . SHin harati qassi , “ Kiristtoosi Galiilappe waani kiyii ?

text: Hath not the scripture said , That Christ cometh of the seed of David , and out of the town of Bethlehem , where David was ?
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Kiristtoosi Daawita zariyaappe Daawiti de7ido Beetaliheeme katamaappe yaana ' geenneeyye ? ” yaagidosona .

text: So there was a division among the people because of him .
text2: Yesuusa gaasuwan asai ba giddon shaahettiis .

text: And some of them would have taken him ; but no man laid hands on him .
text2: He asaappe issooti issooti a oiqqanau koyidosona ; shin kushiyaaninne a bochchibookkona .

text: Then came the officers to the chief priests and Pharisees ; and they said unto them , Why have ye not brought him ?
text2: Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarati qeese halaqatukkonne Parisaawetukko simmidosona ; simmin eti Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarata , “ Aissi a ehibeekketii ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: The officers answered , Never man spake like this man .
text2: Oichchin Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarati etau , “ Ha bitanee haasayidoogaadan , mulekka ooninne haasayibeenna ! ” yaagidi zaaridosona .

text: Then answered them the Pharisees , Are ye also deceived ?
text2: Parisaaweti zaaridi , “ I inttenakka balettidee ?

text: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him ?
text2: Halaqatuppe woi Parisaawetuppe a ammanida asi de7ii ?

text: But this people who knoweth not the law are cursed .
text2: SHin higgiyaa erenna ha asai qanggettidaagaa ” yaagidosona .

text: Nicodemus saith unto them , ( he that came to Jesus by night , being one of them , )
text2: Etappe kase issoi qammi Yesuusakko biida Niqoodimoosi eta ,

text: Doth our law judge any man , before it hear him , and know what he doeth ?
text2: “ Issi urai giyoobaa siyennan woi i ai oottidaakko erennan de7iiddi , kasetidi a bolli pirddiyoogee nu higgiyan de7ii ? ” yaagiis .

text: They answered and said unto him , Art thou also of Galilee ? Search , and look : for out of Galilee ariseth no prophet .
text2: Yaagin eti zaaridi a , “ Neenikka qassi Galiila biittaa asee ? Galiila biittaappe hananabaa yootiyaabi beettennaagaa Xoossaa maxaafata marammarada era ” yaagidosona .

text: And every man went unto his own house .
text2: Asai ubbai aggidi , ba soo ba soo biis .

text: Jesus went unto the mount of Olives .
text2: SHin Yesuusi Dabira Zaite Deriyaakko biis .

text: And early in the morning he came again into the temple , and all the people came unto him ; and he sat down , and taught them .
text2: Qassi wonttetta gallassi guuran Beeta Maqidasiyaa simmiis ; daro asai akko yin , uttidi eta tamaarissiis .

text: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery ; and when they had set her in the midst ,
text2: Higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageetinne Parisaaweti shaaramuxishin oiqqido issi mishiriyo akko ekki ehiidosona . Eti asa ubbaa sinttan o essidi Yesuusa ,

text: They say unto him , Master , this woman was taken in adultery , in the very act .
text2: “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , ha mishiriyaa shaaramuxaidda ohettaasu .

text: Now Moses in the law commanded us , that such should be stoned : but what sayest thou ?
text2: Higgiyaa bolli Muusee hanni mala maccaasa shuchchan caddana mala , nuna azaziis . Yaatin neeni woigai ? ” yaagidosona .

text: This they said , tempting him , that they might have to accuse him . But Jesus stooped down , and with his finger wrote on the ground , as though he heard them not .
text2: Eti hegaa giidoogee Yesuusa mootiyoobaa demmidi a paaccanaassa ; shin Yesuusi hokkidi , ba biradhdhiyan biittaa bolli xaafiis .

text: So when they continued asking him , he lifted up himself , and said unto them , He that is without sin among you , let him first cast a stone at her .
text2: Eti a oichchidi aggennan ixxin , pude xoqqu giidi , “ Intte giddon nagara oottibeenna asi kasetidi , o shuchchan caddo ” yaagiis .

text: And again he stooped down , and wrote on the ground .
text2: Qassikka hokkidi , biittaa bolli xaafiis .

text: And they which heard it , being convicted by their own conscience , went out one by one , beginning at the eldest , even unto the last : and Jesus was left alone , and the woman standing in the midst .
text2: Eti hegaa siyido wode , kasetidi cimati kiyin , issoi issoi kiyiiddi wuridosona ; wurin Yesuusa xalaalai hegan eqqida mishireera attiis .

text: When Jesus had lifted up himself , and saw none but the woman , he said unto her , Woman , where are those thine accusers ? hath no man condemned thee ?
text2: I pude xoqqu giidi mishiriyo , “ Mishiree , asati awan de7iyoonaa ? Ooninne ne bolli pirddibeennee ? ” yaagiis .

text: She said , No man , Lord . And Jesus said unto her , Neither do I condemn thee : go , and sin no more .
text2: Yaagin mishiriyaa , “ Godau , ooninne ta bolli pirddibeenna ” yaagaasu . Yesuusi o , “ Taanikka ne bolli pirddikke ; ba ; naa77anttada nagara oottoppa ” yaagiis .

text: Then spake Jesus again unto them , saying , I am the light of the world : he that followeth me shall not walk in darkness , but shall have the light of life .
text2: Qassikka Yesuusi asau , “ Taani sa7au poo7o ; tana kaalliya ooninne de7o poo7uwaa ekkanaappe attin , xuman mulekka hemettenna ” yaagidi haasayiis .

text: The Pharisees therefore said unto him , Thou bearest record of thyself ; thy record is not true .
text2: Yaagin Parisaaweti , “ Neeni nebaa markkattaasa ; ne markkatettai tuma gidenna ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus answered and said unto them , Though I bear record of myself , yet my record is true : for I know whence I came , and whither I go ; but ye cannot tell whence I come , and whither I go .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani tabaa markkattikkokka , ta markkatettai tuma ; aissi giikko , taani awappe yiidaakkonne qassi awa biyaakko , intte erekketa .

text: Ye judge after the flesh ; I judge no man .
text2: Asi pirddiyo ogiyan intte pirddeeta ; taani issi uraa bollikka pirddikke .

text: And yet if I judge , my judgment is true : for I am not alone , but I and the Father that sent me .
text2: SHin taani pirddiyaabaa gidikkokka , ta pirddai tuma ; aissi giikko , tana kiittida ta Aawai tanaara de7eesippe attin , taani tarkka de7ikke .

text: It is also written in your law , that the testimony of two men is true .
text2: Naa77u asa markkatettai tuma gidiyoogee intte higgiyan xaafetti uttiis .

text: I am one that bear witness of myself , and the Father that sent me beareth witness of me .
text2: Taani tabaa ta huuphen markkattais ; qassi tana kiittida ta Aawaikka tabaa markkattees ” yaagiis .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is thy Father ? Jesus answered , Ye neither know me , nor my Father : if ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also .
text2: Yaagin eti , “ Ne aawai awan de7ii ? ” yaagidi Yesuusa oichchidosona . Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Intte tanakka woi ta Aawaakka erekketa ; tana eridabaa gidiyaakko , intte ta Aawaakka erana ” yaagiis .

text: These words spake Jesus in the treasury , as he taught in the temple : and no man laid hands on him ; for his hour was not yet come .
text2: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyan tamaarissiiddi , muxuwaata miishshaa yeggiyo saaxiniyaa matan hegaa haasayiis . A ooninne oiqqibeenna ; aissi giikko , a wodee biron gakkiichchibeenna .

text: Then said Jesus again unto them , I go my way , and ye shall seek me , and shall die in your sins : whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Qassikka Yesuusi eta , “ Taani baana . Bin intte tana koyana ; shin intte intte nagaran haiqqana . Taani biyoosaakka baanau intte danddayekketa ” yaagiis .

text: Then said the Jews , Will he kill himself ? because he saith , Whither I go , ye cannot come .
text2: Aihudati , “ I , ' Taani biyoosaa intte baanau danddayekketa ' yaagees ; i bana barkka woraneeyye ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And he said unto them , Ye are from beneath ; I am from above : ye are of this world ; I am not of this world .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Intte garssa asa ; taani bolla asa . Intte ha sa7aa asa ; taani ha sa7aa asa gidikke .

text: I said therefore unto you , that ye shall die in your sins : for if ye believe not that I am he , ye shall die in your sins .
text2: Intte intte nagaran haiqqanaagaa taani intteyyo yootidoogee hegaassa ; taani tana gidiyoogaa intte ammanana xayikko , intte intte nagaran haiqqana ” yaagiis .

text: Then said they unto him , Who art thou ? And Jesus saith unto them , Even the same that I said unto you from the beginning .
text2: Yaagin eti , “ Neeni oonee ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona . Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani intteyyo kaseesappe yootido tana .

text: I have many things to say and to judge of you : but he that sent me is true ; and I speak to the world those things which I have heard of him .
text2: Taani inttebaa haasayiyoobainne pirddiyoobai darobai de7ees . SHin tana kiittidaagee tumanchcha ; qassi taani appe siyidoogaa sa7aa asaayyo yootais ” yaagiis .

text: They understood not that he spake to them of the Father .
text2: I ba Aawaabaa haasayiyoogaa eti akeekibookkona .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , When ye have lifted up the Son of man , then shall ye know that I am he , and that I do nothing of myself ; but as my Father hath taught me , I speak these things .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yesuusi eta , “ Tana Asa Na7aa intte masqqaliyaa bolli kaqqiyo wode , taani tana gidiyoogaanne qassi taani ta Aawai tana tamaarissidoogaadan haasayiyoogaappe attin , ta shenen ainne oottennaagaa intte erana .

text: And he that sent me is with me : the Father hath not left me alone ; for I do always those things that please him .
text2: Qassi tana kiittidaagee tanaara de7ees ; taani ubba wode a ufaissiyaagaa oottiyo gishshau , i ta xalaalaa aggibeenna ” yaagiis .

text: As he spake these words , many believed on him .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa haasayishin siyida daro asai a ammaniis .

text: Then said Jesus to those Jews which believed on him , If ye continue in my word , then are ye my disciples indeed ;
text2: Yesuusi bana ammanida Aihudata , “ Intte taani tamaarissiyoogau azazettikko , tumu tana kaalliyaageeta .

text: And ye shall know the truth , and the truth shall make you free .
text2: Intte tumatettaakka erana ; qassi tumatettai inttena ailletettaappe kessana ” yaagiis .

text: They answered him , We be Abraham ' s seed , and were never in bondage to any man : how sayest thou , Ye shall be made free ?
text2: Eti zaaridi , “ Nuuni Abrahaama zare ; nuuni ooyyookka ailletibookko . Yaatin neeni woigada , ' Ailletettaappe intte kiyana ' gai ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus answered them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; nagara oottiya ooninne nagara aille .

text: And the servant abideth not in the house for ever : but the Son abideth ever .
text2: Aillee ubba wode sooni de7enna ; shin na7i merinau sooni de7ees .

text: If the Son therefore shall make you free , ye shall be free indeed .
text2: Na7ai inttena ailletettaappe kessikko , intte ailletettaappe intte tumu kiyana .

text: I know that ye are Abraham ' s seed ; but ye seek to kill me , because my word hath no place in you .
text2: Intte Abrahaama zare gidiyoogaa taani erais ; shin ta qaalai intte wozanan bainna gishshau , tana woranau koyeeta .

text: I speak that which I have seen with my Father : and ye do that which ye have seen with your father .
text2: Taani ta Aawai tana bessidoogaa haasayais ; qassi inttekka intte aawaappe siyidoogaa ootteeta ” yaagiis .

text: They answered and said unto him , Abraham is our father . Jesus saith unto them , If ye were Abraham ' s children , ye would do the works of Abraham .
text2: Eti zaaridi , “ Nu aawai Abrahaama ” yaagidosona . Yaagin Yesuusi eta , “ Intte Abrahaama naata gididaakko , i oottido oosuwaa malaa oottana .

text: But now ye seek to kill me , a man that hath told you the truth , which I have heard of God : this did not Abraham .
text2: SHin Xoossaappe siyido tumaa yootida tana intte woranau koyeeta ; Abrahaami hegaadan oottibeenna .

text: Ye do the deeds of your father . Then said they to him , We be not born of fornication ; we have one Father , even God .
text2: Intte intte aawai oottidoogaa ootteeta ” yaagiis . Eti zaaridi , “ Nuuni shaaramuxan yelettibookko ; nuuyyo issi Aawai , Xoossaa xalaalai de7ees ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus said unto them , If God were your Father , ye would love me : for I proceeded forth and came from God ; neither came I of myself , but he sent me .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi eta , “ Intte Xoossaa naata tumu gididaakko , tana siiqana ; aissi giikko , taani Xoossaa matappe yaada hagan de7ais . Tana i kiittidoogaappe attin , taani ta shenen yabeikke .

text: Why do ye not understand my speech ? even because ye cannot hear my word .
text2: Taani giyoogaa intte akeekennaagee aibissee ? Taani giyoogaa intte siyanau danddayenna gishshassa .

text: Ye are of your father the devil , and the lusts of your father ye will do . He was a murderer from the beginning , and abode not in the truth , because there is no truth in him . When he speaketh a lie , he speaketh of his own : for he is a liar , and the father of it .
text2: Intte intte aawaa xalahe halaqaa naata ; qassi intte intte aawai amottiyoobaa oottanau koyeeta . I kaseppe doommidi , shemppo woridaagaa ; tumatetti aani bainna gishshau , tumatettaakko shiiqi erenna . I wordduwaa haasayiyo wode , baappe haasayees ; aissi giikko , i worddanchchanne qassi wordduwaukka aawa .

text: And because I tell you the truth , ye believe me not .
text2: SHin taani tumaa haasayiyo gishshau , intte tana ammanekketa .

text: Which of you convinceth me of sin ? And if I say the truth , why do ye not believe me ?
text2: Intteppe tana nagara oottishin be7aas gaanau danddayiyai oonee ? Taani tumaa haasayiyaabaa gidikko , tana aissi ammanekketii ?

text: He that is of God heareth God ' s words : ye therefore hear them not , because ye are not of God .
text2: Xoossaa asa gidiya urai Xoossai giyoogaa ezggees ; intte Xoossaa asa gidenna gishshau , Xoossai giyoogaa ezggekketa ” yaagiis .

text: Then answered the Jews , and said unto him , Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan , and hast a devil ?
text2: Aihudati zaaridi , “ Nuuni nena , ' Neeni Samaariyaa asa ; nenan xalahee de7ees ' giidi mooridoo ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus answered , I have not a devil ; but I honour my Father , and ye do dishonour me .
text2: Yesuusi eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Ta bolli xalahee baawa . Taani ta Aawaa bonchchais ; shin intte tana kaushsheeta .

text: And I seek not mine own glory : there is one that seeketh and judgeth .
text2: Taani ta huuphessi bonchcho koyikke ; hegaa koyiyaageenne pirddiyaagee de7ees .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , If a man keep my saying , he shall never see death .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; ta qaalaa naagiya ooninne mulekka haiqqenna ” yaagiis .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Now we know that thou hast a devil . Abraham is dead , and the prophets ; and thou sayest , If a man keep my saying , he shall never taste of death .
text2: Aihudati zaaridi , “ Ne bolli xalahee de7iyoogaa nuuni ha77i erida . Abrahaami haiqqiis ; hananabaa yootiyaageetikka haiqqidosona ; shin neeni , ' Ta qaalaa naagiya ooninne mulekka haiqqenna ' yaagaasa .

text: Art thou greater than our father Abraham , which is dead ? and the prophets are dead : whom makest thou thyself ?
text2: Neeni haiqqida nu aawaa Abrahaamappe darai ? Hananabaa yootiyaageetikka qassi haiqqidosona . Neeni nena o mala gaada qoppai ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus answered , If I honour myself , my honour is nothing : it is my Father that honoureth me ; of whom ye say , that he is your God :
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Taani tana bonchchikko , ta bonchchoi hada ; intte nu Xoossaa giyo ta Aawai tana bonchchees .

text: Yet ye have not known him ; but I know him : and if I should say , I know him not , I shall be a liar like unto you : but I know him , and keep his saying .
text2: Intte a erana xayikkokka , taani a erais . Taani a erikke giikko , inttenadan worddanchcha gidais ; shin taani a erais ; qassi a qaalaakka naagais .

text: Your father Abraham rejoiced to see my day : and he saw it , and was glad .
text2: Intte aawai Abrahaami , ta gallassaa be7anau laamotiis ; be7idikka ufaittiis ” yaagiis .

text: Then said the Jews unto him , Thou art not yet fifty years old , and hast thou seen Abraham ?
text2: Aihudati zaaridi a , “ Neeyyo harai atto ishatamu laitta kumibeennaagee Abrahaama be7adii ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus said unto them , Verily , verily , I say unto you , Before Abraham was , I am .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi eta , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; Abrahaami yelettanaappekka kase taani de7ais ” yaagiis .

text: Then took they up stones to cast at him : but Jesus hid himself , and went out of the temple , going through the midst of them , and so passed by .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , eti Yesuusa caddanau shuchchaa ekkidosona ; shin Yesuusi etappe geemettidi , Beeta Maqidasiyaappe kiyidi biis .

text: And as Jesus passed by , he saw a man which was blind from his birth .
text2: Yesuusi biiddi , yelettoosappe qooqe gididi de7iya issi bitaniyaa be7iis .

text: And his disciples asked him , saying , Master , who did sin , this man , or his parents , that he was born blind ?
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusa , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , ha bitanee qooqe gididi yelettanaadan , nagara oottidai oonee ? I oottideeyye ? Woi a yelidaageeti oottidonaa ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: Jesus answered , Neither hath this man sinned , nor his parents : but that the works of God should be made manifest in him .
text2: Oichchin Yesuusi , “ Xoossaa oosoi a bollan qonccana mala qooqidoogaappe attin , i woi a aayyiyaanne a aawai nagara oottibookkona .

text: I must work the works of him that sent me , while it is day : the night cometh , when no man can work .
text2: Nuuni sa7ai qammennan de7ishin , tana kiittidaagaa oosuwaa oottanau bessees . Ooninne oottanau danddayenna qammai yees .

text: As long as I am in the world , I am the light of the world .
text2: Taani sa7an de7aidda sa7au poo7o ” yaagiis .

text: When he had thus spoken , he spat on the ground , and made clay of the spittle , and he anointed the eyes of the blind man with the clay ,
text2: Yesuusi hegaa giidi , sa7an cuchchiis ; ba cuchchan guutta urqqaa shugissidi , he urqqan qooqe bitaniyaa aifiyaa tiyiis .

text: And said unto him , Go , wash in the pool of Siloam , ( which is by interpretation , Sent . ) He went his way therefore , and washed , and came seeing .
text2: Tiyidi , “ Baada Saliihooma giyo dagattida haattan ne aifiyaa meecca ” yaagiis . “ Saliihooma ” giyoogee “ Kiitettidaagaa ” giyoogaa . Hegaa gishshau , bitanee biidi , ba aifiyaa meecettidi , xeelliiddi simmiis .

text: The neighbours therefore , and they which before had seen him that he was blind , said , Is not this he that sat and begged ?
text2: Bitaniyaa shoorotinne bitanee kase woossishin be7ida asainne , “ Hagee uttidi woossiya bitaniyaa gidenneeyye ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Some said , This is he : others said , He is like him : but he said , I am he .
text2: Qassi amaridaageeti , “ Hagee attennee ” yaagidosona . Harati qassi , “ CHii , hagee a milatiyoogaappe attin , a gidenna ” yaagidosona . SHin bitanee , “ Taani attennee ” yaagiis .

text: Therefore said they unto him , How were thine eyes opened ?
text2: Yaagin eti bitaniyaa , “ Yaatin , ne aifee waani xeellidee ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: He answered and said , A man that is called Jesus made clay , and anointed mine eyes , and said unto me , Go to the pool of Siloam , and wash : and I went and washed , and I received sight .
text2: I zaaridi , “ Yesuusa giyo asi guutta urqqaa shugissidi , ta aifiyaa tiyiis . Tiyidi , ' Saliihooma giyo dagattida haattan baada ne aifiyaa meecetta ' yaagiis . Taani baada meecettada xeellaas ” yaagiis .

text: Then said they unto him , Where is he ? He said , I know not .
text2: Eti a , “ I awan de7ii ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona . Oichchin bitanee , “ Taani erikke ” yaagiis .

text: They brought to the Pharisees him that aforetime was blind .
text2: Eti kase qooqidi xeellida bitaniyaa Parisaawetukko ekki efiidosona .

text: And it was the sabbath day when Jesus made the clay , and opened his eyes .
text2: Yesuusi urqqaa shugissidi , bitaniyaa aifiyaa pattido gallassai Sambbata gallassa .

text: Then again the Pharisees also asked him how he had received his sight . He said unto them , He put clay upon mine eyes , and I washed , and do see .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , bitanee waani xeellidaakkonne Parisaaweti a naa77anttuwaa oichchidosona . Oichchin bitanee etau , “ I ta aifiyan guutta urqqaa wottiis . Ta aifiyaa meecettaas ; meecettada ha77i xeellais ” yaagiis .

text: Therefore said some of the Pharisees , This man is not of God , because he keepeth not the sabbath day . Others said , How can a man that is a sinner do such miracles ? And there was a division among them .
text2: Parisaawetuppe issooti issooti , “ Hagaa oottida bitanee Sambbata higgiyaa naagenna gishshau , Xoossaa matappe yibeenna ” yaagidosona . SHin harati , “ Nagaranchcha asi hagaa mala wolqqaama malaataa waani oottanau danddayii ? ” yaagidosona ; yaagidi eti bantta giddon shaahettidosona .

text: They say unto the blind man again , What sayest thou of him , that he hath opened thine eyes ? He said , He is a prophet .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Parisaaweti bitaniyaa , “ I ne aifiyaa dooyido gishshau , abaa woigai ? ” yaagidosona . Yaagin bitanee , “ I hananabaa yootiyaagaa ” yaagiis .

text: But the Jews did not believe concerning him , that he had been blind , and received his sight , until they called the parents of him that had received his sight .
text2: Aihudati he xeellida bitaniyaa aayyiyoonne aawaa xeesidi oichchana gakkanaassi , bitanee qooqe gididoogaanne ha77i i xeelliyoogaa ammanibookkona .

text: And they asked them , saying , Is this your son , who ye say was born blind ? how then doth he now see ?
text2: Aihudati a aayyiyoonne aawaa , “ Intte , ' Qooqe gididi yelettiis ' giyo intte na7ai hagee ? Yaatin , ha77i waanidi xeellidee ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: His parents answered them and said , We know that this is our son , and that he was born blind :
text2: Oichchin bitaniyaa aayyiyaanne aawai , “ Hagee nu na7aa gididoogaanne qooqe i gididi yelettidoogaa nuuni eroos .

text: But by what means he now seeth , we know not ; or who hath opened his eyes , we know not : he is of age ; ask him : he shall speak for himself .
text2: SHin ha77i i waani xeellidaakko , nuuni erokko ; woi a aifiyaa ooni pattidaakko , nuuni erokko . A oichchite ; i gastta asa ; babaa haasayanau danddayees ! ” yaagidosona .

text: These words spake his parents , because they feared the Jews : for the Jews had agreed already , that if any man did confess that he was Christ , he should be put out of the synagogue .
text2: Bitaniyaa aayyiyaanne aawai Aihudatuyyo yayyido gishshau , hegaa giidosona ; aissi giikko , Aihudati Yesuusi Kiristtoosa yaagidi markkattiya urai de7ikko , he uraa Aihuda woosa keettaappe kessanau kasetidi qachchi wottidosona .

text: Therefore said his parents , He is of age ; ask him .
text2: A aayyiyaanne aawai , “ I gastta asa ; a oichchite ! ” giidoogee hegaassa .

text: Then again called they the man that was blind , and said unto him , Give God the praise : we know that this man is a sinner .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , qooqe gididi yelettida bitaniyaa eti naa77anttuwaa xeesidi , “ Xoossaa galata ; ha bitanee nagaranchcha gidiyoogaa nuuni eroos ” yaagidosona .

text: He answered and said , Whether he be a sinner or no , I know not : one thing I know , that , whereas I was blind , now I see .
text2: Yaagin bitanee , “ I nagaranchcha gidin , gidana xayin erikke ; taani qooqe gidiyoogaanne ha77i xeelliyoogaa he issibaa erais ” yaagiis .

text: Then said they to him again , What did he to thee ? how opened he thine eyes ?
text2: Eti zaaridi bitaniyaa , “ I neeyyo ai oottidee ? I ne aifiyaa waati pattidee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: He answered them , I have told you already , and ye did not hear : wherefore would ye hear it again ? will ye also be his disciples ?
text2: Yaagin i eta , “ Taani intteyyo yootarggaas ; siyibeekketa . Aissi naa77anttuwaa siyanau koyeetii ? Inttekka Yesuusa kaalliyaageeta gidanau koyeetiiyye ? ” yaagiis .

text: Then they reviled him , and said , Thou art his disciple ; but we are Moses ' disciples .
text2: Eti a cayidi , “ Neeni he bitaniyaa kaalliyaagaa ; nuuni Muusa kaalliyaageeta .

text: We know that God spake unto Moses : as for this fellow , we know not from whence he is .
text2: Xoossai Muuseyyo haasayidoogaa nuuni eroos ; shin ha bitaniyaa gidikko , i awappe yiidaakkonne nuuni erokko ” yaagidosona .

text: The man answered and said unto them , Why herein is a marvellous thing , that ye know not from whence he is , and yet he hath opened mine eyes .
text2: Yaagin bitanee , “ I awappe yiidaakkonne intte erennaagee garamissiyaabaa ; shin i ta aifiyaa pattiis !

text: Now we know that God heareth not sinners : but if any man be a worshipper of God , and doeth his will , him he heareth .
text2: Xoossaayyo yayyiya urainne Xoossai koyiyoobaa oottiya urai de7ikko , he uraabaa Xoossai siyiyoogaappe attin , nagaranchchatubaa siyenna .

text: Since the world began was it not heard that any man opened the eyes of one that was born blind .
text2: Qooqe gididi yelettida asa aifiyaa ooninne pattin , sa7ai merettoosappe doommin , siyetti erenna .

text: If this man were not of God , he could do nothing .
text2: Ha bitanee Xoossaappe yibeennabaa gidiyaakko , issibaanne oottanaukka danddayenna ” yaagiis .

text: They answered and said unto him , Thou wast altogether born in sins , and dost thou teach us ? And they cast him out .
text2: Eti zaaridi ayyo , “ Neeni nagaran yelettada diccidaagee nuna tamaarissanau koyai ? ” yaagidosona ; Aihuda woosa keettaappe a kare kessidosona .

text: Jesus heard that they had cast him out ; and when he had found him , he said unto him , Dost thou believe on the Son of God ?
text2: Eti bitaniyaa kare kessidoogaa Yesuusi siyiis ; Yesuusi bitaniyaa demmidi , “ Asa Na7aa ammanai ? ” yaagiis .

text: He answered and said , Who is he , Lord , that I might believe on him ?
text2: Bitanee Yesuusa , “ Godau , taani a ammananaadan i oonee ? Taayyo odarkkii ! ” yaagiis .

text: And Jesus said unto him , Thou hast both seen him , and it is he that talketh with thee .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi bitaniyaa , “ Neeni a be7adasa ; ha nenaara haasayiyaageekka a ” yaagiis .

text: And he said , Lord , I believe . And he worshipped him .
text2: Bitanee zaaridi , “ Godau , ammanais ” yaagidi Yesuusayyo goinniis .

text: And Jesus said , For judgment I am come into this world , that they which see not might see ; and that they which see might be made blind .
text2: Yesuusi , “ Qooqeti xeellana malanne xeelliyaageeti qooqana mala , taani pirddanau ha sa7aa yaas ” yaagiis .

text: And some of the Pharisees which were with him heard these words , and said unto him , Are we blind also ?
text2: Aara de7iya amarida Parisaaweti hegaa siyidi , “ Nuunikka qooqeeyye ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: Jesus said unto them , If ye were blind , ye should have no sin : but now ye say , We see ; therefore your sin remaineth .
text2: Oichchin Yesuusi , “ Intte qooqe gididaakko , intteyyo nagara gidenna ; shin ha77i intte , ' Nuuni xeelloos ' yaageeta ; intte nagaraara de7eeta ” yaagiis .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold , but climbeth up some other way , the same is a thief and a robber .
text2: Yesuusi , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; dorssaa birddiyau penggeera gelennan harasaara geliya ooninne kaisonne pangga .

text: But he that entereth in by the door is the shepherd of the sheep .
text2: SHin penggeera geliyaagee dorssaa heemmiya asa .

text: To him the porter openeth ; and the sheep hear his voice : and he calleth his own sheep by name , and leadeth them out .
text2: Penggiyaa naagiyaagee au penggiyaa dooyees ; dorssatikka a qaalaa siyana ; i ba dorssata eta sunttan sunttan xeesidi , kare kaalettana .

text: And when he putteth forth his own sheep , he goeth before them , and the sheep follow him : for they know his voice .
text2: I baageeta kare kessidoogaappe guyyiyan , etappe sinttaara hemettees ; etikka a qaalaa eriyo gishshau , a kaalloosona .

text: And a stranger will they not follow , but will flee from him : for they know not the voice of strangers .
text2: Hara uraa qaalaa eti erenna gishshau , appe baqatanaappe attin , a geeduwaa kaallokkona ” yaagiis .

text: This parable spake Jesus unto them : but they understood not what things they were which he spake unto them .
text2: Yesuusi etau ha leemisuwaa odiis ; shin i etau ai odiyaakkonne eti akeekibookkona .

text: Then said Jesus unto them again , Verily , verily , I say unto you , I am the door of the sheep .
text2: Yesuusi qassikka etau , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; taani dorssatuyyo pengge .

text: All that ever came before me are thieves and robbers : but the sheep did not hear them .
text2: Taappe kase yiida ubbai kaisonne pangga ; shin dorssati eti giyoogaa siyibookkona .

text: I am the door : by me if any man enter in , he shall be saved , and shall go in and out , and find pasture .
text2: Penggee tana ; tanan geliya ooninne attana . I gelananne kiyana ; qassi lo77o maatai de7iyoosaakka demmana .

text: The thief cometh not , but for to steal , and to kill , and to destroy : I am come that they might have life , and that they might have it more abundantly .
text2: Kaisoi wuuqqanau , woranaunne xaissanau yiyoogaappe attin , harabau yeenna ; taani etau de7oi de7ana malanne kumidi palahana mala yaas .

text: I am the good shepherd : the good shepherd giveth his life for the sheep .
text2: “ Taani dorssaa loitta heemmiyaagaa ; dorssaa loitti heemmiyaagee he dorssatu gishshau haiqqees .

text: But he that is an hireling , and not the shepherd , whose own the sheep are not , seeth the wolf coming , and leaveth the sheep , and fleeth : and the wolf catcheth them , and scattereth the sheep .
text2: Miishshaa ekkidi heemmiya urai wanggireelloi yiishin be7idi , dorssata yeggi bayidi baqatees . Aissi giikko , dorssati aageeta gidokkona ; qassi ikka dorssata heemmiyaagaa gidenna . Hegaa gishshau , wanggireelloi dorssata oiqqeesinne laalees .

text: The hireling fleeth , because he is an hireling , and careth not for the sheep .
text2: Miishshaa ekkidi heemmiyaagee miishshau heemmiyo gishshaunne dorssaabai a qofissenna gishshau , dorssata aggi bayidi baqatees .

text: I am the good shepherd , and know my sheep , and am known of mine .
text2: “ Taani dorssaa loitta heemmiyaagaa ; ta Aawai tana eriyoogaadan , taanikka qassi ta Aawaa erais . Hegaadankka , taani ta dorssata erais ; ta dorssatikka tana eroosona . Qassi taani ta dorssatu gishshau , haiqqanau koyais .

text: And other sheep I have , which are not of this fold : them also I must bring , and they shall hear my voice ; and there shall be one fold , and one shepherd .
text2: Ha wudiyan bainna hara dorssatikka tau de7oosona . Taani etakka ehaanau bessees . Qassi eti ta qaalaa siyana ; issi wudee de7ana ; heemmiyaageekka issuwaa gidana .

text: Therefore doth my Father love me , because I lay down my life , that I might take it again .
text2: “ Taani ta shemppuwaa zaarettada ekkana mala , aattada immanau koyiyo gishshau , ta Aawai tana siiqees .

text: No man taketh it from me , but I lay it down of myself . I have power to lay it down , and I have power to take it again . This commandment have I received of my Father .
text2: Taani dosada ta shemppuwaa aatta immiyoogaappe attin , taappe ooninne ekkenna . Taayyo ta shemppuwaa aatta immiyo maatai de7ees ; qassi zaarettada ekkanaukka maatai de7ees . Taani ha azazuwaa ta Aawaappe ekkaas ” yaagiis .

text: There was a division therefore again among the Jews for these sayings .
text2: He haasayaa gishshau , Aihudatu giddon qassikka shaahoi merettiis .

text: And many of them said , He hath a devil , and is mad ; why hear ye him ?
text2: Etappe dariya baggai , “ Aani xalahee de7ees ! I gooyees ! A haasayaa aissi siyeetii ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Others said , These are not the words of him that hath a devil . Can a devil open the eyes of the blind ?
text2: Harati qassi , “ Xalahee oiqqido asi hagaadan haasayenna ; xalahee qooqe asa aife xeelissanau danddayiiyye ? ” yaagidosona .

text: And it was at Jerusalem the feast of the dedication , and it was winter .
text2: Yerusalaamen Beeta Maqidasiyaa Ooraxissiyo Baalai gakkiis ; sa7ai he wode balggo .

text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Yesuusi Beeta Maqidasiyan Solomona baranddan , yaanne haanne hamettees .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Aihudati Yesuusa matan yuuyi aadhdhidi , “ Neeni nuna aude gakkanaassi sirissaidda wottuutee ? Neeni Kiristtoosa gidikko , nuuyyo geeshshada oda ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: Yesuusi etayyo zaaridi , “ Taani intteyyo yootaas ; shin tana ammanekketa ; taani ta Aawaa sunttan oottiyo oosoi tabaa markkattees .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: SHin taani intteyyo odidoogaadan , intte ta dorssa gidenna gishshau ammanekketa .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Ta dorssati ta qaalaa siyoosona ; taani eta erais ; etikka tana kaalloosona .

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: Taani etayyo merinaa de7uwaa immais ; qassi eti mulekka haiqqokkona . Ooninne ta kushiyaappe eta wotti ekkanau danddayenna .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: Eta taayyo immida ta Aawai ooppenne aadhdhees ; ooninne ta Aawaa kushiyaappe eta wotti ekkanau danddayenna .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Taanne ta Aawai issuwaa ” yaagiis .

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: Aihudati Yesuusa caddanau qassikka shuchchaa denttidosona .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Taani oottanau ta Aawai taayyo immido daro lo77o oosuwaa inttena bessaas ; hegeetuppe augeetu gishshau , tana shuchchan caddanau koyeetii ? ” yaagiis .

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Aihudati zaaridi , “ Nuuni nena lo77o ooso gishshau , shuchchan caddanau koyokko ; shin neeni Xoossaa cayiyo gishshaunne qassi asa gidaidda ne huuphiyaa Xoossaa oottido gishshau , caddanau koyoos ! ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Intte higgiyan Xoossai , ' Intte xoossata ' giidoogee xaafettibeennee ?

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Xoossaa maxaafata laammanau danddayettenna ; Xoossai ba qaalai yiido asata , ' xoossata ' giidi xeesidobaa gidikko ,

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: taani , ' Taani Xoossaa Na7aa ' giido gishshau , ta Aawai anjjidi , sa7aa kiittido tana , ' Xoossaa cayaasa ' yaageetii ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Taani ta Aawai oottiyoogaa oottana xayikko , tana ammanoppite .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: SHin taani oottiyaabaa gidikko , harai atto intte tana ammanana xayikkokka , ta Aawai tanan de7iyoogaanne taanikka ta Aawan de7iyoogaa eranaadaaninne akeekanaadan , ta oosuwaa ammanite ” yaagiis .

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Qassikka eti a oiqqanau koyidosona ; shin i etappe baqatiis .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Yohaannisi kase xammaqiyoosaa Yorddaanoosa SHaafaappe hefintti Yesuusi pinnidi , yaani de7iis .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Daro asai Yesuusakko yiidi , “ Yohaannisi wolqqaama malaata oottibeenna ; shin i ha bitaniyaabaa haasayidobai ubbai tuma ” yaagidosona .

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Yaani daro asai Yesuusa ammaniis .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Biitaaniyaa giyo qeeri kataman Al77aazara giyo issi bitanee harggiis ; he katamai Mairaamanne i michchiyaa Martta de7ido katamaa .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: Godaa tohuwaa shittuwaa tiyada , ba binnaanan a tohuwaa quccidaara he Mairaamo ; harggidaagee qassi i ishaa Al77aazara .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , michchentti , “ Godau , neeni siiqiyoogee harggiis ” giidi Yesuusayyo kiittidosona .

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa siyido wode , “ Taani Xoossaa Na7ai harggiyaa gaasuwan bonchchettana mala , Xoossaa bonchchuwaassi ha harggee Al77aazara oiqqidoogaappe attin , woriya hargge gidenna ” yaagiis .

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Yesuusi Martto , i michchiyoonne Al77aazara siiqees ;

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Al77aazari harggidoogaa Yesuusi siyido wode , ba de7iyoosan naa77u gallassaa pe7iis .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi ba erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Naa77anttuwaa Yihudaa biitti boos ” yaagiis .

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati zaaridi , “ Tamaarissiyaagoo , guutta wodeppe kase Aihudati nena shuchchan caddanau koyidosona ; qassikka yaa buutee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Issi gallassan tammanne naa77u saatee de7ees ; de7enneeyye ? Gallassi hemettiya asi xubettenna ; aissi giikko , i ha sa7aa poo7uwaa be7ees .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: SHin qammi hemettiya urai de7ikko , poo7oi aani bainna gishshau , xubettees ” yaagiis .

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan , qassikka etau , “ Nu dabboi Al77aazari xiskkiis ; shin xiskkuwaappe a denttanau taani bais ” yaagiis .

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati zaaridi , “ Godau , i xiskkidabaa gidikko , denddana ” yaagidosona .

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Al77aazari haiqqidoogaa Yesuusi odiis ; shin Al77aazari xiskkidi zin77idoogaa odiis giidi , eti qoppidosona .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yesuusi geeshshidi eta , “ Al77aazari haiqqiis .

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: Intte ammanana mala , taani he sohuwan de7ennaagaayyo , intte gishshau ufaittais . SHin hinddite ; akko boos ” yaagiis .

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Menttiyaa giyo Toomaasi ba lagge erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Aara haiqqanau nuunikka qassi boos ! ” yaagiis .

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Yesuusi gakkiyo wode , Al77aazari moogettoosappe oiddu gallassa gidiis .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: Biitaanee Yerusalaameppe naa77u kilo meetire keenaa haakkees .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Daro Aihudati Marttonne Mairaamo eta ishai haiqqidoogau minttettanau yiidosona .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Martta Yesuusi yiidoogaa siyada , a mokkanau kiyaasu ; shin Mairaama sooni attaasu .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Martta Yesuusa , “ Godau , neeni hagan de7idabaa gidiyaakko , ta ishai haiqqenna .

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: SHin neeni woossiyoobaa ai gidikkokka , Xoossai neeyyo harai atto ha77ikka immanaagaa taani erais ” yaagaasu .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: Yesuusi , “ Ne ishai haiquwaappe denddana ” yaagiis .

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: Yaagin Martta , “ Wurssettaa gallassi haiquwaappe denddanaagaa taani erais ” yaagaasu .

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: Yesuusi iyyo , “ Taani denddonne de7o ; tana ammaniya urai harai atto , haiqqikkokka paxa de7ana .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Qassi paxa de7iya urainne tana ammaniya urai ubbai mulekka haiqqenna ; hegaa neeni ammanai ? ” yaagiis .

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Martta zaarada , “ Godau , ee taani ammanais ; neeni Xoossaa Na7aa , sa7aa yaanau de7iya Kiristtoosa gidiyoogaa taani ammanais ” yaagaasu .

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Martta hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan , baada ba michcheeyyo geeman xeesada , “ Tamaarissiyaagee yiidi , nena koyees ” yaagaasu .

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Mairaama hegaa siyido wode , eesuwan dendda eqqada Yesuusakko baasu .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Yesuusi Martta a mokkidosan de7eesippe attin , biron qeeri katamaa gakkiichchibeenna .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: Mairaamo minttettiiddi , sooni iira de7iya Aihudati , a eesuwan dendda eqqada kare kiyiyoogaa be7idi , Al77aazari moogettido gonggoluwaa baada yaani yeekkanau hanausu yaagidi , o kaallidi kiyidosona .

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Mairaama Yesuusi de7iyoosaa baada Yesuusa be7ido wode , a tohuwaa bollan kunddaasu ; kunddada , “ Godau , neeni hagan de7idobaa gidiyaakko , ta ishai haiqqenna shin ! ” yaagaasu .

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Yesuusi a yeekkiyoogaanne qassi iira yiida Aihudatikka yeekkiyoogaa be7idi , ba wozanan daro mishettiis ; qassi tookki shemppiis .

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: Eta , “ Awan moogidetii ? ” yaagidi oichchin , “ Godau , yaada be7a ” yaagidi zaaridosona .

text: Jesus wept .
text2: Yesuusi afuxxiis .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Aihudati , “ Al77aazara i ai keenaa siiqiyaakko be7ite ! ” yaagidosona .

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: SHin etappe issooti issooti , “ Hagee qooqe bitaniyaa xeelissidaagee ha bitanee haiqqenna mala teqqanau danddayennee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Yesuusi qassikka wozanappe qarettidi , Al77aazari moogettido gonggoluwaakko biis ; he gonggoloi shuchchan qum77etti uttiis .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Yesuusi , “ SHuchchaa pogite ! ” yaagidi azaziis . Haiqqida bitaniyaa michchiyaa Martta , “ Godau , i haiqqoosappe oiddu gallassa gidido gishshau , ha77i xinqqana ! ” yaagaasu .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: Yesuusi Martto , “ Ammaniyaabaa gidikko , neeni Xoossaa bonchchuwaa be7anaagaa taani neeyyo yootabeikkinaa ? ” yaagiis .

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Eti shuchchaa denttidosona ; denttin Yesuusi saluwaa pude xeellidi , “ Aawau , taani giyoogaa neeni siyido gishshau , nena galatais .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Neeni ubba wode siyiyoogaa taani erais ; shin hagan yuuyi aadhdhidi eqqida asai neeni tana kiittidoogaa ammanana mala , hagaa taani eta gishshau gais ” yaagiis .

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan , ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Al77aazaraa , haa kiya ! ” yaagiis .

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Haiqqida bitaniyau kusheenne tohoi shaluwan qashetti uttidaashiininne a som77oikka afalan kametti uttidaashin kiyiis . Kiyin Yesuusi eta , “ Birshshidi aggi bayite ! Bo ! ” yaagiis .

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Mairaamikko yiida Aihudatuppe daroti Yesuusi oottidoogaa be7idi , a ammanidosona .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: SHin etappe issooti issooti Parisaawetukko biidi , Yesuusi oottidoogaa etau odidosona .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , qeese halaqatinne Parisaaweti yaa7aa shiishshidi , “ Ha bitanee daro wolqqaama malaataa oottiyo gishshau , ai oottanee ?

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: Nuuni a co77u giidi , aggi bayikko , asai ubbai a ammanana ; qassi Roome biittaa asati yiidi , nu Beeta Maqidasiyaanne nu asaa xaissana ” yaagidosona .

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Etappe issoi Qayaafa giyoogee , he laitti qeese ubbatu halaqa gididaagee , “ Intte ainne erekketa !

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: Asai ubbai xayiyoogaappe asa ubbaa gishshau , issi asi haiqqiyoogee keha gidiyoogaa intte akeekite ” yaagiis .

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: I hegaa baappe gibeenna ; shin he laitti qeese ubbatu halaqa gidiyo gishshau , Yesuusi Aihuda asaa gishshau haiqqanau bessiyoogaa hananabaa yootiis .
