text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: Qassi Yesuusi Aihuda asaa xalaalaayyo haiqqenna ; shin laaletti de7iya Xoossaa naata issippe shiishshanau haiqqana .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: He gallassappe doommidi , eti a woranau maqettidosona .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yesuusi Aihudatu giddon qoncciyan yaa haa hemettibeenna ; shin bazzuwaa lanqqiyan de7iya biitti , Efireema giyo qeeri katamaa biis . Biidi ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura he sohuwan takkiis .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Aihudati Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassai matiis ; qassi daro asai bana geeshshanau , Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassai gakkanaappe kase he biittaappe Yerusalaame biis .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Eti Yesuusa koyoosona ; Beeta Maqidasiyan eqqidi , “ Ai qoppeetii ? Paasikaa bonchchiyoosaa Yesuusi yeennee ? ” yaagidi issoi issuwaa oichchidosona .

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Qassi qeesetu halaqatinne Parisaaweti Yesuusa qachchanau , i de7iyoosaa eriya ooninne banttayyo yootana mala azazidosona .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassaappe usuppun gallassaa kasetidi , Yesuusi i haiquwaappe denttido Al77aazari de7iyo Biitaaniyaa giyo katamaa biis .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: He sohuwan eti au kahuwaa kattidosona ; Al77aazari aara issippe uttidaashin , Martta kahuwaa kattausu .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: Mairaama daro miishshan baizettiya narddoose giyo geeshsha shittuwaa ehaada , Yesuusa tohuwaa tiyaasu ; tiyada ba binnaanan a tohuwaa quccaasu ; keetta ubbai shittuwaa sawuwan tonggu gees .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: SHin Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi , Yesuusa aatti immanaagee , Yihudaa Asqqorootu ,

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: “ Ha shittoi issi xeetanne ishatamu biran baizettin , aibissi birai hiyyeesau imettennee ? ” yaagiis .

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: I kaiso gidido gishshau , hegaa giisippe attin , hiyyeesau qarettidi gibeenna ; i miishshaa qarcciitaa oiqqiyaagaa gidiyo gishshau , ubba wode appe baayyo ekkees .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Yesuusi , “ Bau de7iyaabaa taani moogettiyo gallassau minjju ; o aggite .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Hiyyeesati ubba wode inttenaara de7ana ; shin taani ubba wode inttenaara de7ikke ” yaagiis .

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Aihudatuppe daro asai Yesuusi Biitaaniyan de7iyoogaa siyidi , yaa biis ; eti Yesuusa be7ana gishsha xalaalau gidennan , i haiquwaappe denttido Al77aazarakka be7anau biidosona .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , qeese halaqati Al77aazarakka qassi woranau maqettidosona .

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: Aissi giikko , Al77aazara gaasuwan daro Aihudati banttana kaalettiyaageeta aggi bayidi , Yesuusa ammanoosona .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Wonttetta gallassi Paasikaa bonchchiyoosaa yiida daro asai Yesuusi Yerusalaame biyoogaa siyiis .

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: Siyidi zambbaa haittaa oiqqidi , a mokkanau kiyidosona . Bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Xoossai galatetto ! Xoossaa sunttan yiya Israa7eela kawoi anjjettidaagaa ! ” yaagidosona .

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Xiyoone katamau , yayyoppa ! Be7a , ne kawoi hare maraa bolli uttidi yees ” giyoogaadan , Yesuusi hare maraa demmidi , a toggiis .

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati hegaa kase akeekibookkona ; shin Yesuusi bonchchettidoogaappe guyyiyan , Xoossaa maxaafai hegaa ubbaa giidoogaanne qassi etikka hegaa ubbaa Yesuusayyo oottidoogaa hassayidosona .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Al77aazari moogettido gonggoluwaappe Yesuusi a xeesidi , haiquwaappe denttido wode , Yesuusaara de7iya daro asai Yesuusayyo markkattiis .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Daro asai a mokkanau kiyidoogee , i he wolqqaama malaataa oottido gishshassa .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Parisaaweti issoi issuwaa , “ Intte ainne oottanau danddayennaagaa be7eetii ! Be7ite , dere ubbai a geeduwaa kaallees ” yaagidosona .

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi goinnanau Yerusalaame biidaageetu giddon issi issi Giriike asati de7oosona .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Eti Galiila biittan Beetasaida giyo katamaappe yiida Piliphphoosakko biidi , “ Godau , nuuni Yesuusa be7anau koyoos ” yaagidi woossidosona .

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: Piliphphoosi biidi , Inddiraasayyo odiis ; odin naa77aikka biidi , Yesuusayyo odidosona .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: Yesuusi etau hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Taani , Asa Na7ai , bonchchettiyo saatee gakkiis .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; issi gistte aifiyaa biittan wodhdhada wooqqana xayikko , barkka attausu . SHin he gisttee aifiyaa wooqqikko , daro aifiyaa aifausu .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Ba shemppuwaa siiqiya ooninne bashshees ; qassi ba shemppuwaa ha sa7an ixxiya ooninne merinaa de7uwau ashshees .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Ooninne tau oottikko , tana kaallanau bessees ; qassi taani de7iyoosan ta ashkkaraikka de7ana . Tau oottiya oonanne , ta Aawaikka a bonchchana .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: “ Ha77i ta shemppoi daro un77ettiis ; yaatin woigoo ? Taani , ' Ta Aawau , tana ha saateeppe ashsharkkii ' yaagoo ? CHii , taani ha saatiyan yiidoogee hagaa gishshassa .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Ta Aawau , ne sunttaa bonchcha ” yaagiis . He wode saluwaappe , “ Taani ta sunttaa bonchchaas ; qassikka gujjada bonchchana ” yaagiya qaalai yiis .

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: He sohuwan eqqida daro asai he qaalaa siyidi , “ Hegee dadaa ” yaagiis . Harati qassi , “ Kiitanchchai ayyo haasayiis ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi eta , “ Ha qaalai intte gishshau yiidoogaappe attin , ta gishshassa gidenna .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Ha sa7ai pirddettiyo wodee ha77a ; ha sa7aa haariyaagee ha77i kare olettana .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Qassi taani masqqaliyaa bolli kaqettiyo wode , asa ubbaa taakko ekkana ” yaagiis .

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: I hegaa giidoogee ai mala haiquwaa i haiqqanaakkonne eta erissanaassa .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Daro asai zaaridi Yesuusa , “ Nu higgee Kiristtoosi merinau de7iyoogaa odees . Yaatin , neeni woigada , ' Asa Na7ai masqqaliyaa bolli kaqettana ' gai ? He Asa Na7ai oonee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Poo7oi inttenaara guutta wodiyaa takkana . Intteyyo xumenna mala , poo7oi de7ishin , poo7uwan hemettite . Xuman hemettiya urai au biyaakkonne erenna .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Poo7uwaa asa gidana mala , intteyyo poo7oi de7ishin , poo7uwaa ammanite ” yaagiis . Yesuusi hegaa haasayidoogaappe guyyiyan , biidi etappe geemettiis .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: I hegaa keena wolqqaama malaataa eta sinttan oottikkokka , hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasi , “ Godau , nu markkatettaa ooni ammanidee ? Godai ba wolqqaa oona bessidee ? ” giidoogee tuma gidana mala , eti a ammanibookkona .

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Isiyaasi qassikka , “ Eta aifee xeellenna mala , eta wozanaikka akeekenna mala , eti Xoossaakko simmin , i eta pattenna mala , Xoossai eta aifiyaa qooqissiis . Eta wozanaa dammissiis ” giido gishshau , eti ammananau danddayibookkona .

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: Isiyaasi Yesuusa bonchchuwaa be7ido gishshaunne qassi abaa haasayido gishshau , hegaa giis .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Hegaa gidinkka , harai atto Aihudatu halaqatuppekka daroti Yesuusa ammanidosona . SHin Parisaaweti banttana Aihudatu woosa keettaappe kessoosona giidi yayyido gishshau , ammanida giidi markkattibookkona .

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: Aissi giikko , eti Xoossaa sabaappe aattidi , asa sabaa siiqidosona .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Yesuusi ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi yaagiis ; “ Tana ammaniya ooninne tana kiittidaagaakka ammaniyoogaappe attin , ta xalaalaa ammanenna .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Tana be7iya ooninne tana kiittidaagaakka be7ees .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Tana ammaniya ubbai xuman de7enna mala , taani poo7o gidada sa7aa yaas .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: Ta qaalaa siyidi azazettenna uraa oonanne taani pirddikke ; aissi giikko , taani sa7aa ashshanau yiidoogaappe attin , pirddanau yabeikke .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Tana ixxiya oonanne qassi ta qaalaa ekkenna oonanne pirddiyaagee de7ees . Taani yootido qaalai wurssettaa gallassi he uraa pirddana .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani hagaa taappe haasayabeikke ; shin tana kiittida ta Aawai taani gaanaagaanne haasayanaagaa tana azaziis .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Qassi a azazoi merinaa de7uwaa ehiyoogaa taani erais ; hegaa gishshau , taani yootiyoogee ta Aawai tana yoota giidi odidoogaa ” yaagiis .

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassai gakkanaappe kasetidi , ha sa7aappe shaahettidi , Aawaakko biyo wodee gakkidoogaa Yesuusi eriis ; ha sa7an de7iya baageeta ubba wode siiqiis ; wurssettai gakkanaassi eta siiqiis .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Yesuusinne erissiyo ashkkarati kahuwaa miishin , Simoona na7aa Yihudaa Asqqorootu Yesuusa aatti immanaadan , xalahe halaqai a qofissi wottiis .

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: Yesuusi ba Aawai ubbabaa a kushiyan wottidoogaa , qassi Xoossaa matappe i yiidoogaanne , simmidi akko baanaagaa eriis .

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: Yesuusi miyoosaappe denddi eqqidi , bolla bagga maayuwaa qaari wottidi , pooxaa ba xeessan gixxiis .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , haattaa kuixaaruwan tigidi , ba erissiyo ashkkaratu tohuwaa meecciyoogaanne ba xeessan gixxido pooxan qucciyoogaa doommiis .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Yesuusi Simoon PHeexiroosakko yin PHeexiroosi , “ Godau , neeni ta tohuwaa meeccanau hanaiyye ? ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi a , “ Taani oottiyoogaa neeni ha77i erakka ; shin guyyeppe akeekana ” yaagiis .

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: Yaagin PHeexiroosi , “ Neeni ta tohuwaa mulekka meeccakka ! ” yaagiis . Yesuusi a , “ Taani ne tohuwaa meeccana xayikko , neeyyoonne taayyoonne issippetetti baawa ” yaagidi zaariis .

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: Yaagin PHeexiroosi Yesuusa , “ Godau , yaatikko , ta tohuwaa xalaalaa meeccoppa ; ta kushiyaakka ta huuphiyaakka meecca ! ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Bollaa meecettiichchida urai ooninne tohoppe harabaa meecettanau koshshenna ; ayyo ubbasaikka geeshsha . Qassi inttekka geeshsha ; shin ubbai geeshsha gidekketa ” yaagiis .

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Aissi giikko , Yesuusi bana aatti immana urai oonakkonne erees ; i , “ Intte ubbai geeshsha gidekketa ” giidoogee hegaassa .

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Eta tohuwaa meeccidoogaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi ba maayuwaa maayidi , ba sohuwaa guyye simmidi biidi uttiis ; uttidi eta yaagiis ; “ Taani intteyyo oottidoogaa akeekeetii ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Intte tana tamaarissiyaagoonne Godau geeta ; taani he intte giyoogaa gidiyo gishshau , loittideta .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Taani intteyyo Godanne inttena tamaarissiyaagaa gidaidda , intte tohuwaa meeccidabaa gidikko , inttekka issoi issuwaa tohuwaa meeccanau bessees .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani intteyyo oottidoogaadan , inttekka oottana mala , intteyyo leemiso gidaas .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; ashkkari ba godaappe aadhdhenna . Qassi kiitettida uraikka bana kiittidaagaappe aadhdhenna .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Intte hegaa eridi oottiyaabaa gidikko anjjettidaageeta .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: “ Taani intte ubbaabaa haasayikke . Taani dooridoogeeta erais ; shin Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Taani barssidoogee ta kushiyaa saxxiis ' giidoogee tuma gidanau bessees .

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: Hegee haniyo wode taani tana gidiyoogaa intte ammanana mala , hegee hananaappe kasetada intteyyo haara odais .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; taani kiittiyo oonanne mokkiya urai tanakka mokkees ; qassi tana mokkiya ooninne tana kiittidaagaa mokkees ” yaagiis .

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa haasayidoogaappe guyyiyan , ba wozanan daro metootiis ; metootidi , “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; tana intteppe issoi aatti immana ” giidi qoncciyan odiis .

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: I obaa haasayiyaakkonne , erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo mulekka erettennan ixxin , issoi issuwaa xeellidosona .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi , Yesuusi siiqiyoogee , Yesuusa matan uttiis .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Simoon PHeexiroosi he erissiyo ashkkaraa qim77otidi , “ I oona giyaakko , ane a oichcha ” yaagiis .

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Hegaa gishshau , he erissiyo ashkkarai Yesuusa haittaakko shiiqidi , “ Godau , i oonee ? ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani oittan cambbaa tushkkada immiyoogee a ” yaagiis . Qassi oittaa mentti ekkidi , cambbaa tushkkidi , Simoona na7aa , Yihudaa Asqqorootuyyo immiis .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Yihudai oittaa menttettaa ekkidoogaappe guyyiyan , Seexaanai sohuwaarakka Yihudan geliis . Yesuusi a , “ Neeni oottanaagaa eesuwan ootta ! ” yaagiis .

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: SHin he sohuwan uttidaageetuppe ooninne Yesuusi hegaa a aissi giidaakkonne eribeenna .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Yihudai miishshaa qarcciitaa oiqqiyo gishshau , erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issooti issooti Yesuusi Yihudaa , “ Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassau banttana koshshiyaabaa baada shamma woi hiyyeesau muxuwaataa imma giis ” yaagidi qoppidosona .

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Yihudai oittaa me7ettaa ekkidi , sohuwaarakka kare kiyiis ; he wode sa7ai qamma .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: Yihudai kare kiyidoogaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi yaagiis ; “ Ha77i taani Asa Na7ai bonchchettaas : Xoossaikka ta baggaara bonchchettiis .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Xoossai ta baggaara , Asa Na7aa baggaara bonchchettikko , i ba huuphen tana Asa Na7aa bonchchana ; qassi i tana sohuwaara bonchchana .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: Ta naatoo , taani inttenaara daro wodiyaa gam77ikke . Intte tana koyana ; shin taani Aihudata , ' Taani biyoosaa intte baanau danddayekketa ' giidoogaadan , intteyyookka ha77i odais .

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: Taani inttena ooratta azazuwaa azazais ; issoi issuwaa siiqite . Taani inttena siiqidoogaadankka , intte issoi issuwaa siiqana bessees .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Intte issoi issuwaara siiqettikko , ta erissiyo ashkkarata gidiyoogaa asai ubbai erana ” yaagiis .

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: Simoon PHeexiroosi Yesuusa , “ Godau , neeni au bai ? ” yaagiis . Oichchin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani biyoosaa neeni ha77i tana kaallanau danddayakka ; shin guyyeppe kaallana ” yaagiis .

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: Yaagin PHeexiroosi , “ Godau , taani nena ha77i kaallanau aissi danddayikkinaa ? Taani ne gishshau , haiqqanaukka giiga uttaas ! ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ta gishshau haiqqanau hai tumu giiga uttadii ? Taani neeyyo tumaa odais ; kuttoi waassanaappe kase , neeni tana heezzutoo kaddana ” yaagiis .

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarata , “ Intte wozanai hirggoppo ; Xoossaa ammanite ; tanakka ammanite .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Ta Aawaa keettan daro sohoi de7ees . Hegaa gidennaakko , taani intteyyo hegaa yootikke ; taani intteyyo sohuwaa giigissanau bais .

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Taani baada sohuwaa giigissoogaappe guyyiyan , taani de7iyoosan inttekka de7ana mala , simmada yaada inttena taakko ekka efaana .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Qassi intte taani biyo ogiyaa ereeta ” yaagiis .

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: Yaagin Toomaasi , “ Godau , neeni biyoosaa nuuni erokko ; ogiyaa waanidi eranau danddayiyoonii ? ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Ogee , tumainne de7oi tana ; ta baggaarappe attin , ooninne ta Aawaakko baanau danddayenna .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: Intte tana eriyaabaa gidiyaakko , ta Aawaakka erana ; ha77ippe doommidi , intte a ereetanne qassi a be7ideta ” yaagiis .

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: Piliphphoosi Yesuusa , “ Godau , Aawaa nuna bessa ; hegee nuuyyo gidana ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi yaagiis ; “ Taani hagaa keena wodiyaa inttenaara de7inkka , tana erikkii Piliphphoosaa ? Tana be7ida urai Aawaakka be7iis ; yaatin , neeni woigada , ' Aawaa nuna bessa ' gai ?

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: Taani Aawaa giddon de7iyoogaa qassi Aawaikka ta giddon de7iyoogaa neeni ammanikkiiyye ? Taani intteyyo odiyo qaalaa taani taappe odikke ; shin ta giddon de7iya Aawai ba oosuwaa oottees .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Taani Aawaa giddon de7iyoogaaninne qassi Aawaikka ta giddon de7iyoogan tana ammanite ; hegee xayikko , abau a oosuwaabau tana ammanite .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: “ Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; tana ammaniya urai taani oottiyo oosuwaa oottana . Taani Aawaakko biyo gishshau , he urai hagaappe aadhdhiya oosuwaa oottana .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Aawai Na7aa baggaara , ta baggaara bonchchettana mala , ta sunttan intte woossiyo ubbabaa taani intteyyo polana .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: Intte ta sunttan tana ai oichchikkokka , taani polana .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: “ Intte tana siiqiyaabaa gidikko , ta azazuwaa naagana .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Taani Aawaa woossana ; inttenaara merinau de7ana mala , tumatettaa Ayyaanaa , hara minttettiyaagaa intteyyo i immana . Ha sa7ai he tumatettaa Ayyaanaa be7ennaagaanne erennaagaa gidiyo gishshau , a ekkanau danddayenna ; shin i inttenaara de7iyo gishshaunne intte giddon de7ana gishshau , intte a ereeta .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: “ Taani inttena intterkka yeggabeikke ; taani simmada inttekko yaana .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Guutta wodiyaappe guyyiyan , sa7ai tana naa77antto be7enna ; shin intte tana be7ana ; taani paxa de7iyo gishshau , inttekka qassi paxa de7ana .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Taani ta Aawaa giddon de7iyoogaanne intte ta giddon de7iyoogaa , qassi taani intte giddon de7iyoogaanne intte he gallassi erana .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: “ Ta azazoi a matan de7iyo asi , qassi he azazuwaakka naagiyaagee , i tana siiqiya asa . Tana siiqiya asa ta Aawaikka siiqees ; taanikka a siiqais . Taani ayyo qonccana ” yaagiis .

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: Yihudaa Asqqoroota gidenna Yihudai Yesuusa , “ Godau , neeni ne huuphiyaa sa7aa bessennan , nuna bessana giyoogaa woigada gai ? ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Tana siiqiya ooninne ta qaalaa naagana ; ta Aawai a siiqana ; qassi ta Aawainne taaninne akko yiidi , aara de7ana .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Tana siiqenna urai ooninne ta qaalau azazettenna ; intte siyiyo qaalai tana kiittida Aawaagaa gidiyoogaappe attin , taagaa gidenna .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: “ Taani inttenaara issippe de7aidda hagaa intteyyo odaas ;

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: shin Geeshsha Ayyaanai , minttettiyaagee , Aawai ta sunttan kiittanaagee , inttena ubbabaa tamaarissana . Taani intteyyo odido ubbabaakka inttena hassayissana .

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: “ Taani sarotettaa inttenaara wottais ; ta sarotettaa intteyyo immais . Taani sa7ai immiyo sarotettaa malaa immikke . Intte hirggoppitenne yayyoppite .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: Taani intteyyo , ' Taani bais ; shin simmada inttekko yaana ' giidoogaa siyideta ; intte tana siiqidobaa gidiyaakko , taappe Aawai dariyo gishshau , taani Aawaakko biyoogan intte ufaittana shin .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Hegee haniyo wode intte ammanana mala , hegee hanennan de7ishin , haara kasetada taani intteyyo odarggaas .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: “ Ha sa7aa haariyaagee yiyo gishshau , taani hagaappe sinttan inttenaara keehi haasayikke . Tana i ainne oottanau danddayenna .

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: SHin taani Aawaa siiqiyoogaa sa7ai eranau bessees ; qassi taanikka Aawai tana azazidoogaadan oottais . Denddi eqqite ; hagaappe boos .

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: “ Taani woine giyo turaayyo tumu ano ; goshshanchchai ta Aawaa .

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Ta giddon de7iya aife aifenna turaa mara ubbaa i karees ; aifiya turaa mara ubbai kaseegaappe keehi aifanaadan , he maraa xeeraa i qanxxana .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Taani intteyyo ha77i odido qaalaa gaasuwan , intte geeshsha .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: Ta giddon de7ite ; taanikka intte giddon de7ana . Woiniyaa turaa marai anoora issippe de7ennan xayikko , he marai barkka aife aifanau danddayennaagaadan , inttekka ta giddon de7ennan xayikko , aife aifanau danddayekketa .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: “ Taani woine turaayyo ano ; intte he turaa marata . Ta giddon de7iya urai , taanikka a giddon de7iyo urai , daro aife aifana ; aissi giikko , taani bainnan intterkka ainne oottanau danddayekketa .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Ta giddon de7enna urai tura maradan , karen yeggin melana ; melidaagaa shiishshidi taman wottin , i eexxana .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: Intte ta giddon de7ikko , qassi ta qaalaikka intte giddon de7ikko , intte koyidobaa aiba gidinkka woossite ; intte ekkana .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: Intte daro aifiyaa aifikkonne qassi ta erissiyo ashkkarata gidikko , hegan ta Aawai bonchchettana .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: Aawai tana siiqidoogaadan , taanikka inttena siiqaas ; ta siiquwan de7ite .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Taani ta Aawaa azazuwaa naagada a siiquwan de7idoogaadan , inttekka ta azazuwaa naagikko , ta siiquwan de7ana .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: “ Ta ufaissai inttenaara de7ana malanne , inttekka daro ufaittana mala , taani hagaa intteyyo yootaas .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: Ta azazoi hagaa ; taani inttena siiqiyoogaadan , inttekka issoi issuwaara siiqettite .

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Ba shemppuwaa ba laggiyaayyo aattidi immiyoogaappe aadhdhiya siiqoi ooyyookka baawa .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Taani inttena azazidobaa ubbaa oottikko , intte ta laggeta .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: “ Ashkkarai ba godai oottiyoobaa erenna gishshau , taani inttena hagaappe sinttau ashkkarata giikke ; shin taani inttena ta laggeta gaas . Aissi giikko , ta Aawaappe siyido ubbabaa taani intteyyo yootaas .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Taani inttena dooridoogaappe attin , intte tana dooribeekketa . Intte biidi aifiyaa aifana mala , taani inttena sunttaas . Qassi Aawaikka intte ta sunttan woossidobaa ubbaa immana .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Taani inttena azaziyoogee hagaa ; issoi issuwaara siiqettite .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: “ Sa7ai inttena ixxikko , kasetidi tana ixxidoogaa akeekite .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Intte sa7aabaa gididaakko , sa7ai babaadan inttena siiqana ; shin taani inttena sa7aappe dooridoogaappe attin , intte sa7aabaa gidekketa ; sa7ai inttena ixxiyoogee hegaassa .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: ' Ashkkarai ba godaappe darenna ' gaada taani intteyyo odidoogaa hassayite . Eti tana yedettidabaa gidikko , inttenakka yedettana . Eti ta qaalaa naagidabaa gidikko , intte qaalaakka naagana .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: SHin eti tana kiittidaagaa erenna gishshau , ha ubbaa ta gaasuwan eti intte bolli wottana .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: Taani yaada etau odennabaa gidiyaakko , etau nagara gidenna ; shin ha77i eti oottiyo nagaraa gaasoyiyoobi baawa .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Tana ixxiyaagee ta Aawaakka ixxees . Ooninne oottibeenna oosuwaa eta giddon taani oottabeennabaa gidiyaakko , etau nagara gidennan attana ; shin ha77i eti taani oottido oosuwaa be7idi , tanakka ta Aawaakka ixxidosona .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: SHin eta higgiyan , ' Tana coo ixxidosona ' geetettidi xaafettidaagee polettana mala , hagee haniis .

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: “ SHin Aawaappe yiya tumatettaa Ayyaanai minttettiyaagee yaana . Taani Aawaappe intteyyo a yeddana ; qassi i tabaa markkattana .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Inttekka qassi kaseesappe doommidi , tanaara de7iyo gishshau , tabaa markkattana .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: “ Taani hagaa intte xubettenna mala , intteyyo odaas .

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Eti inttena bantta Aihuda woosa keettaappe kessi yeddana . Hegaa bolli qassi inttena woriya urai Xoossau oottiyoobaa au milatiyo wodee yaana .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Eti hegaa intte bolli oottiyoogee tananne Aawaa erenna gishshassa .

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: SHin eti hegaa intte bolli oottiyo wodee gakkiyo wode , taani intteyyo odidoogaa intte hassayana mala , taani intteyyo hagaa odaas . “ Taani inttenaara de7iyo gishshau , koiro hegaa intteyyo odabeikke .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: SHin ha77i taani tana kiittidaagaakko bais ; shin intteppe ooninne , ' Au bai ? ' giidi tana oichchiyai baawa .

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: SHin taani hagaa odido gishshau , intte wozanan daro azzanoi de7ees .

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: SHin taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; taani biyoogee intteyyo keha . Aissi giikko , taani baana xayikko , minttettiyaagee inttekko yeenna ; shin taani biikko , a inttekko yeddana .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: Qassi minttettiyaagee yiidi , nagaraabaa , xillotettaabaanne pirddaabaa ha sa7aa asaa erissana .

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: Nagaraabai asai tana ammanenna gishshassa .

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: Xillotettaabai qassi taani Aawaakko biyo gishshau , intte tana naa77anttuwaa be7ekketa .

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: Xoossaa pirddaabai qassi sa7aa haariyaagee pirddettiichchido gishshassa .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: “ Taani intteyyo odiyoobai darobai de7ees ; shin ha77i intteyyo gelenna .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: Tumatettaa Ayyaanai yiyo wode , inttena tumatetta ubbaakko efaana . Aissi giikko , i ba siyidobaa odanaappe attin , baappe ainne odenna . Qassi sinttappe yaanabaa intteyyo i odana .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: I tana bonchchana ; aissi giikko , i taayyo de7iyaabaappe ekkidi , intteyyo odana .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Aawau de7iyaabai ubbai tabaa ; minttettiyaagee tau de7iyaabaappe ekkidi , intteyyo odana taani giidoogee hegaassa .

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: “ Guutta wodeppe guyyiyan , intte tana be7ekketa ; qassi guutta wodeppe guyyiyan , intte tana be7ana ” yaagiis .

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issooti issooti bantta giddon , “ ' Guutta wodeppe guyyiyan , intte tana be7ekketa ; qassi guutta wodeppe guyyiyan , intte tana be7ana ; aissi giikko , taani Aawaakko bais ' giyoogee hegee woigiyoogee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: “ ' Guutta wodeppe guyyiyan ' giyoogee woigiyoogee ? I aibau haasayiyaakkonne nuuyyo erettenna ” yaagidosona .

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: Eti bana oichchanau koyiyoogaa Yesuusi eridi , eta yaagiis ; “ Taani , ' Guutta wodeppe guyyiyan , intte tana be7ekketa ; qassi guutta wodeppe guyyiyan , intte tana be7ana ' giidoogau intte issoi issuwaa oichcheetii ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Taani intteyyo tumaa odais . Intte yeekkananne koizzana ; shin ha sa7ai ufaittana . Qassi intte azzanana ; shin intte azzanoi ufaissa gidana .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Issi maccaasiyaa na7a yelana haniyo wode , ba maaretaa wodee gakkido gishshau , he maaretaabaa hirggausu ; shin na7a yelidoogaappe guyyiyan , na7i ha sa7an yelettido ufaissaa gishshau , ba maaretaa hassayukku .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , inttekka intte wozanan hirggeeta ; shin taani naa77anttuwaa inttena be7ana ; qassi intte wozanai keehi ufaittana ; intte ufaissaa ooninne intteppe ekkenna .

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: “ He gallassi intte tana ainne woossekketa . Taani intteyyo tumaa odais ; intte ta sunttan woossiyoobaa ubbaa Aawai intteyyo immana .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Ha77i gakkanaassikka ta sunttan ainne woossibeekketa ; intte ufaissai polettana mala , Xoossaa woossite ; intte ekkana .

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: “ Hagaa taani intteyyo leemisuwan yootaas ; shin taani leemisuwan yootenna wodee yaana ; shin Aawaabaa taani intteyyo qoncciyan odana .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Taani he gallassi , intte ta sunttan Aawaa woossana ; qassi intte gishshau , taani Aawaa woossana giikke .

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: Aissi giikko , Aawai ba huuphen inttena siiqees ; intte tana siiqiyo gishshaunne taani Aawaa matappe yiidoogaa ammanido gishshau , i inttena siiqees .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Taani Aawaa matappe sa7aa yaas ; qassi sa7aa aggada Aawaakko baana ” yaagiis .

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Erissiyo ashkkarati zaaridi Yesuusa , “ Be7a , ha77i neeni qoncciyan haasayaasa ; leemison ainne haasayakka .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Neeni ubbabaa eriyoogaa nuuni ha77i eroos ; qassi nena ooninne oichchana mala , neeni koyennaagaa eroos . Hegee nuna neeni Xoossaappe yiidoogaa ammanttees ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi eta , “ Ha77i ammaneetii ?

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: Be7ite , intte intte soo intte soo laalettiyo wodeenne ta xalaalaa yeggi bayiyo wodee yaana ; ha77ikka yiichchiis . SHin Aawai tanaara de7iyo gishshau , ta xalaalaa gidikke .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: Intte ta giddon de7iiddi , saro de7ana mala , taani hagaa intteyyo odaas . Sa7an intte waayettana . SHin minnite ; taani sa7aa xoonaas ” yaagiis .

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: Yesuusi hegaa haasayidoogaappe guyyiyan , pude saluwaa xeellidi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Aawau , wodee gakkiis ; ne Na7ai nena bonchchana mala , neeni ne Na7aa bonchcha .

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: Aissi giikko , neeni ayyo immido ubbau merinaa de7uwaa i immana mala , asa ubbaa bollan ayyo maataa immadasa .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Asai nena issi Xoossaa gididaagaa erana malanne , qassi neeni kiittido Yesuus Kiristtoosa erana mala , hagee merinaa de7o .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: Neeni taayyo oottanau immido oosuwaa polada , nena sa7an bonchchaas .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Ha77ikka qassi Aawau , sa7ai merettanaappe kase ne matan taayyo de7iya bonchchuwan ne sinttan tana bonchcha .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: “ Sa7aa asaappe neeni tau immidoogeeta nenaara eretissaas ; eti neegeeta ; qassi neeni eta tau immadasa . Eti ne qaalaukka azazettidosona .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Ha77i neeni tau immido ubbabai neeppe yiidoogaa eti eroosona .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Aissi giikko , neeni tau immido qaalaa taani etau immaas ; etikka he qaalaa ekkidosona . Taani ne matappe yiidoogee tuma gidiyoogaa eroosona ; eridi neeni tana kiittidoogaakka ammanidosona .

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: “ Taani etau woossais ; sa7au nena woossikke . SHin neeni tau immido asau woossais ; aissi giikko , eti neegeeta .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Tau de7iya ubbabai nebaa ; qassi neeyyo de7iya ubbabaikka tabaa . Taani eta baggaara bonchchettaas .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: Taani hagaappe guyyiyan , sa7an de7ikke ; eti sa7an de7oosona ; taani ha77i neekko bais . Geeshsha Aawau , ha neeni tau immidoogeeti neeninne taani issuwaa gidiyoogaadan , eti issuwaa gidana mala , eta ne sunttan naaga .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Taani etaara sa7an de7aidda , neeni tau immido ne sunttaa wolqqan eta naagaas . Taani eta naagaas ; Xoossaa maxaafai giidoogee polettana mala , xayoi bessiyo uraappe attin , etappe harai ooninne xayibeenna .

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: “ Ha77i taani neekko bais ; eta wozanan ta ufaissai polettana mala , hagaa taani sa7an haasayais .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Taani etau ne qaalaa immaas ; taani sa7aassa gidennaagaadan , etikka sa7aassa gidenna gishshau , sa7ai eta ixxiis .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Neeni xalahiyaappe eta naagana mala woossiyoogaappe attin , sa7aappe kessana mala woossikke .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Taani sa7aassa gidennaagaadan , etikka sa7aassa gidokkona .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Neeni tumatettan eta nebaa ootta ; ne qaalaikka tumatettaa .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Neeni tana sa7aa kiittidoogaadan , taanikka eta sa7aa kiittaas ;

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: qassi eti tumatettan nebaa gidana mala , eta gishshau , taani ta huuphiyaa neeyyo immais .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: “ Taani eta xalaalau woossikke ; shin eti qaalaa yootin , tana ammanidaageetuyyookka woossais .

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Eti ubbai issuwaa gidana mala , taani woossais . Aawau , neeni ta giddon de7iyoogaadan , qassi taanikka ne giddon de7iyoogaadan , eti nu giddon de7ona . Qassi neeni tana kiittidoogaa sa7ai ammanana mala , eti issuwaa gidona .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Neeninne taani issuwaa gidiyoogaadan , eti issuwaa gidana mala , neeni tana bonchchidoogaadan , taanikka eta bonchchaas .

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: Taani eta giddon de7in , neeni ta giddon de7in , qassi neeni tana siiqiyoogaadan , etakka siiqidoogaanne tana sa7aa kiittidoogaa sa7ai eranaadan , eti muleera issuwaa gidona .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: “ Aawau , sa7ai merettanaappe kase neeni tana siiqido gishshau , tau immido ta bonchchuwaa eti be7ana mala , neeni tau immidoogeeti taani de7iyoosan tanaara de7ana mala koyais .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: “ Xillo Aawau , sa7ai nena erenna ; shin taani nena erais . Qassi neeni tana kiittidoogaa hageeti eroosona .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Neeni tana siiqido siiqoi eta giddon de7ana mala , qassi taanikka eta giddon de7ana mala , taani ne sunttaa eta erissaas ; sinttaukka erissana ” yaagiis .

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa giidi , Xoossaa woossidoogaappe guyyiyan , ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura Qediroona giyo shaafaa pinniis . He sohuwan daro wogarai de7ees ; Yesuusinne erissiyo ashkkarati he wogaraa giddo gelidosona .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: Yesuusa aatti immida Yihudai he sohuwaa erees ; aissi giikko , Yesuusi ubba wode ba erissiyo ashkkaratuura hegan shiiqees .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yihudai paanoosiyaa , xomppiyaa , tooraanne gonddalliyaa oiqqida daro wotaaddaratanne qassi qeese halaqatinne Parisaaweti yeddido Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarata kaaletti ekkidi , he sohuwaa biis .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Yesuusi bana gakkana haniya ubbabaa eridi , gaxi kiyidi , “ Oona koyeetii ? ” yaagiis .

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: Yaagin eti zaaridi , “ Naazireeta Yesuusa koyoos ” yaagidosona . Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani a ” yaagiis . Yesuusa aatti immida Yihudaikka hegan etaara eqqiis ;

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Yesuusi , “ Taani a ” giido wode , eti guyyekko shiiqidi , sa7an kunddidosona .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Yesuusi qassikka , “ Oona koyeetii ? ” Yaagin eti , “ Naazireeta Yesuusa koyoos ” yaagidosona .

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani a gidiyoogaa intteyyo yootaas ; simmi intte tana koyiyaabaa gidikko , hageeta yeddite ” yaagiis .

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: I , “ Aawau , neeni tau immidoogeetuppe harai atto , issuwaakka bashshabeikke ” giidoogee polettana mala , hegaa giis .

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: Simoon PHeexiroosau bisoi de7ees ; i he bisuwaa shoddinnee qeese ubbatu halaqaa ashkkaraa ushachcha haittaa shocidi , qanxxi yeggiis . He ashkkaraa sunttai Malkkoosa .

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Yesuusi PHeexiroosa , “ Ne bisuwaa shoohuwan zaarada wotta ! Ta Aawai taayyo immido burccukkuwaappe taani uyennabaa neeyyo milatii ? ” yaagiis .

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: SHaalaqai , daro wotaaddaratinne qassi Aihudatu halaqati Yesuusa oiqqidi qachchidosona .

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: Koiro Yesuusa Haannakko efiidosona ; aissi giikko , Haanni he laitti qeese ubbatu halaqa gidiya Qayaafa bollo .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: “ Asa ubbaa gishshau , issi asi haiqqikko lo77o ” giidi Aihudata zoridaagee Qayaafa .

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: Simoon PHeexiroosinne hara issi erissiyo ashkkarai Yesuusa kaallidi biidosona . He hara erissiyo ashkkaraa qeese ubbatu halaqai loitti erees ; hegee Yesuusaara qeese ubbatu halaqaa dirssa garssi geliis .

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi kareera dirssaa penggen eqqiis . Qeese ubbatu halaqai loitti eriyo hara erissiyo ashkkarai kare kiyidi , penggiyaa naagiya na7eeyyo yootidi , PHeexiroosa dirssa garssi gelissiis .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Penggiyaa naagiya na7iyaa PHeexiroosa , “ Neeni ha bitanee erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issuwaa gidikkiiyye ? ” yaagaasu . Yaagin PHeexiroosi , “ CHii , taani gidikke ” yaagiis .

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Sa7ai meeggiyo gishshau , ashkkaratinne halaqati xiixinttaa tamaa oittidi , bonqqidaagaa yuuyi aadhdhi eqqidi ho77oosona ; PHeexiroosikka etaara eqqidi , he tamaa ho77ees .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: Qeese ubbatu halaqai Yesuusa i erissiyo ashkkaratubaanne a timirttiyaabaa oichchiis .

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani asa ubbau qoncciyan odaas . Taani Aihuda ubbai shiiqiyo Aihuda woosa keettaaninne Beeta Maqidasiyan ubba wode tamaarissaas ; geeman ainne haasayabeikke .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: Yaatin , neeni tana aissi oichchai ? Taani odidoogaa siyida asaa oichcha ; he asai taani odidoogaa erees ” yaagiis .

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Yesuusi hegaa giido wode , he sohuwan eqqida wotaaddaratuppe issoi Yesuusa baqqidi , “ Qeese ubbatu halaqaa bolli hagaadan zaarai ? ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Taani balabaa haasayidabaa gidikko , hagan de7iya asa ubbau oda ; shin taani tumaa haasayidabaa gidikko , tana aissi baqqai ? ” yaagiis .

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Haanni , qashetti uttida Yesuusa , qeese ubbatu halaqaa , Qayaafakko yeddiis .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: PHeexiroosi hegan eqqidi , tamaa ho77ees ; harati a , “ Neeni ha bitanee erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issuwaa gidikkiiyye ? ” yaagiis . Yaagin PHeexiroosi , “ CHii ; taani gidikke ” yaagidi kaddiis .

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Qeese ubbatu halaqaa ashkkaratuppe issoi , PHeexiroosi haittaa qanxxido bitaniyaa dabboi PHeexiroosa , “ Taani nena aara daro wogaraa giddon be7abeikkinaayye ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Oichchin PHeexiroosi qassikka kaddiis ; sohuwaarakka kuttoi waassi aggiis .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Eti Yesuusa Qayaafa sooppe deriyaa haariyaagaa ooso keettaa ekki efiidosona . Sa7ai maallado guura ; Aihudati Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassa qumaa maanau , bantta huuphessi tunenna mala , deriyaa haariyaagaa ooso keettaa gelibookkona .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Hegaa gishshau , PHilaaxoosi etakko kare kiyidi , “ Ha bitaniyaa intte aibin mooteetii ? ” yaagiis .

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Yaagin eti , “ I iitabaa oottibeennabaa gidiyaakko , nuuni a neekko ehookko ” yaagidosona .

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: PHilaaxoosi zaaridi etayyo , “ Intte a ekki efiidi , intte higgee giyoogaadan , a bolli pirddite ” yaagiis . Yaagin Aihudati , “ Oonanne woriyo maati nuuyyo baawa ” yaagidosona ;

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: hagee hanidoogee Yesuusi ai mala haiquwaa haiqqanaakko erissanau haasayidoogee polettanaassa .

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: PHilaaxoosi ba ooso keettaa naa77anttuwaa gelidi , Yesuusa xeesiis ; xeesidi , “ Neeni Aihuda kawoo ? ” yaagidi a oichchiis .

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: Oichchin Yesuusi PHilaaxoosa , “ Ha oishaa neeni neeppe oichchaiyye woi hara asi neeyyo tabaa odidee ? ” yaagiis .

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: PHilaaxoosi zaaridi , “ Tana Aihuda asa gai ? Ne zaretinne qeesetu halaqati nena tau aatti immidosona ; neeni ai oottadii ? ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Ta kawotettai ha sa7aana gidenna . Ta kawotettai ha sa7aana gididaakko , tana Aihudatuyyo aatti immennaadan , ta ashkkarati tau olettana ; shin ta kawotettai ha sa7aana gidenna ” yaagiis .

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , PHilaaxoosi Yesuusa , “ Yaatin , neeni kawooyye ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Yesuusi zaaridi , “ Neeni tana kawo gaasa . Taani tumatettaayyo markkattana gishshau yelettaas ; qassi hegaa gishshau , ha sa7aa yaas . Tumaa bagga gidiya ooninne taani giyoogaa siyees ” yaagiis .

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Yaagin PHilaaxoosi , “ Tumatetti aibee ? ” yaagiis . PHilaaxoosi hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan , Aihudatukko kare kiyidi , “ Taani aani ai balanne demmabeikke .

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: SHin Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassi , issi asa taani intteyyo qashuwaappe birshshiyo meezee de7ees ; taani intteyyo Aihudatu kawuwaa birshshiyoogaa koyeetii ? ” yaagiis .

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Eti zaaridi , bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Barbbaana birshshappe attin , a gidenna ! ” yaagidosona . SHin Barbbaani pangga .

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , PHilaaxoosi Yesuusa oiqqidi , lissuwan garafiis .

text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns , and put it on his head , and they put on him a purple robe ,
text2: Wotaaddarati agunttaappe akiliiliyaa loittidi , a huuphiyan wottidosona ; qassi zo7o maayuwaakka a maizzidosona .

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: Akko shiiqidi , “ Aihuda kawuwau , shemppo gam77a ! ” yaagidi a qinxxalliyaa baqqidosona .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: PHilaaxoosi qassikka kare kiyidi Aihudata , “ Be7ite , taani aani ai balanne demmabeennaagaa intte erana mala , a inttekko kare kessana ” yaagiis .

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi agunttaa akiliiliyaa ba huuphiyan wottidi , zo7o maayuwaa maayidi , kare kiyiis ; PHilaaxoosi Aihudata , “ Bitaniyaa hagaa be7ite ” yaagiis .

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Qeese halaqatinne wotaaddarati a be7ido wode , bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishada a kaqqa ! Kaqqa ! ” yaagidosona . Yaagin PHilaaxoosi eta , “ Intte a ekki efiidi , masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqite ; aissi giikko , taani ai balanne demmabeikke ” yaagiis .

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Aihudati zaaridi , “ Nuuyyo higgee de7ees ; nu higgee giyoogaadan , i haiqqanau bessees ; aissi giikko , i bana Xoossaa Na7aa oottiis ” yaagidosona .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: PHilaaxoosi hegaa siyido wode , kaseegaappe keehi yayyiis .

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: Qassikka PHilaaxoosi ba ooso keettaa simmi gelidi Yesuusa , “ Neeni auppe yaadii ? ” yaagidi oichchiis ; shin Yesuusi ayyo ainne zaaribeenna .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: Hegaa gishshau , PHilaaxoosi a , “ Tau yootikkii ? Nena birshshanau woi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishada kaqqanau tau maati de7iyoogaa erikkiiyye ? ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Xoossai neeyyo bollappe maataa immibeennabaa gidiyaakko , neeyyo ta bolli maati de7enna shin . Hegaa gishshau , tana neeyyo aatti immidaagee aadhdhiya nagaraa oottiis ” yaagiis .

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: PHilaaxoosi hegaa siyido wode , Yesuusa birshshanau oge koyiis ; shin Aihudati bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Neeni a birshshiyaabaa gidikko , Kawuwaa Qeesaara dabbo gidakka ! Bana kawo giya ooninne Qeesaara morkke ! ” yaagidosona .

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: PHilaaxoosi hegaa siyidi , Yesuusa kare kessiis . Yaatidi shuchchaa baasidi kessidosaa giyoosan pirdda oidiyan uttiis ; Ibraisxxe qaalan he sohoi gabataa giyoogaa .

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: He gallassai Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassau giigissiyo gallassa ; sa7ai usuppun saate heera gidana . PHilaaxoosi Aihudata , “ Intte kawuwaa hagaa be7ite ! ” yaagiis .

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Yaagin Aihudati bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Digga ! Digga ! Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishada kaqqa ! ” yaagidosona . PHilaaxoosi zaaridi , “ Intte kawuwaa taani masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishada kaqqiyoogaa koyeetii ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Oichchin qeese halaqati , “ Qeesaarappe hara kawoi nuuyyo baawa ! ” yaagidosona .

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , eti masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi , Yesuusa kaqqana mala , PHilaaxoosi etau aatti immiis . Eti Yesuusa oiqqidi , ekki efiidosona .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: Yesuusi ba masqqaliyaa tookkidi , Guuggiyaa Sohuwaa giyoosaa biis . “ Guuggiyaa Sohuwaa ” giyoogee Ibraisxxe qaalan “ Golggottaa ” giyoogaa .

text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Eti he sohuwan masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi , Yesuusa kaqqidosona ; qassi aara hara naa77u asata , issuwaa ya baggaara qassi issuwaa ha baggaara Yesuusa gidduwan wottidi , masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqidosona .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: PHilaaxoosi xifatiyaa xaafidi , masqqaliyaa bolli wottiis . I xaafidoogee , “ Aihudatu Kawuwaa , Naazireeta Yesuusa ” yaagees .

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: Yesuusi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi kaqettidosai katamaa matan de7iyo gishshau , daro Aihudati he xifatiyaa nabbabidosona . Xifatee Ibraisxxe qaalan , Roomaisxxe qaalaaninne Giriike qaalan xaafettiis .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Aihuda qeese halaqati PHilaaxoosa , “ ' Ha bitanee bana Aihuda kawo yaagiis ' gaada xaafappe attin , ' Aihuda kawo ' gaada xaafoppa ” yaagidosona .

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: Yaagin PHilaaxoosi , “ Taani xaafidoogaa xaafarggaas ” yaagidi zaariis .

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Wotaaddarati masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi , Yesuusa kaqqidoogaappe guyyiyan , a maayuwaa ekkidi , oiddu kessi shaakkidosona ; issi issi wotaaddaraa issi shaahoi gakkiis . A adussa maayuwaakka ekkidosona ; adussa maayoi hashiyaappe doommidi , duge gakkanaassi yeda maayettiyaabaappe attin , qanxxettidi sikettibeenna .

text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: Wotaaddarati issoi issuwaa , “ Oona gakkanaakko , saamaa yegganaappe attin , maayuwaa peerokko ” yaagidosona . Hegee hanidoogee Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Ta maayuwaa shaakki ekkidosona ; ta adussa maayuwan saamaa yeggidosona ” giyoogee polettanaassa . Hegaa gishshau , wotaaddarati hegaa oottidosona .

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: SHin Yesuusa masqqaliyaa matan a aayyiyaa , a aayee michchiyaa , Qaliyoopha machchiyaa Mairaamanne Magddala giyo katamaappe yiida Mairaama eqqidosona .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Yesuusi ba aayyiyaanne i siiqiyo erissiyo ashkkarai hegan eqqidaageeta be7idi , ba aayyiyo , “ Ha mishiree , ne na7aa hagaa be7a ! ” yaagiis .

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , he erissiyo ashkkaraa , “ Ne aayyiyo hanno be7a ! ” yaagiis . He erissiyo ashkkarai o he saatiyaappe doommidi , ba soo ekki efiis .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi ubbabai ha77i polettidoogaa eridi , Xoossaa maxaafai giidoogee polettana mala , “ Tana saammees ” yaagiis .

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: He sohuwan issi xuggaa kumida caala woine eessai de7ees . Eti ispponjjiyaa he woine eessan yeggidi , hiisoophphe giyo mittaa xeeran wottidi , Yesuusa doonaakko shiishshidosona .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Yesuusi woine eessaa ganxxi be7idoogaappe guyyiyan , “ Polettiis ” yaagiis . Qassi hegaappe guyyiyan , ba huuphiyaa ziqqi oottidi , ba shemppuwaa immiis .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: He gallassai giigettiyo gallassa gidiyo gishshaunne qassi he Sambbatai daro bonchcho gidiyo gishshau , Sambbatan asatu ahai masqqaliyaa bolli pe7enna mala , kaqettida asatu suiliyaa menttidi , masqqaliyaappe wottana mala , Aihudati PHilaaxoosa woossidosona .

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , wotaaddarati yiidi , Yesuusaara kaqettida koiro bitaniyaa suiliyaa menttidosona ; qassi aara kaqettida naa77antto bitaniyaa suiliyaakka menttidosona .

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: SHin Yesuusakko yiido wode i haiqqiichchidoogaa be7idi , a suiliyaa menttibookkona .

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: Gidikkonne , wotaaddaratuppe issoi a miyyiyaa tooran caddiis ; caddin sohuwaarakka suuttainne haattai goggi bayiis .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: Intte ammanana mala , hagaa be7idaagee markkattiis ; i markkattiyoogeekka tumaa ; qassi ba haasayai tuma gidiyoogaa i erees .

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Hegee hanidoogee Xoossaa maxaafai , “ A meqettatuppe issoinne meqqenna ” giidoogee polettanaassa .

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: Qassikka Xoossaa maxaafai harai , “ Asai ba caddidoogaa be7ana ” yaagees .

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Armmaatiyaasa giyo katamaappe yiida Yooseefi Yesuusa ahaa ekki efaanau PHilaaxoosa woossiis ; Yooseefi Aihudatuyyo yayyido gishshau , asi erennan Yesuusa kaalliyaagaa . Yooseefi woossin PHilaaxoosi , “ Ekkada efa ” yaagiis . Hegaa gishshau , Yooseefi biidi , Yesuusa ahaa ekki efiis .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: Qassi Niqoodimoosi hegaappe kase Yesuusakko qammi yiidaagee , karbbiyaaranne godare uuttaara walahettida oitamanne ichchashu kilo giraame gidiyaagaa keena shittuwaa oiqqi ekkidi , Yooseefaara yiis .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: He naa77u asati Yesuusa ahaa ekkidi , Aihudati ahaa xaaxiyo maaraadankka , shittuwaara gattidi , liinuwaa giyo afalan xaaxidosona .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Yesuusi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi kaqettido sohuwan daro wogarai de7ees ; he wogara giddon shuchchaa wooci kessido biron ooninne moogettibeenna ooratta gonggoloi de7ees .

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: He gonggoloi matan de7iyo gishshaunne qassi Aihudati Sambbatau giigettiyo gallassa gidiyo gishshau , Yesuusa yaani wottidosona .

text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early , when it was yet dark , unto the sepulchre , and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre .
text2: Woggaa gallassi guuran , biron daabidaabiyaagan , Magddala giyo katamaappe yiida Mairaama Yesuusi moogettido gonggoluwaakko baasu ; baada shuchchai he gonggoluwaa doonaappe denddiichchidaagaa be7aasu .

text: Then she runneth , and cometh to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and saith unto them , They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre , and we know not where they have laid him .
text2: Simoon PHeexiroosakkonne Yesuusi siiqiyo hinkko erissiyo ashkkaraakko , a woxxaidda baada , “ Gonggoluwaappe Godaa ekki efirggidosona ; awan a wottidaakkonne nuuni erokko ” yaagaasu .

text: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple , and came to the sepulchre .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , PHeexiroosinne hinkko erissiyo ashkkarai aggidi , gonggoluwaakko biidosona .

text: So they ran both together : and the other disciple did outrun Peter , and came first to the sepulchre .
text2: Naa77aikka issippe woxxidosona ; shin hinkko erissiyo ashkkarai PHeexiroosappe aadhdhidi kasetidi , he gonggoluwaakko gakkiis .

text: And he stooping down , and looking in , saw the linen clothes lying ; yet went he not in .
text2: He erissiyo ashkkarai hokkidi , liinuwaa giyo afalaa be7iis ; shin giddo gelibeenna .
