text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him , and went into the sepulchre , and seeth the linen clothes lie ,
text2: Simoon PHeexiroosi a kaallidi yiidi , gonggoluwaa giddo geliis . Gelidi liinuwaa giyo afalai hegan de7iyaagaa be7iis ;

text: And the napkin , that was about his head , not lying with the linen clothes , but wrapped together in a place by itself .
text2: qassi Yesuusa huuphiyan xaaxetti uttida afalai he xaaxettidoogaadankka dumma issisan de7iyaagaa be7iis ; he afalai dumma de7eesippe attin , liinuwaa giyo afalaara issippe de7enna .

text: Then went in also that other disciple , which came first to the sepulchre , and he saw , and believed .
text2: He wode , kasetidi gonggoluwaakko gakkida hinkko erissiyo ashkkarai geliis . Geli be7idi ammaniis .

text: For as yet they knew not the scripture , that he must rise again from the dead .
text2: Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddanau bessiyoogaa yootiya Xoossaa maxaafaa eti biron akeekiichchibookkona .

text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , erissiyo ashkkarati bantta soo simmidi biidosona .

text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping : and as she wept , she stooped down , and looked into the sepulchre ,
text2: SHin Mairaama he gonggoluwaa doonan eqqada yeekkausu . Yeekkaidda hokkada gonggoluwaa giddo xeellaasu .

text: And seeth two angels in white sitting , the one at the head , and the other at the feet , where the body of Jesus had lain .
text2: Bootta maayuwaa maayida naa77u kiitanchchati Yesuusa ahai zin77idosan issoi huuphessaara issoi tohossaara uttidaageeta be7aasu .

text: And they say unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? She saith unto them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I know not where they have laid him .
text2: Eti o , “ Mishiree , aissi yeekkai ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona . Oichchin a , “ Asati ta Godaa efirggidosona ; eti awan wottidaakkonne taani erikke ” yaagaasu .

text: And when she had thus said , she turned herself back , and saw Jesus standing , and knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan , guyye simma xeellada , Yesuusi eqqidaagaa be7aasu . SHin i Yesuusa gididoogaa akeekabeikku .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? whom seekest thou ? She , supposing him to be the gardener , saith unto him , Sir , if thou have borne him hence , tell me where thou hast laid him , and I will take him away .
text2: Yesuusi o , “ Mishiree , aissi yeekkai ? Oona koyai ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Mairaama wogaraa naagiyaagaa gaada , “ Godau , neeni ekkidabaa gidikko , a awan wottidaakko , tau yootarkkii ; taani a ekka efaana ” yaagaasu .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Mary . She turned herself , and saith unto him , Rabboni ; which is to say , Master .
text2: Yesuusi o , “ Mairaamee ” yaagiis . A akko simmada , Ibraisxxe qaalan “ Rabunii ” yaagaasu ; hegaa birshshettai “ Tamaarissiyaagoo ” giyoogaa .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Touch me not ; for I am not yet ascended to my Father : but go to my brethren , and say unto them , I ascend unto my Father , and your Father ; and to my God , and your God .
text2: Yesuusi o , “ Taani biron ta Aawaakko babeenna gishshau , tana bochchoppa ; shin ta ishanttukko baada , ' Taani ta Aawaakkonne intte Aawaakko , ta Xoossaakkonne intte Xoossaakko , pude bais giis ' gaada etau oda ” yaagiis .

text: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord , and that he had spoken these things unto her .
text2: Magddala giyo katamaappe yiida Mairaama Godaa be7idoogaanne iyyo i hegaa odidoogaa baada erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo odaasu .

text: Then the same day at evening , being the first day of the week , when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews , came Jesus and stood in the midst , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: He Woggaa gallassi omarssi , erissiyo ashkkarati Aihudatuyyo yayyido gishshau , kariyaa koridi , shiiqi uttidaashin , Yesuusi yiidi , eta gidduwan eqqidi , “ Sarotettai intteyyo gido ” yaagiis .

text: And when he had so said , he shewed unto them his hands and his side . Then were the disciples glad , when they saw the Lord .
text2: Hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan , ba kushiyaanne ba miyyiyaa eta bessiis ; erissiyo ashkkarati Godaa be7ido wode keehi ufaittidosona .

text: Then said Jesus to them again , Peace be unto you : as my Father hath sent me , even so send I you .
text2: Yesuusi naa77anttuwaakka etau , “ Sarotettai intteyyo gido ; ta Aawai tana kiittidoogaadan , taanikka inttena kiittais ” yaagiis .

text: And when he had said this , he breathed on them , and saith unto them , Receive ye the Holy Ghost :
text2: Hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan , eta bolli ufu giidi shemppiis ; qassi , “ Geeshsha Ayyaanaa ekkite .

text: Whose soever sins ye remit , they are remitted unto them ; and whose soever sins ye retain , they are retained .
text2: Intte atto giido asaa nagarai atto geetettana ; intte atto geennaageetu nagarai atto geetettenna ” yaagiis .

text: But Thomas , one of the twelve , called Didymus , was not with them when Jesus came .
text2: SHin tammanne naa77u erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoi , Mentte giyo Toomaasi , Yesuusi yiido wode etaara de7enna .

text: The other disciples therefore said unto him , We have seen the Lord . But he said unto them , Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails , and put my finger into the print of the nails , and thrust my hand into his side , I will not believe .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , hinkko erissiyo ashkkarati Toomaasau , “ Nuuni Godaa be7ida ! ” yaagidosona . SHin Toomaasi etau , “ Misimaariyan i cadettido a kushiyan de7iya malaataa be7ennaaninne he malaataa ta biradhdhiyan bochchennan , qassi ta kushiyaa a miyyiyan yedda be7ennan taani ammanikke ” yaagiis .

text: And after eight days again his disciples were within , and Thomas with them : then came Jesus , the doors being shut , and stood in the midst , and said , Peace be unto you .
text2: Saaminttappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkarati qassikka sooni shiiqi uttidosona ; Toomaasikka etaara de7ees . Karee koretti uttidaashin , Yesuusi yiidi , eta gidduwan eqqiis ; eqqidi , “ Sarotettai intteyyo gido ” yaagiis .

text: Then saith he to Thomas , reach hither thy finger , and behold my hands ; and reach hither thy hand , and thrust it into my side : and be not faithless , but believing .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi Toomaasa , “ Ne kushiyaa haa ehaada , ta kushiyaa be7a , qassi ne kushiyaa haa ehaada , ta miyyiyan yedda be7a , neeni ammaniyaagaa gidanaappe attin , ammanennaagaa gidoppa ! ” yaagiis .

text: And Thomas answered and said unto him , My Lord and my God .
text2: Toomaasi zaaridi , “ Ta Godau , ta Xoossau ! ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thomas , because thou hast seen me , thou hast believed : blessed are they that have not seen , and yet have believed .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Neeni tana be7ido gishshau ammanadasa ; be7ennan ammanidaageeti anjjettidaageeta ” yaagiis .

text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples , which are not written in this book :
text2: Yesuusi ha maxaafan xaafettibeenna hara daro malaatata ba erissiyo ashkkaratu sinttan oottiis .

text: But these are written , that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God ; and that believing ye might have life through his name .
text2: SHin Yesuusi i Kiristtoosa , Xoossaa Na7aa gidiyoogaa intte ammanana malanne , qassi a ammanidi a sunttan de7uwaa intte demmana mala , hagee xaafettiis .

text: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias ; and on this wise shewed he himself .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi Xibiriyaadoosa giyo abbaa lanqqiyan ba erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo naa77anttuwaa beettiis . I etau hagaadan beettiis .

text: There were together Simon Peter , and Thomas called Didymus , and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee , and the sons of Zebedee , and two other of his disciples .
text2: Simoon PHeexiroosinne mentte giyo Toomaasi , Qaana Galiilappe yiida Naatinaa7eeli , Zabddiyoosa naatinne Yesuusi erissiyo ashkkaratuppe hara naa77ati issippe de7oosona .

text: Simon Peter saith unto them , I go a fishing . They say unto him , We also go with thee . They went forth , and entered into a ship immediately ; and that night they caught nothing .
text2: Simoon PHeexiroosi etau , “ Taani mole oiqqanau bais ” yaagiis . Yaagin eti , “ Nuunikka nenaara baana ” yaagidi , kiyidi wolwoluwaa giddo gelidosona ; shin eti he gallassi qammi mole ainne oiqqibookkona .

text: But when the morning was now come , Jesus stood on the shore : but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Maallado wonttaara awai kiyanaappe kase , Yesuusi abbaa gaxan eqqiis ; shin erissiyo ashkkarati Yesuusa gididoogaa eribookkona .

text: Then Jesus saith unto them , Children , have ye any meat ? They answered him , No .
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Naatoo , mole oiqqibeekketiiyye ? ” yaagiis . Yaagin eti zaaridi , “ Ainne oiqqibookko ” yaagidosona .

text: And he said unto them , Cast the net on the right side of the ship , and ye shall find . They cast therefore , and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes .
text2: I zaaridi , “ Intte gitiyaa wolwoluwaappe ushachcha baggakko yeggite ; amaridaagaa intte oiqqana ” yaagiis . Hegaa gishshau , gitiyaa ushachcha baggakko yeggin , molee darido gishshau , goochchi kessanaagee eta xooniis .

text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter , It is the Lord . Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he girt his fisher ' s coat unto him , ( for he was naked , ) and did cast himself into the sea .
text2: Yesuusi siiqiyo ashkkarai PHeexiroosa , “ Hagee Godaattennee ! ” yaagiis . Simooni PHeexiroosi Godaa i gididoogaa siyido wode , kallo de7iyo gishshau , ba maayuwaa maayidi , abbaa giddo guppi geliis .

text: And the other disciples came in a little ship ; ( for they were not far from land , but as it were two hundred cubits , ) dragging the net with fishes .
text2: SHin hinkko erissiyo ashkkarati molee kumi uttido gitiyaa goochchiiddi , wolwoluwan abbaappe gaxi kiyidosona ; eti abbaappe naa77u xeetu wara keenaa haakkidi de7oosonappe attin , keehi haakkidi de7okkona .

text: As soon then as they were come to land , they saw a fire of coals there , and fish laid thereon , and bread .
text2: Eti abbaappe gaxi kiyido wode , xiixinttaa bonqquwan molee de7iyaagaanne oittaa be7idosona .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Bring of the fish which ye have now caught .
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Ha77i intte oiqqido moliyaappe amaridaagaa hammite ” yaagiis .

text: Simon Peter went up , and drew the net to land full of great fishes , and hundred and fifty and three : and for all there were so many , yet was not the net broken .
text2: Simoon PHeexiroosi wolwoluwan gelidi , xeetanne ishatamanne heezzu wogga moleti kumi uttido gitiyaa goochchidi , abbaappe gaxi kessiis ; molee hegaa keena daro gidinkka gitee daakettibeenna .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Come and dine . And none of the disciples durst ask him , Who art thou ? knowing that it was the Lord .
text2: Yesuusi eta , “ Haa yiidi , qan77iyaa qan77ite ” yaagiis . Erissiyo ashkkaratuppe issoinne , “ Neeni oonee ? ” giidi a oichchanau xalibeenna ; aissi giikko , Godaa i gididoogaa eti eridosona .

text: Jesus then cometh , and taketh bread , and giveth them , and fish likewise .
text2: Yesuusi yiidi , oittaa ekkidi , etau immiis ; moliyaakka hegaadan immiis .

text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples , after that he was risen from the dead .
text2: Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddidoogaappe guyyiyan , ba erissiyo ashkkaratuyyo beettishin hagee heezzantto .

text: So when they had dined , Jesus saith to Simon Peter , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me more than these ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my lambs .
text2: Eti qumaa miidoogaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi Simoon PHeexiroosa , “ Yoona na7au Simoonaa , tana hageetuppe aattada siiqai ? ” yaagiis . Simoon PHeexiroosi , “ Ee Godau , taani nena dosiyoogaa neeni eraasa ” yaagiis . Yesuusi a , “ Ta dorssa marata heemma ” yaagiis .

text: He saith to him again the second time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Yesuusi qassikka , “ Yoona na7au Simoonaa , tana siiqai ? ” yaagiis . Simoon PHeexiroosi , “ Ee Godau , taani nena dosiyoogaa neeni eraasa ” yaagiis . Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Ta dorssata heemma ” yaagiis .

text: He saith unto him the third time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time , Lovest thou me ? And he said unto him , Lord , thou knowest all things ; thou knowest that I love thee . Jesus saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Yesuusi heezzanttuwaa , “ Yoona na7au Simoonaa , tana dosai ? ” yaagiis . Yesuusi heezzanttuwaa Simoon PHeexiroosa , “ Tana dosai ? ” yaagidi oichchido gishshau , PHeexiroosi azzanidi , “ Godau , neeni ubbabaa eraasa ; taani nena dosiyoogaa neeni eraasa ” yaagiis . Yaagin Yesuusi , “ Ta dorssata heemma .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , When thou wast young , thou girdedst thyself , and walkedst whither thou wouldest : but when thou shalt be old , thou shalt stretch forth thy hands , and another shall gird thee , and carry thee whither thou wouldest not .
text2: Taani neeyyo tumaa odais ; neeni wodallatettan de7iyo wode , ne xeessan qabattuwaa nerkka gixxada , neeni koyidosaa baasa . SHin cimidoogaappe guyyiyan , ne kushiyaa micca bessaasa . Nena hara urai gixissees ; neeni dosennasaakka efees ” yaagiis .

text: This spake he , signifying by what death he should glorify God . And when he had spoken this , he saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Yesuusi hegaa PHeexiroosi ai mala haiquwaa haiqqidi , Xoossaa bonchchissanaakkonne erissanau giis ; qassi hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi PHeexiroosa , “ Tana kaalla ” yaagiis .

text: Then Peter , turning about , seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following ; which also leaned on his breast at supper , and said , Lord , which is he that betrayeth thee ?
text2: PHeexiroosi guyye simmidi , Yesuusi siiqiyo erissiyo ashkkarai baappe guyyeera yiyaagaa be7iis ; he erissiyo ashkkarai , kahuwaa miyoosan Yesuusakko shiiqidi a , “ Godau , nena aatti immanai oonee ? ” yaagidaagaa .

text: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus , Lord , and what shall this man do ?
text2: PHeexiroosi he erissiyo ashkkaraa be7idi Yesuusa , “ Godau , ha bitanee qassi waananee ? ” yaagiis .

text: Jesus saith unto him , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ? follow thou me .
text2: Yaagin Yesuusi a , “ Taani yaana gakkanaassi i de7ana mala taani koyikko , hegee nena ai metii ? Neeni tana kaalla ” yaagiis .

text: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren , that that disciple should not die : yet Jesus said not unto him , He shall not die ; but , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ?
text2: Hegaa gishshau , he erissiyo ashkkarai haiqqenna giyo haasayai ishanttu ubbaakko gakkiis ; shin Yesuusi , “ Taani yaana gakkanaassi , i de7ana mala , taani koyikko , nena ai metii ? ” giidoogaappe attin , “ Haiqqenna ” gibeenna .

text: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things , and wrote these things : and we know that his testimony is true .
text2: He yohuwaabaa markkattidaageenne qassi hegaa xaafidaagee he erissiyo ashkkaraa ; a markkatettai tuma gidiyoogaa nuuni eroos .

text: And there are also many other things which Jesus did , the which , if they should be written every one , I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written . Amen .
text2: Yesuusi oottido hara darobaikka de7ees ; ubbabai huuphiyan huuphiyan xaafettiyaakko , xaafettiya maxaafatuyyo ha mule sa7ai gidanabaa taayyo milatenna .

text: The former treatise have I made , O Theophilus , of all that Jesus began both to do and teach ,
text2: Tewofiloosaa , Yesuusi saluwaa biido gallassai gakkanaassi , oottanaunne tamaarissanau doommido ubbabaa taani ta koiro maxaafan xaafaas . Saluwaa baanaappe kase i ba dooridi kiittidoogeeta Geeshsha Ayyaanan azaziis .

text: To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs , being seen of them forty days , and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God :
text2: I ba kiittidoogeetussi oitamu gallassaa beettiiddinne qassi Xoossaa kawotettaabaa etau yootiiddi , ba waayiyaappe guyyiyan , haiquwaappe denddidoogaa siree bainnan daro ammanttidi , bana eta bessiis .

text: And , being assembled together with them , commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem , but wait for the promise of the Father , which , saith he , ye have heard of me .
text2: Etaara issippe de7iiddi , eta hagaadan yaagidi azaziis ; “ Yerusalaameppe kiyoppite ; shin intte taappe siyidoogaa ta Aawai inttessi immana giidoogaa naagite .

text: For John truly baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence .
text2: Aissi giikko , Yohaannisi haattan xammaqiis ; shin guutta wodiyaappe guyyiyan , Geeshsha Ayyaanan intte xammaqettana ” yaagiis .

text: When they therefore were come together , they asked of him , saying , Lord , wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel ?
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti Yesuusaara gaittido wode a , “ Godau , ha wodiyan Israa7eelatussi kawotettaa zaaruutee ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: And he said unto them , It is not for you to know the times or the seasons , which the Father hath put in his own power .
text2: Oichchin Yesuusi eta , “ Ta Aawai ba godatettan keerido aginaanne wodiyaa intte eranaassa gidenna .

text: But ye shall receive power , after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you : and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem , and in all Judaea , and in Samaria , and unto the uttermost part of the earth .
text2: SHin Geeshsha Ayyaanai intte bolli wodhdhiyo wode , wolqqaa intte ekkana ; ekkidi Yerusalaameeninne Yihudaa biitta ubban , Samaariyaaninne sa7aa gaxaa gakkanaashinkka taassi markkattiyaageeta gidana ” yaagiis .

text: And when he had spoken these things , while they beheld , he was taken up ; and a cloud received him out of their sight .
text2: Hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan , eti xeellishin , xoqqu xoqqu giiddi , saluwaa bin , eta aifiyaappe shaarai a genttiis .

text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up , behold , two men stood by them in white apparel ;
text2: Yesuusi biyo wode , eti saluwaa tishshi oottidi xeellishin , issi bootta maayuwaa maayida naa77u asati sohuwaara eta matan eqqidi ,

text: Which also said , Ye men of Galilee , why stand ye gazing up into heaven ? this same Jesus , which is taken up from you into heaven , shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven .
text2: “ Galiila asatoo , saluwaa xeelliiddi , intte aissi eqqidetii ? Ha intteppe saluwaa biida Yesuusi saluwaa biyoogaa intte be7idoogaadankka , simmidi yaana ” yaagidosona .

text: Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet , which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day ' s journey .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti Dabira Zaite geetettiya deriyaappe Yerusalaame simmidosona . Dabira Zaitee Yerusalaame matan de7ees .

text: And when they were come in , they went up into an upper room , where abode both Peter , and James , and John , and Andrew , Philip , and Thomas , Bartholomew , and Matthew , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon Zelotes , and Judas the brother of James .
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti Yerusalaame gelidi , bantta de7iyo sohuwaa pooqiyaa pude kiyidosona ; kiyidaageeti PHeexiroosa , Yohaannisa , Yaaqooba , Inddiraasa , Piliphphoosa , Toomaasa , Barttalamoosa , Maatiyoosa , Ilppiyoosa na7aa Yaaqooba , ba biittaassi mishettiya Simoonanne Yaaqooba na7aa Yihudaa .

text: These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication , with the women , and Mary the mother of Jesus , and with his brethren .
text2: Hageeti ubbati maccaasatuura , Yesuusa aayee Mairaamiiranne Yesuusa ishanttuura ubbai issi wozana gididi , tolidi woossoosona .

text: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples , and said , ( the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty , )
text2: He wode , PHeexiroosi xeetanne laatamaa gidiya ammaniya asaa shiiquwan issippe de7iya ba ishanttu giddon denddi eqqidi , hagaadan yaagiis ;

text: Men and brethren , this scripture must needs have been fulfilled , which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas , which was guide to them that took Jesus .
text2: “ Ta ishatoo , Yesuusa oiqqidaageeta kaalettida Yihudaabaa Geeshsha Ayyaanai kase Daawita doonan odido Xoossaa maxaafaa qaalai polettanau bessees .

text: For he was numbered with us , and had obtained part of this ministry .
text2: Aissi giikko , Yihudai nunaara de7ees ; qassi nunaara issippe oottanaassi doorettiis ” yaagiis .

text: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity ; and falling headlong , he burst asunder in the midst , and all his bowels gushed out .
text2: Yihudai ba iita oosuwan demmido miishshan gadiyaa shammiis ; sinttau gufannidi kunddin , a uloi gidduwaappe daahettiis ; a maraccee muleerakka zaazetti aggiis .

text: And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem ; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue , Aceldama , that is to say , The field of blood .
text2: Yihudaa bolli hanidabaa Yerusalaamen de7iya asai ubbai siyiis ; hegaa gishshau , he gadiyaa bantta qaalan Akelddaama giidi xeegidosona ; Akelddaama giyoogee suutta gade giyoogaa .

text: For it is written in the book of Psalms , Let his habitation be desolate , and let no man dwell therein : and his bishoprick let another take .
text2: PHeexiroosi yootiiddi , “ Aissi giikko , Mazamure Maxaafan , ' A keettai mela de7o ; ooninne hegan de7oppo ' qassi ' A sunttatettaakka harai ekko ' geetettidi xaafettiis .

text: Wherefore of these men which have companied with us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us ,
text2: “ Hegaa gishshau , issi asi Godaa Yesuusa dendduwaa markkattanau , nunan gaittana bessees ; Yohaannisi xammaqido wodiyaappe doommidi , Yesuusi nuuppe saluwaa biido wode gakkanaas , Godaa Yesuusi nunaara hemettido wode ubban i nunaara de7iyaageetuppe issuwaa gidanau bessees ” yaagiis .

text: And they appointed two , Joseph called Barsabas , who was surnamed Justus , and Matthias .
text2: Yaagin ammaniya asai dooruwaassi Yosxxoosa giyo Barssaaba geetettiya Yooseefanne Maatiyaasa naa77aa essidosona .

text: And they prayed , and said , Thou , Lord , which knowest the hearts of all men , shew whether of these two thou hast chosen ,
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Xoossaa woossiiddi , “ Ubbaa wozanaa eriya Godau , Yihudai ba sohuwaa baanau yeggi bayido oosuwaanne Yesuusi kiittido oosuwaa sohuwaa ekkanaadan , ha naa77u asatuppe issuwaa neeni dooridoogaa nuna bessa ” yaagidosona .

text: And they gave forth their lots ; and the lot fell upon Matthias ; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles .
text2: Etan saamaa yeggidosona ; saamai Maatiyaasa bollan wodhdhin , Maatiyaasi Yesuusi kiittido tammanne isiinetuura qoodettiis .

text: And when the day of Pentecost was fully come , they were all with one accord in one place .
text2: PHenxxaqosxxe giyo gallassai gakkido wode , ammaniyaageeti ubbati issippe gididi , issisaa shiiqidaashin ,

text: And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind , and it filled all the house where they were sitting .
text2: gagantti yeggiya gotiyaadan guummiya gunttai akeekennan saluwaappe yiidi , eti uttido keettaa ubbaa kumiis .

text: And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire , and it sat upon each of them .
text2: Qassi tama laco milatiya inxxarssati etassi beettidi , shaahetti shaahettidi , eta ubbaa bolli wodhdhidosona .

text: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and began to speak with other tongues , as the Spirit gave them utterance .
text2: Eta ubban Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumidi , dumma dumma qaalan haasayana mala , eta danddayissin , haasayaa doommidosona .

text: And there were dwelling at Jerusalem Jews , devout men , out of every nation under heaven .
text2: Sa7an de7iya zare ubbaappe yiidi , Xoossaa woosan sheekkida Aihudati Yerusalaamen de7oosona .

text: Now when this was noised abroad , the multitude came together , and were confounded , because that every man heard them speak in his own language .
text2: Ha gunttaa siyido wode , asai ubbai shiiqiis ; shiiqidi ammaniyaageeti eta qaalan haasayishin siyido gishshau , giyoobaa xayidosona .

text: And they were all amazed and marvelled , saying one to another , Behold , are not all these which speak Galilaeans ?
text2: Garamettidi , “ Oorattabaa ” giidi , “ Be7ite ; ha haasayiya ubbati Galiila asata gidokkonaayye ?

text: And how hear we every man in our own tongue , wherein we were born ?
text2: Yaatin , nuuni nu yelettido biittaa qaalan eti haasayishin waanidi siyiyoonii ?

text: Parthians , and Medes , and Elamites , and the dwellers in Mesopotamia , and in Judaea , and Cappadocia , in Pontus , and Asia ,
text2: Nuuni PHartte asati , Meedoona asati , Elaameexe asati , naa77u shaafatuppe gidduwan de7iyaageeti , Yihudan , Qaphphadooqiyan , PHanxxoosan Isiyan ,

text: Phrygia , and Pamphylia , in Egypt , and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene , and strangers of Rome , Jews and proselytes ,
text2: Pirggiyan , PHinifiliyan , Gibxxen , Qareena baggan de7iya Liibiyaa woradatun de7iyaageeti , Roomeppe yiida imattati , Aihudati , Aihudatettau laamettida nuuppe amaridaageeti , Qarxxeese asatinne , Araba asati , Xoossai oottido gita oosuwaa nu qaalan eti haasayishin siyoos ” yaagidosona .

text: And they were all amazed , and were in doubt , saying one to another , What meaneth this ?
text2: Ubbaikka garamettidi , yohoi banttau qashettennan ixxin bantta giddon , “ Laa hagee woigiyoogee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Others mocking said , These men are full of new wine .
text2: SHin harati ammaniyaageetun Qilliicciiddi , “ Hageeti uyidi mattottidosona ” yaagidosona .

text: But Peter , standing up with the eleven , lifted up his voice , and said unto them , Ye men of Judaea , and all ye that dwell at Jerusalem , be this known unto you , and hearken to my words :
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi , Yesuusi kiittido hara tammanne isiinetuura denddi eqqidi , ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , etassi hagaadan yaagidi yootiis ; “ Aihudatoo , qassi Yerusalaamen de7iya ubbatoo , taani yootiyoogaa ezggite . Hagee intteyyo eretto ; intte qoppiyoogaadan , hageeti mattottibookkona .

text: For these are not drunken , as ye suppose , seeing it is but the third hour of the day .
text2: Aissi giikko , wonttaappe biron heezzu saate gidees .

text: But this is that which was spoken by the prophet Joel ;
text2: SHin hagee hananabaa yootiya Yuu7eeli haasayidoogaa .

text: And it shall come to pass in the last days , saith God , I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh : and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy , and your young men shall see visions , and your old men shall dream dreams :
text2: “ I haasayiiddi , ' Xoossai hagaadan yaagees ; wodiyaa wurssettan hagaadan hanana . Taani asa ubbaa bolli ta Ayyaanaa gussana . Intte attuma naatinne intte macca naati hananabaa yootana . Intte wodalla naatikka ajjuutaa be7ana ; intte cimatikka aimuwaa aimottana .

text: And on my servants and on my handmaidens I will pour out in those days of my Spirit ; and they shall prophesy :
text2: He gallassatun ta attuma ashkkaratu bollinne ta macca ashkkaratu bolli taani ta Ayyaanaa gussana . Gussin eti hananabaa yootana .

text: And I will shew wonders in heaven above , and signs in the earth beneath ; blood , and fire , and vapour of smoke :
text2: Qassi taani bolla saluwan oorattabaa , garssa sa7ankka malaataa bessana . Suuttai , tamainne shaaraadan gorddida cuwai de7ana .

text: The sun shall be turned into darkness , and the moon into blood , before that great and notable day of the Lord come :
text2: Gitanne bonchcho gidida Godaa gallassai gakkanaappe kase awai xumana ; aginaikka suutta milatana .

text: And it shall come to pass , that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: He wode hagaadan hanana ; Godaa sunttaa xeesiya ooninne attana ' yaagiis .

text: Ye men of Israel , hear these words ; Jesus of Nazareth , a man approved of God among you by miracles and wonders and signs , which God did by him in the midst of you , as ye yourselves also know :
text2: “ Israa7eela asatoo , ha qaalaa siyite ; Naazireeta Yesuusi intte giddon Xoossai banan oottido wolqqaama oosuwan , oorattabaaninne malaatan intteyyo qonccissido asa ; hegaa inttekka ereeta .

text: Him , being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God , ye have taken , and by wicked hands have crucified and slain :
text2: Yesuusi inttessi imettana mala , Xoossai kase ba sheniyaaninne ba eran ba qofaa qachchi wottiis ; yaatin , a intte nagaranchchatu kushiyan masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishissidi , kaqissi worideta .

text: Whom God hath raised up , having loosed the pains of death : because it was not possible that he should be holden of it .
text2: SHin haiqoi Yesuusa oiqqanau danddayibeenna gishshau , Xoossai haiquwaa seelaa appe xaissidi , a denttiis .

text: For David speaketh concerning him , I foresaw the Lord always before my face , for he is on my right hand , that I should not be moved :
text2: Aissi giikko , Daawiti Yesuusabaa hagaadan yaagees ; ' Taani metootennaadan , Godai ta ushachchan de7iyo gishshau , taani ubba wode Godaa ta matan be7ais .

text: Therefore did my heart rejoice , and my tongue was glad ; moreover also my flesh shall rest in hope :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ta wozanai ufaittiis ; ta inxxarssankka ufaissai kumiis . Qassi ta bollaikka lo77o de7ana giidi , ufaissan naagees .

text: Because thou wilt not leave my soul in hell , neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: Aissi giikko , ta shemppuwaa Si7ooliyan aggakka . Qassi ne Geeshsha Na7aa ahaakka musissakka .

text: Thou hast made known to me the ways of life ; thou shalt make me full of joy with thy countenance .
text2: Neeni tana de7uwaa ogiyaa erissadasa . Neeni tanaara de7iyoogan taani daro ufaittais ' yaagees .

text: Men and brethren , let me freely speak unto you of the patriarch David , that he is both dead and buried , and his sepulchre is with us unto this day .
text2: “ Ishatoo , nu aawatu halaqaa Daawitabaa taani intteyyo geeshshada odanau bessees ; Daawiti haiqqidi moogettiis ; a duufoi hachchi gakkanaassikka nu matan de7ees .

text: Therefore being a prophet , and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him , that of the fruit of his loins , according to the flesh , he would raise up Christ to sit on his throne ;
text2: Daawiti hananabaa yootiyaagaa gidido gishshaunne Xoossai a naatu zerettaappe issuwaa a kawotaa araatan utissanau ayyo caaqqidoogaa erido gishshau ,

text: He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ , that his soul was not left in hell , neither his flesh did see corruption .
text2: Kiristtoosa dendduwaa sinttau xeellidi , ' A shemppoi Si7ooliyan attibeenna ; a bollaikka musibeenna ' giidi yootiis .

text: This Jesus hath God raised up , whereof we all are witnesses .
text2: “ Xoossai ha Yesuusa haiquwaappe denttidoogaassi nuuni ubbai markka .

text: Therefore being by the right hand of God exalted , and having received of the Father the promise of the Holy Ghost , he hath shed forth this , which ye now see and hear .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Xoossai baappe ushachcha baggan a xoqqu xoqqu oottidi , ayyo Geeshsha Ayyaanaa immana giidoogaadan , Geeshsha Ayyaanaa ekkidi , hagaa intte ha77i be7iyoogaanne siyiyoogaa nu bolli gussiis .

text: For David is not ascended into the heavens : but he saith himself , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Aissi giikko , Daawiti ba huuphen saluwaa kiyibeenna ; shin yaagiis ; ' Godai ta godaa ; “ Taani ne morkketa neeni tohuwan yedhdha eqqiyoobaa oottana gakkanaassi hagan taappe ushachcha baggaara utta ” giis ' yaagiis .

text: Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly , that God hath made that same Jesus , whom ye have crucified , both Lord and Christ .
text2: “ Hegaa gishshau , Xoossai masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan ha intte xishidi kaqqido Yesuusa Godanne Kiristtoosa oottidoogaa Israa7eela zare ubbai tumaappe ero ” yaagiis .

text: Now when they heard this , they were pricked in their heart , and said unto Peter and to the rest of the apostles , Men and brethren , what shall we do ?
text2: Asai PHeexiroosi giidoogaa siyido wode , asau wozanai maashin , PHeexiroosanne Yesuusi kiittido harata , “ Ishanttoo , yaanin nuuni ai oottanee ? ” yaagidosona .

text: Then Peter said unto them , Repent , and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins , and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: PHeexiroosi eta , “ Intte nagarai atto geetettana mala , nagaraappe simmidi , intte huuphiyan huuphiyan Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan xammaqettite . Xoossai immiyo Geeshsha Ayyaanaa intte ekkana .

text: For the promise is unto you , and to your children , and to all that are afar off , even as many as the Lord our God shall call .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai immana giido qaalai inttessa intte naatussanne Godai nu Xoossai baakko xeesiyo haahuwan de7iyaageetu ubbaassa ” yaagiis .

text: And with many other words did he testify and exhort , saying , Save yourselves from this untoward generation .
text2: PHeexiroosi etassi qaalaa haraakka gujji markkattidi , “ Ha wodiyaa geella asaappe intte huuphiyaa ashshite ” yaagidi zoriis .

text: Then they that gladly received his word were baptized : and the same day there were added unto them about three thousand souls .
text2: PHeexiroosi yootidoogaa ekkidaageeti xammaqettidosona ; he gallassi heezzu sha7u gidiya asai ammaniis .

text: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles ' doctrine and fellowship , and in breaking of bread , and in prayers .
text2: Eti Yesuusi kiittidoogeetu timirttiyan , issippetettan oittaa mentti miyoogaaninne Xoossaa woosan genccoosona .

text: And fear came upon every soul : and many wonders and signs were done by the apostles .
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeetu kushiyan daro oorattabainne malaatai oosettin , asa ubbaa yashshai oiqqiis .

text: And all that believed were together , and had all things common ;
text2: Ammanida ubbati issippe de7oosona ; qassi banttau de7iyaabaa ubbaakka issippe shaakkidosona .

text: And sold their possessions and goods , and parted them to all men , as every man had need .
text2: Eti bantta biittaanne banttassi de7iyaabaa baizzi baizzidi , oonanne koshshido keena miishshaa ubbaassi shaakkidosona .

text: And they , continuing daily with one accord in the temple , and breaking bread from house to house , did eat their meat with gladness and singleness of heart ,
text2: Qassi ubba gallassi , issi wozana gididi , Beeta Maqidasiyan paccennan gaittidi , bantta keettaa keettaa xeesettidi ufaissaaninne pashkka wozanan qumaa moosona .

text: Praising God , and having favour with all the people . And the Lord added to the church daily such as should be saved .
text2: Xoossaa galatiiddi , asa ubban sabettidosona . Qassi Godai attiyaageeta gallassi gallassikka eta bolli gujjees .

text: Now Peter and John went up together into the temple at the hour of prayer , being the ninth hour .
text2: Issi gallassi , PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi Xoossaa woossanau uddufun saatiyan Beeta Maqidasiyaa biidosona .

text: And a certain man lame from his mother ' s womb was carried , whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful , to ask alms of them that entered into the temple ;
text2: Yelettoosappe doommidi , wobbe gididi de7iya issi bitanee Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliya asaappe miishshaa woossanau , ubba gallassi daro lo77o giyo Beeta Maqidasiyaa penggiyan wottiyoogee de7ees .

text: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms .
text2: He wobbe bitanee , PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelana hanishin be7idi , miishsha eta woossiis .

text: And Peter , fastening his eyes upon him with John , said , Look on us .
text2: Woossin PHeexiroosi Yohaannisaara a tishshi ootti xeellidi , “ Nuukko haa xeella ” yaagiis .

text: And he gave heed unto them , expecting to receive something of them .
text2: Wobbe bitanee etappe aibakko ekkanau qaaqqatidi , etakko xeelliis .

text: Then Peter said , Silver and gold have I none ; but such as I have give I thee : In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi a , “ Tau miishshi baawa ; shin taassi de7iyaabaa taani neessi immana ; Naazireeta Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan denddada hemetta ” yaagiis .

text: And he took him by the right hand , and lifted him up : and immediately his feet and ancle bones received strength .
text2: Yaagidi , wobbe bitaniyaa ba ushachcha kushiyan oiqqidi , pude denttiis ; sohuwaarakka a tohoinne meeshi meqettai minni aggiis .

text: And he leaping up stood , and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and praising God .
text2: Bitanee pude guppidi , denddi eqqiis ; yaanne haanne hemetaa doommiis . Hegaappe guyyiyan hemettiiddi , guppiiddinne Xoossaa galatiiddi , etaara issippe Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliis .

text: And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
text2: I hemetettishiininne Xoossaa galatishin , asai ubbai a be7iis .

text: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple : and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him .
text2: Be7idi , miishsha woossanau daro lo77o giyo Beeta Maqidasiyaa penggen uttidaagee a gididoogaa akeekiis ; i hanidobaa be7idi garamettiis .

text: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John , all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon ' s , greatly wondering .
text2: Bitanee PHeexiroosanne Yohaannisa oiqqi uttidaashin , asai ubbai garamettidi , Solomona baranddaa giyoosan issippe etakko woxxiis .

text: And when Peter saw it , he answered unto the people , Ye men of Israel , why marvel ye at this ? or why look ye so earnestly on us , as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk ?
text2: PHeexiroosi asaa be7ido wode asaassi yaagiis ; “ Israa7eela asatoo , aissi hagau garametteetii ? Woi aissi nuna tishshi ootti xeelleetii ? Nuuni nu huuphe wolqqan woi Xoossaa milatiyoogan ha bitaniyaa hemetissidobaa intteyyo misatii ?

text: The God of Abraham , and of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his Son Jesus ; whom ye delivered up , and denied him in the presence of Pilate , when he was determined to let him go .
text2: Abrahaama Xoossai , Yisaaqa Xoossai , Yaaqooba Xoossai , nu aawatu Xoossai , intte aatti immidoogaa PHilaaxoosi birshshanau qoppi uttidaashin , intte a sinttan , ' Nuuni a erokko ' giido ba Na7aa Yesuusa bonchchiis .

text: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just , and desired a murderer to be granted unto you ;
text2: SHin intte geeshshaanne xilluwaa , ' Nuuni a erokko ' giidi , shemppuwaa woridaagaa a gishshaa inttessi birshshanau PHilaaxoosa woossideta .

text: And killed the Prince of life , whom God hath raised from the dead ; whereof we are witnesses .
text2: De7uwaa immiyaagaa intte worideta ; shin Xoossai haiquwaappe a denttiis ; denttidoogaassi nuuni markka .

text: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong , whom ye see and know : yea , the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all .
text2: Ha wobbe bitaniyaa Yesuusa sunttaa wolqqai minttiis ; intte be7iyoogeenne eriyoogeekka i a sunttan ammaniyoogan oosettiis ; ha intte ubbaa sinttan a hagaadan payya oottidaagee , Yesuusa i ammaniyoogaa .

text: And now , brethren , I wot that through ignorance ye did it , as did also your rulers .
text2: “ Ha77ikka ta ishatoo , inttekka inttena kaalettiyaageetuugaadan , erennan oottidoogaa taani erais .

text: But those things , which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets , that Christ should suffer , he hath so fulfilled .
text2: SHin Xoossai hananabaa beni yootiya ubbatu doonan , ' Kiristtoosi waayettana bessees ' yaagidi yootiis ; ba yootidoogaakka hegaadan poliis .

text: Repent ye therefore , and be converted , that your sins may be blotted out , when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord ;
text2: Simmi Xoossai intte nagaraa xaissanaadan , Godaa matappe ayyaanaa minotettaa wodee intteyyo yaanaadaaninne Xoossai Yesuus Kiristtoosa kase intteyyo doorettidaagaa yeddanaadan , intte nagaraappe Xoossaakko simmite .

text: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things , which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began .
text2: Xoossai hananabaa yootiya ba geeshshatu doonan benippe doommidi haasayidoogaadan , ubbabai ooraxxiyo wodee gakkanaassi , Yesuusi saluwan gam77anau bessees .

text: For Moses truly said unto the fathers , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you .
text2: Muusee , ' Godai Xoossai tana denttidoogaadan , intte zariyaa giddoppe intteyyo hananabaa yootiyaagaa denttana ; intte i giyoogaa ubbaa siyite .

text: And it shall come to pass , that every soul , which will not hear that prophet , shall be destroyed from among the people .
text2: He hananabaa yootiyaagee odiyoogaa siyenna asi ooninne asaa giddoppe shaahettidi xayo ' yaagiis .

text: Yea , and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after , as many as have spoken , have likewise foretold of these days .
text2: “ Qassi Sameelappe doommidi , appe guyyiyan hananabaa yootiyaageeti ubbati , ha wodiyaabaa yootidosona .

text: Ye are the children of the prophets , and of the covenant which God made with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed .
text2: Intte hananabaa yootiyaageetu naata ; qassi Xoossai Abrahaamassi , ' Sa7an de7iya asaa ubbaa taani ne zerettaa bagaara anjjana ' yaagidi nu aawatuura maacettido maachchaa naata .

text: Unto you first God , having raised up his Son Jesus , sent him to bless you , in turning away every one of you from his iniquities .
text2: Xoossai inttena ubbata intte iita ogiyaappe guyye zaaridi anjjana mala , ba ashkkaraa denttidi , intteyyo koiro yeddiis ” yaagiis .

text: And as they spake unto the people , the priests , and the captain of the temple , and the Sadducees , came upon them ,
text2: PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi asaassi yootishin , qeese halaqati , Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarata azaziyaageenne Saaduqaaweti ,

text: Being grieved that they taught the people , and preached through Jesus the resurrection from the dead .
text2: eti asaa tamaarissiyo gishshaunne harati haiquwaappe denddanaagau markka gidana mala , Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddidoogaa yootido gishshau , daro yiillotidi , etakko yiidosona .

text: And they laid hands on them , and put them in hold unto the next day : for it was now eventide .
text2: Yiidi eta oiqqidi , Sa7ai omariichchido gishshau wonttanaassi qasho keettaa gelissidosona .

text: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed ; and the number of the men was about five thousand .
text2: SHin qaalaa siyidaageetuppe daroti ammanidosona ; ammanida attumaasaa qoodai ichchashu sha7aa keeni gidiis .

text: And it came to pass on the morrow , that their rulers , and elders , and scribes ,
text2: Wonttetta gallassi , eta haariyaageeti , cimati , higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti , qeese ubbatu halaqai Haanni , Qayaafi , Yohaannisi Iskkinddirinne qeese ubbatu halaqaa dabboti ubbai Yerusalaamen yaa7idosona .

text: And when they had set them in the midst , they asked , By what power , or by what name , have ye done this ?
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta bantta gidduwan essidi , “ Ai wolqqan woi o sunttan hagaa intte oottidetii ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: Then Peter , filled with the Holy Ghost , said unto them , Ye rulers of the people , and elders of Israel ,
text2: He wode PHeexiroosi banan Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumin , eta hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Deriyaa haariyaageetoo , cimatoo ,

text: If we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man , by what means he is made whole ;
text2: hachchi ha wobbe bitaniyaassi oosettida lo77o oosuwaabaanne i waani paxidaakko , intte nuna oichchikko ,

text: Be it known unto you all , and to all the people of Israel , that by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth , whom ye crucified , whom God raised from the dead , even by him doth this man stand here before you whole .
text2: masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan intte xishidi kaqqin , Xoossai haiquwaappe denttido Naazireeta Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan ha bitanee paxidi , intte sinttan eqqidoogee intte ubbaassinne Israa7eela asa ubbaassi eretto .

text: This is the stone which was set at nought of you builders , which is become the head of the corner .
text2: Gimbbiyaageeti intte karidi ixxido shuchchai , godaa xaphuwaa minttiya , ubbaappe aadhdhiya shuchcha gidiis ; he shuchchai Yesuusa .

text: Neither is there salvation in any other : for there is none other name under heaven given among men , whereby we must be saved .
text2: Asi atotettaa Yesuusa baggaara demmanaappe attin , hara o baggaaranne demmenna ; nuuni a sunttan attanau bessees ; aissi giikko , Xoossai saluwaappe garssan asassi immido hara suntti baawa ” yaagiis .

text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John , and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men , they marvelled ; and they took knowledge of them , that they had been with Jesus .
text2: Yaa7aa asai PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi xalido xalaa be7ido wode , eti tamaaribeenna coo asa gididoogaa akeekidi garamettidosona ; qassi eti Yesuusaara de7iyoogaa eridosona .

text: And beholding the man which was healed standing with them , they could say nothing against it .
text2: Qassi paxida bitanee PHeexiroosaaranne Yohaannisaara eqqidaagaa asai be7idi , giyoobaa xayiis .

text: But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council , they conferred among themselves ,
text2: SHin PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi yaa7aappe kare kiyana mala asai azazidi , ba giddon zorettiiddi ,

text: Saying , What shall we do to these men ? for that indeed a notable miracle hath been done by them is manifest to all them that dwell in Jerusalem ; and we cannot deny it .
text2: “ Ha asata ai oottanee ? Aissi giikko , eta kushiyan oosettida gita malaatai Yerusalaamen de7iya ubbaassi beettiis . Nuuni hegaa erokko gaanau danddayokko .

text: But that it spread no further among the people , let us straitly threaten them , that they speak henceforth to no man in this name .
text2: SHin yohoi asau laalettenna mala , hagaappe sinttan ha asati Yesuusa sunttaa ooyyoonne denttennaadan , minttidi eta , ' Inttena erite ' goos ” yaagidosona .

text: And they called them , and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus .
text2: Eta xeesidi , Yesuusa sunttaa mulekka denttennaadaaninne abaa tamaarissennaadan azazidosona .

text: But Peter and John answered and said unto them , Whether it be right in the sight of God to hearken unto you more than unto God , judge ye .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi zaaridi , “ Xoossau azazettiyoogaa aggidi , intteyyo azazettiyoogee Xoossaa sinttan lo77okkonne ane intte pirddite .

text: For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni be7idobaanne siyidobaa yootennan agganau danddayokko ” yaagidi yaa7au odidosona .

text: So when they had further threatened them , they let them go , finding nothing how they might punish them , because of the people : for all men glorified God for that which was done .
text2: Yaa7ai eta qaxxayanau gaasottiyoobi xayin , naa77anttuwaa keehi manddidi , hanidabau asai ubbai Xoossaa galatiyo gishshau , eta birshshi yeddidosona .

text: For the man was above forty years old , on whom this miracle of healing was shewed .
text2: He harggiyaappe pattiyo malaatai oosettido bitanee yelettoosappe laittai au oitamaappe aadhdhiis .

text: And being let go , they went to their own company , and reported all that the chief priests and elders had said unto them .
text2: PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi birshshettidi , bantta dabbotukko biidi , qeese halaqatinne cimati banttana giidobaa ubbaa etassi odidosona .

text: And when they heard that , they lifted up their voice to God with one accord , and said , Lord , thou art God , which hast made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all that in them is :
text2: Eti hegaa siyido wode , issi wozana gididi , Xoossaa hagaadan yaagidi woossidosona ; “ Ubbaa Haariya Godau , saluwaa , sa7aa , abbaanne eta giddon de7iya ubbabaa medhdhidaagoo ,

text: Who by the mouth of thy servant David hast said , Why did the heathen rage , and the people imagine vain things ?
text2: neeni ne ashkkaraa nu aawaa Daawita doonan Geeshsha Ayyaanan haasayaidda , ' Aihuda gidenna asai aissi yiillotidee ? Qassi asai aissi pattennabau maqettidee ?

text: The kings of the earth stood up , and the rulers were gathered together against the Lord , and against his Christ .
text2: Sa7aa kawoti giigettidosona ; deriyaa haariyaageeti Godaa bollinne i tiyido Kiristtoosa bolli issippe denddidosona ' yaagada haasayadasa .

text: For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus , whom thou hast anointed , both Herod , and Pontius Pilate , with the Gentiles , and the people of Israel , were gathered together ,
text2: “ Aissi giikko , Heeroodisinne PHenxxeniyaa PHilaaxoosi Aihuda gidenna asaaranne Israa7eela asaara , neeni tiyido Kiristtoosa ne geeshsha Na7aa Yesuusa bolli denddanau , ha kataman shiiqidoogee tuma .

text: For to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done .
text2: Qassi neeni ne wolqqaaninne ne sheniyan hanana gaada qoppa uttidobaa ubbaa oottanau shiiqidosona .

text: And now , Lord , behold their threatenings : and grant unto thy servants , that with all boldness they may speak thy word ,
text2: Ha77ikka Godau , eta manddettaa xeella ; nuuni ne ashkkarati , ne qaalaa kumetta xalan yootanaadan , nuna danddayissa .

text: By stretching forth thine hand to heal ; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus .
text2: Pattanau ne wolqqaa bessa ; qassi ne geeshsha Na7aa Yesuusa sunttan oorattabaanne malaataa ootissa ” giidi woossidosona .

text: And when they had prayed , the place was shaken where they were assembled together ; and they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and they spake the word of God with boldness .
text2: Eti Xoossaa woossidoogaappe guyyiyan , he eti shiiqidosai qaaxxiis . Eta ubban Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumin , Xoossaa qaalaa xalan yootidosona .

text: And the multitude of them that believed were of one heart and of one soul : neither said any of them that ought of the things which he possessed was his own ; but they had all things common .
text2: Ammaniyaageeti ubbati qofaaninne wozanan issuwaa gididosona . Eta mehee ubbai issippe de7iyoorippe attin , baassi de7idabaa ooninne babaa gibeenna .

text: And with great power gave the apostles witness of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus : and great grace was upon them all .
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti Godaa Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddidoogaa gita wolqqan markkattoosona ; qassi Xoossai eta ubbau aaro kehatettaa darissidi immiis .

text: Neither was there any among them that lacked : for as many as were possessors of lands or houses sold them , and brought the prices of the things that were sold ,
text2: Ammaniyaageetu giddon metootanchchi issoinne baawa ; aissi giikko , biittai woi keettai de7iyoogeeti ubbati baizzi baizzidi , ekkido miishshaa ehiidi ,

text: And laid them down at the apostles ' feet : and distribution was made unto every man according as he had need .
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeetussi immoosona ; he miishshai asau koshshiyoogaadan shaahettidi , huuphiyan huuphiyan imettees .

text: And Joses , who by the apostles was surnamed Barnabas , ( which is , being interpreted , The son of consolation , ) a Levite , and of the country of Cyprus ,
text2: Qophphiroosa giyo haruuruwan yelettida Yooseefa giyo Leewa zare issoi de7ees ; a sunttaa Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti Barnnaabaasa giidosona . Hegaa birshshettai “ Minttettiya Na7aa ” giyoogaa .

text: Having land , sold it , and brought the money , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: Barnnaabaasi baassi de7iya biittaa baizzidi , miishshaa ehiidi , Yesuusi kiittidoogeetussi immiis .

text: But a certain man named Ananias , with Sapphira his wife , sold a possession ,
text2: Issi Hanaaniyaa giyo bitanee ba maccaasee Saphphiiro giyooriira gade baizziis .

text: And kept back part of the price , his wife also being privy to it , and brought a certain part , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: He baizzido miishshaappe ba maccaasiyaa erishin ashshidi , baggaa ehiidi , Yesuusi kiittidoogeetussi immiis .

text: But Peter said , Ananias , why hath Satan filled thine heart to lie to the Holy Ghost , and to keep back part of the price of the land ?
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi Hanaaniyaa , “ Neeni Geeshsha Ayyaanaa cimmada ne gadiyaa baizzido miishshaappe shaakkada ashshana mala , xalahee ne wozanan aissi kumidee ?

text: Whiles it remained , was it not thine own ? and after it was sold , was it not in thine own power ? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart ? thou hast not lied unto men , but unto God .
text2: Neeni baizzanaappe kase gadee nebaa gidenneeyye ? Qassi neeni baizza simminkka miishshai neessa gidenneeyye ? Yaatin , hagaa malabaa oottanau aissi ne wozanan qoppadii ? Neeni Xoossau worddotidoogaappe attin , asau worddotabaakka ” yaagiis .

text: And Ananias hearing these words fell down , and gave up the ghost : and great fear came on all them that heard these things .
text2: Hanaanee he qaalaa siyidosaarakka kunddidi haiqqi aggiis ; hegaa siyida ubbai daro yayyiis .

text: And the young men arose , wound him up , and carried him out , and buried him .
text2: Wodalla asati soo gelidi , a ahaa xaaxidi , gade kessidi a moogidosona .

text: And it was about the space of three hours after , when his wife , not knowing what was done , came in .
text2: Heezzu saate heerappe guyyiyan , Hanaaniyaa maccaasiyaa hegaa erennan de7aidda PHeexiroosi de7iyoosaa gelaasu .

text: And Peter answered unto her , Tell me whether ye sold the land for so much ? And she said , Yea , for so much .
text2: Gelin PHeexiroosi o , “ Intte gadiyaa hanni keena miishshen baizzidetii ? Ane tau oda ” yaagiis . A , “ Ee hanni keena miishshen baizzida ” yaagaasu .

text: Then Peter said unto her , How is it that ye have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord ? behold , the feet of them which have buried thy husband are at the door , and shall carry thee out .
text2: PHeexiroosi maccaasiyo , “ Neeninne ne azinai Godaa Ayyaanaa paaccanau aissi zorettidetii ? Be7a ; ne azinaa moogida asati karen de7oosona ; nenakka eti kare kessana ” yaagiis .

text: Then fell she down straightway at his feet , and yielded up the ghost : and the young men came in , and found her dead , and , carrying her forth , buried her by her husband .
text2: Maccaasiyaa sohuwaarakka PHeexiroosa tohuwaa matan kunddada haiqqa aggaasu ; wodalla asati geliyo wode haiqqidaaro demmidi , kare kessidi , i azinaa lanqqiyan moogidosona .

text: And great fear came upon all the church , and upon as many as heard these things .
text2: Woosa keettaa asai ubbainne hegaa siyida hara asai ubbai daro yashshaa yayyiis .

text: And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people ; ( and they were all with one accord in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti daro malaataanne oorattabaa asaa giddon oottoosona ; ammaniya ubbati Solomona baranddaa giyoosan issippe gaittidosona .

text: And of the rest durst no man join himself to them : but the people magnified them .
text2: Hara asappe etaara gaittanau harai atto issoinne xalibeenna ; shin asai eta bonchchees .

text: And believers were the more added to the Lord , multitudes both of men and women . )
text2: Ammaniya maccaasainne attumaasai kaseegaappe daroi Godaassi gujettees .

text: Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets , and laid them on beds and couches , that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , asai hargganchchata halaaninne saleenan tookkidi , PHeexiroosi hegaara aadhdhiyo wode harai atto , au eeshoikkonne etappe issuwaa issuwaa bollaara aadhdhana mala , katamaa ogetu dooni kessidi wottees .

text: There came also a multitude out of the cities round about unto Jerusalem , bringing sick folks , and them which were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed every one .
text2: Qassi daro asai Yerusalaame matan de7iya katamatuppe hargganchchatanne tuna ayyaanan ohettida asata ekki yees ; ubbatikka paxidosona .

text: Then the high priest rose up , and all they that were with him , ( which is the sect of the Sadducees , ) and were filled with indignation ,
text2: Paxin qeese ubbatu halaqainne aara de7iya Saaduqaaweti ubbati Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta daro qanaatidi , eta bolli denddidosona .

text: And laid their hands on the apostles , and put them in the common prison .
text2: Qassi Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta oiqqidi , dere asaa qachchiyo keettan yeggidosona .

text: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors , and brought them forth , and said ,
text2: SHin Godaa kiitanchchai qammi qasho keettaa penggiyaa dooyidi , Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta kare kessidi ,

text: Go , stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life .
text2: “ Intte biidi , Beeta Maqidasiyan eqqidi , ha ooratta de7uwaa qaalaa ubba asau yootite ” yaagiis .

text: And when they heard that , they entered into the temple early in the morning , and taught . But the high priest came , and they that were with him , and called the council together , and all the senate of the children of Israel and sent to the prison to have them brought .
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti hegaa siyido wode , guuraara Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelidi , tamaarissanau doommidosona . Qassi qeese ubbatu halaqainne aara de7iyaageeti yiidi , yaa7aanne Israa7eela cimata ubbata issippe xeegidi , Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta bantta sintti ehaana mala , wotaaddarata qasho keettau kiittidosona .

text: But when the officers came , and found them not in the prison , they returned , and told ,
text2: SHin wotaaddarati qasho keettaa biidi , Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta demmibookkona ; guyye simmidi yaa7au , “ Nuuni biyo wode qasho keettaa kariyaa daro mintti gorddin , naagiyaageetikka penggen eqqidaageeta demmida ; shin nuuni kariyaa dooyiyo wode , giddon harai atto issi asinne baawa ” yaagidosona .

text: Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things , they doubted of them whereunto this would grow .
text2: Yaagin Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarata azaziyaageenne qeese halaqati hegaa siyido wode , “ Hagee waanidee ? Qassi digin waananee ? ” yaagidi hirggidosona .

text: Then came one and told them , saying , Behold , the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple , and teaching the people .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , issi bitanee etakko yiidi , “ Be7ite ; qasho keettan intte yeggido asati Beeta Maqidasiyan eqqidi , asaa tamaarissoosona ” yaagidi etau odiis .

text: Then went the captain with the officers , and brought them without violence : for they feared the people , lest they should have been stoned .
text2: Odin , Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarata azaziyaagee wotaaddaratuura biidi , Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta ehiis ; shin eti banttana asai shuchchan caddana giidi yayyido gishshau , eta loddan ehiidosona .

text: And when they had brought them , they set them before the council : and the high priest asked them ,
text2: Eti Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta ehiidi , yaa7aa sinttan essin , qeese ubbatu halaqai eta ,

text: Saying , Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name ? and , behold , ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine , and intend to bring this man ' s blood upon us .
text2: “ Inttena nuuni he bitaniyaa sunttan tamaarissenna mala minttidi azazibookkonii ? Be7ite ; intte timirttiyaa Yerusalaame katamaa muleera gattideta ; qassi he bitaniyaa shemppuwan nuna oittanau qoppeeta ! ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said , We ought to obey God rather than men .
text2: Oichchin PHeexiroosinne Yesuusi kiittido harati zaaridi yaagidosona ; “ Nuuni asau azazettanaappe Xoossau azazettanau bessees .

text: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus , whom ye slew and hanged on a tree .
text2: Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishi kaqqidi , intte worido Yesuusa nu aawatu Xoossai haiquwaappe denttiis ;

text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour , for to give repentance to Israel , and forgiveness of sins .
text2: Israa7eelatussi nagaraappe simuwaanne nagaraa atto geettaa Yesuusi immana mala , Xoossai haariyaagaanne ashshiyaagaa a oottidi , baappe ushachcha baggan xoqqu xoqqu oottiis .

text: And we are his witnesses of these things ; and so is also the Holy Ghost , whom God hath given to them that obey him .
text2: Hegaassi nuuni markka ; qassi Xoossai baassi azazettiyaageetussi immido Geeshsha Ayyaanaikka markka ” yaagidosona .

text: When they heard that , they were cut to the heart , and took counsel to slay them .
text2: Yaa7aa asai hegaa siyido wode , daro yiillotidi , Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta woranau qoppidosona .

text: Then stood there up one in the council , a Pharisee , named Gamaliel , a doctor of the law , had in reputation among all the people , and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space ;
text2: SHin asa ubban daro bonchchettida Gamaaliyaala giyoogee , higgiyaa tamaarissiya issi Parisaawee , yaa7an denddi eqqidi , Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta guutta wodiyaa kare kessana mala azaziis .

text: And said unto them , Ye men of Israel , take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men .
text2: Azazidi yaa7aa hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Israa7eela asatoo , intte ha asata oottana qoppiyooban inttena naagite .

text: For before these days rose up Theudas , boasting himself to be somebody ; to whom a number of men , about four hundred , joined themselves : who was slain ; and all , as many as obeyed him , were scattered , and brought to nought .
text2: Aissi giikko , hagaappe kase wodiyan Tewodaasi bana gita giidi denddiis ; denddin oiddu xeetu gidiya asati aara gaittidosona ; shin a worin , a kaallida ubbatikka laalettidi , pattenna asa gididi attidosona .

text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing , and drew away much people after him : he also perished ; and all , even as many as obeyed him , were dispersed .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , asai qoodettiyo wode , Galiila Yihudai denddidi , daro asaa panggayidi kaalettiis ; shin akka worin , a kaallida asai ubbaikka laalettiis .

text: And now I say unto you , Refrain from these men , and let them alone : for if this counsel or this work be of men , it will come to nought :
text2: “ Ha77ikka taani intteyyo odais ; ha asatuppe shaahettite ; eta bochchoppite . Aissi giikko , ha qofainne ha oosoi asi oottidobaa gidikko xayana .

text: But if it be of God , ye cannot overthrow it ; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God .
text2: SHin ha qofainne ha oosoi Xoossaappe yiidabaa gidikko , intte eta xaissanau danddayekketa ; geelladan yaaniiddi Xoossaara intte iitettananne ” yaagiis .

text: And to him they agreed : and when they had called the apostles , and beaten them , they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus , and let them go .
text2: Yaagin yaa7ai Gamaaliyaala zoriyaa ekkidi , Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta soo xeesidi , lissuwan garafissiis ; hegaappe guyyiyan eta , “ Yesuusa sunttaa naa77anttuwaa mulekka denttoppite ” giidi birshshi yeddiis .

text: And they departed from the presence of the council , rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name .
text2: Yesuusa sunttaa gishshau , eti kauyyanau bessiyoogaa Xoossai qoppido gishshau , yaa7aappe ufaittiiddi kiyidosona .

text: And daily in the temple , and in every house , they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ .
text2: Eti ubba gallassi Beeta Maqidasiyaaninne asa son Yesuusi Xoossai tiyido Kiristtoosa gididoogaa tamaarissiyoogaanne yootiyoogaa yaa gujjidosona .

text: And in those days , when the number of the disciples was multiplied , there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews , because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration .
text2: He wode , kaalliyaageetu qoodai dari dari biishin , Giriike qaalaa haasayiya Aihudatinne Yihudan de7iya Aihudati ooyettidosona ; aissi giikko , Giriike qaalaa haasayiya Aihudati , “ Ubba gallassi yeziyo quman nu am77eti naaqettoosona ” yaagidosona .

text: Then the twelve called the multitude of the disciples unto them , and said , It is not reason that we should leave the word of God , and serve tables .
text2: Yesuusi kiittido tammanne naa77ati woosa keettaa asa ubbaa xeegidi , hagaadan yaagidosona ; “ Nuuni Xoossaa qaalaa yootiyoogaa aggidi , quma yezanau nuussi bessenna .

text: Wherefore , brethren , look ye out among you seven men of honest report , full of the Holy Ghost and wisdom , whom we may appoint over this business .
text2: Ishatoo , lo77o geetettiyaageeta Geeshsha Ayyaanainne aadhdhida eratettai kumido laappun asata intte giddoppe doorite ; nuuni qassi eta ha oosuwaassi sunttana .

text: But we will give ourselves continually to prayer , and to the ministry of the word .
text2: SHin nuuni Xoossaa woosaaninne qaalaa yootuwan minnana ” yaagidosona .

text: And the saying pleased the whole multitude : and they chose Stephen , a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost , and Philip , and Prochorus , and Nicanor , and Timon , and Parmenas , and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch :
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti haasayido haasayai asa ubbaa ufaissiis ; ufaissin , ammanoinne Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumido Isxxifaanoosa , Piliphphoosa , PHirokoroosa , Niqaaroona , Ximoona , PHarmmeenanne Aihudatu ammanuwan gelida Anxxookiyaa Niiqolaawoosa dooridosona .

text: Whom they set before the apostles : and when they had prayed , they laid their hands on them .
text2: Dooridi Yesuusi kiittidoogeetu sinttan eta essin , Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti Xoossaa woossidoogaappe guyyiyan , bantta kushiyaa eta bolli wottidosona .

text: And the word of God increased ; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly ; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith .
text2: Xoossaa qaalai aakki aakki biis ; kaalliyaageetu qoodainne Yerusalaamen keehi dari dari biis ; qassi daro qeesetikka ammanidosona .

text: And Stephen , full of faith and power , did great wonders and miracles among the people .
text2: Aaro kehatettainne wolqqai kumido Isxxifaanoosi , asaa giddon oorattabaanne gita malaataa oottees .

text: Then there arose certain of the synagogue , which is called the synagogue of the Libertines , and Cyrenians , and Alexandrians , and of them of Cilicia and of Asia , disputing with Stephen .
text2: Ailletettaappe kiyida asaa giyo Aihuda woosa keettaappe , Qareenappe , Iskkinddiriyaa asatuppe , Kilqqiyaappenne Isiyaappe yiida issi issi asati denddidi , Isxxifaanoosaara palamettoosona .

text: And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake .
text2: SHin Isxxifaanoosi aadhdhida eratettaaninne Ayyaanan haasayiyoogaa teqqanau danddayibookkona .

text: Then they suborned men , which said , We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses , and against God .
text2: He wode eti , “ Muusanne Xoossaa i cayishin siyida ” giya worddo asata shammidosona .

text: And they stirred up the people , and the elders , and the scribes , and came upon him , and caught him , and brought him to the council ,
text2: SHammidi dere asaa , cimatanne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeta hanqetissidosona ; Isxxifaanoosakko yiidi a oiqqidi , yaa7aakko ehin ,

text: And set up false witnesses , which said , This man ceaseth not to speak blasphemous words against this holy place , and the law :
text2: a bolli paidido worddo markkati , “ Ha bitanee ha Beeta Maqidasiyaanne Muuse higgiyaa cayiyoogaa audenne aggenna .

text: For we have heard him say , that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place , and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us .
text2: Aissi giikko i , ' Hagee Naazireeta Yesuusi ha Beeta Maqidasiyaa qolana ; Muusee nuussi immido higgiyaakka laammana ' yaagishin , nuuni siyida ” yaagidosona .

text: And all that sat in the council , looking stedfastly on him , saw his face as it had been the face of an angel .
text2: Yaa7an uttida asai ubbai Isxxifaanoosa akeekidi xeelliyo wode , a som77oi kiitanchchaa som77uwaa milatees .

text: Then said the high priest , Are these things so ?
text2: Qeese ubbatu halaqai Isxxifaanoosa , “ Hagee tumee ? ” yaagidi oichchiis .

text: And he said , Men , brethren , and fathers , hearken ; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he dwelt in Charran ,
text2: Oichchin Isxxifaanoosi hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Ta ishatoo , ta aawatoo , siyite ! Nu aawaa Abrahaami biron Kaaraane baanaappe kase Masphphexoomiyan de7ishin , bonchcho Xoossai ayyo beettidi ,

text: And said unto him , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and come into the land which I shall shew thee .
text2: ' Ne biittaappenne ne dabbotuppe shaahettada , taani nena bessiyo biitti ba ' yaagiis .

text: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and dwelt in Charran : and from thence , when his father was dead , he removed him into this land , wherein ye now dwell .
text2: He wode Abrahaami Kaladaawetu biittaappe kiyidi , Kaaraanen de7anau biis . A aawai haiqqidoogaappe guyyiyan , Xoossai a ha biittaa intte ha77i de7iyoosaa ehiis .

text: And he gave him none inheritance in it , no , not so much as to set his foot on : yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession , and to his seed after him , when as yet he had no child .
text2: I ha biittaappe harai atto , tohuwan yedhdhiyo sohuwaakka Abrahaamassi immibeenna ; shin ayyo na7i xayikkokka , Xoossai a , ' Taani neeyyoonne neeppe guyyiyan , ne zerettaayyo ha biittaa laata oottada immana ' yaagiis .

text: And God spake on this wise , That his seed should sojourn in a strange land ; and that they should bring them into bondage , and entreat them evil four hundred years .
text2: Xoossai Abrahaamassi , ' Ne zareti hara biittan de7ana ; yaani oiddu xeetu laittau eti ailletananne naaqettana .

text: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge , said God : and after that shall they come forth , and serve me in this place .
text2: SHin taani ne zareta haariya asaa bolli pirddana ; hegaappe guyyiyan , eti he deriyaappe kiyidi , hagan tau goinnana ' yaagiis .

text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision : and so Abraham begat Isaac , and circumcised him the eighth day ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs .
text2: Xoossai Abrahaama zaree qaxxarettana mala aara maacettin , Yisaaqa i yelidi , hosppuntta gallassi qaxxariis ; Yisaaqi Yaaqooba qaxxarin , qassi Yaaqoobi tammanne naa77u aawatu halaqata qaxxariis .

text: And the patriarchs , moved with envy , sold Joseph into Egypt : but God was with him ,
text2: “ Aawatu halaqati Yooseefa qanaatidi , Gibxxe biittaassi ailletanaadan , a baizzidosona ; baizzinkka Xoossai aara issippe de7ees .

text: And delivered him out of all his afflictions , and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt ; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house .
text2: A waaye ubbaappekka a kessiis ; qassi Gibxxe kawuwaa sinttankka nashuwaanne aadhdhida eratettaa ayyo immiis ; Gibxxe kawoi Yooseefassi Gibxxe biittaanne ba keetta ubbaa haaranaadan , sunttatettaa immiis .

text: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan , and great affliction : and our fathers found no sustenance .
text2: “ Gibxxe biittaaninne Kanaane biittan ubban koshai gelidi , daro asaa tuggayiis ; tuggayin nu aawati quma demmibookkona .

text: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt , he sent out our fathers first .
text2: Yaaqoobi Gibxxe biittan kattai de7iyoogaa siyidi , nu aawata koiro yaa yeddiis .

text: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren ; and Joseph ' s kindred was made known unto Pharaoh .
text2: Naa77antto buussan Yooseefi ba ishanttussi erettiis ; qassi Gibxxe kawoikka Yooseefa zariyaa eriis .

text: Then sent Joseph , and called his father Jacob to him , and all his kindred , threescore and fifteen souls .
text2: Yooseefi ba aawaa Yaaqoobinne ba dabbo ubbai muleera laappun tammanne ichchashu asai baakko yaana mala , kiittidi xeegissiis .

text: So Jacob went down into Egypt , and died , he , and our fathers ,
text2: Yaaqoobi Gibxxe biittaa wodhdhidi haiqqiis ; nu aawatikka yaani haiqqidosona .

text: And were carried over into Sychem , and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem .
text2: Eta ahai he sohuwaappe Sekeema giyo biittaa toohettidi , yaani Abrahaami Hamoora naatuppe daro biran shammido makkaanan moogettiis .

text: But when the time of the promise drew nigh , which God had sworn to Abraham , the people grew and multiplied in Egypt ,
text2: “ SHin Xoossai Abrahaamassi immana giidoogee polettiyo wodee gakkana matin , Yooseefa erenna hara kawoi Gibxxe biittan denddana gakkanaassi , asai dari dari biis .

text: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred , and evil entreated our fathers , so that they cast out their young children , to the end they might not live .
text2: He kawoi nu zariyaa cimmidi , guutta naati haiqqana mala , kare eta kessi olanaadan , nu aawata un77ettiis .

text: In which time Moses was born , and was exceeding fair , and nourished up in his father ' s house three months :
text2: “ Muusee yelettidoi he wode ; Xoossaa sinttan i daro lo77o na7a gidiis ; ba aawaa keettan heezzu agina gakkanaas dicciis .

text: And when he was cast out , Pharaoh ' s daughter took him up , and nourished him for her own son .
text2: Muusee wora olettido wode , Gibxxe kawuwaa na7iyaa demmada ba na7adan a dichchaasu .

text: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians , and was mighty in words and in deeds .
text2: Muusee Gibxxetu aadhdhida eratettaa ubbaa tamaaridi , qaalaaninne oosuwan wolqqaama asa gidiis .

text: And when he was full forty years old , it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel .
text2: “ SHin Muuseyyo yelettoosappe laittai oitamaa kumido wode , ba ishantta , Israa7eela asata be7anau ba wozanan qoppiis .

text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong , he defended him , and avenged him that was oppressed , and smote the Egyptian :
text2: Israa7eelatuppe issuwaa Gibxxe issoi naaqqishin be7idi , he Israa7eeliyaa maaddiis ; he naaqqida Gibxxe bitaniyaa woridi , a haluwaa kessiis .

text: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them : but they understood not .
text2: Muusee ba ishantta ba baggaara Xoossai ashshana haniyoogaa eti akeekidosona giidi qoppiis ; shin eti akeekibookkona .

text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove , and would have set them at one again , saying , Sirs , ye are brethren ; why do ye wrong one to another ?
text2: “ Wonttetta gallassi naa77u Israa7eela asati issoi issuwaara warettiyaageeta demmidi , eta sigettanau koyidi , ' Asatoo , Ishantti intte aissi issoi issuwaa naaqqeetii ? ' yaagiis .

text: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us ?
text2: “ SHin he ba shooruwaa naaqqiyaagee Muusa , ' Nena nu bolli haariyaagaanne daanna oottidi , sunttidai oonee ?

text: Wilt thou kill me , as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday ?
text2: Neeni zine Gibxxe bitaniyaa woridoogaadan , tanakka woranau koyaiyye ? ' yaagidi , Muusa gaxi sugi yeggiis .

text: Then fled Moses at this saying , and was a stranger in the land of Madian , where he begat two sons .
text2: Muusee hegaa siyido wode Gibxxeppe baqatidi , Midiyaama biittan bete gididi de7iiddi , naa77u attuma naata yaani yeliis .

text: And when forty years were expired , there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush .
text2: “ Godaa kiitanchchai oitamu laittaappe guyyiyan , Siinaa Deriyaa matan de7iya bazzuwaa buuran eexxiya tamaa lacuwaa giddon Muusessi beettiis .

text: When Moses saw it , he wondered at the sight : and as he drew near to behold it , the voice of the Lord came unto him ,
text2: Muusee ba be7idoogau garamettidi , akeeki xeellanau buuraa mati i shiiqidaashin , Godaa qaalai , ' Taani ne aawatu Xoossaa , Abrahaama Xoossaa , Yisaaqa Xoossaa , Yaaqooba Xoossaa ' yaagidi Muusekko yiis . Muusee yashshaa kokkoridi , xeellanau xalibeenna .

text: Then said the Lord to him , Put off thy shoes from thy feet : for the place where thou standest is holy ground .
text2: “ Godai Muusa , ' Neeni eqqido biittai geeshsha gidiyo gishshau , ne tohuwan de7iya caammaa kessa .

text: I have seen , I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt , and I have heard their groaning , and am come down to deliver them . And now come , I will send thee into Egypt .
text2: Taani Gibxxen de7iya ta asaa waayiyaa geeshsha be7ada , qassi eta ooliyaakka siyada , eta ashshanau wodhdhaas . Ha77i haa ya . Taani nena Gibxxe kiittana ' yaagiis .

text: This Moses whom they refused , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge ? the same did God send to be a ruler and a deliverer by the hand of the angel which appeared to him in the bush .
text2: “ He Muusa Israa7eelati ; ' Nena nuna haariyaagaanne daanna oottidi sunttidai oonee ? ' yaagidi ixxidosona ; ixxin buuraa giddon ayyo beettida kiitanchchan haariyaagaanne ashshiyaagaa gidana mala , Xoossai a kiittiis .

text: He brought them out , after that he had shewed wonders and signs in the land of Egypt , and in the Red sea , and in the wilderness forty years .
text2: He Muusee Israa7eelata Gibxxe biittan Zo7o Abbaaninne bazzuwan , oitamu laittau oorattabaanne Xoossai oottiyo malaataa oottiiddi , Gibxxeppe kaalettiis .

text: This is that Moses , which said unto the children of Israel , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear .
text2: “ Israa7eela asaassi , ' Xoossai tana denttidoogaadan , intte zariyaa giddoppe ta mala hananabaa yootiyaagaa intteyyo denttana ' yaagidai he Muusa .

text: This is he , that was in the church in the wilderness with the angel which spake to him in the mount Sina , and with our fathers : who received the lively oracles to give unto us :
text2: I Israa7eela asaa maabaraara issippe bazzuwan de7idaagaa ; i nu aawatuuranne Siinaa Deriyaa bollan baassi haasayida kiitanchchaara issippe de7iis . Yaatidi Xoossaappe de7uwaa qaalaa nuussi immanau ekkiis .

text: To whom our fathers would not obey , but thrust him from them , and in their hearts turned back again into Egypt ,
text2: “ Muusessi nu aawati azazettanau dosibookkona ; shin gede a sugi olidi , guyye gibxxe simmanau amottidosona .
