text: Saying unto Aaron , Make us gods to go before us : for as for this Moses , which brought us out of the land of Egypt , we wot not what is become of him .
text2: Qassi Aaroona , ' Nuna kaalettiya xoossata nuussi ootta ; aissi giikko , ha nuna Gibxxeppe ehiida Muusee waanidaakkonne nuuni erokko ' yaagidosona .

text: And they made a calf in those days , and offered sacrifice unto the idol , and rejoiced in the works of their own hands .
text2: Mara milatissidi , he wode eeqaa oottidosona ; he eeqaassi yarshshuwaa yarshshidi , bantta kushee oottido oosuwan ufaittidosona .

text: Then God turned , and gave them up to worship the host of heaven ; as it is written in the book of the prophets , O ye house of Israel , have ye offered to me slain beasts and sacrifices by the space of forty years in the wilderness ?
text2: SHin Xoossai etau zokkuwaa zaariis ; eti saluwaa xoolinttiyaassi goinnanaadan , eta yeggi bayiis ; hananabaa yootiyaageetu maxaafan , ' Israa7eela asatoo , oitamu laittaa bazzon shukkido mehiyaanne yarshshuwaa taassi yarshshidetii ?

text: Yea , ye took up the tabernacle of Moloch , and the star of your god Remphan , figures which ye made to worship them : and I will carry you away beyond Babylon .
text2: Intte intteyyo goinnanau oottido eeqata , Molooka dunkkaaniyaanne Refaana giyo intte xoossaa xoolinttiyaa tookkideta . Taani inttena Baabilooneppe hini baggi yeddana ' geetettidi xaafettiis .

text: Our fathers had the tabernacle of witness in the wilderness , as he had appointed , speaking unto Moses , that he should make it according to the fashion that he had seen .
text2: “ Muusee ba be7idoogaa milatissidi , Godai ayyo odidoogaadan oottido markka dunkkaanee nu aawatussi bazzuwan de7ees .

text: Which also our fathers that came after brought in with Jesus into the possession of the Gentiles , whom God drave out before the face of our fathers , unto the days of David ;
text2: Qassi nu aawati dunkkaaniyaa bantta aawatuppe kayan ekkidi , Xoossai kase yedettido Aihuda gidenna asaa biittaa oiqqido wode , Yaasuura gelissidosona ; he dunkkaanee Daawiti de7iyo wodee gakkanaassikka he sohuwan de7iis .

text: Who found favour before God , and desired to find a tabernacle for the God of Jacob .
text2: Daawiti Xoossan sabettiis ; qassi Yaaqooba Godai de7ana keettaa keexxanau Xoossaa woossiis .

text: But Solomon built him an house .
text2: SHin ayyo keettaa keexxidai Solomona .

text: Howbeit the most High dwelleth not in temples made with hands ; as saith the prophet ,
text2: “ SHin hananabaa yootiyaagee , ' Godai , “ Saloi ta kawotaa araataa ; sa7aikka ta tohoi yedhdhiyoosaa . Yaatin , taayyo ai mala keetta keexxuuteetii ? Woi taani shemppanasai awaanee ? Ha ubbabaa ta kushiyan oottabeikkinaa ? ” yaagees ' giidoogaadan , Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossai asi keexxido keettan de7enna .

text: Ye stiffnecked and uncircumcised in heart and ears , ye do always resist the Holy Ghost : as your fathers did , so do ye .
text2: “ Intte aiba morgge zozzida asee ? Intte wozanai Xoossaa qaalaa ekkanau aiba dammidee ? Intte haittaikka aiba tullidee ? Ubba wode Geeshsha Ayyaanaassi azazettennan ixxeeta .

text: Which of the prophets have not your fathers persecuted ? and they have slain them which shewed before of the coming of the Just One ; of whom ye have been now the betrayers and murderers :
text2: Hananabaa yootiyaageetun intte aawati waissibeennai oonee ? Xoossaa Na7ai Xilloi yaanaagaa kasetidi yootidaageetakka woridosona . Ha77i inttekka kiitanchchatu kushiyaappe Xoossaa higgiyaa ekkidi azazettibeennaageeti , Xilluwaa aatti immidi worideta ” yaagiis .

text: When they heard these things , they were cut to the heart , and they gnashed on him with their teeth .
text2: Eti hegaa siyido wode , bantta wozanan Isxxifaanoosassi daro yiillotidi , bantta menttershshaa sa77idi manddidosona .

text: But he , being full of the Holy Ghost , looked up stedfastly into heaven , and saw the glory of God , and Jesus standing on the right hand of God ,
text2: SHin Isxxifaanoosi banan Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumin , saluwaa pude tishshi ootti xeellidi , Xoossaa bonchchuwaanne Yesuusi Xoossaappe ushachcha baggan eqqidaagaa be7iis .

text: And said , Behold , I see the heavens opened , and the Son of man standing on the right hand of God .
text2: Be7idi , “ Xeellite , taani saloi dooyettin , Asa Na7ai Xoossaappe ushachcha baggan eqqidaagaa be7ais ” yaagiis .

text: Then they cried out with a loud voice , and stopped their ears , and ran upon him with one accord ,
text2: Qaalaa xoqqu oottidi wocamiiddi , bantta haittaa tuccidi , issippe akko wottaa shoddidosona .

text: And cast him out of the city , and stoned him : and the witnesses laid down their clothes at a young man ' s feet , whose name was Saul .
text2: Katamaappe gaxaa a kessidi , shuchchan caddidosona . Markkati bantta maayuwaa issi Saa7oola giyo wodallaa matan wottidosona .

text: And they stoned Stephen , calling upon God , and saying , Lord Jesus , receive my spirit .
text2: Isxxifaanoosi , “ Ta Godaa Yesuusaa , ta shemppuwaa ekka ” yaagidi xeesishin , eti shuchchan a caddoosona .

text: And he kneeled down , and cried with a loud voice , Lord , lay not this sin to their charge . And when he had said this , he fell asleep .
text2: Caddishin gulbbatidi , ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Ta Godau , ha nagaraa etau atto ga ” yaagiis . Hegaa yaaginnee haiqqi aggiis . Saa7oolikka Isxxifaanoosa woriyoogaa ufaittiis .

text: And Saul was consenting unto his death . And at that time there was a great persecution against the church which was at Jerusalem ; and they were all scattered abroad throughout the regions of Judaea and Samaria , except the apostles .
text2: He gallassi Yerusalaamen de7iya woosa keettan gita yedetai denddiis ; denddin Yesuusi kiittidoogeetuppe attin , ammaniyaageeti ubbati Yihudaa biittaaninne Samaariyaa biittan laalettidosona .

text: And devout men carried Stephen to his burial , and made great lamentation over him .
text2: Xoossaa woosan sheekkida asati Isxxifaanoosa moogidosona ; qassi au daro yeekkidosona .

text: As for Saul , he made havock of the church , entering into every house , and haling men and women committed them to prison .
text2: SHin Saa7ooli woosa keettaa xaissees ; ubbaa keettaa geli gelidi , attumaasaanne maccaasaa goochchi goochchidi , qasho keettaa yeddees .

text: Therefore they that were scattered abroad went every where preaching the word .
text2: Laalettida ammaniyaageeti qaalaa yootiiddi , ubbasaa biidosona .

text: Then Philip went down to the city of Samaria , and preached Christ unto them .
text2: Piliphphoosi Samaariyaa katamaa wodhdhidi , Kiristtoosabaa asaassi yootiis .

text: And the people with one accord gave heed unto those things which Philip spake , hearing and seeing the miracles which he did .
text2: Daro asai Piliphphoosi giidoogaa keehi akeekidi siyiis ; i oottiyo malaataakka be7iis .

text: For unclean spirits , crying with loud voice , came out of many that were possessed with them : and many taken with palsies , and that were lame , were healed .
text2: Aissi giikko , tuna ayyaanati qaalaa xoqqu oottidi haasayiiddi , daro asaappe kiyidosona ; qassi daro silatinne wobbeti paxidosona .

text: And there was great joy in that city .
text2: He kataman asai daro ufaittiis .

text: But there was a certain man , called Simon , which beforetime in the same city used sorcery , and bewitched the people of Samaria , giving out that himself was some great one :
text2: SHin Simoona giyo issi bitanee kase , bana gita giiddi kaayiiddi , Samaariyaa asaa , “ Laa hagee aiba oorattabee ” giissiiddinne he kataman de7iis .

text: To whom they all gave heed , from the least to the greatest , saying , This man is the great power of God .
text2: Guuttaappe doommidi , gitaa gakkanaashin , asai ubbai , “ Xoossaa wolqqai gitai hagaa ” giidi abaa ezggees .

text: And to him they had regard , because that of long time he had bewitched them with sorceries .
text2: Daro wodiyaappe doommidi , kaayuwan Samaariyaa asaa “ Laa hagee aiba oorattabee ” giissido gishshau , asai abaa ezggees .

text: But when they believed Philip preaching the things concerning the kingdom of God , and the name of Jesus Christ , they were baptized , both men and women .
text2: SHin Piliphphoosi Xoossaa kawotettaabaanne Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttaabaa attumaageetussinne maccaageetussi yootin , eti abaa ammanidi xammaqettidosona .

text: Then Simon himself believed also : and when he was baptized , he continued with Philip , and wondered , beholding the miracles and signs which were done .
text2: Qassi Simoonikka ba huuphen ammaniis ; ammanidi xammaqettidoogaappe guyyiyan , Piliphphoosaara issippe de7iiddi , oosettiya malaataanne Xoossai oottido gita malaataa be7idi garamettiis .

text: Now when the apostles which were at Jerusalem heard that Samaria had received the word of God , they sent unto them Peter and John :
text2: Yesuusi kiittido Yerusalaamen de7iyaageeti , Samaariyaa asai Xoossaa qaalaa ekkidoogaa siyido wode , PHeexiroosanne Yohaannisa etakko yeddidosona .

text: Who , when they were come down , prayed for them , that they might receive the Holy Ghost :
text2: Yeddin PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi wodhdhidi , ammaniyaageeti Geeshsha Ayyaanaa ekkana mala , etau Xoossaa woossidosona ;

text: ( For as yet he was fallen upon none of them : only they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus . )
text2: aissi giikko , Samaariyaa asati Godaa Yesuusa sunttan xinqqate xalaalaa xammaqettidoogaappe attin , etappe issuwaa bollinne Geeshsha Ayyaanai wodhdhiichchibeenna .

text: Then laid they their hands on them , and they received the Holy Ghost .
text2: He wode PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi bantta kushiyaa eta bolli wottin , eti Geeshsha Ayyaanaa ekkidosona .

text: And when Simon saw that through laying on of the apostles ' hands the Holy Ghost was given , he offered them money ,
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti bantta kushiyaa eta bolli wottin , etassi Geeshsha Ayyaanai imettidoogaa Simooni be7ido wode , PHeexiroosassinne Yohaannisassi miishshaa ehiidi ,

text: Saying , Give me also this power , that on whomsoever I lay hands , he may receive the Holy Ghost .
text2: “ Taanikka ta kushiyaa wottiyo ubbai Geeshsha Ayyaanaa ekkana mala , ha godatettaa taukka immerkketii ” yaagiis .

text: But Peter said unto him , Thy money perish with thee , because thou hast thought that the gift of God may be purchased with money .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi ayyo hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Neeni Xoossaa imuwaa miishshan shammanau qoppido gishshau , ne miishshai nenaara coo xayo .

text: Thou hast neither part nor lot in this matter : for thy heart is not right in the sight of God .
text2: Ne wozanai Xoossaa sinttan suure gidenna gishshau , neeyyo hagan oosoi woi sohoi baawa .

text: Repent therefore of this thy wickedness , and pray God , if perhaps the thought of thine heart may be forgiven thee .
text2: Yaatada ha ne wozanaa iita qofaa gishshau , nagaraappe simma ; geelladan ne wozanan de7iya iita qofaa Xoossai atto gaanaakkonne Xoossaa woossa .

text: For I perceive that thou art in the gall of bitterness , and in the bond of iniquity .
text2: Aissi giikko , neeni daro qanaatiyaa oiqqada nagaraa qashuwan de7iyoogaa taani be7ais ” yaagiis .

text: Then answered Simon , and said , Pray ye to the Lord for me , that none of these things which ye have spoken come upon me .
text2: Yaagin Simooni PHeexiroosassinne Yohaannisassi zaaridi , “ Intte giidobaappe issibainne tana gakkenna mala , intte tau Xoossaa woossite ” yaagiis .

text: And they , when they had testified and preached the word of the Lord , returned to Jerusalem , and preached the gospel in many villages of the Samaritans .
text2: PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi markkattidoogaappenne Godaa qaalaa yootidoogaappe guyyiyan , guyye Yerusalaame simmidosona ; simmiiddi Samaariyan de7iya daro qeeri katamatun wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootidosona .

text: And the angel of the Lord spake unto Philip , saying , Arise , and go toward the south unto the way that goeth down from Jerusalem unto Gaza , which is desert .
text2: Godaa kiitanchchai Piliphphoosa , “ Denddada Yerusalaameppe Gaaza efiya bazzo ogiyaakko ba ; he ogee tohossa baggaara de7ees ” yaagiis .

text: And he arose and went : and , behold , a man of Ethiopia , an eunuch of great authority under Candace queen of the Ethiopians , who had the charge of all her treasure , and had come to Jerusalem for to worship ,
text2: Piliphphoosi denddidi biis . Hinddake giyo Toophphiyaa kaweessi biittaa haariya i miishsha ubbaakka naagiya Toophphiyaa asa issi mureessai de7ees ; de7iyaagee goinnanau Yerusalaame biis .

text: Was returning , and sitting in his chariot read Esaias the prophet .
text2: Parai goochchiyo gaariyan uttidi , Yerusalaameppe guyye simmiiddi , hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasa maxaafaa nabbabees .

text: Then the Spirit said unto Philip , Go near , and join thyself to this chariot .
text2: Geeshsha Ayyaanai Piliphphoosa , “ He gaariyaakko shiiqada hemetta ” yaagiis .

text: And Philip ran thither to him , and heard him read the prophet Esaias , and said , Understandest thou what thou readest ?
text2: Yaagin Piliphphoosi woxxidi , hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasa maxaafaa mureessai nabbabishin siyidi a , “ Neeni nabbabiyoogaa akeekai ? ” yaagiis .

text: And he said , How can I , except some man should guide me ? And he desired Philip that he would come up and sit with him .
text2: Mureessai , “ Tau odidi akeekissiya asi bainnan waanidi akeekettii ? ” yaagiis ; qassi banaara gaariyan kiyidi uttana mala , Piliphphoosa woossiis .

text: The place of the scripture which he read was this , He was led as a sheep to the slaughter ; and like a lamb dumb before his shearer , so opened he not his mouth :
text2: Mureessai nabbabiyo maxaafaa sohoi hagaadan yaagees ; “ Dorssadan i shuhettanau laagettiis . Dorssa marai ba ikisiyaa meediyaagaa sinttan co77u giyoogaadan , ikka ba doonaa pogibeenna .

text: In his humiliation his judgment was taken away : and who shall declare his generation ? for his life is taken from the earth .
text2: I kauyyidoogan au xillo pirddi xayiis . A de7oi ha sa7aappe pude ekettiichchido gishshau , a zariyaabaa oonee yootanai ? ” yaagees .

text: And the eunuch answered Philip , and said , I pray thee , of whom speaketh the prophet this ? of himself , or of some other man ?
text2: Mureessai zaaridi Piliphphoosassi , “ Hananabaa yootiyaagee hagaa obaa odii ? Babaa odiiyye woi hara asabaa odii ? Tau odarkkii ” yaagiis .

text: Then Philip opened his mouth , and began at the same scripture , and preached unto him Jesus .
text2: Yaagin Piliphphoosi zaaridi , Xoossaa maxaafaa i nabbabiyoosaappe doommidi , Yesuusabaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaappe ayyo yootiis .

text: And as they went on their way , they came unto a certain water : and the eunuch said , See , here is water ; what doth hinder me to be baptized ?
text2: Eti ogiyaa oiqqidi biiddi , haattai de7iyoosaa gakkidosona ; mureessai , “ Haattaa hagaa be7a ; xammaqettiyoogaa tana diggiyai aibee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And Philip said , If thou believest with all thine heart , thou mayest . And he answered and said , I believe that Jesus Christ is the Son of God .
text2: Piliphphoosi a , “ Neeni ne kumetta wozanaappe ammanikko , danddayaasa ” yaagiis . Yaagin i zaaridi , “ Yesuus Kiristtoosi Xoossaa Na7a gidiyoogaa taani ammanais ” yaagiis .

text: And he commanded the chariot to stand still : and they went down both into the water , both Philip and the eunuch ; and he baptized him .
text2: Gaaree eqqana mala mureessai azazin , inne Piliphphoosi naa77ai duge wodhdhidi , haattan gelidosona ; gelin Piliphphoosi a xammaqiis .

text: And when they were come up out of the water , the Spirit of the Lord caught away Philip , that the eunuch saw him no more : and he went on his way rejoicing .
text2: Eti haattaappe gaxaa kiyido wode , Godaa Ayyaanai Piliphphoosa liphphi oottidi , efi aggiis ; naa77anttuwaa mureessai Piliphphoosa be7ibeenna ; shin ba ogiyaa ufaittiiddi biis .

text: But Philip was found at Azotus : and passing through he preached in all the cities , till he came to Caesarea .
text2: Piliphphoosi ba huuphiyau Azooxoosan de7iyoogaa eriis ; qassi Qiisaariyaa yaana gakkanaassikka , katama ubban yuuyiiddi wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootees .

text: And Saul , yet breathing out threatenings and slaughter against the disciples of the Lord , went unto the high priest ,
text2: SHin Saa7ooli Godaa kaalliyaageeta woranau manddiiddi , qeese ubbatu halaqaakko biis .

text: And desired of him letters to Damascus to the synagogues , that if he found any of this way , whether they were men or women , he might bring them bound unto Jerusalem .
text2: Biidi Godaa ogiyaa kaalliya asata maccaageetanne attumaageeta demmikko , qachchidi Yerusalaame ehaanau , Damasqqon de7iya Aihuda woosa keettatussi dabddaabbiyaa xaafanau a woossiis .

text: And as he journeyed , he came near Damascus : and suddenly there shined round about him a light from heaven :
text2: I biiddi , Damasqqo katamaa gakkana matidaashin , qoppennan saluwaappe wolqqaama poo7oi a yuuyi aadhdhidi poo7iis .

text: And he fell to the earth , and heard a voice saying unto him , Saul , Saul , why persecutest thou me ?
text2: Poo7in Saa7ooli sa7an kunddidaashin , “ Saa7oolaa Saa7oolaa , aissi tana waissai ? ” giya qaalaa siyiis .

text: And he said , Who art thou , Lord ? And the Lord said , I am Jesus whom thou persecutest : it is hard for thee to kick against the pricks .
text2: Saa7ooli , “ Ta Godau , neeni oonee ? ” yaagidi oichchiis . Oichchin , “ Taani neeni waissiyo Yesuusa . Boorai bana caddiya xam77aa qakkiyoogaadan , neeni qakkikko , nena qohaasa ” yaagiis .

text: And he trembling and astonished said , Lord , what wilt thou have me to do ? And the Lord said unto him , Arise , and go into the city , and it shall be told thee what thou must do .
text2: SHin Saa7ooli kokkoriiddinne garamettiiddi , “ Ta Godau , taani ai oottanau koyai ? ” yaagiis . Yaagin Godai a , “ Denddada katamaa gela ; neeni oottanau bessiyaabai neeyyo yaani odettana ” yaagiis .

text: And the men which journeyed with him stood speechless , hearing a voice , but seeing no man .
text2: Saa7oolaara ogiyan biya asati ainne haasayennan eqqi bayidi , qaalaa siyoosona ; shin oonanne be7ibookkona .

text: And Saul arose from the earth ; and when his eyes were opened , he saw no man : but they led him by the hand , and brought him into Damascus .
text2: Saa7ooli sa7aappe denddin , a aifee dooyettido wode , ainne xeellanau danddayibeenna ; hegaa gishshau , eti a kushiyaa oiqqidi goochchiiddi , Damasqqo gelissidosona .

text: And he was three days without sight , and neither did eat nor drink .
text2: Heezzu gallassa gakkanaassikka i xeellibeenna ; ainne mibeenna ; ainnekka uyibeenna .

text: And there was a certain disciple at Damascus , named Ananias ; and to him said the Lord in a vision , Ananias . And he said , Behold , I am here , Lord .
text2: Damasqqon issi Hanaaniyaa giyo kaalliyaagee de7ees ; Godai ajjuutan a , “ Hanaaniyau ” yaagiis . Yaagin Hanaanee , “ Ta Godau , hagan de7ais ” yaagiis .

text: And the Lord said unto him , Arise , and go into the street which is called Straight , and inquire in the house of Judas for one called Saul , of Tarsus : for , behold , he prayeth ,
text2: Godai a , “ Denddada Suure giyo ogiyaa baada , Yihudaa sooni issi Saa7oola giyo Xarsseeseppe yiida bitaniyaa koya ; aissi giikko , i woossees .

text: And hath seen in a vision a man named Ananias coming in , and putting his hand on him , that he might receive his sight .
text2: Qassi Hanaaniyaa giyo bitanee gelidi , Saa7ooli naa77anttuwaa xeellanaadan , ba kushiyaa a bolli wottiyoogaa ajjuutan be7iis ” yaagiis .

text: Then Ananias answered , Lord , I have heard by many of this man , how much evil he hath done to thy saints at Jerusalem :
text2: Hanaanee zaaridi , “ Ta Godau , Yerusalaamen ne geeshsha asaa bolli he bitanee ai keena iitabaa oottidaakko , taani daro asaappe siyaas .

text: And here he hath authority from the chief priests to bind all that call on thy name .
text2: Qassi Damasqqon ne sunttaa xeesiyaageeta ubbaa qachchanau , qeese halaqati au maataa immidosona ” yaagiis .

text: But the Lord said unto him , Go thy way : for he is a chosen vessel unto me , to bear my name before the Gentiles , and kings , and the children of Israel :
text2: SHin Godai a , “ Saa7ooli Aihuda gidenna asaa sinttan , kawotu sinttaaninne Israa7eela asaa sinttan , ta sunttaa erissanaunne taassi oottanau doorettida miishsha gidiyo gishshau , neeni ba .

text: For I will shew him how great things he must suffer for my name ' s sake .
text2: Aissi giikko , ta sunttaa gishshau , i woqqaa waayettanau bessiyaakko , taani a bessana ” yaagiis .

text: And Ananias went his way , and entered into the house ; and putting his hands on him said , Brother Saul , the Lord , even Jesus , that appeared unto thee in the way as thou camest , hath sent me , that thou mightest receive thy sight , and be filled with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Yaagin Hanaanee biidi , soo gelidi , ba kushiyaa Saa7oola bolli wottidi , “ Ta ishau Saa7oolaa , neeni yiyo ogiyan neessi beettida Yesuusi , neeni xeellana malanne Geeshsha Ayyaanai nenan kumana mala , tana kiittiis ” yaagiis .

text: And immediately there fell from his eyes as it had been scales : and he received sight forthwith , and arose , and was baptized .
text2: Sohuwaara , aibakko poqo malai Saa7oola aifiyaappe wodhdhin , Saa7ooli naa77anttuwaa xeelliis ; qassi denddidi xammaqettiis .

text: And when he had received meat , he was strengthened . Then was Saul certain days with the disciples which were at Damascus .
text2: Qumaa miidi gasttidi , Damasqqon de7iya kaalliyaageetuura amarida gallassaa takkiis .

text: And straightway he preached Christ in the synagogues , that he is the Son of God .
text2: Sohuwaara , “ Yesuus Kiristtoosi Xoossaa Na7a ” yaagidi , Aihuda woosa keettatun qaalaa yootiis .

text: But all that heard him were amazed , and said ; Is not this he that destroyed them which called on this name in Jerusalem , and came hither for that intent , that he might bring them bound unto the chief priests ?
text2: Hegaa siyida ubbai garamettidi , “ Hagee Yerusalaamen Yesuusa sunttaa xeesiyaageeta xaissiyaagaa gidenneeyye ? Qassi eta qachchidi , qeese halaqatu sintti efaanaassi yibeenneeyye ? ” yaagidosona .

text: But Saul increased the more in strength , and confounded the Jews which dwelt at Damascus , proving that this is very Christ .
text2: SHin Saa7ooli qaalaa yootiyo yootoi minni minnidi biis ; Yesuusi qassi Kiristtoosa gidiyoogaakka i akeekissidi odido gishshau , Damasqqon de7iya Aihudati ayyo zaariyoobaa xayidosona .

text: And after that many days were fulfilled , the Jews took counsel to kill him :
text2: Daro gallassaappe guyyiyan , Aihudati shiiqidi , Saa7oola woranau zorettidosona .

text: But their laying await was known of Saul . And they watched the gates day and night to kill him .
text2: SHin Aihudati bana woranau qoppidoogaa Saa7ooli siyiis ; eti a woranau qamminne gallassi katamaa penggiyaa naagoosona .

text: Then the disciples took him by night , and let him down by the wall in a basket .
text2: SHin i erissiyo ashkkarati a qammi efiidi , dirssaa huuphiyaara keeshiyan duge wottidosona .

text: And when Saul was come to Jerusalem , he assayed to join himself to the disciples : but they were all afraid of him , and believed not that he was a disciple .
text2: Saa7ooli Yerusalaame gakkido wode , erissiyo ashkkaratuura issippe gaittanau shiiqi be7iis ; shin kaalliyaagaa i gididoogaa ubbai ammanennan ixxidi , ayyo yayyidosona .

text: But Barnabas took him , and brought him to the apostles , and declared unto them how he had seen the Lord in the way , and that he had spoken to him , and how he had preached boldly at Damascus in the name of Jesus .
text2: SHin Barnnaabaasi Saa7oola Yesuusi kiittidoogeetukko efiis ; efiidi ogiyan Godaa i waanidi be7idaakko , ayyo Godai waatidi haasayidaakkonne qassi Saa7ooli Damasqqon Yesuusa sunttan yayyennan waatidi qaalaa yootidaakko , etau geeshshidi odiis .

text: And he was with them coming in and going out at Jerusalem .
text2: Saa7ooli Yerusalaamen yuuyiiddinne Godaa Yesuusa sunttan yayyennan qaalaa yootiiddi , Yesuusi kiittidoogeetuura issippe de7iis .

text: And he spake boldly in the name of the Lord Jesus , and disputed against the Grecians : but they went about to slay him .
text2: Qassi Saa7ooli Giriike qaalaa haasayiya Aihudatuura haasayeesinne palamettees ; shin eti a woranau koyidosona .

text: Which when the brethren knew , they brought him down to Caesarea , and sent him forth to Tarsus .
text2: Ishantti hegaa siyidi , Saa7oola duge Qiisaariyaa efiidi , Xarsseese yeddidosona .

text: Then had the churches rest throughout all Judaea and Galilee and Samaria , and were edified ; and walking in the fear of the Lord , and in the comfort of the Holy Ghost , were multiplied .
text2: Yihudan , Galiilaaninne Samaariyan ubban de7iya woosa keettati sarotettan de7idosona ; qassi minnidosona ; Godaassi yayyiyoogaaninne Geeshsha Ayyaanaa maaduwan heemettiiddi , qoodankka dari dari biidosona .

text: And it came to pass , as Peter passed throughout all quarters , he came down also to the saints which dwelt at Lydda .
text2: PHeexiroosi ubbasan yuuyiiddi , Lidan de7iya geeshsha asatukko qassi wodhdhiis .

text: And there he found a certain man named Aeneas , which had kept his bed eight years , and was sick of the palsy .
text2: Wodhdhidi hegan hosppun laittaasappe silidi , arssan zin77idi de7iya issi Eeniyaa giyo bitaniyaa demmiis .

text: And Peter said unto him , Aeneas , Jesus Christ maketh thee whole : arise , and make thy bed . And he arose immediately .
text2: PHeexiroosi Eeniyaa , “ Eeniyau , Yesuus Kiristtoosi nena pattees ; denddada ne hiixaa yegga ” yaagiis . Yaagin sohuwaara denddi eqqiis .

text: And all that dwelt at Lydda and Saron saw him , and turned to the Lord .
text2: Lidaaninne Saaroonan de7iya asai ubbai Eeniyaa be7idi , Godaakko simmiis .

text: Now there was at Joppa a certain disciple named Tabitha , which by interpretation is called Dorcas : this woman was full of good works and almsdeeds which she did .
text2: Yoophphe kataman issi Xaabito giyo ammaniyaara de7ausu ; Xaabito giyoogee Giriike qaalan Dorqqo giyoogaa . A ba de7ido wode ubban lo77obaa oottaiddanne hiyyeesaa maaddaidda de7aasu .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that she was sick , and died : whom when they had washed , they laid her in an upper chamber .
text2: He wode a harggada haiqqin , asai i ahaa meeccidi , pooqiyaa pude kessidi zin77issiis .

text: And forasmuch as Lydda was nigh to Joppa , and the disciples had heard that Peter was there , they sent unto him two men , desiring him that he would not delay to come to them .
text2: Lidi Yoophphessi mata ; kaalliyaageeti PHeexiroosi Lidan de7iyoogaa Yoophphen siyidi , “ Hayyanaa nuukko eesuwan yarkkii ” yaagiyo kiitaa naa77u asatu bolli akko kiittidosona .

text: Then Peter arose and went with them . When he was come , they brought him into the upper chamber : and all the widows stood by him weeping , and shewing the coats and garments which Dorcas made , while she was with them .
text2: Kiittin PHeexiroosi denddidi , etaara biidi gakkin , pooqiyaa pude a kessidi , kifiliyaa gelissidosona . Am77e maccaasati ubbai yeekkiiddinne Dorqqa etaara de7iyo wode oottido qamisetanne afalata ubbaa PHeexiroosa bessiiddi , a yuuyi aadhdhidi eqqidosona .

text: But Peter put them all forth , and kneeled down , and prayed ; and turning him to the body said , Tabitha , arise . And she opened her eyes : and when she saw Peter , she sat up .
text2: PHeexiroosi eta ubbaa kare kessidi , gulbbatidi Xoossaa woossiis ; qassi ahaakko simmidi , “ Xaabitee , dendda ” yaagiis ; yaagin Xaabita ba aifiyaa dooyada PHeexiroosa be7ada , suura uttaasu .

text: And he gave her his hand , and lifted her up , and when he had called the saints and widows , presented her alive .
text2: PHeexiroosi o ba kushiyan maaddidi , dentti essiis ; hegaappe guyyiyan , ammaniyaageetanne am77eta xeesidi , paxidaaro etassi immiis .

text: And it was known throughout all Joppa ; and many believed in the Lord .
text2: Ha yohoi Yoophphe katama ubban laalettiis ; laalettin daro asai Godaa ammaniis .

text: And it came to pass , that he tarried many days in Joppa with one Simon a tanner .
text2: PHeexiroosi Yoophphen issi Simoona giyo galbbaa qaaciyaagaara daro gallassaa gam77iis .

text: There was a certain man in Caesarea called Cornelius , a centurion of the band called the Italian band ,
text2: Qiisaariyan ' Xaaletu Olaasata ' geetettiya olanchchatuyyo issi mato halaqai Qornneliyoosa giyoogee de7ees .

text: A devout man , and one that feared God with all his house , which gave much alms to the people , and prayed to God alway .
text2: Qornneliyoosi Xoossaa daro ammaniya asanne ba so asa ubbaara issippe Xoossaassi goinniya asa ; Aihuda hiyyeesaakka i daro maaddees ; qassi Xoossaa ubba wode woossees .

text: He saw in a vision evidently about the ninth hour of the day an angel of God coming in to him , and saying unto him , Cornelius .
text2: Issi gallassi uddufun saate heeran , “ Qornneliyoosaa ” giya Xoossaa kiitanchchai baakko gelishin , Qornneliyoosi ajjuutan geeshshidi be7iis .

text: And when he looked on him , he was afraid , and said , What is it , Lord ? And he said unto him , Thy prayers and thine alms are come up for a memorial before God .
text2: Qornneliyoosi yayyidi , kiitanchchaa tishshi ootti xeellidi , “ Ta Godau , i aibee ? ” yaagiis . Yaagin kiitanchchai zaaridi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Ne woosainne neeni hiyyeesaa maaddiyoogee Xoossaa sinttan hassayettanau saluwaa biis .

text: And now send men to Joppa , and call for one Simon , whose surname is Peter :
text2: Ha77i Yoophphe asaa kiittada , PHeexiroosa giyo Simoona ehiissa .

text: He lodgeth with one Simon a tanner , whose house is by the sea side : he shall tell thee what thou oughtest to do .
text2: PHeexiroosi abbaa doona keettaawaa galbbaa qaaciya Simoona sooni imattatettau uttiis ; neeni oottanau bessiyaabaa i neeyyo odana ” yaagiis .

text: And when the angel which spake unto Cornelius was departed , he called two of his household servants , and a devout soldier of them that waited on him continually ;
text2: Qornneliyoosi baassi yootida kiitanchchai bin , ba ashkkaratuppe naa77atanne Xoossaassi goinniya baappe shaahettenna wotaaddaratuppe issuwaa xeesidi ,

text: And when he had declared all these things unto them , he sent them to Joppa .
text2: etau ubbabaa odidi , eta Yoophphe kiittiis .

text: On the morrow , as they went on their journey , and drew nigh unto the city , Peter went up upon the housetop to pray about the sixth hour :
text2: Wonttetta gallassi eti biidi , Yoophphe katamaakko matishin , PHeexiroosi usuppun saate heeran keettaa bollan dembbayidi oottidosaa Xoossaa woossanau kiyiis .

text: And he became very hungry , and would have eaten : but while they made ready , he fell into a trance ,
text2: Qassi namisettidi , qumaa maanau koyiis ; shin qumai ka77ishin , ajjuutaa be7iis .

text: And saw heaven opened , and a certain vessel descending unto him , as it had been a great sheet knit at the four corners , and let down to the earth :
text2: Saloi dooyettin , gita afala milatiyaabai oiddu baggaara ohettidi , sa7an wodhdhishin , PHeexiroosi be7iis .

text: Wherein were all manner of fourfooted beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping things , and fowls of the air .
text2: Hegan oiddu tohuwaara de7iya mehee , do7i , shooshshi , zareenne kafoi ubbi de7ees .

text: And there came a voice to him , Rise , Peter ; kill , and eat .
text2: “ PHeexiroosaa , dendda eqqada shukkada ma ” giya qaalai akko yiis .

text: But Peter said , Not so , Lord ; for I have never eaten any thing that is common or unclean .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi , “ Ta Godau , chii ! Taani aibakko tunabaanne sheneyiyaabaa mulekka ma erikke ” yaagiis .

text: And the voice spake unto him again the second time , What God hath cleansed , that call not thou common .
text2: Qassi naa77anttuwaa , “ Xoossai geeshshidoogaa neeni tuna gooppa ” giya qaalai akko yiis .

text: This was done thrice : and the vessel was received up again into heaven .
text2: Heezzutoo hegaadan giis ; hegaappe guyyiyan , sohuwaara he gita afala milatiyaagee pude saluwaa eketti aggiis .

text: Now while Peter doubted in himself what this vision which he had seen should mean , behold , the men which were sent from Cornelius had made inquiry for Simon ' s house , and stood before the gate ,
text2: PHeexiroosi ba be7ido ajjuutaa birshshettai ai gidanddeeshsha ? yaagidi , ba wozana giddon , “ Laa hagee aibee ? ” giishin , Qornneliyoosi kiittido asati Simoona keettai de7iyoosaa lal77iiddi , a penggen eqqidosona .

text: And called , and asked whether Simon , which was surnamed Peter , were lodged there .
text2: Bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ PHeexiroosa geetettiya Simoona giyo imattai hegan de7ii ? ” yaagidi oichchidosona .

text: While Peter thought on the vision , the Spirit said unto him , Behold , three men seek thee .
text2: PHeexiroosi ajjuutan be7idobaa akeekanau qofan sheekkidaashin , Geeshsha Ayyaanai a , “ Be7a , heezzu asati nena koyoosona ;

text: Arise therefore , and get thee down , and go with them , doubting nothing : for I have sent them .
text2: denddada wodhdha ; taani eta kiittido gishshau , sirennan etaara ba ” yaagiis .

text: Then Peter went down to the men which were sent unto him from Cornelius ; and said , Behold , I am he whom ye seek : what is the cause wherefore ye are come ?
text2: PHeexiroosi asatukko wodhdhidi , “ Intte koyiyoogee tana . Ai ekkana yiidetii ? ” yaagiis .

text: And they said , Cornelius the centurion , a just man , and one that feareth God , and of good report among all the nation of the Jews , was warned from God by an holy angel to send for thee into his house , and to hear words of thee .
text2: Eti , “ Xoossaassi yayyiya xilloi Aihuda asa ubban daro bonchchettida mato halaqaa Qornneliyoosi , nena ba soo efiissidi , qaalaa neeppe siyana mala , Xoossaa geeshsha kiitanchchai ayyo yootiis ” yaagidosona .

text: Then called he them in , and lodged them . And on the morrow Peter went away with them , and certain brethren from Joppa accompanied him .
text2: Yaagin PHeexiroosi asata imattanau soo xeesiis . Wonttetta gallassi , denddidi etaara biis ; Yoophphe kataman de7iya ishanttuppe issooti issooti aara issippe biidosona .

text: And the morrow after they entered into Caesarea . And Cornelius waited for them , and had called together his kinsmen and near friends .
text2: Wonttetta gallassi , qiisaariyaa gakkidosona ; Qornneliyoosi ba dabbotanne ba laggeta issippe xeesi shiishshidi , PHeexiroosa naagees .

text: And as Peter was coming in , Cornelius met him , and fell down at his feet , and worshipped him .
text2: PHeexiroosi gelana hanishin , Qornneliyoosi aara gaittidi , a sinttan kunddidi , assi goinniis .

text: But Peter took him up , saying , Stand up ; I myself also am a man .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi , “ Dendda ! Taanikka ta huuphen asa ” yaagidi a denttiis .

text: And as he talked with him , he went in , and found many that were come together .
text2: PHeexiroosi Qornneliyoosaara haasayiiddi , soo geliis ; i geliyo wode daro asai shiiqidaagaa demmidi ,

text: And he said unto them , Ye know how that it is an unlawful thing for a man that is a Jew to keep company , or come unto one of another nation ; but God hath shewed me that I should not call any man common or unclean .
text2: asaa , “ Aihuda asi hara zariyaara issippetettan de7anau , woi gaittanau woga gidennaagaa intte huuphen ereeta ; shin taani oonanne tuna woi sheneyiyaabaa geenna mala , Xoossai tana bessiis .

text: Therefore came I unto you without gainsaying , as soon as I was sent for : I ask therefore for what intent ye have sent for me ?
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte taassi kiittin , palami bainnan yaas . Ha77i , ' Tana aissi ehiissidetii ? ' yaagada inttena oichchais ” yaagiis .

text: And Cornelius said , Four days ago I was fasting until this hour ; and at the ninth hour I prayed in my house , and , behold , a man stood before me in bright clothing ,
text2: Qornneliyoosi hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Taani hachchi oiddu gallassaappe kase ha saaten uddufun saate woosaa ta sooni Xoossaa woossishin , PHooliya maayuwaa maayida asi ta sinttan eqqidi ,

text: And said , Cornelius , thy prayer is heard , and thine alms are had in remembrance in the sight of God .
text2: tana , ' Qornneliyoosaa , Xoossai ne woosaa siyiis ; neeni hiyyeesaa maaddiyoogaakka hassayiis .

text: Send therefore to Joppa , and call hither Simon , whose surname is Peter ; he is lodged in the house of one Simon a tanner by the sea side : who , when he cometh , shall speak unto thee .
text2: Simmi asa Yoophphe kiittada , Simoon PHeexiroosa giyoogaa xeesissa ; Simoon PHeexiroosi Simoona giyo galbbaa qaaciya bitaniyaa sooni abbaa doonan imattatettaa uttiis ' yaagiis .

text: Immediately therefore I sent to thee ; and thou hast well done that thou art come . Now therefore are we all here present before God , to hear all things that are commanded thee of God .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani neekko sohuwaara kiittaas ; neeninne yaada loittadasa ; simmi neeni nuuyyo yootanau Xoossai nena azazidobaa ubbaa siyanau ha77i nuuni ubbaikka hagan Xoossaa sinttan de7oos ” yaagiis .

text: Then Peter opened his mouth , and said , Of a truth I perceive that God is no respecter of persons :
text2: PHeexiroosi haasayaa hagaadan yaagidi doommiis ; “ Xoossai asa som77o xeellenna ; shin dere ubban baassi yayyiyaagaanne xillo ooso oottiyaagaa galatiyoogaa taani tumu akeekaas .

text: The word which God sent unto the children of Israel , preaching peace by Jesus Christ : ( he is Lord of all : )
text2: Xoossai asa ubbaa Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara , sarotettaa yootiiddi , ha wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa Israa7eela asaassi kiittidoogaa intte ereeta .

text: That word , I say , ye know , which was published throughout all Judaea , and began from Galilee , after the baptism which John preached ;
text2: Yohaannisi qaalaa yootido xinqqatiyaappe guyyiyan , Galiilappe doommidi , Yihudaa biitta ubban hanidabaa intte ereeta .

text: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power : who went about doing good , and healing all that were oppressed of the devil ; for God was with him .
text2: Xoossai Naazireeta Yesuusa Geeshsha Ayyaanaaninne wolqqan tiyiis ; Xoossai aara de7iyo gishshau , lo77obaa i oottiiddinne xalahe halaqaassi haarettida ubbaa pattiiddi yuuyiis .

text: And we are witnesses of all things which he did both in the land of the Jews , and in Jerusalem ; whom they slew and hanged on a tree :
text2: “ Aihuda biittaaninne Yerusalaamen i oottido ubbabaassi nuuni markka . Eti masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishi kaqqidi , a woridosona .

text: Him God raised up the third day , and shewed him openly ;
text2: SHin Xoossai heezzantto gallassan haiquwaappe a denttidi bessiis .

text: Not to all the people , but unto witnesses chosen before of God , even to us , who did eat and drink with him after he rose from the dead .
text2: Xoossai koiro doorido markkata nuna , a bessiisippe attin , asa ubbaa gidenna ; haiquwaappe i denddidoogaappe guyyiyan , nuuni aara miidanne uyida .

text: And he commanded us to preach unto the people , and to testify that it is he which was ordained of God to be the Judge of quick and dead .
text2: Xoossai wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa asaassi nuuni yootanaunne , paxa de7iyaageetu bollaaninne haiqqidaageetu bollan pirddanau i sunttidoogee Yesuusa gididoogaa nuuni markkattanau nuna azaziis .

text: To him give all the prophets witness , that through his name whosoever believeth in him shall receive remission of sins .
text2: Xoossai aani ammaniya ubbaa nagaraa a sunttan atto gaanaagaa hananabaa yootiya ubbati markkattoosona ” yaagiis .

text: While Peter yet spake these words , the Holy Ghost fell on all them which heard the word .
text2: PHeexiroosi biron he yohuwaa yootishin , qaalaa siyiya ubbaa bolli Geeshsha Ayyaanai wodhdhi aggiis .

text: And they of the circumcision which believed were astonished , as many as came with Peter , because that on the Gentiles also was poured out the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: PHeexiroosaara Yoophpheppe yiida , ammaniya qaxxarettida Aihuda ubbati Aihuda gidennaageetu bollankka Geeshsha Ayyaanaa imoi gukkido gishshau garamettidosona .

text: For they heard them speak with tongues , and magnify God . Then answered Peter ,
text2: Aissi giikko , eti dumma dumma qaalan haasayishiininne Xoossaa gitatettaa sabbishin siyidosona . He wode PHeexiroosi zaaridi ,

text: Can any man forbid water , that these should not be baptized , which have received the Holy Ghost as well as we ?
text2: “ Hageeti qassi nunadan Geeshsha Ayyaanaa ekkidaageeti xammaqettennaadan , haatta eta digganau danddayiyai oonee ? ” yaagiis .

text: And he commanded them to be baptized in the name of the Lord . Then prayed they him to tarry certain days .
text2: Eti Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan xammaqettana mala , eta azaziis ; hegaappe guyyiyan , eti banttanaara amarida gallassaa uttana mala , a woossidosona .

text: And the apostles and brethren that were in Judaea heard that the Gentiles had also received the word of God .
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeetinne Yihudaa ubban de7iya ishantti , Aihuda gidennaageetikka Xoossaa qaalaa ekkidoogaa siyidosona .

text: And when Peter was come up to Jerusalem , they that were of the circumcision contended with him ,
text2: PHeexiroosi Yerusalaame biido wode , qaxxarettida asati aara palamettidi ,

text: Saying , Thou wentest in to men uncircumcised , and didst eat with them .
text2: a , “ Neeni qaxxarettibeennaageetukko gelada , etaara qumaa maadasa ” yaagidosona .

text: But Peter rehearsed the matter from the beginning , and expounded it by order unto them , saying ,
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi hanidabaa koiruwaappe doommidi , maaran maaran hagaadan yaagidi yootiis ;

text: I was in the city of Joppa praying : and in a trance I saw a vision , A certain vessel descend , as it had been a great sheet , let down from heaven by four corners ; and it came even to me :
text2: “ Taani Yoophphe kataman Xoossaa woossishin , tau wozanai dammin , ajjuutaa be7aas ; gita afala milatiyaabai oiddu baggaara ohettidi , saluwaappe wodhdhidi , taakko yiis .

text: Upon the which when I had fastened mine eyes , I considered , and saw fourfooted beasts of the earth , and wild beasts , and creeping things , and fowls of the air .
text2: Hegaa giddo taani tishshi oottada xeelliyo wode , oiddu tohoi de7iyo mehiyaa , do7aa , shooshshaa , zariyaanne kafuwaa be7aas .

text: And I heard a voice saying unto me , Arise , Peter ; slay and eat .
text2: Qassi , ' PHeexiroosaa , dendda ; shukkada ma ' giya qaalaa taani siyaas .

text: But I said , Not so , Lord : for nothing common or unclean hath at any time entered into my mouth .
text2: “ SHin taani , ' Ta Godau , chii ! Tunabai woi sheneyiyaabai mulekka ta doonaakko shiiqi erenna ' gaas .

text: But the voice answered me again from heaven , What God hath cleansed , that call not thou common .
text2: “ Qaalai saluwaappe naa77anttuwaakka , ' Xoossai geeshshidoogaa neeni tuna gooppa ' yaagidi taassi zaariis .

text: And this was done three times : and all were drawn up again into heaven .
text2: “ Hegee heezzutoo hanin , wurssettan ubbabai saluwaa pude gooshettiis .

text: And , behold , immediately there were three men already come unto the house where I was , sent from Caesarea unto me .
text2: Hegaa peeshshankka heezzu asati Qiisaariyaappe taakko kiitettidi , taani de7iyo keettaa gakki aggidosona .

text: And the spirit bade me go with them , nothing doubting . Moreover these six brethren accompanied me , and we entered into the man ' s house :
text2: Gakkin taani sirennan etaara baana mala , Ayyaanai taassi yootiis . Qassi ha usuppun ishantti Yoophpheppe tanaara Qiisaariyaa bin , nuuni Qornneliyoosa soo gelida .

text: And he shewed us how he had seen an angel in his house , which stood and said unto him , Send men to Joppa , and call for Simon , whose surname is Peter ;
text2: Kiitanchchai ba sooni eqqidi bana , ' PHeexiroosa geetettiya Simoona xeesanau asa Yoophphe kiitta ; neeninne ne keettaa asai ubbai attiyo qaalaa i neeyyo yootana ' giidoogaa Qornneliyoosi waatidi siyidaakko , nuussi odiis .

text: And as I began to speak , the Holy Ghost fell on them , as on us at the beginning .
text2: “ Odin taani haasayanau doommiyoogan Geeshsha Ayyaanai koiro nu bolli wodhdhidoogaadan , eta bollikka wodhdhi aggiis .

text: Then remembered I the word of the Lord , how that he said , John indeed baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Godai , ' Yohaannisi haattan xammaqiis ; shin intte Geeshsha Ayyaanan xammaqettana ' yaagido qaalai taassi hassayettiis .

text: Forasmuch then as God gave them the like gift as he did unto us , who believed on the Lord Jesus Christ ; what was I , that I could withstand God ?
text2: Xoossai nuussi Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammanidaageetussi immido imuwaa malaa Aihuda gidennaageetussikka qassi immikko , simmi Xoossaa digganau taani oonee ? ” yaagiis .

text: When they heard these things , they held their peace , and glorified God , saying , Then hath God also to the Gentiles granted repentance unto life .
text2: Eti hagaa siyido wode bantta palamaa aggidi , “ Yaatin , Xoossai Aihuda gidennaageetikka qassi nagaraappe simmidi de7anaadan , eta qaadiis ” yaagidi Xoossaa galatidosona .

text: Now they which were scattered abroad upon the persecution that arose about Stephen travelled as far as Phenice , and Cyprus , and Antioch , preaching the word to none but unto the Jews only .
text2: Isxxifaanoosa bolli gakkida waayiyaa geedon laalettida ammaniyaageeti qaalaa Aihudatu xalaalaappe attin , haraassi issuwaassinne odennan , Pinqqe , Qophphiroosanne Anxxookiyaa gakkanaashin yuuyidosona .

text: And some of them were men of Cyprus and Cyrene , which , when they were come to Antioch , spake unto the Grecians , preaching the Lord Jesus .
text2: SHin Qophphiroosappenne Qareenappe yiida issi issi ammaniya asati Anxxookiyaa biidi , Godaa Yesuusa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiiddi , Giriike asaassikka yootidosona .

text: And the hand of the Lord was with them : and a great number believed , and turned unto the Lord .
text2: Godaa wolqqai etaara de7ees ; qassi daro asai ammanidi , Godaakko simmiis .

text: Then tidings of these things came unto the ears of the church which was in Jerusalem : and they sent forth Barnabas , that he should go as far as Antioch .
text2: Ha yohoi Yerusalaamen de7iya woosa keettaa asaassi siyettin , woosa keettaa asai Barnnaabaasa Anxxookiyaa kiittiis .

text: Who , when he came , and had seen the grace of God , was glad , and exhorted them all , that with purpose of heart they would cleave unto the Lord .
text2: Barnnaabaasi Anxxookiyaa biido wode , Xoossaa aaro kehatettaa oosuwaa be7idi ufaittiis ; eti ubbaikka Godan bantta kumetta wozanaappe minnidi de7anaadan , eta zoriis .

text: For he was a good man , and full of the Holy Ghost and of faith : and much people was added unto the Lord .
text2: Aissi giikko , Barnnaabaasi Geeshsha Ayyaanainne ammanoi kumido lo77o asa ; yaanin daro asai Godaa ammaniis .

text: Then departed Barnabas to Tarsus , for to seek Saul :
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Barnnaabaasi Saa7oola koyanau Xarsseese biis .

text: And when he had found him , he brought him unto Antioch . And it came to pass , that a whole year they assembled themselves with the church , and taught much people . And the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch .
text2: Biidi Saa7oola demmido wode , Anxxookiyaa ehiis . Barnnaabaasinne Saa7ooli woosa keettaa asaara issi laitta kumettaa uttidi , daro asaa tamaarissidosona ; kaalliyaageeti Anxxookiyan Kiristtaane geetettidi , koiro xeesettidosona .

text: And in these days came prophets from Jerusalem unto Antioch .
text2: Hananabaa yootiyaageeti Yerusalaameppe Anxxookiyaa he wode wodhdhidosona .

text: And there stood up one of them named Agabus , and signified by the spirit that there should be great dearth throughout all the world : which came to pass in the days of Claudius Caesar .
text2: Eta giddoppe Agaaboosa giyoogee denddidi , sa7a ubban gita namisai denddanaagaa Ayyaanaa wolqqan hananabaa yootiis ; hegee hanidoogee Qalaudeyoosa kawotettaa wodiyaana .

text: Then the disciples , every man according to his ability , determined to send relief unto the brethren which dwelt in Judaea :
text2: Kaalliyaageeti huuphiyan huuphiyan bantta wolqqaa keenaa miishshaa peeridi , Yihudan de7iya bantta ishanttussi maaduwaa yeddanau qofaa qachchidosona .

text: Which also they did , and sent it to the elders by the hands of Barnabas and Saul .
text2: Eti hegaadan oottidi , miishshaa Barnnaabaasa bollinne Saa7oola bolli woosa keettaa cimatussi yeddidosona .

text: Now about that time Herod the king stretched forth his hands to vex certain of the church .
text2: Kawoi Heeroodisi he wode woosa keettaa asaappe amaridaageeta waisuwaa doommiis .

text: And he killed James the brother of John with the sword .
text2: Doommidi Yohaannisa ishaa Yaaqooba bisuwan worissiis .

text: And because he saw it pleased the Jews , he proceeded further to take Peter also . ( Then were the days of unleavened bread . )
text2: Hegee Aihudata ufaissidoogaa be7idi , gujjidi PHeexiroosakka oiqqiis ; hegee Paasikaa Baalaa bonchchiyo gallassatuuna .

text: And when he had apprehended him , he put him in prison , and delivered him to four quaternions of soldiers to keep him ; intending after Easter to bring him forth to the people .
text2: PHeexiroosa oiqqidi qachchiis . Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassatuppe guyyiyan , dere asaa sintti aattanau qoppidi , oiddu oiddu wotaaddarati a naaganaadan , tammanne usuppun wotaaddaratussi aattidi immiis .

text: Peter therefore was kept in prison : but prayer was made without ceasing of the church unto God for him .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , PHeexiroosi qasho keettan naagettees ; shin woosa keettaa asai ayyo minttidi Xoossaa woossees .

text: And when Herod would have brought him forth , the same night Peter was sleeping between two soldiers , bound with two chains : and the keepers before the door kept the prison .
text2: Heeroodisi PHeexiroosa asaa sintti aattanau qoppanaappe kase qammi , PHeexiroosi naa77u sanssalatan qashettidi , naa77u wotaaddaratuppe gidduwan xiskkees ; naagiyaageetikka qasho keettaa penggen eqqidi naagoosona .

text: And , behold , the angel of the Lord came upon him , and a light shined in the prison : and he smote Peter on the side , and raised him up , saying , Arise up quickly . And his chains fell off from his hands .
text2: Akeekennan de7ishin , Godaa kiitanchchai hegan eqqi aggiis ; qasho keettankka poo7oi poo7i bayiis . Kiitanchchai PHeexiroosa miyyiyaa dechchi beegotissidi a , “ Elle dendda ” yaagiis ; sohuwaarakka sanssalatai a kushiyaappe wodhdhi aggiis .

text: And the angel said unto him , Gird thyself , and bind on thy sandals . And so he did . And he saith unto him , Cast thy garment about thee , and follow me .
text2: Kiitanchchai a , “ Ne suriyaa gixxa ; ne caammaakka wotta ” yaagin , PHeexiroosi hegaadan oottiis ; oottin kiitanchchai , “ Ne afalaa maayada tana kaalla ” yaagiis .

text: And he went out , and followed him ; and wist not that it was true which was done by the angel ; but thought he saw a vision .
text2: PHeexiroosi qasho keettaappe kiyidi , kiitanchchaa kaalliis ; ayyo ajjuutaa be7iyoobaa misatiisippe attin , kiitanchchai oottiyoobai tuma gididoogaa eribeenna .

text: When they were past the first and the second ward , they came unto the iron gate that leadeth unto the city ; which opened to them of his own accord : and they went out , and passed on through one street ; and forthwith the angel departed from him .
text2: Kiitanchchainne PHeexiroosi koiro wotaaddaraappenne naa77antto wotaaddaraappe aadhdhidi , katamaa efiya birata penggiyaakko gakkidosona ; gakkin penggee etassi barkka dooyetti aggiis ; eti kiyidi issi ogiyaara biishin , kiitanchchai sohuwaara PHeexiroosappe shaahetti bayiis .

text: And when Peter was come to himself , he said , Now I know of a surety , that the Lord hath sent his angel , and hath delivered me out of the hand of Herod , and from all the expectation of the people of the Jews .
text2: PHeexiroosi bana gakkidabaa akeekidi , “ Tana Godai ba kiitanchchaa kiittidi , Heeroodisa kushiyaappenne Aihuda asai naagi uttido ubbabaappe ashshidoogaa ha77i tumu eraas ” yaagiis .

text: And when he had considered the thing , he came to the house of Mary the mother of John , whose surname was Mark ; where many were gathered together praying .
text2: I hegaa akeekido wode , daro asai issippe shiiqidi Xoossaa woossiyoosaa , Marqqoosa giyo Yohaannisa aayee Mairaami soo biis .

text: And as Peter knocked at the door of the gate , a damsel came to hearken , named Rhoda .
text2: Biidi penggen xeesin , issi Roodo giyo ashkkariyaa dooyanau yaasu .

text: And when she knew Peter ' s voice , she opened not the gate for gladness , but ran in , and told how Peter stood before the gate .
text2: Rooda PHeexiroosa qaalaa gididoogaa erido wode , bana ufaissin , kariyaa dooyennan guyye woxxada , PHeexiroosi karen eqqidoogaa asaassi odaasu .

text: And they said unto her , Thou art mad . But she constantly affirmed that it was even so . Then said they , It is his angel .
text2: Odin asai o , “ Hannee neeni gooyaasa ” yaagiis . Rooda PHeexiroosa gididoogaa geeshshada odaasu . Eti , “ Hegee a kiitanchchaa ” yaagidosona .

text: But Peter continued knocking : and when they had opened the door , and saw him , they were astonished .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi karen xeegidi aggennan ixxin , asai kariyaa dooyidi , a be7idi garamettiis .

text: But he , beckoning unto them with the hand to hold their peace , declared unto them how the Lord had brought him out of the prison . And he said , Go shew these things unto James , and to the brethren . And he departed , and went into another place .
text2: SHin eti co77u gaana mala , PHeexiroosi ba kushiyan malaatidi , Godai qasho keettaappe a waati kessidaakko , etassi qonccissi yootidi , “ Hagaa Yaaqoobassinne ishanttussi yootite ” giidi , kiyidi harasaa biis .

text: Now as soon as it was day , there was no small stir among the soldiers , what was become of Peter .
text2: Sa7ai wonttido wode , PHeexiroosi au biichchidaakko gin wotaaddaratu giddon daro wocamai kiyiis .

text: And when Herod had sought for him , and found him not , he examined the keepers , and commanded that they should be put to death . And he went down from Judaea to Caesarea , and there abode .
text2: Heeroodisi PHeexiroosa Lal77issin , i xayido wode , naagiyaageeta qoridi , eta worana mala azaziis ; hegaappe guyyiyan , Yihudaappe Qiisaariyaa wodhdhidi , hegan amarida wodiyaa uttiis .

text: And Herod was highly displeased with them of Tyre and Sidon : but they came with one accord to him , and , having made Blastus the king ' s chamberlain their friend , desired peace ; because their country was nourished by the king ' s country .
text2: Heeroodisi Xiiroosa asaassinne Sidoona asaassi daro hanqqettiis ; hanqqettin eta biittai kattaa Heeroodisa biittaappe demmiyo gishshau , eti issippe gididi , a keettaa halaqaa Bilasxxoosa bantta exa oottidi , sigaa woossanau Heeroodisakko biidosona .

text: And upon a set day Herod , arrayed in royal apparel , sat upon his throne , and made an oration unto them .
text2: Heeroodisi sunttettido gallassi , ba kawotettaa afalaa maayidi , kawotaa araatan uttidi , asaassi haasayiis .

text: And the people gave a shout , saying , It is the voice of a god , and not of a man .
text2: Asai , “ Hagee Xoossaa qaala ; asa qaala gidenna ” yaagidi qaalaa xoqqissidi haasayiis .

text: And immediately the angel of the Lord smote him , because he gave not God the glory : and he was eaten of worms , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Heeroodisi Xoossaa bonchchibeenna gishshau , sohuwaarakka Godaa kiitanchchai a dechchin , guxuniyan meetettidi , haiqqi bayiis .

text: But the word of God grew and multiplied .
text2: SHin Xoossaa qaalai dicceesinne dari dari bees .

text: And Barnabas and Saul returned from Jerusalem , when they had fulfilled their ministry , and took with them John , whose surname was Mark .
text2: Barnnaabaasinne Saa7ooli bantta oosuwaa polidi , Marqqoosa giyo Yohaannisa banttanaara ekkidi , Yerusalaameppe simmidosona .

text: Now there were in the church that was at Antioch certain prophets and teachers ; as Barnabas , and Simeon that was called Niger , and Lucius of Cyrene , and Manaen , which had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch , and Saul .
text2: Anxxookiyan de7iya woosa keettan hananabaa yootiyaageetinne tamaarissiyaageeti de7oosona ; eti Barnnaabaasa , Karetta giyo Simoona , Qareenappe yiida Luqiyoosa , biittaa haariya Heeroodisaara diccida Minaahanne Saa7oola .

text: As they ministered to the Lord , and fasted , the Holy Ghost said , Separate me Barnabas and Saul for the work whereunto I have called them .
text2: Eti Godaassi goinnishiininne xoomishin , Geeshsha Ayyaanai , “ Taani xeesido oosuwaassi Barnnaabaasanne Saa7oola tau kessite ” yaagiis .

text: And when they had fasted and prayed , and laid their hands on them , they sent them away .
text2: Yaagin eti xoomidoogaappenne woossidoogaappe guyyiyan , bantta kushiyaa Barnnaabaasa bollinne Saa7oola bolli wottidi , eta yeddidosona .

text: So they , being sent forth by the Holy Ghost , departed unto Seleucia ; and from thence they sailed to Cyprus .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Geeshsha Ayyaanai eta kiittin , Selewuqiyaa wodhdhidosona ; hegaappe markkabiyan gelidi , Qophphiroosa haruuruwaa biidosona .

text: And when they were at Salamis , they preached the word of God in the synagogues of the Jews : and they had also John to their minister .
text2: Eti Silmmaana gakkidi , Aihuda woosa keettatun Xoossaa qaalaa yootidosona ; eta maaddanau Yohaannisi etaara de7ees .

text: And when they had gone through the isle unto Paphos , they found a certain sorcerer , a false prophet , a Jew , whose name was Bar - jesus :
text2: Eti Qophphiroosa haruuruwaa muleera PHaafu gakkanaassi yuuyidi , hananabaa yootiya issi worddanchchaa , Aihuda asa Bar - Yesuusa giyo shareechchuwaa demmidosona .

text: Which was with the deputy of the country , Sergius Paulus , a prudent man ; who called for Barnabas and Saul , and desired to hear the word of God .
text2: He shareechchoi deriyaa haariya Sarggiyoosa PHauloosa giyo akeekanchcha bitaniyaara de7ees . Sarggiyoosa PHauloosi Barnnaabaasanne Saa7oola baakko xeegidi , Xoossaa qaalaa siyanau koyiis .

text: But Elymas the sorcerer ( for so is his name by interpretation ) withstood them , seeking to turn away the deputy from the faith .
text2: SHin shareechchuwaa Eliimaasi ( Giriike qaalan hegee a sunttaa ) deriyaa haariyaagaa ammanuwaa digganau koyidi , eta haasayaa phalqqiis .

text: Then Saul , ( who also is called Paul , ) filled with the Holy Ghost , set his eyes on him ,
text2: SHin PHauloosa giyo Saa7ooli banan Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumin , shareechchuwaa tishshi ootti xeellidi ,

text: And said , O full of all subtilty and all mischief , thou child of the devil , thou enemy of all righteousness , wilt thou not cease to pervert the right ways of the Lord ?
text2: a , “ Laa ha xalahe halaqaa na7au , gene ubbainne iitatetta ubbai kumidoogoo , xillotetta ubbau morkkiyau , Godaa ogiyaa suuriyaa geellayiyoogaa aggikkii ?

text: And now , behold , the hand of the Lord is upon thee , and thou shalt be blind , not seeing the sun for a season . And immediately there fell on him a mist and a darkness ; and he went about seeking some to lead him by the hand .
text2: Be7a ; ha77i Godaa kushee ne bolli de7ees ; neeni qooqe gidana ; amarida wodee gakkanaashin , awaa poo7uwaa be7akka ” yaagiis . Yaagin sohuwaara ciggaarainne xumai a aifiyaa goozin , ba kushiyaa oiqqidi , kaalettiya uraa koyiiddi yuuyiis .

text: Then the deputy , when he saw what was done , believed , being astonished at the doctrine of the Lord .
text2: He wode deriyaa haariyaagee hegaa be7ido wode , Godai tamaarissiyoogan garamettidi ammaniis .

text: Now when Paul and his company loosed from Paphos , they came to Perga in Pamphylia : and John departing from them returned to Jerusalem .
text2: PHauloosinne aara de7iyaageeti PHaafuppe denddidi , PHinifiliyan de7iya PHergge markkabiyan biidosona ; Yohaannisi etappe shaahettidi , Yerusalaame simmiis .

text: But when they departed from Perga , they came to Antioch in Pisidia , and went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and sat down .
text2: SHin eti PHerggeppe aadhdhidi , PHisddiyan de7iya Anxxookiyaa gakkidosona ; Sambbata gallassan Aihuda woosa keettaa gelidi uttidosona .

text: And after the reading of the law and the prophets the rulers of the synagogue sent unto them , saying , Ye men and brethren , if ye have any word of exhortation for the people , say on .
text2: Muuse higgeenne hananabaa yootiyaageetu maxaafai nabbabettidoogaappe guyyiyan , Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqati , “ Nu ishanttoo asaa minttettiya qaalai inttessi de7ikko , asau haasayerkketii ” yaagidi etassi kiittidosona .

text: Then Paul stood up , and beckoning with his hand said , Men of Israel , and ye that fear God , give audience .
text2: PHauloosi denddi eqqidi , ba kushiyan malaatidi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Israa7eela asatoo , Xoossaassi yayyiyaageetoo siyite .

text: The God of this people of Israel chose our fathers , and exalted the people when they dwelt as strangers in the land of Egypt , and with an high arm brought he them out of it .
text2: Ha Israa7eela asaa Xoossai nu aawata dooridi , Gibxxe biittan imattatettan eti de7ishin , eta darissiis ; ba gita wolqqankka Gibxxe biittaappe eta kessiis .

text: And about the time of forty years suffered he their manners in the wilderness .
text2: Bazzuwan oitamu laitta keenaa nu aawata i danddayiis .

text: And when he had destroyed seven nations in the land of Chanaan , he divided their land to them by lot .
text2: Kanaane giyo biittan Aihuda gidenna laappun zareta xaissidi , eta biittaa ba asaa laatissiis .

text: And after that he gave unto them judges about the space of four hundred and fifty years , until Samuel the prophet .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , hananabaa yootiya Sameela wodiyaa gakkanaas , oiddu xeetanne ishatamu laitta keenaa daannata etassi immiis .

text: And afterward they desired a king : and God gave unto them Saul the son of Cis , a man of the tribe of Benjamin , by the space of forty years .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , eti banttassi kawo immana mala woossin , Xoossai Biniyaama zariyaappe Qiisa na7aa Saa7oola oitamu laittau kawotana mala , etassi immiis .

text: And when he had removed him , he raised up unto them David to be their king ; to whom also he gave testimony , and said , I have found David the son of Jesse , a man after mine own heart , which shall fulfil all my will .
text2: Xoossai Saa7oola shaaridoogaappe guyyiyan , eta bolli Daawiti kawotana mala , a denttiis ; Daawitabaa markkattiiddi , ' Taani koyiyo ubbabaa ta wozanadan oottiya Isseyi na7aa Daawita demmaas ' yaagiis .

text: Of this man ' s seed hath God according to his promise raised unto Israel a Saviour , Jesus :
text2: “ Xoossai , ' Taani Daawita zariyaappe Israa7eela asaa ashshiyaagaa ehaana ' giidoogaadankka , Yesuusa ehiis .

text: When John had first preached before his coming the baptism of repentance to all the people of Israel .
text2: Yesuusi yaanaappe kase Israa7eela asai ubbai bantta nagaraappe simmidi xammaqettana mala , Yohaannisi qaalaa yootiis .

text: And as John fulfilled his course , he said , Whom think ye that I am ? I am not he . But , behold , there cometh one after me , whose shoes of his feet I am not worthy to loose .
text2: Qassi Yohaannisi ba oosuwaa wurssana haniiddi asaa , ' Tana oona giidi qoppeetii ? Taani intte naagiyoogaa gidikke ; shin be7ite , a tohuwaa caammaa birshshanaukka taassi bessennaagee taappe guyyeera yees ' yaagiis .

text: Men and brethren , children of the stock of Abraham , and whosoever among you feareth God , to you is the word of this salvation sent .
text2: “ Ta ishatoo , Abrahaama zaretoo , qassi hagan Aihuda gidennaageetoo Xoossaassi yayyiyaageetoo , ha atotettaa qaalai nuussi kiitettiis .

text: For they that dwell at Jerusalem , and their rulers , because they knew him not , nor yet the voices of the prophets which are read every sabbath day , they have fulfilled them in condemning him .
text2: Aissi giikko , Yerusalaamen de7iya asainne eta halaqati Yesuusanne Sambbata gallassa ubban nabbabettiya hananabaa yootiyaageetu qaalaa akeekibeenna gishshau , a bolli pirddidi , hananabaa yootiyaageetu qaalaa polidosona .

text: And though they found no cause of death in him , yet desired they Pilate that he should be slain .
text2: Yesuusa worissanau issi gaasoikka etau beettennan ixxin , PHilaaxoosi a worana mala woossidosona .

text: And when they had fulfilled all that was written of him , they took him down from the tree , and laid him in a sepulchre .
text2: “ Eti Yesuusabai Xoossaa maxaafan xaafettidaagaa ubbaa polido wode , masqqaliyaappe a wottidi moogidosona .

text: But God raised him from the dead :
text2: SHin Xoossai haiquwaappe Yesuusa denttiis .

text: And he was seen many days of them which came up with him from Galilee to Jerusalem , who are his witnesses unto the people .
text2: Denttin i banaara Galiilappe Yerusalaame yiidaageetussi darotoo beettiis eti ha77i abaa asaassi markkattoosona .

text: And we declare unto you glad tidings , how that the promise which was made unto the fathers ,
text2: “ Xoossai nu aawatussi immana giido wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa nuuni inttessi yootoos .

text: God hath fulfilled the same unto us their children , in that he hath raised up Jesus again ; as it is also written in the second psalm , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee .
text2: Daawita Mazamuriyaa Maxaafan naa77antto miraafiyan , ' Neeni ta Na7aa . Hachchi taani ne Aawaa gidaas ' geetettidi xaafettidoogaadan , Xoossai Yesuusa denttidi , nu aawatussi immana giidoogaa nuussi eta naatussi poliis .

text: And as concerning that he raised him up from the dead , now no more to return to corruption , he said on this wise , I will give you the sure mercies of David .
text2: Naa77anttuwaa i haiqqenna mala , haiquwaappe a denttidoogaassi Xoossai , ' Taani Daawitayyo immana giido ammanettida geeshsha anjjuwaa inttessi immana ' yaagidi haasayiis .

text: Wherefore he saith also in another psalm , Thou shalt not suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Mazamure Maxaafan harasan qassi , ' Ne Geeshsha Na7aa ahaakka musissakka ' yaagees .

text: For David , after he had served his own generation by the will of God , fell on sleep , and was laid unto his fathers , and saw corruption :
text2: Aissi giikko , Daawiti ba wodiyan Xoossaa qofaa oottidoogaappe guyyiyan haiqqidi , ba aawatuura moogettidi musiis .

text: But he , whom God raised again , saw no corruption .
text2: SHin Xoossai haiquwaappe denttidoogee musibeenna .

text: Be it known unto you therefore , men and brethren , that through this man is preached unto you the forgiveness of sins :
text2: “ Hegaa gishshau , ta ishatoo , nagara atto geettai intteyyo Yesuusa baggaara odettidoogeenne , Muuse higgiyan xillanau intteyyo danddayettenna ubbabaappe aani ammaniya ubbai xillanaagee intteyyo eretto .

text: Beware therefore , lest that come upon you , which is spoken of in the prophets ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , hananabaa yootiyaageeti giidoogee intte bolli gakkenna mala naagettite ;

text: Behold , ye despisers , and wonder , and perish : for I work a work in your days , a work which ye shall in no wise believe , though a man declare it unto you .
text2: ' Xoossai giidobaa qilliicciyaageetoo , be7ite ; harai atto issi urai inttessi yootiyaakkokka , intte ammanenna oosuwaa taani intte wodiyan oottiyo gishshau , poora giite ; haiqqite ' yaagidosona ” yaagiis .

text: And when the Jews were gone out of the synagogue , the Gentiles besought that these words might be preached to them the next sabbath .
text2: PHauloosinne Barnnaabaasi Aihuda woosa keettaappe kiyishin , asai eta naa77antto Sambbatankka hegaa gujjidi yootana mala woossiis .

text: Now when the congregation was broken up , many of the Jews and religious proselytes followed Paul and Barnabas : who , speaking to them , persuaded them to continue in the grace of God .
text2: SHiiqoi laalettidoogaappe guyyiyan , daro Aihudatinne Aihudatu ammanuwan gelidi Xoossau yayyiya daroti , PHauloosanne Barnnaabaasa kaallidosona ; kaallin Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti Xoossaa aaro kehatettan minnidi de7ana mala , etau yootidi minttettidosona .

text: And the next sabbath day came almost the whole city together to hear the word of God .
text2: Naa77antto Sambbatan amarida asatuppe attin , katamaa asai ubbai Xoossaa qaalaa siyanau shiiqiis .

text: But when the Jews saw the multitudes , they were filled with envy , and spake against those things which were spoken by Paul , contradicting and blaspheming .
text2: SHin Aihudati daro asaa be7ido wode , PHauloosa qanaatidosona ; a haasayaa PHalqqidi , a cayidosona .

text: Then Paul and Barnabas waxed bold , and said , It was necessary that the word of God should first have been spoken to you : but seeing ye put it from you , and judge yourselves unworthy of everlasting life , lo , we turn to the Gentiles .
text2: PHauloosinne Barnnaabaasi xalidi , “ Xoossaa qaalai kasetidi intteyyo odettanau koshshees ; shin qaalaa intte ixxido gishshaunne merinaa de7uwaa ekkanau inttessi bessenna giidi , intte intte huuphiyan pirddido gishshau , be7ite , nuuni Aihuda gidennaageetukko simmeettees .

text: For so hath the Lord commanded us , saying , I have set thee to be a light of the Gentiles , that thou shouldest be for salvation unto the ends of the earth .
text2: Aissi giikko , Godai nuna , ' Asai ubbai intte baggaara attana mala , inttena taani Aihuda gidennaageetussi poo7o oottaas ' yaagidi azaziis ” yaagidosona .

text: And when the Gentiles heard this , they were glad , and glorified the word of the Lord : and as many as were ordained to eternal life believed .
text2: Aihuda gidennaageeti hegaa siyido wode , ufaittidi Xoossaa qaalaa bonchchidosona ; qassi merinaa de7uwaassi doorettida ubbaikka ammanidosona .

text: And the word of the Lord was published throughout all the region .
text2: Godaa qaalai he biitta ubbaa gakkiis .

text: But the Jews stirred up the devout and honourable women , and the chief men of the city , and raised persecution against Paul and Barnabas , and expelled them out of their coasts .
text2: SHin Aihudati Xoossau goinniya bonchchettida maccaasatanne kataman de7iya gita asata PHauloosa bollinne Barnnaabaasa bolli denttettin , asati eta yedetaa doommidi , bantta biittaappe kessidosona .

text: But they shook off the dust of their feet against them , and came unto Iconium .
text2: SHin Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti eta ixxiyoogaassi malaata gidana mala , bantta tohuwaappe baanaa shocidi , Iqooniyoone katamaa biidosona .

text: And the disciples were filled with joy , and with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Qassi Anxxookiyan de7iya kaalliyaageetunkka Geeshsha Ayyaanainne ufaissai kumees .

text: And it came to pass in Iconium , that they went both together into the synagogue of the Jews , and so spake , that a great multitude both of the Jews and also of the Greeks believed .
text2: Kaseegaadankka PHauloosinne Barnnaabaasi Iqooniyoonen Aihudatu woosa keettaa gelidi , qaalaa yootidosona ; yootin daro Aihudatinne Aihuda gidennaageeti ammanidosona .

text: But the unbelieving Jews stirred up the Gentiles , and made their minds evil affected against the brethren .
text2: SHin ammanibeenna Aihudati Aihuda gidennaageetu wozanaa laammidi , ishanttu bolli hanqetissidosona .

text: Long time therefore abode they speaking boldly in the Lord , which gave testimony unto the word of his grace , and granted signs and wonders to be done by their hands .
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti hegan daro wodiyaa gam77idosona ; eti Godaabaa yayyennan yootidosona ; yootin Godai malaataanne oorattabaa eti oottana mala , etau wolqqaa immidoogan ba aaro kehatettaa qaalaabai tuma gididoogaa markkattiis .

text: But the multitude of the city was divided : and part held with the Jews , and part with the apostles .
text2: SHin katamaa asai shaahettidi , baggai Aihudatukko , baggai Yesuusi kiittidoogeetukko simmiis .

text: And when there was an assault made both of the Gentiles , and also of the Jews with their rulers , to use them despitefully , and to stone them ,
text2: Aihuda gidennaageetinne Aihudati bantta halaqatuura issippe Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta qohanaunne shuchchan caddanau qoppido wode ,

text: They were ware of it , and fled unto Lystra and Derbe , cities of Lycaonia , and unto the region that lieth round about :
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti hegaa eridi , Lisxxiranne Daribe giyo Liqaa7ooniyaa katamatanne eta heeran de7iya biittaa baqatidosona ;

text: And there they preached the gospel .
text2: baqatidi , hegan wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootoosona .

text: And there sat a certain man at Lystra , impotent in his feet , being a cripple from his mother ' s womb , who never had walked :
text2: Ba aayee uluwaappe yelettoosappe doommidi , naa77u tohoi silin , mulekka hemettenna issi bitanee Lisxxiran de7ees .

text: The same heard Paul speak : who stedfastly beholding him , and perceiving that he had faith to be healed ,
text2: He bitanee PHauloosi yootishin siyees ; PHauloosi a tishshi ootti xeelliyo wode , paxanau ayyo ammanoi de7iyoogaa be7idi ,

text: Said with a loud voice , Stand upright on thy feet . And he leaped and walked .
text2: qaalaa xoqqissidi a , “ Sitti gaada ne tohuwan eqqa ” yaagiis ; yaagin guppi denddidi , hemetaa doommiis .

text: And when the people saw what Paul had done , they lifted up their voices , saying in the speech of Lycaonia , The gods are come down to us in the likeness of men .
text2: PHauloosi oottidoogaa asai be7idi , ba qaalaa Liqaa7ooniyaa qaalan xoqqu oottidi , “ Xoossati asa milatidi nuukko wodhdhidosona ” yaagiis .

text: And they called Barnabas , Jupiter ; and Paul , Mercurius , because he was the chief speaker .
text2: Asai Barnnaabaasa , “ Diyaa ” giidi , PHauloosi haasayaassi waannatiyo gishshau , a , “ Hermmeesa ” giidi sunttiis .

text: Then the priest of Jupiter , which was before their city , brought oxen and garlands unto the gates , and would have done sacrifice with the people .
text2: Beeta Maqidasee katamaa matan de7iyo Diyaa qeeseenne asai korimatanne alleeqo ciishshata Yesuusi kiittidoogeetussi yarshshuwaa yarshshanau koyidi , pengge ehiidosona .

text: Which when the apostles , Barnabas and Paul , heard of , they rent their clothes , and ran in among the people , crying out ,
text2: SHin Yesuusi kiittido Barnnaabaasinne PHauloosi hegaa siyido wode bantta maayuwaa pooshshidi , asaa giddo woxxiiddi ,

text: And saying , Sirs , why do ye these things ? We also are men of like passions with you , and preach unto you that ye should turn from these vanities unto the living God , which made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all things that are therein :
text2: bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , hagaadan yaagidosona ; “ Asau , hagaa aissi ootteetii ? Nuunikka inttenadan merettida asa ; ha pattenna yohuwaappe saluwaanne sa7aa , abbaanne eta giddon de7iya ubbabaa medhdhida de7o Xoossaakko intte simmana mala , inttessi nuuni wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootoos .

text: Who in times past suffered all nations to walk in their own ways .
text2: I beni asaa zare ubbaa bantta ogiyaa baana mala yeddi bayiis .

text: Nevertheless he left not himself without witness , in that he did good , and gave us rain from heaven , and fruitful seasons , filling our hearts with food and gladness .
text2: Intteyyo iraa saluwaappe bukissees ; kattaakka i wodiyan immees ; qassi qumaa immidi , inttena daro ufaissees ; yaatidi intteyyo lo77obaa oottiiddi , ubba wodekka bau markka xayibeenna ” yaagidosona .

text: And with these sayings scarce restrained they the people , that they had not done sacrifice unto them .
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti hegaa giidi , banttayyo asai yarshshenna mala , tuggatidi diggidosona .

text: And there came thither certain Jews from Antioch and Iconium , who persuaded the people , and , having stoned Paul , drew him out of the city , supposing he had been dead .
text2: Anxxookiyaappenne Iqooniyooneppe yiida Aihudati asaa bantta baggi zaaridi , shuchchan PHauloosa caddidosona ; etau haiqqidabaa milatin , katamaappe gaxi a goochchidosona .

text: Howbeit , as the disciples stood round about him , he rose up , and came into the city : and the next day he departed with Barnabas to Derbe .
text2: SHin kaalliyaageeti a lanqqiyan yuuyi aadhdhidi eqqidaashin , i denddidi , katamaa geliis . Wonttetta gallassi Barnnaabaasaara issippe Daribe biis .

text: And when they had preached the gospel to that city , and had taught many , they returned again to Lystra , and to Iconium , and Antioch ,
text2: Eti Daribe kataman wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootidi , daro asai Yesuusa ammanana mala oottidoogaappe guyyiyan , Lisxxira , Iqooniyoonenne Anxxookiyaa simmidosona ; simmidi hegan kaalliyaageeta minttettiiddinne eti ammanuwan minnidi de7ana mala zoriiddi , “ Nuuni Xoossaa kawotettaa gelanau daro waayettana bessees ” yaagidosona .

text: And when they had ordained them elders in every church , and had prayed with fasting , they commended them to the Lord , on whom they believed .
text2: Qassi woosa keettatussi huuphiyan huuphiyan cimata dooridi , xoomidoogaappenne woossidoogaappe guyyiyan , eti ammanido Godaassi eta hadaraa immidosona .

text: And after they had passed throughout Pisidia , they came to Pamphylia .
text2: PHisddiyaa biittaappe aadhdhidi , PHinifiliyaa yiidosona ;

text: And when they had preached the word in Perga , they went down into Attalia :
text2: PHerggen qaalaa yootidoogaappe guyyiyan , Axaaliyaa wodhdhidosona .

text: And thence sailed to Antioch , from whence they had been recommended to the grace of God for the work which they fulfilled .
text2: Hegaappe eti bantta polido oosuwaa gishshau , asai eta hadaraa Xoossaa aaro kehatettau immido Anxxookiyaa Markkabiyan simmidosona .

text: And when they were come , and had gathered the church together , they rehearsed all that God had done with them , and how he had opened the door of faith unto the Gentiles .
text2: Simmidi Anxxookiyaa gakkido wode woosa keettaa asaa shiishshidi , Xoossai banttanaara issippe oottido ubbabaanne , Aihuda gidenna asai ammanana mala , etau penggiyaa dooyidoogaa , asau yootidosona .

text: And there they abode long time with the disciples .
text2: Yaatidi hegan kaalliyaageetuura daro wodiyaa gam77idosona .

text: And certain men which came down from Judaea taught the brethren , and said , Except ye be circumcised after the manner of Moses , ye cannot be saved .
text2: Issi issi asati Yihudaappe Anxxookiyaa wodhdhidi , “ Muuse wogaadan , intte qaxxarettennabaa gidikko , attanau danddayekketa ” yaagidi ishantta tamaarissuwaa doommidosona .

text: When therefore Paul and Barnabas had no small dissension and disputation with them , they determined that Paul and Barnabas , and certain other of them , should go up to Jerusalem unto the apostles and elders about this question .
