text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni woiganee ? Nuuni Aihudati , Aihuda gidenna asaappe gitatiyoonii ? Mulekka gidenna ; aissi giikko , Aihudatikka Aihuda gidenna asatikka ubbai issippe nagaraappe garssan de7iyoogaa taani kase intteyyo yootaas .

text: As it is written , There is none righteous , no , not one :
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai hagaadan yaagees ; “ Xillo asi issoinne baawa .

text: There is none that understandeth , there is none that seeketh after God .
text2: Akeekiya asikka baawa ; woikko Xoossaa koyiyaabikka baawa .

text: They are all gone out of the way , they are together become unprofitable ; there is none that doeth good , no , not one .
text2: Asai ubbai Xoossaappe wora simmiis ; ubbaikka muleera go77ennaagaa gidiis . Lo77iyaabaa oottiya ooninne baawa ; harai atto issoinne baawa .

text: Their throat is an open sepulchre ; with their tongues they have used deceit ; the poison of asps is under their lips :
text2: Eta doonai dooyettida duufo mala . Bantta inxxarssan worddotidosona . Eta doonaappe asa woriya shooshshaa yiishshaa mala haasayai kiyees .

text: Whose mouth is full of cursing and bitterness :
text2: Eta doonan hanttaara qanggettai kumiis .

text: Their feet are swift to shed blood :
text2: Eti suutta gussanau daro eesotoosona .

text: Destruction and misery are in their ways :
text2: Bashshainne qohoi eti biidosan awaaninne xayenna .

text: And the way of peace have they not known :
text2: Eti sarotettaa ogiyaakka erokkona .

text: There is no fear of God before their eyes .
text2: Qassi Xoossaassi yayyiyoobi eta qofan baawa ” yaagees .

text: Now we know that what things soever the law saith , it saith to them who are under the law : that every mouth may be stopped , and all the world may become guilty before God .
text2: Asa ubbaa haasayaa diggana malanne kumetta sa7aa Xoossaa pirddaappe garssau aattana mala , higgiyaa giddon odettida ubbabai higgiyaappe garssan de7iya asau haasayiyoogaa nuuni eroos .

text: Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight : for by the law is the knowledge of sin .
text2: Xoossaa sinttan ooninne higgee azaziyoobaa oottiyoogan xillenna ; higgee issi asi nagara oottidoogaa eranaadan oottees .

text: But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested , being witnessed by the law and the prophets ;
text2: SHin Xoossai asa xillissiyo ogee higgee bainnan ha77i qoncciis ; higgeenne hananabaa yootiyaageeti he xillotettaabaa markkattidosona .

text: Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe : for there is no difference :
text2: Xoossai asaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammaniyoogan xillissees ; Xoossai hegaa a ammaniya ubbau oottees ; ai shaahotettinne baawa .

text: For all have sinned , and come short of the glory of God ;
text2: Aissi giikko , asai ubbai nagaraa oottiis ; ashshiya Xoossaappe haakkidosona .

text: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus :
text2: SHin eti Xoossai immiyo a aaro kehatettan , banttana woziya Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara coo xillidosona .

text: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood , to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past , through the forbearance of God ;
text2: Yesuusa suuttan asai a ammanidi , ba nagaraa maarotettaa demmanau , Xoossai a immiis ; Xoossai hegaa ba xillotettaa bessanau oottiis ; i beni wodiyan asaa nagaraa danddayidi , karidi aggiigiis ; shin

text: To declare , I say , at this time his righteousness : that he might be just , and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus .
text2: ha wodiyan ba xillotettaa bessanau asaa nagaraa aggenna ; Xoossai hegaa oottiyoogan i ba huuphen xillo gidiyaagaanne Yesuusa ammaniya ubbaa xillissiyoogaa bessees .

text: Where is boasting then ? It is excluded . By what law ? of works ? Nay : but by the law of faith .
text2: Yaatin , nuuni aibau ceeqettanee ? Aibikka baawa . Ai gaasotaanee ? Nuuni higgiyau azazettiyoogaanee ? Akkai ; ammanuwaa higgiyaanappe attin .

text: Therefore we conclude that a man is justified by faith without the deeds of the law .
text2: Aissi giikko , asi ammanuwan xillanaappe attin , higgee azaziyoogaa oottiyoogaana gidenna yaagidi qoppoos .

text: Is he the God of the Jews only ? is he not also of the Gentiles ? Yes , of the Gentiles also :
text2: Woikko Xoossai Aihudatu xalaalau Xoossee ? Aihuda gidenna asau Xoossaa gidennee ? Tuma , Aihuda gidennaageetuyyookka i qassi Xoossaa .

text: Seeing it is one God , which shall justify the circumcision by faith , and uncircumcision through faith .
text2: Issi Xoossaa xalaalai de7ees ; Aihudata eta ammanuwan i xillissana ; qassi Aihuda gidennaageetakka eta ammanuwan xillissana .

text: Do we then make void the law through faith ? God forbid : yea , we establish the law .
text2: Yaatin , nuuni higgiyaa ammanuwan gaxi sugiyoo ? Gidenna ; higgiyaa minttoosippe attin .

text: What shall we say then that Abraham our father , as pertaining to the flesh , hath found ?
text2: Yaatin , nuuni nuuyyo ashuwan zare gidiya Abrahaami ai demmiis gaanee ?

text: For if Abraham were justified by works , he hath whereof to glory ; but not before God .
text2: Aissi giikko , Abrahaami oosuwan xillidabaa gidiyaakko , ayyo ceeqettiyoobi de7ees ; shin Xoossaa sinttan ceeqettana danddayenna .

text: For what saith the scripture ? Abraham believed God , and it was counted unto him for righteousness .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai woigii ? “ Abrahaami Xoossaa ammaniis ; Xoossai hegaa ayyo xillotettan qoodiis ” yaagees .

text: Now to him that worketh is the reward not reckoned of grace , but of debt .
text2: Oottiya urai ekkiyo miishshaa bau bessin ekkeesippe attin , au imodan qoodettenna .

text: But to him that worketh not , but believeth on him that justifieth the ungodly , his faith is counted for righteousness .
text2: SHin ooso oottennan , nagaranchchaa xillissiya Xoossaa ammaniya uraa , Xoossai a ammanuwan a xillissees .

text: Even as David also describeth the blessedness of the man , unto whom God imputeth righteousness without works ,
text2: Hegaadankka , ai oosoinne bainnan , Xoossai xillodan qoodido asa ufaissiyaabaa Daawiti haasayido wode giidoogee hagaa .

text: Saying , Blessed are they whose iniquities are forgiven , and whose sins are covered .
text2: “ Xoossai eta mooruwaa atto giidoogeetinne eta nagaraa kammidoogeeti anjjettidaageeta .

text: Blessed is the man to whom the Lord will not impute sin .
text2: Godai a nagaraa qoodenna asi anjjettidaagaa ” yaagees .

text: Cometh this blessedness then upon the circumcision only , or upon the uncircumcision also ? for we say that faith was reckoned to Abraham for righteousness .
text2: Yaatin , ha Daawiti haasayido anjjoi qaxxarettida asaa xalaalaasseeyye ? Woikko qassi qaxxarettibeenna asatussaaree ? Aissi giikko nuuni , “ Xoossaa maxaafai , ' Abrahaami Xoossaa ammaniis ; Xoossai hegaa ayyo xillotettan qoodiis ' yaagees ” goos .

text: How was it then reckoned ? when he was in circumcision , or in uncircumcision ? Not in circumcision , but in uncircumcision .
text2: Yaatin , hagee aude hanidee ? Abrahaami qaxxarettidaashiineeyye ? Woi qaxxarettennan de7ishiinee ? Qaxxarettennan de7ishiinappe attin , qaxxarettiina gidenna .

text: And he received the sign of circumcision , a seal of the righteousness of the faith which he had yet being uncircumcised : that he might be the father of all them that believe , though they be not circumcised ; that righteousness might be imputed unto them also :
text2: Guyyeppe i qaxxarettiis ; Xoossai a ammanuwaa gishshau , i qaxxarettanaappe kase a xillo oottidi qoodidoogaa erissanau , a qaxxarai malaata gidiis . Hegeekka qassi qaxxarettennan Xoossaa ammaniya ubbata Xoossai xillo oottidi qoodanaadan , etau Abrahaami aawaa gidanaassa .

text: And the father of circumcision to them who are not of the circumcision only , but who also walk in the steps of that faith of our father Abraham , which he had being yet uncircumcised .
text2: I qaxxarettidaageetuyyookka aawaa ; gidikkokka , eti qaxxarettido gishshassa gidenna ; shin nu aawaa Abrahaami qaxxarettanaappe kase ammaniyo ammanuwaa malaa kaalliyaageetuyyookka aawaa .

text: For the promise , that he should be the heir of the world , was not to Abraham , or to his seed , through the law , but through the righteousness of faith .
text2: Abrahaamayyoonne a zaretuyyo Xoossai , “ Ha sa7aa taani intteyyo immana ” yaagidoogee , Abrahaami Xoossaa ammanidi xillido gishshassappe attin , higgiyau i azazettido gishshassa gidenna .

text: For if they which are of the law be heirs , faith is made void , and the promise made of none effect :
text2: Aissi giikko , higgiyau azazettiyaageeti Xoossai immana giidoogaa laattiyaageeta gidikko , asa ammanoi allaalle kessennabaa gidiis ; Xoossai giidoogeekka hada gidiis ;

text: Because the law worketh wrath : for where no law is , there is no transgression .
text2: higgee Xoossaa boshaa ehees ; shin higgee bainnasan higgiyaa menttiyoobi baawa .

text: Therefore it is of faith , that it might be by grace ; to the end the promise might be sure to all the seed ; not to that only which is of the law , but to that also which is of the faith of Abraham ; who is the father of us all ,
text2: Hegaa gishshau , higgiyaa naagiyaageetu xalaalau gidennan , qassi Abrahaami ammanidoogaadan , ammaniya Abrahaama zaretu ubbau Xoossai immana giidoogee , woitodan tumattanaagee ammanuwaana . Abrahaami nuuyyo ubbaayyo aawaa . Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Taani nena daro kawotettatuyyo aawa oottaas ” giyoogaadan , haiqqidaageetuyyo de7uwaa immiya , ba azazuwan bainnabaa de7iyaabaadan oottidi xeesiya , i ammanido Xoossaa sinttan Abrahaami nuuyyo ubbau aawa .

text: Who against hope believed in hope , that he might become the father of many nations ; according to that which was spoken , So shall thy seed be .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai Abrahaama , “ Ne zerettai hagaa keena gidana ” yaagidoogaadan , hagaa keena gidana giidi , ufaissan naaganau danddayenna wode , Abrahaami ammanidinne sinttappe demmana giidi , ufaissan naagidi , daro zaretuyyo aawa gidiis .

text: And being not weak in faith , he considered not his own body now dead , when he was about an hundred years old , neither yet the deadness of Sara ' s womb :
text2: He wode , Abrahaami yelettoosappe xeetu laitta kumana haniyo cima ; shin ba daafurida asatettaanne Saara na7a yelanau danddayennaagaa qoppido wode , i ba ammanuwan daafuribeenna .

text: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief ; but was strong in faith , giving glory to God ;
text2: Xoossaa i bonchchiiddi , au immana giida Xoossai qassi polanau danddayiyoogaa loittidi erees ; eridi ba ammanuwan minnidoogaappe attin , ammanennan ixxidi , Xoossai immana giidoogaa siribeenna .

text: And therefore it was imputed to him for righteousness .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Xoossai qassi a ammanuwaa xillotettan qoodiis .

text: Now it was not written for his sake alone , that it was imputed to him ;
text2: “ Ayyo xillotettan qoodiis ” giya qaalai a xalaalau xaafettibeenna .

text: But for us also , to whom it shall be imputed , if we believe on him that raised up Jesus our Lord from the dead ;
text2: He qaalai nu Godaa Yesuusa haiquwaappe denttida Xoossaa ammaniya nuuyyookka xillotettan qoodettana mala xaafettiis .

text: Who was delivered for our offences , and was raised again for our justification .
text2: Xoossai a nu nagaraa gishshau , haiquwau aattidi immin , i nuna xillissanau haiquwaappe denddiis .

text: Therefore being justified by faith , we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni ammanuwan xillidoogan , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara nuuyyo Xoossaara sarotettai de7ees ;

text: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand , and rejoice in hope of the glory of God .
text2: qassi i nuna ha77i nuuni de7iyo Xoossaa aaro kehatettaa giddo ammanuwan ehiis ; yaatin , nuuni Xoossaa bonchchuwaa shaakkanau nuuyyo de7iya ufaissan ceeqettoos .

text: And not only so , but we glory in tribulations also : knowing that tribulation worketh patience ;
text2: Hegaa xalaala gidenna ; nuuni nu waayiyankka ufaittoos ; aissi giikko , waayee danddayaa ehiyoogaa , qassi danddayai paaciyaa , paacee qassi demmanau ufaissan naagi uttidoogaa ehiyoogaa nuuni eroos .

text: And hope maketh not ashamed ; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us .
text2: Xoossai nuuyyo immido Geeshsha Ayyaanaa baggaara ba siiquwaa nu wozanan gussido gishshau , he nuuni demmanau ufaissan naagi uttidoogee nuna yeellayenna .

text: For when we were yet without strength , in due time Christ died for the ungodly .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni biron wolqqi bainnaageeta gididi de7ishin , Xoossai doorido wodee gakkin , Kiristtoosi nagaranchchatu gishshau haiqqiis .

text: For scarcely for a righteous man will one die : yet peradventure for a good man some would even dare to die .
text2: Xillo uraa gishshau , issi urai haiqqanaagee daro metobaa ; shin keha asa gishshau haiqqanau , “ Eeno ” giya uri ooni erii beettennan aggenna .

text: But God commendeth his love toward us , in that , while we were yet sinners , Christ died for us .
text2: SHin nuuni biron nagaranchcha gididi de7ishin , Kiristtoosi nu gishshau haiqqiis ; hegee Xoossai nuna ai keenaa siiqiyaakkonne a siiquwaa erissees .

text: Much more then , being now justified by his blood , we shall be saved from wrath through him .
text2: Simmi nuuni ha77i a suuttan xillidabaa gidikko , a baggaara Xoossaa hanqquwaappe attana .

text: For if , when we were enemies , we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son , much more , being reconciled , we shall be saved by his life .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni Xoossaara kase morkke ; shin a Na7aa haiquwan aara sigettida . Hegaappe aattidi , ha77i nuuni Xoossaara sigettiichchidoogaappe guyyiyan , i paxa gidiyo gishshau nuna ashshana .

text: And not only so , but we also joy in God through our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom we have now received the atonement .
text2: SHin hegaa xalaala gidenna ; ha77i nuna Xoossaara sigettida nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara nuna Xoossaabai ufaissees .

text: Wherefore , as by one man sin entered into the world , and death by sin ; and so death passed upon all men , for that all have sinned :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nagarai ha sa7aa issi asa baggaara geliis ; he nagarai banaara haiquwaa ehiis ; hegaa gaasuwan , asai ubbai nagara oottido gishshau , haiqoi asa zare ubbaa gakkiis .

text: ( For until the law sin was in the world : but sin is not imputed when there is no law .
text2: Higgee imettanaappe kase , ha sa7an nagarai de7ees ; shin higgee bainna wode nagari qoodettenna .

text: Nevertheless death reigned from Adam to Moses , even over them that had not sinned after the similitude of Adam ' s transgression , who is the figure of him that was to come .
text2: SHin Addaame wodiyaappe , Muuse wodiyaa gakkanaassi , haiqoi asa ubbaa haariis ; harai atto Addaamee Xoossaa higgiyau azazettennan ixxidoogaadan , nagara oottibeennaageetakka haiqoi haariis . Aissi giikko , Addaamee yaanaagau leemiso .

text: But not as the offence , so also is the free gift . For if through the offence of one many be dead , much more the grace of God , and the gift by grace , which is by one man , Jesus Christ , hath abounded unto many .
text2: SHin Xoossaa imoi Addaame nagaraa keena gidenna gishshau , eti issi mala gidokkona ; issi bitaniyaa nagaraa gishshau , daro asai haiqqidoogee tuma ; shin Xoossaa aaro kehatettainne a imoi issi asa aaro kehatettaa baggaara , Yesuus Kiristtoosa aaro kehatettaa baggaara daro asau dariis .

text: And not as it was by one that sinned , so is the gift : for the judgment was by one to condemnation , but the free gift is of many offences unto justification .
text2: Xoossaa imoi nagaraa oottida bitaniyaa baggaara yiidaagaa mala gidenna ; aissi giikko , Addaamee issi nagaraa oottidoogaappe guyyiyan , Xoossai a mooranchchadan pirddiis ; shin asai daro nagaraa oottidoogaappe guyyiyan Xoossai , “ Intte mooribeekketa ” giidi , ba aaro kehatettaa eta bessees .

text: For if by one man ' s offence death reigned by one ; much more they which receive abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness shall reign in life by one , Jesus Christ . )
text2: Aissi giikko , issi bitaniyaa nagaraa gaasuwan , a nagaraa baggaara , haiqoi kawotidoogee tuma ; shin issi urai , Yesuus Kiristtoosi oottidobai ai keena daro ; Xoossaa daro aaro kehatettaanne xillotettaa imuwaa ekkiya ubbai Kiristtoosa baggaara xoonidi de7ana .

text: Therefore as by the offence of one judgment came upon all men to condemnation ; even so by the righteousness of one the free gift came upon all men unto justification of life .
text2: Simmi issi urai nagara oottido gaasuwan asa ubbaa bolli mooranchchadan pirddai yiidoogaadan , hegaadan issi urai xillobaa oottido gaasuwan , Xoossai asa ubbaa , “ Mooribeekketa ” giidi etau de7uwaa immiis ;

text: For as by one man ' s disobedience many were made sinners , so by the obedience of one shall many be made righteous .
text2: aissi giikko , issi urai azazettennan ixxido gaasuwan , daro asai nagaranchcha gididoogaadan , hegaadankka qassi issoi eeno giidoogan daro asai xillana .

text: Moreover the law entered , that the offence might abound . But where sin abounded , grace did much more abound :
text2: Mooro oosuwaa darissanau , higgee yiis ; shin nagarai darido wode Xoossaa aaro kehatettai keehi dariis ;

text: That as sin hath reigned unto death , even so might grace reign through righteousness unto eternal life by Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: nagari haiquwaa wolqqan kawotidoogaadan , hegaadankka qassi Xoossaa aaro kehatettai xillotettaa wolqqan kawotidi , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara , nuna merinaa de7uwau kaalettees .

text: What shall we say then ? Shall we continue in sin , that grace may abound ?
text2: Yaatin , nuuni woiganee ? Xoossaa aaro kehatettai daranaadan , nagaran minnidi de7anee ?

text: God forbid . How shall we , that are dead to sin , live any longer therein ?
text2: Akkai ; nuuni nagara ooso baggaara gidikko haiqqiichchida . Yaatin , nuuni hagaappe sinttau waati a giddon de7anee ?

text: Know ye not , that so many of us as were baptized into Jesus Christ were baptized into his death ?
text2: Woikko nuuni ubbati Kiristtoos Yesuusaara issippe gidanau , xammaqettido wode , a haiquwankka aara issippe gidanau xammaqettidoogaa erekketii ?

text: Therefore we are buried with him by baptism into death : that like as Christ was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father , even so we also should walk in newness of life .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Kiristtoosi Aawaa bonchcho wolqqan haiquwaappe denddidoogaadan , hegaadan nuunikka ooratta de7uwaa de7anau , a haiquwaa aara shaakkanau xinqqatiyan aara issippe moogettida .

text: For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death , we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection :
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni i haiqqidoogaadan haiqqidi , aara issuwaa gidikko , hegaadankka , haiquwaappe i denddidoogaadan nuunikka denddidi , aara issuwaa gidana .

text: Knowing this , that our old man is crucified with him , that the body of sin might be destroyed , that henceforth we should not serve sin .
text2: Nuuni hagaappe sinttanau nagarau aille gidenna mala , qassi nu nagaranchcha asatettaa wolqqai xayana mala , nu ceega asatettai Kiristtoosaara masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishetti kaqettidoogaa eroos .

text: For he that is dead is freed from sin .
text2: Aissi giikko , issi urai haiqqiyo wode nagaraa wolqqai a haarenna ; shin

text: Now if we be dead with Christ , we believe that we shall also live with him :
text2: nuuni Kiristtoosaara haiqqidabaa gidikko , aara qassi de7anaagaa ammanoos .

text: Knowing that Christ being raised from the dead dieth no more ; death hath no more dominion over him .
text2: Aissi giikko , Kiristtoosi haiquwaappe denddidoogaa , qassi naa77anttuwaa i haiqqennaagaanne haiqoi sinttappe a haarennaagaa nuuni eroos .

text: For in that he died , he died unto sin once : but in that he liveth , he liveth unto God .
text2: I issitookka haiqqiis ; nagarau a bolli wolqqi baawa ; shin i ha de7iyo de7uwaa Xoossaayyo de7ees .

text: Likewise reckon ye also yourselves to be dead indeed unto sin , but alive unto God through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Hegaadan qassi intte nagara oottennaadan , inttena haiqqidabaadan qoppite ; shin Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara Xoossau intte paxa de7iyaabaadan , inttena qoppite .

text: Let not sin therefore reign in your mortal body , that ye should obey it in the lusts thereof .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte intte asatettaa amuwau azazettana mala , nagarai haiqqiya intte asatettaa haaroppo .

text: Neither yield ye your members as instruments of unrighteousness unto sin : but yield yourselves unto God , as those that are alive from the dead , and your members as instruments of righteousness unto God .
text2: Qassi intte asatettaappe issisaanne mooro ooso oottanau nagarau immoppite ; shin haiquwaappe denddida asaadan inttena Xoossau immite ; qassi intte kumetta asatettaakka xillo ooso oottanau Xoossau immite ;

text: For sin shall not have dominion over you : for ye are not under the law , but under grace .
text2: aissi giikko , nagarai inttena haaranau bessenna ; intte Xoossaa aaro kehatettaappe garssaara de7eetappe attin , higgiyaappe garssan de7ekketa .

text: What then ? shall we sin , because we are not under the law , but under grace ? God forbid .
text2: Yaatin , waananee ? Xoossaa aaro kehatettaappe garssaara de7iyoogaappe attin , higgiyaappe garssaara deenna gishshau , nagara oottanee ? Akkai ;

text: Know ye not , that to whom ye yield yourselves servants to obey , his servants ye are to whom ye obey ; whether of sin unto death , or of obedience unto righteousness ?
text2: intte inttena issi urau azazettanau , ailledan oottidi immiyo wode , he inttena azaziyaagau ailleta gidiyoogaa ereeta ; woikko intte intteyyo haiquwaa ehiya nagarau haaretteeta ; woikko intte inttena xillo oottiya azazuwau haaretteeta .

text: But God be thanked , that ye were the servants of sin , but ye have obeyed from the heart that form of doctrine which was delivered you .
text2: SHin Xoossau galatai gido ; aissi giikko , nagarau kase intte aille ; shin guyyeppe intte ekkido timirttiyaa giddon de7iya tumatettau intte kumetta wozanaappe azazettideta .

text: Being then made free from sin , ye became the servants of righteousness .
text2: Intte nagaraa ailletettaappe kiyidi , xillotettau aille gidideta .

text: I speak after the manner of men because of the infirmity of your flesh : for as ye have yielded your members servants to uncleanness and to iniquity unto iniquity ; even so now yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness .
text2: Intte mereta daafuranchcha gidiyo gishshau , taani ooyyookka geliya haasayaa haasayais ; intte kase intte kumetta asatettaa moorobaa oottanau , tunatettaunne moorobau aille oottidi immideta ; ha77i hegaadankka intte kumetta asatettaa geeshshabaa oottanau , xillotettau aille oottidi immite .

text: For when ye were the servants of sin , ye were free from righteousness .
text2: Intte nagarau ailletidi de7iyo wode , xillotettai intteyyo goda gidenna .

text: What fruit had ye then in those things whereof ye are now ashamed ? for the end of those things is death .
text2: Inttena ha77i yeellayiya yohota he wode oottidoogaappe ai go77aa demmidetii ? Aissi giikko , he yohotu wurssettai haiqo .

text: But now being made free from sin , and become servants to God , ye have your fruit unto holiness , and the end everlasting life .
text2: SHin nagaraa ailletettaappe intte kiyidi , Xoossau haarettideta ; qassi intte oottiyo ubbaban inttena muleera au aattidi immideta . Hegee intteyyo wore ; hegaa wurssettai merinaa de7uwaa .

text: For the wages of sin is death ; but the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: Aissi giikko , nagarai qanxxiyo miishshai haiquwaa . SHin Xoossai nu Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara immiyo imoi merinaa de7uwaa .

text: Know ye not , brethren , ( for I speak to them that know the law , ) how that the law hath dominion over a man as long as he liveth ?
text2: Ta ishatoo , intte ubbai higgiyaa eriyo gishshau , taani giyoogaa loittidi ereeta ; higgee issi asi de7ido wode ubban a haarees .

text: For the woman which hath an husband is bound by the law to her husband so long as he liveth ; but if the husband be dead , she is loosed from the law of her husband .
text2: Aissi giikko , azina gelida maccaasiyaa i azinai paxa de7ido keenan , higgiyan aara qashetta uttaasu ; shin i azinai haiqqikko , aara maacettido higgee o haarenna .

text: So then if , while her husband liveth , she be married to another man , she shall be called an adulteress : but if her husband be dead , she is free from that law ; so that she is no adulteress , though she be married to another man .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , a ba azinai paxa de7ishin , hara attumaagaa gelikko , asai o , “ SHaaramuxa ” gaana . SHin i azinai haiqqikko , higgee o haarenna ; a hara azina gelikkonne o ooninne , “ SHaaramuxa ” geenna .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , ye also are become dead to the law by the body of Christ ; that ye should be married to another , even to him who is raised from the dead , that we should bring forth fruit unto God .
text2: Ta ishatoo , hegaadan intte qassi Kiristtoosa asatettaappe issi bagga gidiyo gishshau , higgiyaa qoppiyaabaa gidikko , intte haiqqideta . Qassi nuuni Xoossaa go77iya ooso oottana mala , intte Xoossai haiquwaappe denttido Kiristtoosabaa .

text: For when we were in the flesh , the motions of sins , which were by the law , did work in our members to bring forth fruit unto death .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni nu asatettai koyidoogaadan de7iyo wode , higgee nuuni nagaraa oottanaadan , nuna denttettees ; nu asatettaa giddon iita amoi de7iyo gishshau , nuuni haiquwau aife aifida .

text: But now we are delivered from the law , that being dead wherein we were held ; that we should serve in newness of spirit , and not in the oldness of the letter .
text2: SHin ha77i nuuni nuna qachchidaagau haiqqido gishshau , Xoossai nuna higgiyaa qashuwaappe birshshiis . Hegaa gishshau , nuuni Geeshsha Ayyaanai giigissido ooratta ogiyan Xoossau azazettanaagaappe attin , xaafettida higgee nuussi giigissido ceega ogiyan azazettokko .

text: What shall we say then ? Is the law sin ? God forbid . Nay , I had not known sin , but by the law : for I had not known lust , except the law had said , Thou shalt not covet .
text2: Yaatin , nuuni woiganee ? Higgee ba huuphen nagaree ? Mulekka gidenna ; shin higgee nagari aibakko tana erissiis . Aissi giikko , taani higgee , “ Asabaa amottoppa ” geennaakko , asabaa amottiyoogee aibakko erikke .

text: But sin , taking occasion by the commandment , wrought in me all manner of concupiscence . For without the law sin was dead .
text2: SHin nagari taani ubbabaa amottana mala , azazuwaa baggaara tanan ogiyaa demmiis ; aissi giikko , higgee bainnaakko , nagarau wolqqi baawa .

text: For I was alive without the law once : but when the commandment came , sin revived , and I died .
text2: Kase higgee bainna wode taani paxa ; shin azazoi yiido wode nagarai paxin ,

text: And the commandment , which was ordained to life , I found to be unto death .
text2: taani qassi haiqqaas ; tana paxa wottanau Xoossai qoppido azazoi , tau haiquwaa ehiis .

text: For sin , taking occasion by the commandment , deceived me , and by it slew me .
text2: Aissi giikko , nagarai azazuwaa baggaara tana cimmiyo ogiyaa demmidi , he azazuwan tana woriis .

text: Wherefore the law is holy , and the commandment holy , and just , and good .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , higgee geeshsha ; azazoikka geeshsha , xillonne lo77o .

text: Was then that which is good made death unto me ? God forbid . But sin , that it might appear sin , working death in me by that which is good ; that sin by the commandment might become exceeding sinful .
text2: Yaatin , lo77obai tau haiqo ehiidee ? Mulekka gidenna ; shin tau hegaa nagarai ehiis ; asai nagari aibakko shaakkidi erana mala , nagarai lo77oban go7ettidi , tau haiqo ehiis . Qassi azazoi , “ Ooninne nagara oottanau bessenna ” yaagiyo gishshau , nagarai kaseegaappe aadhdhi iitiis .

text: For we know that the law is spiritual : but I am carnal , sold under sin .
text2: Nuuni higgee Xoossaabaa gidiyoogaa eroos ; shin taani tana nagarau baizzida haiqqiya asa ;

text: For that which I do I allow not : for what I would , that do I not ; but what I hate , that do I .
text2: taani oottiyoobaa akeekikke ; aissi giikko , taani ixxiyoobaa oottaisippe attin , taani oottanau dosiyoobaa oottikke .

text: If then I do that which I would not , I consent unto the law that it is good .
text2: Taani ixxiyoogaa oottiyaabaa gidikko , higgee lo77o gidiyoogaa markkattais .

text: Now then it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: Hegaa gidikko , he yohuwaa tanan de7iya nagarai oottiyoogaappe attin , ha77i taani oottikke .

text: For I know that in me ( that is , in my flesh , ) dwelleth no good thing : for to will is present with me ; but how to perform that which is good I find not .
text2: Tanan , hegeenne ta asatettan lo77obai de7ennaagaa taani erais ; aissi giikko , lo77obaa oottiyo amoi tanan de7ikkokka , taani he lo77obaa oottanau danddayikke .

text: For the good that I would I do not : but the evil which I would not , that I do .
text2: Taani ixxiyo iitabaa oottaisippe attin , taani dosiyo lo77obaa oottikke .

text: Now if I do that I would not , it is no more I that do it , but sin that dwelleth in me .
text2: SHin taani ixxiyoogaa oottiyaabaa gidikko , hegaa tanan de7iya nagarai oottiyoogaappe attin , ha77i hegaa oottiyaagee tana gidikke .

text: I find then a law , that , when I would do good , evil is present with me .
text2: Simmi taani lo77obaa oottanau dosishin , iitabaa oottiyoogee tau higge gidiyoogaa demmaas .

text: For I delight in the law of God after the inward man :
text2: Aissi giikko , taani ta wozana giddon Xoossaa higgiyan ufaittais ;

text: But I see another law in my members , warring against the law of my mind , and bringing me into captivity to the law of sin which is in my members .
text2: shin ta bollaa giddon de7iya ta wozanaa qofaa higgiyaara warettiya dumma higgiyaa be7ais . He higgee ta bollaa giddon de7iya nagaraa ootissiya higgiyan tana qashissees .

text: O wretched man that I am ! who shall deliver me from the body of this death ?
text2: Taani aiba ufaissi bainna asee ! Tana haiquwau efiya ha asatettaappe ashshanai oonee ?

text: I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord . So then with the mind I myself serve the law of God ; but with the flesh the law of sin .
text2: Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara Xoossau galatai gido . Simmi taani ta wozanaa qofan Xoossaa higgiyau haarettais . SHin ta asatettan tana nagaraa ootissiya higgiyau haarettais .

text: There is therefore now no condemnation to them which are in Christ Jesus , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Kiristtoos Yesuusaara de7iyaageetu bolli pirddi ha77i baawa ;

text: For the law of the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus hath made me free from the law of sin and death .
text2: aissi giikko , Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara nuuyyo de7uwaa ehiya Geeshsha Ayyaanaa higgee tana nagaraa higgiyaa ailletettaappenne haiquwaa higgiyaa ailletettaappe kessiis .

text: For what the law could not do , in that it was weak through the flesh , God sending his own Son in the likeness of sinful flesh , and for sin , condemned sin in the flesh :
text2: Asaa asatettai daafuranchcha gidiyo gishshau , higgee oottanau danddayibeennaagaa Xoossai oottiis ; nagaranchchatu asatettaa mala asatettaara de7iya ba Na7aa , asai oottido nagaraayyo yarshsho gidanau Xoossai kiittidi , asaa asatettaa giddon de7iya nagaraa pirddiis .

text: That the righteousness of the law might be fulfilled in us , who walk not after the flesh , but after the Spirit .
text2: Geeshsha Ayyaanai koyiyoogaadan de7iyaageetuppe attin , nu asatettai koyiyoogaadan de7ennaageetu bolli , nu bolli , higgiyaa xillo azazoi polettana mala , Xoossai hagaa oottiis .

text: For they that are after the flesh do mind the things of the flesh ; but they that are after the Spirit the things of the Spirit .
text2: Bantta asatettai koyiyoogaadan de7iyaageeti bantta asatettaabaa qoppoosona ; shin Geeshsha Ayyaanai koyiyoogaadan de7iyaageeti Geeshsha Ayyaanaabaa qoppoosona .

text: For to be carnally minded is death ; but to be spiritually minded is life and peace .
text2: Asatettaabaa qoppiyoogee haiquwaa ehees ; shin Geeshsha Ayyaanaabaa qoppiyoogee de7uwaanne sarotettaa ehees .

text: Because the carnal mind is enmity against God : for it is not subject to the law of God , neither indeed can be .
text2: Asatettaabaa qoppiyoogee Xoossau ixo ; aissi giikko , asatettai Xoossaa higgiyau azazettenna ; qassi azazettanaukka au danddayettenna .

text: So then they that are in the flesh cannot please God .
text2: Bantta asatettau azazettiyaageeti Xoossaa ufaissanau danddayokkona .

text: But ye are not in the flesh , but in the Spirit , if so be that the Spirit of God dwell in you . Now if any man have not the Spirit of Christ , he is none of his .
text2: SHin Xoossaa Ayyaanai inttenan de7ikko , Geeshsha Ayyaanai giyoogaadan de7eetappe attin , intte asatettai koyiyoogaadan de7ekketa . SHin ooninne Kiristtoosa Ayyaanai bainnaagaa gidikko , he urai Kiristtoosabaa gidenna .

text: And if Christ be in you , the body is dead because of sin ; but the Spirit is life because of righteousness .
text2: SHin Kiristtoosi inttenan de7ikko , intte asatettai nagaraa gaasuwan haiqqidaagaa ; shin intte ayyaanai xillotettaa gaasuwan inttenan paxa de7ees .

text: But if the Spirit of him that raised up Jesus from the dead dwell in you , he that raised up Christ from the dead shall also quicken your mortal bodies by his Spirit that dwelleth in you .
text2: SHin Yesuusa haiquwaappe denttida Xoossaa Ayyaanai intte giddon de7ikko , haiquwaappe Kiristtoosa denttida Xoossai qassi inttenan de7iya ba Geeshsha Ayyaanan , haiqqiya intte asatettaukka de7uwaa immana .

text: Therefore , brethren , we are debtors , not to the flesh , to live after the flesh .
text2: Simmi ta ishatoo , nuuni acuwaara de7oos ; nu asatettai koyiyoogaadan de7anau nuuyyo bessenna .

text: For if ye live after the flesh , ye shall die : but if ye through the Spirit do mortify the deeds of the body , ye shall live .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte intte asatettai giyoogaadan de7ikko , intte haiqqana ; shin intte intte nagara oosuwaa Geeshsha Ayyaanan worikko , paxa de7ana .

text: For as many as are led by the Spirit of God , they are the sons of God .
text2: Xoossaa Ayyaanai kaalettiyo ubbati Xoossaa naata .

text: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear ; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption , whereby we cry , Abba , Father .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni nu qaalaa xoqqu oottidi , “ Abbaa ! Ta Aawau ” yaagidi xeesiyo , nuna Xoossaa naata kessiya Geeshsha Ayyaanaa Xoossaappe ekkidoogaappe attin , naa77anttuwaa yayyanau aille kessiya ayyaanaa ekkibookko .

text: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit , that we are the children of God :
text2: Xoossaa Ayyaanai ba huuphen nu ayyaanaara gididi , nuuni Xoossaa naata gidiyoogaa markkattees .

text: And if children , then heirs ; heirs of God , and joint - heirs with Christ ; if so be that we suffer with him , that we may be also glorified together .
text2: Nuuni a naata gidikko , i ba asau minjjido anjjuwaa laattana ; qassi nuuni Xoossai Kiristtoosau minjjidoogaakka aara laattana ; nuuni Kiristtoosa waayiyaa aara shaakkikko , a bonchchuwaakka aara shaakkana .

text: For I reckon that the sufferings of this present time are not worthy to be compared with the glory which shall be revealed in us .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni ha77i waayettiyo waayiyaa nuuyyo sinttappe qonccana bonchchuwaara giigissanau , mulekka danddayettenna gaada taani qoppais .

text: For the earnest expectation of the creature waiteth for the manifestation of the sons of God .
text2: Xoossai medhdhido mereta ubbai Xoossaa naati qonccanaagaa daro laamoti uttiis .

text: For the creature was made subject to vanity , not willingly , but by reason of him who hath subjected the same in hope ,
text2: Aissi giikko , mereta ubbai go77i bainnabaa gidanaadan , Xoossai a bolli pirddiis ; sinttappe demmana giidi ufaissan naagi uttidoogan haarissida Xoossai koyido gishshau hanidoogaappe attin , mereta ubbai ba huuphen koyidoogaana gidenna .

text: Because the creature itself also shall be delivered from the bondage of corruption into the glorious liberty of the children of God .
text2: Mereta ubbai ba huuphen bashshaa ailletettaappe issi gallassi kiyana ; qassi he meretati Xoossaa naati ailletettaappe kiyido bonchcho kessaa shaakkana .

text: For we know that the whole creation groaneth and travaileth in pain together until now .
text2: Aissi giikko , mereta ubbai issippe hanno gakkanaassi , maccaasa leessoi oiqqin ooliyoogaadan , sahuwan ooliyoogaa nuuni eroos .

text: And not only they , but ourselves also , which have the firstfruits of the Spirit , even we ourselves groan within ourselves , waiting for the adoption , to wit , the redemption of our body .
text2: Qassi hegaa xalaala gidenna ; nuuni , Geeshsha Ayyaanaa Xoossaa baira imodan oottidi ekkidaageeti , nu huuphen qassi Xoossai nuna ba naata oottanaadaaninne nu kumetta asatettaa wozanaadan naagiiddi , nu giddon ooloos .

text: For we are saved by hope : but hope that is seen is not hope : for what a man seeth , why doth he yet hope for ?
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni Xoossai immana giidoogan attida . SHin nuuni Xoossai immana giidoogaa be7ikko , yaatin , hegee ufaissan naagiyoobaa gidenna ; aissi giikko , ba be7iyoobaa demmana giiddi , ufaissan naagiyai oonee ?

text: But if we hope for that we see not , then do we with patience wait for it .
text2: SHin nuuni be7ennaagaa demmana giidi , ufaissan naagikko , hegaa danddayidi naagoos .

text: Likewise the Spirit also helpeth our infirmities : for we know not what we should pray for as we ought : but the Spirit itself maketh intercession for us with groanings which cannot be uttered .
text2: Hegaadan qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanai nu daafuraa maaddanau yees ; aissi giikko , nuuni Xoossaa waati woossanau bessiyaakko erokko ; shin Geeshsha Ayyaanai ba huuphen asau haasayanau danddayettenna ooliyan nuuyyo gaannatees .

text: And he that searcheth the hearts knoweth what is the mind of the Spirit , because he maketh intercession for the saints according to the will of God .
text2: Qassi asa wozanaa qoriya Xoossai , Geeshsha Ayyaanai i koyiyoogaadan , geeshshatuyyo gaannatiyo gishshau , Geeshsha Ayyaanaa qofai aibakko erees .

text: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God , to them who are the called according to his purpose .
text2: Xoossai bana siiqiyaageetuyyo , ba qoppidoogaa oottanau xeesidoogeetuyyo , yoho ubbaa lo77obau oottiyoogaa nuuni eroos .

text: For whom he did foreknow , he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son , that he might be the firstborn among many brethren .
text2: Xoossai ba Na7ai daro ishanttu giddon baira gidanaadan , i kase dooridoogeeta qassi ba Na7aa milatanaadan , kasetidi shaakki wottiis .

text: Moreover whom he did predestinate , them he also called : and whom he called , them he also justified : and whom he justified , them he also glorified .
text2: Xoossai kasetidi shaakki wottidoogeeta , eta qassi xeesiis ; he xeesidoogeeta qassi xillissiis ; he xillissidoogeeta qassi bonchchiis .

text: What shall we then say to these things ? If God be for us , who can be against us ?
text2: Yaatin , nuuni hagaa ubbaa woiganee ? Xoossai nu bagga gidikko , nuna oonee qohanai ?

text: He that spared not his own Son , but delivered him up for us all , how shall he not with him also freely give us all things ?
text2: I harai atto ba Na7aakka waayiyaappe guyye ashshibeenna ; shin a nuuyyo ubbaayyo aattidi immi aggiis . I ba Na7aa immidaagee qassi nuuyyo ubbabaa coo immennee ?

text: Who shall lay any thing to the charge of God ' s elect ? It is God that justifieth .
text2: Xoossai dooridoogeeta oonee mootanai ? Xoossai ba huuphen eta xillissiis .

text: Who is he that condemneth ? It is Christ that died , yea rather , that is risen again , who is even at the right hand of God , who also maketh intercession for us .
text2: Yaatin , eta bolli pirddanau danddayiyai oonee ? Oonee giikko , haiquwaappe denddidi , Xoossaappe ushachcha baggaara uttida , Kiristtoos Yesuusa ; i qassi nuuyyo gaannatees .

text: Who shall separate us from the love of Christ ? shall tribulation , or distress , or persecution , or famine , or nakedness , or peril , or sword ?
text2: Simmi nuna Kiristtoosa siiquwaappe shaakkanai oonee ? Waayee woi tuggai woi yedetai woi koshai woi kalloi woi yashshai woi olai nuna shaakkanee ?

text: As it is written , For thy sake we are killed all the day long ; we are accounted as sheep for the slaughter .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Nuuni ne gishshau , gallassaa muumiyaa olettida ; goora7anau efiyo dorssadan qoodettida ” yaagees .

text: Nay , in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us .
text2: SHin nuuni nuna siiqida aani ha yoho ubban poli xoonida .

text: For I am persuaded , that neither death , nor life , nor angels , nor principalities , nor powers , nor things present , nor things to come ,
text2: Aissi giikko , haiqo gidin , de7o gidin , kiitanchchata gidin , haariyaageeta gidin , ha77i de7iyaagaa gidin , sinttappe yaanaagaa gidin , wolqqaamata gidin , bolla saluwaa gidin , garssa sa7aa gidin , ai mereta gidinkka , Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7iya Xoossaa siiquwaappe nuna shaakkanau danddayennaagaa taani eraas .

text: I say the truth in Christ , I lie not , my conscience also bearing me witness in the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Taani tumaa haasayais ; taani Kiristtoosabaa ; qassi worddotikke . Geeshsha Ayyaanai haariyo tana zoriya wozanai taani worddotennaagaa taayyo markkattees .

text: That I have great heaviness and continual sorrow in my heart .
text2: Taayyo ashuwan zare gidiya ta ishanttuyyo , ta wozanan daro qaretainne aggenna qofai de7ees .

text: For I could wish that myself were accursed from Christ for my brethren , my kinsmen according to the flesh :
text2: Aissi giikko , taani ta huuphen eta gishshau , Xoossaa qanggettaappe garssan de7arkkinaashsha ! Qassi Kiristtoosappekka shaahettarkkinaashsha !

text: Who are Israelites ; to whom pertaineth the adoption , and the glory , and the covenants , and the giving of the law , and the service of God , and the promises ;
text2: Eti Israa7eela asata ; Xoossai eta ba naata oottidi , ba bonchchuwaa etaara shaakkiis . Etaara maacettidi , higgiyaa etau immiis . Eti Xoossau bessiya ogiyan goinnoosona ; qassi Xoossai immana giidoogaakka ekkidosona .

text: Whose are the fathers , and of whom as concerning the flesh Christ came , who is over all , God blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: Eti aawatu zare ; qassi Kiristtoosikka ashuwan eta zare . Xoossai , ubbaappe bolla gididi haariyaagee , merinau galatetto . Amin77i .

text: Not as though the word of God hath taken none effect . For they are not all Israel , which are of Israel :
text2: SHin taani , “ Xoossai immana giidoogee attana ” yaagikke . Aissi giikko , Israa7eela asa ubbati Xoossai dooridoogeeta gidokkona .

text: Neither , because they are the seed of Abraham , are they all children : but , In Isaac shall thy seed be called .
text2: Qassi Abrahaama zare ubbati Xoossaa naata gidokkona . Xoossai Abrahaamayyo , “ Ne zaree Yisaaqa baggaara xeesettana ” yaagiis ;

text: That is , They which are the children of the flesh , these are not the children of God : but the children of the promise are counted for the seed .
text2: hegaa giyoogee eti Xoossai immana giido ogiyan yelettida naatu zaredan qoodettana ; shin asa qofaadan yelettidaageeti Xoossaa naata gidokkona yaagiyoogaa .

text: For this is the word of promise , At this time will I come , and Sara shall have a son .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai immana giidi haasayidoogee hagaa ; “ Taani laitti hannoode yaana ; attuma na7a Saara yelana ” yaagiis .

text: And not only this ; but when Rebecca also had conceived by one , even by our father Isaac ;
text2: Hegaa xalaalakka gidenna ; Irbbiqa yelido mentte naatu aawai issuwaa ; i nu aawaa Yisaaqa .

text: ( For the children being not yet born , neither having done any good or evil , that the purpose of God according to election might stand , not of works , but of him that calleth ; )
text2: SHin issi na7aa dooroi Xoossai ba huuphen qoppidoogaa gidanaadan , Xoossai Irbbiqiyyo , “ Bairai kaaluwau azazettana ” yaagiis ; i hegaa eti yelettanaappenne iitabaa woi lo77obaa ainne oottanaappe kase giis . Hegaa gishshau , Xoossaa dooroi a xeesidoogaadaanippe attin , eti oottidoogaana gidenna .

text: As it is written , Jacob have I loved , but Esau have I hated .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Yaaqooba siiqaas ; shin Eesawa ixxaas ” yaagees .

text: What shall we say then ? Is there unrighteousness with God ? God forbid .
text2: Yaatin , nuuni woiganee ? Xoossai moori pirddii ? Mulekka gidenna .

text: For he saith to Moses , I will have mercy on whom I will have mercy , and I will have compassion on whom I will have compassion .
text2: Aissi giikko , Muuseyyo i , “ Taani maaranau koyiyoogeeta maarana ; qassi qarettanau koyiyoogeetuyyookka qarettana ” yaagiis .

text: So then it is not of him that willeth , nor of him that runneth , but of God that sheweth mercy .
text2: Simmi Xoossai asa maariyoogee i maaranau koyiyo gishshassappe attin , asi koyiyo woi oottiyo gishshassa gidenna .

text: For the scripture saith unto Pharaoh , Even for this same purpose have I raised thee up , that I might shew my power in thee , and that my name might be declared throughout all the earth .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai Gibxxe kawuwaayyo , “ Taani ta wolqqaa nenan bessanaunne ta sunttai sa7an ubban odettanau , hegau taani nena kawoyaas ” yaagees .

text: Therefore hath he mercy on whom he will have mercy , and whom he will he hardeneth .
text2: Simmi Xoossai maarana koyiyoogaa maarees ; qassi wozanaa gorddana koyiyoogaa wozanaa gorddees .

text: Thou wilt say then unto me , Why doth he yet find fault ? For who hath resisted his will ?
text2: Simmi intte tana , “ Hegee tuma gidikko , Xoossai asaa mooruwaassi aibissi walassii ? Xoossai giidoogaa ixxaas gaanai oonee ? ” yaaganau danddayeeta .

text: Nay but , O man , who art thou that repliest against God ? Shall the thing formed say to him that formed it , Why hast thou made me thus ?
text2: SHin ta laggiyau , Xoossaa bolli zaaranau neeni oonee ? Urqqaappe merettida miishshai guyye zaaridi bana medhdhidaagaa , “ Tana hagaadan aissi medhdhadii ? ” giidi oichchanau danddayii ?

text: Hath not the potter power over the clay , of the same lump to make one vessel unto honour , and another unto dishonour ?
text2: Woikko urqqaa medhdhiyaagee ba medhdhiyo urqqaa ba koyiyoogaadan oottanaunne issi mala urqqaappe issuwaa bonchcho miishsha oottidi , qassi issuwaa tooshe ooso oottiyo miishsha oottidi medhdhanau au maati baawee ?

text: What if God , willing to shew his wrath , and to make his power known , endured with much longsuffering the vessels of wrath fitted to destruction :
text2: Xoossai oottidoogee hagaara issuwaa . I ba hanqquwaa bessanaunne ba wolqqaa erissanau koyiis ; i ba hanqquwan pirddanaageeta , bashshanau giigi uttidoogeeta , daro genccan danddayiis .

text: And that he might make known the riches of his glory on the vessels of mercy , which he had afore prepared unto glory ,
text2: Qassi i maaridoogeetuyyo , ba bonchchuwaa ekkanau giigissi wottidoogeetuyyo i ai keenaa bonchchettiyaakkonne bessanau koyiis .

text: Even us , whom he hath called , not of the Jews only , but also of the Gentiles ?
text2: Nuuni i xeesidoogeeta ; shin Aihuda asaa giddo xalaalaappe gidennan , Aihuda gidenna asaa giddoppekka xeesiis .

text: As he saith also in Osee , I will call them my people , which were not my people ; and her beloved , which was not beloved .
text2: Hoose7a maxaafan i giyoogee hagaa ; “ Ta asaa gidennaageeta , ' Ta asa ' gaada xeesana . Taani siiqabeenna zariyaakka , ' Ta siiqiyoogeetoo ' gaada xeesana .

text: And it shall come to pass , that in the place where it was said unto them , Ye are not my people ; there shall they be called the children of the living God .
text2: ' Intte ta asa gidekketa ' giyoogaa eti siyido he sohuwan , eti , ' De7o Xoossaa naata ' geetettidi xeesettana ” yaagees .

text: Esaias also crieth concerning Israel , Though the number of the children of Israel be as the sand of the sea , a remnant shall be saved :
text2: Isiyaasi Israa7eela asaabaa yaagidi haasayiis ; “ Israa7eela asai abbaa matan de7iya shafiyaa keena gidiyaakkokka , etappe amaridaageetu xalaalai attana .

text: For he will finish the work , and cut it short in righteousness : because a short work will the Lord make upon the earth .
text2: Aissi giikko , Godai sa7aa bollan de7iya asa ubbaa bolli eesuwan pirddana ” yaagiis .

text: And as Esaias said before , Except the Lord of Sabaoth had left us a seed , we had been as Sodoma , and been made like unto Gomorrha .
text2: Isiyaasi kasetidi , “ Ubbaappe Wolqqaama Godai nuuyyo amarida zareta ashshennaakko , nuuni Sadooma katamaadaaninne Gamoora katamaadan hanidashin ” yaagidi haasayiis .

text: What shall we say then ? That the Gentiles , which followed not after righteousness , have attained to righteousness , even the righteousness which is of faith .
text2: Yaatin , nuuni woiganee ? Xillotettaa koyibeenna Aihuda gidenna asai ammanuwan xilliis ;

text: But Israel , which followed after the law of righteousness , hath not attained to the law of righteousness .
text2: shin Israa7eela asai banttana xillissiya higgiyaa koyidaageeti he higgiyaa demmibookkona .

text: Wherefore ? Because they sought it not by faith , but as it were by the works of the law . For they stumbled at that stumblingstone ;
text2: Aissi demmibookkonaa ? Eti oosuwaanappe attin , ammanuwan xillotettaa koyibeenna gishshassa . Eti Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Akeekite ; taani Xiyoonen asaa xubbiya shuchchaa , eta ooggiya zaallaa wottana . SHin aani ammaniya ooninne yeellatenna ” yaagidi haasayiyo xubbiya shuchchan xubettidosona .

text: Brethren , my heart ' s desire and prayer to God for Israel is , that they might be saved .
text2: Ta ishatoo , taani Israa7eela asaayyo ta kumetta wozanaappe amottiyoogeenne Xoossaa woossiyoogee eti attanaassa ;

text: For I bear them record that they have a zeal of God , but not according to knowledge .
text2: aissi giikko , eti Xoossau oottanau keehi koyiyoogaa taani markkattais ; shin eti Xoossau oottanau keehi koyiyo koshshai tumu eratettaappe gidenna .

text: For they being ignorant of God ' s righteousness , and going about to establish their own righteousness , have not submitted themselves unto the righteousness of God .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai asaa xillissiyo ogiyaa eti erennan , bantta huuphe xillotettaa essanau koyidosona ; qassi bantta huuphen Xoossai asaa xillissiyo ogiyau haarettibookkona .

text: For Christ is the end of the law for righteousness to every one that believeth .
text2: Aissi giikko , ammanida ubbai xillanaadan , Kiristtoosi higgiyau wolqqaa xaissiis .

text: For Moses describeth the righteousness which is of the law , That the man which doeth those things shall live by them .
text2: Asi higgiyau azazettidi xilliyoobau Muusee , “ Higgee azaziyoogaa oottiya ooninne he higgiyan paxa de7ana ” yaagidi xaafiis ;

text: But the righteousness which is of faith speaketh on this wise , Say not in thine heart , Who shall ascend into heaven ? ( that is , to bring Christ down from above : )
text2: shin ammanuwan xilliyoobau geetettidaagee hagaa ; “ Ne wozanan , ' Ooni saluwaa pude baanee ? ' yaagoppa . Hegee Kiristtoosa duge wottanaassa ;

text: Or , Who shall descend into the deep ? ( that is , to bring up Christ again from the dead . )
text2: woikko , ' Duge sa7aa garssi wodhdhanai oonee ? ' gooppa . Hegee Kiristtoosa haiquwaappe denttanaassa .

text: But what saith it ? The word is nigh thee , even in thy mouth , and in thy heart : that is , the word of faith , which we preach ;
text2: SHin i giyoogee hagaa ; ' Xoossaa qaalai ne mataana ; ne doonaaninne ne wozanan de7ees ' geetettiis ” yaagees . Hegeekka nuuni intteyyo yootiyo ammanuwaa qaalaa .

text: That if thou shalt confess with thy mouth the Lord Jesus , and shalt believe in thine heart that God hath raised him from the dead , thou shalt be saved .
text2: Neeni , “ Yesuusi Godaa ” gaada ne doonan markkattikko , qassi Xoossai haiquwaappe a denttidoogaa ne wozanan ammanikko , neeni attana .

text: For with the heart man believeth unto righteousness ; and with the mouth confession is made unto salvation .
text2: Aissi giikko , asi ba wozanan ammanidi xillees ; ba doonankka markkattidi attees .

text: For the scripture saith , Whosoever believeth on him shall not be ashamed .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Aani ammaniya ooninne yeellatenna ” yaagees .

text: For there is no difference between the Jew and the Greek : for the same Lord over all is rich unto all that call upon him .
text2: Aihuda asaanne Aihuda gidenna asaa giddon dummatetti baawa . Issi Xoossai ubbaa Godaa ; i bana xeesiya ubbatuyyo daro keha .

text: For whosoever shall call upon the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Godaa sunttaa xeesiya ooninne attana ” yaagees .

text: How then shall they call on him in whom they have not believed ? and how shall they believe in him of whom they have not heard ? and how shall they hear without a preacher ?
text2: Yaatin , eti a ammanibeennaageeta gidikko , waatidi a xeesanau danddayiyoonaa ? Qassi qaalaa siyibeennaageeti waani ammananau danddayiyoonaa ? Qaalaa yootiyaabi xayikko , eti waani siyanau danddayiyoonaa ?

text: And how shall they preach , except they be sent ? as it is written , How beautiful are the feet of them that preach the gospel of peace , and bring glad tidings of good things !
text2: Qassi qaalaa yootiyaageeti kiitettennan aggikko , kiitai waanidi odettanau danddayii ? Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Ufaissiya mishiraachchuwaa yootiyaageetu tohoti aiba lo77iyoonaa ! ” yaagees .

text: But they have not all obeyed the gospel . For Esaias saith , Lord , who hath believed our report ?
text2: SHin eti ubbai wonggeliyau azazettibookkona ; aissi giikko Isiyaasi , “ Ta Godau , nuuni markkattidoogaa ooni ammanidee ? ” yaagiis .

text: So then faith cometh by hearing , and hearing by the word of God .
text2: Simmi asi qaalaa siyidi ammanees ; qassi issi urai Kiristtoosa qaalaa yootin siyees .

text: But I say , Have they not heard ? Yes verily , their sound went into all the earth , and their words unto the ends of the world .
text2: SHin eti qaalaa siyibeennaagee tumee gaada taani oichchais . Tuma eti siyidosona ; Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Eta haasayaa cenggurssai sa7a ubban laalettiis ; eta qaalaikka sa7aa gaxaa gakkiis ” yaagees .

text: But I say , Did not Israel know ? First Moses saith , I will provoke you to jealousy by them that are no people , and by a foolish nation I will anger you .
text2: SHin Israa7eela asati eribookkonaayye gaada taani oichchais . Muusee kase , “ Taani inttena asa gidenna asatun mishissana ; qassi eeyya asatun taani inttena hanqqetissana ” yaagiis .

text: But Esaias is very bold , and saith , I was found of them that sought me not ; I was made manifest unto them that asked not after me .
text2: Qassi Isiyaasi daro xalidi , “ Tana koyibeennaageetuyyo beettaas ; tana oichchibeennaageetuyyookka qonccaas ” yaagees .

text: But to Israel he saith , All day long I have stretched forth my hands unto a disobedient and gainsaying people .
text2: SHin Israa7eelatubaa i haasayiiddi , “ Gallassaa ubbaa azazettennaageetuyyoonne tabaa ixxiyaageetuyyo ta kushiyaa miccaas ” yaagees .

text: I say then , Hath God cast away his people ? God forbid . For I also am an Israelite , of the seed of Abraham , of the tribe of Benjamin .
text2: Yaatin , Xoossai ba asaa ixxideeyye gaada oichchoo ? Mulekka gidenna ; aissi giikko , taani ta huuphen Israa7eela asa ; Abrahaama zare ; Biniyaama yara .

text: God hath not cast away his people which he foreknew . Wot ye not what the scripture saith of Elias ? how he maketh intercession to God against Israel , saying ,
text2: Xoossai koiro doorido ba asata ixxenna ; Xoossaa maxaafai , Eelaasa taarikiyaa giddon , Eelaasi Israa7eelata Xoossaa sinttan waati mootiyaakko , intte ereeta .

text: Lord , they have killed thy prophets , and digged down thine altars ; and I am left alone , and they seek my life .
text2: “ Godau , eti ne sunttan hananabaa yootiyaageeta woridosona ; ne yarshshiyoosaakka qolidosona . Yaatin , taani tarkka attaas . Qassi eti tanakka woranau koyoosona ” yaagiis .

text: But what saith the answer of God unto him ? I have reserved to myself seven thousand men , who have not bowed the knee to the image of Baal .
text2: Xoossai ayyo woigi zaaridee ? “ Taani Ba7aalayyo gulbbatibeenna laappun sha7u asaa taayyo ashshaas ” yaagiis .

text: Even so then at this present time also there is a remnant according to the election of grace .
text2: Hegaadankka qassi ha wodiyan , Xoossai ba aaro kehatettan doorido amarida asati de7oosona .

text: And if by grace , then is it no more of works : otherwise grace is no more grace . But if it be of works , then is it no more grace : otherwise work is no more work .
text2: SHin i ba aaro kehatettan dooriisippe attin , eta oosuwan eta dooribeenna ; hegee xayikko , a aaro kehatettai tumu aaro kehatetta gidenna .

text: What then ? Israel hath not obtained that which he seeketh for ; but the election hath obtained it , and the rest were blinded
text2: Yaatin , aibee ? Israa7eela asati bantta koyiyoobaa demmibookkona ; shin Xoossai doorido amaridaageeti demmidosona . Xoossai hinkkooti ba xeesiyoogaa siyennaadan tulissiis .

text: ( According as it is written , God hath given them the spirit of slumber , eyes that they should not see , and ears that they should not hear ; ) unto this day .
text2: Hegaadankka , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Xoossai eti bantta aifiyan be7ennaadaaninne bantta haittan siyennaadan , hanno gakkanaassi etau azalla ayyaanaa immiis ” yaagees .

text: And David saith , Let their table be made a snare , and a trap , and a stumbling block , and a recompence unto them :
text2: Qassi Daawiti yaagees ; “ Eti miyo masoobee eta oiqqidi qachcho ; eta gufantto ; Xoossai eta seero .

text: Let their eyes be darkened , that they may not see , and bow down their back alway .
text2: Eti xeellennaadan , eta aifee goozetto ; ubba wode bantta metuwan quunnidi de7ona ” yaagees .

text: I say then , Have they stumbled that they should fall ? God forbid : but rather through their fall salvation is come unto the Gentiles , for to provoke them to jealousy .
text2: Yaatin , Aihudati xubettido wode , denddennaadan kunddidonaayye ? Mulekka gidenna ; eti nagaraa oottido gishshau , atotettai eti Aihuda gidenna asata qanaatanaadan , Aihuda gidenna asau yiis .

text: Now if the fall of them be the riches of the world , and the diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles ; how much more their fulness ?
text2: SHin Aihudati nagaraa oottido gishshau , sa7au daro anjjoi yiis ; qassi eta kunddettaikka Aihuda gidenna asau daro anjjuwaa ehiis . Yaatin , Aihudati muleera gujettiyo wode , anjjoi ai keena daranddeeshsha !

text: For I speak to you Gentiles , inasmuch as I am the apostle of the Gentiles , I magnify mine office :
text2: SHin taani ha77i intteyyo , Aihuda gidenna asaayyo haasayais ; taani Aihuda gidenna asaayyo Yesuusi kiittidoogaa gidiyoogaadankka , ta oosuwaa sabbana .

text: If by any means I may provoke to emulation them which are my flesh , and might save some of them .
text2: Taani ta zare gidiya asata qanaatiyaageeta oottikko , ooni erii etappe amaridaageeta ashshennan aggikke .

text: For if the casting away of them be the reconciling of the world , what shall the receiving of them be , but life from the dead ?
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai eta ixxido wode , ha sa7ai Xoossaara sigettiis . Yaatin Xoossai eta shiishshi ekkiyo wode , haiqqidaagee de7o demmanaappe attin , aibi hananee ?

text: For if the firstfruit be holy , the lump is also holy : and if the root be holy , so are the branches .
text2: Koiro menttido baso oittaa Xoossau immikko , muume oittai qassi abaa ; mittau xaphuwaa ayyo immiyaabaa gidikko , tashe ubbaikka qassi abaa .

text: And if some of the branches be broken off , and thou , being a wild olive tree , wert graffed in among them , and with them partakest of the root and fatness of the olive tree ;
text2: SHin gaden tokkido wogaraa tashiyaappe issoota issoota karidosan , nena woran mokkida wogara malaa he wogaraara gatti qachchida ; qachchin neeni qassi zaitee kiyiyo wogaraa xaphuwaara issippe de7aasa .

text: Boast not against the branches . But if thou boast , thou bearest not the root , but the root thee .
text2: Simmi neeni he karetti wodhdhida tashetu bolli otorettanau bessenna ; shin neeni otorettiyaabaa gidikkokka , xaphoi nena tookkeesippe attin , neeni xaphuwaa tookkennaagaa akeeka .

text: Thou wilt say then , The branches were broken off , that I might be graffed in .
text2: Hegaa gishshau neeni , “ Ee ; shin tasheti taani eta sohuwan gelanaadan karettidosona ” yaagana .

text: Well ; because of unbelief they were broken off , and thou standest by faith . Be not highminded , but fear :
text2: Hegee tuma ; eti ammanibeenna gishshau , karettidosona ; neeni ammanido gishshau , he sohuwan eqqadasa . SHin yayyanaappe attin , otoro qofaa qoppoppa .

text: For if God spared not the natural branches , take heed lest he also spare not thee .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai mereta tashe malatuyyo , Aihudatuyyo qarettibeennaagaa gidikko , neeyyo qarettiyaabaa misatii ?

text: Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God : on them which fell , severity ; but toward thee , goodness , if thou continue in his goodness : otherwise thou also shalt be cut off .
text2: Simmi Xoossaa kehatettaanne meqettaa iitatettaa be7a . Kunddidaageetuyyo i meqettaa iitees ; shin neeni a kehatettan minnada de7ikko , i neeyyo keha ; hegee xayikko , neenikka qassi karettana .

text: And they also , if they abide not still in unbelief , shall be graffed in : for God is able to graff them in again .
text2: Aihudatikka qassi ammanennan ixxiyoogaa aggikko , Xoossai kase eti de7iyoosan zaaridi wottana ; aissi giikko , i eta zaaridi wottanau danddayees .

text: For if thou wert cut out of the olive tree which is wild by nature , and wert graffed contrary to nature into a good olive tree : how much more shall these , which be the natural branches , be graffed into their own olive tree ?
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai nena woran de7iya wogaraappe qanxxidi , ne meretaadan gidennan gaden tookkido wogaraara gatti qachchidabaa gidikko , yaatin , he karetti wodhdhida tasheta zaarettidi , eta anuwaara gatti qachchanau , a aibi waissanee ?

text: For I would not , brethren , that ye should be ignorant of this mystery , lest ye should be wise in your own conceits ; that blindness in part is happened to Israel , until the fulness of the Gentiles be come in .
text2: Ta ishatoo , taani intte eranaadan koyiyo tumu xuura yohoi de7ees ; hegee intte inttena intterkka , nuuni aadhdhida eranchcha yaagidi qoppiyoogaa teqqees ; Israa7eela asaappe baggai siyennan ixxiis ; shin he siyennan ixxiyoogee Aihuda gidenna asaa kumetta qoodai Xoossaakko gakkanaassi gam77ana .

text: And so all Israel shall be saved : as it is written , There shall come out of Sion the Deliverer , and shall turn away ungodliness from Jacob :
text2: Hegaadankka , Israa7eela asai ubbai attana ; Xoossaa maxaafai hagaadan yaagees ; “ Ashshiyaagee Xiyoone giyo katamaappe yaana ; yiidi , nagara ooso ubbaa Yaaqooba zariyaappe diggana .

text: For this is my covenant unto them , when I shall take away their sins .
text2: Taani eta nagaraa atto yaagiyo wode , etaara maacettana maachchai hagaa ” yaagees .

text: As concerning the gospel , they are enemies for your sakes : but as touching the election , they are beloved for the fathers ' sakes .
text2: Aihuda gidenna asatoo , Aihudati wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa baggaara intte gishshau , Xoossaara morkke ; shin Xoossaa dooruwaa baggaara aawatu gishshau , eti i siiqiyoogeeta .

text: For the gifts and calling of God are without repentance .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai ba immidoogaa guyye ekkenna ; qassi ba dooridoogaa ixxaas geenna .

text: For as ye in times past have not believed God , yet have now obtained mercy through their unbelief :
text2: Aihuda gidennaageetoo , Xoossau intte kase azazettibeekketa ; shin Aihudati azazettennan ixxido gishshau , Xoossaa maarotettaa ha77i intte ekkideta .

text: Even so have these also now not believed , that through your mercy they also may obtain mercy .
text2: Hegaadan , intte ekkido maarotettaa gishshau , Aihudati qassi Xoossaa maarotettaa ha77i ekkanaadan , Xoossau azazettennan ixxidosona .

text: For God hath concluded them all in unbelief , that he might have mercy upon all .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai asa ubbaa maarana mala , asai ubbai ayyo azazettennan ixxiyo hanotan qachchiis .

text: O the depth of the riches both of the wisdom and knowledge of God ! how unsearchable are his judgments , and his ways past finding out !
text2: Xoossaa duretettai ai keena daroo ? A hayyoinne a eratettai ai keena xoqqee ? A pirddaa yootanai oonee ? I ba oottiyoogaa aissi oottiyaakko , oonee akeekiyai ?

text: For who hath known the mind of the Lord ? or who hath been his counseller ?
text2: Hegaa Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Godaa wozanaa eriyai oonee ? A zoranau danddayiyai oonee ?

text: Or who hath first given to him , and it shall be recompensed unto him again ?
text2: Woikko ba kushiyaa zaarana mala , au aibakko immidai de7ii ? ” yaagees .

text: For of him , and through him , and to him , are all things : to whom be glory for ever . Amen .
text2: Aissi giikko , ubbabaa i medhdhiis ; qassi ubbabaikka aaninne ayyoonne de7ees ; Xoossau merinau bonchchoi gido . Amin77i .

text: I beseech you therefore , brethren , by the mercies of God , that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice , holy , acceptable unto God , which is your reasonable service .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ta ishatoo , intte intte asatettaa Xoossaa ufaissiya de7onne geeshsha yarshsho oottidi , Xoossau shiishshanaadan , taani inttena Xoossaa maarotettan woossais ; Xoossau intte goinnanau bessiya tumu ogee hegaa .

text: And be not conformed to this world : but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind , that ye may prove what is that good , and acceptable , and perfect , will of God .
text2: Xoossai intte qofaa muumeera dummayidi , inttena laammoppe attin , ha sa7aa asaa milatoppite . He wode intte Xoossai koyiyoobi , lo77obi , a ufaissiyaabinne qassi kumettabi aibakko erana .

text: For I say , through the grace given unto me , to every man that is among you , not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think ; but to think soberly , according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith .
text2: Xoossai tau immido aaro kehatettan taani intteyyo yootais . Intte qoppanau bessiyaagaappe aattidi , otoruwan qoppoppite ; hegaa aggidi , wozannaama asadan qoppite ; Xoossai intteyyo huuphiyan huuphiyan immido ammanuwaa keenan intte bolli pirddite .

text: For as we have many members in one body , and all members have not the same office :
text2: Nu issi bollaa giddon , daro bollaa qommoti de7oosona ; he qommotu ubbaukka dumma dumma oosoi de7ees .

text: So we , being many , are one body in Christ , and every one members one of another .
text2: Hegaadan , nuuni daro asa gidikkokka , Kiristtoosa baggaara issi asa . Qassi nuuni issi asatettaa qommotudan , issoi issuwaara oiqetti uttida .

text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us , whether prophecy , let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith ;
text2: Xoossai nuuyyo immido aaro kehatettan dumma dumma imoi de7ees . Nu imoi Xoossaa qaalaa yootiyoobaa gidikko , nuuyyo de7iya ammanuwaa keenaa yotanau bessees .

text: Or ministry , let us wait on our ministering : or he that teacheth , on teaching ;
text2: Oottiyoobaa gidikko , he oosuwan minnanau bessees ; tamaarissiyoobaa gidikko , he tamaarissuwan minnanau bessees .

text: Or he that exhorteth , on exhortation : he that giveth , let him do it with simplicity ; he that ruleth , with diligence ; he that sheweth mercy , with cheerfulness .
text2: Harata minttettiyoobaa gidikko , he aani minnanau bessees . Bau de7iyaabaappe haratuyyo immiya ooninne wozanappe immo . Maati de7iyo urai mintti oottanau bessees ; haratuyyo kehiya urai ufaissan kehanau bessees .

text: Let love be without dissimulation . Abhor that which is evil ; cleave to that which is good .
text2: Intte siiqoi asa bessanau siiqettiyoobaa gidanau bessenna . Iitabaa ixxite ; lo77obaa minttidi oiqqite .

text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love ; in honour preferring one another ;
text2: Issoi issuwaara ishanttudan siiqettite ; issoi issuwaa bonchchiyoogan ufaittite .

text: Not slothful in business ; fervent in spirit ; serving the Lord ;
text2: Minni oottite ; azalloppite ; intte kumetta wozanaappe Godau oottite .

text: Rejoicing in hope ; patient in tribulation ; continuing instant in prayer ;
text2: Xoossai intteyyo immana giidoogan ufaittite ; waayiyan genccite . Ubba wode Xoossaa woossite ;

text: Distributing to the necessity of saints ; given to hospitality .
text2: geeshshata koshshiyaaban maaddite ; imattaa mokkite .

text: Bless them which persecute you : bless , and curse not .
text2: Inttena yedettiyaageeta anjjite ; eta anjjanaappe attin , qanggoppite .

text: Rejoice with them that do rejoice , and weep with them that weep .
text2: Ufaittiyaageetuura ufaittite ; yeekkiyaageetuurakka yeekkite .

text: Be of the same mind one toward another . Mind not high things , but condescend to men of low estate . Be not wise in your own conceits .
text2: Asa ubbau issi mala qofaa qoppite ; oottiyooban ubban inttena toochchidi de7iteppe attin , otorettoppite ; inttena intte huuphen aadhdhida eranchcha giidi qoppoppite .

text: Recompense to no man evil for evil . Provide things honest in the sight of all men .
text2: Ooninne intteyyo iitabaa oottikko , he urau iitabaa ootti zaaroppite ; asa ubbau lo77obaa oottanau qoppite .

text: If it be possible , as much as lieth in you , live peaceably with all men .
text2: Asa ubbaara sarotettan de7anau , intte baggaara , intteyyo danddayettidabaa ubbaa oottite .

text: Dearly beloved , avenge not yourselves , but rather give place unto wrath : for it is written , Vengeance is mine ; I will repay , saith the Lord .
text2: Ta ishatoo , intte intte huuphen asau halo kessoppite . Xoossai haluwaa kessanau , a aggiigite . Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Godai , ' Taani haluwaa kessana ; taani kushiyaa zaarana ' yaagees ” yaagees .

text: Therefore if thine enemy hunger , feed him ; if he thirst , give him drink : for in so doing thou shalt heap coals of fire on his head .
text2: SHin Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Ne morkkee namisettikko , miza . Saamettikko , ushsha . Aissi giikko , neeni hegaa oottiyoogan a huuphiyan tamaa bonqquwaa qolana ” yaagees .

text: Be not overcome of evil , but overcome evil with good .
text2: Iitabaa lo77oban xoonappe attin , iitabai nena xoonoppo .

text: Let every soul be subject unto the higher powers . For there is no power but of God : the powers that be are ordained of God .
text2: Asai ubbai deriyaa heemmiyaageetuyyo haarettanau bessees ; aissi giikko , Xoossai geennan de7ishin , dere heemmiyaabi de7anau danddayenna . Ha77i de7iya heemmiyaageetikka Xoossai wottidoogeeta .

text: Whosoever therefore resisteth the power , resisteth the ordinance of God : and they that resist shall receive to themselves damnation .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ha77i de7iya heemmiyaageeta ixxiya ooninne Xoossaa azazuwaa ixxees ; ixxiya ooninne ba bolli pirddaa ehees .

text: For rulers are not a terror to good works , but to the evil . Wilt thou then not be afraid of the power ? do that which is good , and thou shalt have praise of the same :
text2: Aissi giikko , heemmiyaageeti iitabaa oottiyaageeta yashshiyoogaappe attin , lo77obaa oottiyaageeta yashshokkona . Heemmiyaagaayyo yayyennan agganau koyai ? Yaatikko lo77obaa ootta ; i nena galatana .

text: For he is the minister of God to thee for good . But if thou do that which is evil , be afraid ; for he beareth not the sword in vain : for he is the minister of God , a revenger to execute wrath upon him that doeth evil .
text2: Aissi giikko , i neeyyo lo77obaa oottanau , Xoossau ashkkara . SHin neeni iitabaa oottikko , iitabaa oottidaagaa i seeriyo gishshau , ayyo yayya ; i Xoossaa ashkkara . Qassi iitabaa oottiyaageetu bolli Xoossaa hanqquwaa i ehees .

text: Wherefore ye must needs be subject , not only for wrath , but also for conscience sake .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , deriyaa heemmiyaageetuyyo azazettiyoogee Xoossaa hanqquwaa xalaalaassa gidennan , inttena zoriya wozanaa gishshaukka haarettanau bessees .

text: For for this cause pay ye tribute also : for they are God ' s ministers , attending continually upon this very thing .
text2: Aissi giikko , deriyaa heemmiyaageeti bantta oosuwaa oottiyo wode , Xoossau oottiyo gishshau , intte giiraa giiriyoogee hegaassa .

text: Render therefore to all their dues : tribute to whom tribute is due ; custom to whom custom ; fear to whom fear ; honour to whom honour .
text2: Ubbau bessiyaagaa immite . Giiraa giiranau bessiyoogau giirite ; qaraxaa qanxxanau bessiyoogau qanxxite ; yayyanau bessiyoogau yayyite ; bonchchoi bessiyoogaa bonchchite .

text: Owe no man any thing , but to love one another : for he that loveth another hath fulfilled the law .
text2: Intte issoi issuwaara siiqettanaappe attin , o acoinne intte bolli de7oppo . Aissi giikko , ba shooruwaa siiqiya ooninne higgee giyoogaa poliis .

text: For this , Thou shalt not commit adultery , Thou shalt not kill , Thou shalt not steal , Thou shalt not bear false witness , Thou shalt not covet ; and if there be any other commandment , it is briefly comprehended in this saying , namely , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: “ SHaaramuxoppa ; woroppa ; wuuqqoppa ; asabaa amottoppa ” giya azazotinne hara azazo ubbati , “ Ne shooruwaa ne huuphedan siiqa ” giya azazuwan kuuyettoosona .

text: Love worketh no ill to his neighbour : therefore love is the fulfilling of the law .
text2: Ba shooruwaa siiqiya ooninne ayyo iitabaa oottenna ; hegaa gishshau , shooruwaa siiqiyoogee higge ubbau azazettiyoogaa .

text: And that , knowing the time , that now it is high time to awake out of sleep : for now is our salvation nearer than when we believed .
text2: Xiskkuwaappe intte beegottiyo saatee ha77i gakkido gishshau , ha wodiyaa akeekite . Aissi giikko , nuuni koiro ammaniyo wodeppe , nuuni attiyo wodee ha77i nuukko matattiis .

text: The night is far spent , the day is at hand : let us therefore cast off the works of darkness , and let us put on the armour of light .
text2: Qammai aadhdhanau hanees ; gallassai matattiis . Simmi nuuni xumaa oosuwaa aggidi , poo7uwan olettanau , tooraa gonddalliyaa oiqqoos ;

text: Let us walk honestly , as in the day ; not in rioting and drunkenness , not in chambering and wantonness , not in strife and envying .
text2: gallassi poo7uwan de7iya asadan , ane maara de7oos . Yettaaninne mattuwan gidoppo ; shaaramuxiyoogaaninne shaaramuxanau qaaqqatiyoogan gidoppo ; palamaaninne qanaatiyan gidoppo .

text: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ , and make not provision for the flesh , to fulfil the lusts thereof .
text2: SHin Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa tooraa gonddalliyaa oiqqite ; intte nagaranchcha asatettai ba wozanaa amuwaa polanaadan , au qoppoppite .

text: Him that is weak in the faith receive ye , but not to doubtful disputations .
text2: Ammanuwan azalliya uraa shiishshi ekkite . SHin i ba huuphen qoppiyooban aara palamettoppite .

text: For one believeth that he may eat all things : another , who is weak , eateth herbs .
text2: Issi ura ammanoi i ai miininne diggenna . SHin ammanuwan azalliya urai gaden mokkidabaa xalaalaa mees .

text: Let not him that eateth despise him that eateth not ; and let not him which eateth not judge him that eateth : for God hath received him .
text2: Ubbabaa miya urai ubbabaa meenna uraa karoppo ; ubbabaa meenna uraikka ubbabaa miya uraa bolli pirddoppo . Aissi giikko , Xoossai a shiishshi ekkiis .

text: Who art thou that judgest another man ' s servant ? to his own master he standeth or falleth . Yea , he shall be holden up : for God is able to make him stand .
text2: Hara asa ashkkaraa bolli pirddiyaagee neeni oonee ? I kunddin woi denddin ba godaassa ; shin Godai a denttanau danddayiyo gishshau , i eqqana .

text: One man esteemeth one day above another : another esteemeth every day alike . Let every man be fully persuaded in his own mind .
text2: Issi urai , “ Hiqqa gallassai hara gallassatuppe aadhdhees ” yaagidi qoppiyo wode , harai , “ Ubba gallassatikka issi mala ” giidi qoppees . Asai ubbai huuphiyan huuphiyan hegaadan aissi qoppiyaakko akeeko .

text: He that regardeth the day , regardeth it unto the Lord ; and he that regardeth not the day , to the Lord he doth not regard it . He that eateth , eateth to the Lord , for he giveth God thanks ; and he that eateth not , to the Lord he eateth not , and giveth God thanks .
text2: Issi gallassaa hara gallassatuppe aattidi bonchchiya urai Godaa bonchchuwau bonchchees ; quma miya uraikka Godaa bonchchuwau mees . Aissi giikko , i he qumaa gishshau , Xoossaa galatees . Qumaa meennaageekka Godaa bonchchuwau meennan aggees ; qassi Xoossaa galatees .

text: For none of us liveth to himself , and no man dieth to himself .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuppe ooninne ba huuphe xalaalau de7enna ; qassi ooninne ba huuphe xalaalau haiqqenna .

text: For whether we live , we live unto the Lord ; and whether we die , we die unto the Lord : whether we live therefore , or die , we are the Lord ' s .
text2: Nuuni paxa de7ikko , Godau de7oos ; qassi haiqqikkokka , Godau haiqqoos . Simmi nuuni paxa de7in woi haiqqin Godaassa .

text: For to this end Christ both died , and rose , and revived , that he might be Lord both of the dead and living .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Kiristtoosi paxa de7iyaageetuyyoonne haiqqidaageetuyyo Goda gidanau haiqqidi , haiquwaappe denddiis .

text: But why dost thou judge thy brother ? or why dost thou set at nought thy brother ? for we shall all stand before the judgment seat of Christ .
text2: Yaatin , neeni ne ishaa bolli aissi pirddai ? Woikko neeni ne ishaa aissi karai ? Nuuni ubbaikka Xoossaa pirddaa araataa sinttan eqqana .

text: For it is written , As I live , saith the Lord , every knee shall bow to me , and every tongue shall confess to God .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ ' Taani Godai ta de7uwan caaqqais ; asai ubbai ta sinttan gulbbatana . Qassi taani Xoossaa gidiyoogaa asai ubbai markkattana ' yaagais ” yaagees .

text: So then every one of us shall give account of himself to God .
text2: Simmi nuuni huuphiyan huuphiyan nubaa Xoossau yootana .

text: Let us not therefore judge one another any more : but judge this rather , that no man put a stumblingblock or an occasion to fall in his brother ' s way .
