text2: Giyan axaare taran baizettiyaabaa aibanne zoriya wozanaa gishshau , ainne oichchennan miite .

text: For the earth is the Lord ' s , and the fulness thereof .
text2: Aissi giikko , sa7ainne sa7an de7iyaabai ubbai Godaabaa .

text: If any of them that believe not bid you to a feast , and ye be disposed to go ; whatsoever is set before you , eat , asking no question for conscience sake .
text2: Issi ammanenna asi inttena imattanau xeesin baanau koyikko , zoriya wozanaa gishshau , ainne oichchennan intte sintti i aattiyoobaa ubbaa miite .

text: But if any man say unto you , This is offered in sacrifice unto idols , eat not for his sake that shewed it , and for conscience sake : for the earth is the Lord ' s , and the fulness thereof :
text2: SHin issi urai intteyyo , “ Hagee eeqassi yarshshidoogaa ” giikko , he intteyyo odida bitaniyaa gishshaunne qassi zoriya wozanaa gishshau , he qumaa mooppite .

text: Conscience , I say , not thine own , but of the other : for why is my liberty judged of another man ' s conscience ?
text2: Taani giyoogee nena ne huuphen zoriya wozanaa gishshaassa gidenna ; shin hinkko bitaniyaa zoriya wozanaa gishshaassa . Taani ta koyidoogaa hananau danddayiyo ta hanotettaa hara asa zoriya wozanai aissi pirddii ?

text: For if I by grace be a partaker , why am I evil spoken of for that for which I give thanks ?
text2: Taani Xoossaa galatada qumaa miikko , taani Xoossaa galatada miido qumaassi aissi borettiyaanaa ?

text: Whether therefore ye eat , or drink , or whatsoever ye do , do all to the glory of God .
text2: Simmi intte ai miikkonne , woi ai uyikkonne , woi intte ai oottikkonne , ubbabaa Xoossaa bonchchuwaassi oottite .

text: Give none offence , neither to the Jews , nor to the Gentiles , nor to the church of God :
text2: Intte Aihuda asatussi woi Giriike asatussi woikko Xoossaa woosa keettaassi xube gidoppite .

text: Even as I please all men in all things , not seeking mine own profit , but the profit of many , that they may be saved .
text2: Taani qassi daroti attana mala , eta ubbaa go77aappe attin , ta huuphe go77aa koyennan , asa ubbaa ubbaban ufaissiyoogaadan , inttekka oottite .

text: Be ye followers of me , even as I also am of Christ .
text2: Taani Kiristtoosadan haniyoogaadan , inttekka tanadan hanite .

text: Now I praise you , brethren , that ye remember me in all things , and keep the ordinances , as I delivered them to you .
text2: Ta ishatoo , intte ubbaban tana hassayiyo gishshaunne , wogaa taani intteyyo immidoogaadan , intte minttidi naagiyo gishshau , inttena galatais .

text: But I would have you know , that the head of every man is Christ ; and the head of the woman is the man ; and the head of Christ is God .
text2: SHin Kiristtoosi attumaasa ubbaayyo huuphe gidiyoogaa , attumaasi maccaasassi huuphe gidiyoogaanne qassi Xoossai Kiristtoosassi huuphe gidiyoogaa intte erana mala koyais .

text: Every man praying or prophesying , having his head covered , dishonoureth his head .
text2: Xoossaa woossiiddi , woi hananabaa yootiiddi , ba huuphiyaa qachchiya attumaasai ubbai Kiristtoosa toochchees .

text: But every woman that prayeth or prophesieth with her head uncovered dishonoureth her head : for that is even all one as if she were shaven .
text2: Qassi Xoossaa woossaidda woi hananabaa yootaidda , ba huuphiyaa qachchenna maccaara ba azinaa toochchausu ; aissi giikko , a ba huuphiyaa meedettaichchidaariira issi mala .

text: For if the woman be not covered , let her also be shorn : but if it be a shame for a woman to be shorn or shaven , let her be covered .
text2: Maccaara ba huuphiyaa qachchana xayikko , qanxxissu . SHin iyyo i huuphiyaa qanxxissanaagee woi meedissanaagee pokkikko , ba huuphiyaa qachchu .

text: For a man indeed ought not to cover his head , forasmuch as he is the image and glory of God : but the woman is the glory of the man .
text2: Attumaasai Xoossaa leemisonne bonchcho gidiyo gishshau , ba huuphiyaa qachchanau bessenna ; shin maccaara attumaagaassi bonchcho .

text: For the man is not of the woman ; but the woman of the man .
text2: Aissi giikko , maccaara attumaagaappe merettaasuppe attin , attumaagee maccaarippe merettibeenna .

text: Neither was the man created for the woman ; but the woman for the man .
text2: Aissi giikko , maccaara attumaagaa gishshau merettaasuppe attin , attumaagee maccaari gishshau merettibeenna .

text: For this cause ought the woman to have power on her head because of the angels .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , maccaara ba azinaa alaafetettaappe garssaara de7iyoogaa erissiya malaatai kiitanchchatu gishshau , i huuphiyan de7anau bessees .

text: Nevertheless neither is the man without the woman , neither the woman without the man , in the Lord .
text2: SHin Godaa qofan maccaara attumaagee bainnan de7ukku ; attumaageekka maccaara bainnan de7enna .

text: For as the woman is of the man , even so is the man also by the woman ; but all things of god .
text2: Aissi giikko , maccaara attumaagaappe merettidoogaadan , hegaadan qassi attumaageekka maccaarippe yelettiis . Qassi ubbabaikka Xoossaappe yees .

text: Judge in yourselves : is it comely that a woman pray unto God uncovered ?
text2: Intte intte huuphen pirddite . Maccaara ba huuphiyaa qacennan Xoossaa woossanau bessii ?

text: Doth not even nature itself teach you , that , if a man have long hair , it is a shame unto him ?
text2: Attumaagee ba huuphiyaa dichchikko , ayyo pokko . SHin maccaara ba huuphiyaa dichchikko , iyyo bonchcho gidiyoogaa harai atto , meretaikkonne inttena tamaarissennee ? Aissi giikko , maccaari huuphee o kammanau iyyo imettiis .

text: But if any man seem to be contentious , we have no such custom , neither the churches of God .
text2: SHin ooninne ha yohuwan palamettana koyikko , nuussi gidin woikko Xoossaa woosa keettatussi gidinkka , hagaappe hara meezee baawa .

text: Now in this that I declare unto you I praise you not , that ye come together not for the better , but for the worse .
text2: SHin intte shiiqiyoogee iitabaassappe attin , lo77obaassa gidenna gishshau , taani ha azazuwaa immaidda inttena galatikke .

text: For first of all , when ye come together in the church , I hear that there be divisions among you ; and I partly believe it .
text2: Aissi giikko , ubbabaikka de7o . SHin intte woosa keettan shiiqiyo wode , intte giddon phalqqettai de7iyoogaa taani siyais . Qassi hegee issi baggaara tuma gidiyoogaa ammanais .

text: For there must be also heresies among you , that they which are approved may be made manifest among you .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte matan ammanettidaageeti beettana mala , intte giddonkka qassi shaahoi de7anau bessees .

text: When ye come together therefore into one place , this is not to eat the Lord ' s supper .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte issippe shiiqiyo wode , intte shiiqoi Godaa kahuwaa maanaassa gidenna .

text: For in eating every one taketh before other his own supper : and one is hungry , and another is drunken .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte qumaa miyo wode , ubbai huuphiyan huuphiyan baagaa baagaa miyo gishshau , issoi namisettees ; issoi qassi mattottees .

text: What ? have ye not houses to eat and to drink in ? or despise ye the church of God , and shame them that have not ? What shall I say to you ? shall I praise you in this ? I praise you not .
text2: Maanaunne uyanau intteyyo keetti baawee ? Woikko Xoossaa woosa keettaa kareetii ? Qassi aibinne bainnaageeta yeellayeetii ? Taani inttena woigoo ? Ha yohuwan taani inttena galatoo ? Galatikke .

text: For I have received of the Lord that which also I delivered unto you , That the Lord Jesus the same night in which he was betrayed took bread :
text2: Aissi giikko , taani qassi intteyyo immido timirttiyaa Godaappe ekkaas . Godai Yesuusi eti a aattidi immido qammi oittaa ekkidi ,

text: And when he had given thanks , he brake it , and said , Take , eat : this is my body , which is broken for you : this do in remembrance of me .
text2: Xoossaa galatiis ; oittaa menttidi , “ Heite . Miite . Hagee intteyyo meqqida ta ashuwaa . Hagan tana hassayite ” yaagiis .

text: After the same manner also he took the cup , when he had supped , saying , This cup is the new testament in my blood : this do ye , as oft as ye drink it , in remembrance of me .
text2: Hegaadankka , kahuwaa mi simmin , burccukkuwaa qassi ekkidi , “ Hagee burccukkoi ta suuttan maacettida ooratta maachchaa . Intte appe uyido wode ubban hegan tana hassayite ” yaagiis .

text: For as often as ye eat this bread , and drink this cup , ye do shew the Lord ' s death till he come .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte ha oittaa miido wode ubbaaninne ha burccukkuwaappe uyido wode ubban Godai yaana gakkanaassikka , a haiquwaa yooteeta .

text: Wherefore whosoever shall eat this bread , and drink this cup of the Lord , unworthily , shall be guilty of the body and blood of the Lord .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , bessenna ogiyan Godaa oittaa miyaagee , woikko Godaa burccukkuwaappe uyiyaagee ooninne a ashuwaanne a suuttaa acotees .

text: But let a man examine himself , and so let him eat of that bread , and drink of that cup .
text2: SHin asi ba huuphiyaa qoro . Yaatidi oittaa mo . Burccukkuwaappekka uyo .

text: For he that eateth and drinketh unworthily , eateth and drinketh damnation to himself , not discerning the Lord ' s body .
text2: Aissi giikko , Godaa ashuwaa shaakkidi erennan oittaa miyaageenne burccukkuwaappekka uyiyaagee ba huuphiyaassi pirddaa meesinne uyees .

text: For this cause many are weak and sickly among you , and many sleep .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte giddon daroti daafuranchchanne hargganchcha ; qassi intte giddoppe unddennidaageeti haiqqidosona .

text: For if we would judge ourselves , we should not be judged .
text2: SHin nuuni nu huuphiyaa tumu qoridaakko , Xoossai nuna pirddenna .

text: But when we are judged , we are chastened of the Lord , that we should not be condemned with the world .
text2: Nuuni pirddettiyo wode , ha sa7aara issippe pirddettenna mala , Godai nuna seerees .

text: Wherefore , my brethren , when ye come together to eat , tarry one for another .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ta ishatoo , Godaa qumaa maanau intte shiiqiyo wode , issoi issuwaa gatti ekkite .

text: And if any man hunger , let him eat at home ; that ye come not together unto condemnation . And the rest will I set in order when I come .
text2: Ooninne namisettidabaa gidikko , issippe shiiqiyo wode Xoossaa pirddan intte gelenna mala , ba sooni mo . Attidabaa taani yaa baada giigissana .

text: Now concerning spiritual gifts , brethren , I would not have you ignorant .
text2: Ta ishatoo , Geeshsha Ayyaanaa imuwaabaa intte eranau koyais .

text: Ye know that ye were Gentiles , carried away unto these dumb idols , even as ye were led .
text2: Intte Xoossaa ammanenna wode , ubba wode kaalliyoogaadankka , haasayenna eeqatukko intte biidoogaa ereeta .

text: Wherefore I give you to understand , that no man speaking by the Spirit of God calleth Jesus accursed : and that no man can say that Jesus is the Lord , but by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Xoossaa Ayyaanai kaalettiyo asi ooninne , “ Yesuusi qanggetto ” yaagidi haasayennaagaanne qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanai kaalettikkoppe attin , harai atto issi asinne , “ Yesuusi Goda ” gaanau danddayennaagaa taani inttena erissais .

text: Now there are diversities of gifts , but the same Spirit .
text2: Ayyaanaa imoi dumma dumma ; shin immiya Ayyaanai issuwaa .

text: And there are differences of administrations , but the same Lord .
text2: Qassi oottiyo oosoi dumma dumma ; shin Godai issuwaa .

text: And there are diversities of operations , but it is the same God which worketh all in all .
text2: Oosuwaa oottanau dumma dumma ogee de7ishin , he oottiyo oge ubbaa asa ubbau qonccissiya Xoossai issuwaa .

text: But the manifestation of the Spirit is given to every man to profit withal .
text2: SHin asa ubbaa maaddanau , Geeshsha Ayyaanaa qonccissiyo wolqqai ubbaayyo huuphiyan huuphiyan imettiis .

text: For to one is given by the Spirit the word of wisdom ; to another the word of knowledge by the same Spirit ;
text2: Aissi giikko , Geeshsha Ayyaanai issuwaassi aadhdhida eratettaa haasayaa immees ; qassi issuwaassi eratettaa haasayaa immees .

text: To another faith by the same Spirit ; to another the gifts of healing by the same Spirit ;
text2: He Geeshsha Ayyaanai issuwaassi ammanuwaa immidi , hinkkuwaassi hargganchchaa pattiyo wolqqaa immees .

text: To another the working of miracles ; to another prophecy ; to another discerning of spirits ; to another divers kinds of tongues ; to another the interpretation of tongues :
text2: Geeshsha Ayyaanai issuwaassi Xoossai oottiyo malaataa oottiyo wolqqaa immidi , issuwaassi hananabaa yootiyo wolqqaa immees . Issuwaassi ayyaanatu gidduwan de7iya dummatettaa eriyo wolqqaa immidi , issuwaassi dumma dumma qaalan haasayiyo wolqqaa immees . Qassi issuwaassi dumma dumma qaalan haasayidoogaa birshshiyo wolqqaa immees

text: But all these worketh that one and the selfsame Spirit , dividing to every man severally as he will .
text2: SHin ha ubbabaa oottiyaagee he issi Geeshsha Ayyaanaa . Asa ubbaassi i ba koyiyoogaadan , dumma dumma imuwaa shaakki shaakkidi immees .

text: For as the body is one , and hath many members , and all the members of that one body , being many , are one body : so also is Christ .
text2: Kiristtoosi daro qommoti de7iyo issi bolla mala . Bollai daro qommotuppe merettidabaa gidikkokka , issi bolla .

text: For by one Spirit are we all baptized into one body , whether we be Jews or Gentiles , whether we be bond or free ; and have been all made to drink into one Spirit .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni Aihuda asa gidikkonne woi Giriike asa gidikko , woi aille gidikkonne woi goqa gidikko , ubbai issi Geeshsha Ayyaanan issi bolla gidanau xammaqettida . Qassi nuuni ubbaikka issi Geeshsha Ayyaanaa uyida .

text: For the body is not one member , but many .
text2: Aissi giikko , bollaassi qommoi daro gidiyoogaappe attin , issuwaa gidenna .

text: If the foot shall say , Because I am not the hand , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Tohoi , “ Taani kushe gidenna gishshau , bollaa qommo gidikke ” giikko , i hegaa giyoogee bollaa qommo gidiyoogaa digganee ?

text: And if the ear shall say , Because I am not the eye , I am not of the body ; is it therefore not of the body ?
text2: Haittaikka , “ Taani aife gidenna gishshau , bollaa qommo gidikke ” giikko , i hegaa giyoogee bollaa qommo gidiyoogaa digganee ?

text: If the whole body were an eye , where were the hearing ? If the whole were hearing , where were the smelling ?
text2: Bolla ubbai aife xalaala gidiyaakko , waatidi siyanau danddayii ? Qassi bolla ubbai haitta xalaala gidiyaakko , waatidi singganau danddayii ?

text: But now hath God set the members every one of them in the body , as it hath pleased him .
text2: SHin Xoossai ba koyidoogaadan , bollaa qommota issuwaa issuwaa bollan wottiis .

text: And if they were all one member , where were the body ?
text2: Ubbai issi qommo gidiyaakko , bollai awan de7anee ?

text: But now are they many members , yet but one body .
text2: SHin qommoti daro gidikkokka , bollai issuwaa .

text: And the eye cannot say unto the hand , I have no need of thee : nor again the head to the feet , I have no need of you .
text2: Aifee kushiyaa , “ Neeni tana koshshakka ” gaanau danddayenna . Woikko qassi huuphee tohota , “ Intte tana koshshekketa ” gaanau danddayenna .

text: Nay , much more those members of the body , which seem to be more feeble , are necessary :
text2: SHin laafa milatiya bollaa qommoti daro koshshiyaageeta .

text: And those members of the body , which we think to be less honourable , upon these we bestow more abundant honour ; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness .
text2: Bollaa qommotuppe bonchchettennabaa nuussi milatiyaageeta nuuni daro bonchcheettees . Qassi nuna yeellayiya bollaa qommotakka keehi bonchcheettees .

text: For our comely parts have no need : but God hath tempered the body together , having given more abundant honour to that part which lacked :
text2: Nu bollaappe lo77iya baggaa bonchchoi koshshenna ; shin bonchchoi pacciyo bollaa qommotussi aadhdhiya bonchchuwaa immanau , Xoossai bollaa issippe gattiis .

text: That there should be no schism in the body ; but that the members should have the same care one for another .
text2: Bollaa qommoti issoi issuwaassi issi mala qofaa qoppanaappe attin , bollan dummatetti de7anau bessenna .

text: And whether one member suffer , all the members suffer with it ; or one member be honoured , all the members rejoice with it .
text2: Bollaa qommotuppe issoi seelettikko , bollaa qommoti ubbaikka aara seelettoosona ; bollaa qommotuppe issoi bonchchettikko , bollaa qommoti ubbai aarakka ufaittoosona .

text: Now ye are the body of Christ , and members in particular .
text2: Intte ubbai Kiristtoosa bolla ; qassi huuphiyan huuphiyan intte ubbaikka a bollaa qommota .

text: And God hath set some in the church , first apostles , secondarily prophets , thirdly teachers , after that miracles , then gifts of healings , helps , governments , diversities of tongues .
text2: Xoossai woosa keettan issi issi asata , koiruwan Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta , naa77anttuwan hananabaa yootiyaageeta , heezzanttuwan tamaarissiyaageeta , hegaappe guyyiyan , Xoossai oottiyo malaataa oottiyaageeta , hegaappe guyyiyan , pattiyo wolqqai de7iyoogeeta , maaddiyaageeta , woosa keettaa aissiyaageetanne dumma dumma qaalan haasayiyaageeta oottiis .

text: Are all apostles ? are all prophets ? are all teachers ? are all workers of miracles ?
text2: Ubbati Yesuusi kiittidoogeetee ? Ubbati hananabaa yootiyaageetee ? Ubbati tamaarissiyaageetee ? Ubbati Xoossai oottiyo malaataa oottiyoonaa ?

text: Have all the gifts of healing ? do all speak with tongues ? do all interpret ?
text2: Ubbaassi pattiyo wolqqai de7ii ? Ubbati dumma dumma qaalan haasayiyoonaa ? Qassi dumma dumma qaalan haasayidobaa ubbati birshshiyoonaa ?

text: But covet earnestly the best gifts : and yet shew I unto you a more excellent way .
text2: SHin ubbaappe aadhdhiya imuwaa minttidi koyite . Qassi ubbaappe keehi aadhdhiya ogiyaa taani inttena bessana .

text: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels , and have not charity , I am become as sounding brass , or a tinkling cymbal .
text2: Taani asa qaalaaninne kiitanchcha qaalan haasayikkokka taassi siiqoi xayikko , ta haasayai kilddi giya daala mala ; woikko chachachi giya shappo mala .

text: And though I have the gift of prophecy , and understand all mysteries , and all knowledge ; and though I have all faith , so that I could remove mountains , and have not charity , I am nothing .
text2: Hananabaa yootiyo imoi taassi de7iyaakkokka , taani geema yoho ubbaanne eratetta ubbaa eriyaakkokka , qassi deriyaa harasaa efiyo ammanoi taassi de7iyaakkokka , siiqoi xayikko , taani aibanne gidikke .

text: And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor , and though I give my body to be burned , and have not charity , it profiteth me nothing .
text2: Taassi de7iyaabaa ubbaa hiyyeesata mizanau immiyaakkokka harai atto , ta bollaa taman xuugganau aatta immiyaakkokka siiqoi xayikko , tana ainne go77enna .

text: Charity suffereth long , and is kind ; charity envieth not ; charity vaunteth not itself , is not puffed up ,
text2: Siiqoi danddayanchcha . Siiqoi kehees . Siiqoi qanaatenna . Ceeqettenna ; qassi otorettenna .

text: Doth not behave itself unseemly , seeketh not her own , is not easily provoked , thinketh no evil ;
text2: Siiqoi baassi bessennabaanne oottenna . Uuzettenna . Yiillotenna . Siiqoi naaqettidobaakka paidenna .

text: Rejoiceth not in iniquity , but rejoiceth in the truth ;
text2: Siiqoi tumatettan ufaittiyoogaappe attin , wordduwan ufaittenna .

text: Beareth all things , believeth all things , hopeth all things , endureth all things .
text2: Siiqoi ubbabaa danddayees . Ubbabaikka hanana giidi , ufaissan naagees . Ubbabaa genccees .

text: Charity never faileth : but whether there be prophecies , they shall fail ; whether there be tongues , they shall cease ; whether there be knowledge , it shall vanish away .
text2: Siiqoi mulekka xayenna . SHin hananabaa yootiyoogeekka xayana . Dumma dumma qaalan haasayiyoogeekka attana . Eratettaikka xayana .

text: For we know in part , and we prophesy in part .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni eratettaappe baggaa ereettees ; hananabaa yootiyoogaappekka baggaa yooteettees .

text: But when that which is perfect is come , then that which is in part shall be done away .
text2: SHin kumettai yiyo wode , baggai xayana .

text: When I was a child , I spake as a child , I understood as a child , I thought as a child : but when I became a man , I put away childish things .
text2: Taani naatettan de7iyo wode , na7adan haasayais . Na7adan qoppais . Qassi na7adankka akeekais . Wodalla gidido wode , naatetta hanuwaa xaissaas .

text: For now we see through a glass , darkly ; but then face to face : now I know in part ; but then shall I know even as also I am known .
text2: Nuuni ha77i be7iyoogee heregan be7iyo lem77i lem77iya mera mala ; shin he wode nuuni nu aifiyan qoncciyan be7ana . Ha77i taani eratettaappe baggaa erais ; shin Xoossai tana wurssidi eriyoogaadan , he wode taanikka wurssa erana .

text: And now abideth faith , hope , charity , these three ; but the greatest of these is charity .
text2: SHin hegaa gidikko , ammanoi , hanana giidi ufaissan naagiyoogeenne siiqoi , hageeti heezzai minnidi de7oosona . De7inkka hageetuppe aadhdhiyaagee siiquwaa .

text: Follow after charity , and desire spiritual gifts , but rather that ye may prophesy .
text2: Siiquwaa kaallite . Ayyaanaa imuwaakka minttidi koyite . SHin ubbaappe aattidi , hananabaa yootiyoogaakka koyite .

text: For he that speaketh in an unknown tongue speaketh not unto men , but unto God : for no man understandeth him ; howbeit in the spirit he speaketh mysteries .
text2: Aissi giikko , dumma dumma qaalan haasayiya urai Xoossaassi haasayeesippe attin , asassi haasayenna . Aissi giikko , i haasayiyoogaa ooninne akeekenna . SHin asassi qonccibeenna yohuwaa Ayyaanaa wolqqan haasayees .

text: But he that prophesieth speaketh unto men to edification , and exhortation , and comfort .
text2: SHin hananabaa yootiyaagee asa maaddanau , zoranaunne minttettanau asassi haasayees .

text: He that speaketh in an unknown tongue edifieth himself ; but he that prophesieth edifieth the church .
text2: Dumma dumma qaalan haasayiya urai bana maaddees . SHin hananabaa yootiyaagee woosa keettaa maaddees .

text: I would that ye all spake with tongues , but rather that ye prophesied : for greater is he that prophesieth than he that speaketh with tongues , except he interpret , that the church may receive edifying .
text2: Intte ubbai dumma dumma qaalan haasayanaagaa taani dosais . SHin hananabaa yootanaagaa hegaappe aattada dosais . Aissi giikko , dumma dumma qaalan haasayiyaagee he haasayidoogaa woosa keettaa maaddanau birshshiya asi xayikko , dumma dumma qaalan haasayiyaagaappe hananabaa yootiyaagee aadhdhees .

text: Now , brethren , if I come unto you speaking with tongues , what shall I profit you , except I shall speak to you either by revelation , or by knowledge , or by prophesying , or by doctrine ?
text2: SHin ta ishatoo , ha77i taani inttekko baada , dumma dumma qaalan haasayaidda , ajjuutan woi eratettan woi hananabaa yootiyoogan woi tamaarissiyoogan inttessi yootana xayikko , taani inttena ai go77iyaanaa ?

text: And even things without life giving sound , whether pipe or harp , except they give a distinction in the sounds , how shall it be known what is piped or harped ?
text2: Harai atto , shemppoi bainnabai pulaale gidin woikko diitta gidin giiriiddi , ba giirettaa dummatettaa erissana xayikko , pulaale punniyaakkonne , woi diitta diixxiyaakko , asi waatidi eranee ?

text: For if the trumpet give an uncertain sound , who shall prepare himself to the battle ?
text2: Qassi malkkataa waasoi geeyidi erettana xayikko , olaassi oonee giigettanai ?

text: So likewise ye , except ye utter by the tongue words easy to be understood , how shall it be known what is spoken ? for ye shall speak into the air .
text2: Hegaadankka , qassi dumma dumma qaalan intte haasayiyoogee qoncce gidennan xayikko , intte haasayiyoogaa asi waatidi akeekanee ? Aissi giikko , carkkuwaassi intte haasayeeta .

text: There are , it may be , so many kinds of voices in the world , and none of them is without signification .
text2: Ha sa7an daro qaalai de7ennan aggenna ; qassi birshshetti bainna qaali issoinne baawa .

text: Therefore if I know not the meaning of the voice , I shall be unto him that speaketh a barbarian , and he that speaketh shall be a barbarian unto me .
text2: SHin issi asi haasayiyo qaalaa taani erana xayikko , he haasayiyaagee taassi imatta gidees ; taanikka assi imatta gidais .

text: Even so ye , forasmuch as ye are zealous of spiritual gifts , seek that ye may excel to the edifying of the church .
text2: Hegaadankka , qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanaa imuwaa intte ekkanau minttidi koyiyaageeta gidiyo gishshau , woosa keettaa dichchanau maaddiyaabaa ubbabaappe aattidi koyite .

text: Wherefore let him that speaketh in an unknown tongue pray that he may interpret .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , dumma dumma qaalan haasayiyaagee ba haasayidobaa birshshanau danddayana mala , Xoossaa woosso .

text: For if I pray in an unknown tongue , my spirit prayeth , but my understanding is unfruitful .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani dumma dumma qaalan Xoossaa woossikko , ta ayyaanaikka woossees ; shin ta wozanaa qofai ainne go7ettenna .

text: What is it then ? I will pray with the spirit , and I will pray with the understanding also : I will sing with the spirit , and I will sing with the understanding also .
text2: Yaatin , taani waatoo ? Taani ta ayyaanan Xoossaa woossana ; qassi ta qofankka Xoossaa woossana . Ta ayyaanan yexxana ; qassi ta qofankka yexxana .

text: Else when thou shalt bless with the spirit , how shall he that occupieth the room of the unlearned say Amen at thy giving of thanks , seeing he understandeth not what thou sayest ?
text2: Hegaa gidana xayikko , neeni ne ayyaanaa xalaalan Xoossaa galatiyaabaa gidikko , he sohuwan neeni giyoogaa erenna asi neeni Xoossaa galatiyoogaa erennan , neeni galatidoogan woigidi , “ Amin77i ” gaanee ?

text: For thou verily givest thanks well , but the other is not edified .
text2: Neeni Xoossaa lo77o galataasa ; shin hegee hinkko bitaniyaa maaddenna .

text: I thank my God , I speak with tongues more than ye all :
text2: Taani dumma dumma qaalan intte ubbaappe aattada haasayiyo gishshau , Xoossaa galatais .

text: Yet in the church I had rather speak five words with my understanding , that by my voice I might teach others also , than ten thousand words in an unknown tongue .
text2: SHin taani woosa keettan harata tamaarissanau dumma dumma qaalan tammu sha7u qaalata haasayiyoogaappe ichchashu qaalata ta wozanaa qofan haasayanau dosais .

text: Brethren , be not children in understanding : howbeit in malice be ye children , but in understanding be men .
text2: Ta ishatoo , intte iita yohuwan yiira mala gidanaappe attin , qofan na7a mala gidoppite ; intte wozanaa qofan wozannaamata gidite .

text: In the law it is written , With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people ; and yet for all that will they not hear me , saith the Lord .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafan , “ Godai , ' Taani ha asaassi , dumma dumma qaalan haasayiya asaaninne imattatu doonaan haasayana . SHin hegaa gidikkokka , taani giyoobaa eti siyokkona ' yaagees ” geetettidi xaafettiis .

text: Wherefore tongues are for a sign , not to them that believe , but to them that believe not : but prophesying serveth not for them that believe not , but for them which believe .
text2: Simmi dumma dumma qaalan haasayiyoogee ammanennaageetussi malaata gidiyoogaappe attin , ammaniyaageetussi malaata gidenna . Qassi hananabaa yootiyoogee ammaniyaageetussi malaata gidiyoogaappe attin , ammanennaageetussi malaata gidenna .

text: If therefore the whole church be come together into one place , and all speak with tongues , and there come in those that are unlearned , or unbelievers , will they not say that ye are mad ?
text2: Hegaa gishshau , woosa keettaa asai ubbai issippe shiiqidi , qassi ubbaikka dumma dumma qaalan haasayikko , tamaaribeenna asai woi ammanenna asai gelidi , inttena ubbaa , “ Gooyeeta ” geenneeyye ?

text: But if all prophesy , and there come in one that believeth not , or one unlearned , he is convinced of all , he is judged of all :
text2: SHin tamaaribeenna asi woi ammanenna asi woosa keettaa geliyo wode , asai ubbai hananabaa yootikko , i ba siyoban ba nagaraa akeekana . Qassi he siyidobaa ubbankka i pirddettana .

text: And thus are the secrets of his heart made manifest ; and so falling down on his face he will worship God , and report that God is in you of a truth .
text2: A wozanaa geema qofaikka qonccana . Hegaadankka qassi , “ Xoossai tumu intte giddon de7ees ” yaagidi markkattiiddi , gufannidi Xoossaassi goinnana .

text: How is it then , brethren ? when ye come together , everyone of you hath a psalm , hath a doctrine , hath a tongue , hath a revelation , hath an interpretation . Let all things be done unto edifying .
text2: Simmi ta ishatoo , aibee ? Intte issippe shiiqiyo wode , huuphiyan huuphiyan , issuwaassi mazamuree de7ees ; issuwaassi tamaarissiyoogee de7ees ; issuwaassi ajjuutai de7ees ; qassi issuwaassi dumma dumma qaalan haasayiyoogee de7ees ; issuwaassi birshshiyoogee de7ees . Ubbaikka woosa keetta maaddiyaabaa gidanau bessees .

text: If any man speak in an unknown tongue , let it be by two , or at the most by three , and that by course ; and let one interpret .
text2: Ooninne dumma dumma qaalan haasayikko , naa77u gididi , woi darikko heezzu gididi , kayan kayan haasayanau bessees . Qassi hara issoi eti haasayidoogaa birshsho .

text: But if there be no interpreter , let him keep silence in the church ; and let him speak to himself , and to God .
text2: SHin birshshiya asi xayikko , dumma dumma qaalan haasayiyaagee woosa keettan sirphphi go . Ba huuphessinne Xoossaassi haasayo .

text: Let the prophets speak two or three , and let the other judge .
text2: Hananabaa yootiyaageetikka naa77u gididi woi heezzu gididi haasayona . Qassi harati eti giyoobaa pirddona .

text: If any thing be revealed to another that sitteth by , let the first hold his peace .
text2: SHin Xoossai he sohuwan uttida haraassi issibaa qonccissikko , kase haasayiyaagee sirphphi go .

text: For ye may all prophesy one by one , that all may learn , and all may be comforted .
text2: Aissi giikko , ubbai tamaarana malanne ubbai minnana mala , kayan kayan hananabaa yootanau danddayeeta .

text: And the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets .
text2: Hananabaa yootiyaageetu imoi hananabaa yootiyaageetussi azazettees .

text: For God is not the author of confusion , but of peace , as in all churches of the saints .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai sarotettaa Xoossaappe attin , wocamaa Xoossaa gidenna . Geeshshatu woosa keetta ubbatuugaadan ,

text: Let your women keep silence in the churches : for it is not permitted unto them to speak ; but they are commanded to be under obedience , as also saith the law .
text2: maccaasai woosa keettan sirphphi go . Aissi giikko , Aihudatu higgee giyoogaadankka eti haarettanaappe attin , woosa keettan haasayanau etau maati baawa .

text: And if they will learn any thing , let them ask their husbands at home : for it is a shame for women to speak in the church .
text2: Maccaasai woosa keettan haasayiyoogee pokko gidiyo gishshau , aibakko eranau koyikkonne sooni bantta azinata oichchona .

text: What ? came the word of God out from you ? or came it unto you only ?
text2: Xoossaa qaalaa koiro intte ehiidetii ? Woikko intte xalaalaakko yiidee ?

text: If any man think himself to be a prophet , or spiritual , let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord .
text2: Ooninne bana hananabaa yootiyaagaa woi Ayyaanai de7iyo asa yaagidi qoppikko , taani intteyyo xaafiyoogee Godaa azazuwaa gidiyoogaa akeeko .

text: But if any man be ignorant , let him be ignorant .
text2: SHin ooninne akeekana xayikko , akeekoppo , aggi bayo .

text: Wherefore , brethren , covet to prophesy , and forbid not to speak with tongues .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ta ishatoo , hananabaa yootanau minttidi amottite . Qassi dumma dumma qaalan haasayiyoogaakka diggoppite .

text: Let all things be done decently and in order .
text2: SHin ubbabaikka wogaaninne maaran hano .

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: Ta ishatoo , taani intteyyo yootido wonggeliyaa intte ekkidoogaanne qassi intte ammanoi aani eqqidoogaa inttena hassayissais .

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: Intte ammanoi hada gidana xayikko , qassi taani intteyyo yootido qaalaa mintti oiqqikko , intte he wonggeliyan attideta .

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: Aissi giikko , taani qassi ekkidoogaa ubbabaappe aadhdhidi koshshiyaagaa kasetada inttessi immaas . Hegee aibee giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai giyoogaadan , Kiristtoosi nu nagaraa gishshau haiqqiis .

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: Haiqqidi moogettiis . Xoossaa maxaafai giyoogaadankka , heezzantto gallassi haiquwaappe denddiis .

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: Denddidi , PHeexiroosassi qoncciis . Hegaappe guyyiyan , ba kiittido tammanne naa77atussi qoncciis .

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , ichchashu xeetaappe dariya ishatussi issitoo qoncciis . Etappe dariya baggai hanno gakkanaassikka paxa de7ees ; shin amaridaageeti haiqqidosona .

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Yaaqoobassi qoncciis ; guyyeppe ba kiittido ubbatussi qoncciis .

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: Qassi ubbaappe wurssettan , wodee gakkennan yelettida taassikka qoncciis .

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: Aissi giikko , Yesuusi kiittido ubbaappe taani laafa ; taani Xoossaa woosa keettaa waissido gishshau , Yesuusi kiittidoogaa geetettada xeesettanaukka bessikke .

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: SHin Xoossaa aaro kehatettan taani tanakka . Qassi taassi i immido aaro kehatettai hada gidibeenna ; shin taani eta ubbaappe aattada oottaas . SHin tanaara de7iya Xoossaa aaro kehatettai oottiisippe attin , tana gidikke .

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: Simmi tana gidikkokka , woikko eta gidikkokka , nuuni ubbai yootiyoogee hagaa ; inttekka hagaa ammanideta .

text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead , how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
text2: Kiristtoosi haiquwaappe denddidoogaa yootiyoobaa gidikko , intteppe issi issi asati yaatin woigidi , “ Haiqqidabai haiquwaappe denddenna ” yaagiyoonaa ?

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: Haiqqida urai haiquwaappe denddibeennabaa gidikko , yaatin hekko Kiristtoosikka haiquwaappe denddibeenna giyoogaa .

text: And if Christ be not risen , then is our preaching vain , and your faith is also vain .
text2: Kiristtoosi haiquwaappe denddibeennabaa gidikko , yaatin nuuni yootiyoogeekka mela ; qassi intte ammanoikka mela .

text: Yea , and we are found false witnesses of God ; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ : whom he raised not up , if so be that the dead rise not .
text2: Qassi nuuni , “ Kiristtoosa haiquwaappe denttiis ” yaagidi Xoossaa bolli markkattido gishshau , a worddo markkata gididi beettida . SHin haiqqidaageeta haiquwaappe i denttibeennabaa gidikko , Kiristtoosakka denttibeenna .

text: For if the dead rise not , then is not Christ raised :
text2: Aissi giikko , haiqqidaageeti haiquwaappe denddennabaa gidikko , simmi Kiristtoosikka denddibeenna .

text: And if Christ be not raised , your faith is vain ; ye are yet in your sins .
text2: Kiristtoosi haiquwaappe denddibeennabaa gidikko , intte ammanoikka mela ; qassi intte hanno gakkanaassikka nagaraara de7eeta .

text: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished .
text2: Simmi Kiristtoosa ammanidi haiqqidaageetikka qassi xayidosona giyoogaa .

text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ , we are of all men most miserable .
text2: Nuuni ha de7uwaa xalaalaassi Kiristtoosa yainnidabaa gidikko , ha sa7an de7iya asa ubbaappekka nubai pala .

text: But now is Christ risen from the dead , and become the firstfruits of them that slept .
text2: SHin Kiristtoosi haiqqidaageetu dendduwaassi baira gididi , haiquwaappe denddidoogee tuma .

text: For since by man came death , by man came also the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Aissi giikko , haiqoi issi asa baggaara ha sa7aa yiidoogaadan , haiqqidaageetu denddoikka qassi issi asa baggaara yiis .

text: For as in Adam all die , even so in Christ shall all be made alive .
text2: Aissi giikko , asai ubbai Addaameera dabbotido gishshau haiqqidoogaadan , Kiristtoosaara dabbotido gishshau , ubbai de7uwaassi denddana .

text: But every man in his own order : Christ the firstfruits ; afterward they that are Christ ' s at his coming .
text2: SHin ubbaikka ba kayan kayan denddana . Kiristtoosi ubbaappe kasetidi denddiis ; hegaappe guyyiyan , Kiristtoosaageeti Kiristtoosi yiyo wode denddana .

text: Then cometh the end , when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God , even the Father ; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Kiristtoosi halaqatetta ubbaa , godatetta ubbaanne wolqqaanne xaissidi , Xoossaassi ba Aawaassi kawotettaa immiyo wode , wodiyaa wurssettai yaana .

text: For he must reign , till he hath put all enemies under his feet .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai a morkketa ubbaa a tohuwaappe garssaara wottana gakkanaassi , Kiristtoosi haaranau bessees .

text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death .
text2: Ubbaappe wurssettan xayana morkkee haiquwaa .

text: For he hath put all things under his feet . But when he saith , all things are put under him , it is manifest that he is excepted , which did put all things under him .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Xoossai ubbabaa a tohuwaappe garssaara wottidi haarissiis ” yaagees . SHin ubbabaa a tohuwaappe garssaara wottidi haarissiis giyo wode , ubbabaa haarissida Xoossaappe attin , hinkko ubbai haarettiis giyoogee qoncce .

text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him , then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him , that God may be all in all .
text2: SHin ubbabai Kiristtoosassi haarettidoogaappe guyyiyan , Kiristtoosi qassi ba huuphen ubbabaa bana haarissida Xoossaassi haarettana . Xoossai qassi ubbabaa wurssidi haarana .

text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead , if the dead rise not at all ? why are they then baptized for the dead ?
text2: Hegaa gidana xayikko , haiqqidaageetussi xammaqettiyaageeti ai oottiyoonaa ? Haiqqidaageeti mulekka denddennabaa gidikko , asai haiqqidaageetussi aissi xammaqettii ?

text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?
text2: Yaatin , nuuni ubba wode aissi hassayenna metuwan geliyoonii ?

text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord , I die daily .
text2: Ta ishatoo , taani nu Godaa Kiristtoosi Yesuusan taassi de7iya intte ceequwan ceeqqaidda , wonttin wonttin haiqqais .

text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus , what advantageth it me , if the dead rise not ? let us eat and drink ; for to morrow we die .
text2: Taani Efisoonan asadan do7aara baaxetidoogee tana ai go77anee ? SHin haiqqidaageeti haiquwaappe denddibeennabaa gidikko , “ Simmi moosinne uyoos ; aissi giikko , nuuni wontto haiqqana ” yaagiyoogaa mala .

text: Be not deceived : evil communications corrupt good manners .
text2: Cimettoppite ; iita laggetettai lo77o hanotettaa moorees .

text: Awake to righteousness , and sin not ; for some have not the knowledge of God : I speak this to your shame .
text2: Xillotettaakko simmite . Nagara oottoppite . Intteppe issi issi asai Xoossaa erenna ; taani hagaa inttena yeellayanau gais .

text: But some man will say , How are the dead raised up ? and with what body do they come ?
text2: SHin issi asi , “ Haiqqida asai waanidi denddanee ? Eti ai mala bollaara yaanee ? ” yaagennan aggenna .

text: Thou fool , that which thou sowest is not quickened , except it die :
text2: Nenoo eeyyau , neeni biittan zeriyo zerettai wooqqennan mokkenna .

text: And that which thou sowest , thou sowest not that body that shall be , but bare grain , it may chance of wheat , or of some other grain :
text2: Neeni zeriyoogee gistte gidin woi hara qommo katta gidin , aife xalaalappe attin , mokkidi kiyiya bollaa gidenna .

text: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him , and to every seed his own body .
text2: SHin Xoossai zerettaassi ba dosido bollaa immees ; qassi zeretta ubbaassikka huuphiyan huuphiyan eta bollaa immees .

text: All flesh is not the same flesh : but there is one kind of flesh of men , another flesh of beasts , another of fishes , and another of birds .
text2: Mereta ubbaa ashoi issuwaa gidenna . SHin asa ashoi issuwaa ; mehiyaa ashoi dumma ; kafotu ashoikka dumma ; qassi moliyaa ashoikka dumma .

text: There are also celestial bodies , and bodies terrestrial : but the glory of the celestial is one , and the glory of the terrestrial is another .
text2: Qassi saluwaa bollatinne sa7aa bollati de7oosona . SHin saluwaa bollaa bonchchoi dumma ; qassi sa7aa bollaa bonchchoi dumma .

text: There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars : for one star differeth from another star in glory .
text2: Awa aifiyaassi a huuphe bonchchoi de7ees . Aginaassikka a huuphe bonchchoi de7ees . Qassi xoolinttetussikka dumma bonchchoi de7ees ; aissi giikko , issi xoolinttee hinkko xoolinttiyaappe bonchchuwan dummatees .

text: So also is the resurrection of the dead . It is sown in corruption ; it is raised in incorruption :
text2: Qassi haiqqidaageeti haiquwaappe denddiyo wode hegaadan hanana ; haiqqiya bollai moogettidi , haiqqenna bolla gididi denddana .

text: It is sown in dishonour ; it is raised in glory : it is sown in weakness ; it is raised in power :
text2: Bollai tooshiyan moogettidi , bonchchuwan denddana . Qassi daafuran moogettidi , wolqqan denddana .

text: It is sown a natural body ; it is raised a spiritual body . There is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
text2: Mereta bollai moogettidi , ayyaana bollaa gididi denddana . Mereta bollai de7ikko , qassi ayyaanaa bollaikka de7ees .

text: And so it is written , The first man Adam was made a living soul ; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit .
text2: Hegaadankka , qassi Xoossaa maxaafan , “ Koiro bitanee , Addaamee , paxa de7iya asa gidi merettiis ” yaagees . SHin wurssetta Addaamee de7uwaa immiya ayyaana gidiis .

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: SHin mereta asi koiro yin , geedoppe ayyaana asi yiisippe attin , ayyaanaagee koiro yibeenna .

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: Koiro Addaamee biittaappe merettiis ; i biittaappe merettidaagaa . Naa77antto Addaamee saluwaappe yiis .

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: Biittaageeti biittaappe merettidaagaa mala . Qassi saluwaageeti saluwaappe yiidaagaa mala .

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .
text2: Nuuni biittaappe merettidaagaa meraa maayidoogaadan , saluwaappe yiidaagaa meraakka qassi maayana .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .
text2: Ta ishatoo , taani giyoogee hagaa ; ashoinne suutti Xoossaa kawotettaa laattana danddayenna . Qassi musiyaagee musennaagaa laattenna .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
text2: Siyite ! Taani intteyyo issibaa xuurana . Nuuni ubbai haiqqokko . SHin wurssetta malkkatai punettiyo wode , liphida aifee xeellanaassi hassayennan laamettana . Aissi giikko , malkkatai punettiyo wode , haiqqida asai musenna asa gididi denddana ; nuunikka laamettana .

text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption , and this mortal must put on immortality .
text2: Aissi giikko , hagee musiyaagee musennaagaa maayanau bessees ; qassi hagee haiqqiyaageekka haiqqennaagaa maayanau bessees .

text: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption , and this mortal shall have put on immortality , then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written , Death is swallowed up in victory .
text2: SHin hagee musiyaagee musennaagaa maayiyo wode , qassi hagee haiqqiyaagee haiqqennaagaa maayiyo wode , he wode , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Haiqoi xoonettidi mitettiis .

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?
text2: Haiquwau , ne yiishshai awaanee ? Haiquwau , ne xoonoi awaanee ? ” giido qaalai polettana .

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: Haiqoi dukkiyo wolqqaa nagaraappe demmees ; qassi nagarai wolqqaa higgiyaappe demmees .

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: SHin nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara nuna xoonissiya Xoossaa galatai gakko .

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
text2: Taani siiqiyo ta ishatoo , hegaa gishshau , qaaxxennan minnidi eqqite . Intte daafurai Godaa baggaara mela gidennaagaa eridi , ubba wode Godaa oosuwaa azallennan oottite .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Geeshshatussi miishshaa shiishshanau Galaatiyaa woosa keettatussi taani maacidoogaadan , inttekka qassi hegaadan oottite .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: Intte taani yaa biyo wode , miishshaa shiishshenna mala , intte ubbai Woggaa gallassi gallassi , intte demmiyo keenaappe intte keettan dagayite .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: Taani yaa gakkiyo wode , intte ammaniyo asa oona gidikkonne , intte immidoogaa gattana mala , dabddaabbiyaara eta Yerusalaame kiittana .

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: Qassi taani etaara baanau koshshikko , eti tanaara issippe baana .

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Taani Maqidooniyaara aadhdhaidda , inttekko baana ; aissi giikko , taani Maqidooniyaara aadhdhais .

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: Taani biyoosaa awa gidikkonne , ta buussan intte tana maaddana mala , intte matan amarida wodiyaa gam77ennan aggikke . Woikko balgguwaakka intte matan shaaccennan waayada aggana .

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani ha77i yaara aadhdhaidda oge tohuwaara inttena be7anau koyikke . Godai giikko , intte matan amarida wodiyaa takkanau qoppais .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: SHin taani PHenxxaqosxxe giyo gallassai gakkanaassi Efisoonan gam77ana .

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: Taassi oosoi kumido aaho penggee yaani dooyettiis . Qassi taassi daro morkketi de7oosona .

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: Ximootiyoosi inttekko yiikko , intte matan i yayyennan de7anaadan , a loitti wottite . Aissi giikko , ikka qassi Godaa oosuwaa oottees .

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ooninne a karoppo . SHin i taakko saro simmana mala , a maaddidi sarotettan moissite . Aissi giikko , taani i ishanttuura simmanaagaa naaga uttaas .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: SHin nu ishaa Aphiloosi hinkko ishanttuura inttekko baana mala , taani a mintta woossaas . SHin ha77i inttekko baanau koyibeenna ; i baayyo injjetiyo wode inttekko baana .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: Tishshi giite . Ammanuwan minnite . Xalite . Minnite .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: Ooso ubbaa siiquwan oottite .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: Ta ishatoo , Isxxifaanoosinne a so asai Giriiken koiro ammanidaageeta gidiyoogaanne geeshshatussi oottanau banttana immidoogaa intte ereeta . Inttekka eta mala asaassinne , etaara oottiya ubbaassi daafuriya ubbaassi haarettanaadan , taani inttena woossais .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: Isxxifaanoosi , Parddonaaxisinne Akaiqoosi intte bainnasan tana boorasiyaa teqqido gishshau , eta yuussaa taani ufaittais .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Eti inttena ayyaanan minttettidoogaadan , tanakka ayyaanan minttettido gishshau , hegeeta mala asata dogoppite .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: Isiyaa woosa keettaa asai inttena , “ Saro saro ” goosona . Aqiilinne PHirisqqila bantta soo shiiqiya woosa keettaa asaarakka intteyyo Godaa sarotaa wozanappe kiittoosona .

text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Ishantti ubbai inttessi sarotaa kiittoosona . Issoi issuwaa geeshsha yerettaa yerettidi sarotite .

text: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand .
text2: Taani PHauloosi ha sarotaa ta kushiyan xaafaas .

text: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ , let him be Anathema Maranatha .
text2: Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa siiqenna asi de7ikko , i qanggettidaagaa gido . Nu Godau , haaya .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
text2: Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aaro kehatettai inttenaara gido .

text: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7iya inttenaara ubbaara ta siiqoi gido . Amin77i .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timothy our brother , unto the church of God which is at Corinth , with all the saints which are in all Achaia :
text2: Taani PHauloosi , Xoossai kiitta gin , Kiristtoos Yesuusi kiittidoogeenne nu ishai Ximootiyoosi Xoossaayyo goinniya Qoronttoosa kataman de7iya woosa keettaayyoonne Giriike biitta ubban de7iya geeshshatuyyo ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafoos .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Xoossaa nu Aawaappenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe , aaro kehatettainne sarotettai intteyyo gido .

text: Blessed be God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies , and the God of all comfort ;
text2: Xoossaa nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Aawaa , maarotettaa Aawaanne minttetto ubbaa Xoossaa galatai gakko ;

text: Who comforteth us in all our tribulation , that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble , by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God .
text2: Xoossai nuna nu huuphen minttettido minttettuwaadan , daro waayiyaa waayettiyaageeta nuunikka minttettanaadan , nu waaye ubban i nuna minttettees .

text: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us , so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni Kiristtoosa baggaara daro waayiyaa waayettiyoogaadan , hegaadankka , qassi nuuni a baggaara daro minttettuwan minetteettees .

text: And whether we be afflicted , it is for your consolation and salvation , which is effectual in the enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer : or whether we be comforted , it is for your consolation and salvation .
text2: Nuuni waayettikko , hegee inttena minttettanaassanne inttena ashshanaassa ; qassi nuuni minettikko , nuuni danddayido waayiyaa malaa inttekka genccidi danddayana mala , Xoossai intteyyookka qassi minttettuwaanne danddayaa immanaassa .

text: And our hope of you is stedfast , knowing , that as ye are partakers of the sufferings , so shall ye be also of the consolation .
text2: Intte demmana giidi , ufaissan naagi uttidoogee daro mino ; aissi giikko , intte nunaara waayettidoogaadan , hegaadan minttettuwaakka nunaara ekkanaagaa nuuni eroos .

text: For we would not , brethren , have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia , that we were pressed out of measure , above strength , insomuch that we despaired even of life :
text2: Nu ishatoo , nuuni Isiyaa biittan waayettido waayiyaa inttena hassayissanau koyoos ; nu waayee nu wolqqaappe darin , nuna worees giidi , nuuni hirggana gakkanaassi , nuna wogi bainnaagaa deexxiis .

text: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves , that we should not trust in ourselves , but in God which raiseth the dead :
text2: Nuuni nu bolli haiquwaa pirddai pirddettiis yaagidi qoppida ; shin hegee hanidoogee haiqqida asaa haiquwaappe denttiya Xoossan nuuni ammanettanaappe attin , nu huuphen ammanettennan agganaassa .

text: Who delivered us from so great a death , and doth deliver : in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us ;
text2: Xoossai hagaa mala iita haiquwaappe nuna ashshiis ; i nuna ashshana ; sinttappekka i nuna ashshana giidi , ufaissan naagi uttida .

text: Ye also helping together by prayer for us , that for the gift bestowed upon us by the means of many persons thanks may be given by many on our behalf .
text2: Intte woossido daro woosan nuuyyo anjjoi simmido gishshau , daro asai nu gishshaa Xoossaa galatana mala , inttekka qassi nuna woosan maaddana koshshees .

text: For our rejoicing is this , the testimony of our conscience , that in simplicity and godly sincerity , not with fleshly wisdom , but by the grace of God , we have had our conversation in the world , and more abundantly to you - ward .
text2: Nuuni ceeqettiyoogee hagaa ; ha sa7an nuuni de7iyo de7oi , ubba qassi inttenaara nuuyyo de7iya issippetettai Xoossaa aaro kehatettaanappe attin , asa aadhdhida eratettaana gidennaagaa , qassi Xoossai immido geeshshatettaaninne suuretettan nuuni de7iyoogaa nuna zoriya wozanai nuuyyo markkattees .

text: For we write none other things unto you , than what ye read or acknowledge ; and I trust ye shall acknowledge even to the end ;
text2: Aissi giikko , intte nabbabanaunne akeekanau danddayiyoogaa xalaalaa intteyyo xaafiyoogaappe attin , nuuni harabaa intteyyo xaafokko . Nu Godaa Yesuusa gallassi nuuni inttenan ceeqettanaagaadan , inttekka nunan ceeqettana mala , intte ha77i wurssi akeekenna yohuwaa digin wurssi akeekana gaada qoppais .

text: And in this confidence I was minded to come unto you before , that ye might have a second benefit ;
text2: Hegaa taani loitta erido gishshau , intte naa77utoo go7ettana mala , ubbaappe kasetada inttekko baanau qofaa qachchaas .

text: And to pass by you into Macedonia , and to come again out of Macedonia unto you , and of you to be brought on my way toward Judaea .
text2: Taani Maqidooniyaa baidda inttenaara gaittanaagaanne qassi yaappe simmaidda intte mataara Yihudaa aadhdhishin , intte tana maaddanaagaa qoppa uttaas .

text: When I therefore was thus minded , did I use lightness ? or the things that I purpose , do I purpose according to the flesh , that with me there should be yea yea , and nay nay ?
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani hegaa qoppaidda tanan ammanettabeikkinaa ? Taani ta qofaa qachchiyo wode , sa7aa asadan issi kuttan , “ Ee , ee ” woi , “ CHii , chii ” gaanau giiga uttidanaa ?

text: But as God is true , our word toward you was not yea and nay .
text2: SHin Xoossai ammanettidaagaa gidiyoogee tuma gidiyoogaadan , nuuni intteyyo yootiyo qaalai “ Ee ” nne “ CHii ” nne giyoogaa gidenna .

text: For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , who was preached among you by us , even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus , was not yea and nay , but in him was yea .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani , Sillaasinne Ximootiyoosi Intte giddon yootido Xoossaa Na7ai , Yesuus Kiristtoosi “ Ee ” nne “ CHii ” nne giyoogaa gidenna . SHin Xoossaa baggaara i ubba wodekka “ Ee ” .

text: For all the promises of God in him are yea , and in him Amen , unto the glory of God by us .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai immana giidobau ubbau eeno giidoogee Kiristtoosa baggaara polettana ; hegaa gishshau , nuuni Kiristtoosa baggaara Xoossaa bonchchuwau , amin77i goos .

text: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ , and hath anointed us , is God ;
text2: Xoossai Kiristtoosa baggaara nunanne inttena minttetteesinne tiyees .

text: Who hath also sealed us , and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts .
text2: Nuuni abaa gidiyoogaa erissiya maatafaa i nu bolli wottidi , ba Geeshsha Ayyaanaa waasedan , nu wozana giddon wottiis .

text: Moreover I call God for a record upon my soul , that to spare you I came not as yet unto Corinth .
text2: Qassi taani Qoronttoosa beennan aggidoogee inttena qohennan agganaassa ; hegau taani shemppuwaara de7anau Xoossai taayyo markka .

text: Not for that we have dominion over your faith , but are helpers of your joy : for by faith ye stand .
text2: Nuuni inttena ufaissanau inttenaara issippe oottiyaageeta gidiyoogaappe attin , intte ammaniyooban inttena godatanau koyiyaageeta gidokko ; aissi giikko , intte intte ammanuwan minnidi de7eeta .

text: But I determined this with myself , that I would not come again to you in heaviness .
text2: Taani naa77anttuwaa inttena azzanissenna mala , inttekko beennan agganaadan , ta qofaa qachchaas .

text: For if I make you sorry , who is he then that maketh me glad , but the same which is made sorry by me ?
text2: Aissi giikko , taani inttena azzanissiyaabaa gidikko , ha taani azzanissido intte tana ufaissanaagaappe attin , oonee tana ufaissanai ?

text: And I wrote this same unto you , lest , when I came , I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice ; having confidence in you all , that my joy is the joy of you all .
text2: Taani intteyyo he dabddaabbiyaa xaafidoogee , tana ufaissanau bessiya asatun taani azzananau inttekko baanau koyabeennaagaassa ; taani ufaittiyo wode , intte ubbaikka qassi ufaittanaagaa inttenan ubban ammanettais .

text: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears ; not that ye should be grieved , but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani intteyyo daro waayiyaaninne tuggan qassi daro afuttaara xaafidoogee , inttena azzanissanaassa gidenna ; shin taani inttena ubbata ai keenaa siiqiyaakkonne intte eranaassa .

text: But if any have caused grief , he hath not grieved me , but in part : that I may not overcharge you all .
text2: SHin issi urai asa azzanissidobaa gidikko , taani a yohuwaa darissanau koyikke ; i inttena ubbata azzanissidoogaappe attin , tana azzanissibeenna .

text: Sufficient to such a man is this punishment , which was inflicted of many .
text2: Intteppe dariya bagga asai he bitaniyaa mala asa hegaadan qaxxayikko , he qixaatee ayyo gidana .

text: So that contrariwise ye ought rather to forgive him , and comfort him , lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , he bitanee keehi daro azzanenna mala , intte ayyo atto gaanaunne a minttettanau bessees .

text: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte a minttidi siiqiyoogaa i erana mala , taani inttena woossais .

text: For to this end also did I write , that I might know the proof of you , whether ye be obedient in all things .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte tau azazettanau ubba wode giigi uttidaakkonne qassi paaciyaa intte danddayiyaakko eranau , he dabddaabbiyaa intteyyo xaafaas .

text: To whom ye forgive any thing , I forgive also : for if I forgave any thing , to whom I forgave it , for your sakes forgave I it in the person of Christ ;
text2: Issi urai naaqqidoogaa intte atto giyo wode , taanikka qassi atto gais ; taani atto giidobaa gidikko , atto giidobaa aibanne Kiristtoosa sinttan intte gishshau , atto gaas .

text: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us : for we are not ignorant of his devices .
text2: Seexaanai nuukko yiidi , nuna cimmenna mala , taani atto gaas ; aissi giikko , nuuni a qofaa ereettees .

text: Furthermore , when I came to Troas to preach Christ ' s gospel , and a door was opened unto me of the Lord ,
text2: Taani Kiristtoosa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootanau Xiro7aada biido wode , Godai yaani tau dooyi wottiis .

text: I had no rest in my spirit , because I found not Titus my brother : but taking my leave of them , I went from thence into Macedonia .
text2: Taani ta ishaa Tiita yaani demmabeenna gishshau , taayyo sheefai gagettiis . Hegaa gishshau , yaani de7iya asaa , “ Saro de7ite ” gaada Maqidooniyaa baas .

text: Now thanks be unto God , which always causeth us to triumph in Christ , and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place .
text2: SHin Kiristtoosa baggaara ubba wode nuna xoonuwau kaalettiya Xoossaa , Qassi Kiristtoosa timirttiyaa nu baggaara shittodan , ubbasaa gattiyaagaa galatai gakko .

text: For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ , in them that are saved , and in them that perish :
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni attiya asa giddooninne xayiya asa giddon Kiristtoosi Xoossaayyo yarshshiyo sawuwaa tonggu giya shitto mala .

text: To the one we are the savour of death unto death ; and to the other the savour of life unto life . And who is sufficient for these things ?
text2: Hegee xayiyaageetuyyo woriya zeeqo ; qassi attiyaageetuyyo de7uwaa ehiya shitto ; yaatin , hegaa oottanau danddayiyai oonee ?

text: For we are not as many , which corrupt the word of God : but as of sincerity , but as of God , in the sight of God speak we in Christ .
text2: Nuuni Xoossaa qaalaa hiraisobaadan , walakkidi zal77iya hara daro asatu mala gidokko ; shin Xoossai nuna kiittin , ammanettidi Xoossaa sinttan Kiristtoosa baggaara qaalaa yootoos .

text: Do we begin again to commend ourselves ? or need we , as some others , epistles of commendation to you , or letters of commendation from you ?
text2: Nuuni zaarettidi , nu huuphiyaa sabbanau doommidoniiyye ? Woi hara asatuugaadan , saba dabddaabbiyaa intteyyo yeddanau woi intteppe ekkanau koyiyoonii ?

text: Ye are our epistle written in our hearts , known and read of all men :
text2: Intte intte huuphen asai ubbai eranaadaaninne nabbabanaadan , nu wozanan xaafetti uttida nu dabddaabbe .

text: Forasmuch as ye are manifestly declared to be the epistle of Christ ministered by us , written not with ink , but with the Spirit of the living God ; not in tables of stone , but in fleshy tables of the heart .
text2: Ha dabddaabbiyaa Kiristtoosi ba huuphen xaafidi , nu bolli kiittidoogee tuma ; ha dabddaabbee de7o Xoossaa Geeshsha Ayyaanan asa wozanan xaafettidoogaappe attin , shuchcha bolli qalamen xaafettibeenna .

text: And such trust have we through Christ to God - ward :
text2: Nuuyyo Kiristtoosa baggaara Xoossan hagaa mala ammanoi de7ees .

text: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves ; but our sufficiency is of God ;
text2: Nu danddayai Xoossaappe yiyoogaappe attin , ha oosuwaa nuuni nu huuphen oottanau danddayoos giyoobi nuuyyo aibinne baawa .

text: Who also hath made us able ministers of the new testament ; not of the letter , but of the spirit : for the letter killeth , but the spirit giveth life .
text2: Nuuni Ooratta Maachchaayyo oottana mala , Xoossai nuna danddayissiis ; he Ooratta Maachchai Geeshsha Ayyaanaagaa gidiyoogaappe attin , xaafettida higgiyaagaa gidenna . Xaafettida higgee haiquwaa ehees ; shin Geeshsha Ayyaanai de7uwaa ehees .

text: But if the ministration of death , written and engraven in stones , was glorious , so that the children of Israel could not stedfastly behold the face of Moses for the glory of his countenance ; which glory was to be done away :
text2: SHuchchaa woocidi xaafido higgee imettiyo wode , Xoossaa bonchchoi beettiis ; Muuse som77uwan de7iya phoolettai xayiyaabaa gidikkokka , he phoolettai daro wolqqaama gidiyo gishshau , Israa7eela asai a som77uwaa tishshi ootti xeellanau danddayibeenna . Haiquwaa ehiya higgee oottiyo oosoi hagaa mala bonchchuwaara yiyaagaa gidikko ,

text: How shall not the ministration of the spirit be rather glorious ?
text2: Geeshsha Ayyaanai oottiyo oosuwaa bonchchoi ai keenaa aadhdhanee ?

text: For if the ministration of condemnation be glory , much more doth the ministration of righteousness exceed in glory .
text2: Aissi giikko , asi pirdda ekkiyo oosoi bonchcho gidikko , yaatin , asi xilliyo oosuwaa bonchchoi waanidi daranee ?

text: For even that which was made glorious had no glory in this respect , by reason of the glory that excelleth .
text2: Aissi giikko , kase bonchchoi ha77i baappe keehi aadhdhiya bonchchuwaa gaasuwan xayidoogee tuma .

text: For if that which is done away was glorious , much more that which remaineth is glorious .
text2: Aissi giikko , he xayidaagan bonchchoi de7iyaabaa gidikko , merinau de7iyaagan ai keena gita bonchchoi de7anee ?

text: Seeing then that we have such hope , we use great plainness of speech :
text2: Nuuni ufaissan naagiyo hagaa malabai nuuyyo de7iyo gishshau , qoncciyan xalidi haasayeettees .

text: And not as Moses , which put a vail over his face , that the children of Israel could not stedfastly look to the end of that which is abolished :
text2: Israa7eela asai xayiya bonchchuwaa wurssettaa be7enna mala , ba som77uwaa naxalan kammida Muuse mala nuuni gidokko .

text: But their minds were blinded : for until this day remaineth the same vail untaken away in the reading of the old testament ; which vail is done away in Christ .
text2: SHin eta wozanai dammiis ; aissi giikko , eti Gal77a Maachchaa nabbabiyo wode , hachchi gakkanaassikka , he naxalai eta wozanaa kammi wottiis ; ooninne Kiristtoosaara gaittiyo wode xalaalan he naxalai kichchees .

text: But even unto this day , when Moses is read , the vail is upon their heart .
text2: SHin eti Muuse maxaafaa nabbabiyo wode ubban hachchi gakkanaassikka , he naxalai eta wozanaa kammi wottiis .

text: Nevertheless when it shall turn to the Lord , the vail shall be taken away .
text2: SHin Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Ooninne Godaakko simmiyo wode audenne he naxalai kichchees ” yaagees .

text: Now the Lord is that Spirit : and where the Spirit of the Lord is , there is liberty .
text2: Godai Geeshsha Ayyaana . Godaa Ayyaanai de7iyoosan ailletetti baawa .

text: But we all , with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord , are changed into the same image from glory to glory , even as by the Spirit of the Lord .
text2: Nuuni ubbaikka naxalan kamettibeenna som77uwan Godaa bonchchuwaa heregadan zaaridi phoolana ; qassi Geeshsha Ayyaana gidiya Godaappe yiya he bonchchoi nuna ba meraa milatissidi , bonchchuwaappe bonchchuwau laammana .

text: Therefore seeing we have this ministry , as we have received mercy , we faint not ;
text2: Simmi Xoossai nuuyyo ha oosuwaa ba maarotettan immido gishshau , nuuni salettokko .

text: But have renounced the hidden things of dishonesty , not walking in craftiness , nor handling the word of God deceitfully ; but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man ' s conscience in the sight of God .
text2: Nuuni geeman oottiyo yeellayiya ooso ubbaa aggi bayida ; qassi gene oosokka oottokko ; woi Xoossaa qaalaa wordduwaara walakkokko . Hegaadankka , tumaa qoncciyan haasayidi , Xoossaa sinttan asa ubbaa zoriya wozanaayyo nuna shiishsheettees .

text: But if our gospel be hid , it is hid to them that are lost :
text2: Nuuni yootiyo wonggeliyaa mishiraachchoi geemmidabaa gidikkokka , xayiya asatu xalaalau geemmiis .

text: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not , lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ , who is the image of God , should shine unto them .
text2: Ha sa7aa Xoossai ammanenna asatu qofaa jallissiis ; jallissidi Kiristtoosa bonchchuwaa , wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa poo7uwaa banttau poo7iyaagaa , Xoossaa milatiyaagaa eti be7enna mala , eta diggiis .

text: For we preach not ourselves , but Christ Jesus the Lord ; and ourselves your servants for Jesus ' sake .
text2: Aissi giikko , Yesuus Kiristtoosi Goda gidiyoogaanne a gishshau nuuni nu huuphen intteyyo ashkkara gidiyoogaa yooteetteesippe attin , nu huuphebaa yootokko .

text: For God , who commanded the light to shine out of darkness , hath shined in our hearts , to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ .
text2: Aissi giikko , “ Xumaappe poo7oi poo7ana ” giida Xoossai nu wozanan ba poo7uwaa poo7issiis ; qassi i ba bonchcho eratettaa poo7uwaa Kiristtoosa sinttan poo7iyaagaa nuuyyo immanau poo7issiis .

text: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels , that the excellency of the power may be of God , and not of us .
text2: SHin ubbaappe aadhdhiya wolqqai Xoossaagaa gidiyoogaappe attin , nuugaa gidennaagaa bessanau nuuyyo ha minjjai urqqaappe merettida miishsha giddon de7ees .

text: We are troubled on every side , yet not distressed ; we are perplexed , but not in despair ;
text2: Nuuni ubba baggaarakka un77ettida ; shin me7erettibookko ; qassi issi issi wode siroos ; shin muleerakka aggi bayana gibookko .

text: Persecuted , but not forsaken ; cast down , but not destroyed ;
text2: Nuuni yedetettida ; shin Xoossai nuna olibeenna ; qassi nu morkketi nuna oli bayidosona ; shin nuuni xayibookko .

text: Always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body .
text2: Qassi Yesuusi de7iyoogee nu asatettan beettana mala , nuuni ubba wode a haiquwaa nu asatettan tookki yuuyoos .

text: For we which live are alway delivered unto death for Jesus ' sake , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our mortal flesh .
text2: Aissi giikko , haiqqiya nu asatettaa bolli Yesuusi de7iyoogee beettana mala , paxa de7iya nuuni a gishshau , ubba wode haiqqiichchidi attoos .

text: So then death worketh in us , but life in you .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , haiqoi nu giddon oottees ; shin de7oi qassi intte giddon oottees .

text: We having the same spirit of faith , according as it is written , I believed , and therefore have I spoken ; we also believe , and therefore speak ;
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Taani ammanido gishshau haasayaas ” yaagees ; he ammanuwaa Ayyaanai nuuyyo de7iyo gishshau , nuunikka ammanoos ; hegaa gishshau , haasayoos .

text: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus shall raise up us also by Jesus , and shall present us with you .
text2: Xoossai , Godaa Yesuusa haiquwaappe denttidaagee , nunakka qassi Yesuusaara haiquwaappe denttidi , inttenaara issippe ba sintti shiishshanaagaa eroos .

text: For all things are for your sakes , that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God .
text2: Hagee ubbai intte gishshassa ; Xoossaa aaro kehatettai daro asaa gakkiyo wode , asai Xoossaa bonchchuwaayyo daro galataa immana .

text: For which cause we faint not ; but though our outward man perish , yet the inward man is renewed day by day .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni salettokko ; nuuyyo harai atto , bolla bagga asatettai wooqqiyaabaa gidikkokka , garssa bagga asatettai gallassi gallassi ooraxxees .

text: For our light affliction , which is but for a moment , worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory ;
text2: Aissi giikko , ha77issau nuuni waayettiyo ha guutta waayee , ubbaappe keehi gitatiya merinaa bonchchuwaa nuuyyo beetissana .

text: While we look not at the things which are seen , but at the things which are not seen : for the things which are seen are temporal ; but the things which are not seen are eternal .
text2: Nuuni beettennabaa xeelliyoogaappe attin , beettiyaabaa xeellokko ; aissi giikko , beettiyaabai ha77issau de7iyaagaa ; shin beettennabai merinau de7iyaagaa .

text: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved , we have a building of God , an house not made with hands , eternal in the heavens .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni de7iyo ha sa7aa dunkkaanee qolettikko , nuuyyo asi keexxibeenna keettai , Xoossai keexxidoogee , saluwan merinau de7iyoogaa nuuni eroos .

text: For in this we groan , earnestly desiring to be clothed upon with our house which is from heaven :
text2: Nuuni hagan tumu ooloosinne saluwan de7ana nu keettaa maayanau keehi amottoos .

text: If so be that being clothed we shall not be found naked .
text2: Nuuni hegaa maayidi , kallottokko ;

text: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan , being burdened : not for that we would be unclothed , but clothed upon , that mortality might be swallowed up of life .
text2: nuuni ha sa7aa dunkkaaniyan de7iiddi , deexettidi ooloos ; aissi giikko , haiqqiya asatettai de7uwan mitettana mala , nuuni maayanau koyiyoogaappe attin , kallottanau koyokko .

text: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God , who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit .
text2: Nuuyyo hagaa giigissidaagee Xoossaa ; qassi i ba Geeshsha Ayyaanaa oito oottidi , nuna oitti wottiis .

text: Therefore we are always confident , knowing that , whilst we are at home in the body , we are absent from the Lord :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni ubba wode ammanettoos ; qassi nuuni nu sooni ha asatettan de7ido keenan , Godaappe shaahettidi de7iyoogaakka eroos .

text: ( For we walk by faith , not by sight : )
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni ammaniyoogan de7iyoogaappe attin , be7iyoogan de7okko .

text: We are confident , I say , and willing rather to be absent from the body , and to be present with the Lord .
text2: Nuna ammanttees ; qassi ha asatettan nu keettaa aggi bayidi , Godaara issippe de7iyoogee nuna ufaissees .

text: Wherefore we labour , that , whether present or absent , we may be accepted of him .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni qassi sooni de7in de7ana xayin , nu qofai a ufaissanaagaa .

text: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ ; that every one may receive the things done in his body , according to that he hath done , whether it be good or bad .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni huuphiyan huuphiyan oottido oosoi lo77o gidin , woi iita gidin , nuuyyo bessiyaagaa ekkanau , Kiristtoosa pirdda araataa sinttan ubbaikka beettanau bessees .

text: Knowing therefore the terror of the Lord , we persuade men ; but we are made manifest unto God ; and I trust also are made manifest in your consciences .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni Xoossaayyo yayyiyoogaa eridi , hegaadan qassi asaakka ammantteettees ; Xoossai nuna muleera erees ; qassi inttekka inttena zoriya wozanan nuna ereeta yaagada qoppais .

text: For we commend not ourselves again unto you , but give you occasion to glory on our behalf , that ye may have somewhat to answer them which glory in appearance , and not in heart .
text2: Meran ceeqettiyoogaappe attin , wozanan ceeqettenna asatuyyo intte yooti zaariyoobai intteyyo de7ana mala , intte nunan ceeqettanaadan , nuuni intteyyo gaaso gidanau koyiyoogaappe attin , nuna galatanau koyokko .

text: For whether we be beside ourselves , it is to God : or whether we be sober , it is for your cause .
text2: Nuuni gooyyiyaabaa gidikko , Xoossaa bonchchuwaassa ; woi qassi wozanaara de7iyaabaa gidikkokka , inttena go77anaassa .

text: For the love of Christ constraineth us ; because we thus judge , that if one died for all , then were all dead :
text2: Kiristtoosa siiqoi nuna godatees ; aissi giikko , issi asi asa ubbaayyo haiqqidoogaa nuuni akeekida ; hegaa gidikko asai ubbai aara haiqqiis .

text: And that he died for all , that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves , but unto him which died for them , and rose again .
text2: Paxa de7iyaageeti bantta gishshau haiqqidaagaayyoonne qassi haiquwaappe denddidaagaayyo de7anaappe attin , sinttappe bantta huupheyyo de7enna mala , i asa ubbaa gishshau haiqqiis .

text: Wherefore henceforth know we no man after the flesh : yea , though we have known Christ after the flesh , yet now henceforth know we him no more .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni hagaappe sinttau oonanne asa qofan pirddokko ; harai atto , nuuni Kiristtoosa kase asa qofan pirddidobaa gidikkokka , simmi sinttappe hegaadan pirddokko .

text: Therefore if any man be in Christ , he is a new creature : old things are passed away ; behold , all things are become new .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ooninne Kiristtoosaara de7ikko , ooratta mereta ; gal77ai aadhdhiis ; be7ite , ubbabaikka ooraxxiis .

text: And all things are of God , who hath reconciled us to himself by Jesus Christ , and hath given to us the ministry of reconciliation ;
text2: Kiristtoosa baggaara nuna banaara sigettida Xoossai ubbabaakka oottiis ; qassi i nuuyyo harata banaara sigettiyo oosuwaa immiis .

text: To wit , that God was in Christ , reconciling the world unto himself , not imputing their trespasses unto them ; and hath committed unto us the word of reconciliation .
text2: Xoossai Kiristtoosa baggaara asa ubbaa banaara sigettees ; asa nagaraakka asa bolli qoodenna ; qassi asa banaara sigettiyo kiitaakka nuuyyo immiis .

text: Now then we are ambassadors for Christ , as though God did beseech you by us : we pray you in Christ ' s stead , be ye reconciled to God .
text2: Simmi Xoossai nu baggaara intteyyo haasayiyoogaadan , nuunikka Kiristtoosa gishshaa haasayiya i kiittidoogeeta ; qassi nuuni inttena , “ Xoossaara sigettite ” giidi , Kiristtoosa gishshaa woossoos .

text: For he hath made him to be sin for us , who knew no sin ; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him .
text2: Nuuni Xoossaa xillotettaa Kiristtoosa baggaara ekkana mala , nagara erenna Kiristtoosa nu gishshau , Xoossai nagaranchcha oottiis .

text: We then , as workers together with him , beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain .
