text2: Intte nunaara Xoossaa oosuwaa oottiiddi , a aaro kehatettaa ekkidi go7ettana mala , nuuni inttena woossoos .

text: ( For he saith , I have heard thee in a time accepted , and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee : behold , now is the accepted time ; behold , now is the day of salvation . )
text2: Aissi giikko Xoossai , “ Taani injje wodiyan neeni giyoogaa siyaas ; qassi atotettaa gallassi nena maaddaas ” yaagees . Be7ite , injje wodee ha77a . Be7ite , atotettaa gallassai hachcha .

text: Giving no offence in any thing , that the ministry be not blamed :
text2: Nuuni nu oosuwaa ooninne boranaagaa koyokko ; qassi oonanne xubbanaagaa koyokko .

text: But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God , in much patience , in afflictions , in necessities , in distresses ,
text2: SHin ubbaban nuuni Xoossaa ashkkarata gidiyoogaa nu huuphen bessida ; daro genccan , waayiyan , metuwan , gita tuggan ,

text: In stripes , in imprisonments , in tumults , in labours , in watchings , in fastings ;
text2: lissuwan garafettiyoogan , qashuwan , wocaman , daafuran , xiskko xayiyoogan , xooman ,

text: By pureness , by knowledge , by longsuffering , by kindness , by the Holy Ghost , by love unfeigned ,
text2: geeshshatettan , eratettan , danddayan , kehatettan , Geeshsha Ayyaanan , tumu siiquwan ,

text: By the word of truth , by the power of God , by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left ,
text2: tumaa haasayiyoogan , Xoossaa wolqqan nuuni Xoossaa ashkkarata gidiyoogaa nu huuphen bessida ; qassi nu huuphiyaa naaganaunne olettanau nuuyyo xillotettaa ola miishshai de7ees .

text: By honour and dishonour , by evil report and good report : as deceivers , and yet true ;
text2: Nuuni bonchchettidanne tooshettida ; cayettidanne galatettida . Qassi tumaa haasayoos ; shin asai nuna worddanchcha giidi qoppees .

text: As unknown , and yet well known ; as dying , and , behold , we live ; as chastened , and not killed ;
text2: Nuuni asi erenna asa mala ; shin asai ubbai nuna erees ; nuuni haiqqida asa mala ; shin intte be7iyoogaadankka de7oos ; qaxxayettida asa mala ; shin haiqqibookko .

text: As sorrowful , yet alway rejoicing ; as poor , yet making many rich ; as having nothing , and yet possessing all things .
text2: Nuuni kayyottiyaageeta gidikkokka , ubba wode ufaittoos . Hiyyeesa milatoos ; shin daro asaa dureyoos ; qassi aibinne bainna asa milatoos ; shin ubbabaikka nubaa .

text: O ye Corinthians , our mouth is open unto you , our heart is enlarged .
text2: Qoronttoosan de7iya asau , nuuni intteyyo qoncciyan yootida ; nu uluwaakka inttena bessida ;

text: Ye are not straitened in us , but ye are straitened in your own bowels .
text2: Nuuni intteyyo xibibookko ; xibidaageeti inttena . Nuuni nu uluwaa intteyyo genttibookko ; shin intte uluwaa nuuyyo genttidaageeti inttena .

text: Now for a recompence in the same , ( I speak as unto my children , ) be ye also enlarged .
text2: Ha77i taani ta naatuyyo haasayiyoogaadan , intteyyo haasayais ; nuuni inttena nu uluwaa bessidoogaadan , inttekka nuna intte uluwaa aassi dooyidi bessite .

text: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers : for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness ? and what communion hath light with darkness ?
text2: Ammanenna asatuura zuppetidi , giigenna oosuwaa oottoppite . Aissi giikko , xillotettaayyoonne nagaraayyo aiba gaitetti de7ii ? Poo7uwaayyoonne xumaayyo aiba issippetetti de7ii ?

text: And what concord hath Christ with Belial ? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel ?
text2: Kiristtoosanne xalahe halaqaa issippe gattiyaabi aibee ? Qassi ammaniyaageenne ammanennaagee koxxiyoobi aibi de7ii ?

text: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols ? for ye are the temple of the living God ; as God hath said , I will dwell in them , and walk in them ; and I will be their God , and they shall be my people .
text2: Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyaaranne eeqaara aiba zuppetetti de7ii ? Aissi giikko Xoossai , “ Taani eta giddon de7ananne eta giddon hemetettana . Taani eta Xoossaa gidana ; qassi etikka ta asata gidana ” giidoogaadan , nuuni de7o Xoossaa beeta maqidase .

text: Wherefore come out from among them , and be ye separate , saith the Lord , and touch not the unclean thing ; and I will receive you ,
text2: Hegaadankka , qassi Godai , “ Eta giddoppe kiyite ; etappe shaahettite . Tunabaakka bochchoppite . Taani inttena mokka ekkana .

text: And will be a Father unto you , and ye shall be my sons and daughters , saith the Lord Almighty .
text2: Qassi taani intteyyo aawa gidana ; inttekka taayyo attuma naatanne macca naata gidana . Taani Ubbaappe Wolqqaama Godai hagaa odais ” yaagiis .

text: Having therefore these promises , dearly beloved , let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit , perfecting holiness in the fear of God .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ta siiqotoo , Xoossai ha ubbabaa nuuyyo immana giidoogaappe hini baggan , nu ashuwaanne nu shemppuwaa tunissiya ubbabaappe nu huuphiyaa ane geeshshoos ; qassi Xoossaayyo yayyiyoogan muleera geeyidi de7oos .

text: Receive us ; we have wronged no man , we have corrupted no man , we have defrauded no man .
text2: Intte uluwaa nuna bessite ; nuuni oonanne naaqqibookko ; oonanne bashshibookko ; qassi oonanne cimmibookko .

text: I speak not this to condemn you : for I have said before , that ye are in our hearts to die and live with you .
text2: Taani hegaa intte bolli pirddanau giikke ; aissi giikko , taani kase intteyyo giidoogaadankka , intte nu wozanan de7eeta ; nuuni de7inkka haiqqinkka , issippe de7oos .

text: Great is my boldness of speech toward you , great is my glorying of you : I am filled with comfort , I am exceeding joyful in all our tribulation .
text2: Taani inttena keehi ammanais ; taani inttenan gitatais ; nu waayee ubban taani keehi minettaisinne wogi bainna ufaissaa ufaittais .

text: For , when we were come into Macedonia , our flesh had no rest , but we were troubled on every side ; without were fightings , within were fears .
text2: Aissi giikko , harai atto nuuni Maqidooniyaa biido wode , ubba baggaarakka waayettidappe attin , shemppibookko ; hara asaara ooshshai de7ees ; nu wozanankka yashshai de7ees .

text: Nevertheless God , that comforteth those that are cast down , comforted us by the coming of Titus ;
text2: SHin kayyottidaageeta minttettiya Xoossai , Tiitu yuussan nuna minttettiis .

text: And not by his coming only , but by the consolation wherewith he was comforted in you , when he told us your earnest desire , your mourning , your fervent mind toward me ; so that I rejoiced the more .
text2: Nuna kaseegaappe aatti ufaissidaagee , Tiitu yuussaa xalaala gidenna ; shin intte a minttettidoogaa ; intte tana be7anau amottidoogaanne tau qarettidoogaa qassi intte tana maaddanau giigettidoogaa i nuuyyo yootiis .

text: For though I made you sorry with a letter , I do not repent , though I did repent : for I perceive that the same epistle hath made you sorry , though it were but for a season .
text2: Aissi giikko , ta dabddaabbee inttena azzanissidabaa gidikkokka , aissi xaafidanaashsha giikke ; aissi xaafidanaashsha giikkokka , ta dabddaabbee inttena guutta wodiyaa azzanissidoogaa be7ais .

text: Now I rejoice , not that ye were made sorry , but that ye sorrowed to repentance : for ye were made sorry after a godly manner , that ye might receive damage by us in nothing .
text2: Ha77i tana ufaissidaagee taani inttena azzanissido gishshassa gidenna ; shin intte azzanoi inttena nagaraappe zaaridoogaa gishshassa ; aissi giikko , nuuni inttena aibiininne qohennaadan , Xoossai ba koyidoogaadan , inttena azzanissiis .

text: For godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of : but the sorrow of the world worketh death .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai koyiyo azzanoi atotettaakko gattiya nagaraappe simuwaa ehees ; hegeekka zil77etti bainnaagaa ; shin sa7aa azzanoi haiquwaa ehees .

text: For behold this selfsame thing , that ye sorrowed after a godly sort , what carefulness it wrought in you , yea , what clearing of yourselves , yea , what indignation , yea , what fear , yea , what vehement desire , yea , what zeal , yea , what revenge ! In all things ye have approved yourselves to be clear in this matter .
text2: Xoossai he intte azzanuwan ai oottidaakkonne be7ite . Inttena ai keenaa genccissidaakkonne intte geeshshatettaa tumayanau inttena ai keenaa laamoyidaakko , ai keenaa hanqqetissidaakkonne ai keenaa yashissidaakko , qassi inttena ai keenaa amoyidaakko , ai keenaa mishissidaakkonne naaqo oosuwaa qaxxayanau ai keenaa giigidaakko be7ite ; intte intte huuphen geeshsha gididoogaa ubbabankka erissideta .

text: Wherefore , though I wrote unto you , I did it not for his cause that had done the wrong , nor for his cause that suffered wrong , but that our care for you in the sight of God might appear unto you .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani he dabddaabbiyaa intteyyo xaafidabaa gidikkokka , naaqqida uraa woi naaqettida uraa gishshassa gidenna ; shin intte nuuyyo woqqaa qoppiyaakkonne Xoossaa sinttan intteyyo qonccissanau taani xaafaas .

text: Therefore we were comforted in your comfort : yea , and exceedingly the more joyed we for the joy of Titus , because his spirit was refreshed by you all .
text2: Nuuni minettidoogee hegaa gishshassa ; he nu minettaa bolli , Tiitu ufaittidoogaassi nuuni ubbaappe dariya ufaissaa ufaittida . Aissi giikko , intte ubbai a hirggaappe shemppissideta .

text: For if I have boasted any thing to him of you , I am not ashamed ; but as we spake all things to you in truth , even so our boasting , which I made before Titus , is found a truth .
text2: Taani inttebaa sabbada ayyo odin , intte tana yeellayibeekketa ; shin nuuni intteyyo ubba wode tumaa haasayida ; hegaadankka , nuuni Tiitu sinttan inttebaa sabbidoogee tuma gidiis .

text: And his inward affection is more abundant toward you , whilst he remembereth the obedience of you all , how with fear and trembling ye received him .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte ubbai ayyo yayyidi kokkoridi , a waati mokkidaakkonne qassi ayyo ai keenaa azazettidaakko i hassayiyo wode , inttena keehi daro siiqees .

text: I rejoice therefore that I have confidence in you in all things .
text2: Taani ubbaban inttena ammaniyo gishshau ufaittais .

text: Moreover , brethren , we do you to wit of the grace of God bestowed on the churches of Macedonia ;
text2: Nu ishatoo , Xoossaa aaro kehatettai Maqidooniyaa woosa keettatun oottidobaa inttena erissanaagaa koyoos .

text: How that in a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality .
text2: Eti aadhdhido waayiyan wolqqaama paaciyaa paacettidosona ; shin eti hiyyeesa gidikkokka , bantta immiyooban daro kehoosonanne qassi gita ufaissaa ufaittoosona .

text: For to their power , I bear record , yea , and beyond their power they were willing of themselves ;
text2: Aissi giikko , eti bantta wolqqa keenaa qassi harai atto bantta wolqqaappekka dariyaagaa dosidi immidoogau taani markka .

text: Praying us with much intreaty that we would receive the gift , and take upon us the fellowship of the ministering to the saints .
text2: Eti geeshshata maaddiyo lo77o oosuwaa nunaara oottanau nuna daro woossidosona .

text: And this they did , not as we hoped , but first gave their own selves to the Lord , and unto us by the will of God .
text2: Eti nuuni qoppidoogaappe aattidi oottidosona ; kasetidi eti bantta huuphiyaa Godaayyo immidoogaappe guyyiyan , Xoossai giido mala , nuuyyookka bantta huuphiyaa immidosona .

text: Insomuch that we desired Titus , that as he had begun , so he would also finish in you the same grace also .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni ha lo77o oosuwaa doommida Tiitu gujji oottanaadaaninne inttena maaddidi , he oosuwaa polissanaadan a woossida .

text: Therefore , as ye abound in every thing , in faith , and utterance , and knowledge , and in all diligence , and in your love to us , see that ye abound in this grace also .
text2: SHin intte ubbaban , ammanuwan , haasayan , eratettan , gita amuwan , nuna siiqiyoogan ubbabankka duretidoogaadan , ha lo77o oosuwankka intte keha gidanaagaa nuuni koyoos .

text: I speak not by commandment , but by occasion of the forwardness of others , and to prove the sincerity of your love .
text2: Taani hegaa azazanau giikke ; shin haratu gita amuwaa baggaara intte siiqoi ai keena tumakko eranau gais .

text: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ , that , though he was rich , yet for your sakes he became poor , that ye through his poverty might be rich .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aaro kehatettaa ereeta ; Kiristtoosi dure gidi uttidi , intte a hiyyeesatettan duretanaadan , intte gishshau hiyyeesiis .

text: And herein I give my advice : for this is expedient for you , who have begun before , not only to do , but also to be forward a year ago .
text2: Taani ha yohuwan inttena zoriyoogee hagaa ; zillaitti intte doommidoogaa ha77i wurssiyoogee intteyyo lo77o ; intte ooso xalaalau gidennan , oottana qofaukka kasetidaageeta .

text: Now therefore perform the doing of it ; that as there was a readiness to will , so there may be a performance also out of that which ye have .
text2: Intte oottanau keehi amottidoogee oottidi polidoogaara giiga gidana mala , intteyyo danddayettidoogaadankka oosuwaa polite .

text: For if there be first a willing mind , it is accepted according to that a man hath , and not according to that he hath not .
text2: Aissi giikko , issi urai Xoossau immanau keehi amottikko , Xoossai au de7ida keenaa ekkanaappe attin , au bainnabaa appe ekkenna .

text: For I mean not that other men be eased , and ye burdened :
text2: Aissi giikko , taani harati waayiyaappe shemppin , intte waayettanaagaa giikke ; intte giiga gidanaagaappe attin .

text: But by an equality , that now at this time your abundance may be a supply for their want , that their abundance also may be a supply for your want : that there may be equality :
text2: Eta palahai intte pacaa kunttana mala , intteyyo ha wodiyan de7iya palahai eta pacaa kunttana koshshees ; naa77aikka hegan giiga gidana .

text: As it is written , He that had gathered much had nothing over ; and he that had gathered little had no lack .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafan , “ Darissidi shiishshidaagau palahibeenna ; qassi guuttaa shiishshidaagaukka paccibeenna ” geetettidi xaafettiis .

text: But thanks be to God , which put the same earnest care into the heart of Titus for you .
text2: SHin nuuni intteyyo qoppiyoogaa mala , gita qofaa Tiita qofissida Xoossaa galatai gakko .

text: For indeed he accepted the exhortation ; but being more forward , of his own accord he went unto you .
text2: Tiitu inttekko baanau ba qofaa qachchidoogee , ba huuphen inttena maaddanau daro amottido gishshappe attin , nu zore xalaalaa ekkidoogaana gidenna .

text: And we have sent with him the brother , whose praise is in the gospel throughout all the churches ;
text2: Wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiyo ba oosuwan woosa keetta ubban daro bonchchettida ishaa nuuni aara issippe kiittoos .

text: And not that only , but who was also chosen of the churches to travel with us with this grace , which is administered by us to the glory of the same Lord , and declaration of your ready mind :
text2: Hegaa bollan qassi , ha nuuni oottiyo lo77o oosuwaa i nunaara issippe oottanaunne Godaa bonchchuwau nuuni harata maaddanaassi keehi amottiyoogaa bessanau woosa keettati a dooridi sunttidosona .

text: Avoiding this , that no man should blame us in this abundance which is administered by us :
text2: Nuuni oottiyo ha keha imuwaa gishshau , ooninne nuna borenna mala naagettoos .

text: Providing for honest things , not only in the sight of the Lord , but also in the sight of men .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni Godaa sintta xalaalan lo77obaa oottanaagaa gidenna ; shin asa sinttankka lo77obaa oottanaagaa qoppoos .

text: And we have sent with them our brother , whom we have oftentimes proved diligent in many things , but now much more diligent , upon the great confidence which I have in you .
text2: Nuuni darotoo paacci be7ido nu ishaa , ubba wode inttena maaddanau daro amottiyaagaa , ha asatuura inttekko kiittoos ; qassi ha77i i inttena daro ammaniyo gishshau , inttena maaddanau kaseegaappe aattidi keehi amottees .

text: Whether any do inquire of Titus , he is my partner and fellowhelper concerning you : or our brethren be inquired of , they are the messengers of the churches , and the glory of Christ .
text2: Tiitubaa gidikko , i inttena maaddanau tanaara issippe oottiya ta laggiyaa ; hinkko ishanttubaa gidikko , eti woosa keettati kiittidoogeetanne Kiristtoosa bonchchissiyaageeta .

text: Wherefore shew ye to them , and before the churches , the proof of your love , and of our boasting on your behalf .
text2: Simmi woosa keetta ubbati intte siiqoi tuma gidiyoogaa erana mala , qassi nuuni inttebaa sabbiyoogee likke gidiyoogaa erana mala , intte siiquwaa eta bessite .

text: For as touching the ministering to the saints , it is superfluous for me to write to you :
text2: Yihudan de7iya geeshsha asata maaddanau yeddiyoobau taani intteyyo xaafanau koshshenna .

text: For I know the forwardness of your mind , for which I boast of you to them of Macedonia , that Achaia was ready a year ago ; and your zeal hath provoked very many .
text2: Intte maaddanau keehi amottiyoogaa taani eriyo gishshau , Maqidooniyan de7iya asaayyo inttebaa sabbaas . Taani etayyo , “ Akaayiyan de7iya ishantti zillaittaasappe doommidi , maaddanau giigettidosona ” yaagada yootaas ; qassi intte gita amoikka etappe dariya baggaa denttettiis .

text: Yet have I sent the brethren , lest our boasting of you should be in vain in this behalf ; that , as I said , ye may be ready :
text2: SHin taani etayyo giidoogaadankka nuuni ha yohuwan intteban gitatiyoogee hada gidenna mala , intte giigettidaageeta gidanaadan , ha ishantta inttekko kiittais .

text: Lest haply if they of Macedonia come with me , and find you unprepared , we ( that we say not , ye ) should be ashamed in this same confident boasting .
text2: Geelladan Maqidooniyaa asati tanaara yiidi , intte giigettennan de7ishin , inttena demmikko , nuuni ai keenaa yeellatanddoniishsha ! Intte yeellatanaagaa gookko ; shin nuuni inttena keehi ammanidi gitatidoogaassa .

text: Therefore I thought it necessary to exhort the brethren , that they would go before unto you , and make up beforehand your bounty , whereof ye had notice before , that the same might be ready , as a matter of bounty , and not as of covetousness .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani ha ishantti taappe sinttatidi inttekko biidi , intte immana giido imuwaa kasetidi giigissana mala , eta woossanau koshshiyoogaa akeekaas . Hegaappe guyyiyan , he imoi taani gakkiyo wode giigi uttana ; hegee qassi wolqqan intte immiyoogaa gidennan , dosidi immiyoogaa erissana .

text: But this I say , He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly ; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully .
text2: Hagaa akeekite ; guutta zerettaa zeriya urai guutta kattaa cakkana ; daro zerettaa zeriya urai qassi daro kattaa cakkana .

text: Every man according as he purposeth in his heart , so let him give ; not grudgingly , or of necessity : for God loveth a cheerful giver .
text2: Xoossai ufaissan immiya uraa siiqiyo gishshau , qarettiiddi woi dosennan immiyoogaa gidennan , immiya urai huuphen huuphen ba wozanan qoppidobaa immo .

text: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you ; that ye , always having all sufficiency in all things , may abound to every good work :
text2: Xoossai intteyyo gidiyaabai ubba wode de7anaadaaninne qassi haratuyyookka intte immanau gidiyaabai de7anaadan inttena koshshiya ubbabaa intteyyo immanau danddayees .

text: ( As it is written , He hath dispersed abroad ; he hath given to the poor : his righteousness remaineth for ever .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai , “ I hiyyeesa asaayyo darissidi immees ; qassi a xillotettai merinau de7ana ” yaagees .

text: Now he that ministereth seed to the sower both minister bread for your food , and multiply your seed sown , and increase the fruits of your righteousness ; )
text2: Xoossai , zeriyaagaayyo zerettaanne maanau qumaa immiyaagee , inttena koshshiya zeretta ubbaa intteyyo immana ; qassi intte xillotettaappe daro aifiyaa aifissanau he zerettaa dichchana .

text: Being enriched in every thing to all bountifulness , which causeth through us thanksgiving to God .
text2: Daro asai intte immiyo imuwaa nuuppe ekkidi , Xoossaa galatanaadan , intte ubba wode darissidi immiyaageeta gidana mala , Xoossai inttena ubba baggaara dureyana .

text: For the administration of this service not only supplieth the want of the saints , but is abundant also by many thanksgivings unto God ;
text2: Aissi giikko , ha intte oottiyo oosoi geeshshata koshshiyaabaa kuntti immiyoogaa xalaala gidenna ; shin Xoossaayyo daro galataa immiyoogan kumidi goggees .

text: Whiles by the experiment of this ministration they glorify God for your professed subjection unto the gospel of Christ , and for your liberal distribution unto them , and unto all men ;
text2: Ha intte oosoi intte ammanuwaa erissiyo gishshau , daro asai Kiristtoosa wonggeliyaa intte ammanidi markkattiyoogaayyoonne intte maaduwaa etaaranne hara ubbatuura shaakkidi , darissi immiyoogaayyo Xoossaa bonchchana .

text: And by their prayer for you , which long after you for the exceeding grace of God in you .
text2: Eti intteyyo Xoossaa woossiiddi , inttenan de7iya Xoossaa aaro kehatettaa zawai bainnaagaa gishshau , inttena laamotoosona .

text: Thanks be unto God for his unspeakable gift .
text2: Zawai bainna Xoossaa aaro kehatettaa gishshau , Xoossaa galatai gakko .

text: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ , who in presence am base among you , but being absent am bold toward you :
text2: Taani PHauloosi , intte , “ I nunaara de7iyo wode kauyyees ” giyoogee , qassi , “ Nuuppe haakkidi de7iyo wode nu bolli xalees ” giyoogee , Kiristtoosa doshotettaa baggaaranne a ashkketettaa baggaara inttena woossais .

text: But I beseech you , that I may not be bold when I am present with that confidence , wherewith I think to be bold against some , which think of us as if we walked according to the flesh .
text2: Nuna ha sa7aa meeziyaadan de7oosona giidi qoppiya issi issi asatu bolli taani xalanaagaa erais ; shin taani inttekko biyo wode intte tana xalissenna mala , inttena woossais .

text: For though we walk in the flesh , we do not war after the flesh :
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni ha sa7an de7ikkokka , ha sa7aa asadan olettokko .

text: ( For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal , but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds ; )
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni olettiyo toorai ha sa7aagaa gidenna . SHin qatuwaa laalanau wolqqaara de7iya Xoossaa tooraa .

text: Casting down imaginations , and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God , and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ ;
text2: Nuuni asa qofa xaissoos ; qassi Xoossaa eratettaa bolli denddidi xubbiya otoro qofa ubbaa laaloos . He qofa ubbai Kiristtoosayyo azazettana mala omooddoos .

text: And having in a readiness to revenge all disobedience , when your obedience is fulfilled .
text2: Intte azazettiyoogaa polidoogaappe guyyiyan , azazettennan ixxiyoobaa ubbaa nuuni qaxxayanau giigettana .

text: Do ye look on things after the outward appearance ? If any man trust to himself that he is Christ ' s , let him of himself think this again , that , as he is Christ ' s , even so are we Christ ' s .
text2: Intte sinttan de7iyaabaa xeellite ; ooninne bana Kiristtoosabaa giidi qoppikko , hegaa gujji qoppo ; Kiristtoosabaa i gididoogaadan , nuunikka qassi abaa .

text: For though I should boast somewhat more of our authority , which the Lord hath given us for edification , and not for your destruction , I should not be ashamed :
text2: Aissi giikko , Godai nuuyyo immido nu alaafetettan taani keehi otorettiyaabaa gidikkokka , hegan yeellatikke ; he nuuyyo immido alaafetettai inttena keexxanaassappe attin , qolanaassa gidenna .

text: That I may not seem as if I would terrify you by letters .
text2: Taani ta dabddaabbiyan inttena yashissiya asa gidada beettanau koyikke .

text: For his letters , say they , are weighty and powerful ; but his bodily presence is weak , and his speech contemptible .
text2: Aissi giikko , issi issi asai , “ PHauloosa dabddaabbee deexonne wolqqaama ; shin xeelliyo wode i daafuranchcha ; a haasayaikka pattenna ” yaagees .

text: Let such an one think this , that , such as we are in word by letters when we are absent , such will we be also in deed when we are present .
text2: Hegaa mala asi nuuni haahuwan de7iiddi xaafiyo dabddaabbiyaaninne yaani inttenaara de7iiddi oottiyo oosuwan dummatetti bainnaagaa akeekana koshshees .

text: For we dare not make ourselves of the number , or compare ourselves with some that commend themselves : but they measuring themselves by themselves , and comparing themselves among themselves , are not wise .
text2: Nuuni banttana nashshiya issi issi asatuura nuna paidanau woi likkissanau xalokko ; shin eti banttana issoi issuwaara likkissiiddinne qassi banttana issoi issuwaara yiggi xeelliiddi , muleera eeyyidosona .

text: But we will not boast of things without our measure , but according to the measure of the rule which God hath distributed to us , a measure to reach even unto you .
text2: SHin nuuni Xoossai nuuyyo essido zawaa giddon ceeqettiyoogaappe attin , he zawaappe pinnidi ceeqettokko ; he zawai inttekkokka gakkees .

text: For we stretch not ourselves beyond our measure , as though we reached not unto you : for we are come as far as to you also in preaching the gospel of Christ :
text2: Nuuni inttekko gakkibeennabaa milatidi , zawaa pinnokko ; aissi giikko , nuuni Kiristtoosa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiiddi , inttekko kase gakkida .

text: Not boasting of things without our measure , that is , of other men ' s labours ; but having hope , when your faith is increased , that we shall be enlarged by you according to our rule abundantly ,
text2: Nuuni Xoossai essido zawaa pinnidi , hara asi oottido ooson ceeqettokko ; shin intte ammanoi dicci dicci biyo wode , nuuni intte giddon oottiyo oosuwaa zawai kaseegaappe keehi aakki aakki baana giidi qoppoos .

text: To preach the gospel in the regions beyond you , and not to boast in another man ' s line of things made ready to our hand .
text2: Nuuni wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa intte de7iyoosaappe hini baggan yootana ; qassi hara zawan oosettiichchida oosonkka ceeqettokko .

text: But he that glorieth , let him glory in the Lord .
text2: SHin Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Ceeqqiya urai ooninne Godan ceeqqo ” yaagees .

text: For not he that commendeth himself is approved , but whom the Lord commendeth .
text2: Aissi giikko , Godai nashshiyo uraappe attin , bana nashshiya urai nashettenna .

text: Would to God ye could bear with me a little in my folly : and indeed bear with me .
text2: Intte ta eeyyatettaa guuttaa gencciyaakko lo77o . Hayyanintta genccite .

text: For I am jealous over you with godly jealousy : for I have espoused you to one husband , that I may present you as a chaste virgin to Christ .
text2: Xoossai qanaatiyoogaadan , taanikka intteban qanaatais ; aissi giikko , taani inttena issi attumaagau , Kiristtoosau immana gaada , geela7otettaara de7iya geeshsha geela7eedan giigissa wottaas .

text: But I fear , lest by any means , as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty , so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ .
text2: SHin shooshshai ba geniyaara Hewaano balettidoogaadan , Kiristtoosayyo intte immido intte suure qofai moorettibeennaagee wora biichchanaakkonne gaada hirggais .

text: For if he that cometh preacheth another Jesus , whom we have not preached , or if ye receive another spirit , which ye have not received , or another gospel , which ye have not accepted , ye might well bear with him .
text2: Aissi giikko , issi urai yiidi , nuuni intteyyo yootido Yesuusappe hara Yesuusa intteyyo yootikko , woi intte ekkido Ayyaanaappenne wonggeliyaappe dumma ayyaanaanne wonggeliyaa intte ekkikko , loittidi gencceeta .

text: For I suppose I was not a whit behind the very chiefest apostles .
text2: Yesuusi kiittido ha waannatuppe taani aibinkka laafiyoobaa taayyo milatenna .

text: But though I be rude in speech , yet not in knowledge ; but we have been throughly made manifest among you in all things .
text2: Taani haasayiyo haasayan tamaarabeenna asa gidikkokka , eratettan gidikke ; shin nuuni intteyyo ha yohuwaa asa ubbaa giddon ubba baggaara qonccissida .

text: Have I committed an offence in abasing myself that ye might be exalted , because I have preached to you the gospel of God freely ?
text2: Woi taani inttena miishsha oichchennan , Xoossaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa intteyyo coo yootidoogeenne inttena xoqqu oottanau ta huuphiyaa toochchidoogee taayyo nagara gidanddeeshsha !

text: I robbed other churches , taking wages of them , to do you service .
text2: Taani intteyyo oottanau hara woosa keettatun de7iya asaappe miishsha ekka ekkada , he woosa keettata bonqqaas .

text: And when I was present with you , and wanted , I was chargeable to no man : for that which was lacking to me the brethren which came from Macedonia supplied : and in all things I have kept myself from being burdensome unto you , and so will I keep myself .
text2: Qassi taani inttenaara de7ishin , tana metin , intteppe issi uraakka waissabeikke . Aissi giikko , Maqidooniyaappe yiida ishantti tana koshshida ubbabaa taayyo immidosona ; taani inttena waissenna mala , kase ta huuphen naagettidoogaadankka sinttaukka naagettana .

text: As the truth of Christ is in me , no man shall stop me of this boasting in the regions of Achaia .
text2: Kiristtoosa tumatettai tanan de7ishin , ha ta ceeqoi Akaayiyaa biittan awaaninne attenna .

text: Wherefore ? because I love you not ? God knoweth .
text2: Taani hagaa aissi giyaanaa ? Inttena siiqenna gishshassee ? Taani inttena siiqiyoogaa Xoossai erees .

text: But what I do , that I will do , that I may cut off occasion from them which desire occasion ; that wherein they glory , they may be found even as we .
text2: SHin he bantta ceeqettiyooban nuuni oottiyoogaadan oottanau gaasottiyaageetu gaasuwaa digganau , ha77i taani oottiyo oosuwaa gujjada oottana .

text: For such are false apostles , deceitful workers , transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ .
text2: Aissi giikko , eti Yesuusi kiittibeenna worddanchcha asata ; hegeetu mala asati Kiristtoosi kiittidoogeeta milatanau bantta meraa laamerettiya kiitettibeenna worddanchchatanne genanchcha oosanchchata .

text: And no marvel ; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light .
text2: Hegee garamissiyaabaa gidenna ; aissi giikko , Seexaanai ba huuphen poo7o kiitanchcha milatanau ba meraa laammees .

text: Therefore it is no great thing if his ministers also be transformed as the ministers of righteousness ; whose end shall be according to their works .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Seexaanaa ashkkarati xillotettaa ashkkarata milatanau bantta meraa laamerettikko , hegee gitabaa gidenna ; eti wurssettan bantta oosuwaa malaa ekkana .

text: I say again , Let no man think me a fool ; if otherwise , yet as a fool receive me , that I may boast myself a little .
text2: Taani naa77anttuwaakka gais ; tana ooninne eeyya giidi qoppoppo ; shin intte tana , i eeyya giikkokka , taani guuttaa ceeqettanaadan , tana eeyya giite .

text: That which I speak , I speak it not after the Lord , but as it were foolishly , in this confidence of boasting .
text2: Taani hagaadan xalada ceeqettaidda haasayiyoogee , eeyyatetta haasayappe attin , tana Godai azaziina gidenna .

text: Seeing that many glory after the flesh , I will glory also .
text2: Daro asai ha sa7aaban ceeqettiyo gishshau , taanikka ceeqettana .

text: For ye suffer fools gladly , seeing ye yourselves are wise .
text2: Intte aadhdhida eranchcha gidiyo gishshau , eeyya asaabaa ufaissan gencceeta .

text: For ye suffer , if a man bring you into bondage , if a man devour you , if a man take of you , if a man exalt himself , if a man smite you on the face .
text2: Aissi giikko , ooninne inttena ailleyikko , woi inttebaa miikko , woi inttebaa bonqqikko , intte bolli otorettikko , woi intte qinxxalliyaa baqqikko , gencceeta .

text: I speak as concerning reproach , as though we had been weak . Howbeit whereinsoever any is bold , ( I speak foolishly , ) I am bold also .
text2: Nuuni hegaa oottanau daro daafuranchcha gididoogaa taani yeellataidda yootais . SHin ooninne issiban xalidi ceeqettikko , taanikka ceeqettanau xalais ; taani eeyya asadan haasayais .

text: Are they Hebrews ? so am I . Are they Israelites ? so am I . Are they the seed of Abraham ? so am I .
text2: Eti Ibraawetee ? Taanikka Ibraawe . Eti Israa7eela asee ? Taanikka Israa7eela asa . Eti Abrahaama zaree ? Taanikka qassi Abrahaama zare .

text: Are they ministers of Christ ? ( I speak as a fool ) I am more ; in labours more abundant , in stripes above measure , in prisons more frequent , in deaths oft .
text2: Eti Kiristtoosa ashkkaratee ? Taanikka etappe aadhdhiya ashkkara ; taani gooyyiya asadan haasayais ; taani daro ootta daafuraas ; daro wodiyaa qashettaasinne lissuwan garafettaas ; qassi daro wodiyaa haiqqaichchada attaas .

text: Of the Jews five times received I forty stripes save one .
text2: Aihudati tana ichchashutoo , hasttamanne uddufunaa lissuwan garafidosona .

text: Thrice was I beaten with rods , once was I stoned , thrice I suffered shipwreck , a night and a day I have been in the deep ;
text2: Roome asai tana heezzutoo dullan shociis ; issi gallassi shuchchan caddii caddidi aggiis ; markkabee heezzutoo me77in , abba giddon issi qammaanne issi gallassaa aqada pe7aas .

text: In journeyings often , in perils of waters , in perils of robbers , in perils by mine own countrymen , in perils by the heathen , in perils in the city , in perils in the wilderness , in perils in the sea , in perils among false brethren ;
text2: Taani daro ogiyaa hemettaas ; tana kixa haattinne panggi daafirggidi ashshiis ; qassi ta biittaa asainne Aihuda gidenna asai daafirggidi ashshidosona . Qassikka katamai , bazzoi , abbai , tana yashissiis ; worddanchcha dabbotikka tana daafirggidi ashshidosona .

text: In weariness and painfulness , in watchings often , in hunger and thirst , in fastings often , in cold and nakedness .
text2: Taani daafuraasinne metootaas . Darotoo xiskkuwaa xayaas ; namisettaas ; saamettaas . Darotoo xoomaas ; qassi meegettaasinne kallottaas .

text: Beside those things that are without , that which cometh upon me daily , the care of all the churches .
text2: Harabaa ubbaappekka ubba gallassi tau tooho gididabai , woosa keetta ubbau hirggiyoogaa .

text: Who is weak , and I am not weak ? who is offended , and I burn not ?
text2: Daafuriyai oonee ? Taani daafurikkinaayye ? Nagaran geliyai oonee ? Taani un77ettada ayyo qarettikkinaayye ?

text: If I must needs glory , I will glory of the things which concern mine infirmities .
text2: Taani ceeqettanau koshshiyaabaa gidikko , taani daafuranchcha gidiyoogaa erissiyaaban ceeqettana .

text: The God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which is blessed for evermore , knoweth that I lie not .
text2: Merinau anjjettida Xoossai , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Aawai , taani worddotennaagaa erees .

text: In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king kept the city of the Damascenes with a garrison , desirous to apprehend me :
text2: Damasqqo kataman Aretaasa giyo kawuwaappe garssaara deriyaa haariyaagee , tana oittanau Damasqqo katamaa naagissees .

text: And through a window in a basket was I let down by the wall , and escaped his hands .
text2: SHin katamaa dirssaa maskkootiyaara tana keeshiyan duge wottin , appe kessa ekkaas .

text: It is not expedient for me doubtless to glory . I will come to visions and revelations of the Lord .
text2: Ceeqettiyoogee taayyo ainne allaalle kessennabaa gidikkokka , taani ceeqettanau bessees . SHin taani ajjuutaabaanne Godaappe qonccidabaa haasayana .

text: I knew a man in Christ above fourteen years ago , ( whether in the body , I cannot tell ; or whether out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; ) such an one caught up to the third heaven .
text2: Tammanne oiddu laittappe kase , heezzantto saluwaa pude ekettida issi bitaniyaa , Kiristtoosa ammaniyaagaa , taani erais ; he bitanee ba asatettaara biidaakkonne woikko ajjuutan biidaakko , taani erikke ; Xoossai erees .

text: And I knew such a man , ( whether in the body , or out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; )
text2: He bitaniyaa , heezzantto saluwaa pude ekettidaagaa , erais ; i ba asatettaara biidaakkonne woikko ajjuutan biidaakko , taani erikke ; Xoossai erees .

text: How that he was caught up into paradise , and heard unspeakable words , which it is not lawful for a man to utter .
text2: Hegan he bitanee asi haasayanau danddayennabaa , asa inxxarssikka haasayanau danddayennabaa siyiis .

text: Of such an one will I glory : yet of myself I will not glory , but in mine infirmities .
text2: Taani he bitaniyaaban ceeqettana ; shin taani daafuranchcha gidiyoogaa erissanaappe attin , ta huupheban ceeqettikke .

text: For though I would desire to glory , I shall not be a fool ; for I will say the truth : but now I forbear , lest any man should think of me above that which he seeth me to be , or that he heareth of me .
text2: Taani ceeqettanau koyiyaabaa gidikkokka eeyyikke ; aissi giikko , taani tumaa haasayais . SHin asi tabaa tanan be7iyoogaappenne taappe siyiyoogaappe aattidi qoppenna mala ceeqettikke .

text: And lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations , there was given to me a thorn in the flesh , the messenger of Satan to buffet me , lest I should be exalted above measure .
text2: Qassi Xoossai qoncciyo aadhdhida gitatettan taani otorettiyoogaa digganau tana caddi oiqqiyaagee , Seexaanaa kiitanchchai , tana dechchanaunne taani otorettenna mala , tana naaganau taayyo imettiis .

text: For this thing I besought the Lord thrice , that it might depart from me .
text2: Hegaa taappe shaakkana mala , taani Godaa heezzutoo woossaas .

text: And he said unto me , My grace is sufficient for thee : for my strength is made perfect in weakness . Most gladly therefore will I rather glory in my infirmities , that the power of Christ may rest upon me .
text2: Godai tana , “ Ta aaro kehatettai neeyyo gidana ; aissi giikko , ta wolqqai daafuran polettees ” yaagiis ; hegaa gishshau , Kiristtoosa wolqqai tanan de7ana mala , ta daafuran ceeqettanau taani daro ufaittais .

text: Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities , in reproaches , in necessities , in persecutions , in distresses for Christ ' s sake : for when I am weak , then am I strong .
text2: Taani Kiristtoosa gishshau daafuriyoogan , asan cayettiyoogan , waayettiyoogan , yedetettiyoogan , metootiyoogan ufaittais ; aissi giikko , taani daafuriyo wode , he wode minnais .

text: I am become a fool in glorying ; ye have compelled me : for I ought to have been commended of you : for in nothing am I behind the very chiefest apostles , though I be nothing .
text2: Taani ceeqettidoogan eeyyaas ; shin hegaa intte tana wolqqan ootissideta ; aissi giikko , intte tana galatanau bessees ; taani aibanne gidana xayikkokka , Yesuusi kiittido ubbaappe aadhdhiyaageetuppe laafikke .

text: Truly the signs of an apostle were wrought among you in all patience , in signs , and wonders , and mighty deeds .
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogee tuma gididoogaa erissiya malaatainne oorattabainne Xoossai oottiyo malaatai intte giddon daro genccan oosettiis .

text: For what is it wherein ye were inferior to other churches , except it be that I myself was not burdensome to you ? forgive me this wrong .
text2: Taani ta huuphen inttena waissabeennaagaappe attin , hara woosa keettatuppe intte aibin laafeetii ? Hayyanintta taani inttena naaqqidoogaa taayyo atto giite .

text: Behold , the third time I am ready to come to you ; and I will not be burdensome to you : for I seek not yours , but you : for the children ought not to lay up for the parents , but the parents for the children .
text2: Taani inttekko baanau giigettishin , hagee taayyo heezzantto wode ; taani inttena waissikke . Taani inttena koyiyoogaappe attin , intte miishsha koyikke ; aissi giikko , aayyiyaanne aawai bantta naatuyyo miishsha minjjiyoogaappe attin , naati bantta aayeeyyoonne aawaayyo minjjokkona .

text: And I will very gladly spend and be spent for you ; though the more abundantly I love you , the less I be loved .
text2: Taani intte shemppuwaayyo taayyo de7iyaabaa tanaara gattada ufaissan immana ; yaatin , taani inttena keehi siiqiyo gishshau , intte tana ashshi siiquuteetiiyye ?

text: But be it so , I did not burden you : nevertheless , being crafty , I caught you with guile .
text2: Gidikkokka , taani inttena waissabeikke ; shin intte tana , “ Neeni nuna cimmada wordduwan oiqqadasa ” yaagana .

text: Did I make a gain of you by any of them whom I sent unto you ?
text2: Taani harai atto , inttekko kiittido issi asa baggaarakka inttena cimmidanaa ?

text: I desired Titus , and with him I sent a brother . Did Titus make a gain of you ? walked we not in the same spirit ? walked we not in the same steps ?
text2: Tiitu inttekko baana mala , taani woossaas ; qassi ammaniya ishaakka aara yeddaas . Yeddin Tiitu inttena cimmidee ? Nuuni nu oosuwaa issi qofan oottibookkonii ? Qassi nu hanoikka issuwaa gidenneeyye ?

text: Again , think ye that we excuse ourselves unto you ? we speak before God in Christ : but we do all things , dearly beloved , for your edifying .
text2: Nuuni ubba wodekka intte sinttan nu huupheyyo mootettiyoobaa intteyyo milatii ? Nuuni Kiristtoosan de7iyaageetudan , Xoossaa sinttan ha77i gakkanaassikka haasayoos . Nu siiqotoo , nuuni oottiyo ubbabaikka inttena maaddanaassa .

text: For I fear , lest , when I come , I shall not find you such as I would , and that I shall be found unto you such as ye would not : lest there be debates , envyings , wraths , strifes , backbitings , whisperings , swellings , tumults :
text2: Aissi giikko , taani inttekko biyo wode , ooni erii taani koyiyoogaa mala intte gidennan agganaakkonne ; qassi taanikka intte koyiyoogaa mala gidennan agganaakkonne . Qassi ooni erii hegan palamai , qanaatee , hanqqoi , yiiqetiyoogee , zigirssai , saasukkiyoogee , otoroi , metoi de7ennan waayi aggana ; tana yashshees .

text: And lest , when I come again , my God will humble me among you , and that I shall bewail many which have sinned already , and have not repented of the uncleanness and fornication and lasciviousness which they have committed .
text2: Taani inttekko naa77anttuwaa biyo wode , ta Xoossai intte sinttan tana kaushshanaakkonne yayyais ; taani nagara kase oottidi , bantta oottido tunatettaappe , shaaramuxatettaappenne amuwaappe simmibeenna daro asatuyyo yeekkennan aggikke gaada yayyais .

text: This is the third time I am coming to you . In the mouth of two or three witnesses shall every word be established .
text2: Hagee taayyo inttekko yiishin heezzantto wode . Ai mootoikka naa77u woi heezzu markkai markkattin pirddettanau koshshees .

text: I told you before , and foretell you , as if I were present , the second time ; and being absent now I write to them which heretofore have sinned , and to all other , that , if I come again , I will not spare :
text2: Taani naa77anttuwaa inttenaara gaittido wode , inttena ye77e gaas ; ha77ikka haahuwan de7ikkokka , inttena ye77e gais . Taani qassikka inttekko biyo wode , nagara kase oottidaageetakka qassi harata ubbatakka qaxxayennan aggikke .

text: Since ye seek a proof of Christ speaking in me , which to you - ward is not weak , but is mighty in you .
text2: Aissi giikko , Kiristtoosi ta baggaara haasayiyoogaa erissiyaabaa intte koyeeta . I inttenaara haasayiyo wode wolqqaama gidiyoogaappe attin , intte giddon daafuranchcha gidenna ;

text: For though he was crucified through weakness , yet he liveth by the power of God . For we also are weak in him , but we shall live with him by the power of God toward you .
text2: aissi giikko , Kiristtoosi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi , daafuran kaqettiis ; shin Xoossaa wolqqan paxa de7ees . Aissi giikko , i daafuranchcha gididoogaadan , nuunikka daafuranchcha ; shin inttenaara haasayiyoogan nuuni Xoossaa wolqqan aara de7ana .

text: Examine yourselves , whether ye be in the faith ; prove your own selves . Know ye not your own selves , how that Jesus Christ is in you , except ye be reprobates ?
text2: Ammanuwan intte de7iyaakkonne ane inttena qoridi pirddite ; paaciyan intte muleera kunddikkoppe attin , Kiristtoosi inttenan de7iyoogaa intte geeshshidi ereeta .

text: But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates .
text2: Nuuni paaciyaa danddayanaagaa intte eriyoogaa ammanais .

text: Now I pray to God that ye do no evil ; not that we should appear approved , but that ye should do that which is honest , though we be as reprobates .
text2: Intte iitabaa mulekka oottenna mala , nuuni Xoossaa woossoos . Nuuni paaciyaa danddayiyaageeta gididi beettanaassa gidenna ; shin nuuni paaciyaa danddayennaageeta milatidi beettikkokka , lo77obaa intte oottanaassa .

text: For we can do nothing against the truth , but for the truth .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni tumaa xalaalaayyo oottanaappe attin , tumaa bolli ainne oottanau danddayokko ;

text: For we are glad , when we are weak , and ye are strong : and this also we wish , even your perfection .
text2: nuuni daafuriyo wode ufaittoos ; shin intte wolqqaama ; intte bali bainnaageeta gidana mala , nuuni qassi Xoossaa woossoos .

text: Therefore I write these things being absent , lest being present I should use sharpness , according to the power which the Lord hath given me to edification , and not to destruction .
text2: Taani intteppe haahuwan de7aidda xaafidoogee hegaa gishshassa ; taani inttekko biyo wode , Godai taayyo immido maatan zemppada , inttenaara iitettanau tana waayi koshshana . He maatai taani inttena keexxanau taayyo imettidoogaappe attin , inttena qolanau imettibeenna .

text: Finally , brethren , farewell . Be perfect , be of good comfort , be of one mind , live in peace ; and the God of love and peace shall be with you .
text2: Wurssettan ta ishatoo , saro de7ite ; bali bainnan de7ite ; ta zoriyaa siyite ; issi wozana gididi de7ite ; sarotettan de7ite . Siiqo Xoossai , sarotettaa Xoossai , inttenaara issippe de7ana .

text: Greet one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Issoi issuwaara geeshsha yeretaa yerettidi sarotite .

text: All the saints salute you .
text2: Xoossaa asa ubbati inttena saro saro goosona .

text: The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ , and the love of God , and the communion of the Holy Ghost , be with you all . Amen .
text2: Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aaro kehatettai , Xoossaa siiqoi , Geeshsha Ayyaanaa issippetettai inttenaara ubbaara gido . Amin77i .

text: Paul , an apostle , ( not of men , neither by man , but by Jesus Christ , and God the Father , who raised him from the dead ; )
text2: Taani PHauloosi , Yesuus Kiristtoosinne qassi haiquwaappe a denttida Xoossai Aawai kiittidoogaappe attin , asappe woikko asa baggaara kiitettidaagaa gidikke .

text: And all the brethren which are with me , unto the churches of Galatia :
text2: Ha taaninne tanaara de7iya ammaniya ishantti ubbai , Galaatiyaa biittan de7iya woosa keetta ubbaassi sarotaa kiittoos .

text: Grace be to you and peace from God the Father , and from our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Xoossai nu Aawainne nu Godai Yesuus Kiristtoosi intteyyo aaro kehatettaanne sarotettaa immo .

text: Who gave himself for our sins , that he might deliver us from this present evil world , according to the will of God and our Father :
text2: Nu Xoossaa , nu Aawaa sheniyan Kiristtoosi ha iita oosoi oosettiyo wodiyaappe nuna ashshana mala , nu nagaraa gishshau , ba huuphiyaa immiis .

text: To whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Xoossaayyo merinaappe merinaa gakkanaassi bonchchoi gido . Amin77i .

text: I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you into the grace of Christ unto another gospel :
text2: Kiristtoosa aaro kehatettan inttena xeesida Xoossaa aggidi , hara wonggeliyaakko , intte ellellidi , waani simmidaakko tau oorattabaa gidiis .

text: Which is not another ; but there be some that trouble you , and would pervert the gospel of Christ .
text2: Inttena bul77akkiyaageetinne Kiristtoosa wonggeliyaa geellayanau koyiya amarida asati de7oosonappe attin , tumaappe hara wonggelee baawa .

text: But though we , or an angel from heaven , preach any other gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you , let him be accursed .
text2: SHin harai atto nuna gidin , woikko saluwaappe kiitanchcha gidin , nuuni intteyyo kase yootido wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaappe dummatiyaagaa intteyyo yootiyaabaa gidikko , i qanggettidaagaa gido .

text: As we said before , so say I now again , If any man preach any other gospel unto you than that ye have received , let him be accursed .
text2: Kase nuuni giidoogaadan , ha77ikka naa77anttuwaa taani gais ; intte ekkido wonggeliyaappe dummatiyaagaa ooninne intteyyo yootikko , he urai qanggettidaagaa gido .

text: For do I now persuade men , or God ? or do I seek to please men ? for if I yet pleased men , I should not be the servant of Christ .
text2: Hagee tana asappe saba koyiyaabaa milatissii ? Akkai ! Taani Xoossai lo77o giyoogaa koyais . Woikko taani asa ufaissanau koyiyaanaa ? Taani ha77ikka asa ufaissanau koyiyaabaa gidiyaakko , Kiristtoosa aille gidikke .

text: But I certify you , brethren , that the gospel which was preached of me is not after man .
text2: Ta ishanttoo , taani intteyyo yootido wonggeliyaa mishiraachchoi asappe gidennaagaa intteyyo yootais .

text: For I neither received it of man , neither was I taught it , but by the revelation of Jesus Christ .
text2: Aissi giikko , taassi Yesuus Kiristtoosi qonccissiisippe attin , taani wonggeliyaa asappe ekkabeikke ; asinne tana tamaarissibeenna .

text: For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews ' religion , how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of God , and wasted it :
text2: Kase taani Aihuda ammanuwan de7iyo wode , waana de7idaakko , intte siyideta ; taani Xoossaa woosa keettaa qareti bainnan yedettaasinne xaissanau baaxetaas .

text: And profited in the Jews ' religion above many my equals in mine own nation , being more exceedingly zealous of the traditions of my fathers .
text2: Ta wode de7ida ta dabbotuppe darota Aihuda ammanuwaa higgiyaa naagiyoogan aadhdhais ; nu aawatu wogaa ooppenne aadhdhada siiqaas .

text: But when it pleased God , who separated me from my mother ' s womb , and called me by his grace ,
text2: SHin Xoossai ba aaro kehatettan , taani biron ta aayee uluwan de7ishin , baayyo oottanau tana xeesiis ; abaa yootiya wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa Aihuda gidenna asaayyo taani yootana mala , Xoossai ba Na7aa tau qonccissanau koyido wode , zorettanau ookkonne babeikke .

text: Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles before me ; but I went into Arabia , and returned again unto Damascus .
text2: Woikko taappe kase Yesuusi kiittidoogeetuura gaittanau Yerusalaame babeikke ; shin taani sohuwaara Araba giyo biittaa baas . Hegaappe Damasqqo giyo katamaa simmaas .

text: Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter , and abode with him fifteen days .
text2: Heezzu laittappe guyyiyan , PHeexiroosaara gaittanau Yerusalaame baada , aara tammanne ichchashu gallassaa uttaas .

text: But other of the apostles saw I none , save James the Lord ' s brother .
text2: SHin Yesuusi kiittidoogeetuppe Godaa ishaa Yaaqoobappe attin , haratuura gaittabeikke .

text: Now the things which I write unto you , behold , before God , I lie not .
text2: Taani intteyyo xaafiyoogan worddoi baawa ; taani intteyyo wordduwaa odennaagau Xoossai markka !

text: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia ;
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Sooriyaa giyo biittaanne Kilqqiyaa giyo biittaa baas .

text: And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were in Christ :
text2: Yihudan de7iya woosa keettatun he wode uttiya ammaniya asati tanaara meeze gidokkona .

text: But they had heard only , That he which persecuted us in times past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed .
text2: SHin hara asai , “ Nuna yedetti yuuyiya bitanee hagaappe kase i xaissanau koyiyo ammanuwaabaa ha77i yootees ” yaagiyoogaa eti siyidosona .

text: And they glorified God in me .
text2: Siyidi taban Xoossaa galatidosona .

text: Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with Barnabas , and took Titus with me also .
text2: Hegaappe simmada taani tammanne oiddu laittaappe guyyiyan , Barnnaabaasaara naa77anttuwaa Yerusalaame baidda , Tiitakka tanaara ekkada baas .

text: And I went up by revelation , and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles , but privately to them which were of reputation , lest by any means I should run , or had run , in vain .
text2: Xoossai tau ajjuutan qonccissido gishshau baas ; baada taani ha77i oottiyo oosoi woikko kase oottidoogee mela attenna mala , woosa keettaa kaalettiyaageeta dumma shiishshada , Aihuda gidenna asaayyo taani yootiyo wonggeliyaa mishiraachchoi ai malakko etassi yootaas .

text: But neither Titus , who was with me , being a Greek , was compelled to be circumcised :
text2: SHin harai atto tanaara de7iya Tiita i Giriike biitta asa gidishin , qaxxaretto giidi godatibookkona .

text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in , who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus , that they might bring us into bondage :
text2: Gidinkka , wordduwaa nuuyyo ishantta milatidi yiidi , nunaara walahettida daro asati a qaxxaranau koyidosona . He asati Kiristtoos Yesuusan nuuyyo de7iya nuuni koyidoogaadan hanana danddayiyo sheniyaa xomoosanau , wuuqettidi nu giddo gelidosona . Gelidi nuna aille oottanau koyidosona .

text: To whom we gave place by subjection , no , not for an hour ; that the truth of the gospel might continue with you .
text2: SHin wonggeliyaa tumatettai inttenaara minnidi de7ana mala , nuuni harai atto issi saatiyaukka etayyo haarettibookko .

text: But of these who seemed to be somewhat , ( whatsoever they were , it maketh no matter to me : God accepteth no man ' s person : ) for they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to me :
text2: SHin halaqa milatiyaageeti taayyo ainne ooratta qofa immibookkona ; hagaa aissi giyaanaa giikko , hagaappe kase eti oona gidinkka tana metiyaabaa gidenna ; Xoossai asa som77o xeellidi pirddenna .

text: But contrariwise , when they saw that the gospel of the uncircumcision was committed unto me , as the gospel of the circumcision was unto Peter ;
text2: SHin guyyeppe Xoossai PHeexiroosassi , Aihudatuyyo wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiyo hadaraa immidoogaadan , taukka Aihuda gidenna asaayyo wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiyo hadaraa immidoogaa eti be7idosona .

text: ( For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision , the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles : )
text2: Aissi giikko , PHeexiroosi Aihudatuyyo Yesuusi kiittidoogaa gididoogaadan , taanikka Xoossaa wolqqan Aihuda gidenna asaayyo Yesuusi kiittidoogaa gidaas .

text: And when James , Cephas , and John , who seemed to be pillars , perceived the grace that was given unto me , they gave to me and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship ; that we should go unto the heathen , and they unto the circumcision .
text2: Qassi kaalettiyaageeta milati beettiyaageeti , Yaaqoobi , PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi , taayyo imettida aaro kehatettaa eridi , tananne Barnnaabaasa nu kushiyaa oiqqidi sarotidosona . Taaninne Barnnaabaasi Aihuda gidenna asaa giddon oottanaadan , qassi eti Aihudatu giddon oottanaadan qachchidi denddida .

text: Only they would that we should remember the poor ; the same which I also was forward to do .
text2: Eti nuna kaseesappekka taani oottanau qoppaidda de7iyo hiyyeesata qoppanaagaa xalaalaa hassayissidosona .

text: But when Peter was come to Antioch , I withstood him to the face , because he was to be blamed .
text2: SHin PHeexiroosi Anxxookiyaa giyo katamaa yiido wode , i moorido gishshau , qoncciyan taani a , “ Neeni mooranchcha ” yaagaas .

text: For before that certain came from James , he did eat with the Gentiles : but when they were come , he withdrew and separated himself , fearing them which were of the circumcision .
text2: Aissi giikko , Yaaqooba matappe kiitettida amarida asai yaanaappe kase Aihuda gidenna asatuura qumaa mees ; shin eti yiidoogaappe guyyiyan , Aihuda gidennaageeta qaxxaranau koyiyaageetuyyo yayyido gishshau , ba kushiyaa guyye ekkidi , Aihuda gidennaageetuppe shaahettiis .

text: And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him ; insomuch that Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation .
text2: Qassi hinkko ammanida Aihudati PHeexiroosaara yashshaa doommidosona ; harai atto barnnaabaasikka etaara yashshanchcha gidiis .

text: But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the truth of the gospel , I said unto Peter before them all , If thou , being a Jew , livest after the manner of Gentiles , and not as do the Jews , why compellest thou the Gentiles to live as do the Jews ?
text2: SHin eti wonggeliyaa tumatettaadan , suure hemettennaagaa be7ada , PHeexiroosa he ubba asaa sinttan , “ Neeni Aihuda gidaidda , Aihudatudan gidennan Aihuda gidennaageetudan de7aasa ; shin yaatin , waatada Aihuda gidennaageeta , ' Aihudatudan de7ite ' yaagada godatai ? ” yaagaas .

text: We who are Jews by nature , and not sinners of the Gentiles ,
text2: Nuuni yeletan Aihuda ; nagaranchcha gidida Aihuda gidenna asata gidokko .

text: Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law , but by the faith of Jesus Christ , even we have believed in Jesus Christ , that we might be justified by the faith of Christ , and not by the works of the law : for by the works of the law shall no flesh be justified .
text2: Yaaninkka , asi Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammanidi xillanaappe attin , higgiyaa naagiyoogan xillennaagaa erida ; ashuwaa maayida asai ubbai higgiyaa naagiyoogan xillenna gishshau , nuuni nu huuphenkka higgiyaa naagiyoogan gidennan , Kiristtoosan ammanidi xillana mala , Kiristtoosi Yesuusan ammanida .

text: But if , while we seek to be justified by Christ , we ourselves also are found sinners , is therefore Christ the minister of sin ? God forbid .
text2: SHin nuuni Kiristtoosan xillanau koyiyaageeta gidiiddi , nu huuphen nagaranchcha gidi beettikko , yaatin Kiristtoosi nagaraa tamaarissiyaagee ? Hegee mulekka worddo !

text: For if I build again the things which I destroyed , I make myself a transgressor .
text2: Aissi giikko , issitookka qolarggidoogaa taani zaarettada keexxiyaagaa gidikko , taani ta huuphen higgiyaa menttiyaagaa gidiyoogaa erissais .

text: For I through the law am dead to the law , that I might live unto God .
text2: Taani Xoossaayyo paxa de7ana mala , higgiyaa baggaara higgiyaayyo haiqqaas .

text: I am crucified with Christ : nevertheless I live ; yet not I , but Christ liveth in me : and the life which I now live in the flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God , who loved me , and gave himself for me .
text2: Taani Kiristtoosaara a masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettada kaqettaas ; simmi , ha77i paxa de7iyaagee tana gidikke . SHin Kiristtoosi ta giddon de7ees ; taani ha77i de7iyo de7oi , tana siiqidi , ta gishshau , ba huuphiyaa immida Xoossaa Na7an de7iya ammanuwaana .

text: I do not frustrate the grace of God : for if righteousness come by the law , then Christ is dead in vain .
text2: Taani Xoossaa aaro kehatettaa ixxikke ; asai higgiyaa baggaara xillotetta demmiyaabaa gidikko , yaatin Kiristtoosi coo mela haiqqiis yaagiyoogaa .

text: O foolish Galatians , who hath bewitched you , that ye should not obey the truth , before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been evidently set forth , crucified among you ?
text2: Akeeki bainna Galaatiyaa asatoo , intte aifiyaa sinttan Kiristtoosi masqqaliyaa bollan misimaariyan xishettidi kaqettido misilee qonccidi beettees . Yaatin , tumau intte azazettenna mala , inttena bitidai oonee ?

text: This only would I learn of you , Received ye the Spirit by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Ane taayyo ha issi yohee xalaaliyo yootite : Xoossaa Ayyaanaa , higgee giyoogaa naagidi ekkidetiiyye woikko ammanuwan siyidi ekkidetii ?

text: Are ye so foolish ? having begun in the Spirit , are ye now made perfect by the flesh ?
text2: Intte hegaa keena eeyyee ? Xoossaa Ayyaanan doommidi , ha77i intte wolqqan poleetii ?

text: Have ye suffered so many things in vain ? if it be yet in vain .
text2: Intte daafura ubbau ainne go77i baawee ? Tumaappe go77ai de7ees .

text: He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit , and worketh miracles among you , doeth he it by the works of the law , or by the hearing of faith ?
text2: Yaatin , Xoossai intteyyo Geeshsha Ayyaanaa immiyoogeenne intte giddon malaataa oottiyoogee , higgee giyoogaa intte oottido gishshataasseeyye ? Woikko wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa siyidi , intte ammanido gishshataassee ?

text: Even as Abraham believed God , and it was accounted to him for righteousness .
text2: Hegaadankka , Abrahaami Xoossaa ammanido gishshau , Xoossai hegaa ayyo xillotettan qoodiis .

text: Know ye therefore that they which are of faith , the same are the children of Abraham .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ammaniyaageeti Abrahaama zare gidiyoogaa erite .

text: And the scripture , foreseeing that God would justify the heathen through faith , preached before the gospel unto Abraham , saying , In thee shall all nations be blessed .
text2: Xoossai Aihuda gidenna asaa ammanuwan xillissanaagaa Xoossaa maxaafai kaseti be7idi , “ Ha sa7an de7iya asai ubbai nenan anjjettana ” yaagidi , wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa Abrahaamayyo kasetidi yootiis .

text: So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful Abraham .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Abrahaami ammanidi anjjettidoogaadan , ammaniyaageeti Abrahaamaara anjjettana .

text: For as many as are of the works of the law are under the curse : for it is written , Cursed is every one that continueth not in all things which are written in the book of the law to do them .
text2: Higgiyaa oosuwan ammanettidi de7iyaageeti ubbai qanggettaa giddon de7oosona ; aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Higgiyaa maxaafan xaafettida ubbaban de7ennaageenne polennaagee ooninne qanggettidaagaa ” yaagees .

text: But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God , it is evident : for , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Xilloi ammanuwan de7ana ” giyo gishshau , ooninne Xoossaa sinttan higgiyaa naagiyoogan xillennaagee erettidaagaa .

text: And the law is not of faith : but , The man that doeth them shall live in them .
text2: Higgee ammanuwan zemppenna ; shin Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Higgee giyoogaa poliyaagee an paxa de7ana ” yaagees .

text: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law , being made a curse for us : for it is written , Cursed is every one that hangeth on a tree :
text2: Xoossaa maxaafan , “ Mitta bolli kaqetti haiqqiya ooninne qanggettidaagaa ” geetetti xaafettido gishshau , Kiristtoosi nu gishshau qanggettidaagaa gididi , nuna higgiyaa qanggettaappe woziis .

text: That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith .
text2: Kiristtoosi hegaa aissi oottidee giikko , Xoossai immana giido Geeshsha Ayyaanaa nuuni ammanuwan ekkanaadaaninne Abrahaama anjjoi ba baggaara Aihuda gidenna asaa gakkana mala giidi oottiis .

text: Brethren , I speak after the manner of men ; Though it be but a man ' s covenant , yet if it be confirmed , no man disannulleth , or addeth thereto .
text2: Ta ishanttoo , taani asi giyoogaadan intteyyo gais ; harai atto naa77u asati issi yoho haasayidi , maachchaa wottoogaappe hini baggan , ooninne he maachchaa birshshanau woikko harabaa he maachchaa bolli gujjanau danddayenna .

text: Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made . He saith not , And to seeds , as of many ; but as of one , And to thy seed , which is Christ .
text2: Abrahaaminne a zerettati Xoossai sinttappe immana giidi haasayidoogaa siyidosona . Xoossaa maxaafai daro asaayyo haasayiyoogaadan , “ Ne zerettatuyyo ” geenna ; woigii giikko , “ Ne zerettaayyo ” yaagees . Hegeenne , issi asa xalla gees ; ikka Kiristtoosa .

text: And this I say , that the covenant , that was confirmed before of God in Christ , the law , which was four hundred and thirty years after , cannot disannul , that it should make the promise of none effect .
text2: Taani giyoogee hagaa ; Xoossai maachchaa wottidi , he maachchaa taani naagana yaagiis . Oiddu xeetanne hasttamu laittaappe guyyiyan yiida higgee Xoossai wottido maachchaa xaissanaunne sinttappe immana giidi haasayidoogaa digganau danddayenna .

text: For if the inheritance be of the law , it is no more of promise : but God gave it to Abraham by promise .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai immiyo laatai higgiyan beettiyaagaa gidikko , yaatin Xoossai sinttappe immana giidi , haasayidoogaana gidenna giyoogaa ; shin Xoossai immana giidi haasayidoogan laataa Abrahaamayyo immiis .

text: Wherefore then serveth the law ? It was added because of transgressions , till the seed should come to whom the promise was made ; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a mediator .
text2: Yaatin , higgee aissi de7ii ? Higgee mooro ooso gidiyaabai aibakko bessanau Xoossai immana giidi haasayido Abrahaama zaree yaana gakkanaashin gujettiis ; kiitanchchaa baggaara issi gaannatiyaagan imettiis .

text: Now a mediator is not a mediator of one , but God is one .
text2: Gaannai issi uraa xalaalaassa gidenna ; shin Xoossai issuwaa .

text: Is the law then against the promises of God ? God forbid : for if there had been a law given which could have given life , verily righteousness should have been by the law .
text2: Yaatin , Xoossai sinttappe immana giidi haasayidoogaa , issi higgee , “ Hanenna ” yaagii ? Akkai ! Mulekka geenna . Aissi giikko , higgee asaayyo de7uwaa immanau danddayiyaabaa gidikko , xillotettaikka tumu higgiyaappe beettees giyoogaa .

text: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin , that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe .
text2: SHin Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammanin , Xoossai sinttappe immana giidi haasayidoogee , ammaniyaageetuyyo imettana mala , asai ubbai nagaraassi haarettidi de7iyoogaa , Xoossaa maxaafai yootees .

text: But before faith came , we were kept under the law , shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed .
text2: SHin ammanoi yaanaappe kase , sinttappe qonccana ammanuwaayyo higgee nuna qashettida asaadan gorddi wottiis .

text: Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto Christ , that we might be justified by faith .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni ammanuwan xillana mala , Kiristtoosi yaana gakkanaassi higgee nuna naagiyaagaa gidiis .

text: But after that faith is come , we are no longer under a schoolmaster .
text2: SHin ha77i simmi ammanoi yiido gishshau , higgee hagaappe sinttau nuna naagiyaagaa gidenna .

text: For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus .
text2: Intte ubbai ammanuwaa baggaara Kiristtoos Yesuusan Xoossaa naata .

text: For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put on Christ .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte Kiristtoosaara issuwaa gidana mala xammaqettida ubbati Kiristtoosa maayideta .

text: There is neither Jew nor Greek , there is neither bond nor free , there is neither male nor female : for ye are all one in Christ Jesus .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Aihuda asaa giddooninne Giriike asaa giddon dummatetti baawa ; aille woi goqa giddon dummatetti baawa ; attumaasa woi maccaasa giddon dummatetti baawa . Aissi giikko , intte ubbaikka Kiristtoos Yesuusan issi asa .

text: And if ye be Christ ' s , then are ye Abraham ' s seed , and heirs according to the promise .
text2: Intte Kiristtoosabaa gidikko , simmi intte Abrahaama zare ; qassi Xoossai sinttappe immana giidi haasayidoogaa laattiyaageeta .

text: Now I say , That the heir , as long as he is a child , differeth nothing from a servant , though he be lord of all ;
text2: SHin akeekite ; ba aawaabaa laattiya na7ai naatettan de7iiddi , de7iyaabaa ubbau goda gidikkokka , ashkkaratuppe dummatiyoosi baawa .

text: But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of the father .
text2: SHin ba aawai giido wodee wurana gakkanaashin , a hadaraa ekkidaageetu kushiyaaninne a miishshaa naagiyaageetu kushiyan de7ees .

text: Even so we , when we were children , were in bondage under the elements of the world :
text2: Hegaadan nuunikka qassi naatettan de7iyo wode , ha sa7aa haariya ayyaanatussi ailletida .

text: But when the fulness of the time was come , God sent forth his Son , made of a woman , made under the law ,
text2: SHin wodiyaa wurssettai gakkido wode , Xoossai maccaasi yelidoogaa , higgiyaa garssan yelettidaagaa , ba na7aa kiittiis .

text: To redeem them that were under the law , that we might receive the adoption of sons .
text2: Aissi kiittidee giikko , higgiyan haarettidi de7iyaageeta wozanaunne nuna ba naata oottanau kiittiis .

text: And because ye are sons , God hath sent forth the Spirit of his Son into your hearts , crying , Abba , Father .
text2: Xoossai intte a naata gidiyo gishshau , “ Abbaa , ta Aawau ” giidi waassiya ba Na7aa Ayyaanaa , nu wozanaa giddo kiittiis .

text: Wherefore thou art no more a servant , but a son ; and if a son , then an heir of God through Christ .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , hagaappe sinttan neeni Xoossaa na7a gidiyoogaappe attin , aille gidakka ; qassi neeni a na7a gidikko , Kiristtoosa baggaara Xoossaabaa laattiyaagaa .

text: Howbeit then , when ye knew not God , ye did service unto them which by nature are no gods .
text2: SHin intte hagaappe kasiyan Xoossaa erennan de7iiddi , Xoossa gidennaageetuyyo aille gididi haarettideta .

text: But now , after that ye have known God , or rather are known of God , how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements , whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage ?
text2: SHin ha77i Xoossaa eridi , ubbakka Xoossan erettiichchidi , laafanne qassi karettida ha ayyaanatukko waanidi simmeetii ? Wodhdhi eqqidi , aille gididi , naa77anttuwaa etayyo haarettanau koyeetii ?

text: Ye observe days , and months , and times , and years .
text2: Gallassaa , aginaa , wodiyaanne laittaa intte loitti naageeta .

text: I am afraid of you , lest I have bestowed upon you labour in vain .
text2: Tana inttebai yashshees ; taani intteyyo coo mela daafuridanaashsha ?

text: Brethren , I beseech you , be as I am ; for I am as ye are : ye have not injured me at all .
text2: Ta ishanttoo , taani inttenadan hanido gishshau , “ Inttekka tanadan hanite ” gaada , inttena woossais ; intte tana ainne naaqqibeekketa .

text: Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the gospel unto you at the first .
text2: Taani koiro intteyyo wonggeliyaa yootidoogee tana harggissishiina gidiyoogaa intte ereeta .

text: And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not , nor rejected ; but received me as an angel of God , even as Christ Jesus .
text2: Taayyo payyatettai guuxxidi , intteyyo paace gidinkka , tana karibeekketa ; shenetinnebeekketa . Hegaa gishshaa ubba tana Xoossaa kiitanchchaa mokkiyoogaadan , woikko Kiristtoosi Yesuusa mokkiyoogaadan mokkideta .

text: Where is then the blessedness ye spake of ? for I bear you record , that , if it had been possible , ye would have plucked out your own eyes , and have given them to me .
text2: Yaatin , hekko intte ufaittiyoogee beettenna ! Tana gidikko , intteyyo danddayettiyaabaa gidin , taayyo intte intte aifiyaa shoddi immiyaakkonne ixxennaagaa markkattais .

text: Am I therefore become your enemy , because I tell you the truth ?
text2: Yaanin taani intteyyo tumaa yootiyo gishshau , intte morkke gidiyaanaa ?

text: They zealously affect you , but not well ; yea , they would exclude you , that ye might affect them .
text2: Hara asati intteyyo qarettiyaabaa milatoosona ; shin eta qofai lo77enna ; aissi giikko , intte etayyo qarettana mala , taappe inttena shaakkanau koyoosona .

text: But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good thing , and not only when I am present with you .
text2: SHin taani intte matan de7iyo wode xalaalan gidennan , ubba wodekka lo77oban intte koyettiyaageeta gidikko lo77o .

text: My little children , of whom I travail in birth again until Christ be formed in you ,
text2: Ta siiqo naatoo , Kiristtoosa meretai inttenan beettana gakkanaashin , maccaasiyo maaretai tuggayiyoogaa keenaa , taani intte gishshau sahettais .

text: I desire to be present with you now , and to change my voice ; for I stand in doubt of you .
text2: SHin taani intteyyo hirggiyo gishshau , ha77i intte mati baada inttenaara doonan haasayiyaakko , daro dosais .

text: Tell me , ye that desire to be under the law , do ye not hear the law ?
text2: Higgiyan haarettidi de7anau koyiyaageetoo , higgee giyoogaa siyekketii ? Ane taayyo yootite .

text: For it is written , that Abraham had two sons , the one by a bondmaid , the other by a freewoman .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Abrahaamayyo ailleeppenne goqeeppe yelettida naa77u naati de7oosona ” yaagees .

text: But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh ; but he of the freewoman was by promise .
text2: SHin aillee na7ai asi na7a yeliyo maaraadankka yelettiis ; qassi goqee na7ai , Xoossai sinttappe immana giidi haasayidoogan yelettiis .

text: Which things are an allegory : for these are the two covenants ; the one from the mount Sinai , which gendereth to bondage , which is Agar .
text2: Ha maccaasati naa77u maachcha gidiyo gishshau , hagee leemiso gidana danddayees . Etappe issinniyaa , Siinaa Deriyaappe yiidaara , ba naata ailletettaayyo yelaasu ; akka Aggaaro .

text: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia , and answereth to Jerusalem which now is , and is in bondage with her children .
text2: Ha Aggaara Araba giyo biittan de7iya Siinaa Deriyan leemisettausu ; qassikka ha77i de7iya Yerusalaamen leemisettausu ; aissi giikko , Yerusalaame katamai ba giddon de7iya asa ubbaara ailletettan de7ees .

text: But Jerusalem which is above is free , which is the mother of us all .
text2: SHin saluwan de7iya Yerusalaama ailletettan de7ukku ; a nuussi aayyiyo .

text: For it is written , Rejoice , thou barren that bearest not ; break forth and cry , thou that travailest not : for the desolate hath many more children than she which hath an husband .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai yaagees ; “ Bii , yelabeenna mainee , ufaitta ; maareti oiqqi erennaaree , ne qaalaa xoqqu oottada ilila ! Aissi giikko , ba azinaara de7iya maccaaseeppe , barkka de7iya maccaaseeyyo daro naati de7ana ” yaagees .

text: Now we , brethren , as Isaac was , are the children of promise .
text2: Ta ishanttoo , nuunikka Yisaaqadan , Xoossai sinttappe immana giido naata .

text: But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the Spirit , even so it is now .
text2: SHin he wode asa maaraadan yelettidaagee , Xoossaa Ayyaanai giidoogaadan yelettidaagaa yedetti yuuyidoogaadan , ha77ikka hegaa mala .

text: Nevertheless what saith the scripture ? Cast out the bondwoman and her son : for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir with the son of the freewoman .
text2: SHin Xoossaa maxaafai woigii ? “ Aillee na7ai goqee na7aara issippe laattenna gishshau , ailliyo i na7aara gattada kessa yedda ” yaagees .

text: So then , brethren , we are not children of the bondwoman , but of the free .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ta ishanttoo , nuuni goqee naata gidiyoogaappe attin , aillee naata gidokko .

text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free , and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage .
text2: Nuuni ailletetti bainnan , de7ana mala , Kiristtoosi nuna ailletettaappe kessiis ; simmi minnidi eqqite ; naa77anttuwaa ailletettaa qambbaran geloppite .

text: Behold , I Paul say unto you , that if ye be circumcised , Christ shall profit you nothing .
text2: Siyite , taani PHauloosi , inttena yaagais ; intte qaxxarettiyaabaa gidikko , Kiristtoosi inttena ainne go77enna .

text: For I testify again to every man that is circumcised , that he is a debtor to do the whole law .
text2: Qaxxarettiya ubbati higgee giyoogaa ubbaa polidi naaganau bessiyoogaa gujjada hassayissais .

text: Christ is become of no effect unto you , whosoever of you are justified by the law ; ye are fallen from grace .
text2: Higgiyaa naagidi xillanau koyiyaageetoo , Kiristtoosappe shaahettideta ; Xoossaa aaro kehatettaappekka kunddideta .

text: For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness by faith .
text2: Nuna gidikko , nuuni Xoossaa Ayyaanaa baggaara ammanuwan xillanau ufaissan naagoos .

text: For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision ; but faith which worketh by love .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni Kiristtoosi Yesuusaara issippe de7in , siiquwan oottiya ammanuwaappe attin , qaxxarettinkka , qaxxarettennan agginkka nuna ainne go77enna .

text: Ye did run well ; who did hinder you that ye should not obey the truth ?
text2: Kase lo77o ootteeta ; shin tumatettaayyo intte azazettenna mala , oonee inttena diggidai ?

text: This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you .
text2: Ha cimoi inttena xeesida Xoossaappe yibeenna .

text: A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump .
text2: Asai giyoogaadan , guutta irshshoi munaqaa ubbaa denttees .

text: I have confidence in you through the Lord , that ye will be none otherwise minded : but he that troubleth you shall bear his judgment , whosoever he be .
text2: Intte harabaa qoppennaagaa taani Xoossan ammanettais ; shin inttena waissiya urai oona gidikkonne , Xoossaappe ba pirddaa ekkana .

text: And I , brethren , if I yet preach circumcision , why do I yet suffer persecution ? then is the offence of the cross ceased .
text2: SHin ta ishanttoo , taani hanno gakkanau qaxxarai koshshiyoogaa yootiyaabaa gidikko , tana aissi yedettiyoonaa ? Hegee tuma gidiyaakko , taani Kiristtoosa masqqaliyaabaa tamaarissin ainne waissiyaabi baawa .

text: I would they were even cut off which trouble you .
text2: Inttena waissiyaageeti banttana banttarkka mureessorkkonaashsha !

text: For , brethren , ye have been called unto liberty ; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh , but by love serve one another .
text2: Inttena gidikko , ta ishanttoo , ailletettaappe kiyanau xeesettideta . Gidinkka ailletettaappe intte kiyidoogan , intte asatettaa amoi inttena haaroppo . Hegaa gishshaa siiquwan issoi issuwaayyo haarettite .

text: For all the law is fulfilled in one word , even in this ; Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself .
text2: Aissi giikko , higge ubbai issi haasayan qashettees ; ikka , “ Ne shooruwaa ne huuphedan siiqa ” yaagiyaagaa .

text: But if ye bite and devour one another , take heed that ye be not consumed one of another .
text2: SHin intte issoi issuwaara saxettiyaabaanne meetettiyaabaa gidikko , intte intte giddon wurenna mala naagettite .

text: This I say then , Walk in the Spirit , and ye shall not fulful the lust of the flesh .
text2: SHin siyite ; Xoossaa Ayyaanai inttena kaalettiyaabaa gidikko , intte asatettaa amuwaa mulekka polekketa .
