text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit , and the Spirit against the flesh : and these are contrary the one to the other : so that ye cannot do the things that ye would .
text2: Aissi giikko , nu asatettai amottiyoobaa Geeshsha Ayyaanai ixxees ; qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanai amottiyoobaa nu asatettai ixxees ; hageeti issoi issuwaara ixettoosona . Hegaa gishshau , intte dosiyoobaa oottanau danddayekketa .

text: But if ye be led of the Spirit , ye are not under the law .
text2: SHin Xoossaa Ayyaanai inttena kaalettiyaabaa gidikko , higgee inttena haarenna .

text: Now the works of the flesh are manifest , which are these ; Adultery , fornication , uncleanness , lasciviousness ,
text2: Asatettaa oosoi erettidaagaa ; ikka aibee giikko , shaaramuxiyoogaa , tunatettaa , yeellaa xayiyoogaa ,

text: Idolatry , witchcraft , hatred , variance , emulations , wrath , strife , seditions , heresies ,
text2: Eeqau goinniyoogaa , bitiyoogaa , morkketettaa , palamaa , qanaatiyoogaa , hanqquwaa , bana xoqqissiyoogaa , ooyettiyoogaa , issoi issuwaappe shaahettiyoogaa ,

text: Envyings , murders , drunkenness , revellings , and such like : of the which I tell you before , as I have also told you in time past , that they which do such things shall not inherit the kingdom of God .
text2: miqqainniyoogaa , woriyoogaa , mattottiyoogaa , yettanchcha kiyiyoogaanne hageeta milatiyaageeta . Kasekka taani intteyyo yootidoogaadan , hageeta milatiyaageeta oottiyaageeti Xoossaa kawotettaa laattokkona .

text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love , joy , peace , longsuffering , gentleness , goodness , faith ,
text2: SHin Geeshsha Ayyaanaa aifee , siiquwaa , ufaissaa , sarotettaa , danddayaa , kehatettaa , lo77otettaa , ammanuwaa ,

text: Meekness , temperance : against such there is no law .
text2: ashkketettaa , ba huuphiyaa naagiyoogaa . Hageeta milatiyaageeta diggiya higgee baawa .

text: And they that are Christ ' s have crucified the flesh with the affections and lusts .
text2: Kiristtoos Yesuusabaa gidiyaageeti bantta asatettaa a iita qofaaranne a amuwaara issippe masqqaliyaa bollan misimaariyan xishidi kaqqidosona .

text: If we live in the Spirit , let us also walk in the Spirit .
text2: Nuuni Geeshsha Ayyaanan de7ikko , nuna qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanai kaaletto .

text: Let us not be desirous of vain glory , provoking one another , envying one another .
text2: Ane otorettiyoogaa , woikko issoi issuwaa yiilloyiyoogaa , woikko issoi issuwaa qanaatiyoogaa aggoos .

text: Brethren , if a man be overtaken in a fault , ye which are spiritual , restore such an one in the spirit of meekness ; considering thyself , lest thou also be tempted .
text2: Ta ishanttoo , intte Ayyaanan de7iyaageeti issi urai ai mooro oottidi , beettikkonne , ashkketetta ayyaanan a suurissite ; qassi intte paacettenna mala , intte huuphiyaa naagite .

text: Bear ye one another ' s burdens , and so fulfil the law of Christ .
text2: Issoi issuwaa toohuwaa tookkite ; hegaa oottiyoogan Kiristtoosa higgiyau azazetteeta .

text: For if a man think himself to be something , when he is nothing , he deceiveth himself .
text2: Aissi giikko , issi urai ainne hanennan de7iiddi , aibakko i hanidobaa ayyo milatikko , ba huuphiyaa cimmees .

text: But let every man prove his own work , and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone , and not in another .
text2: SHin asai ubbai huuphiyan huuphiyan ba oosuwaa paacco ; hegaappe guyyiyan , hara asaagaara giigissennan , ba huuphe ooso xalaalan ceeqettiyoobaa demmana .

text: For every man shall bear his own burden .
text2: Aissi giikko , asai ubbai huuphiyan huuphiyan ba toohuwaa tookkanau bessees .

text: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things .
text2: SHin Xoossaa qaalaa tamaariyaagee baayyo de7iya lo77obaa ubbaa bana tamaarissiyaagaara shaakko .

text: Be not deceived ; God is not mocked : for whatsoever a man soweth , that shall he also reap .
text2: Inttena intterkka cimmoppite . Ooninne Xoossaa bolli qilliiccanau danddayenna ; aissi giikko , asi ba zeriyoogaa zaarettidi cakkana .

text: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption ; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting .
text2: Ba asatettaa amuwan zeriyaabaa gidikko , asatettaa amuwaappe haiquwaa cakkana . SHin Ayyaanan zeriyaabaa gidikko , Ayyaanaappe merinaa de7uwaa cakkana .

text: And let us not be weary in well doing : for in due season we shall reap , if we faint not .
text2: Ane lo77o oosuwaa oottanau azalliyoogaa aggoos . Aissi giikko , nuuni azallennan aggikko , cakkiyo wodee sinttappe yaana .

text: As we have therefore opportunity , let us do good unto all men , especially unto them who are of the household of faith .
text2: Yaanikko ha oottanau nuuni danddayiyoorin , asa ubbau lo77obaa oottoos ; shin ubbaappe aattidi , nunaara ammanuwan de7iyaageetuyyo lo77obaa oottoos .

text: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand .
text2: Taani ta kushiyan , ai mala gita pitaletun , intteyyo xaafiyaakko be7ite .

text: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh , they constrain you to be circumcised ; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ .
text2: Asaa sinttan lo77idi beettanau koyiya ubbati , intte qaxxarettana mala koyoosona ; shin hegaa eti oottiyoogee banttayyo Kiristtoosa masqqaliyaa gishshau yedetettennan attana xalaalaassa .

text: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law ; but desire to have you circumcised , that they may glory in your flesh .
text2: Aissi giikko , eti intte qaxxarettidoogan ceeqettanau inttena qaxxarettona goosonappe attin , harai atto qaxxarettidaageetikka bantta huuphen higgiyaa naagokkona .

text: But God forbid that I should glory , save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ , by whom the world is crucified unto me , and I unto the world .
text2: SHin sa7ai taayyo kaqettin , taanikka sa7aayyo kaqettido Yesuus Kiristtoosa masqqaliyaappe attin , taani ceeqettiyoobi harabai taappe haakko .

text: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth anything , nor uncircumcision , but a new creature .
text2: Aissi giikko , Kiristtoos Yesuusan ooratta mereta gidiyoogee go77eesippe attin , qaxxarettinkka qaxxarettennan agginkka ainne go77enna .

text: And as many as walk according to this rule , peace be on them , and mercy , and upon the Israel of God .
text2: Ha wogan hemettiya ubbatu bollinne Xoossaa asa ubbaa bolli , sarotettainne maarotettai de7o .

text: From henceforth let no man trouble me : for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus .
text2: Taani Yesuusayyo masunxxido malaataa ta bollan tookkido gishshau , hagaappe sinttau issi asikka tana waissoppo .

text: Brethren , the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Ta ishanttoo , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aaro kehatettai inttenaara gido . Amin77i .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , to the saints which are at Ephesus , and to the faithful in Christ Jesus :
text2: Taani Xoossaa sheniyan Kiristtoos Yesuusi kiittido PHauloosi , Efisoonan de7iya geeshshatuyyo qassi Kiristtoos Yesuusau ammanettidi de7iyaageetuyyo ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafais .

text: Grace be to you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Xoossaa nu Aawaappenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe aaro kehatettainne sarotettai intteyyo gido .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , who hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ :
text2: Ayyaanaa anjjo ubban Kiristtoosa baggaara saluwaa sohuwan nuna anjjida Xoossaa , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Aawaa , nuuni galatoos .

text: According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of the world , that we should be holy and without blame before him in love :
text2: Nuuni a sinttan geeshshatanne pokkoi bainnaageeta gidana mala , Xoossai nuna sa7ai merettanaappe kase , Kiristtoosa baggaara ba siiquwan dooriis .

text: Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus Christ to himself , according to the good pleasure of his will ,
text2: Xoossai ba sheniyan ba dosidoogaadan , Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara nuna ba naata oottanau kasetidi qoppi wottiis .

text: To the praise of the glory of his grace , wherein he hath made us accepted in the beloved .
text2: Xoossai ba siiqiyo Na7aa baggaara nuuyyo coo immido aaro kehatettaa bonchchuwaa gishshau , nuuppe galataa ekkanau hegaa oottiis .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , the forgiveness of sins , according to the riches of his grace ;
text2: Nuuni Xoossaa aaro kehatettaa daruwaadan , Kiristtoosa sunttan wozettida ; hegan Xoossai nu nagaraa atto giis .

text: Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence ;
text2: Xoossai ba aadhdhida eratetta ubbaaninne ba wozanaa qofa ubban ba aaro kehatettaa nuuyyo darissidi immiis .

text: Having made known unto us the mystery of his will , according to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself :
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai ba qoppidoogaa oottiis ; qassi Kiristtoosa baggaara polanau qoppi wottido xuura yohuwaa nuna erissiis .

text: That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might gather together in one all things in Christ , both which are in heaven , and which are on earth ; even in him :
text2: Xoossai wodiyaa wurssettai gakkiyo wode polanau qoppido qofai Kiristtoosa waanna oottidi , saluwaaninne sa7an de7iya mereta ubbaa issippe aani shiishshanaagaa .

text: In whom also we have obtained an inheritance , being predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all things after the counsel of his own will :
text2: Ubbabai Xoossaa qofaadaaninne i giidoogaadan haniis ; Xoossai kasetidi qoppi wottidoogaadan , Kiristtoosa baggaara nuuni aageeta gidanaadan , nuna dooriis .

text: That we should be to the praise of his glory , who first trusted in Christ .
text2: Nuuni kasetidi , Kiristtoosa baggaara ekkana giidi ufaissan naagiyaageeti , Xoossaa bonchchuwaa galatoos .

text: In whom ye also trusted , after that ye heard the word of truth , the gospel of your salvation : in whom also after that ye believed , ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise ,
text2: Intteyyookka qassi hegaadan haniis ; tumu kiitaa , intteyyo atotettaa ehiida wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa , intte siyido wode Kiristtoosa ammanideta ; Xoossai intteyyo immana giido Geeshsha Ayyaanaa baggaara , intte abaa gidiyoogaa erissiya maatafaa intte bolli wottiis .

text: Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption of the purchased possession , unto the praise of his glory .
text2: Xoossai ba asau immana giidoogaa nuuni ekkana gakkanaassi , Geeshsha Ayyaanaa daannatuwaa oiqqida . Hegee qassi a bonchchuwau galata gidana .

text: Wherefore I also , after I heard of your faith in the Lord Jesus , and love unto all the saints ,
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Godaa Yesuusa intte ammaniyoogaanne geeshshata ubbaa intte siiqiyoogaa taani siyoosappe doommada ,

text: Cease not to give thanks for you , making mention of you in my prayers ;
text2: intteyyo Xoossaa galatiyoogaa aggabeikke ; Xoossaa woossaidda intteyyookka woossais .

text: That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of glory , may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the knowledge of him :
text2: Qassi Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Xoossai , bonchcho Aawai , Xoossaa intte eranaadan , inttena aadhdhida eranchcha oottiya qassi Xoossaa intteyyo qonccissiya Geeshsha Ayyaanaa intteyyo immanaadan , taani woossais .

text: The eyes of your understanding being enlightened ; that ye may know what is the hope of his calling , and what the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints ,
text2: Xoossai intte ekkana giidi , ufaissan naagi uttidoogaayyo inttena xeesidoogaanne i ba asau immana giyo anjjoi ai keena durekko intte eranaadan , Xoossai intte wozanaa dooyin , a poo7uwaa intte be7anaadan , taani Xoossaa woossais .

text: And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to usward who believe , according to the working of his mighty power ,
text2: Qassi a ammaniya nunan a wolqqai keehi oottees . Ha nunan de7iya wolqqainne haiquwaappe Kiristtoosa denttidi , saluwaa sohuwan Xoossaappe ushachcha baggaara utissida gita wolqqai issuwaa .

text: Far above all principality , and power , and might , and dominion , and every name that is named , not only in this world , but also in that which is to come :
text2: Kiristtoosi saluwaa sunttatuppe , godatettai de7iyoogeetuppe , wolqqaamatuppenne godatu ubbaappe bolla gididi haarees ; i ha sa7aa xalaalan gidennan , sinttappe yaana sa7ankka hara sunttatetta ubbaappe xoqqees .

text: And hath put all things under his feet , and gave him to be the head over all things to the church ,
text2: Xoossai ubbabaa Kiristtoosa tohuwaappe garssan haarissiis ; qassi Xoossai i ubbaban ubbaappe bollaara Goda gidanaadan , woosa keettaayyo a immiis .

text: Which is his body , the fulness of him that filleth all in all .
text2: Woosa keettai Kiristtoosa asatetta ; woosa keettai Kiristtoosi ubbasan ubbabaa kunttiyo a polo .

text: And you hath he quickened , who were dead in trespasses and sins ;
text2: Intte azazettennan ixxido gishshaunne intte nagaraa gishshau , kase wodiyan ayyaana haiquwaa haiqqideta .

text: Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this world , according to the prince of the power of the air , the spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience :
text2: He wode intte ha sa7aa iita ogiyaa hemettideta ; carkkuwaa giddon de7iya wolqqaama ayyaanatu halaqaayyo qassi Xoossaayyo azazettenna asaa ha77i haariya ayyaanaayyo azazettideta .

text: Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in the lusts of our flesh , fulfilling the desires of the flesh and of the mind ; and were by nature the children of wrath , even as others .
text2: Nuunikka qassi ubbai he asaa mala ; qassi nuuni nu meretettaa amuwaadan de7ida ; nu asatettainne nu wozanai koyidobaa oottida . Nuunikka haratuugaadan , nu meretan Xoossaa hanqquwaa ekkanau de7oos .

text: But God , who is rich in mercy , for his great love wherewith he loved us ,
text2: SHin Xoossaa maarotettai daro gidiyo gishshau , ba siiquwaa daruwaadan ,

text: Even when we were dead in sins , hath quickened us together with Christ , ( by grace ye are saved ; )
text2: Nuuni ayyo azazettennan ixxidi , harai atto ayyaanan haiqqidaageeta gidinkka , i Kiristtoosaara nuuyyo de7uwaa immiis . Xoossaa aaro kehatettan intte attideta .

text: And hath raised us up together , and made us sit together in heavenly places in Christ Jesus :
text2: Nuuni Kiristtoos Yesuusaara saluwaa sohuwan haaranaadan , Xoossai nuna aara issippe haiquwaappe denttiis .

text: That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus .
text2: I sinttappe yaana wodiyan , nuuyyo Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7iya kehatettan , ubbaappe aadhdhiya ba aaro kehatettaa gitatettaa bessanau hegaa oottiis .

text: For by grace are ye saved through faith ; and that not of yourselves : it is the gift of God :
text2: Aissi giikko , intte Xoossaa aaro kehatettan , ammanuwan attideta ; hagee Xoossaa imoppe attin , intte oosuwaana gidenna .

text: Not of works , lest any man should boast .
text2: Intte daafuran beettibeenna gishshau , intte ceeqettiyoobi aibinne baawa .

text: For we are his workmanship , created in Christ Jesus unto good works , which God hath before ordained that we should walk in them .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni Xoossaa mereta ; i nuuyyo kasetidi giigissi wottido lo77o oosuwaa nuuni oottanaadan , Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara nuna medhdhiis .

text: Wherefore remember , that ye being in time past Gentiles in the flesh , who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , inttenoo zariyan Aihuda gidenna asatoo , bantta asatettaa bolli kushiyan oosettidoogan , banttana qaxxarettidaageeta giya Aihudati , qaxxarettibeennaageeta giidi xeesiyoogeetoo , intte kase oonakko akeekite .

text: That at that time ye were without Christ , being aliens from the commonwealth of Israel , and strangers from the covenants of promise , having no hope , and without God in the world :
text2: He wode intte Kiristtoosappe shaahettideta ; imatta gididi , Israa7eela asaappe haakkidi de7ideta ; Xoossai ba asaayyo immana giidi maacido maachchaappe ainne demmibeekketa ; ha sa7aa bolli intte demmana giidi , ufaissan naagi uttidobaa demmennaaninne qassi Xoossi bainnan de7ideta .

text: But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made nigh by the blood of Christ .
text2: SHin intte kase haakkidi de7iyaageeti ha77i Kiristtoos Yesuusaara de7idi , Kiristtoosa haiquwan mataa shiiqideta .

text: For he is our peace , who hath made both one , and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us ;
text2: Aissi giikko , Kiristtoosi Aihuda asaanne Aihuda gidenna asaa timidi , nuuyyo sarotettaa ehiis . Eta naa77aa shaakkidi , morkke ootti wottida morkketettaa godaa ba asatettan qoqqofi yeggiis .

text: Having abolished in his flesh the enmity , even the law of commandments contained in ordinances ; for to make in himself of twain one new man , so making peace ;
text2: I ba huuphen ha naa77u zaretuppe issi ooratta asa medhdhidi sarotettaa wottanau , Aihuda asatu higgiyaa a azazotuuranne wogatuura issippe xaissiis .

text: And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the cross , having slain the enmity thereby :
text2: Kiristtoosi masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi haiqqido ba haiquwan morkketettaa xaissiis ; qassi masqqaliyaa baggaara naa77u zaretakka issi asa ootti sigettidi , Xoossaakko ekki ehiis .

text: And came and preached peace to you which were afar off , and to them that were nigh .
text2: Kiristtoosi yiidi , Xoossaappe haakkidi de7iya intteyyo Aihuda gidennaageetuyyoonne , a matan de7iya Aihudatuyyo ubbaayyo , wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa sarotettaa yootiis .

text: For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the Father .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni ubbai , Aihudatikka Aihuda gidennaageetikka , issi Geeshsha Ayyaanan Kiristtoosa baggaara Aawaa sintti shiiqanau danddayoos .

text: Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners , but fellowcitizens with the saints , and of the household of God ;
text2: Simmi intte Aihuda gidenna asati hagaappe sinttau allaga woi imatta gidekketa ; ha77i inttenne geeshshati issi biittaa asa ; qassi Xoossaayyo intte so asa .

text: And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and prophets , Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone ;
text2: Yesuusi kiittidoogeetinne hananabaa yootiyaageeti baasido baasuwaa bolli inttekka keexettideta ; godaa xaphuwaa minttiya waanna shuchchai Kiristtoos Yesuusa .

text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord :
text2: I keettaa ubbaa issippe shiishshi oiqqidi , Xoossaa baggaara geeshsha beeta maqidase gidana mala dichchees .

text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit .
text2: Intte qassi Xoossai ba Ayyaanan de7iyo keetta gidanau , haratu ubbaara issippe Kiristtoosan keexetteeta .

text: For this cause I Paul , the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you Gentiles ,
text2: Hegaa gishshau , inttenoo Aihuda gidenna asatoo , taani PHauloosi intte gishshau Kiristtoos Yesuusa qasho asa gididaagee , Xoossaa woossais .

text: If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which is given me to youward :
text2: Xoossai ba aaro kehatettan , taani inttena maaddanaadan , ha oosuwaa taayyo immidoogaa intte loitti siyideta .

text: How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery ; ( as I wrote afore in few words ,
text2: Xoossai ba xuura qofaa taayyo qonccissidi , tana erissiis ; erissin taani hegaa qanttan xaafaas .

text: Whereby , when ye read , ye may understand my knowledge in the mystery of Christ )
text2: Qassi taani xaafidoogaa intte nabbabiyo wode , Kiristtoosa xuuraa taani waata akeekidaakko eranau danddayeeta .

text: Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men , as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by the Spirit ;
text2: Beni wode asai he xuura yohuwaa siyibeenna ; shin Xoossai hegaa Yesuusi kiittido geeshshatuyyoonne hananabaa yootiyaageetuyyo , Geeshsha Ayyaanan ha77i qonccissiis .

text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs , and of the same body , and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel :
text2: Xuura yohoi hagaa ; Aihuda gidenna asai wonggeliyaa baggaara , Xoossaa anjjuwaa Aihudatuura issippe laattoosona ; eti issi asatettan shaahettennan de7oosona ; qassi Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara Xoossai immana giidoogaa Aihudatuura shaakkoosona .

text: Whereof I was made a minister , according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power .
text2: Xoossai ba oosuwaa wolqqaa baggaara tau immido aaro kehatettan taani ha wonggeliyau ashkkara gidaas .

text: Unto me , who am less than the least of all saints , is this grace given , that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ ;
text2: Taani geeshshatu ubbaa giddon laafiyaagaa gidikkokka , Aihuda gidenna asau zawai bainna Kiristtoosa duretettaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiyo ha qaadaa Xoossai taayyo immiis .

text: And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery , which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God , who created all things by Jesus Christ :
text2: Qassi taani hegan Xoossaa xuura qofaa asa ubbau qonccissa yootana ; ubbabaa medhdhida Xoossai ba xuura yohuwaa beni wode ubban gentti wottiis . Xoossai ha77i hegaa woosa keettaa baggaara saluwaa sohuwan de7iya halaqatuyyoonne godatettai de7iyoogeetuyyo zawai bainna ba aadhdhida eratettaa qonccissanau oottiis .

text: According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ Jesus our Lord :
text2: Xoossai hegaa nu Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara i polido ba merinaa qofaadan oottiis .

text: In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the faith of him .
text2: Nuuni Kiristtoosi Yesuusaara issippe gididi , a ammaniyo ammanuwan ammanettidi , ainne yayyennan Xoossaa sintti aadhdhanau danddayoos .

text: Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for you , which is your glory .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani intteban metootiyoogan intte hirggenna mala , inttena woossais ; aissi giikko , taani intte bonchchuwau metootais .

text: For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani saluwaaninne sa7an de7iya ammaniya keetta asai ubbai aani sunttettido Xoossaa sinttan gulbbatais .

text: That he would grant you , according to the riches of his glory , to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man ;
text2: Xoossai ba bonchchuwaa daruwaadan , ba Geeshsha Ayyaanan , intteyyo intte garssa asatettan intte minniyo wolqqaa immanaadaaninne , qassi ammanuwaa baggaara Kiristtoosi intte wozanaa ba keetta oottanaadan , taani Xoossaa woossais ; qassikka intte xaphuwaa yeddidi , tokettidi siiquwan minnanaadan , Xoossaa woossais .

text: May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth , and length , and depth , and height ;
text2: Qassi geeshshatu ubbaara Kiristtoosa siiqoi ai keena aahokko , adussakko , xoqqakkonne ciimmakko eriyo wolqqaa intte demmanaadan , taani Xoossaa woossais .

text: And to know the love of Christ , which passeth knowledge , that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God .
text2: Eratettaappe aadhdhiya Kiristtoosa siiquwaa intte eranaadaaninne qassi Xoossaabaa gidiya ubbaban intte poli kumanaadan , taani Xoossaa woossais .

text: Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all that we ask or think , according to the power that worketh in us ,
text2: Simmi nu giddon oottiya ba wolqqaa baggaara nuuni woossiyoobaa woi qoppiyoobaa ubbaappe keehi darissi oottanau danddayiya Xoossaayyo , woosa keettaaninne Kiristtoos Yesuusan ubba wode merinaappe merinaa gakkanaassi bonchchoi gido . Amin77i .

text: I therefore , the prisoner of the Lord , beseech you that ye walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called ,
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani Godaayyo oottiyo gishshau qashettidaagee Xoossai inttena xeesido xeessau bessiya de7uwaa intte de7anaadan , taani inttena woossais .

text: With all lowliness and meekness , with longsuffering , forbearing one another in love ;
text2: Ubba wode intte intte huuphiyaa kaushshiyaageeta , ashkketanne danddayanchchata gidite ; issoi issuwaa maaddiyoogan intte siiquwaa bessite .

text: Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of peace .
text2: Inttena issippe gatti qachchiya sarotettan , Geeshsha Ayyaanai intteyyo immiyo issippetettaa naaganau minnite .

text: There is one body , and one Spirit , even as ye are called in one hope of your calling ;
text2: Xoossai inttena xeesido ufaissai , intte demmana giidi naagi uttidoogee mexi issuwaa giyoogaadan , issi asatettainne issi Geeshsha Ayyaanai de7ees .

text: One Lord , one faith , one baptism ,
text2: Issi Godai , issi ammanoinne issi xinqqatee de7ees .

text: One God and Father of all , who is above all , and through all , and in you all .
text2: Ubbaa Godai , ubbaa baggaara oottiyaagee , ubbaa giddon de7iyaagee , issi Xoossai , ubbaa Aawai de7ees .

text: But unto every one of us is given grace according to the measure of the gift of Christ .
text2: SHin Kiristtoosi immido imuwaadan , nuuni huuphiyan huuphiyan dumma imuwaa ekkida .

text: Wherefore he saith , When he ascended up on high , he led captivity captive , and gave gifts unto men .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ I pude xoqqasaa kiyido wode , omoodettida darota ekkidi efiis ; asaayyookka imota immiis ” yaagees .

text: ( Now that he ascended , what is it but that he also descended first into the lower parts of the earth ?
text2: Yaatin , “ Pude kiyiis ” giyoogee woigiyoogee ? I koiro duge wodhdhiis ; hegee sa7au hirkki ziqqiyaasaa wodhdhiis giyoogaa .

text: He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above all heavens , that he might fill all things . )
text2: Ha duge wodhdhidaagee ba huuphen a ; he i ubbabaa kumanaadan , salo ubbaappe xoqqiyaasaa pude kiyiis .

text: And he gave some , apostles ; and some , prophets ; and some , evangelists ; and some , pastors and teachers ;
text2: Asaayyo imo immidaagee a ; i issoota issoota Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta , harata hananabaa yootiyaageeta , qassi harata wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiyaageeta , qassikka harata woosa keettaa kaalettiyaageetanne tamaarissiyaageeta ootti sunttiis .

text: For the perfecting of the saints , for the work of the ministry , for the edifying of the body of Christ :
text2: I hegaa geeshshati ubbai ammaniya asa ooso oottanaadaaninne Kiristtoosa bollaa keexxanaadan giigissanau oottiis .

text: Till we all come in the unity of the faith , and of the knowledge of the Son of God , unto a perfect man , unto the measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ :
text2: Qassi nuuni ubbai Xoossaa Na7aa ammaniininne erin beettiya issippetettaakko gakkana ; nuuni Kiristtoosa polo dichchaa keenaa diccidi , gastta asa gidana .

text: That we henceforth be no more children , tossed to and fro , and carried about with every wind of doctrine , by the sleight of men , and cunning craftiness , whereby they lie in wait to deceive ;
text2: Nuuni beetan yaanne haanne shocettidi , bantta cimo hanotan asaa bala ogiyaa kaalettiya gene asaa timirtte carkko ubban sugettidi , hagaappe sinttau na7a gidanau bessenna .

text: But speaking the truth in love , may grow up into him in all things , which is the head , even Christ :
text2: SHin nuuni siiqotettan tumaa haasayiiddi , huuphe gidiya Kiristtoosakko ubbaban diccanau bessees .

text: From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted by that which every joint supplieth , according to the effectual working in the measure of every part , maketh increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love .
text2: Bolla giddon de7iya dumma dumma shaahoti aani issippe ohettidosona ; qassi kumetta bollai baayyo imettida shaya ubban issoi issuwaara gaittidi , issippe ohetti uttiis ; he dumma dumma shaahoti oottanau bessiyaagaa oottiyo wode , kumetta bollai siiquwan dicceesinne bana keexxees .

text: This I say therefore , and testify in the Lord , that ye henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk , in the vanity of their mind ,
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani hagaa intteyyo Godaa sunttan odaisinne markkattais . Intte go77i bainna qofaa qoppiya Aihuda gidenna asatudan de7oppite .

text: Having the understanding darkened , being alienated from the life of God through the ignorance that is in them , because of the blindness of their heart :
text2: Eta wozanai xuman de7ees ; eti ainne erennaageetanne ixxaas giyaageeta gidiyo gishshau , Xoossai immiyo de7uwaappe haakkidosona .

text: Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto lasciviousness , to work all uncleanness with greediness .
text2: Eta matan yeella giyoobi baawa ; eti shaaramuxettiyo qaaqqau bantta huuphiyaa aatti immoosona ; qassi tunabaa ubbaa paci bainnan oottoosona .

text: But ye have not so learned Christ ;
text2: SHin intte Kiristtoosabaa hegaadan tamaaribeekketa .

text: If so be that ye have heard him , and have been taught by him , as the truth is in Jesus :
text2: Abaa tumu siyideta ; qassi tumatettaikka Yesuusan de7iyoogaadan , appe tamaarideta .

text: That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old man , which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts ;
text2: Intte kase de7iyo de7uwaa aggite ; qassi ba cimmiya amuwan xayiya intte ceega asatettaa xaissite .

text: And be renewed in the spirit of your mind ;
text2: Intte wozanainne qofai muleera ooraxxanau bessees .

text: And that ye put on the new man , which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness .
text2: Tumu xillotettaaninne geeshshatettan Xoossaa leemisuwan merettida ooratta asatettaa maayite .

text: Wherefore putting away lying , speak every man truth with his neighbour : for we are members one of another .
text2: Simmi worddotoppite . Nuuni ubbai Kiristtoosa asatettan issi asa gidiyo gishshau , asai ubbai ba ishau tumaa haasayanau bessees .

text: Be ye angry , and sin not : let not the sun go down upon your wrath :
text2: Hanqqettite ; shin intte hanqquwan nagaraa oottoppite . Intte hanqqetti uttidaashin , awai wulloppo .

text: Neither give place to the devil .
text2: Xalahe halaqaayyo soho immoppite .

text: Let him that stole steal no more : but rather let him labour , working with his hands the thing which is good , that he may have to give to him that needeth .
text2: Wuuqqiya urai hagaappe sinttau wuuqqoppo ; shin hegaa aggidi , hiyyeesata maaddanau , ba kushiyan lo77obaa oottiiddi daafuro .

text: Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth , but that which is good to the use of edifying , that it may minister grace unto the hearers .
text2: Intte haasayai siyiyaageeta go77ana mala , koshshiyoogaadan minttettiya lo77o qaalai intte doonaappe kiyoppe attin , iita qaalai mulekka kiyoppo .

text: And grieve not the holy Spirit of God , whereby ye are sealed unto the day of redemption .
text2: Xoossai inttena woziyo gallassau intte parametti uttido Xoossaa Geeshsha Ayyaanaa azzanissoppite .

text: Let all bitterness , and wrath , and anger , and clamour , and evil speaking , be put away from you , with all malice :
text2: Ixo hanotettaa , yiilluwaa , hanqquwaa , waasuwaanne cashshaa ubbaa iitatetta ubbaara intteppe xaissite .

text: And be ye kind one to another , tenderhearted , forgiving one another , even as God for Christ ' s sake hath forgiven you .
text2: Issoi issuwaayyo kehitenne qarettite ; qassi Xoossai Kiristtoosa baggaara intteyyo atto giidoogaadan , inttekka issoi issuwaayyo atto giite .

text: Be ye therefore followers of God , as dear children ;
text2: Simmi Xoossai siiqiyo naatudan , a milatite .

text: And walk in love , as Christ also hath loved us , and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savour .
text2: Qassi Kiristtoosi nuna siiqidi , ba huuphiyaa Xoossaayyo sawuwaa tonggu giya yarshsho oottidi immidoogaadan , inttekka siiquwan de7anau bessees .

text: But fornication , and all uncleanness , or covetousness , let it not be once named among you , as becometh saints ;
text2: SHin geeshshatuyyo bessiyaagaadan , intte giddon shaaramuxiyoogeenne tunatetta ubbai , woi miishsha amottiyoogee mulekka siyettoppo .

text: Neither filthiness , nor foolish talking , nor jesting , which are not convenient : but rather giving of thanks .
text2: Yeellayiyaabainne eeyya haasayai woi pattenna qiree intteyyo bessennabaa gidiyo gishshau , intte matan mulekka de7oppo ; intte hegaa ubbaa aggidi , Xoossaa galatanau bessees .

text: For this ye know , that no whoremonger , nor unclean person , nor covetous man , who is an idolater , hath any inheritance in the kingdom of Christ and of God .
text2: Hagaa erite ; ooninne shaaramuxiyaagaa woi tunabaa oottiyaagaa , woi miishsha amottiyaagaa gidikko , Kiristtoosa kawotettaanne Xoossaa kawotettaa laattanau danddayenna ; miishsha amottiyoogee eeqau goinniyoogaappe dummatenna .

text: Let no man deceive you with vain words : for because of these things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of disobedience .
text2: Inttena ooninne pattenna haasayan cimmoppo ; aissi giikko , hagaa gaasuwan Xoossaa hanqqoi azazettenna asaa bolli yaana .

text: Be not ye therefore partakers with them .
text2: Simmi hegaa mala asaara zuppetoppite .

text: For ye were sometimes darkness , but now are ye light in the Lord : walk as children of light :
text2: Aissi giikko , kase intte xuman de7ideta ; shin Godaa baggaara ha77i poo7uwan de7eeta ; poo7uwan de7iya asaadan poo7uwan hemettite .

text: ( For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and righteousness and truth ; )
text2: Aissi giikko , poo7oi lo77otettaa , xillotettaanne tumatettaa ubbaa aifees .

text: Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord .
text2: Godaa ufaissiyaabai aibakko tamaarite .

text: And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness , but rather reprove them .
text2: Go77i bainna xuma oosuwaa qonccissi bessiteppe attin aara walahettoppite .

text: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret .
text2: Eti geeman oottiyoobaa harai atto haasayiyoogeekka pokkees .

text: But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the light : for whatsoever doth make manifest is light .
text2: SHin ubbabai poo7uwaa kiyiyo wode , qoncciyan beettana ; aissi giikko , qoncciyan beettiya ubbabai poo7o .

text: Wherefore he saith , Awake thou that sleepest , and arise from the dead , and Christ shall give thee light .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , “ Xiskkiyaagoo , beegotta ; haiquwaappekka dendda ; Kiristtoosi neeyyo poo7issana ” yaagees .

text: See then that ye walk circumspectly , not as fools , but as wise ,
text2: Simmi intte waani de7iyaakko akeekite ; aadhdhida eratettaara de7iya asadan de7iteppe attin , aadhdhida eratetti bainna asadan de7oppite .

text: Redeeming the time , because the days are evil .
text2: Wodee iita gidiyo gishshau , intte lo77o wodiyaa coo xaissoppite .

text: Wherefore be ye not unwise , but understanding what the will of the Lord is .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Godai koyiyoobai aibakko akeekiteppe attin , eeyyoppite .

text: And be not drunk with wine , wherein is excess ; but be filled with the Spirit ;
text2: Qassi inttenan Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumoppe attin , inttena bashshiya woiniyaa giyo eessaa uyidi mattottoppite .

text: Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord ;
text2: Mazamuriyaa yettan , galatiiddi yexxiyoogaaninne ayyaana yettan issoi issuwaara haasayite ; qassi galatiyo yettaaninne mazamuriyaa yexxiyoogan intte wozanan Godaa galatiiddi yexxite .

text: Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ ;
text2: Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan , Aawaa Xoossaa ubbabau ubba wode galatite .

text: Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God .
text2: Kiristtoosayyo yayyiiddi , issoi issuwaayyo haarettite .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as unto the Lord .
text2: Maccaasatoo , Godaayyo haarettiyoogaadan , intte azinatuyyo haarettite .

text: For the husband is the head of the wife , even as Christ is the head of the church : and he is the saviour of the body .
text2: Aissi giikko , Kiristtoosi qassi woosa keettaayyo huuphe gidiyoogaadan , azinaikka ba maccaaseeyyo huuphe ; qassi Kiristtoosi ba huuphen , ba bollaa gidiya woosa keettaa ashshiyaagaa .

text: Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ , so let the wives be to their own husbands in every thing .
text2: SHin woosa keettai Kiristtoosayyo haarettiyoogaadan , maccaasai qassi bantta azinau ubbaban haarettanau bessees .

text: Husbands , love your wives , even as Christ also loved the church , and gave himself for it ;
text2: Azinatoo , Kiristtoosi woosa keettaa siiqidi , ba huuphiyaa ayyo immidoogaadan , inttekka intte maccaasata siiqite .

text: That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of water by the word ,
text2: I woosa keettaa ba qaalaaninne haattan meecci geeshshidi , Xoossaayyo dummayanau hagaa oottiis .

text: That he might present it to himself a glorious church , not having spot , or wrinkle , or any such thing ; but that it should be holy and without blemish .
text2: Kiristtoosi woosa keettaa qiti woi kul77i woi hegaa milatiyaabi bainnan , a kumetta bonchchuwaara geeshshanne borettennaagaa oottidi , ba huupheyyo shiishshanau koyiis .

text: So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies . He that loveth his wife loveth himself .
text2: Simmi qassi azinai ba maccaasiyo ba bollaadan siiqanau bessees ; ba machchiyo siiqiyaagee bana siiqees .

text: For no man ever yet hated his own flesh ; but nourisheth and cherisheth it , even as the Lord the church :
text2: Aissi giikko , ba bollaa ixxiya asi mulekka baawa ; shin Kiristtoosi woosa keettaa miziyoogaadaaninne naagiyoogaadan ooninne ba bollaa mizeesinne naagees .

text: For we are members of his body , of his flesh , and of his bones .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni a bollaa shaaho .

text: For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother , and shall be joined unto his wife , and they two shall be one flesh .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai yaagees ; “ Hegaa gishshau , attumaagee ba aawaanne ba aayyiyo aggi bayidi , ba machcheera issippe de7ana ; eti naa77aikka issi asho gidana ” yaagees .

text: This is a great mystery : but I speak concerning Christ and the church .
text2: Ha xuurai wolqqaama tumatetta ; shin taani hagee Kiristtoosabaanne woosa keettaabaa yootees yaagais .

text: Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his wife even as himself ; and the wife see that she reverence her husband .
text2: Gidikkokka , qassi intte huuphiyan huuphiyan intte maccaasaa intte huuphedan siiqanau bessees ; maccaasa ubbaikka bantta azinaa azinaa bonchchanau bessees .

text: Children , obey your parents in the Lord : for this is right .
text2: Naatoo , inttena yelidaageetuyyo Godan azazettite ; aissi giikko , hagee oottanau bessiyaabaa .

text: Honour thy father and mother ; ( which is the first commandment with promise ; )
text2: “ Neeyyo ubbabai lo77anaadaaninne sa7an ne laittai aduqqanaadan , ne aawaanne ne aayyiyo bonchcha ” giya azazoi Xoossai immana giidoogaara de7iya koiro azazuwaa .

text: And , ye fathers , provoke not your children to wrath : but bring them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord .
text2: Aawatoo , intte intte naata Godaa seeraaninne zoriyan dichchiteppe attin , eta hanqqetissoppite .

text: Servants , be obedient to them that are your masters according to the flesh , with fear and trembling , in singleness of your heart , as unto Christ ;
text2: Ailletoo , Kiristtoosayyo oottiyoogaadan , intte godatuyyo yashshatettaaninne kokkorssan suure wozanaappe azazettite .

text: Not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but as the servants of Christ , doing the will of God from the heart ;
text2: Xoossai giidoogaa oottiyaageetudan , Kiristtoosa ailletudan , wozanaappe oottiteppe attin , asa ufaissanau oottiyaabaadan , asi be7o giidi oottoppite .

text: With good will doing service , as to the Lord , and not to men :
text2: Asau gidennan Kiristtoosau oottiyoogaadan , xibennan wozanappe oottite .

text: Knowing that whatsoever good thing any man doeth , the same shall he receive of the Lord , whether he be bond or free .
text2: Aille gidin woi goqa gidin , i oottiyo lo77o ooso ubbaayyo Godai huuphiyan huuphiyan woitanaagaa ereeta .

text: And , ye masters , do the same things unto them , forbearing threatening : knowing that your Master also is in heaven ; neither is there respect of persons with him .
text2: Godatoo , intte ailleta naassiyoogaa aggidi , etayyo hegaadan oottite ; inttenanne eta gatti haariya Godai , oonanne maaddi pirddennaagee , saluwan de7iyoogaa ereeta .

text: Finally , my brethren , be strong in the Lord , and in the power of his might .
text2: Wurssettan , Godaaninne a gita wolqqan minnite .

text: Put on the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil .
text2: Xalahee halaqaa iita cimuwaa teqqanau intte danddayana mala , Xoossai intteyyo immiyo ollaa maayo ubbaa maayite .

text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood , but against principalities , against powers , against the rulers of the darkness of this world , against spiritual wickedness in high places .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni saluwaa sohuwan de7iya iita ayyaana wolqqatuura , haariyaageetuura , godatettai de7iyaageetuuranne ha xuma biittaa haariyaageetuura olettiyoogaappe attin , asaara baaxetokko .

text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God , that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day , and having done all , to stand .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , iita gallassan teqqanaunne qassi wurssettai gakkanaassi warettoogaappe guyyiyan , minni eqqanau intte danddayana mala , Xoossaa ola miishsha ubbaa oiqqite .

text: Stand therefore , having your loins girt about with truth , and having on the breastplate of righteousness ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , xeessan qabattuwaa gixxiyoogaadan tumatettaa gixxidi , tiran wottiyo ola miishshadan xillotettaa maayidi , intte tohuwan caammaa wottiyoogaadan sarotettaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootanau giigidi , minni eqqite .

text: Above all , taking the shield of faith , wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked .
text2: He ubbaappe aattidi , xalahe halaqai dafidi yeddiyo wonddafiyaa tama ubbaa toissanau , ammanuwaa ubba wode gonddalledan oiqqite .

text: And take the helmet of salvation , and the sword of the Spirit , which is the word of God :
text2: Ammanuwaa huuphiyan wottiyo birata qophedan wottite ; qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanaa bisuwaa , Xoossaa qaalaa , oiqqite .

text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit , and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints ;
text2: Xoossaa woossiiddinne a maaduwaa oichchiiddi , ubba wode Geeshsha Ayyaanan Xoossaa woossite . Hegaa gishshau , minnite ; salettoppite ; geeshshatu ubbaayyo Xoossaa ubba wode woossite .

text: And for me , that utterance may be given unto me , that I may open my mouth boldly , to make known the mystery of the gospel ,
text2: Qassi taani yayyennan wonggeliyaa xuuraa yootanau , Xoossai ta doonaa dooyidi , tau haasayiyoobaa immanaadan , taukka Xoossaa woossite .

text: For which I am an ambassador in bonds : that therein I may speak boldly , as I ought to speak .
text2: Taani ha77i qashuwan de7ikkokka , ha wonggeliyaa gishshau taani kiitettidaagaa ; taani abaa tau bessiyaagaadan yayyennan yootana mala , taayyo Xoossaa woossite .

text: But that ye also may know my affairs , and how I do , Tychicus , a beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord , shall make known to you all things :
text2: SHin taani waana de7iyaakkonne ai oottiyaakko inttekka eranaadan , nu siiqo ishai , Godaa oosuwan ammanettida ashkkarai Tikiqoosi , tabaa ubbaa intteyyo yootana .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that ye might know our affairs , and that he might comfort your hearts .
text2: Nuuni ubbai waani de7iyaakko intteyyo yootidi , inttena minttettana mala , taani a inttekko kiittaas .

text: Peace be to the brethren , and love with faith , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Xoossaa Aawaappenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe sarotettainne siiqotettai ammanuwaara issippe ishanttu ubbaayyo gido ;

text: Grace be with all them that love our Lord Jesus Christ in sincerity . Amen .
text2: dochchenna siiquwan nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa siiqiya ubbatuura Xoossaa aaro kehatettai gido . Amin77i .

text: Paul and Timotheus , the servants of Jesus Christ , to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi , with the bishops and deacons :
text2: Nuuni Yesuus Kiristtoosa ashkkarati PHauloosinne Ximootiyoosi , Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7iyaageetuyyo , Piliphphisiyuusa giyo kataman de7iya geeshsha ubbatuyyo , woosa keettaa kaalettiyaageetuyyoonne woosa keettaa cimatuyyo ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafoos .

text: Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Nu Aawaa Xoossaappenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe aaro kehatettainne sarotettai intteyyo gido .

text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you ,
text2: Taani inttena hassayiyo wode ubban ta Xoossaa galatais .

text: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy ,
text2: Intte koiro gallassaappe hanno gakkanaassi , wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiyoogan tana maaddido gishshau , taani ubba wode intteyyo ubbaayyo ufaissan Xoossaa woossais .

text: Being confident of this very thing , that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ :
text2: Qassi intte giddon lo77o oosuwaa doommida Xoossai , Kiristtoos Yesuusi simmiyo gallassai gakkanaassi polanaagaa erais .

text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: Taani intteyyo ubbaayyo hegaadan qoppanau bessees ; aissi giikko , taani inttena ubba wode hassayais . Ha77i taani qashuwan de7iyoogan , wonggeliyau mootettiyoogaaninne wonggeliyaa mintta essiyoogan Xoossai taayyo qaadido qaadaa inttekka tanaara shaakki ekkideta .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani inttena ubbata Kiristtoos Yesuusappe yiya siiquwan ai keenaa siiqiyaakko , Xoossai tau markka .

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: Qassi taani intteyyo Xoossaa woossiyoogee hagaa ; lo77obai aibakko dooranau intte danddayanaadaaninne , qassi intte siiqoi tumu eratettaaranne akeeka ubbaara issippe gujji gujji diccanaadan , Xoossaa woossais ; yaatidi Kiristtoosi simmiyo gallassan intte suurenne borettennaageeta gidana .

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
text2: Qassi intte de7oikka Xoossaa bonchchuwaayyoonne galataayyo Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara beettiya xillotettaa aifiyaa aifana .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: Ta ishatoo , ha tana gakkidabai wonggelee aakkanaadan tumu maaddidoogaa intte erana mala koyais .

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: Taani Kiristtoosa gishshau qashettidoogaa , kawo keettaa naagiya ubbatinne hagan de7iya harati ubbati eroosona .

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: Qassi taani qashettidoogee nu ishanttuppe dariyaageeti Godan keehi ammanettidi , Xoossaa qaalaa yashshi bainnan kaseegaappe xalidi yootanaadan maaddiis .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: Tumaappe issooti issooti qanaatiyaa gishshaunne palamaa gishshau , Kiristtoosabaa yootoosona ; shin harati lo77o amuwan yootoosona .

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: Hageeti Xoossai taayyo wonggeliyaa naagiyo oosuwaa immido gishshau , siiqidi qaalaa yootoosona .

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: SHin hinkkooti taani qashuwan de7ishin , ta bolli waaye ehaanabaa etau milatin , banttana siiqiyo gita amuwan Kiristtoosabaa yootoosonappe attin , wozanappe yootokkona .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: Aikkonne baawa ; milatissiyo yootonne gido woikko tumu yootonne gido , ai ogiyaaninne Kiristtoosabaa yootikko , taani hegan ufaittais . Sinttanaukka qassi taani ufaittana .

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: Aissi giikko , taani intte woosaaninne Yesuus Kiristtoosa Ayyaanaappe yiya maaduwan attanaagaa erais .

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: Ta gita amoinne Xoossaappe ekkana gaada taani ufaissan naagiyo naagoi aibee giikko , taani paxa de7inkka woi haiqqinkka yayyennan , kaseegaadan ha77ikka ta kumetta asatettan Kiristtoosi bonchchettanaagaappe attin , taani harai atto issibankka yeellatennan attanaassa .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: Aissi giikko , tau de7oi Kiristtoosa ; qassi haiqoikka tau go77a .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: SHin taani paxa de7iyoogan daro go77iyaabaa oottanabaa gidikko , augaa dooranaakko tau erettenna .

text: For I am in a strait betwixt two , having a desire to depart , and to be with Christ ; which is far better :
text2: Taani ha naa77u yohotun tuggatais ; ha de7uwaappe shaahettanaunne qassi Kiristtoosaara issippe de7anau amottais ; Kiristtoosaara issippe de7iyoogee ubbaappe aadhdhida daro lo77obaa .

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: SHin taani haiqqiyoogaappe intte gishshau paxa de7iyoogee inttena daro koshshiyaabaa .

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: Hagee tuma gidiyoogaa taani geeshshada erais ; qassi ammanuwan intte diccanaadaaninne ufaittanaadan , taani inttenaara ubbaara paxa de7ana .

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani inttenaara naa77anttuwaa de7iyo wode , Kiristtoos Yesuusaara intte de7iyo de7uwan , taban ceeqettiyoobai intteyyo darana .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: Gidikkokka , intte intte huuphen Kiristtoosa wonggeliyaayyo bessiya de7uwaa de7ite ; taani inttena baada be7in woikko be7ana xayin , intte issi qofan minnidi eqqidoogaanne , qassi wonggeliyaa ammanuwaayyo issi wozana gididi issippe baaxetiyoogaa siyana .

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: Intte morkketuyyo aibinkka yayyoppite ; hegee etayyo bashshaa malaata ; shin Xoossai inttena xoonissiyo gishshau , intteyyo atotettaa malaata .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: Aissi giikko , Kiristtoosayyo oottiyo qaadai inttena gakkidoogee intte a gishshau waayettiyo gishshassappe attin , intte a ammaniyoogaa xalaalaassa gidenna .

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: Taani kase baaxetishin intte be7idoogaa mala baaxeenne qassi ha77ikka taani baaxetiyoogaa intte siyiyoogaa malai inttena gakkiis .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Kiristtoosan intte de7iyo de7oi inttena gasttissii ? A siiqoi inttena minttettii ? Geeshsha Ayyaanaara intteyyo issippetettai de7ii ? Intte issoi issuwaayyo keheetiinne qaretteetii ?

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: Yaatikko , intte qofan , siiquwan , wozanaaninne qofaa poluwan issuwaa gididi , tana wurssi ufaissite .

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: Inttena siiqiyoogan woikko ceeqettanau koyiyo hada amuwan issibaanne oottoppite ; shin issoi issuwaappe gitatais yaagidi qoppennan , issoi issuwaayyo intte huuphiyaa kaushshite .

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: Qassi issoi issuwaa go77iyaabaa koyanaappe attin , intte huuphe xalaalaa go77iyaabaa koyoppite .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7iya ha qofai qassi inttenankka de7anau bessees .

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: I ubba wode Xoossaa gididi de7iis ; shin Xoossaa keeni wolqqan gidanau mali be7iyoogaa bessiyaabaadan qoodibeenna .

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: SHin i ba shenen ubbabaa aggi bayidi , ashkkara meretaa ekkiis ; qassi asa milatidi qoncciis .

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: I bana kaushshiis ; haiquwau , ubba harai atto , masqqaliyaa bolla haiquwaukka azazettiis .

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Xoossai a keehi Xoqqu xoqqu oottiis ; qassi suntta ubbaappekka aadhdhiya xoqqa sunttaa ayyo immiis .

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , saluwaaninne sa7an sa7aappe garssan de7iya ubbai Yesuusa sunttaa bonchchanau gulbbatana .

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: Qassi asai ubbai Yesuus Kiristtoosa Goda yaagidi , Xoossaa Aawaa bonchchuwau markkattana .

text: Wherefore , my beloved , as ye have always obeyed , not as in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ta dabbotoo , taani inttenaara de7iyo wode ubban intte tau azazettidoogaadan , ha77i taani intte matan de7enna wodekka , intte kaseegaappe aattidi tau azazettanau bessees ; yashshatettaaninne kokkorssan intte atotettaa polanau oottite .

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai inttena bau eeno giissanaadaaninne qassi i qoppidobaa intte oottanaadan intte giddon ubba wode oottees .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: Geellanne nagaranchcha asaa giddon borettennaageeta , ashkketanne Xoossaa naatudankka pokkoi bainnaageeta gidite ; qassi zuuzummennan woikko iitabaa qoppennan ubbabaa oottite . He asaa giddonkka saluwan poo7iya xoolinttedan poo7iiddi ,

text: Holding forth the word of life ; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ , that I have not run in vain , neither laboured in vain .
text2: de7uwaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa etau yootite ; he wode ta daafurainne ta oosoi mela xayibeennaagee erettiyo gishshau , Kiristtoosa gallassi taani inttenan gitatana .

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: Harai atto intte ammanoi Xoossaayyo yarshshiyo yarshshuwaa bolli ta suuttai ushshaa yarshshodan gukkikkokka , taani ufaittais ; inttenaara ubbaara issippe ufaittais .

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: Hegaadan inttekka qassi ufaittanau bessees ; tanaara issippe ufaittite .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: SHin taani intte de7uwaabaa siyada ufaittanaadan , Ximootiyoosa inttekko eesuwan yeddanaagaa Godaa Yesuusan ammanettais .

text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte de7uwaabau wozanappe hirggiya a mala asi harai ooninne tau baawa .

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: Aissi giikko , harati ubbati bantta huuphebaa koyoosona ; Yesuus Kiristtoosabaa koyokkona .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: SHin na7i ba aawau oottiyoogaadan , Ximootiyoosi tanaara issippe gididi , wonggeliyaa oosuwaa oottidoogan , ammanettiya asa gidiyoogaa erissidoogaa intte ereeta .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani yohoi haniyoobaa be7ada , sohuwaara a inttekko yeddana gaada qoppais .

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: Taani ta huuphen mata wodiyan inttekko baanaagaa Godan ammanettais .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: SHin taani ta ishaa Eppafiroditoosa , tanaara issippe ta bagga gididi oottidaagaa , olettidaagaanne , qassi tana maaddiyooban intteyyo kiitettidi oottidaagaa inttekko kiittanau koshshiyoogaa qoppaas .

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: Aissi giikko , i inttena ubbaa be7anau laamotees ; qassi i sakettidoogaa intte siyido gishshau , ba wozanan daro metootees .

text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: I tumu sakettidi , haiqqiichchidi attiis ; shin Xoossai au qarettiis ; a xalaalaayyo gidennan azzanoi azzanuwaa bolli gujettennaadan , taayyookka qarettiis .

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: Simmi intte naa77anttuwaa a be7idi ufaittanaadan , taukka ta wozanaa azzanoi irxxanaadan , taani eesuwan a inttekko yeddana .

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Godan de7iya ishadan , kumetta ufaissan a mokkite ; qassi a milatiya asa ubbaakka bonchchite .

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte intte huuphen tana maaddana danddayenna maaduwaa maaddanau , Kiristtoosa oosuwaa gishshau , ba shemppuwaa shenehoo giidi , haiqqiichchidi attiis .

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: Wurssettan , ta ishatoo , Godai intteyyo ufaissaa immo . Taani kase xaafidoogaa zaarettada xaafiyoogee tana waissenna ; qassi he xaafiyoogee inttena naagana .

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: Iitabaa oottiyaageetuppe , he kanatuppe , qaxxarai koshshees giya asatuppe naagettite .

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni Xoossaa Geeshsha Ayyaanan Xoossaayyo goinniyo gishshaunne nu de7uwan Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusan ufaittiyo gishshau , tumu qaxxaraa qaxxarettidaageeta ; asatettaa bolli oosettiyaaban ammanokko .

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: Qassi tau ta huuphenkka ta asatettan ammanettiyoobi de7ees . Ai asinne ba asatettan ammanettiyoobi bau de7ees giidi qoppikko , taani appe keehi aadhdhais .

text: Circumcised the eighth day , of the stock of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , an Hebrew of the Hebrews ; as touching the law , a Pharisee ;
text2: Taani yelettoosappe saamintta giishin qaxxarettaas . Taani yeletan Israa7eela ; Biniyaama zare ; walahi bainna Aihuda asa . Aihuda higgiyaa naagiyoogan gidikko , taani parisaawe ;

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: Aihuda ammanuwau mishettiyoogaa gidikko , taani woosa keettaa waissaas ; issi urai higgiyau azazettidi xilliyoogaa baggaa gidikko , tanan boree beettibeenna .

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: SHin tana go77iya ubbabaa Kiristtoosa gishshau bayidabaadan qoodaas .

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: Tumakka , hegeetu xalaala gidenna ; taani ta Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa eriyoogee ubbabaappe keehi aadhdhiyo gishshau , ubbabaa tana mulekka go77ennabaadan qoodaas ; taani a gishshau ubbabaa yegga bayaas . Kiristtoosa demmanaunne aara de7anau ubbabaa wora olidobaadan qoodais ; taani higgiyaayyo azazettada demmiyo ta huuphe xillotetti taayyo baawa . Kiristtoosa ammanin , Xoossai immiyo xillotettai , ammanuwan Xoossaa matappe yiya xillotettai tau ha77i de7ees .

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: Taani Kiristtoosanne haiquwaappe i denddido wolqqaa eranau koyais ; yaatada taani ta huuphen haiquwaappe denddana yaagiyoogan , a waayiyaa aara waayettanaunne a haiquwan a milatanau amottais .

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: Taani ha77i demmarggaas woikko tanan bali baawa giikke . SHin Kiristtoos Yesuusi tana baayyo oottido woituwaa demmana gaada eesotais .

text: Brethren , I count not myself to have apprehended : but this one thing I do , forgetting those things which are behind , and reaching forth unto those things which are before ,
text2: Ta ishatoo , taani hegaa demmarggaas gaada qoppikke ; shin taani issibaa oottais ; taappe guyyeera de7iyaagaa doga aggada , sinttan de7iyaagaa oiqqanau warettais .

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: Xoossai Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara bolla de7uwau xeesiyo woituwaa ekkanau , ta gakkanasaa horddofais .

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: Simmi nuuni Ayyaanan gasttida ubbati hagaa qoppanau bessees ; qassi intteppe amaridaageetuyyo aibiininne dumma qofai de7ikko , hegaakka Xoossai intteyyo qonccissana .

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: Gidikkokka , nuuni hanno gakkanaassi de7ido maaraadan , ane sinttau boos .

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: Ta ishatoo , taani haniyoogaadan hanite . Nuuni intteyyo leemiso gidida ; hegaadan inttekka nuuni intteyyo leemiso gidido maaraa kaalliyaageeta akeekite .

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: Aissi giikko , taani hegaa intteyyo kase darotoo yootaas ; qassi ha77i naa77anttuwaakka afuxxaidda intteyyo yootais ; Kiristtoosa masqqaliyaassi morkke gidada daro asati de7oosona .

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: Eta wurssettai bashsha ; eta uloi etayyo Xoossa ; yeellatanau bessiyooban eti otorettoosona ; qassi ha sa7aabaa xalaalaa qoppoosona .

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Aissi giikko , nu biittai saluwaana ; nuuni qassi saluwaappe yaana nuna ashshiya Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa naagoos .

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: Kiristtoosi ubbabaa baappe garssan wottanau danddayiya ba wolqqan , nu daafuranchcha asatettaa laammidi , ba bonchcho asatettaa milatissidi oottana .

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: Ta ishatoo , taani siiqiyoogeetoo , laamotiyoogeetoo , tana ufaissiyaageetoo , tana gitayiyaageetoo , ta dabbotoo , simmi Godan intte minni eqqanau bessees .

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Ewodeenne Sinxxiikee , intte naa77aikka issi qofan michchidan , Godan de7anaadan , taani inttena zorais .

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: Qassi tanaara oottiya ammanettidaagoo , neeni ha maccaasata maaddanaadan , taani nena woossais ; aissi giikko , eti tanaaranne eta sunttai Xoossaa de7o maxaafan xaafettido Qaleminxxoosaara qassi tanaara issippe oottiya haratu ubbaara wonggeliyaa ubbasaa gattanau daafuridosona .

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: Godaara intte de7iyo de7uwan ubba wode ufaittite ; taani hagaa gujjadakka gais ; ufaittite .

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: Asai ubbai intte ashkketettaa ero ; Godai matan yaana .

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: Xoossaa intte woossiyo woosa ubban a keehi galatiiddi , inttena koshshiyaabaa ubbau woossiteppe attin , issibaukka hirggoppite .

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: Qassi asa eratettaa ubbaappe aadhdhiya Xoossaa sarotettai intte wozanaanne intte qofaa Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara naagana .

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: Wurssettan , ta ishatoo , intte wozanan lo77obaanne galatissiyaabaa qoppite ; tuma gidiyaabaa ubbaa , bonchchissiyaabaa ubbaa , mooro gidennabaa ubbaa , geeshshabaa ubbaa , siiqobaa ubbaa , lo77o haasaya gidiyaabaa ubbaa qoppite .

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: Intte taappe tamaaridoogaa , ekkidoogaa , siyidoogaanne be7idoogaa ubbaa oottite ; qassi nuuyyo sarotettaa immiya Xoossai inttenaara issippe gidana .

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: SHin daro wodiyaappe guyyiyan , ha77i intte tabaa naa77anttuwaa qoppanau doommido gishshau , taani Godan keehi ufaittais ; taayyo qoppanau intteyyo injjetennan ixxidoogaappe attin , tau qofaa qoppeeta .

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: Taani hagaa tana metido gishshau giikke ; aissi giikko , tau de7iyaabai taayyo gidana giyoogaa taani tamaaraas .

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: Taani metootidi de7iyoobi aibakko erais ; qassi duretidi de7iyoobikka aibakko erais ; awan gidinkka aude gidinkka , taani kaluwaanne namisaa qassi pacaanne palahaa tamaaraas .

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: Kiristtoosi tau immido wolqqan , ubbabaa oottanau taani danddayais .

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: Gidikkokka , intte ta metuwaa tanaara metootidi daro loittideta ;

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: Piliphphisiyuusa asau , wonggeliyaa mishiraachchoi koiro intte giddon odettiis ; shin taani maqidooniyaappe kiyido wode , tana intte woosa keettappe attin , harai maaddibeennaagaa intte intte huuphen ereeta ; qassi immiyoobankka ekkiyoobankka intteppe attin , harai tana maaddibeenna .

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: Aissi giikko , tana metoi oiqqido wode , harai atto taani Tasalonqqen de7ishinkka tana zaari zaaridi maaddideta .

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: Taani inttebaa bolli harabai gujettanaagaa koyiyoogaappe attin , woito xalaalaa ekkanau koyikke .

text: But I have all , and abound : I am full , having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you , an odour of a sweet smell , a sacrifice acceptable , wellpleasing to God .
text2: SHin taani intte immidoogaa ubbaa ekkaas ; qassi tau palahidi gidiyaagee de7ees . Intte kiittido ubbabaa Eppafiroditoosappe ekkaas ; koshshiya ubbai tau de7ees . Intte tau kiittido imoi Xoossaayyo sawuwaa tonggu giyaanne i dosiyo , a ufaissiya yarshsho mala .

text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus .
text2: Qassi ta Xoossai ba bonchcho duretettaa daruwan Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara inttena koshshiyaabaa ubbaa intteyyo immana .

text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Nu Xoossaayyoonne nu Aawaayyo merinaappe merinaa gakkanaassi bonchchoi gido . Amin77i .

text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus . The brethren which are with me greet you .
text2: Kiristtoos Yesuusabaa gidiya geeshsha ubbata saro giite . Tanaara hagan de7iya ishantti inttena saro goosona .

text: All the saints salute you , chiefly they that are of Caesar ' s household .
text2: Hagan de7iya geeshsha ubbati , ubbaappekka aattidi Kawuwaa Qeesaara keettan de7iyaageeti inttena saro goosona .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aaro kehatettai inttenaara gido .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: Taani PHauloosi , Xoossaa sheniyan Kiristtoosi Yesuusi kiittidoogaa gididaageenne nu ishai Ximootiyoosi ,

text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Qolasiyaasa giyo kataman de7iya geeshshatuyyo , Kiristtoosan ammanettida ishanttuyyo ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafoos . Xoossaa nu Aawaappenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe , aaro kehatettainne sarotettai intteyyo gido .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Nuuni intteyyo Xoossaa woossiyo wode , Xoossaa nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Aawaa , ubba wode galatoos .

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni Kiristtoos Yesuusa intte ammaniyoogaanne geeshshata ubbaa siiqiyoogaa siyida .

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: Tumu kiitai wonggelee koiro inttekko yiido wode , Xoossai sinttappe immana giidoogaa siyideta . Simmi intte ammanoinne siiqoi saluwan giigidi naagiya , Xoossai sinttappe immana giidoogan doomettiis .

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: He wonggelee inttekko gakkiis ; gakkidi , intte a siyoosappenne Xoossaa aaro kehatettaa tumatettan eroosappe doommidi , intte giddon de7iyoogaadankka , biitta ubban anjjuwaa eheesinne ubbasaa aakkees .

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: Intte hegaa nunaara issippe ashkkara gidida siiqo Eppaafirappe tamaarideta ; i nu gishshaa Kiristtoosayyo ammanettidi oottiyaagee ,

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: Xoossaa Ayyaanan harata intte siiqiyoogaa nuuyyo yootiis .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni qassi hegaa siyido gallassaasappe doommidi , Xoossai intteyyo ba sheniyaa eriyo eratettaa , Xoossaa Ayyaanai immiyo aadhdhida eratettaaranne akeekaara issippe kunttidi immanaadan , ubba wode balennan Xoossaa woossoos .

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Godai koyiyoogaadan intte de7anaunne , ubba wode a ufaissiyaabaa oottanau danddayana ; intte oottiyo lo77o ooso ubban intte de7oi go77aara de7iyaagaa gidana ; qassi Xoossaa eriyoogan intte diccana .

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: Intte ubbaban ufaissan genccanaadaaninne danddayanaadan , Xoossai ba bonchchuwaa gitaadan immiyo wolqqa ubban minnite .

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: Qassi geeshshatuyyo giigida poo7o kawotettaa laattanau , nuna danddayissida Aawaa galatite .

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: I nuna xumaa wolqqaappe ashshidi , ba siiqiyo Na7aa kawotettaakko pinttiis .

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: Qassi i ba Na7an nuna wozidi , nu nagaraa atto giis .

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: Kiristtoosi beettenna Xoossaa leemiso ; i merettidabaa ubbaappe aadhdhiya baira Na7a .

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: Aissi giikko , ubbabaikka aani merettiis ; beettiyaageeti , beettennaageeti , ayyaanatuppe beettiya wolqqainne godatettai , halaqatettainne maatai , saluwaaninne sa7an de7iya ubbabaikka aaninne ayyo merettiis .

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: I ubbabaappe kase de7iis ; ubbabaikka aani ba sohuwaa sohuwaa oiqqidi de7ees .

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: I ba bollau , woosa keettau huuphe ; i ubbaappe bolla gidana mala , kasetidi haiquwaappe denddida baira Na7a gidiis .

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai koyidoogaadan , aani Xoossatetta mereta kumettai de7ees .

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: Yaatin Xoossai Kiristtoosa baggaara ubbabaa banaara sigettanau yohuwaa qachchiis ; ba Na7ai masqqaliyaa bollan gussido suuttan saluwaaninne sa7an de7iya ubbabaa banaara sigettiis .

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: Hagaappe kase , intte iitabaa oottido gishshaunne qoppido gishshau , Xoossaappe shaahettidi , aara morkkettideta .

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: SHin Xoossai ha77i inttena pokkoinne boree bainnaageetanne qassi geeshshata oottidi , ba sintti shiishshanau , ba Na7aa haiqqidaagaa asatettan banaara inttena sigettiis .

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: Hegee intte tumu ammanuwan minni eqqidi , wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa siyidi , sinttappe ekkana giidoogaappe qaaxxennan minnidi de7ikko hanana ; he wonggeliyaa mishiraachchoi sa7an de7iya mereta ubbaa matan odettiis . Taani PHauloosikka wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiyaagaa gidaas .

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Taani intteyyo waayettido gishshau , ha77i ufaittais ; Kiristtoosi ba bollaayyo , hegaa giyoogee woosa keettaayyo , waayettishin paccidaagaa taani ta bollaa sahuwan kunttais .

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: Xoossai tana intte gishshau , woosa keettaa Ayyaanan kaalettiyaagaa oottido gishshau , a qaalaa polada yootana mala , taani woosa keettau ashkkara gidaas .

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: Ha qaalai hagaappe kase bagga ubban , asa ubbau erettennan geemmidi de7ees ; shin ba geeshshatuyyo Xoossai ha77i qonccissiis .

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: Xoossai Aihuda gidenna asaayyo wottido ha asaayyo qonccibeenna bonchchonne dure yohoi aibakko geeshshata erissanau koyiis ; ha asaayyo qonccibeennaagee aibee giikko , Kiristtoosi inttenan de7iyoogaa ; hegaa giyoogee Xoossaa bonchchuwaa aara intte ekkanaagaa .

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
