text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni asa ubbau Kiristtoosabaa yootoos ; asa ubbaa Kiristtoosan kumetta asa oottidi , Xoossaakko shiishshana mala , nuuyyo aadhdhida eratetta ubban inttena ye77e goosinne tamaarissoos .

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: Taani hagaa polanau , tanan oottiya Kiristtoosi taayyo immiyo wolqqan baaxetaisinne daafurais .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: Taani intteyyo , Lodooqiyaa giyo kataman de7iya asaayyoonne tana be7ibeenna asa ubbaayyo ai keenaa baaxetidaakkonne intte erana mala koyais .

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: Eta wozanai minnana mala , siiquwan issippe gididi , tumu akeekan beettiya duretettaa ubbaa eti ekkana malanne qassi eti Xoossai asaayyo qonccissibeennaagaa , Kiristtoosa a huuphen erana mala , taani daafurais .

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: Geeman Xoossai minjjido erainne aadhdhida eratettai ubbai aani de7ees .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Ooninne inttena cimo qaalan balettenna mala , taani inttena hassayissais .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Aissi giikko , taani intte matappe haakkada de7ikkokka , ayyaanan inttenaara de7ais ; intte de7iyo maaraanne Kiristtoosa intte minnidi ammaniyoogaa be7ada ufaittais .

text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord , so walk ye in him :
text2: Simmi intte Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa ekkidoogaadan , aani de7ite .

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
text2: Aani xaphuwaa yeddidi diccite ; intte tamaaridoogaadan ammanuwan minnite ; Xoossaa ubba wode galatite .

text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit , after the tradition of men , after the rudiments of the world , and not after Christ .
text2: Kiristtoosappe gidenna timirttiyan , ha sa7aa haariya ayyaanatu timirttiyaaninne , asappe yiida eratettan , qassi mela cimuwan inttena ooninne omooddenna mala naagettite .

text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
text2: Aissi giikko , Kiristtoosa bollan Xoossatetta mereta kumettai de7ees .

text: And ye are complete in him , which is the head of all principality and power :
text2: Qassi halaqatettaayyoonne godatettaayyo ubbaayyo huuphe gidiya Kiristtoosappe kumetta de7uwaa demmideta .

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: Intte Kiristtoosaara issi asa mala gididi , asa qaxxara mala gidennan , intte iita hanotettaa diggiyo qaxxaraa , Kiristtoosan qaxxarettideta .

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: Intte xammaqettido wode , Kiristtoosaara moogettidi , Kiristtoosa haiquwaappe denttida Xoossaa wolqqaa ammanido gishshau , xinqqatiyan Kiristtoosaara issippe denddideta .

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: Intte intte naaquwaaninne intte asatettaa qaxxarettennan aggidoogan haiqqidi de7iyo wode , Xoossai intte naaquwaa atto giidi , Kiristtoosaara inttena paxa wottiis .

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: Nuna ixxiya , acuwaa paramaa a maachchaara issippe Xoossai daakkiis ; daakkidi , masqqaliyaa bollan xishidi , ogiyaappe diggiis .

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: Kiristtoosi he masqqaliyan halaqatuppenne godatuppe wolqqaa wotti ekkidi , eta omooddidoogaa asa ubbaa qoncciyan yuushshi bessiis .

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , meettan woi ushshan , baala gallassaa woi aginai xeeriyo wodiyaa bonchchiyoogan , woi Sambbataa bonchchiyoogan , ooninne intte bolli pirddoppo .

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: Hageeti sinttappe yaana yohotu eesho ; shin bollai Kiristtoosaagaa .

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: Wordduwaa ashkke milatanaunne kiitanchchaayyo goinnanau koyiyaagee , be7ibeennaagaa ajjuutan be7aas giidi otorettiyaagee , asatetta qofan coo ayyiyaagee , ooninne intte bolli pirddoppo .

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .
text2: Hegaa mala asi huuphe gidiya Kiristtoosa mintti oiqqidoogaa lefissees . Bolla ubbai he huuphiyaappe wolqqaa demmidi , bollan de7iya kuriyaaranne shayaara issippe ohettidi , Xoossai dichchiyo dishuwaadan diccees .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,
text2: Intte ha sa7aa haariya ayyaanatuppe haakkidi , Kiristtoosaara haiqqideta ; yaatin , aissi ha sa7aa wogan de7iya asadan de7eetii ? “ Oiqqoppa ; baara be7oppa ; bochchoppa ” yaagiya higgetuyyo aissi azazetteetii ?

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: Ha ubbabaikka asi medhdhido higgenne timirtte gidiyo gishshau , polettoogaappe guyyiyan xayana .

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: Eti kiitanchchaayyo goinniyoogaaninne wordduwaa ashkke milatiyoogan qassi bantta asatettaa gilqqissiyoogan aadhdhida eranchcha milatoosona ; shin shaaramuxanau koyiyoogaa diggiyoogee hegan ainne go77enna .

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Simmi intte Kiristtoosaara haiquwaappe denddidobaa gidikko , Xoossaappe ushachcha baggaara uttida Kiristtoosi de7iyoosan saluwan de7iyaagaa mintti koyite .

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: Saluwan de7iyaagaa intte qoppanaappe attin , sa7an de7iyaagaa qoppoppite .

text: For ye are dead , and your life is hid with Christ in God .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte haiqqideta ; qassi intte de7oi Xoossan Kiristtoosaara geemmiis .

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: Intteyyo de7o gidida Kiristtoosi qoncciyo wode , he wode inttekka aara bonchchuwan qonccana .

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , inttenan de7iya ha sa7aa amota worite ; hegeetikka shaaramuxiyoogaa , tunatettaa , shaaramuxanau koyiyoogaa , iita amuwaa , miishsha amottiyoogaa . Miishsha amottiyoogee eeqau goinniyoogaappe dummatenna .

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :
text2: Hageetu gaasuwan , Xoossai azazettenna asata hanqqettana .

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: Kase intte ha iita qofatun de7iyo wode etan haarettideta .

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: SHin ha77i intte qassi hanqquwaa , yiilluwaa , ixuwaa , intte doonaappe kiyiya cashshaanne yeellayiya haasayaa hageeta ubbaa intteppe xaissite .

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;
text2: Issoi issuwau worddotoppite ; aissi giikko , ceega meretaa a oosuwaara intteppe xaissirggidi ,

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :
text2: Xoossai , a medhdhidaagee , bana milatissanaunne baayyo de7iya eratetta ubbaa immanau , ubba wode ooraxissiyo ooratta meretaa maayideta .

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .
text2: Ha ooratta meretan , Giriike asa woi Aihuda asa , qaxxarettidaagaa woi qaxxarettibeennaagaa , ammanoi bainnaageetanne ainne tamaaribeennaagaa , aille woi goqa giidi shaakkiyoobi baawa ; Kiristtoosi ubbabaa ; i ubbankka de7ees .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Xoossai dooridoogeetudan , geeshshanne siiqidoogeeta gididi , maarotettaa , qaretaa , kehatettaa , intte huuphiyaa kaushshiyoogaa , ashkketettaanne danddayaa maayite .

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
text2: Issoi issuwaabaa danddayite ; ooninne ba laggiyaa bolli hanqqettidobai de7ikko , issoi issuwau atto yaago . Kiristtoosi intteyyo atto giidoogaadan , inttekka atto giite .

text: And above all these things put on charity , which is the bond of perfectness .
text2: Hegaa ubbaa bolli , ubbabaa issippe shiishshi qachchiya siiquwaa maayite .

text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts , to the which also ye are called in one body ; and be ye thankful .
text2: Kiristtoosi immiyo sarotettai inttena haaro ; aissi giikko , Xoossai inttena issi asa oottidi , he sarotettau xeesiis . Xoossaa galatite .

text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom ; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord .
text2: Kiristtoosa qaalai intte wozanan kumidi de7o ; intteyyo de7iya aadhdhida eratetta ubban issoi issuwaa tamaarissitenne zorite ; intte wozanan Xoossaa galatiiddi , xalotiyaanne mazamuriyaa , Xoossaa sunttaa xoqqu oottiya yettaa yexxite .

text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God and the Father by him .
text2: Intte ai haasayiyaabaa woi ai oottiyaabaa gidikkokka , Aawaa Xoossaa Yesuusa baggaara galatiiddi , oottiyoobaa ubbaa Godaa Yesuusa sunttan oottite .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as it is fit in the Lord .
text2: Maccaasatoo , ammaniya asau bessiyaagaadan , intte azinatuyyo haarettite .

text: Husbands , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
text2: Attumaasatoo , intte maccaasaa siiqite ; etaara woppu giidi de7ite .

text: Children , obey your parents in all things : for this is well pleasing unto the Lord .
text2: Naatoo , inttena yelidaageetuyyo ubbaban azazettite . Aissi giikko , intte etau azazettiyoogee Xoossaa daro ufaissees .

text: Fathers , provoke not your children to anger , lest they be discouraged .
text2: Aawatoo , intte naati wozanaa bayenna mala , eta yiilloyoppite .

text: Servants , obey in all things your masters according to the flesh ; not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but in singleness of heart , fearing God :
text2: Ailletoo , sa7an intteyyo goda gidiyaageetuyyo ubbaban azazettite ; Godau yayyidi , suure wozanan oottiteppe attin , asa ufaissanaunne asi be7o giyoogan azazettiyaageeta gidoppite .

text: And whatsoever ye do , do it heartily , as to the Lord , and not unto men ;
text2: Intte oottiyo ooso ubbaa asau gidennan Godau oottiyoogaadan , wozanappe oottite .

text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .
text2: Godaa Kiristtoosayyo intte oottiyo gishshau , i baageetuyyo immanau giigissi wottidoogaa intte laattanaagaa akeekite .

text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done : and there is no respect of persons .
text2: Balabaa oottida urai ooninne , ba oottido balaadan woituwaa ekkana ; aissi giikko , Xoossai pirddiiddi , oonanne maaddenna .

text: Masters , give unto your servants that which is just and equal ; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven .
text2: Godatoo , intteyyookka saluwan Godai de7iyoogaa eridi , intte ailletuyyo xillotettaaninne suuretettan koshshiyaabaa oottite .

text: Continue in prayer , and watch in the same with thanksgiving ;
text2: Xoossaa aggennan woossite ; qassi woossiiddi azallennan , a galatiiddi woossite .

text: Withal praying also for us , that God would open unto us a door of utterance , to speak the mystery of Christ , for which I am also in bonds :
text2: Qassi intte woossiyo wode ubban , kaseesappe asayyo qonccibeennabaa , Kiristtoosabaa nuuni yootana mala , Xoossai nuuyyo injjeyanaadan , nuuyyookka Xoossaa woossite ; aissi giikko , ha77i taani qasho keettan de7iyoogee hegaassa .

text: That I may make it manifest , as I ought to speak .
text2: Qassikka taani bessiyaagaa keenaa qonccissada ha yohuwaa yootana mala , taayyo Xoossaa woossite .

text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without , redeeming the time .
text2: Intteyyo de7iya wodiyaa go77i bainnasan xaissennan , ammanennaageetu matan hayyottidi de7ite .

text: Let your speech be alway with grace , seasoned with salt , that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man .
text2: Intte asa ubbau waati zaaranau bessiyaakko erana mala , intte haasayai ubba wode , siyanau kehiyaagaanne ufaissiyaagaa gidanau bessees .

text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you , who is a beloved brother , and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord :
text2: Nu siiqo ishai Tikiqoosi , tanaara issippe Godaa oosuwan ashkkara gidida ammanettiya oosanchchai , ta de7uwaabaa inttena erissana .

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that he might know your estate , and comfort your hearts ;
text2: Taani a inttekko kiittiyoogee , nuuni waani de7iyaakko intteyyo i yootidi , inttena minttettana gishshassa .

text: With Onesimus , a faithful and beloved brother , who is one of you . They shall make known unto you all things which are done here .
text2: Anaasimoosi , ammanettiya siiqo ishai , intte biittaagee , aara issippe inttekko bees ; eti hagan haniya ubbabaa inttena erissana .

text: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you , and Marcus , sister ' s son to Barnabas , ( touching whom ye received commandments : if he come unto you , receive him ; )
text2: Tanaara qashuwan de7iya Arisxxirokoosinne Barnnaabaasayyo ishaa na7ai Marqqoosi inttena saro de7eetii goosona ; taani inttena kase azazidoogaadan , Marqqoosi inttekko biikko , wozanappe a mokkite .

text: And Jesus , which is called Justus , who are of the circumcision . These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God , which have been a comfort unto me .
text2: Yosxxoosa giyo Yesuusikka inttena saro saro gees ; Aihuda asatuppe tanaara Xoossaa kawotettaayyo oottiyai , ha heezzu asatuppe harai baawa ; hageeti tana daro maaddidosona .

text: Epaphras , who is one of you , a servant of Christ , saluteth you , always labouring fervently for you in prayers , that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God .
text2: Eppaafiri , intte biittaagee , Kiristtoos Yesuusa ashkkarai , inttena saro saro gees . I intte Xoossan minnidi eqqanaadaaninne Xoossai koyiyoobai ubbai aibakko eridi , poli ammananaadan , ubba wode Xoossaa mintti woossees .

text: For I bear him record , that he hath a great zeal for you , and them that are in Laodicea , and them in Hierapolis .
text2: Aissi giikko , i intteyyo , Lodooqiyaa asaayyoonne Hirapoliisa giyo katamaa asaayyo daro daafuriyoogaa taani markkattais .

text: Luke , the beloved physician , and Demas , greet you .
text2: Nu siiqo dottoree Luqaasinne Deemaasi inttena saro de7eetii yaagoosona .

text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea , and Nymphas , and the church which is in his house .
text2: Lodooqiyan de7iya nu ishanttuyyoonne Nimppiyyo qassi i keettan shiiqiya asaayyo nu sarotaa yootite .

text: And when this epistle is read among you , cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans ; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea .
text2: Ha dabddaabbiyaa intte nabbabidoogaappe guyyiyan , Lodooqiyaa woosa keettankka nabbabissite ; inttekka Lodooqiyaa woosa keettaikka intteyyo yeddiyo dabddaabbiyaa nabbabite .

text: And say to Archippus , Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord , that thou fulfil it .
text2: Qassi Arkkipoosayyo , “ Godai neeyyo immido oosuwaa polanaagaa dogoppa ” yaagidi yootite .

text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Taani PHauloosi , ta kushiyan saro gaada xaafidoogaa hagaa be7ite ; taani qashuwan de7iyoogaa dogoppite . Xoossaa aaro kehatettai inttenaara gido .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Nuuni PHauloosi , Sillaasinne Ximootiyoosi Tasalonqqe woosa keettan de7iya asaayyo ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafoos ; he woosa keettai Xoossaa nu Aawaabaanne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosabaa . Xoossaa nu Aawaappenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe , aaro kehatettainne sarotettai intteyyo gido .

text: We give thanks to God always for you all , making mention of you in our prayers ;
text2: Nuuni Xoossaa woossiyo wode inttena hassayidi , intteyyo ubbaayyo ubba wode Xoossaa galatoos .

text: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith , and labour of love , and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ , in the sight of God and our Father ;
text2: Nuuni nu Xoossaa , nu Aawaa sinttan ammanuwan intte oottido oosuwaanne , siiquwan intte daafurido daafuraa , qassi Xoossai intteyyo nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara immana giidoogaa ekkanau gencciyo genccaa ubba wode hassayoos .

text: Knowing , brethren beloved , your election of God .
text2: Nu ishatoo , Xoossai inttena siiqiyoogaanne inttena babaa oottanau dooridoogaa nuuni eroos .

text: For our gospel came not unto you in word only , but also in power , and in the Holy Ghost , and in much assurance ; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni wonggeliyaa wolqqan , Geeshsha Ayyaanaaninne he wonggelee tuma gididoogaa wurssi ammaniyoogan intteyyo ehiidoogaappe attin , doona xalaalan ehibookko . Nuuni inttenaara de7iyo wode , intte gishshau waani de7idaakko , intte ereeta .

text: And ye became followers of us , and of the Lord , having received the word in much affliction , with joy of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Qassi intte daro waayettikkokka , Geeshsha Ayyaanai immido ufaissaara kiitaa ekkideta ; nunanne Godaa milatideta .

text: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Maqidooniyaa giyo biittaaninne Akaayiyaa giyo biittan de7iya ammaniya ubbatuyyo leemiso gidideta .

text: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia , but also in every place your faith to God - ward is spread abroad ; so that we need not to speak any thing .
text2: Aissi giikko , Godaa qaalai intteppe kiyidi , Maqidooniyaaninne Akaayiyaa xalaalan siyettibeenna ; shin Xoossaa intte ammaniyoogee ubbasan siyettiis . Simmi nuuni haasayanau koshshiyaabi aibinne baawa .

text: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you , and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God ;
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni inttekko biido wode , intte nuna waati mokkidaakkonne qassi intte intte eeqaa aggidi , worddotenna de7o Xoossaayyo oottanau waani simmidaakko , eti bantta huuphen haasayoosona .

text: And to wait for his Son from heaven , whom he raised from the dead , even Jesus , which delivered us from the wrath to come .
text2: Qassi Xoossaa Na7ai Yesuusi , Xoossai haiquwaappe denttidoogee , nuna sinttappe yaana Xoossaa hanqquwaappe ashshiyaagee saluwaappe yaanaagaa intte naagiyoogaa eti haasayoosona .

text: For yourselves , brethren , know our entrance in unto you , that it was not in vain :
text2: Ta ishatoo , nuuni inttekko biidoogee mela gidennaagaa intte intte huuphen ereeta .

text: But even after that we had suffered before , and were shamefully entreated , as ye know , at Philippi , we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention .
text2: SHin nuuni inttekko yaanaappe kase Piliphphisiyuusa giyo kataman waayettidoogaanne cayettidoogaa intte ereeta ; daro phalqqettai de7ikkokka , intteyyo a wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootana mala , Xoossai nuuyyo minotettaa immiis .

text: For our exhortation was not of deceit , nor of uncleanness , nor in guile :
text2: Nuuni inttena woossiyoogee balan woi tunatettan woi geniyan gidenna .

text: But as we were allowed of God to be put in trust with the gospel , even so we speak ; not as pleasing men , but God , which trieth our hearts .
text2: SHin Xoossai wonggeliyaa hadaraa ekkanau nuuni ammanettiyaageeta gidin , nuuyyo he hadaraa immiis ; he immidoogaadankka nuuni haasayoos . Qassi nuuni nu wozanaa xomoosiya Xoossaa ufaissiyaagaadan haasayoosippe attin , asa ufaissiyaagaadan haasayokko .

text: For neither at any time used we flattering words , as ye know , nor a cloke of covetousness ; God is witness :
text2: Nuuni inttekko cimo haasayaara yibeennaagaa , woikko nuuni uuzettiyoogaa genttiya haasayaa haasayibeennaagaa intte loitti ereeta ; Xoossaikka nuuyyo markka .

text: Nor of men sought we glory , neither of you , nor yet of others , when we might have been burdensome , as the apostles of Christ .
text2: Nuuni Kiristtoosi kiittidoogeeta gidiiddi , intteppe bonchcho ekkanau danddayikkokka , ooppenne intteppe gidin woi haratuppekka gidin , bonchcho koyibookko .

text: But we were gentle among you , even as a nurse cherisheth her children :
text2: SHin nuuni aayyiyaa ba naata dichchiyoogaadan , intte giddon ashkke gidida .

text: So being affectionately desirous of you , we were willing to have imparted unto you , not the gospel of God only , but also our own souls , because ye were dear unto us .
text2: Inttena siiqido gishshau , Xoossaa wonggeliyaa intteyyo immanaagaa xalaala gidennan , nu de7uwaakka intteyyo immanau giigi uttida ; aissi giikko , intte nuuyyo daro al77o .

text: For ye remember , brethren , our labour and travail : for labouring night and day , because we would not be chargeable unto any of you , we preached unto you the gospel of God .
text2: Ta ishatoo , nu oosuwaanne nu daafuraa intte akeekeeta ; intteyyo Xoossaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiiddi , inttena ainne waayissenna mala , qamminne gallassi nuuni oottida .

text: Ye are witnesses , and God also , how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe :
text2: Nu de7oi intte matan , ammaniyaageetu matan , geeshsha , xillonne borettennaagaa gidiyoogau intte markka ; qassi Xoossaikka markka .

text: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,
text2: Nuuni intteyyo huuphiyan huuphiyan aawai ba naatuyyo haniyoogaadan hanidoogaa ereeta .

text: That ye would walk worthy of God , who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory .
text2: Nuuni inttena zorida ; minttettida . Qassi a kawotettaanne a bonchchuwaa shaakkanau inttena xeesiya Xoossaa ufaissiya de7uwaa intte de7ana mala , intteyyo minttidi yootida .

text: For this cause also thank we God without ceasing , because , when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us , ye received it not as the word of men , but as it is in truth , the word of God , which effectually worketh also in you that believe .
text2: Intte nuuppe Xoossaa qaalaa tuma gididoogaadan ekkido wode , Xoossaa kiitadan ekkidoogaappe attin , asa kiitadan ekkibeenna gishshau , nuuni Xoossaa ubba wode hegaa gaasuwan galatoos ; Xoossaa qaalai ammaniyaageetun , inttenan oottees .

text: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :
text2: Aissi giikko , ta ishatoo , Kiristtoos Yesuusayyo Yihudaa giyo biittan de7iya woosa keettatuura , intte leemisetteeta ; hegeeti Xoossaa woosa keettata . Aihudati eta waissidoogaadan , intte biittaa asaikka inttena waissiis .

text: Who both killed the Lord Jesus , and their own prophets , and have persecuted us ; and they please not God , and are contrary to all men :
text2: He Aihudati Godaa Yesuusanne hananabaa yootiyaageeta woridosona ; qassi nuna yedettidosona . Eti Xoossaa ufaissokkona ; asa ubbaakka ixxoosona .

text: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
text2: Aihuda gidenna asai attana mala , nuuni etau qaalaa yootiyoogaa diggoosona . Qassi eta nagaraikka ubba wode dari dari bees . SHin wurssettan Xoossaa hanqqoi eta bolli wodhdhiis .

text: But we , brethren , being taken from you for a short time in presence , not in heart , endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire .
text2: SHin ta ishatoo , nuuni nu qofan gidennan , asatettaa xalaalan intteppe guutta wodiyau shaahettido wode , inttena daro laamotidi , be7anau keehi koyida .

text: Wherefore we would have come unto you , even I Paul , once and again ; but Satan hindered us .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni inttekko simmidi baanau koyida . Harai atto , taani PHauloosikka darotoo inttekko baanau mala be7aas ; shin Seexaanai nuna diggiis .

text: For what is our hope , or joy , or crown of rejoicing ? Are not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming ?
text2: Aissi giikko , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosi yiyo wode , nuuni be7ana giidi ufaissan naagiyoogee , woikko nu ufaissai , woikko nuuni ceeqettiyo akiliile oonee ? Inttena gidekketiiyye ?

text: For ye are our glory and joy .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte nu bonchchonne nu ufaissa .

text: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear , we thought it good to be left at Athens alone ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuyyo genccanau danddayettennan ixxido wode , Ateena giyo kataman nurkka attanau qofaa qachchida .

text: And sent Timotheus , our brother , and minister of God , and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ , to establish you , and to comfort you concerning your faith :
text2: Inttena zoranaadaaninne intte ammanuwan inttena minttanaadan , Xoossau oottiya nu ishaa , nunaara issippe Kiristtoosa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiya Ximootiyoosa inttekko kiittida .

text: That no man should be moved by these afflictions : for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto .
text2: Ha waayiyaa gaasuwan intteppe ooninne guyye simmenna mala , a kiittida . Nuuni hegau doorettidoogaa intte intte huuphen ereeta .

text: For verily , when we were with you , we told you before that we should suffer tribulation ; even as it came to pass , and ye know .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni inttenaara de7iiddi , nuuni waayettanaagaa kasetidi intteyyo yootida ; qassi intte eriyoogaadankka kase hegaadan haniis .

text: For this cause , when I could no longer forbear , I sent to know your faith , lest by some means the tempter have tempted you , and our labour be in vain .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , qassi genccanau tau danddayettennan ixxido wode , “ Ooni erii xalahe halaqai eta paaccennan aggenna . Nu daafuraikka mela gidennan aggenna ” yaagada intte ammanuwaabaa eranau Ximootiyoosa inttekko kiittaas .

text: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :
text2: SHin ha77i Ximootiyoosi intte matappe nuukko yiidi , intte ammanuwaabaanne intte siiquwaabaa intteyyo mishiraachcho giidi nuuyyo yootiis . Qassi nuuni inttena be7anau laamotiyoogaadan inttekka nuna be7anau laamotiiddi , ubba wode nuuyyo lo77obaa qoppiyoogaa i yootiis .

text: Therefore , brethren , we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ta ishatoo , nu waayiyaaninne nu tuggan ubban intte ammanuwaa baggaara intteban minettida .

text: For now we live , if ye stand fast in the Lord .
text2: Godan minnidi intte de7ikko , nuunikka tumu de7oos .

text: For what thanks can we render to God again for you , for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God ;
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni inttebaayyo Xoossaa galatoos . Nuuni nu Xoossaa sinttan intte gishshau de7iya ufaissa ubbau a daro galatoos .

text: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face , and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith ?
text2: Nuuni inttena be7anaunne intte ammanuwau paccidabaa kunttanau , qamminne gallassi nu kumetta wozanaappe Xoossaa woossoos .

text: Now God himself and our Father , and our Lord Jesus Christ , direct our way unto you .
text2: Nu Aawai , nu Xoossai ba huuphen , qassi nu Godai Yesuus Kiristtoosi nuuni inttekko biyo ogiyaa nuuyyo giigisso .

text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :
text2: Nuuni inttena keehi siiqiyoogaadan , Xoossai intte issoi issuwaa siiqiyo siiquwaanne qassi asa ubbaa siiqiyo siiquwaa intteyyo darissonne gujjo .

text: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God , even our Father , at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints .
text2: Nu Godai Yesuus Kiristtoosi ba geeshshatu ubbaara yiyo wode , nu Xoossaa , nu aawaa sinttan geeshshatanne borettennaageeta oottidi , inttena i minttetto .

text: Furthermore then we beseech you , brethren , and exhort you by the Lord Jesus , that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God , so ye would abound more and more .
text2: Simmi wurssettan , ta ishatoo , Xoossaa ufaissanau intte waani de7anau bessiyaakko , nuuppe tamaarideta . Hegee intte kaseesappe de7iyo maaraa ; shin ha77i intte kaseegaappe loittidi oottanaadan , Godaa Yesuusa sunttan inttena woossoosinne zoroos .

text: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni Godaa Yesuusa maataa baggaara intteyyo immido azazoi augaakko , intte ereeta .

text: For this is the will of God , even your sanctification , that ye should abstain from fornication :
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai intteppe koyiyoogee aibee giikko , intte geeshsha gidanaagaanne shaaramuxiyoogaa muleera agganaagaa koyees .

text: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;
text2: Intte ubbai huuphen huuphen geeshshatettaaninne bonchchuwan machcho waati ekkiyaakko eranau besseesippe attin ,

text: Not in the lust of concupiscence , even as the Gentiles which know not God :
text2: Xoossaa erenna ammanenna asatudan , keehi amottiyoogan ekkanau bessenna .

text: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter : because that the Lord is the avenger of all such , as we also have forewarned you and testified .
text2: Nuuni qassi kase intteyyo yootidoogaadaaninne inttena mintti zoridoogaadan , Godai hagaa malaban ubban halo kessiyaagaa gidiyo gishshau , ooninne ha yohuwan ba ishaa naaqqanaunne cimmanau bessenna .

text: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness , but unto holiness .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai nuna geeshshatettan de7anau xeesidoogaappe attin , tunatettan de7anau xeesibeenna .

text: He therefore that despiseth , despiseth not man , but God , who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ha timirttiyaa ixxiya ooninne intteyyo ba Geeshsha Ayyaanaa immiya Xoossaa ixxeesippe attin , asa ixxenna .

text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you : for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another .
text2: Intte intte huuphen issoi issuwaa siiqanaadan , Xoossai inttena tamaarissido gishshau , intte intte ishata waati siiqanau bessiyaakko , nuuni xaafanau koshshenna .

text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia : but we beseech you , brethren , that ye increase more and more ;
text2: Qassi Maqidooniyaa biitta ubban de7iya ishata ubbata tumu intte siiqeeta . SHin nu ishatoo , intte hegaappe gujji gujjidi eta siiqana mala , inttena woossoos .

text: And that ye study to be quiet , and to do your own business , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ;
text2: Nuuni kase intteyyo yootidoogaadan , woppu giida de7uwaa de7ite . Qassi intte huuphe oosuwaa oottidi , inttena koshshiyaabaa demmite .

text: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without , and that ye may have lack of nothing .
text2: Hegaa gidikko , ammanennaageetu matan intte bonchchettananne qassi inttena koshshiyaabau oonanne auddashekketa .

text: But I would not have you to be ignorant , brethren , concerning them which are asleep , that ye sorrow not , even as others which have no hope .
text2: SHin nu ishatoo , intte sinttappe demmana giidi ufaissan naagiyoobi bainna asatudan kayyottenna mala , haiqqida asatubaa intte erana mala koyoos .

text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him .
text2: Nuuni Yesuusi haiqqidoogaanne qassi haiquwaappe i denddidoogaa ammanoos ; hegaadankka , Xoossai Yesuusa ammanidi haiqqidaageeta Yesuusaara ehaanaagaa ammanoos .

text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord , that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni intteyyo yootiyo Godaa qaalai hagaa ; nuuni paxa de7iyaageeti , Godai yiyo gallassi hagan de7iyaageeti , haiqqidaageetuppe kasetokko .

text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trump of God : and the dead in Christ shall rise first :
text2: Aissi giikko , Godai ba huuphen azazuwaara , kiitanchchatu halaqaa cenggurssaara , Xoossaa malkkataa giirettaara saluwaappe wodhdhana . Kiristtoosa ammanidi haiqqidaageeti kasetidi haiquwaappe denddana .

text: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air : and so shall we ever be with the Lord .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , nuuni he wode paxa de7iyaageeti , Godaara carkkuwaa giddon gaittanau etaara issippe shaaran pude shiiqana . Hegan nuuni Godaara issippe ubba wode de7ana .

text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ha haasayan issoi issuwaa minttettite .

text: But of the times and the seasons , brethren , ye have no need that I write unto you .
text2: SHin ishatoo , ha yohoti aude hananaakko , wodiyaanne aginaa intteyyo xaafanau koshshenna .

text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night .
text2: Aissi giikko , Godaa gallassai kaisoi qammi yiyoogaadan yaanaagaa intte loitti ereeta .

text: For when they shall say , Peace and safety ; then sudden destruction cometh upon them , as travail upon a woman with child ; and they shall not escape .
text2: Asai , “ Ubbabai saro ; aibikka hanenna ” giishin , maccaasaa maaretai oiqqiyoogaadan , bashshai eti qoppennan eta bolli yaana . Eti mulekka kessi ekkokkona .

text: But ye , brethren , are not in darkness , that that day should overtake you as a thief .
text2: SHin nu ishatoo , he gallassai intteyyo kaisoi yiyoogaadan yaanau intte xuman de7ekketa .

text: Ye are all the children of light , and the children of the day : we are not of the night , nor of darkness .
text2: Intte ubbai poo7uwaa asanne gallassaa asa ; nuuni qammaa asa woi xumaa asa gidokko .

text: Therefore let us not sleep , as do others ; but let us watch and be sober .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni harati xiskkiyoogaadan xiskkanau bessenna . Nuuni beegottanaunne woga de7anau bessees .

text: For they that sleep sleep in the night ; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night .
text2: Aissi giikko , xiskkiyaageeti qammi xiskkoosona ; mattottiyaageetikka qammi mattottoosona .

text: But let us , who are of the day , be sober , putting on the breastplate of faith and love ; and for an helmet , the hope of salvation .
text2: SHin nuuni gallassaa asa gidiyaageeti woga de7anau bessees . Nuuni ammanuwaanne siiquwaa tiran wottiyo ola miishshadan oiqqidi , Xoossai nuuyyo immana gin , nuuni ufaissan naagi uttido atotettaa birata qophedan , huuphiyan wottanau bessees .

text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath , but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai nuna nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara atotettaa demmanau dooridoogaappe attin , a hanqquwaa ekkanau dooribeenna .

text: Who died for us , that , whether we wake or sleep , we should live together with him .
text2: Nuuni paxa gidin woikko haiqqidaageeta gidin , Kiristtoosaara issippe de7ana mala , Kiristtoosi nu gishshau haiqqiis .

text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together , and edify one another , even as also ye do .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte qassi ha77i oottiyoogaadan , issoi issuwaa minttettitenne maaddite .

text: And we beseech you , brethren , to know them which labour among you , and are over you in the Lord , and admonish you ;
text2: Nu ishatoo , intte giddon oottiyaageeta , inttena kaalettanaunne zoranau Godai dooridoogeeta , intte bonchchana mala , inttena woossoos .

text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work ' s sake . And be at peace among yourselves .
text2: Eti oottiyo oosuwaa gishshau , eta keehi bonchchitenne siiqite . Issoi issuwaara sarotettan de7ite .

text: Now we exhort you , brethren , warn them that are unruly , comfort the feebleminded , support the weak , be patient toward all men .
text2: Nu ishatoo , nuuni inttena zoroos ; maari bainna de7uwaa de7iyaageeta seerite . Yayyiyaageeta minttettite . Wolqqi bainnaageeta maaddite . Asa ubbaa danddayite .

text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man ; but ever follow that which is good , both among yourselves , and to all men .
text2: Ooninne iitaa gishshaa iitaa zaarenna mala naagettite ; shin issoi issuwaayyoonne qassi asa ubbaayyo lo77obaa oottanau minnite .

text: Rejoice evermore .
text2: Ubba wode ufaittite .

text: Pray without ceasing .
text2: Ubba wode Xoossaa woossite .

text: In every thing give thanks : for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you .
text2: Ubbaban galatite . Aissi giikko , Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara Xoossai intteppe koyiyoobai hegaa .

text: Quench not the Spirit .
text2: Geeshsha Ayyaanaa doshissoppite .

text: Despise not prophesyings .
text2: Hanana giidi yootido qaalaa karoppite .

text: Prove all things ; hold fast that which is good .
text2: Ubbabaakka paaccite . Lo77obaa oiqqite .

text: Abstain from all appearance of evil .
text2: Iita ooso ubbaappe haakkite .

text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly ; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Sarotettaa Xoossai ba huuphen inttena ubbaban geeshsho ; qassi nu Godai Yesuusi Kiristtoosi yiyo wode , Xoossai intte ayyaanaa , shemppuwaanne kumetta asatettaa borettennaagaa oottidi naago .

text: Faithful is he that calleth you , who also will do it .
text2: Inttena xeesiyaagee ammanettidaagaa ; qassi hegaa i polana .

text: Brethren , pray for us .
text2: Nu ishatoo , nuuyyo Xoossaa woossite .

text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss .
text2: Ishantta ubbaa geeshsha yeruwaa yeridi sarotite .

text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren .
text2: Intte ha kiitaa geeshsha ishanttu ubbaayyo nabbabanaadan , Godaa sunttan inttena woossais .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aaro kehatettai inttenaara issippe gido . Amin77i .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Nuuni PHauloosi , Sillaasinne Ximootiyoosi , Tasalonqqe woosa keettan de7iya asaayyo ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafoos . He woosa keettai Xoossaa nu Aawaabaanne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosabaa .

text: Grace unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Xoossaa nu Aawaappenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe , aaro kehatettainne sarotettai intteyyo gido .

text: We are bound to thank God always for you , brethren , as it is meet , because that your faith groweth exceedingly , and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth ;
text2: Nu ishatoo , intte ammanoi keehi dicciyo gishshaunne , intte issoi issuwaa siiqiyo siiqoi dariyo gishshau , nuuni intteyyo bessiyaadan , Xoossaa ubba wode galatanau bessees .

text: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , inttena yedetainne waaye ubbai gakkinkka intte gencciyoogaanne ammaniyoogaa nuuni nu huuphen Xoossaa woosa keettaayyo yootiiddi , intteban ceeqettoos .

text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God , that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God , for which ye also suffer :
text2: Intte waayettiyo Xoossaa kawotettaayyo bessiyaageeta gididi qoodettana mala , Xoossai pirddiyo xillo pirddau hagee malaata .

text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you ;
text2: Xoossai tumu pirddaa pirddana . Godai Yesuusi ba wolqqaama kiitanchchatuura tamaa lacuwaa giddon saluwaappe yiyo wode , Xoossai inttena waissiyaageetu bolli waayiyaa ehaana . Qassi waayettiya inttenanne nuna shemppissana .

text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God , and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Qassi Xoossai bana erennaageetanne nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaayyo azazettennaageeta qaxxayana .

text: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord , and from the glory of his power ;
text2: He gallassi , i ba geeshshatu ubban bonchchettanaunne qassi bana ammaniya ubbatun sabettanau yiyo wode , eti Godaa sinttappenne a wolqqaa bonchchuwaappe shaahettidi , merinaa bashshan qaxxayettana . Nuuni intteyyo yootido kiitaa intte ammanido gishshau , intte a bonchchiyaageetu giddooninne sabbiyaageetu giddon de7ana .

text: Wherefore also we pray always for you , that our God would count you worthy of this calling , and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness , and the work of faith with power :
text2: Nuuni intteyyo ubba wode Xoossaa woossiyoogee hegaassa . Nu Xoossai xeesido de7uwau inttena bessiyaageeta giidi qoodanaadan , nuuni a woossoos ; intte lo77obaa amottiyoogaanne intte ammanuwaa oosuwaa i ba wolqqan polo .

text: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you , and ye in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Hegan nu Xoossaa aaro kehatettaaninne qassi nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aaro kehatettan , Godaa Yesuusa sunttaa intte bonchchana ; inttenakka i bonchchana .

text: Now we beseech you , brethren , by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , and by our gathering together unto him ,
text2: Ha77i nu ishatoo , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa yuussaabaunne nuuni aara de7anau akko shiiqanabau ,

text: That ye be not soon shaken in mind , or be troubled , neither by spirit , nor by word , nor by letter as from us , as that the day of Christ is at hand .
text2: hananabaa asi intteyyo yootiyooban woi hara asappe siyido qaalan , woi ooninne nuuppe yiida kiitadan haasayiyoogan , “ Godaa gallassai gakkiis ” giidi intte dagammennaadaaninne wozanaa bayennaadan , nuuni inttena woossoos .

text: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;
text2: Inttena ooninne ai ogiyaaninne balettoppo . Aissi giikko , kasetidi makkaliyoogeenne qassi nagaranchchai , bashshaa na7ai qonccennan de7ishin , he gallassai gakkenna .

text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God , or that is worshipped ; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God , shewing himself that he is God .
text2: Asi goinniyo ubbabaanne asi Xoossa giyo ubbabaa i ixxana . I bana eta ubbaappe xoqqu oottana . Qassi harai atto Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyaa geli uttidikka , “ Taani Xoossaa ” gaana .

text: Remember ye not , that , when I was yet with you , I told you these things ?
text2: Intte hassayekketii ? Taani hegaa intteyyo inttenaara de7aidda odaas .

text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time .
text2: I ba qaxaruwaa gallassi yaanaappe attin , ha77i yaanaagaa aibi a teqqiyaakko , intte ereeta .

text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work : only he who now letteth will let , until he be taken out of the way .
text2: Aissi giikko , asau qonccibeenna makkalaa wolqqai ha77i oottees ; shin he teqqiyaagee ogiyaappe kichchana gakkanaassi , i qonccenna .

text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed , whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth , and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming :
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , he makkalanchchai qonccin , Godai Yesuusi ba doonaa shemppuwan a worana . Qassi i yiyo wode ba bonchcho Yuussan a xaissana .

text: Even him , whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders ,
text2: He makkalanchchai Seexaanaa wolqqaara yiidi , Xoossai oottiyo malaata ubbaa , worddo malaataanne garamissiyaabaa oottana .

text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish ; because they received not the love of the truth , that they might be saved .
text2: Hegaadankka , qassi xayiya asata dumma dumma iita cimuwan balettana . Xayiyaageeti attanau tumatettaa siiqidi ekkibeenna gishshau xayana .

text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion , that they should believe a lie :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , tumatettaa ammanibeenna asati , nagara oottiyoogan ufaittiyaageeti ubbai pirddettanaadaaninne worddo gidiyaabaa ammananaadan , Xoossai wolqqaama balaa eta giddo yeddana .

text: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you , brethren beloved of the Lord , because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth :
text2: SHin Godai siiqiyo nu ishatoo , nuuni Xoossaa intte gishshau , ubba wode galatanau bessees . Aissi giikko , Geeshsha Ayyaanaa wolqqan inttena ba geeshsha asa oottiyoogaaninne tumatettaa intte ammaniyoogan inttena ashshanau , Xoossai inttena bairadan dooriis .

text: Whereunto he called you by our gospel , to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Xoossai inttena nuuni intteyyo yootido nu wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa baggaara xeesidoogee , intte nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosaara issippe bonchchettanaassa .

text: Therefore , brethren , stand fast , and hold the traditions which ye have been taught , whether by word , or our epistle .
text2: Simmi nu ishatoo , minnidi eqqite ; nuuni inttena nu doonan gidin , woi nu dabddaabbiyan gidin , tamaarissido wogaa oiqqite .

text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself , and God , even our Father , which hath loved us , and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace ,
text2: Nu Godai Yesuus Kiristtoosi ba huuphen qassi Xoossai , nu Aawai nuna siiqidi , ba aaro kehatettan nuuyyo merinaa danddayaanne sinttappe ekkana giyo lo77o ufaissaa immidaagee , inttena minttetto ; qassi intte lo77obaa ubbaa oottanaadaaninne haasayanaadan , inttena minttetto .

text: Finally , brethren , pray for us , that the word of the Lord may have free course , and be glorified , even as it is with you :
text2: Wurssettan nu ishatoo , Godaa qaalai intte giddon , eesuwan aakkanaadaaninne bonchchettanaadan , nuuyyo Xoossaa woossite .

text: And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men : for all men have not faith .
text2: Qassi asai ubbai qaalaa ammanenna gishshau , Xoossai nuna nagaranchcha asatuppenne iita asatuppe ashshana mala , nuuyyo woossite .

text: But the Lord is faithful , who shall stablish you , and keep you from evil .
text2: SHin Godai ammanettiyaagaa ; i inttena minttettananne qassi iitaappekka naagana .

text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you , that ye both do and will do the things which we command you .
text2: Nuuni inttena azaziyoogaa intte ha77i oottiyoogaanne qassi sinttappekka oottanaagaa Godai nuna intteban ammanttees .

text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God , and into the patient waiting for Christ .
text2: Godai intte wozanaa Xoossaa siiquwaakkonne Kiristtoosi immiyo danddayaakko kaaletto .

text: Now we command you , brethren , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly , and not after the tradition which he received of us .
text2: Nu ishatoo , intte nuuppe ekkido wogaa kaallennan azalla de7uwaa de7iya isha ubbaappe intte shaahettanaadan , Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan inttena azazoos .

text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us : for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you ;
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni inttenaara de7iyo wode azallibeenna gishshau , intte nunadan hanidi de7anau bessiyoogaa intte intte huuphen ereeta .

text: Neither did we eat any man ' s bread for nought ; but wrought with labour and travail night and day , that we might not be chargeable to any of you :
text2: Nuuni intteppe oossinne tooho gidenna mala , qamminne gallassi daafuriiddinne jaamiiddi oottidi de7idoogaappe attin , bessiyaagaa oottennan ooppenne quma coo mibookko .

text: Not because we have not power , but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us .
text2: Nuuni hegaa oottidoogee intte nunadan hanidi de7anaadan , nuuni intteyyo leemiso gidanaassappe attin , hegaa inttena oichchanau nuuyyo maati xayiina gidenna .

text: For even when we were with you , this we commanded you , that if any would not work , neither should he eat .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni harai atto inttenaara de7iiddikka , “ Oottanau koyenna urai ooninne mooppo ” yaagidi inttena azazida .

text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly , working not at all , but are busybodies .
text2: Aissi giikko , asa yohon geliyoogaappe attin , ainne oottennaageeti , azalla de7uwaa de7iya amarida asati intte giddon de7iyoogaa nuuni siyida .

text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ , that with quietness they work , and eat their own bread .
text2: Nuuni hegeetu mala asati maara de7uwaa de7anaadaaninne banttana koshshiyaabaa oottidi demmanaadan , Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan eta azazoosinne zoroos .

text: But ye , brethren , be not weary in well doing .
text2: SHin intte nu ishatoo , lo77o oosuwaa oottanau azalloppite .

text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle , note that man , and have no company with him , that he may be ashamed .
text2: Qassi nuuni ha dabddaabbiyan kiittido kiitaayyo azazettenna urai ooninne de7ikko , he uraa akeekite . I yeellatana mala , appe shaahettite .

text: Yet count him not as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
text2: SHin ishadan a seeriteppe attin , morkkedan xeelloppite .

text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means . The Lord be with you all .
text2: Sarotettaa Godai ba huuphen intteyyo ubba wodenne ubba baggaara sarotettaa immo . Godai inttenaara ubbaara gido .

text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand , which is the token in every epistle : so I write .
text2: Taani PHauloosi , ha kiitaa ta kushiyan xaafaas ; ta kiita ubbau malaatai hagaa . Taani hagaadan xaafais .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aaro kehatettai inttenaara ubbaara gido .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour , and Lord Jesus Christ , which is our hope ;
text2: Nuna ashshiya Xoossainne nuuni be7ana giidi ufaissan naagiyo Yesuus Kiristtoosi azazido azazuwaadan , Yesuus Kiristtoosi kiittidoogaa gidida taani PHauloosi ,

text: Unto Timothy , my own son in the faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: ammanuwaa baggaara ta tumu na7au , Ximootiyoosau ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafais . Xoossaa nu Aawaappenne nu Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusappe aaro kehatettai , maarotettainne sarotettai neeyyo gido .

text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus , when I went into Macedonia , that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine ,
text2: Taani Maqidooniyaa baidda neeyyo giidoogaadan , neeni Efisoonan takkana mala koyais . Issi issi asati worddo timirttiyaa tamaarissoosona ; hegeeti tamaarissenna mala , aggite gaada oda .

text: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies , which minister questions , rather than godly edifying which is in faith : so do .
text2: Eti haisiyaa yootiyoogaanne bantta zariyaa gairiyoogaa agganaadan oda . Aissi giikko , hegaa malabai palamaa kaalettees ; qassi Xoossaa qofaa ammanuwan erettiyaagaa oottokkona .

text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart , and of a good conscience , and of faith unfeigned :
text2: Ha azazuwau waanna qofai geeshsha wozanaappe , lo77o zoriya wozanaappe , asi be7o giyoobi bainna ammanuwaappe beettiya siiquwaa denttettanaassa .

text: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling ;
text2: Issi issi asati hagaa aggidi , pattenna haasayaakko simmidosona .

text: Desiring to be teachers of the law ; understanding neither what they say , nor whereof they affirm .
text2: Eti ai haasayiyaakkonne woikko tumayidi yootiyoobai aibakko erokkona ; shin Xoossaa higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeta gidanau koyoosona .

text: But we know that the law is good , if a man use it lawfully ;
text2: Asai bessiyaagaadan higgiyan go7ettikko , higgee lo77o gidiyoogaa nuuni eroos .

text: Knowing this , that the law is not made for a righteous man , but for the lawless and disobedient , for the ungodly and for sinners , for unholy and profane , for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers , for manslayers ,
text2: Issibaa akeekanau koshshees . Higgee lo77o asau merettibeenna . SHin higgiyaa menttiyaageetuyyo , azazettennaageetuyyo , makkalanchchatuyyo , nagaranchchatuyyo , geeshshatetti bainnaageetuyyo , tunatuyyo , bantta aayyiyo woikko aawaa woriyaageetuyyo , shemppuwaa woriyaageetuyyo ,

text: For whoremongers , for them that defile themselves with mankind , for menstealers , for liars , for perjured persons , and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine ;
text2: shaaramuxanau qaaqqatiyaageetuyyo , attumaasai attumaasaara shaaramuxiyaageetuyyo , asa baizziyaageetuyyo , worddanchchatuyyoonne wordduwan caaqqiyaageetuyyo , woikko tumu timirttiyaara gaittenna ai ooso gidinkka oottiyaageetuyyo kiyiis .

text: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God , which was committed to my trust .
text2: Qassi anjjettida Xoossai taani awaajjana mala , tau hadaraa immido bonchcho wonggeliyaa giddon he timirttee de7iyoogaakka nuuni eroos .

text: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord , who hath enabled me , for that he counted me faithful , putting me into the ministry ;
text2: Taani oottiyo oosuwan taayyo wolqqaa immida nu Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa galatais . Tana ba oosuwau sunttidi , tana he oosuwau bessiyaagaa giidi qoodiyo gishshaukka a galatais .

text: Who was before a blasphemer , and a persecutor , and injurious : but I obtained mercy , because I did it ignorantly in unbelief .
text2: Taani hagaappe kase a cayiyaagaa , a yedettiyaagaanne tuggayiyaagaa gidikkokka , taayyo hagaa i oottiis . SHin taani erennan oottido gishshaunne ammanabeenna gishshau , Xoossai tana maariis .

text: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Qassi nu Godai zawai bainna ba aaro kehatettaa ta bollan gussidi , Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara nubaa gidiya ammanuwaanne siiquwaa taayyo immiis .

text: This is a faithful saying , and worthy of all acceptation , that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners ; of whom I am chief .
text2: Kiristtoos Yesuusi nagaranchchata ashshanau ha sa7aa yiis giyo haasayai ammanettidaagaanne asai ubbai tuma giidi ekkanau bessiyaabaa . Ubbaappe aadhdhiya nagaranchchai tana .

text: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy , that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering , for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting .
text2: SHin merinaa de7uwaa ekkanau aani ammananau bessiya asau taani leemiso gidanaadan , ubbaappe aadhdhiya nagaranchchau taayyo Yesuus Kiristtoosi keehi danddayidoogaadan , Xoossai tana maariis .

text: Now unto the King eternal , immortal , invisible , the only wise God , be honour and glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Aifiyan beettenna merinaa Xoossau issuwau , merinaa Kawuwau , merinaappe merinaa gakkanaassi galatainne bonchchoi gido .

text: This charge I commit unto thee , son Timothy , according to the prophecies which went before on thee , that thou by them mightest war a good warfare ;
text2: Ta na7aa Ximootiyoosaa , kase nebaa hananabaa yootidoogaadan , he yootidoogan lo77o olaa neeni olettana mala , ha azazuwaa neeyyo hadaraa immais .

text: Holding faith , and a good conscience ; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck :
text2: Ammanoinne lo77o zoriya wozanai neeyyo de7o . Issooti issooti banttana zoriya wozanaa yeggi aggidi , laaggiyaabi bainna markkabee bayiyoogaadan , bantta ammanuwaa bashshidosona .

text: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander ; whom I have delivered unto Satan , that they may learn not to blaspheme .
text2: Xoossaa cayiyoogaa aggana mala , hegaa tamaaranau taani Seexaanau aatta immido Hemeneyoosinne Iskkinddiri eta giddon de7oosona .

text: I exhort therefore , that , first of all , supplications , prayers , intercessions , and giving of thanks , be made for all men ;
text2: Nuuni Xoossaa milatiyoogan , geeshshatetta ubban , sarotettaaninne ashkketettan de7ana mala , asa ubbau , kawotuyyoonne sunttatettai de7iyo ubbatuyyo , Xoossaa oichchanau , woossanau , gaannatanaunne galatanau bessiyoogaa ubbabaappe kasetada taani nena erissais .

text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour ;
text2: Asai ubbai attanaadaaninne tumatettaa eranaadan koyiya nuna ashshiya Xoossaa sinttan hagee lo77iyaabaanne ufaissiyaabaa .

text: For there is one God , and one mediator between God and men , the man Christ Jesus ;
text2: Aissi giikko , issi Xoossai de7ees ; Xoossaappenne asaappe gidduwan gididi gaannatiya issoi de7ees . Hegeekka Kiristtoos Yesuusa giyo asa .

text: Who gave himself a ransom for all , to be testified in due time .
text2: I asaa ubbaa wozanau bana ubbau immiis . Xoossai ba wodiyan asa ubbaa wozanau koyiyoogaa bessiya markkai hagaa .

text: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher , and an apostle , ( I speak the truth in Christ , and lie not ; ) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity .
text2: Taani Xoossaa qaalaa yootiyaagaa , Yesuusi kiittidoogaanne qassi ammanuwaaninne tumatettan Aihuda gidenna asaa tamaarissiyaagaa gidada sunttettidoogee hegaassa . Taani worddotikke ; tumaa haasayais .

text: I will therefore that men pray every where , lifting up holy hands , without wrath and doubting .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ubbasan de7iya attumaasai hanqqoinne palami bainnan , ba geeshsha kushiyaa pude denttidi , Xoossaa woossanaadan , taani koyais .

text: In like manner also , that women adorn themselves in modest apparel , with shamefacedness and sobriety ; not with broided hair , or gold , or pearls , or costly array ;
text2: Hegaadan qassi maccaasaikka bessiya maayuwaa kiphataaninne banttana shiishshi ekkiyoogan maayona . Xoossau yayyais giya maccaasau bessiyoogaadan , lo77obaa oottiyoogaanappe attin , huuphiyaa shurubbaa daddiyoogan , worqqan woikko inqquwan , woikko daro al77o afalan banttana alleeqissoppona .

text: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection .
text2: Maccaasai ubbaban haarettidi , co77u giidi tamaaro .

text: But I suffer not a woman to teach , nor to usurp authority over the man , but to be in silence .
text2: Taani maccaasai co77u giidi de7ona gaisippe attin , attumaasaa tamaarissona woikko eta bolli aawatona giikke .

text: For Adam was first formed , then Eve .
text2: Aissi giikko , Addaamee koiro merettiis ; Hewaana guyyeppe merettaasu .

text: And Adam was not deceived , but the woman being deceived was in the transgression .
text2: Hewaana cimettada Xoossaa higgiyaa menttaasuppe attin , Addaamee cimettibeenna .

text: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing , if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety .
text2: SHin maccaasai ammanuwan , siiquwan , geeshshatettaaninne banttana kiphatiyoogan de7ikko , naata yeliyoogan attana .

text: This is a true saying , If a man desire the office of a bishop , he desireth a good work .
text2: Ooninne woosa keettaa kaalettiyaagaa gidanau koyikko , lo77obaa amottiis giyo haasayai tuma .

text: A bishop then must be blameless , the husband of one wife , vigilant , sober , of good behaviour , given to hospitality , apt to teach ;
text2: Woosa keettaa kaalettiya urai borettennaagaa , issi machchee xalaalai de7iyoogaa , kiphatanchchaa , bana naagiyaagaa , bau bessiyaabaa oottiyaagaa , imattaa mokkiyaagaa , tamaarissanau danddayiyaagaa ,

text: Not given to wine , no striker , not greedy of filthy lucre ; but patient , not a brawler , not covetous ;
text2: mattottennaagaa , ashkketettappe attin ooyettennaagaa , palamettennaagaa , miishsha siiqennaagaa ,

text: One that ruleth well his own house , having his children in subjection with all gravity ;
text2: naati ayyo azazettiyoogaanne bonchchiyoogaa , qassi ba keettaa aissanau danddayiyaagaa gidanau bessees .

text: ( For if a man know not how to rule his own house , how shall he take care of the church of God ? )
text2: Aissi giikko , issi urai ba keettaa aissanau danddayennaagaa gidikko , Xoossaa woosa keettaa waati aissanau danddayii ?

text: Not a novice , lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the condemnation of the devil .
text2: Otoruwan sugettidi , xalahe halaqai Xoossaa pirddan kunddidoogaadan kunddenna mala , ooratta ammanida asa gidanau bessenna .

text: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without ; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil .
text2: Xalahe halaqaa boriyaaninne piriyan gelenna mala , he aawi woosa keettaappe kareera de7iya asan nashettiyaagaa gidanau bessees .

text: Likewise must the deacons be grave , not doubletongued , not given to much wine , not greedy of filthy lucre ;
text2: Hegaadan qassi woosa keettan oottiyaageeti cinccata , naa77a haasayennaageeta , daro woiniyaa eessaa uyennaageeta , yaaretennaageeta ,

text: Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience .
text2: ammanuwaa xuuraa geeshsha zoriya wozanan naagiyaageeta gidanau bessees .

text: And let these also first be proved ; then let them use the office of a deacon , being found blameless .
text2: Hegeeti kasetidi paacettanau koshshees . Paaciyaa aadhdhidoogaappe guyyiyan , woosa keettan oottiyaageeta gididi oottona .

text: Even so must their wives be grave , not slanderers , sober , faithful in all things .
text2: Hegaadan qassi eta maccaasati cinccata , zigirennaageeta , kiphatanchchata , ubbaban ammanettiyaageeta gidanau bessees .

text: Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife , ruling their children and their own houses well .
text2: Woosa keettan oottiyaagee issi machchee xalaalai de7iyoogaanne qassi ba naatanne ba keettaa loitti aissiyaagaa gidanau bessees .

text: For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase to themselves a good degree , and great boldness in the faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Aissi giikko , woosa keettaa maaddiyaageeta gididi , lo77o ooso oottiyaageeti bantta huuphiyau gita bonchchuwaa demmoosona ; qassi Kiristtoos Yesuusan banttau de7iya ammanuwaa keehi xalidi haasayanau danddayoosona .

text: These things write I unto thee , hoping to come unto thee shortly :
text2: Taani neekko eesuwan baana gaada hagaa neeyyo xaafais .

text: But if I tarry long , that thou mayest know how thou oughtest to behave thyself in the house of God , which is the church of the living God , the pillar and ground of the truth .
text2: SHin taani beennan gam77ikko , Xoossaa keettan neeni waana de7anau bessiyaakko erana mala xaafais . He keettai tumatettau tuussanne tuuqe gidiya de7o Xoossaa woosa keettaa .

text: And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness : God was manifest in the flesh , justified in the Spirit , seen of angels , preached unto the Gentiles , believed on in the world , received up into glory .
text2: Nu ammanuwaa xuurai gita gidiyoogaa ooninne kashi gaanau danddayenna . Kiristtoosi ashuwan qoncciis ; i xillo gidiyoogaa Geeshsha Ayyaanai markkattiis . Kiitanchchatikka a be7idosona ; Aihuda gidenna asai abaa yootin siyiis . Sa7an de7iya asai a ammaniis ; bonchchuwan i saluwaa biis .

text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly , that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith , giving heed to seducing spirits , and doctrines of devils ;
text2: Issi issi asai wurssetta wodiyan ammanuwaa agganaagaa Geeshsha Ayyaanai qoncciyan yootiis . Eti worddo ayyaanatuyyo azazettana ; qassi xalahetu timirttiyaa kaallana .

text: Speaking lies in hypocrisy ; having their conscience seared with a hot iron ;
text2: Hagaa mala timirttee zoriya wozanai taman bonqqida biratan xuuggidobaadan donjjillida worddanchcha asatu baggaara yiis .

text: Forbidding to marry , and commanding to abstain from meats , which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of them which believe and know the truth .
text2: Hageetu mala asati ekkiyoogaanne geliyoogaa qassi issi issi qommo kattaa miyoogaa diggoosona . SHin ammaniyaageetinne tumatettaa eriyaageeti Xoossaa galatidoogaappe guyyiyan maana mala , Xoossai kattaa medhdhiis .

text: For every creature of God is good , and nothing to be refused , if it be received with thanksgiving :
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai medhdhidobai ubbabaikka lo77o . Xoossaa galatidi ekkikko , wora yeggiyo aibinne baawa .

text: For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer .
text2: Aissi giikko , he ubbabai Xoossaa qaalaaninne woosan anjjettidaagaa .

text: If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things , thou shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ , nourished up in the words of faith and of good doctrine , whereunto thou hast attained .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , neeni ishantta hegaa hassayissiyaabaa gidikko , ammanuwaanne neeni kaallido lo77o timirttiyaa qaalaa maasa ; qassi neeni Kiristtoos Yesuusa ashkkara .

text: But refuse profane and old wives ' fables , and exercise thyself rather unto godliness .
text2: SHin ammaniya asau lo77enna haasayaappenne qassi ceega maccaasa haisiyaappe baqata . Qassi Xoossaa milatiyoogan nena loohissa .

text: For bodily exercise profiteth little : but godliness is profitable unto all things , having promise of the life that now is , and of that which is to come .
text2: Aissi giikko , asai ba bollaa minttiyoogee guuttaa go77ees . SHin Xoossaa milatiyoogan lohissiyoogee ha77ikka sinttappekka de7uwaa immana giyo gishshau , ubbabaukka go77ees .

text: This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation .
text2: Ha haasayai asai ubbai ekkanau bessiyo tumu haasaya .

text: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach , because we trust in the living God , who is the Saviour of all men , specially of those that believe .
text2: Nuuni hegaa demmanau daafuroosinne keehi oottoos ; hegaa gishshau , nuuni cayettoos . Aissi giikko , asa ubbaa , ubbaappekka aattidi , ammaniyaageeta ashshiya de7o Xoossaappe nuuni ekkana giidi uttida .

text: These things command and teach .
text2: Hagaa azazanne tamaarissa .

text: Let no man despise thy youth ; but be thou an example of the believers , in word , in conversation , in charity , in spirit , in faith , in purity .
text2: Neeni yelaga gidiyo gishshau , nena ooninne karoppo . SHin ammaniyaageetuyyo ne haasayan , hanotettan , siiquwan , ammanuwaaninne geeshshatettan leemiso gida .

text: Till I come , give attendance to reading , to exhortation , to doctrine .
text2: Taani yaana gakkanaassi asassi Xoossaa maxaafaa nabbabiyoogan , Xoossaa qaalaa yootiyoogaaninne tamaarissiyoogan minna .

text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee , which was given thee by prophecy , with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery .
text2: Hananabaa yootiyaageeti haasayiininne cimati bantta kushiyaa ne bolli wottin , neeni ekkido , nenan de7iya Geeshsha Ayyaanaa imuwaa toochchoppa .

text: Meditate upon these things ; give thyself wholly to them ; that thy profiting may appear to all .
text2: Ne dichchai asa ubbau qonccana mala , hegaa mintta qoppa . Hagaa ubba wode ootta .

text: Take heed unto thyself , and unto the doctrine ; continue in them : for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself , and them that hear thee .
text2: Ne huuphiyaanne ne timirttiyaa naaga . Neeni hegaa oottikko , nenanne neeni giyoogaa siyiyaageeta ashshiyo gishshau , aggennan ootta .

text: Rebuke not an elder , but intreat him as a father ; and the younger men as brethren ;
text2: Cima asa ne aawaa bonchchiyoogaadan bonchchappe attin , toochchoppa . Yelagata ne ishadan ,

text: The elder women as mothers ; the younger as sisters , with all purity .
text2: qassi cima maccaasa ne aayeedan , yelaga maccaasa ne michcheedan , kumetta geeshshatettan bonchcha .

text: Honour widows that are widows indeed .
text2: Tumu am77eta bonchcha .

text: But if any widow have children or nephews , let them learn first to shew piety at home , and to requite their parents : for that is good and acceptable before God .
text2: SHin am77eeyyo naati woikko naatu naati de7ikko , he naati Xoossaa milatiyoogaa bantta so asaa bessiyoogaanne qassi hegaa oottiyoogan banttana yelidaageetuyyo kushe zaariyoogaa tamaarona . Aissi giikko , hegee Xoossaa ufaissiyaabaa .

text: Now she that is a widow indeed , and desolate , trusteth in God , and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day .
text2: Ai maadoikka bainna tumu am77iyaa Xoossai immana gaada ufaissan naaga uttaasu . Qassi gallassinne qammi Xoossai o maaddana mala , woossausunne oichchausu .

text: But she that liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth .
text2: SHin bana ishalissiya am77iyaa paxa de7ikkokka , a haiqqaichchaasu .

text: And these things give in charge , that they may be blameless .
text2: Qassi ooninne eta borenna mala , ha azazuwaa imma .

text: But if any provide not for his own , and specially for those of his own house , he hath denied the faith , and is worse than an infidel .
text2: SHin baageetuyyo qassi ubbaappe aattidi , ba so asaayyo qoppenna urai oonanne gidikko , he aawi ba ammanuwaa kaddidaagaa . Ammanenna asaappekka aadhdhida iitaa .

text: Let not a widow be taken into the number under threescore years old , having been the wife of one man ,
text2: Usuppun tammu laittai kumibeenna am77ee sunttaa mazggafan xaafoppa . Hegaa bollan qassi a issi azinaappe haraa gelabeennaaro gidanau koshshees .

text: Well reported of for good works ; if she have brought up children , if she have lodged strangers , if she have washed the saints ' feet , if she have relieved the afflicted , if she have diligently followed every good work .
text2: Naata dichchiyoogan , imattaa mokkiyoogan , geeshshatu tohuwaa meecciyoogan , waayettida asaa maaddiyoogan , lo77o ooso ubbaa kaalliyoogan , ha lo77o oosuwaa oottiyoogan erettidaaro gidanau bessees .

text: But the younger widows refuse : for when they have begun to wax wanton against Christ , they will marry ;
text2: SHin yelaga am77eta hinkkootu sunttaara gatta xaafoppa . Aissi giikko , eti banttana azinaa gela gela giyo wode , Kiristtoosa aggi bayana .

text: Having damnation , because they have cast off their first faith .
text2: Koiro ammanuwaa karido gishshau , eti pirddettana .

text: And withal they learn to be idle , wandering about from house to house ; and not only idle , but tattlers also and busybodies , speaking things which they ought not .
text2: Hegee bainnan ooso xayidi issi keettaappe hara keettaa hoskkattana . Hoskkattiyoogee hemettiyoogaa xalaala gidennan , banttau bessennabaa haasayiiddi , zigirssaanne yohon coo geliyoogaa tamaaroosona .

text: I will therefore that the younger women marry , bear children , guide the house , give none occasion to the adversary to speak reproachfully .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nu morkketi nu bolli haasayiyo iitabaa demmenna mala , yelaga am77eti azinaa gelidi , na7a yelidi , bantta keettaa aissana mala zorais .

text: For some are already turned aside after Satan .
text2: Aissi giikko , hagaappe kase amarida am77eti Seexaanaa kaallanau aggidi guyye simmidosona .

text: If any man or woman that believeth have widows , let them relieve them , and let not the church be charged ; that it may relieve them that are widows indeed .
text2: Ammaniya maccaaseeyyo ainniyyookka dabbo am77eti de7ikko , a eta maaddanau bessees . Woosa keettai maadoi bessiyo tumu am77eta maaddana mala , eti woosa keettaayyo tooho gidoppona .

text: Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double honour , especially they who labour in the word and doctrine .
text2: Loitti heemmiya cimati , qassi ubbaappekka aattidi , qaalaa yootiyoogaaninne tamaarissiyoogan daafuriyaageeti , naa77u kushe bonchchuwaa ekkanau bessees .

text: For the scripture saith , Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that treadeth out the corn . And , The labourer is worthy of his reward .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Audiyan kattaa yedhdhiya booraa doonaa qachchoppa ” qassi , “ Oosanchchai ba damoozaa ekkanau bessees ” yaagees .

text: Against an elder receive not an accusation , but before two or three witnesses .
text2: Naa77u woi heezzu markki bainnan , woosa keettaa cimaa mootiyoobaa siyoppa .

text: Them that sin rebuke before all , that others also may fear .
text2: Harati yayyana mala , nagara oottiya ubbata asa ubbaa sinttan seera .

text: I charge thee before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , and the elect angels , that thou observe these things without preferring one before another , doing nothing by partiality .
text2: Neeni ainne asa som77o xeellennan , issuwaa issuwaappe dummayennan ha azazuwaa naagana mala , Xoossaanne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa doorettida kiitanchchatu sinttan nena taani zorais .

text: Lay hands suddenly on no man , neither be partaker of other men ' s sins : keep thyself pure .
text2: O bollaaninne eesotada ne kushiyaa wottoppa . Haratu nagaran geloppa . Nena geeshshatettan naaga .

text: Drink no longer water , but use a little wine for thy stomach ' s sake and thine often infirmities .
text2: Neeni ubba wode sakettiyo gishshaunne ne uluwaa gishshau , guutta woiniyaa eessaa uyappe attin , haatta xalaalaa uyoppa .

text: Some men ' s sins are open beforehand , going before to judgment ; and some men they follow after .
text2: Issi issi asatu nagarai be7anau qoncce ; eta nagarai eta pirddanau etappe sinttau aadhdhees . SHin haratu nagarai guyyeppe qonccees .

text: Likewise also the good works of some are manifest beforehand ; and they that are otherwise cannot be hid .
text2: Hegaadankka , lo77o oosoikka qoncce . Qonccibeennabaa gidikkokka , geemmanau danddayenna .

text: Let as many servants as are under the yoke count their own masters worthy of all honour , that the name of God and his doctrine be not blasphemed .
text2: Xoossaa sunttainne nu timirttee cayettenna mala , ailletettaa qambbaraa giddon de7iyaageeti banttana haariya godatuyyo bonchchoi bessiyoogaa erona .

text: And they that have believing masters , let them not despise them , because they are brethren ; but rather do them service , because they are faithful and beloved , partakers of the benefit . These things teach and exhort .
text2: Ammaniya asaa aille gidiyaageetuyyo eta godati etau isha gidiyo gishshau , eta karoppona . SHin bantta oosuwan go7ettiyaageeti eti siiqiyo ammaniyaageeta gidiyo gishshau , eti kaseegaappe aattidi oottanau bessees . Neeni ha yohota tamaarissanaunne yootanau bessees .

text: If any man teach otherwise , and consent not to wholesome words , even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ , and to the doctrine which is according to godliness ;
text2: Ai asinne dumma timirttiyaa tamaarissiyaabaa gidikko , qassi nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa tumu qaalaaranne nu haimaanootiyaa timirttiyaara gaittenna urai daro otorettees ; ainnekka erenna . Qassi qaalaa bollan palamettanaunne ooyettanau etau giigenna qofai de7ees . Hegee qanaatiyaa , palamaa , cashshaa , iita siriyaa kaalettees .

text: Perverse disputings of men of corrupt minds , and destitute of the truth , supposing that gain is godliness : from such withdraw thyself .
text2: Qassi eta huuphee oottenna . Tumatetti bainna asatuurakka palamaa kaalettees . Eti Xoossaa milatiyoogan duretana giidi qoppoosona . Neeni he asatuppe shaahetta .

text: But godliness with contentment is great gain .
text2: SHin taayyo de7iyaabai tau gidana giya ura Xoossaa milatiyoogee dureyees .

text: For we brought nothing into this world , and it is certain we can carry nothing out .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni ha sa7aassi ainne ehibookko ; qassi appe ainnekka ekkokko .

text: And having food and raiment let us be therewith content .
text2: SHin miyoobainne maayiyoobai de7ikko , hegee nuuyyo gidana .

text: But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare , and into many foolish and hurtful lusts , which drown men in destruction and perdition .
text2: SHin duretanau koyiyaageeti paaciyaaninne piriyan geloosona ; qassi daro asaa bashshaunne xayuwau goochchi efiya daro eeyyanne qohiya amuwan kunddoosona .

text: For the love of money is the root of all evil : which while some coveted after , they have erred from the faith , and pierced themselves through with many sorrows .
text2: Aissi giikko , miishsha siiqiyoogee iitatetta ubbau pultto . Issooti issooti hegaa amottiiddi , ammanuwaappe balettidi , daro metuwan banttana qohidosona .

text: But thou , O man of God , flee these things ; and follow after righteousness , godliness , faith , love , patience , meekness .
text2: SHin nenoo , Xoossaa asau , hegaappe baqata . Xillotettaa , Xoossaa milatiyoogaa , ammanuwaa , siiquwaa , danddayaanne ashkketettaa kaalla .

text: Fight the good fight of faith , lay hold on eternal life , whereunto thou art also called , and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses .
text2: Ammanuwaa baaxiyaa loitta baaxeta . Daro asaa sinttan lo77o markkaa markkattaidda , nena Xoossai xeesido merinaa de7uwaa oiqqa .

text: I give thee charge in the sight of God , who quickeneth all things , and before Christ Jesus , who before Pontius Pilate witnessed a good confession ;
