text2: Ubbabau de7o immiya Xoossaa sinttaaninne , qassi PHenxxeniyaa PHilaaxoosa giyo biittaa haariyaagaa sinttan lo77o markkaa markkattida Kiristtoos Yesuusa sinttan taani nena hagaa azazais .

text: That thou keep this commandment without spot , unrebukeable , until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosi qonccana gakkanaassi , qiti bainnaaninne boree bainnan he azazuwaa naaga .

text: Which in his times he shall shew , who is the blessed and only Potentate , the King of kings , and Lord of lords ;
text2: A qonccettaa , anjjettida issi sunttai , kawotu Kawoi , godatu Godai , Xoossai bessiya wodiyan bessana .

text: Who only hath immortality , dwelling in the light which no man can approach unto ; whom no man hath seen , nor can see : to whom be honour and power everlasting . Amen .
text2: Haiqqennaagee issi a xalaala . Ooninne akko shiiqanau danddayenna poo7uwan de7ees . Ooninne a be7ibeenna ; qassi be7anaukka danddayenna . Bonchchoinne merinaa wolqqai ayyo gido . Amin77i .

text: Charge them that are rich in this world , that they be not highminded , nor trust in uncertain riches , but in the living God , who giveth us richly all things to enjoy ;
text2: Ha77i ha wodiyan dure gidiyaageeti otorettennaadaaninne qassi nuuni ufaittanaadan , ubbabaa palahissidi nuuyyo immiya de7o Xoossan ammanettanaagaappe attin , aadhdhiya duretettan eti ammanettennaadan , eta azaza .

text: That they do good , that they be rich in good works , ready to distribute , willing to communicate ;
text2: Eti lo77obaa oottanaadan , lo77o oosuwan duretanaadan , kehiyaageetanne haratuura shaakki ekkiyaageeta gidanaadan azaza .

text: Laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against the time to come , that they may lay hold on eternal life .
text2: Hegaa yaatiyoogan eti sinttanau banttau mino baaso gidiya miishshaa banttau shiishshoosona . Hegaappe guyyiyan , eti tumu de7uwaa ekkana .

text: O Timothy , keep that which is committed to thy trust , avoiding profane and vain babblings , and oppositions of science falsely so called :
text2: Ximootiyoosaa , issi issi asai balan eratetta giyo eeyya palamaappenne hada haasayaappe baqataidda , neeyyo imettida hadaraa naaga .

text: Which some professing have erred concerning the faith . Grace be with thee . Amen .
text2: Aissi giikko , issooti issooti nuuyyo eratetti de7ees yaagiiddi , ammanuwaa balidosona . Xoossaa aaro kehatettai inttenaara ubbaara gido .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , according to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus ,
text2: Taani PHauloosi , Xoossai immana giido Kiristtoos Yesuusaara nuuyyo de7iya de7uwaabaa yootanau , Xoossai giidoogaadan , Kiristtoos Yesuusi kiittidoogee ,

text: To Timothy , my dearly beloved son : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord .
text2: ta siiqo na7aa Ximootiyoosayyo ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafais . Xoossaa Aawaappenne nu Godaa Kiristtoos Yesuusappe , aaro kehatettai , maarotettainne sarotettai neeyyo gido .

text: I thank God , whom I serve from my forefathers with pure conscience , that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in my prayers night and day ;
text2: Ta zareti oottidoogaadan , taanikka tana zoriya geeshsha wozanaappe oottiyo Xoossaa qamminne gallassi woossiyo woosan ubba wode nena hassayiyo gishshau , a galatais .

text: Greatly desiring to see thee , being mindful of thy tears , that I may be filled with joy ;
text2: Taani ne afuttaa hassaya hassayada ufaittana mala , nena be7anau daro laamotais .

text: When I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in thee , which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois , and thy mother Eunice ; and I am persuaded that in thee also .
text2: Nenan de7iya worddoi bainna ammanuwaa hassayais . He ammanoi beni ne aayee aayee Loidiininne ne aayee Euniiqin de7iya ammanuwaa mala ; qassi nenankka hegee de7iyoogaa eraas .

text: Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift of God , which is in thee by the putting on of my hands .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani ta kushiyaa naa77aa ne bolli wottido wode , Xoossai neeyyo immido imuwaa neeni doshissenna mala , nena hassayissais .

text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear ; but of power , and of love , and of a sound mind .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai nuuyyo wolqqaa , siiquwaanne nu huuphiyaa naagiyoogaa immiya Geeshsha Ayyaanaa immiisippe attin , yashsha ayyaanaa immibeenna .

text: Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord , nor of me his prisoner : but be thou partaker of the afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God ;
text2: Simmi , nu Godaayyo markkattiyoogan woikko a gishshau qashuwan de7iya tabankka yeellatoppa . SHin Xoossai neeyyo immiyo wolqqaa keenan tanaara wonggeliyaayyo waayetta .

text: Who hath saved us , and called us with an holy calling , not according to our works , but according to his own purpose and grace , which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world began ,
text2: Xoossai ba qofaaninne ba aaro kehatettan nuna ashshidi , ba asa oottanau xeesidoogaappe attin , nuuni oottido oosuwaa gishshau gidenna . I ha aaro kehatettaa Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara wodee doomettanaappe kase nuuyyo immiis .

text: But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus Christ , who hath abolished death , and hath brought life and immortality to light through the gospel :
text2: SHin ha77i ha aaro kehatettai nuna ashshiya Kiristtoos Yesuusa yuussan nuuyyo qoncciis . Qassi haiquwaa wolqqaakka i xaissiis . Wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa baggaara xayenna de7uwaa nuuyyo qonccissees .

text: Whereunto I am appointed a preacher , and an apostle , and a teacher of the Gentiles .
text2: Taani Yesuusi kiittidoogaanne Aihuda gidenna asaa tamaarissiyaagaa gidada , wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootana mala , Xoossai tana dooriis .

text: For the which cause I also suffer these things : nevertheless I am not ashamed : for I know whom I have believed , and am persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed unto him against that day .
text2: Qassi taani ha metuwaa ekkiyoogee hegaa gishshassa . SHin taani ammanidoogaa eriyo gishshau , yeellatikke . Qassi taani ayyo immido hadaraa he gallassai gakkanaassi , i naaganau danddayiyoogaa erais .

text: Hold fast the form of sound words , which thou hast heard of me , in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Taani nena tamaarissido tumu qaalaa leemiso ootta oiqqada , Kiristtoos Yesuusan nuuyyo de7iya ammanuwaaninne siiquwan de7a .

text: That good thing which was committed unto thee keep by the Holy Ghost which dwelleth in us .
text2: Nu giddon de7iya Geeshsha Ayyaanaa baggaara neeyyo hadaraa immido lo77obaa naaga .

text: This thou knowest , that all they which are in Asia be turned away from me ; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes .
text2: Isiyaa giyo biittan de7iya ubbati taappe baqatidoogaa eraasa ; eta giddon Pigeluusinne Hermmogeneesi de7oosona .

text: The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus ; for he oft refreshed me , and was not ashamed of my chain :
text2: Henesifooru tana daro wode minttettido gishshau , Godai a so asaayyo maarotettaa immo . Qassi taani qasho keettan de7iyoogan i yeellatibeenna .

text: But , when he was in Rome , he sought me out very diligently , and found me .
text2: SHin Roome giyo katamaa gakkidosaara tana keehi koyidi demmiis .

text: The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in that day : and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus , thou knowest very well .
text2: He gallassi Godaappe maarotettaa demmanaadan , Godai ayyo immo . Qassi Efisoona giyo kataman i tana ai keenaa maaddidaakkonne neeni loitta eraasa .

text: Thou therefore , my son , be strong in the grace that is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Simmi ta na7au , Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7iya aaro kehatettan minna .

text: And the things that thou hast heard of me among many witnesses , the same commit thou to faithful men , who shall be able to teach others also .
text2: Qassi daro markkati de7iyoosan taappe neeni siyido yohota harata tamaarissanau danddayiya ammanettida asatuyyo hadaraa imma .

text: Thou therefore endure hardness , as a good soldier of Jesus Christ .
text2: Yesuus Kiristtoosayyo ammanettida wotaaddaradan , tanaara waayetta .

text: No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of this life ; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a soldier .
text2: Olaa biya wotaaddarai ba halaqaa ufaissanau , wotaaddara gidenna asai oottiyo oosuwan walahettenna .

text: And if a man also strive for masteries , yet is he not crowned , except he strive lawfully .
text2: Qassi baaxiyaa gaittiya uraikka baaxetana xayikko , woituwaa ekkenna .

text: The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the fruits .
text2: Daro daafuridi oottida biittaa goyiya bitanee shiiqida kattaappe bana gakkiyaagaa koiro ekkanau bessees .

text: Consider what I say ; and the Lord give thee understanding in all things .
text2: Neeni ubbabaa akeekanaadan , Godai nena danddayissana gishshau , taani giyoogaa qoppa .

text: Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel :
text2: Taani wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiyoogaadan , haiquwaappe denddida Daawita zariyaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa qoppa .

text: Wherein I suffer trouble , as an evil doer , even unto bonds ; but the word of God is not bound .
text2: Taani wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiyo gishshau , iitabaa oottidabaadan , harai atto qashettana gakkanaassi waayettais . SHin Xoossaa qaalai qashettenna .

text: Therefore I endure all things for the elect ' s sakes , that they may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani Xoossai doorido asatikka Kiristtoos Yesuusan de7iya atotettaa merinaa bonchchuwaara demmanaadan , eta gishshau , taani ubbaban waayettais .

text: It is a faithful saying : For if we be dead with him , we shall also live with him :
text2: Hagee , “ Nuuni aara issippe haiqqidobaa gidikko , aara issippe de7ana .

text: If we suffer , we shall also reign with him : if we deny him , he also will deny us :
text2: Nuuni genccikko , aara issippe kawotana . Nuuni a kaddikko , ikka nuna kaddana .

text: If we believe not , yet he abideth faithful : he cannot deny himself .
text2: Nuuni ammanettennan aggikkokka , i ammanettiyaagaa gididi de7ana . Aissi giikko , i bana ba huuphen erikke gaanau danddayenna ” giyaagee tumu haasaya .

text: Of these things put them in remembrance , charging them before the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit , but to the subverting of the hearers .
text2: Neeni ne asaa hagaa hassayissa ; eti qaalan palamettenna mala , Xoossaa sinttan zora . Hegee siyiya asa mooriyoogaappe attin , ainne go77enna .

text: Study to shew thyself approved unto God , a workman that needeth not to be ashamed , rightly dividing the word of truth .
text2: Neeni Xoossaa tumatettaa qaalaa suuretettan yootiyaagaanne qassi a oosuwaayyo yeellatenna oosanchcha gidada , Xoossai sabbiyo asadan , ne huuphiyaa Xoossau immanau minna .

text: But shun profane and vain babblings : for they will increase unto more ungodliness .
text2: SHin ha sa7au injjetiya pattenna haasayaappe nena naaga . Aissi giikko , hegee Xoossaappe asa haassees .

text: And their word will eat as doth a canker : of whom is Hymenaeus and Philetus ;
text2: Qassi eti tamaarissiyoogee bollaa mirggiya cittuwaadan ubbasaa gakkana . He tamaarissiyaageetuppe naa77ati Hemeneyoosanne Piliixoosa .

text: Who concerning the truth have erred , saying that the resurrection is past already ; and overthrow the faith of some .
text2: Eti tumaa ogiyaa aggidi , “ Nuuni haiquwaappe denddiyoogee kase aadhdhiichchiis ” yaagidi amarida ammaniya asatu ammanuwaa bashshoosona .

text: Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure , having this seal , The Lord knoweth them that are his . And , Let every one that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity .
text2: Gidikkokka , Xoossai essido mino tuussai qaaxxana danddayenna . Qassi a bollan , “ Godai baageeta erees ” ; qassi “ Godaabaa gidiya ooninne iita ooso aggi bayo ” yaagiya qaalati xaafettidosona .

text: But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver , but also of wood and of earth ; and some to honour , and some to dishonour .
text2: Issi gita keettan worqqaappenne biraappe merettida miishsha xalaala gidennan , mittaappenne urqqaappe merettida miishshatikka de7oosona . Hegeetuppe baggati bonchcho oosuwaa etan oottanau , qassi baggati tooshettiyaabaa etan oottanau merettidosona .

text: If a man therefore purge himself from these , he shall be a vessel unto honour , sanctified , and meet for the master ' s use , and prepared unto every good work .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ooninne ha iitabaa ubbaappe bana geeshshikko , i ba Godaa go77iya ooso oottanau bana immido gishshau , bonchcho ooso oottiyo miishsha gidana . Qassi lo77o ooso ubbaa oottanau giigettidaagaa gidana .

text: Flee also youthful lusts : but follow righteousness , faith , charity , peace , with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart .
text2: SHin neeni iita wodallatetta amuwaappe baqata . Banttana maaddanau geeshsha wozanaappe Godaa xeesiyaageetuura issippe , xillotettaa , ammanuwaa , siiqotettaanne sarotettaa minttada kaalla .

text: But foolish and unlearned questions avoid , knowing that they do gender strifes .
text2: SHin eeyyatu palamainne ainne erennaageetu palamai ooshsha kaalettiyoogaa erada appe baqata .

text: And the servant of the Lord must not strive ; but be gentle unto all men , apt to teach , patient ,
text2: Godaa ashkkarai ubbaayyo kehiyaagaa , loitti tamaarissiyaagaanne danddayanchcha gidanau besseesippe attin , ooyettanau bessenna .

text: In meekness instructing those that oppose themselves ; if God peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of the truth ;
text2: Qassi i bana ixxiyaageeta ashkketettan seeriyaagaa gidanau bessees . Eti bantta nagaraappe simmidi , tumatettaa eranaadan Xoossai oottanaakko , ooni erii .

text: And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the devil , who are taken captive by him at his will .
text2: Qassi eti bantta wozanaa qofau simmidi , banttana ba koyidobau azazettana mala oiqqida xalahee halaqaa gitiyaappe kessi ekkana .

text: This know also , that in the last days perilous times shall come .
text2: SHin wurssetta gallassi waissiya wodee yaanaagaa akeeka .

text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves , covetous , boasters , proud , blasphemers , disobedient to parents , unthankful , unholy ,
text2: Aissi giikko , asati banttana siiqiyaageeta , miishshaa siiqiyaageeta , ceeqettiyaageeta , ayyiyaageeta , cayiyaageeta , banttana yelidaageetuyyo azazettennaageeta , galatennaageeta , geeshshatetti bainnaageeta ,

text: Without natural affection , trucebreakers , false accusers , incontinent , fierce , despisers of those that are good ,
text2: siiqoi bainnaageeta , sigettennaageeta , zigirssanchchata , banttana naagennaageeta , kehennaageeta , lo77obaa dosennaageeta ,

text: Traitors , heady , highminded , lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God ;
text2: kashi erikke giyaageeta , eesotiyaageeta , otoruwan sugettiyaageeta , qassi Xoossaappe aattidi , ufaittiyoobaa dosiyaageeta gidana .

text: Having a form of godliness , but denying the power thereof : from such turn away .
text2: Eti nu ammanuwaa bolla doonan ekkidabaa milatana ; shin a tumu wolqqaa erikke gaana . Hegeetu mala asatukko shiiqoppa .

text: For of this sort are they which creep into houses , and lead captive silly women laden with sins , led away with divers lusts ,
text2: Aissi giikko , etappe issoi issoi asa keetta gelidi , nagarai deexxidoogeeta , dumma dumma amuwan sugettiyaageeta , ubba wode tamaaridi , tumatettaa eratettaa ekkanau mule danddayibeenna daafuranchcha maccaasata godatoosona .

text: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses , so do these also resist the truth : men of corrupt minds , reprobate concerning the faith .
text2: Yaaneesinne Yambbareesi Muuse yohuwaa phalqqidoogaadan , hegaadan qassi hageeti , suure qofai bainnaageeti ammanuwan kunddidaageeti , tumatettaabaa phalqqoosona .

text: But they shall proceed no further : for their folly shall be manifest unto all men , as theirs also was .
text2: SHin Yaaneesa eeyyatettainne Yambbareesa eeyyatettai qassi qonccidoogaadan , eta eeyyatettaikka asa ubbau qonccana gishshau , eti kaseegaappe aadhdhidi go7ettokkona .

text: But thou hast fully known my doctrine , manner of life , purpose , faith , longsuffering , charity , patience ,
text2: SHin neeni ta timirttiyaa , ta hanotaanne ta qofaa , ta ammanuwaanne ta danddayaa , ta siiquwaanne ta genccaa ,

text: Persecutions , afflictions , which came unto me at Antioch , at Iconium , at Lystra ; what persecutions I endured : but out of them all the Lord delivered me .
text2: ta yedetaanne ta waayiyaa be7adasa . Anxxookiyaanne , Iqooniyoonenne Lisxxira giyo katamatun tana gakkidabaanne taani danddayido yedetaa eraasa . Godai tana he ubbaappe ashshiis .

text: Yea , and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution .
text2: Tumatettan Kiristtoos Yesuusan Xoossaa milatidi de7anau dosiya ubbai yedetettana .

text: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse , deceiving , and being deceived .
text2: SHin iita asatinne balettiyaageeti harata balettiiddinne bantta huuphiyau baliiddi , kaseppe iiti iiti boosona .

text: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of , knowing of whom thou hast learned them ;
text2: SHin neeni he tumatettaa ooppe tamaaridaakkonne erada , neeni tamaaridoogaaninne eridoogan minnada de7a .

text: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures , which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus .
text2: Neeni guutta naatettaasappe doommada Kiristtoos Yesuusa ammanada , atotettai beettiyo aadhdhida eratettaa immanau danddayiya geeshsha maxaafata eradasa .

text: All scripture is given by inspiration of God , and is profitable for doctrine , for reproof , for correction , for instruction in righteousness :
text2: Xoossaa maxaafa ubban Xoossaa Ayyaanai de7ees . Qassi he maxaafati Xoossau oottiya asi kumettanne lo77o ooso ubbau giigidaagaa gidana mala , tumatettaa tamaarissanau , balaa seeranau , mooruwaa suurissanaunne xillotetta de7uwau zoriyaa immanau maaddoosona .

text: I charge thee therefore before God , and the Lord Jesus Christ , who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom ;
text2: Taani nena Xoossaa sinttaaninne , paxa de7iya asaanne haiqqida asaa pirddanau de7iya Kiristtoos Yesuusa sinttan , qassi a yuussaaninne a kawotettan nena zorais .

text: Preach the word ; be instant in season , out of season ; reprove , rebuke , exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine .
text2: Qaalaa yoota . Wodee injjetin injjetana xayin , minnada yoota . Daro danddayan asaa tamaarissaidda bora , seeranne zora .

text: For the time will come when they will not endure sound doctrine ; but after their own lusts shall they heap to themselves teachers , having itching ears ;
text2: Aissi giikko , asai tumu timirttiyaa ezggennan ixxiyo wodee yaana . SHin asai bantta amuwaa kaallidi , siyanau ufaissiyaabaa yootiya tamaarissiyaageeta gujji gujji shiishshana .

text: And they shall turn away their ears from the truth , and shall be turned unto fables .
text2: Eti tumu yohuwaa siyiyoogaa aggidi , haisiyaa siyanau bantta haittaa wora zaarana .

text: But watch thou in all things , endure afflictions , do the work of an evangelist , make full proof of thy ministry .
text2: SHin neeni ubbaban ne huuphiyaa naaganau bessees . Waayiyaa danddaya . Wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiyaagee oottiyo oosuwaa ootta . Xoossaa ashkkaradan , ne oottiyo ooso ubbaa pola .

text: For I am now ready to be offered , and the time of my departure is at hand .
text2: Tana gidikko , taani yarshshettiyo wodeenne qassi ha de7uwaa aggada biyo wodee gakkiis .

text: I have fought a good fight , I have finished my course , I have kept the faith :
text2: Taani lo77o baaxiyaa baaxetaas ; ta wottaanne woxxada wurssaas ; ammanuwaakka naagaas .

text: Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness , which the Lord , the righteous judge , shall give me at that day : and not to me only , but unto all them also that love his appearing .
text2: Sinttappe taayyo xillotettaa akiliilee giigi uttiis . Hegaa xillo pirddaa pirddiya Godai he gallassi taayyo sheedhdhana . Qassi Kiristtoosi qonccanaagaa dosiya ubbaassappe attin , ta xalaalaassa gidenna .

text: Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me :
text2: Taakko eesuwan yaanau minna .

text: For Demas hath forsaken me , having loved this present world , and is departed unto Thessalonica ; Crescens to Galatia , Titus unto Dalmatia .
text2: Aissi giikko , Deemaasi ha wodiyaa sa7aa dosidi , tana aggidi , Tasalonqqe giyo katamaa biis . Qerqqiisi Galaatiyaa giyo biittaa bin , qassi Tiitu Dilmmaaxiyaa giyo biittaa biis .

text: Only Luke is with me . Take Mark , and bring him with thee : for he is profitable to me for the ministry .
text2: Luqaasa xalaalai tanaara de7ees . Marqqoosi tana oosuwan keehi maaddanau danddayiyo gishshau , a demmada nenaara ekkada ya .

text: And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus .
text2: SHin taani Tikiqoosa Efisoona giyo katamaa kiittaas .

text: The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus , when thou comest , bring with thee , and the books , but especially the parchments .
text2: Neeni yaidda , Xiro7aada giyo kataman Karppoosaagan taani yeggada yiido ta waaruwaanne qassi maxaafata taayyo ekkada ya . SHin galbban xaafettidaageeta ai gidikkonne , ekkennan yooppa .

text: Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil : the Lord reward him according to his works :
text2: Birataa qoxxiya Iskkinddiri tana daro qohiis ; Godai ayyo a oosuwaadan zaarana .

text: Of whom be thou ware also ; for he hath greatly withstood our words .
text2: I nuuni yootiyoogaa keehi phalqqiyo gishshau , neeni appe nena naaga .

text: At my first answer no man stood with me , but all men forsook me : I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge .
text2: Koiro tana mootiyo wode , ubbaikka aggi bayidoogaappe attin , tana ooninne maaddibeenna . Xoossai hegaa etau qoodoppo .

text: Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me , and strengthened me ; that by me the preaching might be fully known , and that all the Gentiles might hear : and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion .
text2: SHin taani kumetta kiitaa Aihuda gidenna asai ubbai siyanau yootana mala , Godai ta matan eqqidi , taayyo wolqqaa immiis . Qassi gaammuwaa doonaappekka tana ashshiis .

text: And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work , and will preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom : to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Godai tana iitabaa ubbaappe ashshidi , ba saluwaa kawotettaa sarotettan efaana ; ayyo meri merinau bonchchoi gido . Amin77i .

text: Salute Prisca and Aquila , and the household of Onesiphorus .
text2: PHirisqqilo , Aqiilanne Henesifooru so asaayyo ta sarotaa oda .

text: Erastus abode at Corinth : but Trophimus have I left at Miletum sick .
text2: Erasxxoosi Qoronttoosa giyo kataman attiis . SHin Xirofiimoosi sahettido gishshau , Miliixe giyo kataman a yeggaas .

text: Do thy diligence to come before winter . Eubulus greeteth thee , and Pudens , and Linus , and Claudia , and all the brethren .
text2: Balggoi wodhdhanaappe kase yaanau minna . Eubuluusi , PHudeesi , Liinoosinne Qilaadee qassi hara ishantti ubbaikka nena saro saro goosona .

text: The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Godai Yesuus Kiristtoosi ne ayyaanaara gido . Xoossaa aaro kehatettai inttenaara ubbaara gido . Amin77i .

text: Paul , a servant of God , and an apostle of Jesus Christ , according to the faith of God ' s elect , and the acknowledging of the truth which is after godliness ;
text2: Yesuus Kiristtoosi kiittido taani PHauloosi , Xoossaa aillee , ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafais . Xoossai doorido asau ammanoi de7anaadaaninne Xoossaa tumatettaa eraakko eta kaalettanaadan taani doorettada kiitettaas .

text: In hope of eternal life , which God , that cannot lie , promised before the world began ;
text2: Worddotenna Xoossai nuuyyo ha merinaa de7uwaa daro wodiyaappe kase immana giis .

text: But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching , which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God our Saviour ;
text2: Xoossai nuna ashshiyaagee likke wodiyan ba qaalan hagaa qonccissiis ; i hadarettidi tana azazidoogaadan , taani a qaalaa yootais .

text: To Titus , mine own son after the common faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our Saviour .
text2: Ammanuwaa issippetettan ta tumu na7aa neeyyo Tiituyyo , Xoossaa Aawaappenne nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosappe , aaro kehatettai , maarotettainne sarotettai gido .

text: For this cause left I thee in Crete , that thou shouldest set in order the things that are wanting , and ordain elders in every city , as I had appointed thee :
text2: Taani nena Qarxxeesen aggada yiidoogee , neeni attidabaa giigissanaassanne , taani azazidoogaadan , katama ubban woosa keetta cimata dooranaassa .

text: If any be blameless , the husband of one wife , having faithful children not accused of riot or unruly .
text2: Cimai borettennaagaanne issi machchee xalaalai de7iyoogaanne ammaniya naati de7iyoogaa gidanau bessees ; a naati miishsha mooriyoobaaninne woi azazettennan ixxiyooban asi amassalennaageeta gidanau bessees .

text: For a bishop must be blameless , as the steward of God ; not selfwilled , not soon angry , not given to wine , no striker , not given to filthy lucre ;
text2: Aissi giikko , he cimai Xoossaa oosuwaa azaziya alaafe gidiiddi , borettennaagaa , otorettennaagaanne elle hanqqettennaagaa gidanau bessees ; qassi mattottennaagaa , sugennaagaanne yorattennaagaa gidanau bessees .

text: But a lover of hospitality , a lover of good men , sober , just , holy , temperate ;
text2: SHin imattaa mokkiyaagaanne lo77obaa dosiyaagaa gidanau bessees ; qassi akeekanchcha , xillo , geeshshanne bana naagiyaagaa gidanau bessees .

text: Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught , that he may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince the gainsayers .
text2: Ammanettiya de7oi beettiyo timirttiyaara giigiya qaalaa i mintti oiqqo . Yaatikko harata tumu ammanuwaa tamaarissiyoogan minttettanaunne qassi hegaa ixxiyaageetakka zoranau danddayana .

text: For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers , specially they of the circumcision :
text2: Aissi giikko , azazettennaageeti , pattennabaa haasayiyaageeti , harata cimmiyaageetinne qaxxarettidaageetu bagga gidiya daro asati de7oosona .

text: Whose mouths must be stopped , who subvert whole houses , teaching things which they ought not , for filthy lucre ' s sake .
text2: Eti tamaarissanau bessenna pokkiya ogiyan miishsha demmanau tamaarissiyoogan keetta ubbaa mooriyo gishshau , eta haasayaa teqqana bessees .

text: One of themselves , even a prophet of their own , said , The Cretians are alway liars , evil beasts , slow bellies .
text2: Eta giddoppe issoi , hananabaa yootiya etaagee , “ Qarxxeese asai ubba wode , worddanchcha , iita do7anne yoranchcha qassi azalla asa ” yaagiis .

text: This witness is true . Wherefore rebuke them sharply , that they may be sound in the faith ;
text2: I markkattidoogee tuma ; hegaa gishshau , neeni etassi mino ammanoi de7anaadaaninne qassi Aihudatu haisiyaanne tumaa ixxida asatu azazuwaa eti siyennaadan , eta minttada seeranau bessees .

text: Unto the pure all things are pure : but unto them that are defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure ; but even their mind and conscience is defiled .
text2: Bantta huuphen geeshsha gididaageetussi ubbabaikka geeshsha ; shin tunatussinne ammanennaageetussi eta wozanaa qofainne eta zoriya wozanai tunido gishshau , etau aibinne geeshsha gidenna .

text: They profess that they know God ; but in works they deny him , being abominable , and disobedient , and unto every good work reprobate .
text2: Banttau eti Xoossaa eriyoogaa qoncciyan yootoosona ; shin eti sheneyiyaageeta , azazettennaageetanne lo77o ooso ubbaukka giigennaageeta gidiyo gishshau , bantta oosuwan a erokko goosona .

text: But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine :
text2: SHin neeni de7uwaa demmanau giigiya timirttiyaa tamaarissanau bessees .

text: That the aged men be sober , grave , temperate , sound in faith , in charity , in patience .
text2: Cima attumaasai ammanuwan , siiquwaaninne danddayan mino gidanaadan , qassi mattottennaagaa , woppu giidaagaanne banakka naagiyaagaa gidanaadan zora .

text: The aged women likewise , that they be in behaviour as becometh holiness , not false accusers , not given to much wine , teachers of good things ;
text2: Hegaadankka cima maccaasai geeshsha de7o de7iya maccaasatudan haniyaagaa , zigirennaagaa , woine eessassi haarettennaagaanne lo77obaa tamaarissiyaagaa gidanau bessees .

text: That they may teach the young women to be sober , to love their husbands , to love their children ,
text2: Eti Xoossaa qaalai borettenna mala , bantta keettaawatanne bantta naata siiqiyaageeta , banttanakka naagiyaageeta , geeshshata , bantta keettan oottiyaageeta , kehatanne bantta keettaawatussikka azazettiyaageeta gidana mala , yelaga maccaasaa tamaarissona .

text: Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded .
text2: Hegaadankka yelaga attumaasati banttana naagana mala zora .

text: In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works : in doctrine shewing uncorruptness , gravity , sincerity ,
text2: Neeni ne huuphenkka lo77o ooso ubban etau leemiso gida ; neeni tamaarissiyoogankka ammanettiyaagaanne kiphata gida .

text: Sound speech , that cannot be condemned ; that he that is of the contrary part may be ashamed , having no evil thing to say of you .
text2: Ne morkketi nuna zigiriyoobai etassi xayiyo wode eti yeellatana mala , neeni borettenna lo77o haasayaa haasaya .

text: Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters , and to please them well in all things ; not answering again ;
text2: Ailleti bantta godatussi azazettana malanne , etaara palamettennan ubbaban eta ufaissana mala zora .

text: Not purloining , but shewing all good fidelity ; that they may adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things .
text2: Eti bantta godatuppe wuuqqenna mala , qassi nuna ashshiyaa Xoossaabaa tamaarissiyoogaa ubbaban galatissanau , bantta oottiyo oosuwan ubba wode lo77onne ammanettiyaageeta gidiyoogaa bessana mala , eta zora .

text: For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to all men ,
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai asa ubbaa ashshiya ba aaro kehatettaa qonccissiis .

text: Teaching us that , denying ungodliness and worldly lusts , we should live soberly , righteously , and godly , in this present world ;
text2: He aaro kehatettai nagara oosuwaanne ha sa7aa amuwaa nuuni agganaadaaninne nu huuphiyaa naagidi , ha sa7an Xoossaa milatidi , xillotettan de7anaadan , nuna tamaarissees .

text: Looking for that blessed hope , and the glorious appearing of the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ ;
text2: Nuuni nu gita Xoossai , nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosi beettana giido anjjettida bonchcho gallassaa naagoos .

text: Who gave himself for us , that he might redeem us from all iniquity , and purify unto himself a peculiar people , zealous of good works .
text2: Iita ooso ubbaappe i nuna wozanaunne lo77obaa oottanau amottiya ba geeshsha asa kessanau , nu gishshau , ba huuphiyaa immiis .

text: These things speak , and exhort , and rebuke with all authority . Let no man despise thee .
text2: Neeni hagaa tamaarissa , ne kumetta maatan zoranne seera ; ooninne nena karoppo .

text: Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers , to obey magistrates , to be ready to every good work ,
text2: Eti deriyaa haariyaageetussinne godatettai de7iyoogeetussi haarettanau , azazettanaunne lo77o ooso ubbaa oottanau giigettanaadan eta hassayissa ; qassi eti oonanne cayenna mala , palamettenna mala , asa ubbaa ashkketettaanne doshotettaa bessiyaageeta gidanaadan zora .

text: For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish , disobedient , deceived , serving divers lusts and pleasures , living in malice and envy , hateful , and hating one another .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni kase nu huuphenkka eeyyata , azazettennaageeta , baliyaageetanne amossinne dumma dumma ufaissaassi ailledan haarettiyaageeta ; qassi iitatettaaninne qanaatiyan de7iyaageeta ; asan ixettiyaageetanne issoi issuwaakka ixxiyaageeta .

text: But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward man appeared ,
text2: SHin nuna ashshiya Xoossaa kehatettainne asa i siiqiyoogeenne beettido wode ,

text: Not by works of righteousness which we have done , but according to his mercy he saved us , by the washing of regeneration , and renewing of the Holy Ghost ;
text2: i ba maarotettaadankka , ooratta yeletaassi haniya meechchaaninne Geeshsha Ayyaanan ooraxxiyoogan nuna ashshidoogaappe attin , nuuni xillo oosuwaa oottidoogaana gidenna .

text: Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our Saviour ;
text2: Xoossai ba aaro kehatettan nuuni xillanaadaaninne , i immana giido merinaa de7uwaa laattanaadan , nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara Geeshsha Ayyaanaa nu bolli darissidi tigiis .

text: This is a faithful saying , and these things I will that thou affirm constantly , that they which have believed in God might be careful to maintain good works . These things are good and profitable unto men .
text2: Ha haasayai ammanettidaagaa ; Xoossaa ammaniyaageeti lo77o oosuwaa oottanau giiganaadan , ha yohuwaa etassi neeni minttada yootanau koyais ; hageeti asau lo77onne go77iyaageeta .

text: But avoid foolish questions , and genealogies , and contentions , and strivings about the law ; for they are unprofitable and vain .
text2: SHin eeyyatetta palamaappe , zare qoodiyoogaappe , walassaappenne higgeban ooyettiyoogaappe naagetta . Aissi giikko , hegeeti go77ennaageetanne allaalle kessennaageeta .

text: A man that is an heretick after the first and second admonition reject ;
text2: SHaahotetta medhdhiya urai geella asa gidiyoogaanne ba huuphiyan pirddidi nagaraa oottiyoogaa erada , issitoo naa77utoo a seeridoogaappe guyyiyan , hegaa milatiya asappe shaahetta .

text: When I shall send Artemas unto thee , or Tychicus , be diligent to come unto me to Nicopolis : for I have determined there to winter .
text2: Taani Arxxemaasa woi Tikiqoosa neekko kiittiyo wode , neeni taakko Niqophiliyoona yaanau minna . Aissi giikko , taani balgguwaa yaani shaaccanau qofaa qachchaas .

text: Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey diligently , that nothing be wanting unto them .
text2: Higgiyaa eriya Zemaasinne Aphiloosi ogiyaa biyo wode , etassi aibinne paccenna mala , eta loitta maadda .

text: And let ours also learn to maintain good works for necessary uses , that they be not unfruitful .
text2: Nu asaikka pattenna asa gididi attenna mala , bana keehi koshshiyaabaa demmanau , lo77o oosuwaa minnidi oottiyoogaa tamaaro .

text: All that are with me salute thee . Greet them that love us in the faith . Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Tanaara de7iya ubbati nena saro saro giidosona . Nuna ammanuwan siiqiyaageeta saro saro ga . Xoossaa aaro kehatettai inttenaara ubbaara issippe gido . Amin77i .

text: Paul , a prisoner of Jesus Christ , and Timothy our brother , unto Philemon our dearly beloved , and fellowlabourer ,
text2: Taani PHauloosi , Yesuus Kiristtoosa gishshau qashuwan de7iyaageenne nu ishaa Ximootiyoosi , nunaara oottiya nuuni siiqiyo Pilimoonayyo ,

text: And to our beloved Apphia , and Archippus our fellowsoldier , and to the church in thy house :
text2: ne sooni shiiqiya woosa keettaayyo , nu michchee Afiibiyyoonne nunaara issippe de7iya wotaaddaraa Arkkipoosayyo ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafoos .

text: Grace to you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Xoossaa nu Aawaappenne nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe aaro kehatettainne sarotettai intteyyo gido .

text: I thank my God , making mention of thee always in my prayers ,
text2: Neeni geeshshata siiqiyoogaanne Godaa Yesuusa ammaniyoogaa taani siyiyo gishshau , Xoossaa woossaidda nena hassayiyo wode ubban , ta Xoossaa galatais .

text: That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in Christ Jesus .
text2: Neeni ne ammanuwaa haratuura shaakkiyoogee nuuyyo Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara yiya lo77obaa ubbaa erissana mala , taani Xoossaa woossais .

text: For we have great joy and consolation in thy love , because the bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee , brother .
text2: Aissi giikko , geeshshatu wozanai ne oosuwan minnido gishshau , ta ishau , taani ne siiquwan daro ufaissaanne minttettuwaa demmaas .

text: Wherefore , though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin thee that which is convenient ,
text2: Hegaa gishshau , neeni oottanau bessiyaabaa oottana mala , taani nena azazanau Kiristtoosa baggaara xalikkokka ,

text: Yet for love ' s sake I rather beseech thee , being such an one as Paul the aged , and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ .
text2: Taani PHauloosi cimidaagee , Kiristtoos Yesuusayyo ha77ikka qashuwan de7iyaagee , siiquwaa gishshau , nena woossais .

text: I beseech thee for my son Onesimus , whom I have begotten in my bonds :
text2: Taani qashuwan de7aidda ayyo aawa gidido ta na7aa Anaasimoosa gishshau , nena woossais .

text: Which in time past was to thee unprofitable , but now profitable to thee and to me :
text2: I kase nena go77enna ; shin ha77i nenakka tanakka tumu go77ees .

text: Whom I have sent again : thou therefore receive him , that is , mine own bowels :
text2: Taani wozanappe dosiyo Anaasimoosa neekko yeddais . Taani wonggeliyaa gishshau qashetta uttidaashin , ne gishshaa tau oottidi , tana maaddana mala , ta matan a ashshanau koyais .

text: But without thy mind would I do nothing ; that thy benefit should not be as it were of necessity , but willingly .
text2: SHin neeni ne shenedan oottanaagaa koyaisippe attin , nenaara zorettennan wolqqan ainne oottanau koyikke .

text: For perhaps he therefore departed for a season , that thou shouldest receive him for ever ;
text2: Anaasimoosi guutta wodiyaa neeppe shaahettidoogee , ooni erii simmidi , ubba wodekka nenaara de7anaassakkonne .

text: Not now as a servant , but above a servant , a brother beloved , specially to me , but how much more unto thee , both in the flesh , and in the Lord ?
text2: Simmi hagaappe sinttau Anaasimoosi aille gidenna ; shin ailleppe i keehi aadhdhees ; i taayyo ai keena siiqo ishee ! Qassi i neeyyo asa baggaarakka Godaa baggaarakka ai keena aadhdhida isha gidanddeeshsha !

text: If thou count me therefore a partner , receive him as myself .
text2: Simmi neeni tana ne lagge giyaabaa gidikko , tana mokkiyoogaadan , a mokka .

text: If he hath wronged thee , or oweth thee ought , put that on mine account ;
text2: I neeyyo mooridobai woi a bolli neeyyo acoi de7ikko , taappe qanxxuwaa ekka .

text: I Paul have written it with mine own hand , I will repay it : albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine own self besides .
text2: He acuwaa taani qanxxana gaada , taani PHauloosi ta kushiyan xaafais . Neeni tau ne shemppuwaa acota uttidoogaa taani nena hassayissanau koshshenna .

text: Yea , brother , let me have joy of thee in the Lord : refresh my bowels in the Lord .
text2: Ee ta ishau , Godaa baggaara neeppe go77a demmanau koyais . Kiristtoosa baggaara tana minttetta .

text: Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee , knowing that thou wilt also do more than I say .
text2: Taani giidoogaappe daruwaa neeni oottanaagaa erada , qassi ne tau azazettanaagaakka ammanada , hagaa neeyyo xaafais .

text: But withal prepare me also a lodging : for I trust that through your prayers I shall be given unto you .
text2: Qassi intte he sohuwaarakka taayyo imatti shemppiyo keetta giigissite . Aissi giikko , Xoossai intte woosan tana intteyyo guyye zaaridi immana gaada qoppais .

text: There salute thee Epaphras , my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus ;
text2: Kiristtoos Yesuusa gishshau , tanaara qashuwan de7iya Eppaafiri nena saro saro gees .

text: Marcus , Aristarchus , Demas , Lucas , my fellowlabourers .
text2: Qassi tanaara issippe oottiya Marqqoosi , Arisxxirokoosi , Deemaasinne Luqaasi nena saro saro goosona .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit . Amen .
text2: Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aaro kehatettai intte ayyaanaara gido .

text: God , who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets ,
text2: Xoossai beni wode , nu aawatuyyo hananabaa yootiyaageetu baggaara dumma dumma ogiyaaninne daro wodiyan haasayiis .

text: Hath in these last days spoken unto us by his Son , whom he hath appointed heir of all things , by whom also he made the worlds ;
text2: SHin ha wurssetta wodiyan , ubbabaa a laatissidi , sa7aa a baggaara medhdhido ba Na7aa baggaara nuuyyo haasayiis .

text: Who being the brightness of his glory , and the express image of his person , and upholding all things by the word of his power , when he had by himself purged our sins , sat down on the right hand of the Majesty on high ;
text2: Na7ai Xoossaa bonchcho poo7uwaa phoolees ; qassi muleerakka a meretaa ekkidi , ba wolqqaama qaalan ha sa7aa naagees ; yaatidi asaa nagaraappe geeshshidi , Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaappe ushachcha baggaara saluwan uttiis .

text: Being made so much better than the angels , as he hath by inheritance obtained a more excellent name than they .
text2: Xoossai ayyo immido sunttatettai kiitanchchatuugaappe xoqqa gidiyoogaadankka , etappe a keehi xoqqu oottiis .

text: For unto which of the angels said he at any time , Thou art my Son , this day have I begotten thee ? And again , I will be to him a Father , and he shall be to me a Son ?
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai ba kiitanchchatuppe oona , “ Neeni ta Na7aa ; taani hachchi neeyyo aawa gidaas ” giidee ? Woi qassi oona , “ Taani ayyo aawa gidana ; ikka taayyo na7a gidana ” giidee ?

text: And again , when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world , he saith , And let all the angels of God worship him .
text2: Qassi Xoossai ba baira Na7aa ha sa7aa yeddana haniiddi , “ Ta kiitanchchati ubbatikka ayyo goinnona ” yaagiis .

text: And of the angels he saith , Who maketh his angels spirits , and his ministers a flame of fire .
text2: Xoossai kiitanchchatubaa haasayiiddi , “ Taani ta kiitanchchata carkko kessais ; qassi ta ashkkaratakka tama laco kessais ” yaagees .

text: But unto the Son he saith , Thy throne , O God , is for ever and ever : a sceptre of righteousness is the sceptre of thy kingdom .
text2: SHin ba Na7aabaa haasayiiddi , “ Xoossau , ne kawotaa araatai meri merinau de7ees . Ne kawotaa xam77aikka xillotettaa xam77aa .

text: Thou hast loved righteousness , and hated iniquity ; therefore God , even thy God , hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows .
text2: Neeni xillotettaa siiqadasa ; naaquwaa ixxadasa . Xoossai , ne Xoossai nena ne laggetuppe aattidi , ufaissa zaitiyaa tiyidoogee hegaassa ” yaagees .

text: And , Thou , Lord , in the beginning hast laid the foundation of the earth ; and the heavens are the works of thine hands :
text2: Xoossai hagaadan yaagees ; “ Godau , koiro neeni sa7aa medhdhadasa ; saluwaakka ne kushiyan medhdhadasa .

text: They shall perish ; but thou remainest ; and they all shall wax old as doth a garment ;
text2: Hegeeti ubbai xayana ; shin neeni de7ana . Eti ubbaikka afaladan wurana .

text: And as a vesture shalt thou fold them up , and they shall be changed : but thou art the same , and thy years shall not fail .
text2: Neeni eta iirichchodan dakkoyana ; qassi eti afaladan laamettana . SHin neeni nenakka ; ne laittai mulekka wurenna ” yaagees .

text: But to which of the angels said he at any time , Sit on my right hand , until I make thine enemies thy footstool ?
text2: SHin Xoossai ba kiitanchchatuppe issuwaanne , “ Taani ne morkketa neeni tohuwan yedhdhiyoobaa oottana gakkanaassi , hagan taappe ushachcha baggan utta ” gibeenna .

text: Are they not all ministering spirits , sent forth to minister for them who shall be heirs of salvation ?
text2: Kiitanchchati ubbai Xoossau oottanaunne atotettaa demmana asata maaddanau Xoossai kiittido ayyaanata gidokkonaayye ?

text: Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard , lest at any time we should let them slip .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni siyido tumu yohuwaappe wora beenna mala , he yohuwaa mintti oiqqanau bessees .

text: For if the word spoken by angels was stedfast , and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompence of reward ;
text2: Aissi giikko , kiitanchchati yootido qaalai tuma gidiyo gishshau , naaqqiya woi azazettenna asai ubbai qaxxayettidobaa gidikko ,

text: How shall we escape , if we neglect so great salvation ; which at the first began to be spoken by the Lord , and was confirmed unto us by them that heard him ;
text2: Yaatin , nuuni ha gita atotettaa wudennaageeta gidikko , waanidi kessi ekkanee ? Godai koiro ba huuphen ha atotettaa yootiis ; qassi i yootidoogaa siyidaageeti nuuyyo geeshshidi yootidosona .

text: God also bearing them witness , both with signs and wonders , and with divers miracles , and gifts of the Holy Ghost , according to his own will ?
text2: He siyidaageeti markkattidoogaa bolli Xoossaikka malaataa , oorattabaanne Xoossai oottiyo dumma dumma malaataa oottiyoogan gujji markkattiis ; qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanaa imuwaakka ba koyidoogaadan , gishi gattiis .

text: For unto the angels hath he not put in subjection the world to come , whereof we speak .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai nuuni haasayiyo sinttappe yaana sa7aa , kiitanchchata haarissibeenna .

text: But one in a certain place testified , saying , What is man , that thou art mindful of him ? or the son of man , that thou visitest him ?
text2: SHin Xoossaa maxaafai issisan hagaadan yaagees ; “ Xoossau , neeni asabaa qoppanau asi aibee ? Woi neeni ayyo hirgganau i aibee ?

text: Thou madest him a little lower than the angels ; thou crownedst him with glory and honour , and didst set him over the works of thy hands :
text2: Neeni kiitanchchatuppe amarida wodiyaa a guuttadasa . A huuphiyankka bonchchonne saba akiliiliyaa wottadasa .

text: Thou hast put all things in subjection under his feet . For in that he put all in subjection under him , he left nothing that is not put under him . But now we see not yet all things put under him .
text2: Qassi ubbabaa a tohuwaappe garssaara wottada haarissadasa ” yaagees . Aissi giikko , Xoossai ubbabaakka a haarissidoogan aani haarettibeennabi aibinne baawa ; shin ha77i ubbabai ayyo haarettiyoobi nuuyyo beettenna .

text: But we see Jesus , who was made a little lower than the angels for the suffering of death , crowned with glory and honour ; that he by the grace of God should taste death for every man .
text2: SHin nuuni Yesuusa be7oos ; Yesuusi Xoossaa aaro kehatettaa baggaara asa ubbau haiqqana mala , amarida wodiyaa kiitanchchatuppe garssa gidiis . Qassi haiqo waayiyaa i waayettido gishshau , poo7iya bonchchonne saba akiliiliyaa wottidaagaa ha77i nuuni be7oos .

text: For it became him , for whom are all things , and by whom are all things , in bringing many sons unto glory , to make the captain of their salvation perfect through sufferings .
text2: Xoossai ubbabaa medhdhiyaagee , ubbabaakka naagiyaagee , Yesuusi daro naata ehiidi , banaara bonchchissana mala , waayiyaa baggaara Yesuusa bali bainnaagaa oottanau bessees ; aissi giikko , he naata atotettaayyo kaalettiyaagee Yesuusa .

text: For both he that sanctifieth and they who are sanctified are all of one : for which cause he is not ashamed to call them brethren ,
text2: Aissi giikko , asa geeshshiyaagaukka qassi he geeyida asa ubbaukka Aawai issuwaa . Yesuusi eta , “ Ta ishantta ” giidi yeellatennan xeesiyoogee hegaassa .

text: Saying , I will declare thy name unto my brethren , in the midst of the church will I sing praise unto thee .
text2: Yesuusi , “ Taani ne sunttaa ta ishanttuyyo awaajjana . Maabaraa shiiquwankka nena galatana ” yaagees .

text: And again , I will put my trust in him . And again , Behold I and the children which God hath given me .
text2: Qassi i , “ Taani ta ammanuwaa Xoossan wottana ” qassikka , “ Xoossai tau immido naatuura taani hagan de7ais ” yaagees .

text: Forasmuch then as the children are partakers of flesh and blood , he also himself likewise took part of the same ; that through death he might destroy him that had the power of death , that is , the devil ;
text2: Naata giidi i xeesiyoogeeti , ashoppenne suuttappe merettida asata gidiyo gishshau , Yesuusi ba huuphen eta milatidi , eta meretaa ekkiis ; qassi i hegaa oottidoogee , xalahe halaqaa wolqqaa ba haiquwan xaissanaassa .

text: And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage .
text2: Qassi bantta de7o ubban haiquwau yayyidi , au ailletidi de7iyaageeta ubbata ailletettaappe kessiis .

text: For verily he took not on him the nature of angels ; but he took on him the seed of Abraham .
text2: Aissi giikko , Abrahaama zariyaa i maaddiyoogaappe attin , kiitanchchata maaddennaagee erettiis .

text: Wherefore in all things it behoved him to be made like unto his brethren , that he might be a merciful and faithful high priest in things pertaining to God , to make reconciliation for the sins of the people .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , asaa nagarai atto geetettana mala , Xoossaa oosuwan ammanettida maariya qeese ubbatu halaqa gidana mala , ubbaban i ba ishantta milatanau bessees .

text: For in that he himself hath suffered being tempted , he is able to succour them that are tempted .
text2: Aissi giikko , i ba huuphen paacettido gishshaunne waayettido gishshau , paacettiyaageeta maaddanau danddayees .

text: Wherefore , holy brethren , partakers of the heavenly calling , consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession , Christ Jesus ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Xoossai xeesido geeshsha ishatoo , nu ammanuwau Xoossai kiittidoogaa qeese ubbatu halaqaa , Yesuus Kiristtoosa qoppite .

text: Who was faithful to him that appointed him , as also Moses was faithful in all his house .
text2: Muusee ba oosuwan Xoossaa keetta ubban ammanettidaagaa gididoogaadan , Yesuusikka bana dooridi , ha oosuwau yeddida Xoossaayyo ammanettidaagaa .

text: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses , inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house .
text2: Aissi giikko , keexettiya keettaappe keexxiya bitanee bonchchettiyoogaadan , Muuseegaappe aadhdhiya bonchchuwaa i ekkanau bessiyoogee erettidaagaa .

text: For every house is builded by some man ; but he that built all things is God .
text2: Aissi giikko , keetta ubbaa keexxidaagee issi asa ; shin ubbabaa keexxidaagee Xoossaa .

text: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house , as a servant , for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after ;
text2: Muusee Xoossaa keetta ubban ammanettida ashkkara gididi , Xoossai sinttappe gaanabaa markkattiis .

text: But Christ as a son over his own house ; whose house are we , if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end .
text2: SHin Kiristtoosi Xoossaa keettan na7adan ammanettidaagaa ; nuuni ekkana giidi ufaissan naagiyoogaa xalatettaaninne ammanuwan naagikko , Xoossau keetta gidoos .

text: Wherefore ( as the Holy Ghost saith , To day if ye will hear his voice ,
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Geeshsha Ayyaanai hagaadan yaagees ; “ Xoossaa qaalaa intte hachchi siyiyaabaa gidikko ,

text: Harden not your hearts , as in the provocation , in the day of temptation in the wilderness :
text2: intte aawati taayyo ixxi makkalidi , oitamu laittaa ta oosuwaa be7ido bazzo paaciyaa gallassaadan , inttekka zore ekkennan ixxoppite .

text: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation , and said , They do alway err in their heart ; and they have not known my ways .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani he asaa hanqqettada , ' Eti ubba wode bantta wozanan baloosona . Ta ogiyaakka eribookkona ' yaagaas .

text: So I sware in my wrath , They shall not enter into my rest . )
text2: Hegaadankka qassi , taani hanqqetta caaqqada , ' Taani shemppiyoosaa eti mulekka gelokkona ' yaagaas ” yaagees .

text: Take heed , brethren , lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief , in departing from the living God .
text2: Ta ishatoo , de7o Xoossaappe inttena shaakkiya iita ammanenna wozani inttenan oonaaninne de7enna mala naagettite .

text: But exhort one another daily , while it is called To day ; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin .
text2: SHin Xoossai inttena ubba gallassi hachchi giidi xeesishin , intteppe oonanne nagari balettin , zore ekkennan ixxenna mala , issoi issuwaa zorite .

text: For we are made partakers of Christ , if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end ;
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni koiro nuuyyo de7iya ammanuwaa wurssettai gakkanaassi mintti naagikko , Kiristtoosaara issippe shaakkana .

text: While it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts , as in the provocation .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Xoossaa qaalaa intte hachchi siyiyaabaa gidikko , he wode eti ixxi makkalidoogaadan , zore ekkennan ixxoppite ” yaagiis .

text: For some , when they had heard , did provoke : howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses .
text2: Xoossai giyoogaa siyidi , ayyo makkalida asati oonee ? Muusee Gibxxeppe kaalettin kiyida ubbata gidokkonaayye ?

text: But with whom was he grieved forty years ? was it not with them that had sinned , whose carcases fell in the wilderness ?
text2: Xoossai oitamu laittaa oona hanqqettidee ? Ahai bazzuwan attido asata , nagaraa oottidaageeta gidokkonaayye ?

text: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest , but to them that believed not ?
text2: Qassi Xoossai baayyo azazettennan ixxidaageeti i shemppiyoosaa mulekka gelenna mala , etayyo caaqqidoogaappe attin , ooyyo caaqqidee ?

text: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief .
text2: Eti ammanibeenna gishshau , shemppiyoosaa gelanau danddayibeennaagaa nuuni be7oos .

text: Let us therefore fear , lest , a promise being left us of entering into his rest , any of you should seem to come short of it .
text2: Simmi Xoossai nuna ba shemppiyoosaa , “ Gelissana ” giidoogee biroona gidikko , intteppe ooninne he shemppiyoosaa gelennan attenna mala yayyoos .

text: For unto us was the gospel preached , as well as unto them : but the word preached did not profit them , not being mixed with faith in them that heard it .
text2: Aissi giikko , eti wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa siyidoogaadan , nuunikka siyida ; eti siyidosona ; shin ammanidi ekkibeenna gishshau , ainne eta go77ibeenna .

text: For we which have believed do enter into rest , as he said , As I have sworn in my wrath , if they shall enter into my rest : although the works were finished from the foundation of the world .
text2: Gidikkokka , Xoossaa oosoi sa7ai merettoosappe doommin polettidaagaa gidikkokka , Xoossai , “ Taani hanqqetta caaqqada , ' Eti taani shemppiyoosaa mulekka gelokkona ' yaagaas ” giidoogaadan , nuuni ammanidaageeti i shemppiyoosaa gelana .

text: For he spake in a certain place of the seventh day on this wise , And God did rest the seventh day from all his works .
text2: Aissi giikko , laappuntta gallassaabaa issisan Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Xoossai laappuntta gallassan ba ooso ubbaappe shemppiis ” yaagiis .

text: And in this place again , If they shall enter into my rest .
text2: Qassi he sohuwankka , “ Eti taani shemppiyoosaa mulekka gelokkona ” yaagiis .

text: Seeing therefore it remaineth that some must enter therein , and they to whom it was first preached entered not in because of unbelief :
text2: Wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa koiro siyidaageeti azazettibeenna gishshau , shemppo sohuwaa gelibookkona ; issi issi asati he sohuwaa gelanaageeti de7oosona .

text: Again , he limiteth a certain day , saying in David , To day , after so long a time ; as it is said , To day if ye will hear his voice , harden not your hearts .
text2: Xoossai daro wodiyaappe guyyiyan , Daawita baggaara naa77anttuwaa issi gallassaa , “ Hachchi ” giyo qaalan keeridi , “ Xoossaa qaalaa intte hachchi siyiyaabaa gidikko , zore ekkennan ixxoppite ” yaagiis .

text: For if Jesus had given them rest , then would he not afterward have spoken of another day .
text2: Xoossai shemppiyoosaa asaa efiidi Yaasu shemppissidobaa gidiyaakko , Xoossai hara gallassabaa guyye keerenna .

text: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Xoossaa asaayyo Sambbataa shemppoi naagetti uttiis .

text: For he that is entered into his rest , he also hath ceased from his own works , as God did from his .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai shemppiyoosaa geliya ooninne , Xoossai ba oosuwaappe shemppidoogaadan , ikka ba oosuwaappe shemppana .

text: Let us labour therefore to enter into that rest , lest any man fall after the same example of unbelief .
text2: Simmi Israa7eela asai azazettennan ixxidi , Xoossaara issippe shemppiyoosaa gelennan attidoogaadan , nuuppe ooninne hegaa mala ixuwan he sohuwaa gelennan attenna mala minnoos .

text: For the word of God is quick , and powerful , and sharper than any twoedged sword , piercing even to the dividing asunder of soul and spirit , and of the joints and marrow , and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa qaalai paxa de7eesinne oottees ; naa77u zoozee de7iyo bisuwaappekka aadhdhidi qarattees . He qaalai shemppoinne ayyaanai , kureenne kolzzee issippe gaittiyoosaa shaakkana gakkanaassi caddees . Qassi asa wozanan de7iya koshshaanne qofaa i shaakkees .

text: Neither is there any creature that is not manifest in his sight : but all things are naked and opened unto the eyes of him with whom we have to do .
text2: Nuuni oottiyoobaa wochchiya Xoossaa sinttan ubbabaikka beettiyoogaappenne qoncciyan de7iyoogaappe attin , a aifiyan geemmiya mereti aibinne baawa .

text: Seeing then that we have a great high priest , that is passed into the heavens , Jesus the Son of God , let us hold fast our profession .
text2: Simmi saluwaa biida qeese ubbatu gita halaqai , Xoossaa Na7ai Yesuusi , nuuyyo de7iyo gishshau , nu ammanuwaa mintti naagoos .

text: For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities ; but was in all points tempted like as we are , yet without sin .
text2: Aissi giikko , nu qeese ubbatu halaqai nuuni daafuriyo wode nuuyyo qarettanau danddayees ; nagara i oottibeennaagaappe attin , nunadan ubbabankka paacettiis .

text: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace , that we may obtain mercy , and find grace to help in time of need .
text2: Simmi nuna koshshiyo wode maaddiya maarotettaa ekkanaunne aaro kehatettaa demmanau , aaro kehatettai de7iyoosaa Xoossaa araataakko , yayyennan shiiqoos .

text: For every high priest taken from among men is ordained for men in things pertaining to God , that he may offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins :
text2: Qeese ubbatu halaqati huuphiyan huuphiyan ba asaa giddoppe doorettidi , he asaa gishshaa Xoossau oottanau , imuwaa immanaunne nagaraa yarshshuwaa yarshshanau sunttettidosona .

text: Who can have compassion on the ignorant , and on them that are out of the way ; for that he himself also is compassed with infirmity .
text2: I ba huuphen daafuranchcha gidiyo gishshau , tamaaribeennaageetuyyoonne baliyaageetuyyo qarettanau danddayees .

text: And by reason hereof he ought , as for the people , so also for himself , to offer for sins .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , he qeese ubbatu halaqai asaa gishshau yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoogaadan , ba huuphe nagaraa gishshaukka yarshshanau bessees .

text: And no man taketh this honour unto himself , but he that is called of God , as was Aaron .
text2: Xoossai Aaroona qeese ubbatu halaqa gidanau xeesidoogaadan , Xoossai xeesanaappe attin , ooninne qeese ubbatu halaqa gidiyo bonchchuwaa bau ekkanau danddayenna .

text: So also Christ glorified not himself to be made an high priest ; but he that said unto him , Thou art my Son , to day have I begotten thee .
text2: Hegaadankka , Kiristtoosi qeese ubbatu halaqa gidiyo bonchchuwaa bau ekkibeenna ; shin Xoossai a , “ Neeni ta Na7aa . Taani hachchi neeyyo Aawa gidaas ” yaagiis .

text: As he saith also in another place , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Hegaadankka qassi harasan , “ Malkki - Xedeqi qeese gididoogaadan , neenikka merinau qeese gidana ” yaagiis .

text: Who in the days of his flesh , when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death , and was heard in that he feared ;
text2: Yesuusi sa7an de7iyo wode , bana haiquwaappe ashshanau danddayiya Xoossaa keehi yeekkidinne afuxxidi woossiisinne oichchiis ; Xoossai a woosaa siyidoogee , i bana toochchidoogaassanne bau yayyidoogaassa .

text: Though he were a Son , yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered ;
text2: Yesuusi Xoossaa Na7aa gidikkokka , ba waayettido waayiyan azazettiyoogaa tamaariis .

text: And being made perfect , he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him ;
text2: Yesuusi bali bainnaagaa gidido wode , bau azazettiya ubbau merinaa atotettaa demmanau gaaso gidiis .

text: Called of God an high priest after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Qassi Xoossai Malkki - Xedeqa sunttatettaadan , qeese ubbatu halaqa gidana mala , a sunttiis .

text: Of whom we have many things to say , and hard to be uttered , seeing ye are dull of hearing .
text2: Nuuni ha yohuwan haasayanabai darobai de7ees ; shin intte akeekanau azalla gidiyo gishshau , intteyyo yooti gelissanau waissees .

text: For when for the time ye ought to be teachers , ye have need that one teach you again which be the first principles of the oracles of God ; and are become such as have need of milk , and not of strong meat .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte ha wodiyan tamaarissiyaageeta gidanau bessikkokka , Xoossaa qaalaa koiro timirttiyaa inttena zaaretti tamaarissiya issi uraa koshshees ; inttena uyiyo maatta koshsheesippe attin , mino quma koshshenna .

text: For every one that useth milk is unskilful in the word of righteousness : for he is a babe .
text2: Maatta paahettidi de7iya ooninne gacino na7a gidiyo gishshau , xillotettaa timirttiyaabaa erenna .

text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age , even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil .
text2: SHin mino qumai iitaa kehaa de7uwaa daruwan shaakkida wozannaama asaassa .

text: Therefore leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ , let us go on unto perfection ; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works , and of faith toward God ,
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Kiristtoosa timirttiyaa biron doommiyaagaa aggi bayidi , wozannaama asa timirttiyau sinttau boos ; koiro nuuni tamaaranau koshshiyo timirttiyaa wodhdhi eqqidi tamaaranau nuuyyo bessenna ; he timirttee aibee giikko , pattenna oosuwaappe simmiyoogaa , Xoossaa ammaniyoogaa , xinqqatebaa , kushe wotobaa , haiqoppe denddobaanne merinaa pirddaabaa .

text: And this will we do , if God permit .
text2: Xoossai oottite giikko , hegaa nuuni oottana .

text: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened , and have tasted of the heavenly gift , and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Aissi giikko , issitookka poo7oi poo7idoogeetanne saluwaa imuwaa baari be7idaageeta , qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanaakka shaakki ekkidaageetanne Xoossaa qaalai lo77o gididoogaa siyi eridaageeta , sinttappe yaana sa7aa wolqqaakka bochchi xeellidaageeta ,

text: If they shall fall away , to renew them again unto repentance ; seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God afresh , and put him to an open shame .
text2: hegaappe guyye simmidi kaddidaageeta nagaraappe naa77anttuwaa zaaranaagee danddayettennabaa . Aissi giikko , hegeeti Xoossaa Na7aa masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishidi kaqqoosonanne asa sinttan kaushshoosona .

text: For the earth which drinketh in the rain that cometh oft upon it , and bringeth forth herbs meet for them by whom it is dressed , receiveth blessing from God :
text2: Ubba wode bukkiya iraa uyidi , goyida uraa go77iya kattaa mokkiya biittaa Xoossai anjjees .

text: But that which beareth thorns and briers is rejected , and is nigh unto cursing ; whose end is to be burned .
text2: SHin buluwaa buuzuwaa mokkikko , ainne go77enna ; qanggettau shiiqi eqqiis . Qassi wurssettan xuugettana .

text: But , beloved , we are persuaded better things of you , and things that accompany salvation , though we thus speak .
text2: SHin nu siiqotoo , nuuni hagaadan haasayiyaabaa gidikkokka , intte atotettau gidiya lo77obai intteyyo de7iyoogaa eroos .

text: For God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love , which ye have shewed toward his name , in that ye have ministered to the saints , and do minister .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte oottido oosuwaanne qassi ammaniyaageeta maaddidoogaaninne ha77ikka maaddiyoogan Xoossaa siiqido siiquwaa Xoossai doganau worddanchcha gidenna .

text: And we desire that every one of you do shew the same diligence to the full assurance of hope unto the end :
text2: Intte huuphiyan huuphiyan demmana giidi , nuuni ufaissan naagi uttido kumetta tumatettaa wurssettai gakkanaassi , kaseegaadan minttidi naagana mala amottoos .

text: That ye be not slothful , but followers of them who through faith and patience inherit the promises .
text2: Xoossai immana giidoogaa ammanuwaaninne genccan laattiyaageetu mala intte gidanaagaa nuuni koyiyoogaappe attin , azalla gidanaagaa koyokko .

text: For when God made promise to Abraham , because he could swear by no greater , he sware by himself ,
text2: Xoossai Abrahaamayyo immana giidi caaqqido wode , baappe aadhdhiya giti bainna gishshau , ba huuphiyan caaqqiis .

text: Saying , Surely blessing I will bless thee , and multiplying I will multiply thee .
text2: Xoossai a , “ Taani nena anjjana ; ne zerettaakka corayana ” yaagidi caaqqiis .

text: And so , after he had patiently endured , he obtained the promise .
text2: Hegaadankka , Abrahaami gencci naagidi , Xoossai immana giidoogaa ekkiis .

text: For men verily swear by the greater : and an oath for confirmation is to them an end of all strife .
text2: Aissi giikko , asai baappe gitatiya uran caaqqees ; qassi he caaqoi palama ubbaakka teqqees .

text: Wherein God , willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel , confirmed it by an oath :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Xoossai ba immana giidoogaa laattanaageetuyyo ba qofaa mulekka laammennaagaa geeshshi yootanau keehi koyidi , hegee tuma gididoogaayyo caaqqiis .

text: That by two immutable things , in which it was impossible for God to lie , we might have a strong consolation , who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us :
text2: Xoossai worddotanau danddayenna ha naa77u laamettenna yohotun , i immana giido nu sinttan de7iyaagaa oiqqanau baqatida nuuyyo gita minttettoi de7ees .

text: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul , both sure and stedfast , and which entereth into that within the veil ;
text2: Ha nuuni demmana giidi ufaissan naagi uttidoogee , nu shemppuwaayyo markkabiyaa oiqqiya qaaxxenna birata mala ; he nuuni demmana giidi , ufaissan naagi uttidoogee erettida mino gididi , magalasho giddo geeshshasaa gelees .

text: Whither the forerunner is for us entered , even Jesus , made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Qassi Yesuusi Malkki - Xedeqa sunttatettaadan , merinau qeese ubbatu halaqa gididi , nu gishshaa nuuppe kasetidi , he sohuwaa geliis .

text: For this Melchisedec , king of Salem , priest of the most high God , who met Abraham returning from the slaughter of the kings , and blessed him ;
text2: Ha Malkki - Xedeqi , Saleema kawoi , Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaa qeesee , Abrahaami kawota woridi olaappe simmishin , aara gaittidi , a anjjiis .

text: To whom also Abraham gave a tenth part of all ; first being by interpretation King of righteousness , and after that also King of Salem , which is , King of peace ;
text2: Abrahaami ba omooddido ubbaappe asirataa kessidi , ayyo immiis ; Malkki - Xedeqa sunttau koiro birshshettai xillotettaa kawuwaa giyoogaa ; qassi Saleema kawo i gidiyo gishshau , naa77antto birshshettai sarotettaa kawuwaa giyoogaa .

text: Without father , without mother , without descent , having neither beginning of days , nor end of life ; but made like unto the Son of God ; abideth a priest continually .
text2: Malkki - Xedeqayyo aayyiyaa woi aawai , woi ayyo zare paidoi baawa ; qassi a yeletau doometti woi a haiquwau wurssetti baawa ; shin Xoossaa Na7aa milatidi , merinau qeese gidiis .

text: Now consider how great this man was , unto whom even the patriarch Abraham gave the tenth of the spoils .
text2: Nu aawatu halaqai Abrahaami olan omooddidi , ehiidobaappe asirataa immido Malkki - Xedeqi ai keena gitakko be7ite .

text: And verily they that are of the sons of Levi , who receive the office of the priesthood , have a commandment to take tithes of the people according to the law , that is , of their brethren , though they come out of the loins of Abraham :
text2: Qeese gidiya Leewa zareti Israa7eela asaappe , hegeenne bantta dere asaappe harai atto eti Abrahaama zare gidikkokka , asirataa ekkana mala , higgiyan azazettidosona .

text: But he whose descent is not counted from them received tithes of Abraham , and blessed him that had the promises .
text2: Malkki - Xedeqi Leewa zare gidenna ; shin Abrahaamappe asirataa ekkidi , Xoossai immana giidoogaa naagiya Abrahaama anjjiis .

text: And without all contradiction the less is blessed of the better .
text2: Qassi anjjiyaagee anjjettiyaagaappe gitatiyoogee palanttenna .

text: And here men that die receive tithes ; but there he receiveth them , of whom it is witnessed that he liveth .
text2: Issi baggaara , haiqqiya asai asirataa kessees ; shin hara baggaara qassi , haiqqenna giidi markkattiyo urai asirataa kessees .

text: And as I may so say , Levi also , who receiveth tithes , payed tithes in Abraham .
text2: Hagaadan haasayanau harai atto , asirataa kessiya Leewikka Abrahaama baggaara asirataa immiis .

text: For he was yet in the loins of his father , when Melchisedec met him .
text2: Aissi giikko , Malkki - Xedeqi Abrahaamaara gaittiyo wode , Leewi biron yelettibeenna ; shin ba zariyaa Abrahaama gulbbatan de7ees .

text: If therefore perfection were by the Levitical priesthood , ( for under it the people received the law , ) what further need was there that another priest should rise after the order of Melchisedec , and not be called after the order of Aaron ?
text2: Israa7eela asaayyo higgee Leewa qeesetettaa baggaara imettiis . He qeesetettaa oosoi bali bainnaagaa gidikko , Aaroonaagaa mala gidennan Malkki - Xedeqa mala hara qeesee sunttettanau aissi koshshii ?

text: For the priesthood being changed , there is made of necessity a change also of the law .
text2: Aissi giikko , qeesetettai laamettiyo wode , higgeekka qassi laamettanau koshshees .

text: For he of whom these things are spoken pertaineth to another tribe , of which no man gave attendance at the altar .
text2: Ha yohoi haasayettido urai hara zaree ; a zariyaappe ooninne yarshshiyoosan qeesedan oottibeenna .

text: For it is evident that our Lord sprang out of Juda ; of which tribe Moses spake nothing concerning priesthood .
text2: Nu Godai Yihudaa zariyaappe yiidoogee erettidaagaa gidiyo gishshau , Muusee qeesetubaa haasayiiddi , he zariyaabaa ainne haasayibeenna .

text: And it is yet far more evident : for that after the similitude of Melchisedec there ariseth another priest ,
text2: Malkki - Xedeqa mala hara qeesee yiidobaa gidiyaakko , hagee aadhdhidi erettana .

text: Who is made , not after the law of a carnal commandment , but after the power of an endless life .
text2: I asa higgeeninne wogan qeese gidibeenna ; shin wurenna de7uwaa wolqqan qeese gidiis .

text: For he testifieth , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Malkki - Xedeqi qeese gididoogaadan , neenikka merinau qeese gidana ” yaagidi markkattees .

text: For there is verily a disannulling of the commandment going before for the weakness and unprofitableness thereof .
text2: Beni de7iya higgee laafanne pattennaagaa gidiyo gishshau attiis .

text: For the law made nothing perfect , but the bringing in of a better hope did ; by the which we draw nigh unto God .
text2: Aissi giikko , Muuse higgee aibanne bali bainnabaa oottanau danddayenna ; qassi nuuni a baggaara Xoossaakko shiiqana giidi ufaissan naagi uttido ubbaappe aadhdhiyaagee yiis .

text: And inasmuch as not without an oath he was made priest :
text2: Hegaa bollan qassi Xoossaa caaqoikka de7ees ; harati qeese gidido wode , hegaa mala caaqoi baawa .

text: ( For those priests were made without an oath ; but this with an oath by him that said unto him , The Lord sware and will not repent , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec : )
text2: SHin Yesuusi caaquwan qeese gidiis ; Xoossai a , “ Godai caaqqiis ; i ba qofaa laammenna . ' Neeni merinau qeese gidana ' giis ” yaagiis .

text: By so much was Jesus made a surety of a better testament .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yesuusi ubbaappe aadhdhiya caaquwau waase gidiis .

text: And they truly were many priests , because they were not suffered to continue by reason of death :
text2: Kase qeesetu qoodai daro ; aissi giikko , eti oottana oosuwaa haiqoi diggiis .

text: But this man , because he continueth ever , hath an unchangeable priesthood .
text2: SHin Yesuusi merinau de7iyo gishshau , a qeesetettai laamettenna .

text: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him , seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , i eta gishshaa gaannatanau merinau de7iyo gishshau , Xoossaakko ba baggaara yiyaageeta muleera ashshanau danddayees .

text: For such an high priest became us , who is holy , harmless , undefiled , separate from sinners , and made higher than the heavens ;
text2: Nuuyyo giigiya hagaa mala , qeese ubbatu halaqai de7anau koshshees ; i geeshsha ; aani geneenne borssoi baawa ; nagaranchchatuura i gaittenna ; qassi xoqqa saluwankka i bonchchettiis .

text: Who needeth not daily , as those high priests , to offer up sacrifice , first for his own sins , and then for the people ' s : for this he did once , when he offered up himself .
text2: Hara qeese ubbatu halaqatudan , i koiro ba huuphe nagaraassi yarshshidi , qassi guyyeppe asaa nagaraassi hachchi hachchi yarshshanau koshshenna ; i bana yarshshido wode , naa77anttennan issitoo yarshshiis .

text: For the law maketh men high priests which have infirmity ; but the word of the oath , which was since the law , maketh the Son , who is consecrated for evermore .
text2: Aissi giikko , Muuse higgee daafuranchcha asaa qeese ubbatu halaqa oottidi sunttees ; shin Xoossai immana giidi caaqqido higgiyaappe guyye yiida qaalai merinau bali bainnaagaa , Xoossaa Na7aa sunttees .

text: Now of the things which we have spoken this is the sum : We have such an high priest , who is set on the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens ;
text2: Nuuni haasayiyo gitabai hagaa ; saluwan Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossai uttiyo kawotaa araataappe ushachcha baggaara uttida qeese ubbatu halaqai , hagaa malai nuuyyo de7ees .

text: A minister of the sanctuary , and of the true tabernacle , which the Lord pitched , and not man .
text2: Geeshsha Sohuwaaninne tumu Dunkkaaniyan i oottees ; he Dunkkaanee asi essidoogaa gidennan , Xoossai essidoogaa .

text: For every high priest is ordained to offer gifts and sacrifices : wherefore it is of necessity that this man have somewhat also to offer .
text2: Qeese ubbatu halaqa ubbai imuwaanne yarshshuwaa Xoossau immanau sunttettido gishshau , ha qeese ubbatu halaqaayyookka yarshshanau issibai de7anau koshshees .

text: For if he were on earth , he should not be a priest , seeing that there are priests that offer gifts according to the law :
text2: Simmi sa7an i de7iyaabaa gidikko , mulekka qeese gidenna ; aissi giikko , higgee azaziyoogaadan , imuwaa immiya qeeseti de7oosona .

text: Who serve unto the example and shadow of heavenly things , as Moses was admonished of God when he was about to make the tabernacle : for , See , saith he , that thou make all things according to the pattern shewed to thee in the mount .
text2: Eti qeesetuugaadan oottiyo oosoi saluwan de7iya oosuwau tumu leemisonne eesho ; aissi giikko , Muusee Dunkkaaniyaa essana hanishin , Xoossai a , “ Akeeka ; ubbabaakka taani nena deriyaa huuphiyan bessido leemisuwaa kaallada ootta ” yaagiis .

text: But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry , by how much also he is the mediator of a better covenant , which was established upon better promises .
text2: SHin Yesuusi gaannatiyo maachchai kaseegaappe aadhdhiyoogaadankka , ayyo imettida oosoikka etaagaappe aadhdhees ; aissi giikko , he maachchai Xoossai immana giido ubbaappe aadhdhiya oosuwan oosettiis .

text: For if that first covenant had been faultless , then should no place have been sought for the second .
text2: Aissi giikko , koiro maachchan bali bainnabaa gidiyaakko , naa77antto maachchaa koshshenna .

text: For finding fault with them , he saith , Behold , the days come , saith the Lord , when I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel and with the house of Judah :
text2: SHin eta boriiddi , Godai hagaadan yaagees ; “ Taani Israa7eela asaaranne Yihudaa asaara ooratta maachchaa maacettiyo gallassati yaana .

text: Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt ; because they continued not in my covenant , and I regarded them not , saith the Lord .
text2: He maachchai taani Gibxxe biittaappe eta aawatu kushiyaa oiqqada , goochcha kessido wode , etaara maacettido maachchaa mala gidenna . Eti ta maachchan ammanettibeenna gishshau , taanikka eta yegga bayaas . Taani , Godai , hagaa odais .

text: For this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days , saith the Lord ; I will put my laws into their mind , and write them in their hearts : and I will be to them a God , and they shall be to me a people :
text2: Aissi giikko , he gallassatuppe guyyiyan , taani Israa7eela asaara maacettana maachchai hagaa : Taani ta higgiyaa eta qofan wottana ; qassi eta wozanankka xaafana . Taani eta Xoossaa gidana ; etikka ta asa gidana .

text: And they shall not teach every man his neighbour , and every man his brother , saying , Know the Lord : for all shall know me , from the least to the greatest .
text2: Etappe ooninne ba shooruwaa woi ba ishaa , ' Godaa era ' yaagidi tamaarissenna . Aissi giikko , eti guuttaappe gitaa gakkanaassi ubbai tana eroosona .

text: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness , and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Taani eta naaquwaa maarana ; eta nagaraakka naa77antto hassayikke ” yaagees .

text: In that he saith , A new covenant , he hath made the first old . Now that which decayeth and waxeth old is ready to vanish away .
