text2: Xoossai ooratta maachchaa giidi haasayiyoogan koiroogaa ceegettiis ; qassi ceeggiyaabainne wuriyaabai eesuwan xayana .

text: Then verily the first covenant had also ordinances of divine service , and a worldly sanctuary .
text2: Koiro maachchaayyo Xoossau goinniyo wogainne asai oottido Beeta Maqidasee de7ees .

text: For there was a tabernacle made ; the first , wherein was the candlestick , and the table , and the shewbread ; which is called the sanctuary .
text2: Aissi giikko , koiro Dunkkaanee eqqiis ; a giddon muqaaddaa wottiyoogee , xaraphpheezainne Godaa sinttan wottiyo oittai de7ees ; he sohuwaa Geeshsha Sohuwaa giidi xeeseettees .

text: And after the second veil , the tabernacle which is called the Holiest of all ;
text2: Naa77antto magalashuwaappe guyye baggaara Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Soho geetettiya Dunkkaanee de7ees .

text: Which had the golden censer , and the ark of the covenant overlaid round about with gold , wherein was the golden pot that had manna , and Aaron ' s rod that budded , and the tables of the covenant ;
text2: A giddon ixaanaa cuwayanau worqqappe oottido saaxineenne ubbasaara worqqan sheeshshido Maachchaa Taabootai de7ees . He Maachchaa Taabootan mannai de7iyo worqqa xaaroi , Aaroona xam77ai aacidaageenne qassi Muuse higgee xaafettido naa77u masettida shuchchati de7oosona .

text: And over it the cherubims of glory shadowing the mercyseat ; of which we cannot now speak particularly .
text2: He Maachchaa Taabootaappe bolla baggaara atto giyo sohuwaa qum77uwaa bantta qefiyan genttiya bonchcho kiruubeti de7oosona ; shin ha ubbabaa ha77i wurssi yootanau danddayokko .

text: Now when these things were thus ordained , the priests went always into the first tabernacle , accomplishing the service of God .
text2: Hegee hegaadan giigidaashin , qeeseti ubba wode , bantta oosuwaa oottanau koiro Dunkkaaniyaa geloosona .

text: But into the second went the high priest alone once every year , not without blood , which he offered for himself , and for the errors of the people :
text2: SHin qeese ubbatu halaqa xalaalai naa77antto Dunkkaaniyaa laittaappe issitoo gelees ; geliiddi ba gishshaunne erennan asi oottido nagaraa gishshau , Xoossaayyo yarshshiyo suuttaa ekkidi gelees .

text: The Holy Ghost this signifying , that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest , while as the first tabernacle was yet standing :
text2: Koiro Dunkkaanee eqqi de7ishin , ubbaappe aadhdhiya geeshsha sohuwaa efiya ogee biron dooyettibeennaagaa Geeshsha Ayyaanai hegan erissees .

text: Which was a figure for the time then present , in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices , that could not make him that did the service perfect , as pertaining to the conscience ;
text2: He Dunkkaanee ha wodiyau leemiso ; hegaa giyoogee Xoossau immiyo imoinne yarshshoi goinniyaagaa zoriya wozanaa bali bainnaagaa oottanau danddayokkona .

text: Which stood only in meats and drinks , and divers washings , and carnal ordinances , imposed on them until the time of reformation .
text2: Hegeeti meettaabaa , ushshaabaanne dumma dumma meechchaabaa yootiyaageeta ; eti ooraxxiyo wodee gakkanaassi oosettiya wogata .

text: But Christ being come an high priest of good things to come , by a greater and more perfect tabernacle , not made with hands , that is to say , not of this building ;
text2: SHin Kiristtoosi hagan de7iya lo77obau qeese ubbatu halaqa gididi yiichchiis . Giddon i oottiyo Dunkkaanee ubbaappe aadhdhiyaagaanne bali bainnaagaa ; qassi he Dunkkaaniyaa asi oottibeenna ; ha merettida sa7aabaakka gidenna .

text: Neither by the blood of goats and calves , but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place , having obtained eternal redemption for us .
text2: Kiristtoosi Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwaa geliyo wode , deeshsha suuttanne galo suutta oiqqidi gelibeenna ; shin ba suuttaa oiqqidi , nuuyyo merinaa atotettaa demmidi , naa77anttennan issitoo geliis .

text: For if the blood of bulls and of goats , and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean , sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh :
text2: Tunida asa bolli korimaa suuttaanne deeshshaa suuttaa caccafidi , xuugettida usa bidintta qolin , he uraa tunatettaappe geeshshanau danddayikko ,

text: How much more shall the blood of Christ , who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God , purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God ?
text2: Merinaa Geeshsha Ayyaanaa baggaara bali bainna yarshshodan , Xoossau bana immida Kiristtoosa suuttai , nuuni de7o Xoossau oottana mala , kase nu haiqqida oosuwaappe nuna zoriya wozanaa waati geeshshanddeeshsha !

text: And for this cause he is the mediator of the new testament , that by means of death , for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first testament , they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Xoossai xeesidoogeeti i immana giido merinaa anjjuwaa laattana mala , Kiristtoosi ooratta maachchau gaannatiis ; hegee hanana danddayiyoogee , asai koiro maachchaappe garssan de7iiddi oottido bala ailletettaappe kessiya haiqoi de7iyo gishshassa .

text: For where a testament is , there must also of necessity be the death of the testator .
text2: Aissi giikko , haiqqiya urai azazidobai de7ikko , he urai haiqqidoogee erettana koshshees .

text: For a testament is of force after men are dead : otherwise it is of no strength at all while the testator liveth .
text2: Aissi giikko , azazida urai haiqqido wode , i azazidoogee polettees ; he azazidaagee paxa de7ishin , ainne polettenna .

text: Whereupon neither the first testament was dedicated without blood .
text2: Harai atto , koiro maachchaikka suutti bainnan injjetibeennaagee hegaassa .

text: For when Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law , he took the blood of calves and of goats , with water , and scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled both the book , and all the people ,
text2: Aissi giikko , higgiyan de7iya azazo ubbaa Muusee asa ubbau yootiis ; hegaappe guyyiyan , galo maraa suuttaanne deeshshaa suuttaa , haattaara , zo7o dorssa ikisiyaaranne hiisoophphiyaa giyo mittaa bonccuwaara issippe ekkidi , “ Hagee inttena Xoossai azazido maachchaa suuttaa ” yaagidi , higgiyaa maxaafaa bollinne asa ubbaa bolli caccafiis .

text: Moreover he sprinkled with blood both the tabernacle , and all the vessels of the ministry .
text2: Hegaadankka , Dunkkaaniyaa bollinne oottiyo miishsha ubbaa bolli suuttaa Muusee caccafiis .

text: And almost all things are by the law purged with blood ; and without shedding of blood is no remission .
text2: Higgee giyoogaadan , tumakka amaridabaappe attin , ubbabaikka suuttan geeyees ; suutti gukkana xayikko , atotetti baawa .

text: It was therefore necessary that the patterns of things in the heavens should be purified with these ; but the heavenly things themselves with better sacrifices than these .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , saluwan de7iyaageeta milatiyaageeti he yarshshuwan geeyanau koshshees ; shin saluwan de7iyaageetikka bantta huuphen geeyanau aadhdhiya yarshshuwaa eta koshshees .

text: For Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands , which are the figures of the true ; but into heaven itself , now to appear in the presence of God for us :
text2: Aissi giikko , Kiristtoosi tumu geeshshasan leemisettiya asi oottido geeshshasaa gelibeenna ; shin i ha77i nu gishshaa Xoossaa sinttan beettanau yaa saluwaa geliis .

text: Nor yet that he should offer himself often , as the high priest entereth into the holy place every year with blood of others ;
text2: Qeese ubbatu halaqai laittan laittan ba suuttaa gidennaagaa oiqqidi , Geeshsha Sohuwaa geliyoogaadan , i bana ubbatoo yarshshanau gelibeenna .

text: For then must he often have suffered since the foundation of the world : but now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself .
text2: Hegaa gidiyaakko , Kiristtoosi sa7ai merettoosappe doommidi darotoo waayettanau koshshees ; shin ha77i wodiyaa wurssettan nagaraa xaissanau bana yarshshidi , naa77anttennan issitoo beettiis .

text: And as it is appointed unto men once to die , but after this the judgment :
text2: Asai ubbai issitoo haiqqanau bessees ; hegaappe guyyiyan Xoossai asaa pirddana .

text: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many ; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation .
text2: Hegaadankka , qassi Kiristtoosi daro asaa nagaraa xaissanau issitoo yarshshettiis ; qassi i bana mintti naagiyaageeta ashshanau beettanaappe attin , naa77antto nagara tookkanau beettenna .

text: For the law having a shadow of good things to come , and not the very image of the things , can never with those sacrifices which they offered year by year continually make the comers thereunto perfect .
text2: Aissi giikko , higgiyau yaana lo77obaa eesho xalaalai de7ees ; ayyo tumu leemisoi baawa . Ubba wode laittan laittan issi mala yarshshoi yarshshettees ; hegaa gishshau , higgee Xoossaakko shiiqiya asa he yarshshon bali bainna asa oottanau mulekka danddayenna .

text: For then would they not have ceased to be offered ? because that the worshippers once purged should have had no more conscience of sins .
text2: Xoossau goinniya asai ba nagaraappe muleera geeyidobaa gidiyaakko , bana zoriya wozanan naa77anttuwaa nagara qoppenna ; qassi yarshshiyoogaakka aggi bayana .

text: But in those sacrifices there is a remembrance again made of sins every year .
text2: SHin asai laittan laittan he yarshshuwan ba nagaraa hassayees .

text: For it is not possible that the blood of bulls and of goats should take away sins .
text2: Aissi giikko , korima suuttinne deeshsha suutti nagara xaissanau mulekka danddayenna .

text: Wherefore when he cometh into the world , he saith , Sacrifice and offering thou wouldest not , but a body hast thou prepared me :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Kiristtoosi ha sa7aa yaana haniiddi , hagaadan yaagiis ; “ Neeni yarshshonne imo koyabaakka ; shin taayyo bolla giigissadasa .

text: In burnt offerings and sacrifices for sin thou hast had no pleasure .
text2: Neeni xuuggiyo yarshshuwaaninne nagaraa yarshshuwan mulekka ufaittakka .

text: Then said I , Lo , I come ( in the volume of the book it is written of me , ) to do thy will , O God .
text2: Taani he wode , ' Xaatta maxaafan tabai xaafettidoogaadankka , Xoossau , taani neeni koyiyoogaa oottanau yaas ' yaagaas ” yaagiis .

text: Above when he said , Sacrifice and offering and burnt offerings and offering for sin thou wouldest not , neither hadst pleasure therein ; which are offered by the law ;
text2: Yarshshoi yarshshettana mala , higgee azaziyoobaa gidikkokka , Kiristtoosi koiro , “ Neeni yarshsho , imo , xuuggiyo yarshshonne nagaraa yarshsho mulekka koyabaakka ; hegeetun ufaittakka ” yaagiis .

text: Then said he , Lo , I come to do thy will , O God . He taketh away the first , that he may establish the second .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan Kiristtoosi , “ Xoossau , taani neeni koyiyoogaa oottanau yaas ” yaagiis . Hegaa gishshau , Kiristtoosi naa77anttuwaa essanau koiroogaa xaissees .

text: By the which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all .
text2: Yesuus Kiristtoosi Xoossai koyidoogaa oottido gishshau , ba ashuwaa naa77anttennan issitoo yarshshidoogan nuuni nu nagaraappe geeyi aggida .

text: And every priest standeth daily ministering and offering oftentimes the same sacrifices , which can never take away sins :
text2: Qeese ubbai hachchi hachchi eqqidi , ba oosuwaa oottees ; qassi nagara xaissanau mulekka danddayenna issi mala yarshshuwaa zaari zaaridi yarshshees .

text: But this man , after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever , sat down on the right hand of God ;
text2: SHin Kiristtoosi nagaraa gishshau , ubba wodiyau gidiya issi yarshshuwaa yarshshidi , Xoossaappe ushachcha baggaara utti aggiis .

text: From henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool .
text2: Xoossai sinttappe Kiristtoosa morkketa Kiristtoosayyo tohuwan yedhdhiyoobaa oottana gakkanaassi , yaani naagees .

text: For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified .
text2: Aissi giikko , i issitoo yarshshidoogan , nagaraappe geeyidaageeta merinau bali bainnaageeta oottiis .

text: Whereof the Holy Ghost also is a witness to us : for after that he had said before ,
text2: Qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanai nuuyyo markkattiiddi , hagaadan yaagees ;

text: This is the covenant that I will make with them after those days , saith the Lord , I will put my laws into their hearts , and in their minds will I write them ;
text2: “ Taani he gallassatuppe guyyiyan , etaara maacettiyo maachchai hagaa : Taani ta higgiyaa eta qofan wottana ; qassi eta wozanankka xaafana ” yaagees .

text: And their sins and iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Qassi hegaappe guyyiyankka , “ Taani eta nagaraanne eta makkala oosuwaa naa77antto hassayikke ” yaagees .

text: Now where remission of these is , there is no more offering for sin .
text2: Xoossai he nagara atto giido wode , nagara xaissanau hagaappe sinttau yarshsho koshshenna .

text: Having therefore , brethren , boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus ,
text2: Simmi ta ishatoo , nuuni Yesuusa suuttaa baggaara Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwaa gelanau nuuyyo xalatettai de7ees .

text: By a new and living way , which he hath consecrated for us , through the veil , that is to say , his flesh ;
text2: Kiristtoosi nuuyyo ooratta ogiyaanne de7o ogiyaa magalashuwaa baggaara , hegaa giyoogee ba bollaa baggaara dooyiis .

text: And having an high priest over the house of God ;
text2: Nuuyyo Xoossaa keettan sunttettida gita qeesee de7iyo gishshau ,

text: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith , having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience , and our bodies washed with pure water .
text2: Nuuni suure wozanaara , tumu ammanuwaara , iitabaa zoriya wozanaappe geeyida wozanaaranne qassi xillo haattan meecettida bollaara Xoossaakko shiiqoos .

text: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering ; ( for he is faithful that promised ; )
text2: Nuuyyo immana giida Xoossai ammanttiyo gishshau , nuuni demmana giidi ufaissan naagi uttidoogaa mintti oiqqoos .

text: And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works :
text2: Issoi issuwaara waani siiqettanaakkonne qassi lo77o oosuwaa waati oottanaakko , issoi issuwau qoppoos .

text: Not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together , as the manner of some is ; but exhorting one another : and so much the more , as ye see the day approaching .
text2: Issooti issooti shiiquwaa meeze oottidi shiiqiyoogaadan , nuunikka issippe shiiqiyoogaa aggokko ; shin Godaa gallassai matattiyoogaa intte be7iyo gishshau , issoi issuwaa minttettoos .

text: For if we sin wilfully after that we have received the knowledge of the truth , there remaineth no more sacrifice for sins ,
text2: Nuuni tumatettaa eratettaa ekkirggidi , eriiddi nagara oottiyaabaa gidikko , hagaappe sinttau nagara xaissiya yarshshoi issibinne baawa .

text: But a certain fearful looking for of judgment and fiery indignation , which shall devour the adversaries .
text2: SHin yashshiya pirddaa naagiyoogeenne Xoossaa ixxiya ubbaa maanau wolqqaama tamai de7ees .

text: He that despised Moses ' law died without mercy under two or three witnesses :
text2: Muuse higgiyau azazettenna urai , naa77u urai woi heezzu urai a bolli markkattikko , qareti bainnan haiqqees .

text: Of how much sorer punishment , suppose ye , shall he be thought worthy , who hath trodden under foot the Son of God , and hath counted the blood of the covenant , wherewith he was sanctified , an unholy thing , and hath done despite unto the Spirit of grace ?
text2: Xoossaa Na7aa karida urai , bana nagaraappe geeshshida Xoossaa maachchaa suuttaa tunabaadan qoppida urai , qassi aaro kehatettaa Geeshsha Ayyaanaa cayiya urai , ai keena iita pirddaa ekkanau bessiyaakkonne ane qoppite .

text: For we know him that hath said , Vengeance belongeth unto me , I will recompense , saith the Lord . And again , The Lord shall judge his people .
text2: Aissi giikko , “ Taani haluwaa kessananne kushiyaa zaarana ” giidaagaa nuuni eroos ; qassikka , “ Godai ba asaa pirddana ” yaagiis .

text: It is a fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
text2: De7o Xoossaa kushiyan kunddanaagee daro yashshiyaabaa .

text: But call to remembrance the former days , in which , after ye were illuminated , ye endured a great fight of afflictions ;
text2: Intteyyo Xoossaa poo7oi poo7idoogaappe guyyiyan , intte daroban waayettidi , gita waretan genccido beni wodiyaa hassayite .

text: Partly , whilst ye were made a gazingstock both by reproaches and afflictions ; and partly , whilst ye became companions of them that were so used .
text2: Issi issitoo inttena asa sinttan cayidosonanne paxa kaa7idosona ; qassi hara wode hegaadan oottidoogeetuura issippe de7ideta .

text: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds , and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods , knowing in yourselves that ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance .
text2: Aissi giikko , qashuwan de7iya asatuyyo intte qarettideta ; yaatidi intteyyo merinau wurenna ubbaappe aadhdhiya miishshai saluwan de7iyoogaa intte huuphen erido gishshau , inttebaa ubbaa ekkirgginkka ufaissan genccideta .

text: Cast not away therefore your confidence , which hath great recompence of reward .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , gita woituwaara de7iya intte xalatettaa oloppite .

text: For ye have need of patience , that , after ye have done the will of God , ye might receive the promise .
text2: Xoossai koyiyoogaa oottidi , i intteyyo immana giidoogaa ekkanau genccana koshshees .

text: For yet a little while , and he that shall come will come , and will not tarry .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Amarida wodee attiis . Yiyaagee yaana ; gam77enna .

text: Now the just shall live by faith : but if any man draw back , my soul shall have no pleasure in him .
text2: Ta xilloi ammanuwan de7ana . SHin ooninne guyye simmikko , tana ufaissenna ” yaagees .

text: But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition ; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul .
text2: Nuuni ammanidi attidaageetu bagga gidiyoogaappe attin , guyye simmidi xayidaageetu bagga gidokko .

text: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for , the evidence of things not seen .
text2: Ammano giyoogee , demmana giidi ufaissan naagi uttidobai ammanttiyoogaanne be7anau danddayennabaa erissiyaagaa .

text: For by it the elders obtained a good report .
text2: Xoossai beni ceega asaayyo markkattidoogee , eti ammanidoogaana .

text: Through faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God , so that things which are seen were not made of things which do appear .
text2: Sa7ai Xoossaa qaalan merettidoogaa ammanuwan nuuni eroos ; hegaa gishshau , beettiyaabai beettennabaappe merettiis .

text: By faith Abel offered unto God a more excellent sacrifice than Cain , by which he obtained witness that he was righteous , God testifying of his gifts : and by it he being dead yet speaketh .
text2: Aabeeli Qaa7eelaagaappe aadhdhiya yarshshuwaa Xoossau yarshshidoogee ammanuwaana . Xoossai a imuwaabaa markkattiiddi , i xillo gididoogaakka markkattiis ; Aabeeli harai atto haiqqidikka , ba ammanuwan ha77i gakkanaassi haasayees .

text: By faith Enoch was translated that he should not see death ; and was not found , because God had translated him : for before his translation he had this testimony , that he pleased God .
text2: Heenooki haiqqennan saluwaa biidoogee ammanuwaana ; Xoossai efiido gishshau , ooninne a be7anau danddayibeenna . Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Heenooki saluwaa baanaappe kase Xoossaa ufaissiis ” yaagees .

text: But without faith it is impossible to please him : for he that cometh to God must believe that he is , and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him .
text2: Ammanoi bainnan ooninne Xoossaa ufaissanau danddayenna ; aissi giikko , Xoossaakko yiya ooninne Xoossai de7iyoogaanne bana koyiyaageetuyyo woituwaa immiyoogaa ammananau koshshees .

text: By faith Noah , being warned of God of things not seen as yet , moved with fear , prepared an ark to the saving of his house ; by the which he condemned the world , and became heir of the righteousness which is by faith .
text2: Nohee be7anau danddayenna sinttappe hananabau Xoossai , “ Nena naaga ” gin , Xoossau yayyidi , bananne ba so asaa ashshanau markkabiyaa keexxidoogee ammanuwaana ; yaatidi hegan ha sa7aa bolli pirddidi , ammanuwan beettiya xillotettaakka Xoossaappe ekkiis .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was called to go out into a place which he should after receive for an inheritance , obeyed ; and he went out , not knowing whither he went .
text2: Abrahaami laattanaadan , Xoossai baayyo immana giido biittaa baana mala , Xoossai bana xeesido wode , azazettidoogee ammanuwaana ; i ba biittaappe kiyidi biyo wode , au biyaakkonne erennan kiyiis .

text: By faith he sojourned in the land of promise , as in a strange country , dwelling in tabernacles with Isaac and Jacob , the heirs with him of the same promise :
text2: Abrahaami Xoossai baayyo immana giido biittan hara biitta asadan de7idoogee ammanuwaana ; Xoossai he immana giidoogaa banaara issippe laattana Yisaaqaaranne Yaaqoobaara Dunkkaaniyan de7iis .

text: For he looked for a city which hath foundations , whose builder and maker is God .
text2: Aissi giikko , Abrahaami Xoossai lo77o baasuwan hayyottidi keexxido katamaa naagees .

text: Through faith also Sara herself received strength to conceive seed , and was delivered of a child when she was past age , because she judged him faithful who had promised .
text2: Saara ba huuphen harai atto ceeggaichchadakka , immana giida Xoossai ammanettidaagaa gididoogaa erido gishshau , na7a shahaaranau wolqqaa demmidoogee ammanuwaana .

text: Therefore sprang there even of one , and him as good as dead , so many as the stars of the sky in multitude , and as the sand which is by the sea shore innumerable .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , haiqqida asa milatiya issi bitaniyaappe saluwan de7iya xoolintte keena , abbaa lanqqiyan de7iya qoodi bainna shafe keena zareti yelettidosona .

text: These all died in faith , not having received the promises , but having seen them afar off , and were persuaded of them , and embraced them , and confessed that they were strangers and pilgrims on the earth .
text2: He asati ubbati ammanuwan haiqqidosona ; banttau Xoossai immana giidoogaakka ekkibookkona ; shin haahuwan hegaa be7idi , sarotidosona . Qassi eti sa7an imattanne yedetettidi kiyida asata gididoogaa eridosona .

text: For they that say such things declare plainly that they seek a country .
text2: Aissi giikko , hegaadan giya asati bantta huuphe biittaa koyiyoogaa erissoosona .

text: And truly , if they had been mindful of that country from whence they came out , they might have had opportunity to have returned .
text2: Eti he yeggidi kiyido biittaa simmanau qoppidobaa gidiyaakko , guyye simmiyo qaadaa demmennan aggokkona ; shin

text: But now they desire a better country , that is , an heavenly : wherefore God is not ashamed to be called their God : for he hath prepared for them a city .
text2: eti hegaa aggidi , lo77iya biittaa laamotoosona ; hegee saluwaa biittaa . Hegaa gishshau , Xoossai eta Xoossaa geetettanau yeellatenna . Aissi giikko , i etau katamaa giigissi wottiis .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was tried , offered up Isaac : and he that had received the promises offered up his only begotten son ,
text2: Abrahaami Yisaaqa yarshshanaakko yarshshennaakko , Xoossai eranau xomoosido wode , Abrahaami ammanuwan a yarshshiis . Xoossai Abrahaama , “ Ne zaree Yisaaqa baggaara xeesettana ” giidaashinkka , Abrahaami ba na7aa Yisaaqa yarshshanau giigiis .

text: Accounting that God was able to raise him up , even from the dead ; from whence also he received him in a figure .
text2: Abrahaami Xoossai Yisaaqa harai atto , haiquwaappekka pattanau danddayiyoogaa eriis ; hegaa gishshau , haiquwaappe guyye a zaaridi ekkiis .

text: By faith Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau concerning things to come .
text2: Yisaaqi wodeppe hananabau Yaaqoobanne Eesawa anjjidoogee ammanuwaana .

text: By faith Jacob , when he was a dying , blessed both the sons of Joseph ; and worshipped , leaning upon the top of his staff .
text2: Yaaqoobi haiqqana haniiddi , Yooseefa naata huuphiyan huuphiyan anjjidoogeenne gatiman guufetidi , Xoossau goinnidoogee ammanuwaana .

text: By faith Joseph , when he died , made mention of the departing of the children of Israel ; and gave commandment concerning his bones .
text2: Yooseefi haiqqanau matiiddi , Israa7eela asai Gibxxeppe kiyanaagaa haasayidoogeenne ba meqettaa oottanabaa eta azazidoogee ammanuwaana .

text: By faith Moses , when he was born , was hid three months of his parents , because they saw he was a proper child ; and they were not afraid of the king ' s commandment .
text2: Muusee yelettidoogaappe guyyiyan , aayyiyaanne aawai malaa lo77o na7a gididoogaa be7idi , heezzu agina qottidoogee ammanuwaana ; eti kawuwaa awaajuwaukka yayyibookkona .

text: By faith Moses , when he was come to years , refused to be called the son of Pharaoh ' s daughter ;
text2: Muusee diccidoogaappe guyyiyan , Gibxxe kawuwaa na7ee na7aa geetettanaagaa ixxidoogee ammanuwaana .

text: Choosing rather to suffer affliction with the people of God , than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a season ;
text2: Nagaran Muusee guutta wodiyaa ufaittanaagaappe , Xoossaa asaara waayettanaagaa dooriis .

text: Esteeming the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures in Egypt : for he had respect unto the recompence of the reward .
text2: Wodeppe demmana woituwaa i tishshi oottidi xeellido gishshau , Gibxxe biittaa miishsha ubbaappe Kiristtoosa gishshau borettiyoogee daro aadhdhiya duretetta gididoogaa qoppiis .

text: By faith he forsook Egypt , not fearing the wrath of the king : for he endured , as seeing him who is invisible .
text2: Kawuwaa hanqquwau Muusee yayyennan , Gibxxe biittaappe kiyidoogee ammanuwaana ; aissi giikko , beettenna Xoossaa be7idabaadan , genccidi sinttau biis .

text: Through faith he kept the passover , and the sprinkling of blood , lest he that destroyed the firstborn should touch them .
text2: Haiquwaa kiitanchchai Israa7eela asaayyo baira naata bochchennaadan , Muusee Paasikaa bonchchidoogeenne qosilettan suuttaa caccafissidoogee ammanuwaana .

text: By faith they passed through the Red sea as by dry land : which the Egyptians assaying to do were drowned .
text2: Israa7eela asai mela biittan hemettiyoogaadan , Zo7o Abbaa pinnidoogee ammanuwaana ; shin Gibxxe asati geli be7ishin , haattai eta mitti aggiis .

text: By faith the walls of Jericho fell down , after they were compassed about seven days .
text2: Israa7eela asai Yarkko giyo katamaa shuchcha dirssaa laappun gallassaa yuuyi yuuyi aadhdhidoogaappe guyyiyan , he shuchcha dirssai kunddidoogee ammanuwaana .

text: By faith the harlot Rahab perished not with them that believed not , when she had received the spies with peace .
text2: SHaaramuxiyaa Ra7aaba yohuwaa qoriyaageeta loitta mokkido gishshau , Xoossau azazettennan ixxida asaara haiqqennan attidoogee ammanuwaana .

text: And what shall I more say ? for the time would fail me to tell of Gedeon , and of Barak , and of Samson , and of Jephthae ; of David also , and Samuel , and of the prophets :
text2: Simmi harabaa gujjada ai odoo ? Geedoonabaa , Baaraaqabaa , Samssoonabaa , Yofttaahebaa , Daawitabaanne Sameelabaa , qassi hananabaa yootiyaageetubaa odanau tau wodee gidenna .

text: Who through faith subdued kingdoms , wrought righteousness , obtained promises , stopped the mouths of lions ,
text2: Eti kawo ubbaara olettidi xoonidoogeenne xillobaa oottidoogee ammanuwaana ; yaatidi Xoossai immana giidoogaa ekkidosona ; gaammotu doonaakka gorddidosona .

text: Quenched the violence of fire , escaped the edge of the sword , out of weakness were made strong , waxed valiant in fight , turned to flight the armies of the aliens .
text2: Wolqqaama tamaa toissidosona ; bisuwaa qaraappe kessi ekkidosona ; eti daafuranchcha ; shin minnidosona ; qassi olan wolqqaamidi , hara biittaa tooraasaa yedettidosona .

text: Women received their dead raised to life again : and others were tortured , not accepting deliverance ; that they might obtain a better resurrection :
text2: Maccaasati bantta haiqqidaageeti haiquwaappe paxidaageeta ekkidosona . Qassi harati qashuwaappe birshshettanaagaa ixxidi , kehiya de7uwaayyo haiquwaappe denddanau , bukettidi haiqqidosona .

text: And others had trial of cruel mockings and scourgings , yea , moreover of bonds and imprisonment :
text2: Haratu bolli asai qilliicci kaa7iis ; lissuwan garafettidosonanne sanssalatan qashettidi , qasho keettaa gelidosona .

text: They were stoned , they were sawn asunder , were tempted , were slain with the sword : they wandered about in sheepskins and goatskins ; being destitute , afflicted , tormented ;
text2: SHuchchan cadettidosona ; magaajan naa77u kiyidi phalqqettidosona ; paacettidosona ; bisuwan haiqqidosona ; etau ubbabaikka xayin , waayettidi tuggatidi , dorssa calaanne deeshsha calaa maayidi yuuyidosona .

text: ( Of whom the world was not worthy : ) they wandered in deserts , and in mountains , and in dens and caves of the earth .
text2: Etau ha sa7ai giigennan ixxin , bazzon , deriyan , gonggolo giddooninne olla giddon yuuyidosona .

text: And these all , having obtained a good report through faith , received not the promise :
text2: Xoossai eta ammanuwaa markkattikkokka , hegeeti ubbati i , immana giidoogaa ekkibookkona .

text: God having provided some better thing for us , that they without us should not be made perfect .
text2: Xoossai nuuyyo issi lo77o qofaa qoppi wottido gishshau , eti nuuni bainnan bali bainnaageeta gidokkona .

text: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses , let us lay aside every weight , and the sin which doth so easily beset us , and let us run with patience the race that is set before us ,
text2: Simmi nuuyyo hagaa keena daro asai , shaaraadan nu matan yuuyi aadhdhidi markkattiyaagee de7ishin , nuna xubbiya ubbabaanne baqqi oiqqiya nagaraa diggoos ; diggidi nu sinttan de7iya nuuni woxxana wottaa genccidi woxxoos .

text: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith ; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross , despising the shame , and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God .
text2: Nuuni nu ammanuwau huuphenne polo gidiya Yesuusa xeelloos . Yesuusi yeellaa karidi , wodeppe au de7iya ufaissaa gishshau , masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishettidi haiqqanaagaa genccidi , Xoossaa kawotaa araataappe ushachcha baggaara uttiis .

text: For consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself , lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds .
text2: Intte intte wozanaa bayidi daafurenna mala , nagaranchchati bana daro ixxinkka genccida Yesuusa qoppite .

text: Ye have not yet resisted unto blood , striving against sin .
text2: Nagaraara intte baaxetiiddi , suuttaa gussana gakkanaassi biron olettiichchibeekketa .

text: And ye have forgotten the exhortation which speaketh unto you as unto children , My son , despise not thou the chastening of the Lord , nor faint when thou art rebuked of him :
text2: Xoossai ba naatudan , inttena zoriyoogaa dogidetii ? Xoossai inttena , “ Ta na7au , Xoossai nena qaxxayiyo wode , laafabaadan qoppoppa . I nena seeriyo wodekka yayyoppa .

text: For whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth , and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth .
text2: Aissi giikko , i ba siiqiyo uraa qaxxayees ; qassi ba na7adan ekkiyo ubbaakka lissuwan garafees ” yaagiis .

text: If ye endure chastening , God dealeth with you as with sons ; for what son is he whom the father chasteneth not ?
text2: Xoossai inttena qaxxayiyo wode genccite . Aissi giikko , i inttena naatudan oottees . Aawai qaxxayenna na7i de7ii ?

text: But if ye be without chastisement , whereof all are partakers , then are ye bastards , and not sons .
text2: Naata ubbaa qaxxayiyoogaadan , inttena qaxxayennan yeggi bayikko , karen yelettidaageeta gideetappe attin , tumu naata gidekketa .

text: Furthermore we have had fathers of our flesh which corrected us , and we gave them reverence : shall we not much rather be in subjection unto the Father of spirits , and live ?
text2: Hegaa bollan qassi , nuna yelida nu aawati nuna qaxxayido wode , nuuni eta bonchchida . Yaatin , nuuni waanidi ayyaanatu Aawaayyo keehi darissi haarettidi de7okkonii ?

text: For they verily for a few days chastened us after their own pleasure ; but he for our profit , that we might be partakers of his holiness .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuna yelida nu aawati banttana ufaissiyaadan , amarida wodiyaa nuna qaxxayidosona ; shin Xoossai nuuni a geeshshatettaa ekkana mala , nuna maaddanau qaxxayees .

text: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous , but grievous : nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby .
text2: Nuuni qaxxayettiyo wode , ha77issau yiilloyees ; ufaissenna . SHin qaxxayidoogeetuyyo guyyeppe he qaxxayoi xillotettaa de7uwaa sarotettaa woituwaa immana .

text: Wherefore lift up the hands which hang down , and the feeble knees ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte arggaacida kushiyaanne intte daafurida gulbbataa minttettite .

text: And make straight paths for your feet , lest that which is lame be turned out of the way ; but let it rather be healed .
text2: Wobbiya tohoi paxanaappe attin , burqqenna mala , sitta ogiyan hemettite .

text: Follow peace with all men , and holiness , without which no man shall see the Lord :
text2: Asa ubbaara saro de7anau minnite ; qassi geeshsha de7uwaa de7ite . Aissi giikko , hegee bainnan ooninne Godaa be7anau danddayenna .

text: Looking diligently lest any man fail of the grace of God ; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you , and thereby many be defiled ;
text2: Xoossaa aaro kehatettaa ooninne ekkennan attenna mala naagettite ; qassi mokkidi , ba marzziyan asa waissiya camo mittadan hanidi , ooninne daro asaa tunissenna mala naagettite .

text: Lest there be any fornicator , or profane person , as Esau , who for one morsel of meat sold his birthright .
text2: SHaaramuxanau qaaqqatiya asi ooninne de7enna mala , woi qassi issitoo miyoobau ba bairatettaa baizzida , Xoossaa Ayyaani bainna Eesawa mala asikka de7enna mala naagettite .

text: For ye know how that afterward , when he would have inherited the blessing , he was rejected : for he found no place of repentance , though he sought it carefully with tears .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , Eesawi ba aawaa anjjuwaa ekkanau koyidoogaa ereeta ; shin a aawai a anjjennan ixxiis ; aissi giikko , nagaraappe simmiyo ogiyaa i harai atto , afuxxi koyidikka demmanau danddayibeenna .

text: For ye are not come unto the mount that might be touched , and that burned with fire , nor unto blackness , and darkness , and tempest ,
text2: Intte bochchanau danddayiyo deriyaakkonne eexxiya tamaakko , xumaakko , ciggaaraakkonne gotiyaakko ,

text: And the sound of a trumpet , and the voice of words ; which voice they that heard intreated that the word should not be spoken to them any more :
text2: qassi malkkataa waasuwaakkonne qaalaa cenggurssaakko yibeekketa . Asai he cenggurssaa siyido wode , haraa gujji siyenna mala woossiis .

text: ( For they could not endure that which was commanded , And if so much as a beast touch the mountain , it shall be stoned , or thrust through with a dart :
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai eta , “ Harai atto , do7ikka he deriyaa bochchikko , shuchchan cadettidi haiqqo ” yaagido azazuwaa eti genccanau danddayibookkona .

text: And so terrible was the sight , that Moses said , I exceedingly fear and quake : )
text2: Aifiyan beettiyaagee daro daganttiyaagaa gidiyo gishshau Muusee , “ Taani yashshan kokkorais ” yaagiis .

text: But ye are come unto mount Sion , and unto the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem , and to an innumerable company of angels ,
text2: SHin intte Xiyoone Deriyaa , de7o Xoossai de7iyo katamaa , issippe shiiqidi ufaittiya daro sha7u kiitanchchatukko saluwaa Yerusalaame yiideta .

text: To the general assembly and church of the firstborn , which are written in heaven , and to God the Judge of all , and to the spirits of just men made perfect ,
text2: Xoossaa baira naatukko , issippe shiiqidaageetukko , eta sunttai saluwan xaafettidoogeetukko yiideta ; qassi asa ubbaa pirddiya Xoossaakkonne , bali bainnaageeta oottido xillo asatu ayyaanatukko yiideta .

text: And to Jesus the mediator of the new covenant , and to the blood of sprinkling , that speaketh better things than that of Abel .
text2: Ooratta maachchau gaannatiya Yesuusanne Aabeela suuttaappe aadhdhiyaabaa yootiya caccafettida suuttaakko yiideta .

text: See that ye refuse not him that speaketh . For if they escaped not who refused him that spake on earth , much more shall not we escape , if we turn away from him that speaketh from heaven :
text2: Intteyyo yootiya uraa yohuwaa ezggiyoogaa intte ixxenna mala , inttena naagite . Xoossaa kiitaa sa7an banttau yootiyaagee yootiyoogaa ezggennan ixxidaageeti kessi ekkana xayikko , saluwan , “ Inttena naagite ” giya Xoossaappe nuuni waanidi kessi ekkanee ?

text: Whose voice then shook the earth : but now he hath promised , saying , Yet once more I shake not the earth only , but also heaven .
text2: He wode a cenggurssai sa7aa qaattiis ; shin i ha77i , “ Taani sa7aa xalaalaa gidennan , issitoo gujjada saluwaakka qaattana ” yaagiis .

text: And this word , Yet once more , signifieth the removing of those things that are shaken , as of things that are made , that those things which cannot be shaken may remain .
text2: “ Issitoo gujjada ” giya qaalai qaaxxennabai minnidi de7ana mala , merettidabai qaaxxanaagaanne kichchanaagaa geeshshidi bessees .

text: Wherefore we receiving a kingdom which cannot be moved , let us have grace , whereby we may serve God acceptably with reverence and godly fear :
text2: Nuuni qaaxxanau danddayenna kawotettaa ekkiyo gishshau , ane Xoossaa galatoosinne a ufaissoos ; au bessiyoogaadan bonchchuwaaninne yashshatettan au goinnoos .

text: For our God is a consuming fire .
text2: Aissi giikko , nu Xoossai tumu bashshiya tama .

text: Let brotherly love continue .
text2: Intte ishata siiqiyoogaa aggoppite .

text: Be not forgetful to entertain strangers : for thereby some have entertained angels unawares .
text2: Imatta mokkiyoogaakka dogoppite . Aissi giikko , yaatiyoogan issi issi asai erennan kiitanchchata mokkiis .

text: Remember them that are in bonds , as bound with them ; and them which suffer adversity , as being yourselves also in the body .
text2: Qasho keettan de7iyaageetubaa inttekka etaara issippe qasho keettan de7iyoogaadan qoppite ; qassi intte intte huuphen waayettiyoogaadan , waayettiyaageetubaa qoppite .

text: Marriage is honourable in all , and the bed undefiled : but whoremongers and adulterers God will judge .
text2: Ekkiyoogaanne geliyoogaa asai ubbai bonchchanau bessees ; qassi azinainne machchiyaa issoi issuwau ammanettanau bessees ; aissi giikko , Xoossai shaaramuxanau qaaqqatiyaageetanne shaaramuxiyaageeta pirddana .

text: Let your conversation be without covetousness ; and be content with such things as ye have : for he hath said , I will never leave thee , nor forsake thee .
text2: Miishsha siiqoppe inttena naagite ; intteyyo de7iyaagee intteyyo gido . Aissi giikko , Xoossai ba huuphen , Taani nena mulekka yeggikke woikko aggikke ” yaagiis .

text: So that we may boldly say , The Lord is my helper , and I will not fear what man shall do unto me .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni xalidi , “ Godai tana maaddiyaagaa ; taani yayyikke . Asi tana ai oottii ? ” yaagoos .

text: Remember them which have the rule over you , who have spoken unto you the word of God : whose faith follow , considering the end of their conversation .
text2: Xoossaa qaalaa intteyyo yootida inttena kaalettidaageeta hassayite ; eti waani de7idaakkonne hassayite ; qassi etaagaadan ammanite .

text: Jesus Christ the same yesterday , and to day , and for ever .
text2: Yesuus Kiristtoosi zinekka hachchikka merinaukka laamettenna .

text: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines . For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace ; not with meats , which have not profited them that have been occupied therein .
text2: Dumma dumma ooratta timirttiyan wora booppite . Nu wozanai Xoossaa aaro kehatettan galatiyoogee lo77o gidiyoogaappe attin , miyoobau azazettiyoogaa gidenna ; hegau azazettidaageetikka maadettibookkona .

text: We have an altar , whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle .
text2: Nuuyyo yarshshiyoosai de7ees ; Dunkkaaniyaa giddon oottiyaageeti he yarshshiyoosaappe maanau etau maati baawa .

text: For the bodies of those beasts , whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin , are burned without the camp .
text2: Qeese ubbatu halaqai nagaraa gishshau , mehiyaa suuttaa yarshshanau Ubbaappe Aadhdhiya Geeshsha Sohuwaa efees ; shin he mehiyaa ashuwaa qassi dirssaappe kareera xuuggees .

text: Wherefore Jesus also , that he might sanctify the people with his own blood , suffered without the gate .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Yesuusikka qassi nagaraappe asaa ba suuttan geeshshanau , katamaa penggiyaappe kareera waayettiis .

text: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp , bearing his reproach .
text2: Simmi nuuni i borettido boriyaa ekkidi , dirssaappe kare akko kiyoos .

text: For here have we no continuing city , but we seek one to come .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuyyo hagan merinau de7iya katami baawa ; shin nuuni yaana katamaa naagoos .

text: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually , that is , the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name .
text2: Simmi Xoossaayyo Yesuusa baggaara ubba wode galataa yarshshuwaa immoos ; hegaa giyoogee menttershshai a sunttaayyo immiyo galataa giyoogaa .

text: But to do good and to communicate forget not : for with such sacrifices God is well pleased .
text2: Lo77obaa oottiyoogaanne issoi issuwaa maaddiyoogaa dogoppite . Aissi giikko , Xoossaa ufaissiyaagee hegaa mala yarshshuwaa .

text: Obey them that have the rule over you , and submit yourselves : for they watch for your souls , as they that must give account , that they may do it with joy , and not with grief : for that is unprofitable for you .
text2: Inttena kaalettiyaageetuyyo azazettite ; qassi eti azaziyoogaakka oottite . Eti bantta oottidobaa Xoossau yootana gishshau , intte shemppuwaa mintti naagoosona ; intte etau azazettikko , bantta oosuwaa ufaittidi oottana ; hegee xayikko , eti yiillotiiddi oottana ; hegee inttena ainne maaddenna .

text: Pray for us : for we trust we have a good conscience , in all things willing to live honestly .
text2: Nuuyyo Xoossaa woossite . Nuuni ubba wode lo77obaa oottanau koyiyo gishshau , nuna zoriya lo77o wozanai nuuyyo de7ees .

text: But I beseech you the rather to do this , that I may be restored to you the sooner .
text2: Xoossai tana inttekko eesuwan zaarana mala , Xoossaa intte mintti woossanaadan , taani inttena keehi woossais .

text: Now the God of peace , that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus , that great shepherd of the sheep , through the blood of the everlasting covenant ,
text2: Sarotettaa Xoossai , nu Godaa Yesuusa , dorssaa heemmiya gitaa , merinaa maachchaa suuttan haiquwaappe denttiis .

text: Make you perfect in every good work to do his will , working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight , through Jesus Christ ; to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Xoossai Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara ba sinttan bana ufaissiyaabaa inttena ootissiiddi , inttekka i koyidobaa oottana mala , lo77o ooso ubban inttena i giigisso ; Xoossai meri merinau bonchchetto . Amin77i .

text: And I beseech you , brethren , suffer the word of exhortation : for I have written a letter unto you in few words .
text2: Ta ishatoo , taani ha dabddaabbiyaa intteyyo qanttan xaafido gishshau , intte ha zoriyaa salettennan ezggana mala , taani inttena woossais .

text: Know ye that our brother Timothy is set at liberty ; with whom , if he come shortly , I will see you .
text2: Nu ishai , Ximootiyoosi qashuwaappe birshshettidoogaa erite . Eesuwan i haa yiikko , taani aara baada inttena be7ana .

text: Salute all them that have the rule over you , and all the saints . They of Italy salute you .
text2: Inttena kaalettiya ubbatanne geeshshata ubbaa saro saro giite . Xaaliyaappe yiida ammaniyaageeti inttena saro saro goosona .

text: Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Aaro kehatettai inttenaara ubbaara issippe gido . Amin77i .

text: James , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ , to the twelve tribes which are scattered abroad , greeting .
text2: Taani Yaaqoobi Xoossaa ailleenne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aillee , biitta ubban laalettida tammanne naa77u zerettatuyyo sarotaa kiittais .

text: My brethren , count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations ;
text2: Ta ishatoo , intte ammanoi paacettiyoogee intteyyo danddayaa immanaagaa eridi , dumma dumma paacee inttena gakkiyo wode , hegaa kumetta ufaissadan qoodite .

text: But let patience have her perfect work , that ye may be perfect and entire , wanting nothing .
text2: Intte danddayai aibinne bali bainnan inttena zawatidaageetanne paci bainnaageeta oottidi , ba oosuwaa polo .

text: If any of you lack wisdom , let him ask of God , that giveth to all men liberally , and upbraideth not ; and it shall be given him .
text2: SHin intteppe ooninne baayyo aadhdhida eratettai xayikko , borennan ubbau kehatettan immiya Xoossaa woosso . I ayyo immana .

text: But let him ask in faith , nothing wavering . For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed .
text2: SHin i aibiininne sirennan ammanuwan Xoossaa woosso . Aissi giikko , siriya urai carkkoi sugin qaaxxiya abbaa beetaa mala .

text: For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord .
text2: Aissi giikko , naa77u qofai de7iyo urai , ba oge ubban ba qofaa qachchennaagee , he urai Godaappe ainne demmanau qoppoppo .

text: Let the brother of low degree rejoice in that he is exalted :
text2: SHin hiyyeesa ishai Xoossai a xoqqu oottido wode ufaitto ; qassi dure ishaikka Xoossai a ziqqi oottido wode ufaitto . Aissi giikko , dure bitanee maata giddon dicciya ciishshadan xayana .

text: For the sun is no sooner risen with a burning heat , but it withereth the grass , and the flower thereof falleth , and the grace of the fashion of it perisheth : so also shall the rich man fade away in his ways .
text2: Aissi giikko , awai ba mishuwaara kiyidi , maataa melissin , ciishshai xayees ; qassi a meraa lo77otettaikka xayees ; hegaadankka qassi dure bitanee babaa oottiiddi xayana .

text: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation : for when he is tried , he shall receive the crown of life , which the Lord hath promised to them that love him .
text2: Waayiyan gencciya urai anjjettidaagaa ; aissi giikko , he waayiyaa xoonidoogaappe guyyiyan , Xoossai bana siiqiyaageetuyyo immana giido de7uwaa akiliiliyaa i ekkana .

text: Let no man say when he is tempted , I am tempted of God : for God cannot be tempted with evil , neither tempteth he any man :
text2: Ooninne paacettido wode , “ Tana Xoossai paaccees ” gooppo . Aissi giikko , Xoossai iitan paacettanau danddayenna ; qassi i ba huuphen oonanne paaccenna .

text: But every man is tempted , when he is drawn away of his own lust , and enticed .
text2: SHin asi huuphiyan huuphiyan ba huuphe iita amuwan gooshettiyo wodenne cimettiyo wode paacettees .

text: Then when lust hath conceived , it bringeth forth sin : and sin , when it is finished , bringeth forth death .
text2: Hegaappe guyyiyan , amoi shahaaridi , nagaraa yelees ; qassi nagarai diccidi , haiquwaa yelees .

text: Do not err , my beloved brethren .
text2: Ta siiqo ishatoo , cimettoppite .

text: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above , and cometh down from the Father of lights , with whom is no variableness , neither shadow of turning .
text2: Lo77o imo ubbainne kumetta woito ubbai saluwaappe yees . Saluwaa poo7uwaa medhdhida Xoossaappe yees ; Xoossai ba huuphen dummatennanne woi mirqqidi xumissenna .

text: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth , that we should be a kind of firstfruits of his creatures .
text2: Nuuni i medhdhido meretatu giddon Xoqqasaa ekkanaadan , nuna ba sheniyan tumu qaalan yeliis .

text: Wherefore , my beloved brethren , let every man be swift to hear , slow to speak , slow to wrath :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ta siiqo ishatoo , hagaa hassayite ; asai ubbai siyanau eesoto ; shin haasayanaunne hanqqettanau eesotoppo .

text: For the wrath of man worketh not the righteousness of God .
text2: Aissi giikko , asa hanqqoi Xoossai koyiyo xillotettaa eheenna .

text: Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness , and receive with meekness the engrafted word , which is able to save your souls .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , tuna hanota ubbaanne iitatetta ubbaa intteppe xaissidi , Xoossai intte wozanan tookkido intte shemppuwaa ashshanau danddayiya qaalaa ashkketettan ekkite .

text: But be ye doers of the word , and not hearers only , deceiving your own selves .
text2: SHin Xoossaa qaalaa oottiteppe attin , sissa xallan intte huuphiyaa cimmoppite .

text: For if any be a hearer of the word , and not a doer , he is like unto a man beholding his natural face in a glass :
text2: Aissi giikko , qaalaa siyidi oottenna urai de7ikko , i ba meraa heregan xeelliya uraa mala .

text: For he beholdeth himself , and goeth his way , and straightway forgetteth what manner of man he was .
text2: I bana xeellidi bees ; biidi sohuwaarakka i ai malakkonne dogi aggees .

text: But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty , and continueth therein , he being not a forgetful hearer , but a doer of the work , this man shall be blessed in his deed .
text2: SHin ooninne ailletettaappe kessiya bali bainna higgiyaa xeellidi , aani aqiyaagee qassi a naagiyaagee , siyidoogaakka dogennaagee , he urai ba oottiyo oosuwan anjjettana .

text: If any man among you seem to be religious , and bridleth not his tongue , but deceiveth his own heart , this man ' s religion is vain .
text2: Ba inxxarssaa naagennan bana cimmiiddi , bau Xoossaa ammaniyoobaa milatiyo urai de7ikko , a ammanoi mela .

text: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this , To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction , and to keep himself unspotted from the world .
text2: Xoossaa Aawaa sinttan pokkoi bainna geeshsha ammanoi hagaa ; hegee augee giikko , aaya aawi bainna naatanne waayettiya am77eta maaddanaagaanne sa7aa nagaraa qitaappe ba huuphiyaa naaganaagaa .

text: My brethren , have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Lord of glory , with respect of persons .
text2: Ta ishatoo , intte nu bonchcho Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammaniiddi , som77o xeellidi , asa bonchchoppite .

text: For if there come unto your assembly a man with a gold ring , in goodly apparel , and there come in also a poor man in vile raiment ;
text2: Aissi giikko , worqqa migido wottidi , lo77o maayo maayida issi asi intte shiiquwaa yiikko , qassi curqqa maayo maayida hiyyeesa asikka yiikko ,

text: And ye have respect to him that weareth the gay clothing , and say unto him , Sit thou here in a good place ; and say to the poor , Stand thou there , or sit here under my footstool :
text2: lo77o maayuwaa maayida bitaniyaa intte aatti bonchchidi a , “ Neeni hagan ubbaappe lo77iya oidiyan utta ” giidi qassi hiyyeesa bitaniyaa , “ Neeni hinin eqqashsha ; woi hagan ta tohuwaa matan sa7an utta ” giikko ,

text: Are ye not then partial in yourselves , and are become judges of evil thoughts ?
text2: yaatin intte intte giddon shaahotettaa medhdhiyaageetanne iita qofaara de7iya daannata gidekketiiyye ?

text: Hearken , my beloved brethren , Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith , and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him ?
text2: Ta siiqo ishatoo , siyite ; Xoossai ha sa7an de7iya hiyyeesa asai ammanuwan duretanaunne bana siiqiyaageetuyyo immana giido saluwaa kawotettaa laattanau dooribeenneeyye ?

text: But ye have despised the poor . Do not rich men oppress you , and draw you before the judgment seats ?
text2: SHin intte hiyyeesata toochchideta . Dureti inttena tuggayiyaageeta gidokkonaayye ? Eti inttena daannan mootiyaageeta gidokkonaayye ?

text: Do not they blaspheme that worthy name by the which ye are called ?
text2: Intteyyo imettida lo77o sunttaa cayiyaageeti eta gidokkonaayye ?

text: If ye fulfil the royal law according to the scripture , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself , ye do well :
text2: SHin Xoossaa maxaafan , “ Ne shooruwaa ne huuphedan siiqa ” geetettidi xaafettida kawo higgiyaa intte polikko , lo77obaa ootteeta .

text: But if ye have respect to persons , ye commit sin , and are convinced of the law as transgressors .
text2: SHin intte asa som77o xeellidi bonchchikko , nagaraa ootteeta ; qassi higgee intte bolli higgiyaa menttidaageetudan pirddana .

text: For whosoever shall keep the whole law , and yet offend in one point , he is guilty of all .
text2: Aissi giikko , ooninne higge ubbaa naagidi , issinno menttiyaabaa gidikko , he urai higge ubbaa menttees .

text: For he that said , Do not commit adultery , said also , Do not kill . Now if thou commit no adultery , yet if thou kill , thou art become a transgressor of the law .
text2: Aissi giikko , “ SHaaramuxoppa ” giidaagee qassi “ Woroppa ” giis ; shin neeni shaaramuxana xayikkokka , woridabaa gidikko , higgiyaa menttadasa .

text: So speak ye , and so do , as they that shall be judged by the law of liberty .
text2: Asa ailletettaappe kessiya higgiyan pirddaa ekkana asatudan haasayitenne etaagaadan oottite .

text: For he shall have judgment without mercy , that hath shewed no mercy ; and mercy rejoiceth against judgment .
text2: Aissi giikko , asa maaribeenna uraa Xoossai maarennan pirddana ; maarotettai pirddaa xoonees .

text: What doth it profit , my brethren , though a man say he hath faith , and have not works ? can faith save him ?
text2: Ta ishatoo , issi urai baayyo ammanoi de7ees giikko , qassi a ammanuwaa a oosoi erissana xayikko , a ai go77anee ? A ammanoi a ashshanau danddayii ?

text: If a brother or sister be naked , and destitute of daily food ,
text2: Issi ishai , woi issi michchiyaa kallottikko , qassi etau ubba gallassi miyoobi xayikko ,

text: And one of you say unto them , Depart in peace , be ye warmed and filled ; notwithstanding ye give them not those things which are needful to the body ; what doth it profit ?
text2: Intteppe issi urai eta , “ Saro biite . Tamaa ho77ite . Kallidi miite ” giidi , etau koshshiyaabaa immana xayikko , eta ai go77anee ?

text: Even so faith , if it hath not works , is dead , being alone .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ammanoi oosoi bainnan barkka de7ikko haiqqidaagaa .

text: Yea , a man may say , Thou hast faith , and I have works : shew me thy faith without thy works , and I will shew thee my faith by my works .
text2: SHin issi urai , “ Neessi ammanoi de7ees ; qassi taassi oosoi de7ees . Neeni ne ammanuwaa ne oosuwaappe shaakkada tana bessa ; taanikka ta ammanuwaa ta oosuwan nena bessana ” gaana .

text: Thou believest that there is one God ; thou doest well : the devils also believe , and tremble .
text2: Neeni issi Xoossai de7iyoogaa ammanaasa ; hegee lo77o . Xalahetikka qassi ammanoosona ; yashshan kokkoroosona .

text: But wilt thou know , O vain man , that faith without works is dead ?
text2: Neeni eeyyai ! Ammanoi oosuwaappe shaahettidi go77ennaagaa eranau koyai ?

text: Was not Abraham our father justified by works , when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar ?
text2: Nu aawai Abrahaami ba na7aa Yisaaqa yarshshiyoosaa bolli wottido wode , ba oosuwan xillibeennee ?

text: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works , and by works was faith made perfect ?
text2: A ammanoinne a oosoi issippe oottidoogaanne a ammanoi a oosuwan polettidoogaa be7ikkii ?

text: And the scripture was fulfilled which saith , Abraham believed God , and it was imputed unto him for righteousness : and he was called the Friend of God .
text2: Xoossaa maxaafai “ Abrahaami Xoossaa ammaniis . Xoossaikka hegaa ayyo xillotettan qoodiis ” giidoogee polettiis ; qassi Xoossaa dabbo geetettidi i xeesettiis .

text: Ye see then how that by works a man is justified , and not by faith only .
text2: Asi ammano xalaalaana gidennan , oosuwan xilliyoogaa intte be7eeta .

text: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot justified by works , when she had received the messengers , and had sent them out another way ?
text2: Hegaadankka qassi shaaramuxiyaa Ra7aaba kiitettiyaageeta mokkada hara ogiyaara eta moissido wode , ba oosuwan xillabeikke ?

text: For as the body without the spirit is dead , so faith without works is dead also .
text2: Aissi giikko , shemppoi shaahettido bollai haiqqidaagaa gidiyoogaadan , hegaadankka qassi oosoi shaahettido ammanoi haiqqidaagaa .

text: My brethren , be not many masters , knowing that we shall receive the greater condemnation .
text2: Ta ishatoo , nuuni haratuppe aadhdhiya pirddaa ekkanaagaa intte eriyo gishshau , intteppe daroti tamaarissiyaageeta gidoppite .

text: For in many things we offend all . If any man offend not in word , the same is a perfect man , and able also to bridle the whole body .
text2: Nuuni ubbaikka daroban baleettees ; issi urai ba haasayan mulekka balana xayikko , i bana naaganau danddayiya bali bainna asa .

text: Behold , we put bits in the horses ' mouths , that they may obey us ; and we turn about their whole body .
text2: Parati nuuyyo azazettana mala , bixaalaa barssidi , nuuni koyiyoosaa ubbaa eta efeettees .

text: Behold also the ships , which though they be so great , and are driven of fierce winds , yet are they turned about with a very small helm , whithersoever the governor listeth .
text2: Be7ite , markkabetikka qassi hegaa keena gita gidiiddi , gote carkkuwan laagettikkokka , eta laaggiyaagee ba koyiyoosaa zaaridi laaggiyo qii guutta mittan laagettidi boosona .

text: Even so the tongue is a little member , and boasteth great things . Behold , how great a matter a little fire kindleth !
text2: Hegaadan inxxarssai bollaa giddon guutta qommo gidikkokka , daro gitaban ceeqettees . Guutta tamai waanida gita woraa xuuggii ! Akeekite .

text: And the tongue is a fire , a world of iniquity : so is the tongue among our members , that it defileth the whole body , and setteth on fire the course of nature ; and it is set on fire of hell .
text2: Inxxarssaikka tama mala . I nu asatettaa giddon iitabaa ubbaa oottana danddayees ; asatetta ubbaa tunissees . Qassi nu de7uwaa wottaakka taman xuuggees ; Gaannabiyaa taman i xuugettana .

text: For every kind of beasts , and of birds , and of serpents , and of things in the sea , is tamed , and hath been tamed of mankind :
text2: Aissi giikko , do7atu kafotu zariyaa , tiran gooshettiya shooshshatu zariyaanne abban de7iya meretatu zariyaa ubbaa asi aadissiis ; qassi etikka aadidosona .

text: But the tongue can no man tame ; it is an unruly evil , full of deadly poison .
text2: SHin ooninne inxxarssaa aadissanau danddayibeenna ; inxxarssi woriya marzzee kumido woppu geenna iita mereta .

text: Therewith bless we God , even the Father ; and therewith curse we men , which are made after the similitude of God .
text2: Nuuni inxxarssan nu Godaanne Xoossaa galatoos ; qassi aanikka Xoossaa leemisuwan merettida asaa qanggoos .

text: Out of the same mouth proceedeth blessing and cursing . My brethren , these things ought not so to be .
text2: Issi doonaappe galatainne qanggettai kiyees . Ta ishatoo , hegee hegaadan hananau bessenna .

text: Doth a fountain send forth at the same place sweet water and bitter ?
text2: Pulttoi issi ollaappe mal77iya haattaanne cammiya haattaa pulttanau danddayii ?

text: Can the fig tree , my brethren , bear olive berries ? either a vine , figs ? so can no fountain both yield salt water and fresh .
text2: Ta ishatoo , balase giyo mitti wogara aifanau danddayii ? Woi woine turi balase giyo mitta aifanau danddayii ? Maxine maxine giya haattappekka mal77o haatti kiyana danddayenna .

text: Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you ? let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom .
text2: Intte giddon aadhdhida eranchchinne akeekanchchi oonee ? Ba lo77o de7uwan oosettida ba oosuwaa ashkketettaaninne aadhdhida eratettan besso .

text: But if ye have bitter envying and strife in your hearts , glory not , and lie not against the truth .
text2: SHin intte wozanan cammiya qanaateenne yiiqee de7ikko , otorettoppite ; qassi tumatettaa bollikka worddotoppite .

text: This wisdom descendeth not from above , but is earthly , sensual , devilish .
text2: Hegaa mala aadhdhida eratettai saluwaappe wodhdhiyaagaa gidenna ; shin hegee sa7aabaa , asaabaa , xalahetubaa .

text: For where envying and strife is , there is confusion and every evil work .
text2: Aissi giikko , qanaateenne yiiqee de7iyoosan ooshshainne iita ooso ubbai de7ees .

text: But the wisdom that is from above is first pure , then peaceable , gentle , and easy to be intreated , full of mercy and good fruits , without partiality , and without hypocrisy .
text2: SHin bollappe yiya aadhdhida eratettai ubbaappe kase geeshsha . Qassi sarotetta , ashkkenne ero giyaagaa ; qassi maarotettinne lo77o aifee kumidoogaa . Sireenne lo77o milatiya iitatetti bainnaagaa .

text: And the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace of them that make peace .
text2: Xillotettaa aifee sarotettaa oottiyaageeti sarotettan zerido zerettaappe beettiis .

text: From whence come wars and fightings among you ? come they not hence , even of your lusts that war in your members ?
text2: Olinne ooshshi intte giddo auppe yii ? Eti yiidosai intte bollaa giddon olettiya intte ufaittanau gita amuwaa amottiyoogaappe gidennee ?

text: Ye lust , and have not : ye kill , and desire to have , and cannot obtain : ye fight and war , yet ye have not , because ye ask not .
text2: Intte amotteeta ; shin demmekketa ; hegaa gishshau woreeta . Mintti koyeeta ; shin demmanau danddayekketa ; hegaa gishshau , ooyetteetanne oletteeta . SHin Xoossaa woossenna gishshau , intte koyiyoobaa demmekketa .

text: Ye ask , and receive not , because ye ask amiss , that ye may consume it upon your lusts .
text2: Xoossaa intte woossiyo wode , intte amuwaa polanau woosseeta ; qassi intte qofai iita gidiyo gishshau demmekketa .

text: Ye adulterers and adulteresses , know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God ? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God .
text2: Simmi shaaramuxiyaageetoo , ha sa7aara dabbotiyoogee Xoossaayyo ixo gidiyoogaa erekketii ? Aissi giikko , ha sa7aara dabbotana koyiyai ooninne Xoossaara morkkettees .

text: Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain , The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy ?
text2: Woi Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Xoossai nunan wottido Ayyaanai wolqqaama amuwaa amottees ” giyoogaa intteyyo coo giyoobaa milatii ?

text: But he giveth more grace . Wherefore he saith , God resisteth the proud , but giveth grace unto the humble .
text2: SHin Xoossai aaro kehatettaa aattidi immees . Hegaa gishshau , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Xoossai otorettiyaageeta ixxees ; shin banttana kaushshiyaageetuyyo aaro kehatettaa immees ” yaagees .

text: Submit yourselves therefore to God . Resist the devil , and he will flee from you .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte Xoossau haarettite . Yaatidi xalahe halaqaa teqqite ; i intteppe baqatana .

text: Draw nigh to God , and he will draw nigh to you . Cleanse your hands , ye sinners ; and purify your hearts , ye double minded .
text2: Xoossaakko shiiqite ; ikka inttekko shiiqana . Inttenoo nagaranchchatoo , intte kushiyaa meecettite . Naa77u qofai de7iyoogeetoo , intte wozanaa geeshshite .

text: Be afflicted , and mourn , and weep : let your laughter be turned to mourning , and your joy to heaviness .
text2: Tuggatite ; kayottitenne yeekkite . Intte miichchaa yeehuwau laammite ; intte ufaissaakka kayyuwau laammite .

text: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord , and he shall lift you up .
text2: Godaa sinttan intte huuphiyaa toochchite ; qassi i inttena xoqqu xoqqu oottana .

text: Speak not evil one of another , brethren . He that speaketh evil of his brother , and judgeth his brother , speaketh evil of the law , and judgeth the law : but if thou judge the law , thou art not a doer of the law , but a judge .
text2: Ta ishatoo , issoi issuwaa zigiroppite . Ba ishaa zigiriyaageenne a bolli pirddiyaagee higgiyaa zigireesinne higgiyaa bolli pirddees . Neeni higgiyaa bolli pirddikko , higgiyaa bolli pirddiyaagaa gidaasappe attin , higgiyau azazettiyaagaa gidakka .

text: There is one lawgiver , who is able to save and to destroy : who art thou that judgest another ?
text2: Higgiyaa immiyaageenne pirddiyaagee Xoossaa xalaala ; i ashshanaunne xaissanau danddayees ; shin ne shooruwaa bolli pirddiyaagee neeni oonee ?

text: Go to now , ye that say , To day or to morrow we will go into such a city , and continue there a year , and buy and sell , and get gain :
text2: Inttenoo , “ Nuuni hachchi woi wontto he katamaa baana ; biidi hegan laitta uttana ; zal77ananne qassi miishsha worissana ” giyaageetoo , be7ite .

text: Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow . For what is your life ? It is even a vapour , that appeareth for a little time , and then vanisheth away .
text2: Wontto intte de7oi ai hananaakkonne erekketa ; guutta wodiyau intte beettidi , guyyeppe xayiya cuwa mala .

text: For that ye ought to say , If the Lord will , we shall live , and do this , or that .
text2: Hegaa aggidi , “ Godai giikko , nuuni de7ana ; hagaa woi hegaa oottana ” gaanau bessees .

text: But now ye rejoice in your boastings : all such rejoicing is evil .
text2: SHin intte ha77i intte gitatettan ceeqqeeta ; hegaa mala ceeqo ubbai iita .

text: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good , and doeth it not , to him it is sin .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , lo77obaa oottanau eriiddi oottenna urau hegee nagara .

text: Go to now , ye rich men , weep and howl for your miseries that shall come upon you .
text2: Ha77ikka inttenoo dure asatoo , intte bolli yiya tuggau “ Aayyee ! Aayyee ! ” yaagidi yeekkitenne zilaalite .

text: Your riches are corrupted , and your garments are motheaten .
text2: Intte duretettai moorettiichchiis ; qassi intte afalaakka bil77ai mirggiis .

text: Your gold and silver is cankered ; and the rust of them shall be a witness against you , and shall eat your flesh as it were fire . Ye have heaped treasure together for the last days .
text2: Intte worqqainne intte birai shiyiichchiis . Qassi he shiyai intte bolli markkattana ; intte bollaakka tamadan maana . Intte intte miishshaa wodeyyo dagayideta .

text: Behold , the hire of the labourers who have reaped down your fields , which is of you kept back by fraud , crieth : and the cries of them which have reaped are entered into the ears of the Lord of sabaoth .
text2: Akeekite ; intte gaden kattaa cakkida asatuyyo qanxxibeenna keraa miishshai waassees ; eta waasoi wolqqaama Godaa haittan siyettiis .

text: Ye have lived in pleasure on the earth , and been wanton ; ye have nourished your hearts , as in a day of slaughter .
text2: Intteyyo injjetin , sa7an ishalidi de7ideta ; shuha gallassau xiikkiyoogaadan , intte bollaa xiikkideta .

text: Ye have condemned and killed the just ; and he doth not resist you .
text2: Xillo asa bolli pirddideta ; qassi a worideta ; i inttenaara eqettenna .

text: Be patient therefore , brethren , unto the coming of the Lord . Behold , the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth , and hath long patience for it , until he receive the early and latter rain .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ta ishatoo , Godai yaana gakkanaassi genccite ; biittaa goyyiyaagee ofinttaa irainne badhdheesaa irai yaana gakkanaassi genccidi , al77o kattaa i waati naagidi gatti ekkiyaakko be7ite .

text: Be ye also patient ; stablish your hearts : for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh .
text2: Inttekka qassi genccite ; yayyoppite . Aissi giikko , Godaa yuussai matattiis .

text: Grudge not one against another , brethren , lest ye be condemned : behold , the judge standeth before the door .
text2: Ta ishatoo , Xoossai intte bolli pirddenna mala , issoi issuwaa bolli zuuzummoppite . Be7ite , pirddiyaagee penggen eqqiis .

text: Take , my brethren , the prophets , who have spoken in the name of the Lord , for an example of suffering affliction , and of patience .
text2: Ta ishatoo , waayessinne genccassi leemiso gididaageeta , Godaa sunttan haasayida hananabaa yootidaageeta hassayite .

text: Behold , we count them happy which endure . Ye have heard of the patience of Job , and have seen the end of the Lord ; that the Lord is very pitiful , and of tender mercy .
text2: Be7ite , danddayidi genccidaageeta nuuni anjjettidaageeta geettees . Iyyooba genccaa intte siyideta ; qassi Godai ayyo wurssettan immidoogaakka be7ideta . Aissi giikko , Godai maarotainne qaretai kumidoogaa .

text: But above all things , my brethren , swear not , neither by heaven , neither by the earth , neither by any other oath : but let your yea be yea ; and your nay , nay ; lest ye fall into condemnation .
text2: SHin ubbaappe kase , ta ishatoo , saluwan gidin , woi sa7an gidin , woi hara caaquwan gidin , aibinkka caaqqoppite . SHin Xoossaa pirddan intte gelennaadan , intte yohoi ee giyoobaa gidikko , “ Ee ” giite ; chii giyoobaa gidikko , “ CHii ” giite .

text: Is any among you afflicted ? let him pray . Is any merry ? let him sing psalms .
text2: Intte giddon waayettiya urai ooninne de7ikko , Xoossaa woosso ; ufaittiya urai ooninne de7ikko , yexxidi galato .

text: Is any sick among you ? let him call for the elders of the church ; and let them pray over him , anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord :
text2: Intteppe sahettiya urai ooninne de7ikko , woosa keettaa cimata baakko xeeso ; eti Godaa sunttan zaitiyaa a tiyidi , ayyo Xoossaa woossona .

text: And the prayer of faith shall save the sick , and the Lord shall raise him up ; and if he have committed sins , they shall be forgiven him .
text2: Ammanuwan Xoossaa woossido woosai hargganchchaa pattana ; Godaikka a harggiyaappe denttana ; qassi nagara i oottidobaa gidikkokka Godai ayyo atto gaana .

text: Confess your faults one to another , and pray one for another , that ye may be healed . The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte paxana mala , intte nagaraa issoi issuwaayyo paaxitenne issoi issuwaayyo Xoossaa woossite ; xillo asa woosai wolqqaama oosuwaa oottees .

text: Elias was a man subject to like passions as we are , and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain : and it rained not on the earth by the space of three years and six months .
text2: Eelaasi nu mala asa . Irai sa7an bukkennaadan , i minttidi , Xoossaa woossiis ; woossin heezzu laittanne usuppun agina sa7an irai bukkibeenna .

text: And he prayed again , and the heaven gave rain , and the earth brought forth her fruit .
text2: Naa77anttuwaa Xoossaa i woossin , saluwaappe irai bukkiis ; sa7aikka ba kattaa mokkiis .

text: Brethren , if any of you do err from the truth , and one convert him ;
text2: Ta ishatoo , intteppe ooninne tumaappe wora biikko , qassi issoi a guyye zaarikko ,

text: Let him know , that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death , and shall hide a multitude of sins .
text2: nagaranchchaa a bala ogiyaappe zaariya ooninne a shemppuwaa haiquwaappe ashshanaagaanne daro nagaraa kammanaagaa ero .

text: Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ , to the strangers scattered throughout Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia ,
text2: Taani , Yesuus Kiristtoosi kiittido PHeexiroosi , Xoossai doorido asatuyyo PHanxxoosa biittan , Galaatiyaa biittan , Qaphphadooqiyaa biittan , Isiyaa biittaaninne Bitiniyaa biittan yedettin laalettidi de7iyaageetuyyo dabddaabbiyaa xaafais .

text: Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father , through sanctification of the Spirit , unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ : Grace unto you , and peace , be multiplied .
text2: Yesuus Kiristtoosayyo intte azazettana malanne a suuttan geeyana mala , Xoossai Aawai doorido intteyyo ba Ayyaanan geeshshidoogeetuyyo , aaro kehatettainne sarotettai gido .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead ,
text2: Nuuni Xoossaa , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa Aawaa , ba maarotettaa daruwaadankka nuna naa77anttuwaa yelidaagaa , Yesuus Kiristtoosa haiquwaappe denttidoogan nuuyyo de7uwaa immana giidaagaa galatoos .

text: To an inheritance incorruptible , and undefiled , and that fadeth not away , reserved in heaven for you ,
text2: Qassi Xoossai intteyyo immana daro laataa wooqqennasan , moorettennasan , woi xayennasan saluwan naagees .

text: Who are kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation ready to be revealed in the last time .
text2: He laatai wodiyaa wurssettan beettanau de7iya atotettaayyo Xoossaa wolqqan ammanuwan naagetti uttida inttessa .

text: Wherein ye greatly rejoice , though now for a season , if need be , ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations :
text2: Ha77i guutta wodiyaayyo harai atto dumma dumma paaciyan intte paacettanau koshshikkokka , hagan daro ufaittite .

text: That the trial of your faith , being much more precious than of gold that perisheth , though it be tried with fire , might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ :
text2: Hegee harai atto , taman yeggin xayiya worqqappekka intte ammanoi daro al77onne bali bainnaagaa gidiyoogaa bessanaassa ; yaatidi Yesuus Kiristtoosi beettiyo wode , galataa , bonchchuwaanne sabaa intte ekkana .

text: Whom having not seen , ye love ; in whom , though now ye see him not , yet believing , ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory :
text2: Intte a be7ana xayikkokka , siiqeeta ; intte ha77i a be7ana xayikkokka , ammaneeta . Qassi intte intte ammanuwau polo gidiya intte shemppuwaa atotettaa ekkiyo gishshau , yootanau danddayettenna bonchchoi kumido ufaissaa ufaitteeta .

text: Of which salvation the prophets have inquired and searched diligently , who prophesied of the grace that should come unto you :
text2: Xoossai intteyyo immana aaro kehatettaabau hananabaa yootidaageeti keehi koyidi , ha atotettaabaa qoridosona .

text: Searching what , or what manner of time the Spirit of Christ which was in them did signify , when it testified beforehand the sufferings of Christ , and the glory that should follow .
text2: Etan de7iya Kiristtoosa Ayyaanai Kiristtoosa waayiyaabaanne hegaappe guyyiyan yaana bonchchuwaabaa kasetidi markkattiiddi , aude woi waanida wodiyan yaanaakkonne akeekissidoogaadan , eti qoroosona .

text: Unto whom it was revealed , that not unto themselves , but unto us they did minister the things , which are now reported unto you by them that have preached the gospel unto you with the Holy Ghost sent down from heaven ; which things the angels desire to look into .
text2: He hananabaa yootiyaageeti oottido oosoi inttessappe attin , eta huuphessa gidennaagaa Xoossai etayyo qonccissiis ; ha77i intte siyido wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa intteyyo yootida asati , banttau saluwaappe kiitettida Geeshsha Ayyaanaa wolqqan yootidosona . Hegaa kiitanchchatikka be7anau amottoosona .

text: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind , be sober , and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , oosuwaa oottanau intte wozanan qoppi uttite ; minnite . Yesuus Kiristtoosi beettiyo wode aaro kehatettaa ekkana giidi , kumetta ufaissan naagi uttite .

text: As obedient children , not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance :
text2: Xoossau azazettite ; intte kase erennan amottido amuwaa kaalloppite .

text: But as he which hath called you is holy , so be ye holy in all manner of conversation ;
text2: SHin inttena xeesida Xoossai geeshsha gididoogaadan , inttekka intte ooso ubban geeshsha gidite . Xoossaa maxaafan , “ Taani geeshsha gidiyo gishshau , inttekka geeshsha gidite ” geetettidi xaafettiis .

text: And if ye call on the Father , who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man ' s work , pass the time of your sojourning here in fear :
text2: Asa huuphen huuphen som77o xeellennan a huuphe huuphe oosuwaadan pirddiya Xoossaa woossiiddi intte , “ Nu Aawau ” giidi a xeesiyaabaa gidikko , ha sa7aa bolli intte de7iyo wodiyan yashshatettan de7ite .

text: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things , as silver and gold , from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers ;
text2: Intte intte aawatuppe laattido pattenna de7uwaappe wozettidoogee , xayiya bira woi worqqa malaana gidennaagaa ereeta ; borssoi woi qiti bainna dorssa suuttadan , al77o Kiristtoosa suuttan intte wozettideta .

text: Who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world , but was manifest in these last times for you ,
text2: Xoossai sa7ai merettanaappe kase Kiristtoosa doori wottiis ; shin intte gishshau , ha wodiyaa wurssettan i beettiis .

text: Who by him do believe in God , that raised him up from the dead , and gave him glory ; that your faith and hope might be in God .
text2: Intte ammanoinne intte ekkana giidi ufaissan naagi uttidobai Xoossan de7ana mala , Xoossai haiquwaappe a denttidi , ayyo bonchchuwaa immidaagan aani ammanetta .

text: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren , see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently :
text2: Tumatettaayyo intte azazettiyoogan , lo77o milatiya iitatetti bainnan , intte ishantta siiqanau intte huuphiyaa geeshshidi , issoi issuwaara minttidi wozanappe siiqettite .

text: Being born again , not of corruptible seed , but of incorruptible , by the word of God , which liveth and abideth for ever .
text2: Intte haiqqiya zareppe naa77anttuwaa yelettibeekketa ; shin merinau de7iya Xoossaa qaalan haiqqenna zareppe yelettideta .

text: For all flesh is as grass , and all the glory of man as the flower of grass . The grass withereth , and the flower thereof falleth away :
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Asai ubbai maataa mala ; a bonchcho ubbaikka maataa ciishshaa mala . Maatai melees ; ciishshaikka qoqqofettees .

text: But the word of the Lord endureth for ever . And this is the word which by the gospel is preached unto you .
text2: SHin Godaa qaalai merinau de7ees ” yaagees . Hagee intteyyo odido wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa qaalaa .

text: Wherefore laying aside all malice , and all guile , and hypocrisies , and envies , and all evil speakings ,
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intteppe iitatetta ubbaa , cimo ubbaa , lo77o milatiya iitatetta , qanaatenne zigirssa ubbaa diggite .

text: As newborn babes , desire the sincere milk of the word , that ye may grow thereby :
text2: Godai keha gididoogaa intte eridobaa gidikko , ha77i yelettida gacino naatudan , uyiiddi diccanaunne attanau Xoossaa geeshsha qaalaa maattaa ubba wode laamotite .
