text: To whom coming , as unto a living stone , disallowed indeed of men , but chosen of God , and precious ,
text2: Godaakko de7o shuchchaakko shiiqite . Asi a ixxiis ; shin Xoossaa matan i doorettida al77o .

text: Ye also , as lively stones , are built up a spiritual house , an holy priesthood , to offer up spiritual sacrifices , acceptable to God by Jesus Christ .
text2: Inttekka qassi de7o shuchchadan , geeshsha qeese gididi , Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara Xoossaa ufaissiya ayyaanaa yarshshuwaa Xoossaayyo yarshshanau , intte intte huuphen ayyaana keettadan keexettite .

text: Wherefore also it is contained in the scripture , Behold , I lay in Sion a chief corner stone , elect , precious : and he that believeth on him shall not be confounded .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai , “ Be7ite , taani Xiyoone giyo kataman keettaa godaa xaphuwaa minttiya , doorettida , al77o shuchchaa wottais ; aani ammaniya ooninne yeellatenna ” yaagees .

text: Unto you therefore which believe he is precious : but unto them which be disobedient , the stone which the builders disallowed , the same is made the head of the corner ,
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ha shuchchai intteyyo ammaniyaageetuyyo daro al77o ; shin ammanennaageetuyyo , “ Gimbbiyaageeti karidi ixxido shuchchai godaa xaphuwaa minttiya , ubbaappe aadhdhiya shuchcha gidiis ” yaagees .

text: And a stone of stumbling , and a rock of offence , even to them which stumble at the word , being disobedient : whereunto also they were appointed .
text2: Qassikka , “ Ha shuchchai asa xubbiya shuchchanne asa ooggiya zaalla ” yaagees ; eti Xoossaa qaalaa ammanenna gishshau , i etau qoppidoogaadankka xubettoosona .

text: But ye are a chosen generation , a royal priesthood , an holy nation , a peculiar people ; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light :
text2: SHin Xoossai xumaappe garamissiya ba poo7uwau inttena xeesiis ; intte a ooratta oosuwaa yootanau doorettida zare ; intte kawo qeeseta ; geeshsha asanne Xoossaassi buzo asa .

text: Which in time past were not a people , but are now the people of God : which had not obtained mercy , but now have obtained mercy .
text2: Intte kase Xoossaa asa gidekketa ; shin ha77i intte a asa ; intte kase maarotettaa ekkibeekketa ; shin ha77i maarotettaa ekkideta .

text: Dearly beloved , I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims , abstain from fleshly lusts , which war against the soul ;
text2: Ta dabbotoo , intte ha sa7an imattanne yedettin asasan de7iyaageeta gididoogaadan , ubba wode intte shemppuwaara olettiya asatettaa amuwaappe intte haakkana mala , taani inttena woossais .

text: Having your conversation honest among the Gentiles : that , whereas they speak against you as evildoers , they may by your good works , which they shall behold , glorify God in the day of visitation .
text2: Aihuda gidenna asai inttena iitabaa oottiyaageetudan zigiriyo wode , Kiristtoosi yiyo gallassi intte lo77o oosuwaa eti akeekidi , Xoossaa galatana mala , intte de7uwaa eta giddon loitti naagite .

text: Submit yourselves to every ordinance of man for the Lord ' s sake : whether it be to the king , as supreme ;
text2: Godaa gishshau , asa higge ubbaayyo haarettite ; kawoikka ubbaappe bolla gidiyo gishshau , ayyo haarettite .

text: Or unto governors , as unto them that are sent by him for the punishment of evildoers , and for the praise of them that do well .
text2: Qassi deriyaa haariyaageetuyyookka haarettite . Aissi giikko , eti iitabaa oottiyaageeta qaxxayanaunne lo77obaa oottiyaageeta galatanau kawoppe kiitettidosona .

text: For so is the will of God , that with well doing ye may put to silence the ignorance of foolish men :
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai intte intte lo77o oosuwan erenna eeyya asaa haasayaa co77u oottanaagaa koyees .

text: As free , and not using your liberty for a cloke of maliciousness , but as the servants of God .
text2: Ailletettaappe kiyidi , Xoossaa ailledan de7iteppe attin , he ailletettaappe kiyidoogaa iitatetta genttiyoobaa oottoppite .

text: Honour all men . Love the brotherhood . Fear God . Honour the king .
text2: Asa ubbaa bonchchite . Intte ishantta siiqite . Xoossau yayyite . Kawo bonchchite .

text: Servants , be subject to your masters with all fear ; not only to the good and gentle , but also to the froward .
text2: Ashkkaratoo , intte lo77o godatu xalaalaayyoonne ashkke godatu xalaalaayyo gidennan , iitatuyyookka daro yayyidi haarettite .

text: For this is thankworthy , if a man for conscience toward God endure grief , suffering wrongfully .
text2: Aissi giikko , asi naaqqiyo wode waayettiya urai Xoossaa qoppiiddi , waayiyaa danddayikko , Xoossai a anjjana .

text: For what glory is it , if , when ye be buffeted for your faults , ye shall take it patiently ? but if , when ye do well , and suffer for it , ye take it patiently , this is acceptable with God .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte nagara oottin , inttena dechchiyo wode , intte danddayikko , intteyyo ai galati de7ii ? SHin lo77obaa oottidi waayiyaa intte danddayikko , Xoossai inttena hegau anjjana .

text: For even hereunto were ye called : because Christ also suffered for us , leaving us an example , that ye should follow his steps :
text2: Xoossai inttena xeesidoogee hegaa gishshassa ; aissi giikko , Kiristtoosi intteyyo waayettiis ; intte a kaallana mala , intteyyo leemiso gidiis .

text: Who did no sin , neither was guile found in his mouth :
text2: Nagara i oottibeenna ; ba doonankka worddo haasayibeenna .

text: Who , when he was reviled , reviled not again ; when he suffered , he threatened not ; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously :
text2: Asi bana cayiyo wode , zaaridi cayibeenna ; waayettiyo wodekka manddibeenna . SHin xillo pirddiya Xoossaayyo bana aattidi immiis .

text: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree , that we , being dead to sins , should live unto righteousness : by whose stripes ye were healed .
text2: Nuuni nagarau haiqqidi , xillotettau de7ana mala , Kiristtoosi ba huuphen ba ashuwan nu nagaraa masqqaliyan tookkiis ; intte a masunttan paxideta .

text: For ye were as sheep going astray ; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls .
text2: Aissi giikko , intte oge balida dorssa mala ; shin ha77i intte shemppuwaa heemmiyaagaakkonne naagiyaagaakko simmideta .

text: Likewise , ye wives , be in subjection to your own husbands ; that , if any obey not the word , they also may without the word be won by the conversation of the wives ;
text2: Hegaadankka maccaasatoo , intte azinatuppe Xoossaa qaalau azazettenna issooti issooti de7ikkokka , intte palamettennan , eti intte yashshatettaanne intte geeshsha de7uwaa be7idi ammanana mala , etau haarettite .

text: Whose adorning let it not be that outward adorning of plaiting the hair , and of wearing of gold , or of putting on of apparel ;
text2: Intte intte huuphe pixiyoogaaninne worqqa wottiyoogan woi lo77o maayo maayiyoogan intteyyo bolla baggaa loittoppite .

text: But let it be the hidden man of the heart , in that which is not corruptible , even the ornament of a meek and quiet spirit , which is in the sight of God of great price .
text2: SHin intte wozana giddon de7iya lo77otettai Xoossaa sinttan intteyyo daro al77o gididi , xayenna ashkkenne woppu giida ayyaana gido .

text: For after this manner in the old time the holy women also , who trusted in God , adorned themselves , being in subjection unto their own husbands :
text2: Aissi giikko , hegaadan Xoossai immana giidoogaa ammanida geeshsha maccaasati beni wode bantta azinatuyyo haarettidi , banttana hegaadan daro loittidosona .

text: Even as Sara obeyed Abraham , calling him lord : whose daughters ye are , as long as ye do well , and are not afraid with any amazement .
text2: Hegaadan Saara Abrahaama , “ Ta godau ” yaagada xeesaidda , ayyo azazettaasu ; inttekka issibaunne yayyennan lo77obaa oottikko , i naata .

text: Likewise , ye husbands , dwell with them according to knowledge , giving honour unto the wife , as unto the weaker vessel , and as being heirs together of the grace of life ; that your prayers be not hindered .
text2: Hegaadan azinatoo , intte maccaasati daafuranchcha mereta gidiyoogaa eridi , etaara issippe de7ite ; intte woosai xubettenna mala , Xoossai immido de7uwaa aaro kehatettaa eti inttenaara issippe laattiyo gishshau , eta bonchchite .

text: Finally , be ye all of one mind , having compassion one of another , love as brethren , be pitiful , be courteous :
text2: Hegaappe aadhdhiyaabaa gidikko , ubbai issi qofan de7ite . Issoi issuwau qarettidi , ishanttudan siiqettite ; qassi issoi issuwau kehiyaageetanne intte huuphiyaa kaushshiyaageeta gidite .

text: Not rendering evil for evil , or railing for railing : but contrariwise blessing ; knowing that ye are thereunto called , that ye should inherit a blessing .
text2: Iitaa gishshaa iitaa woi cashshaa gishshaa cashshaa zaaroppite ; hegaa aggidi , Xoossai intteyyo anjjuwaa immanau inttena xeesido gishshau anjjite .

text: For he that will love life , and see good days , let him refrain his tongue from evil , and his lips that they speak no guile :
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa maxaafai hagaadan yaagees ; “ De7o dosiyainne lo77o wodiyaa be7anau koyiyai oona gidikkonne ba inxxarssan iitabaa haasayiyoogaanne worddo yootiyoogaa aggo .

text: Let him eschew evil , and do good ; let him seek peace , and ensue it .
text2: Iitabaa oottiyoogaa aggidi , lo77obaa ootto ; sarotettaakka keehi koyonne a kaallo .

text: For the eyes of the Lord are over the righteous , and his ears are open unto their prayers : but the face of the Lord is against them that do evil .
text2: Aissi giikko , Godaa aifee xillotukko xeellees ; qassi i ubba wode eta woosaa ezggees . SHin Godai iitabaa oottiyaageeta ba hanqqo som77uwan xeellees ” yaagees .

text: And who is he that will harm you , if ye be followers of that which is good ?
text2: Intte lo77obaa oottanau amottikko , inttena qohanai oonee ?

text: But and if ye suffer for righteousness ' sake , happy are ye : and be not afraid of their terror , neither be troubled ;
text2: SHin harai atto , xillotettaa gishshau intte waayettikkokka , anjjettidaageeta . Asau yayyoppitenne hirggoppite .

text: But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts : and be ready always to give an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you with meekness and fear :
text2: SHin Kiristtoosa intte wozanan bonchchitenne a intte Goda oottite . Xoossai intteyyo immana giido inttenan de7iyaagau gaaso oichchiya ooyyoonne zaaro immanau ubba wode giigi uttite ; shin hegaa ashkketettaaninne yashshatettan oottite .

text: Having a good conscience ; that , whereas they speak evil of you , as of evildoers , they may be ashamed that falsely accuse your good conversation in Christ .
text2: Qassi Kiristtoosan intte de7iyo lo77o de7uwaa iitabaa oottidobaadan , inttena cayiya asai ba zigiriyooban yeellatana mala , inttena zoriya wozanai geeshsha gido .

text: For it is better , if the will of God be so , that ye suffer for well doing , than for evil doing .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossai giidobaa gidikko , iitabaa oottido gishshau waayettiyoogaappe , lo77obaa oottido gishshau waayettiyoogee keha .

text: For Christ also hath once suffered for sins , the just for the unjust , that he might bring us to God , being put to death in the flesh , but quickened by the Spirit :
text2: Aissi giikko , Kiristtoosi nuna Xoossaakko efaanau , baayyo xillo gidiiddi , makkalanchchatu gishshau , issitoo ubbaa nagarau haiqqiis ; i ba asatettan haiqqiis ; shin ayyaanan paxiis .

text: By which also he went and preached unto the spirits in prison ;
text2: Qassi he Ayyaanan , qashuwan de7iya ayyaanatukko biidi , etayyo qaalaa yootiis .

text: Which sometime were disobedient , when once the longsuffering of God waited in the days of Noah , while the ark was a preparing , wherein few , that is , eight souls were saved by water .
text2: He ayyaanati amarida hosppun asati haattan attido markkabiyaa Nohee keexxishin , Xoossai danddayidi gam77ido wode , Xoossaayyo azazettibeenna asaa ayyaanata .

text: The like figure whereunto even baptism doth also now save us ( not the putting away of the filth of the flesh , but the answer of a good conscience toward God , ) by the resurrection of Jesus Christ :
text2: Hegee xinqqatiyau leemiso gididi , inttena ha77i ashshees ; lo77o zoriya wozanaappe Xoossaa woossiyoogaappe attin , bollaa qitaa meecciyoogaa gidenna ; hegee inttena Yesuus Kiristtoosi haiquwaappe denddidoogan ashshees .

text: Who is gone into heaven , and is on the right hand of God ; angels and authorities and powers being made subject unto him .
text2: Saluwaa biidi Xoossaappe ushachcha baggan i uttidi , kiitanchcha ubbaa , maataara de7iyaageetanne wolqqaamata haarees .

text: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh , arm yourselves likewise with the same mind : for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , Kiristtoosi ba ashuwan nuuyyo waayettido gishshau , inttekka he qofaa ola miishshadan oiqqidi , intte intteyyo minnite . Aissi giikko , ba ashuwan waayettida urai nagaraa oottiyoogaa aggiis .

text: That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men , but to the will of God .
text2: Hagaappe sinttan , ha sa7an shemppoora de7anau attida wodiyan , Xoossai koyiyoogaadan de7anau bessiyoogaappe attin , asa amodan de7anau bessenna .

text: For the time past of our life may suffice us to have wrought the will of the Gentiles , when we walked in lasciviousness , lusts , excess of wine , revellings , banquetings , and abominable idolatries :
text2: Aissi giikko , Aihuda gidenna asai oottanau dosiyoogaa intte oottiiddi , shaaramuxanau qaaqqatiyoogan , amuwan , mattuwan , yettan , ushshan , pokkiya eeqau goinniyoogan , de7ido kase aadhdhida wodee intteyyo gidana .

text: Wherein they think it strange that ye run not with them to the same excess of riot , speaking evil of you :
text2: Aihuda gidenna asaara intte shori bainna oosuwaa issippe oottenna gishshau garamettidi , inttena cayoosona .

text: Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead .
text2: SHin eti paxa de7iya asaa bollinne haiqqida asaa bolli pirddanau giigi uttida Xoossau zaaruwaa immana .

text: For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead , that they might be judged according to men in the flesh , but live according to God in the spirit .
text2: Haiqqida asai ba asatettan asai pirddettiyoogaadan pirddettanaunne qassi ayyaanan Xoossai de7iyoogaadan de7anau , wonggeliyaa mishiraachchoi etayyo hegau odettiis .

text: But the end of all things is at hand : be ye therefore sober , and watch unto prayer .
text2: Ubbabaukka wurssettai matattiis . Hegaa gishshau , Xoossaa woossanau wozanaa qofai de7iyoogeetudan , inttena naagitenne minnite .

text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves : for charity shall cover the multitude of sins .
text2: Siiqoi daro nagaraa kammiyo gishshau , ubbabaappe aattidi issoi issuwaara wozanappe siiqettite .

text: Use hospitality one to another without grudging .
text2: Zuuzummennan issoi issuwaa imattatettan mokkite .

text: As every man hath received the gift , even so minister the same one to another , as good stewards of the manifold grace of God .
text2: Intte huuphiyan huuphiyan Xoossaappe dumma dumma aaro kehatettaa ekkidoogaadankka , Xoossaa dumma imuwaa loitti gishiyaageetudan , issoi issuwau oottite .

text: If any man speak , let him speak as the oracles of God ; if any man minister , let him do it as of the ability which God giveth : that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ , to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara ubbaban Xoossai galatettana mala , ooninne yootiyaabaa gidikko , qaalaa Xoossaappe ekkidi yootiyoogaadan yooto . Qassi ooninne maaddiyaabaa gidikko , Xoossai ayyo immiyo wolqqan maaddo . Bonchchoinne godatettai Xoossaassi meri merinau gido . Amin77i .

text: Beloved , think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you , as though some strange thing happened unto you :
text2: Ta dabbotoo , intte giddon tamadan xuuggidi paacciya waayee yiyaagaa oorattabai haniyaabaadan garamettoppite .

text: But rejoice , inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ ' s sufferings ; that , when his glory shall be revealed , ye may be glad also with exceeding joy .
text2: SHin Kiristtoosa bonchchoi beettiyo wode intte ufaittana mala , aara waayettiyoogan ufaittite .

text: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ , happy are ye ; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you : on their part he is evil spoken of , but on your part he is glorified .
text2: Asi inttena Kiristtoosa sunttaa gishshau boriyaabaa gidikko , intte anjjettidaageeta ; aissi giikko , bonchcho Ayyaanai , Xoossaa Ayyaanai , intte bolli shemppana .

text: But let none of you suffer as a murderer , or as a thief , or as an evildoer , or as a busybody in other men ' s matters .
text2: Intteppe ooninne shemppo woridabaadan , woi kaisodan , woi iitabaa oottida asadan , woi hara asa yohuwan gelidabaadan waayettoppo .

text: Yet if any man suffer as a Christian , let him not be ashamed ; but let him glorify God on this behalf .
text2: SHin ooninne Kiristtoosa ammaniyo gishshau waayettikko , Kiristtoosa sunttaa gishshau , Xoossaa galatanaappe attin , yeellatoppo .

text: For the time is come that judgment must begin at the house of God : and if it first begin at us , what shall the end be of them that obey not the gospel of God ?
text2: Aissi giikko , pirddai Xoossaa asaa bolli doomettiyo wodee gakkiis . Qassi he pirddai koiro nu bolli doomettiyaabaa gidikko , a wonggeliyaayyo azazettennaageetu wurssettai aiba gidanee ?

text: And if the righteous scarcely be saved , where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear ?
text2: Xillo asi tuggan attiyaabaa gidikko , makkalanchchainne nagaranchchai yaatin waananee ?

text: Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well doing , as unto a faithful Creator .
text2: Hegaa gishshau qassi , Xoossai giidoogaadan waayettiyaageeti lo77obaa oottiiddi , bantta shemppuwaa hadaraa banttana medhdhida ammanettiya Xoossau immona .

text: The elders which are among you I exhort , who am also an elder , and a witness of the sufferings of Christ , and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed :
text2: Simmi taani woosa keettaa cimatuura cima gidiyaageenne , Kiristtoosa waayiyaa markkattiyaagee , qassi qonccana bonchchuwaa shaakkanaagee intte giddon de7iya cimata zorais .

text: Feed the flock of God which is among you , taking the oversight thereof , not by constraint , but willingly ; not for filthy lucre , but of a ready mind ;
text2: Intte giddon de7iya Xoossaa dorssaa wudiyaa Xoossai koyiyoogaadan heemmite . Dosaanappe attin , wolqqan gidenna . Qassi intte go77a xalaalaa xeellennan , lo77o qofan heemmite .

text: Neither as being lords over God ' s heritage , but being ensamples to the flock .
text2: Dorssaa wudiyau intte leemiso gidanaappe attin , heemmiyoogeeta wolqqan haaroppite .

text: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear , ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away .
text2: Qassi heemmiyaageetu halaqai beettiyo wode , moorettenna bonchcho akiliiliyaa intte ekkana .

text: Likewise , ye younger , submit yourselves unto the elder . Yea , all of you be subject one to another , and be clothed with humility : for God resisteth the proud , and giveth grace to the humble .
text2: Hegaadankka yelaga asatoo , cimatuyyo haarettite . Ubbaikka issoi issuwau oottanau intte huuphiyaa kaushshiyoogaa afaladan maayite . Aissi giikko , Xoossai otorettiyaageeta ixxees ; shin banttana kaushshiyaageetuyyo aaro kehatettaa immees .

text: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God , that he may exalt you in due time :
text2: Xoossai ba lo77o wodiyan inttena xoqqu oottana mala , wolqqaama Xoossaa kushiyaappe garssaara inttena toochchite .

text: Casting all your care upon him ; for he careth for you .
text2: I intteyyo qoppiyo gishshau , inttena hirggissiya ubbabaa a bolli olite .

text: Be sober , be vigilant ; because your adversary the devil , as a roaring lion , walketh about , seeking whom he may devour :
text2: Xalahe halaqai , intte morkkee , mittiyo uraa koyidi , gudiya gaammuwaadan gudiiddi , intte lanqqiyan yuuyiyo gishshau naagettitenne beegottite .

text: Whom resist stedfast in the faith , knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world .
text2: Sa7an de7iya intte ishantti hegaadan waayettiyoogaa eridi , ammanuwan minnidi , aara eqettite .

text: But the God of all grace , who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus , after that ye have suffered a while , make you perfect , stablish , strengthen , settle you .
text2: Aaro kehatetta ubbaa Xoossai , ba merinaa bonchchuwaayyo Kiristtoos Yesuusa baggaara inttena xeesidaagee , amarida wodiyaa intte waayettidoogaappe guyyiyan , i ba huuphen inttena loittananne minttana . Qassi i inttena wolqqanttana .

text: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Bonchchoinne wolqqai merinaappe merinaa gakkanaassi ayyo gido . Amin77i .

text: By Silvanus , a faithful brother unto you , as I suppose , I have written briefly , exhorting , and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand .
text2: Hagee Xoossaa tumu aaro kehatettaa gidiyoogaa taani intteyyo markkattaiddanne inttena zoraidda , intteyyo qanttan xaafido dabddaabbiyaa ammanettiya isha gaada taani qoppiyo Sillaasa bolli kiittaas ; he aaro kehatettan minnite .

text: The church that is at Babylon , elected together with you , saluteth you ; and so doth Marcus my son .
text2: Inttenaara issippe doorettida Baabiloonen de7iya woosa keettaa asainne ta na7ai Marqqoosi inttena “ Saro saro ” goosona .

text: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity . Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Siiqo yeretaa yerettiiddi , issoi issuwaa sarotite . Intteyyo , Kiristtoosaara de7iya ubbatuyyo sarotettai gido . Amin77i .

text: Simon Peter , a servant and an apostle of Jesus Christ , to them that have obtained like precious faith with us through the righteousness of God and our Saviour Jesus Christ :
text2: Taani Simoon PHeexiroosi , Yesuus Kiristtoosi kiittidoogeenne a ashkkarai , nu Xoossaanne nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosa xillotettaa baggaara nuugaa mala al77o ammanuwaa ekkidaageetuyyo ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafais .

text: Grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God , and of Jesus our Lord ,
text2: Xoossaanne nu Godaa Yesuusa intte eriyoogan aaro kehatettainne sarotettai intteyyo palahidi gido .

text: According as his divine power hath given unto us all things that pertain unto life and godliness , through the knowledge of him that hath called us to glory and virtue :
text2: Nuuni Xoossaa bonchchuwaanne lo77otettaa laattana mala , nuna xeesidaagaa nuuni eriyoogan , Xoossaa milatidi de7anau nuna koshshiyaabaa ubbaa Xoossaa wolqqai nuuyyo immiis .

text: Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises : that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature , having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust .
text2: Intte a imuwaa baggaara sa7an de7iya bashshiya amuwaappe kessi ekkanaadaaninne Xoossaa xoossatettaa laattanaadan , i ba immana giido daro wolqqaamanne al77o imuwaa nuuyyo immiis .

text: And beside this , giving all diligence , add to your faith virtue ; and to virtue knowledge ;
text2: Hegaa gishshau , minnidi intte ammanuwaa bolli lo77otettaa , lo77otettaa bolli eratettaa ,

text: And to knowledge temperance ; and to temperance patience ; and to patience godliness ;
text2: eratettaa bolli inttena naagiyoogaa , inttena naagiyoogaa bolli genccaa , genccaa bolli Xoossaa milatiyoogaa ,

text: And to godliness brotherly kindness ; and to brotherly kindness charity .
text2: Xoossaa milatiyoogaa bolli ishatettaa siiquwaa , ishatettaa siiquwaa bolli siiquwaa gujjite .

text: For if these things be in you , and abound , they make you that ye shall neither be barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Aissi giikko , hageeti intteyyo keehi dariyaabaa gidikko , inttena Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa eratettan tishshanne aifeera de7iyaageeta oottana .

text: But he that lacketh these things is blind , and cannot see afar off , and hath forgotten that he was purged from his old sins .
text2: SHin hegeeti bainna urai ba matan de7iyaabaa xalaalaa demmees ; qassi i qooqe ; i kase oottido nagarai atto geetettidoogaa erenna .

text: Wherefore the rather , brethren , give diligence to make your calling and election sure : for if ye do these things , ye shall never fall :
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ta ishatoo , inttena Xoossai xeesidoogaanne dooridoogaa minttanau , kaseegaappe aadhdhi minnite ; aissi giikko , intte hegaa oottiyaabaa gidikko , xubettekketa .

text: For so an entrance shall be ministered unto you abundantly into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ .
text2: Hegaadan qassi nu Godaanne nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosa merinaa kawotettaa geliyo kumetta shenee intteyyo imettana .

text: Wherefore I will not be negligent to put you always in remembrance of these things , though ye know them , and be established in the present truth .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , intte ha yohota eriyaabaa gidikkokka , qassi intte oiqqido tuman minnidaageeta gidikkokka , taani inttena ha yohota ubba wode hassayissiyoogaa aggikke .

text: Yea , I think it meet , as long as I am in this tabernacle , to stir you up by putting you in remembrance ;
text2: Taani paxa de7ido keenan , inttena hassayissada qaasettanau koshshiyaabaa tau milatees .

text: Knowing that shortly I must put off this my tabernacle , even as our Lord Jesus Christ hath shewed me .
text2: Nu Godai Yesuus Kiristtoosi tau qoncciyan yootidoogaadan , taani ha haiqqiya asatettaa gam77ennan qaara olanaagaa erais .

text: Moreover I will endeavour that ye may be able after my decease to have these things always in remembrance .
text2: Taani haiqqidoogaappe guyyiyaana gidinkka , intte ha yohota ubba wode qoppanau danddayana mala , tau danddayettidabaa ubbaa oottana .

text: For we have not followed cunningly devised fables , when we made known unto you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , but were eyewitnesses of his majesty .
text2: Nuuni a gita bonchchuwaa be7idi yootoosippe attin , medhdhi ekkido haisiyan nu Godaa Kiristtoosa wolqqaanne yuussaa intteyyo yootibookko .

text: For he received from God the Father honour and glory , when there came such a voice to him from the excellent glory , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Aissi giikko , daro wolqqaama bonchchuwaappe , “ Taani aani daro ufaittiyo ta siiqo Na7ai hagaa ” yaagiya cenggurssai yiido wode , Xoossaappe , Aawaappe bonchchuwaanne galataa i ekkiis .

text: And this voice which came from heaven we heard , when we were with him in the holy mount .
text2: Qassi nuunikka geeshsha deriyaa bollan aara de7iiddi , he cenggurssai saluwaappe yiishin siyida .

text: We have also a more sure word of prophecy ; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed , as unto a light that shineth in a dark place , until the day dawn , and the day star arise in your hearts :
text2: Qassi hegaappe keehi aadhdhiya hananabaa yootiyaageeti haasayido nuna keehi ammanttiya qaalai nuuyyo de7ees ; intte he qaalaa naagiyaabaa gidikko loittideta . Aissi giikko , hegee sa7ai wonttana gakkanaassinne maallado xoolinttiyaa poo7oi intte wozanan poo7ana gakkanaassi , xuman poo7iya poo7uwaa mala .

text: Knowing this first , that no prophecy of the scripture is of any private interpretation .
text2: Ubbaappe kasetidi , hagaa erite ; Xoossaa maxaafan xaafettida hananabaa yootidobaa ooninne barkka birshshanau danddayenna .

text: For the prophecy came not in old time by the will of man : but holy men of God spake as they were moved by the Holy Ghost .
text2: Aissi giikko , hananabaa yootidobi ubbai geeshsha asati Geeshsha Ayyaanai kaalettin , Xoossaa qaalaa haasayidosonappe attin , asa sheniyan haasayettibeenna .

text: But there were false prophets also among the people , even as there shall be false teachers among you , who privily shall bring in damnable heresies , even denying the Lord that bought them , and bring upon themselves swift destruction .
text2: SHin hananabaa yootiya worddoti asaa giddon kase de7iyoogaadan , intte giddonkka wordduwaa tamaarissiyaageeti de7ana . Eti banttana wozida , Ubbaa Haariya Godaa kaddidi , bashshiya worddo timirttiyaa ehaana ; qassi eti akeekenna bashshaa bantta bolli ehaana .

text: And many shall follow their pernicious ways ; by reason of whom the way of truth shall be evil spoken of .
text2: Qassi daro asai yeellayiya eta iita ogiyaa kaallana ; eta gaasuwan tumaa ogee cayettana .

text: And through covetousness shall they with feigned words make merchandise of you : whose judgment now of a long time lingereth not , and their damnation slumbereth not .
text2: Wordduwaa tamaarissiya hegeeti miishshau yaaretiyoogan bantta medhdhi ekkido haisiyan inttena bonqqana ; beniisappe doommidi , eta pirddai giigi uttiis ; eta xaissiyaagee beegottidi naagees .

text: For if God spared not the angels that sinned , but cast them down to hell , and delivered them into chains of darkness , to be reserved unto judgment ;
text2: Nagara oottida kiitanchchatuyyo Xoossai qarettennan , pirddaa gallassai gakkanaassi xuma ollan eti qashetti uttido Gaannabiyan yeggiis .

text: And spared not the old world , but saved Noah the eighth person , a preacher of righteousness , bringing in the flood upon the world of the ungodly ;
text2: Xoossai nagaranchchatu bolli bashshaa haattaa yeddiisippe attin , beni asau kehibeenna ; shin xillotettaabaa yootida Nohanne hara laappun asata ashshiis .

text: And turning the cities of Sodom and Gomorrha into ashes condemned them with an overthrow , making them an ensample unto those that after should live ungodly ;
text2: Xoossai Sadoomanne Gamoora giyo katamata biitta bidintta oottidi , xuuggi xaissidi , nagaranchcha gidiyaageeta gakkanabau leemiso oottiis .

text: And delivered just Lot , vexed with the filthy conversation of the wicked :
text2: Higgiyau azazettenna shaaramuxiya asatu giddon tuggatidi de7iya xillo Looxa Xoossai ashshiis .

text: ( For that righteous man dwelling among them , in seeing and hearing , vexed his righteous soul from day to day with their unlawful deeds ; )
text2: He lo77o bitanee eta giddon de7iiddi , eti oottiyo iita oosuwaa gallassi gallassi be7ido wodenne siyido wode a lo77o wozanai un77ettiis .

text: The Lord knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptations , and to reserve the unjust unto the day of judgment to be punished :
text2: Hegaa gidikko , Godai Xoossau goinniya asata paaciyaappe waati ashshanaakko erees ; nagaranchchata qassi ubbaappe aattidi , tuna amuwan ashuwaa amuwaa kaalliyaageetanne qassi Xoossaa wolqqaa kariyaageeta , pirddaa gallassai gakkanaassi Godai qaxxayiiddi wottanaagaakka erees . Wordduwaa tamaarissiya hegeeti xalanne otoranchcha gididoogan , bollan de7iya bonchcho meretaa cayoosonappe attin , bonchchokkona .

text: Whereas angels , which are greater in power and might , bring not railing accusation against them before the Lord .
text2: He asatuppe daro minonne wolqqaama gidiya kiitanchchatikka bollan de7iya bonchcho meretaa Godaa sinttan cashshan mootanau koyokkona .

text: But these , as natural brute beasts , made to be taken and destroyed , speak evil of the things that they understand not ; and shall utterly perish in their own corruption ;
text2: SHin he asati ohettidi xayanau yelettida bantta meretan wozanai bainna woraa do7atudan hanoosona ; eti erennabaa cayoosona ; qassi woraa do7adan , eti coo xayana .

text: And shall receive the reward of unrighteousness , as they that count it pleasure to riot in the day time . Spots they are and blemishes , sporting themselves with their own deceivings while they feast with you ;
text2: Eti bantta medhdhido metuwan metootana ; gallassi yexxidi duriyoogaa ufaissiyaabaa giidi qoppoosona ; eti kaushshatanne tunata gidi uttidi , inttenaara miyo qumaa meettan ufaittoosona .

text: Having eyes full of adultery , and that cannot cease from sin ; beguiling unstable souls : an heart they have exercised with covetous practices ; cursed children :
text2: SHaaramuxa maccaasaa xeelliyoogaa aggenna aifee etau de7ees ; qassi nagara oottiyoogaakka aggokkona . Ammanuwan minnibeenna asaa cimmoosona . Amuwaara meezetida wozanai etau de7ees ; eti qanggettidaageeta .

text: Which have forsaken the right way , and are gone astray , following the way of Balaam the son of Bosor , who loved the wages of unrighteousness ;
text2: Sitta ogiyaa aggidi balidosona . Bi7oora na7aa Balaama ogiyaara biidosona ; Balaami makkalan miishshaa ekkanau koyiis .

text: But was rebuked for his iniquity : the dumb ass speaking with man ' s voice forbad the madness of the prophet .
text2: I hananabaa yootiyaagaa ; shin a nagaraa gishshau , a haree asadan haasayan seeridi , a gooshsha mala hanuwaappe a teqqiis .

text: These are wells without water , clouds that are carried with a tempest ; to whom the mist of darkness is reserved for ever .
text2: He asati meliichchida pulttuwaa mala ; qassi gotee tookkidi efiyo shaaraa mala ; Xoossai etau sakkana xumaa giigissi uttiis .

text: For when they speak great swelling words of vanity , they allure through the lusts of the flesh , through much wantonness , those that were clean escaped from them who live in error .
text2: Aissi giikko , eti hadanne otoro haasayaa hasayoosona ; balan de7iya asaappe kessi ekkiyaageeta shaaramuxanau qaaqqatiyo amuwan cimmoosona .

text: While they promise them liberty , they themselves are the servants of corruption : for of whom a man is overcome , of the same is he brought in bondage .
text2: Eti banttau bashsha amuwaara de7iiddi eta , “ Intte ailletettaappe kiyana ” yaagoosona ; aissi giikko , issi asi bana xoonidabau aibaunne aille .

text: For if after they have escaped the pollutions of the world through the knowledge of the Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ , they are again entangled therein , and overcome , the latter end is worse with them than the beginning .
text2: Eti nu Godaanne nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosa eratettan ha sa7aa tunatettaappe kessi ekkidoogaappe guyyiyan , guyye simmidi , aani xubettidi xoonettiyaabaa gidikko , kase de7iyo de7uwaappe guyyeegee etau iitana .

text: For it had been better for them not to have known the way of righteousness , than , after they have known it , to turn from the holy commandment delivered unto them .
text2: Aissi giikko , etau imettida geeshsha azazuwaa eridi aggiyoogaappe eti xillotettaa ogiyaa erennan aggiyaakko lo77o shin .

text: But it is happened unto them according to the true proverb , The dog is turned to his own vomit again ; and the sow that was washed to her wallowing in the mire .
text2: “ Kanai ba cooshshaakko guyye simmees ” giyo leemisoinne qassi , “ Meecettida gudunttai guyye simmidi , urqqan gonddorettees ” giyo leemisoi tuma gidiyoogaa eta gakkidabai bessees .

text: This second epistle , beloved , I now write unto you ; in both which I stir up your pure minds by way of remembrance :
text2: Ta siiqotoo , hagee taani intteyyo xaafido naa77antto dabddaabbiyaa ; taani he naa77u dabddaabbetakka intte suure qofaa qoppanaadan denttettanau inttena hassayissanaadan xaafaas .

text: That ye may be mindful of the words which were spoken before by the holy prophets , and of the commandment of us the apostles of the Lord and Saviour :
text2: Hananabaa yootiya geeshshati beni yootido qaalaa intte hassayana malanne Godai inttena ashshiyaagee , ba kiittidoogeetu baggaara inttena azazido azazuwaa intte hassayana mala koyais .

text: Knowing this first , that there shall come in the last days scoffers , walking after their own lusts ,
text2: Wodiyaa wurssettan , asa toochchiya bantta amuwaadan de7iyaageeti asa toochchiiddi denddanaagaa ubbaappe kasetidi erite .

text: And saying , Where is the promise of his coming ? for since the fathers fell asleep , all things continue as they were from the beginning of the creation .
text2: Eti , “ I ' Yaana ' yaagiis . Gibeennee ? Yaatin awan de7ii ? Aissi giikko , nu aawati haiqqiichchidosona ; shin ubbabaikka sa7ai merettoosappe doommidi de7iyoogaadankka de7ees ” yaagana .

text: For this they willingly are ignorant of , that by the word of God the heavens were of old , and the earth standing out of the water and in the water :
text2: Daro wodiyaappe kase Xoossai haasayin , saloinne sa7ai merettidoogaa eridi , eti akeekennan ixxidosona . Sa7ai haattaappenne haattan merettiis .

text: Whereby the world that then was , being overflowed with water , perished :
text2: Qassi hegaa gaasuwan , he wode de7iya sa7ai he haattan meetetti xayiis .

text: But the heavens and the earth , which are now , by the same word are kept in store , reserved unto fire against the day of judgment and perdition of ungodly men .
text2: SHin ha77i de7iya saloinne sa7ai , Xoossau goinnenna asati pirddettiyo gallassainne xayiyo gallassai gakkanaassi takkidi , he qaalan tamaa naagoosona .

text: But , beloved , be not ignorant of this one thing , that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years , and a thousand years as one day .
text2: SHin ta siiqotoo , ha issi yohiyo dogoppite ; Godaa matan , issi gallassai sha7u gallassa mala gidiyoogaanne , qassi sha7u gallassai issi gallassa mala gidiyoogaa dogoppite .

text: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise , as some men count slackness ; but is longsuffering to us - ward , not willing that any should perish , but that all should come to repentance .
text2: Issooti issooti qoppiyoogaadan , Godai ba oottana giidoogaa oottanau takkenna ; shin ooninne ba nagaraappe simmanaadan koyeesippe attin , ooninne xayana mala koyenna gishshau , inttebaa genccees .

text: But the day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night ; in the which the heavens shall pass away with a great noise , and the elements shall melt with fervent heat , the earth also and the works that are therein shall be burned up .
text2: SHin Godaa gallassai kaisodan yaana . He gallassi saloti wolqqaama gunttan Xayana ; saluwaa meretati wolqqaama mishuwan seerana ; sa7ainne a bollan de7iya ubbabai xayana .

text: Seeing then that all these things shall be dissolved , what manner of persons ought ye to be in all holy conversation and godliness ,
text2: Ubbabaikka hegaadan xayiyaabaa gidikko , intte ai mala asa gidanau bessii ? Intte de7oi geeshshanne Xoossaa milatiyaagaa gidanau koshshees .

text: Looking for and hasting unto the coming of the day of God , wherein the heavens being on fire shall be dissolved , and the elements shall melt with fervent heat ?
text2: Intte Xoossaa gallassaa naagishin , he gallassai eesuwan gakkanaadan , intteyyo danddayettiyaabaa oottite ; he gallassi saloti xuugettidi xayananne saluwaa meretatikka wolqqaama mishuwan seerana .

text: Nevertheless we , according to his promise , look for new heavens and a new earth , wherein dwelleth righteousness .
text2: SHin nuuni Xoossai immana giido ooratta saluwaanne ooratta sa7aa xilloi de7anasaa naagoos .

text: Wherefore , beloved , seeing that ye look for such things , be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace , without spot , and blameless .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ta siiqotoo , he gallassaa naagiiddi , pokkoinne boree bainnaageeta gididi , aara sarotettan de7ana mala minnite .

text: And account that the longsuffering of our Lord is salvation ; even as our beloved brother Paul also according to the wisdom given unto him hath written unto you ;
text2: Godaa danddayai atotettaa gidiyoogaa intte wozanan qoppite ; hegaadan qassi nu siiqo ishai PHauloosi , Xoossai bau immido aadhdhida eratettan intteyyo xaafiis .

text: As also in all his epistles , speaking in them of these things ; in which are some things hard to be understood , which they that are unlearned and unstable wrest , as they do also the other scriptures , unto their own destruction .
text2: Ba xaafiyo dabddaabbe ubban , he yohuwaabaa xaafiyo wode , i giyoogee hagaa . Tamaaribeenna asatinne minnibeenna asati Xoossaa maxaafata harata geellayiyoogaadankka , he dabddaabbiyaa giddon de7iya akeekanau waayissiya yohuwaa geellayoosona . Eti hegaa oottiyoogan bantta bolli bashshaa ehoosona .

text: Ye therefore , beloved , seeing ye know these things before , beware lest ye also , being led away with the error of the wicked , fall from your own stedfastness .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , ta siiqotoo , intte hegaa eriyo gishshau , makkalanchchatu balan cimettidi , wora beenna malanne , qassi minnidi de7iyo sohuwaappe kunddenna mala naagettite .

text: But grow in grace , and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ . To him be glory both now and for ever . Amen .
text2: SHin intte nu Godaa , nuna ashshiya Yesuus Kiristtoosa aaro kehatettaaninne eratettan diccite . A ha77inne merinaa gallassai gakkanaassi galatai gakko . Amin77i .

text: That which was from the beginning , which we have heard , which we have seen with our eyes , which we have looked upon , and our hands have handled , of the Word of life ;
text2: Nuuni koiroosappe doommidi de7iya , nu aifiyan be7idi , nu kushiyan a bochchi be7ido de7uwaa qaalaabaa intteyyo xaafoos . Nuuni a be7ida ; nu kusheekka a bochchi be7iis .

text: ( For the life was manifested , and we have seen it , and bear witness , and shew unto you that eternal life , which was with the Father , and was manifested unto us ; )
text2: He de7oi qonccin , nuuni a be7idi , abaa intteyyo markkattoos ; qassi Aawaa matan de7iya nuuyyo qonccida merinaa de7uwaabaa intteyyo yootoos .

text: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you , that ye also may have fellowship with us : and truly our fellowship is with the Father , and with his Son Jesus Christ .
text2: Qassi nunaara intteyyo issippetettai de7ana mala , nuuni be7idoogaanne siyidoogaa intteyyo yootoos ; nuuyyo Aawaaranne a Na7aa Yesuus Kiristtoosaara issippetettai de7ees .

text: And these things write we unto you , that your joy may be full .
text2: Nuuni nu ufaissai polettana mala , hagaa intteyyo xaafoos .

text: This then is the message which we have heard of him , and declare unto you , that God is light , and in him is no darkness at all .
text2: Nuuni appe siyidi , intteyyo yootiyo kiitai , “ Xoossai poo7o ; aani xumi mulekka baawa ” yaagiyaagaa .

text: If we say that we have fellowship with him , and walk in darkness , we lie , and do not the truth :
text2: Nuuni nuuyyo aara issippetettai de7ees giidi xuman de7ikko , nu haasayaaninne nu oosuwan worddotoos .

text: But if we walk in the light , as he is in the light , we have fellowship one with another , and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin .
text2: SHin poo7uwan i de7iyoogaadan , nuunikka poo7uwan de7ikko , nuuyyo issuwau issuwaara issippetettai de7ees ; qassi a Na7aa , Yesuus Kiristtoosa suuttai nagara ubbaappe nuna ashshees .

text: If we say that we have no sin , we deceive ourselves , and the truth is not in us .
text2: Nuuni nunan nagari baawa giikko , nurkka nuna cimmoos ; nunan tumatettikka baawa .

text: If we confess our sins , he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins , and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness .
text2: SHin nuuni Xoossau nu nagaraa paaxikko , i nu nagaraa atto gaanaunne nu mooro ooso ubbaappe nuna geeshshanau , ammanttiyaagaanne tumubaa oottiyaagaa .

text: If we say that we have not sinned , we make him a liar , and his word is not in us .
text2: Nuuni nagara oottibookko giikko , Xoossaa worddanchcha kessoos ; a qaalaikka nunan de7enna .

text: My little children , these things write I unto you , that ye sin not . And if any man sin , we have an advocate with the Father , Jesus Christ the righteous :
text2: Ta naatoo , nagara intte oottennaadan , taani hagaa intteyyo xaafais ; shin ooninne nagara oottikko , Aawaa matan nuuyyo gaannatiya Yesuus Kiristtoosi , Xilloi , de7ees .

text: And he is the propitiation for our sins : and not for ours only , but also for the sins of the whole world .
text2: Qassi nuuni nu nagaraa atto geetettaa Kiristtoosa baggaara demmeettees ; Kiristtoosi yarshshettidoogee asa ubbaa nagaraassappe attin , nu nagaraa xalaalaassa gidenna .

text: And hereby we do know that we know him , if we keep his commandments .
text2: Nuuni Xoossaa azazuwaa naagikko , tumu a eriyoogaa hegan shaakkanau danddayoos .

text: He that saith , I know him , and keepeth not his commandments , is a liar , and the truth is not in him .
text2: Issi urai , “ Taani a erais ” giidi , qassi a azazuwaa naagennan aggikko , he urai worddanchcha ; tumatettikka aani baawa .

text: But whoso keepeth his word , in him verily is the love of God perfected : hereby know we that we are in him .
text2: SHin a qaalau azazettiya oona gidikkonne , he urai Xoossaa siiqiyoogee tumu polettiis . Nuuni Xoossan de7iyoogaa hagee nuna erissees .

text: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk , even as he walked .
text2: Taani , “ Xoossan de7ais ” giya ooninne Kiristtoosi de7idoogaadan de7anau bessees .

text: Brethren , I write no new commandment unto you , but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning . The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning .
text2: Ta ishatoo , taani intteyyo koiroosappe de7iya ceega azazuwaa xaafaisippe attin , ooratta azazo xaafikke ; he ceega azazoi intte siyido qaalaa .

text: Again , a new commandment I write unto you , which thing is true in him and in you : because the darkness is past , and the true light now shineth .
text2: Gidikkokka , taani intteyyo naa77anttuwaa ooratta azazuwaa xaafais ; he azazuwaa tumatettaikka Kiristtoosaaninne inttenan beettees . Aissi giikko , xumai xayees ; tumu poo7oi ha77i poo7ees .

text: He that saith he is in the light , and hateth his brother , is in darkness even until now .
text2: Poo7uwan de7ais giiddi , ba ishaa ixxiya ooninne hanno gakkanaassikka xuman de7ees .

text: He that loveth his brother abideth in the light , and there is none occasion of stumbling in him .
text2: Ba ishaa siiqiya ooninne poo7uwan de7ees ; he uran hara ura xubbiyaabi aibinne baawa .

text: But he that hateth his brother is in darkness , and walketh in darkness , and knoweth not whither he goeth , because that darkness hath blinded his eyes .
text2: SHin ba ishaa ixxiya ooninne xuman de7ees ; xuman hemettees . Xumai a aifiyaa qooqissi wottido gishshau , awu biyaakkonne erenna .

text: I write unto you , little children , because your sins are forgiven you for his name ' s sake .
text2: Ta naatoo , Xoossai Kiristtoosa sunttaa gishshau , intte nagaraa atto yaagido gishshau , taani intteyyo xaafais .

text: I write unto you , fathers , because ye have known him that is from the beginning . I write unto you , young men , because ye have overcome the wicked one . I write unto you , little children , because ye have known the Father .
text2: Aawatoo , koiroosappe de7iyaagaa intte erido gishshau , intteyyo xaafais . Yelagatoo , xalahe halaqaa intte xoonido gishshau , intteyyo xaafais . Guutta naatoo , Xoossaa intte erido gishshau , intteyyo xaafais .

text: I have written unto you , fathers , because ye have known him that is from the beginning . I have written unto you , young men , because ye are strong , and the word of God abideth in you , and ye have overcome the wicked one .
text2: Aawatoo , koiroosappe de7iyaagaa intte erido gishshau , intteyyo xaafais . Yelagatoo , intte mino gidiyo gishshaunne Xoossaa qaalai inttenan de7iyo gishshau , qassi xalahe halaqaa intte xoonido gishshau , intteyyo xaafais .

text: Love not the world , neither the things that are in the world . If any man love the world , the love of the Father is not in him .
text2: Ha sa7aa woi sa7an de7iya aibanne siiqoppite . Intte ha sa7aa siiqikko , Xoossaa siiqoi inttenan baawa .

text: For all that is in the world , the lust of the flesh , and the lust of the eyes , and the pride of life , is not of the Father , but is of the world .
text2: Aissi giikko , ha sa7an de7iya ubbabai , hegeekka : asatettaa amoi , aifen xeellidi qaaqqatiyoogeenne miishshan ceeqettiyoogee ha sa7aappe yiidoogaappe attin , Xoossaappe yibeenna .

text: And the world passeth away , and the lust thereof : but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever .
text2: Ha sa7ainne ha sa7an asi amottiyo ubbabai aadhdhana . SHin Xoossai giidoogaa oottiya urai merinau de7ana .

text: Little children , it is the last time : and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come , even now are there many antichrists ; whereby we know that it is the last time .
text2: Ta naatoo , wodiyaa wurssettai matattiis ; Kiristtoosa morkkee sinttappe yaanaagaa intte siyidoogaadan , harai atto ha77ikka a morkketi daroti denddidosona . Hegaa gishshau , wodiyaa wurssettai matattidoogaa nuuni hegan eroos .

text: They went out from us , but they were not of us ; for if they had been of us , they would no doubt have continued with us : but they went out , that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us .
text2: Ha morkketi nu bagga gidenna gishshau , nu giddoppe kiyidosona ; aissi giikko , eti nu bagga gidiyaabaa gidiyaakko , nu giddon de7ana ; shin etappe ooninne nu bagga gidennaagee erettana mala , nu giddoppe kiyidosona .

text: But ye have an unction from the Holy One , and ye know all things .
text2: SHin Kiristtoosi intte bolli Geeshsha Ayyaanaa gussiis ; qassi intte ubbai tumaa ereeta .

text: I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth , but because ye know it , and that no lie is of the truth .
text2: Tumaa intte eriyo gishshaunne qassi tuman worddoi aibinne bainnaagaa intte eriyo gishshau , taani intteyyo xaafaisippe attin , tumaa intte erenna gishshau xaafikke .

text: Who is a liar but he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ ? He is antichrist , that denieth the Father and the Son .
text2: Yesuusa giyoogee Kiristtoosa gidin erikke giya urappe attin , worddanchchi oonee ? Hegee Aawaanne Na7aa erikke giyaagee Kiristtoosa morkkiyaa .

text: Whosoever denieth the Son , the same hath not the Father : ( but ) he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also .
text2: Na7aa erikke giya oonaaninne Aawai de7enna ; Na7aa erais giya oonaanikka qassi Aawai de7ees .

text: Let that therefore abide in you , which ye have heard from the beginning . If that which ye have heard from the beginning shall remain in you , ye also shall continue in the Son , and in the Father .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , koiroosappe intte siyidoogaa intte wozanan minttidi naagite . Koiroosappe siyidoogaa intte naagikko , intteyyo qassi Na7aaranne Aawaara issippetettai de7ana .

text: And this is the promise that he hath promised us , even eternal life .
text2: Qassi Kiristtoosi ba huuphen nuuyyo immana giidoogee merinaa de7uwaa .

text: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you .
text2: Taani hagaa intteyyo he inttena balettiya asatu gishshau xaafaas .

text: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you , and ye need not that any man teach you : but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things , and is truth , and is no lie , and even as it hath taught you , ye shall abide in him .
text2: SHin Kiristtoosi intte bolli ba Geeshsha Ayyaanaa gussiis . Geeshsha Ayyaanai inttenan de7iyo gishshau , ooninne inttena tamaarissana koshshenna ; aissi giikko , a Geeshsha Ayyaanai inttena ubbabaa tamaarissees . I tamaarissidoogaadan , Kiristtoosan de7ite .

text: And now , little children , abide in him ; that , when he shall appear , we may have confidence , and not be ashamed before him at his coming .
text2: Ta naatoo , qassi i qoncciyo wode , nuuni yashshi bainnaageeta gidanaadaaninne , a yuussaa gallassi a sinttan nuuni yeellatennaadan , aani de7ite .

text: If ye know that he is righteous , ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him .
text2: Kiristtoosi xillo gidiyoogaa intte erikko , xillobaa oottiya ubbai Xoossaa na7a gidiyoogaa eranau bessees .

text: Behold , what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us , that we should be called the sons of God : therefore the world knoweth us not , because it knew him not .
text2: Nuuni Xoossaa naata geetettidi xeesettana mala , Xoossai nuna ai keenaa siiqidaakkonne be7ite . Nuuni tumukka a naata . Ha sa7ai Xoossaa erenna gishshau , nunakka erenna .

text: Beloved , now are we the sons of God , and it doth not yet appear what we shall be : but we know that , when he shall appear , we shall be like him ; for we shall see him as he is .
text2: Ta siiqotoo , ha77i nuuni Xoossaa naata ; nuuni ai hananaakko biron erettibeenna ; shin Kiristtoosi qoncciyo wode , nuuni a milatanaagaa eroos . Aissi giikko , i tumu de7iyoogaa nuuni be7ana .

text: And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself , even as he is pure .
text2: Qassi Kiristtoosa be7ana giidi ufaissan naagiya ooninne Kiristtoosi geeshsha gididoogaadan , bana geeshshees .

text: Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law : for sin is the transgression of the law .
text2: Nagara oottiya ubbai Xoossaa higgiyaa menttees ; aissi giikko , nagari higge menttiyoogaa .

text: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins ; and in him is no sin .
text2: Kiristtoosi asaa nagaraa xaissanau qonccidoogaa intte ereeta ; aani nagari baawa .

text: Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not : whosoever sinneth hath not seen him , neither known him .
text2: Kiristtoosan de7iya ooninne nagara oottenna ; qassi nagaraa oottiya ooninne a be7ibeenna woi eribeenna .

text: Little children , let no man deceive you : he that doeth righteousness is righteous , even as he is righteous .
text2: Ta naatoo , ooninne inttena balettoppo . Kiristtoosi xillo gidiyoogaadan , xillobaa oottiya urai xillo .

text: He that committeth sin is of the devil ; for the devil sinneth from the beginning . For this purpose the Son of God was manifested , that he might destroy the works of the devil .
text2: Xalahe halaqai koiroosappe nagaraa oottido gishshau , nagara ubba wode oottiya urai xalahe halaqaassa ; hegaa gishshau , Xoossaa Na7ai xalahe halaqaa oosuwaa xaissanau qoncciis .

text: Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin ; for his seed remaineth in him : and he cannot sin , because he is born of God .
text2: Xoossaa na7a gidiya ooninne Xoossaa meretai aani de7iyo gishshau , nagara ubba wode oottenna ; qassi Xoossai a Aawaa gidiyo gishshau , nagara oottanau danddayenna .

text: In this the children of God are manifest , and the children of the devil : whosoever doeth not righteousness is not of God , neither he that loveth not his brother .
text2: Xoossaa naatu giddooninne xalahe halaqaa naatu giddon de7iya dummatettai hagan erettees ; xillobaa oottenna urai woikko ba ishaa siiqenna urai ooninne Xoossaa Na7a gidenna .

text: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning , that we should love one another .
text2: Aissi giikko , koiroosappe intte siyido kiitai , “ Issoi issuwaara siiqettanau bessees ” yaagiyaagaa .

text: Not as Cain , who was of that wicked one , and slew his brother . And wherefore slew he him ? Because his own works were evil , and his brother ' s righteous .
text2: Nuuni Qaayeela mala gidanau bessenna . Qaayeeli xalahe halaqaassa ; yaanidi ba ishaa woriis . I ba ishaa aissi woridee ? I oottido oosoi iita gidin , a ishai oottido oosoi lo77o gidido gishshau woriis .

text: Marvel not , my brethren , if the world hate you .
text2: Ta ishatoo , ha sa7aa asai inttena ixxikko , oorattabaa gooppite .

text: We know that we have passed from death unto life , because we love the brethren . He that loveth not his brother abideth in death .
text2: Nuuni nu ishata siiqiyo gishshau , haiquwaappe de7uwau pinnidoogaa eroos ; ba ishaa siiqenna urai ooninne haiquwaa giddon de7ees .

text: Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer : and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him .
text2: Ba ishaa ixxiya ooninne shemppo woridaagaa ; qassi shemppo woridaagan merinaa de7oi bainnaagaa intte ereeta .

text: Hereby perceive we the love of God , because he laid down his life for us : and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren .
text2: Kiristtoosi ba shemppuwaa nu gishshau aattidi immidoogan siiqoi aibakko nuuni erida ; nuunikka nu ishatu gishshau , nu shemppuwaa aattidi immanau bessees .

text: But whoso hath this world ' s good , and seeth his brother have need , and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him , how dwelleth the love of God in him ?
text2: SHin dure asi ooninne ba ishai metootiyoogaa be7iiddi , ayyo qarettennan ixxikko , ba wozanan Xoossaa siiqoi de7ees gaanau waani danddayii ?

text: My little children , let us not love in word , neither in tongue ; but in deed and in truth .
text2: Ta naatoo , nuuni oosuwaaninne tumatettan siiqettanaappe attin , coo haasayan woikko bolla doonan siiqettanau bessenna .

text: And hereby we know that we are of the truth , and shall assure our hearts before him .
text2: Nuuni tumaa baggan de7iyoogaa hegan erana ; qassi nu wozanai nu bolli pirddiyo wode ubban , Xoossaa sinttan tumatettaa nuna hegan erissees . Aissi giikko , Xoossai nu wozanaappe gita ; qassi i ubbabaa erees .

text: Beloved , if our heart condemn us not , then have we confidence toward God .
text2: Ta siiqotoo , nu wozanai nu bolli pirddennabaa gidikko , nuuni Xoossaa sinttan yayyokko .

text: And whatsoever we ask , we receive of him , because we keep his commandments , and do those things that are pleasing in his sight .
text2: Nuuni a azazuwaa naagiyo gishshaunne a ufaissiyaabaa oottiyo gishshau , woossiyo ubbabaa appe ekkoos .

text: And this is his commandment , That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ , and love one another , as he gave us commandment .
text2: Xoossaa azazoi hagaa : Kiristtoosi nuna azazidoogaadankka , Xoossaa Na7aa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan nuuni ammananaadaaninne issoi issuwaara siiqettanaadan Xoossai nuna azaziis .

text: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him , and he in him . And hereby we know that he abideth in us , by the Spirit which he hath given us .
text2: Xoossaa azazuwaa naagiya ooninne Xoossaa giddon de7ees ; Xoossainne a giddon de7ees ; Xoossai nuuyyo immido Geeshsha Ayyaanaa baggaara i nu giddon de7iyoogaa nuuni eroos .

text: Beloved , believe not every spirit , but try the spirits whether they are of God : because many false prophets are gone out into the world .
text2: Ta siiqotoo , ayyaanata ubbata ammanoppite ; shin eti Xoossaappe yiidaakkonne akeekite . Aissi giikko , hananabaa yootiya daro worddoti ubbasaa biidosona .

text: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God : Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God :
text2: Xoossaa Ayyaana gidiyoogaa intte hegan erana ; “ Yesuus Kiristtoosi asa gididi yiidoogaa ammanais ” giya ayyaana ubbai Xoossaappe yees .

text: And every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God : and this is that spirit of antichrist , whereof ye have heard that it should come ; and even now already is it in the world .
text2: Qassi Kiristtoosi asa gididi yiidoogaa ammanais geenna ayyaana ubbai Xoossaappe yibeenna ; hegee Kiristtoosa morkkiya ayyaana . Intte he ayyaanai yaanaagaa kase siyideta ; i harai atto ha77ikka ha sa7an de7ees .

text: Ye are of God , little children , and have overcome them : because greater is he that is in you , than he that is in the world .
text2: Ta naatoo , intte Xoossaageeta ; intte giddon de7iya Geeshsha Ayyaanai ha sa7an de7iya ayyaanaappe daro wolqqaamiyo gishshau , hananabaa yootiya worddota intte xoonideta .

text: They are of the world : therefore speak they of the world , and the world heareth them .
text2: Eti ha sa7aa asa gidiyo gishshau , ha sa7aabaa haasayoosona ; ha sa7aa asaikka eta haasayaa siyees .

text: We are of God : he that knoweth God heareth us ; he that is not of God heareth not us . Hereby know we the spirit of truth , and the spirit of error .
text2: Nuuni Xoossaageeta ; Xoossaa eriya ooninne nuuni giyoogaa siyees . Xoossaa erenna ooninne nuuni giyoogaa siyenna . Nuuni tumu ayyaanaanne worddo ayyaanaa hegan shaakkoos .

text: Beloved , let us love one another : for love is of God ; and every one that loveth is born of God , and knoweth God .
text2: Ta siiqotoo , siiqoi Xoossaappe yiyo gishshau , ane issoi issuwaara siiqettoos . Siiqiya ooninne Xoossaa na7a ; Xoossaa i erees .

text: He that loveth not knoweth not God ; for God is love .
text2: Xoossai siiqo gidiyo gishshau , siiqenna urai ooninne Xoossaa erenna .

text: In this was manifested the love of God toward us , because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world , that we might live through him .
text2: Xoossai nuna ba siiquwaa hagan bessiis ; nuuni Kiristtoosa baggaara de7uwaa demmana mala , ba issi Na7aa ha sa7aa kiittiis .

text: Herein is love , not that we loved God , but that he loved us , and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins .
text2: Siiqo giyoogee hagaa ; Xoossai nuna siiqidi , nuuni nu nagaraappe maarotettaa demmido ba Na7aa nuuyyo kiittiisippe attin , nuuni a siiqidoogaana gidenna .

text: Beloved , if God so loved us , we ought also to love one another .
text2: Ta siiqotoo , Xoossai nuna hagaadan siiqidabaa gidikko , nuunikka issoi issuwaara siiqettanau bessees .

text: No man hath seen God at any time . If we love one another , God dwelleth in us , and his love is perfected in us .
text2: Xoossaa ooninne mulekka be7ibeenna ; nuuni issoi issuwaara siiqettikko , Xoossai nu giddon de7ees ; a siiqoikka nu giddon polettiis .

text: Hereby know we that we dwell in him , and he in us , because he hath given us of his Spirit .
text2: Xoossai ba Geeshsha Ayyaanaa nuuyyo immido gishshau , nuuni Xoossaa giddon de7iyoogaanne ikka nu giddon de7iyoogaa eroos .

text: And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world .
text2: Aawai ba Na7aa ha sa7aa ashshiyaagaa gidanau kiittidoogaa nuuni be7idi markkattoos .

text: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God , God dwelleth in him , and he in God .
text2: Yesuusi Xoossaa Na7aa gidiyoogaa markkattiya o giddooninne Xoossai de7ees ; ikka Xoossaa giddon de7ees .

text: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us . God is love ; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God , and God in him .
text2: Xoossai nuna siiqiyoogaa nuuni nu huuphen eroosinne ammanoos . Xoossai siiqo . Siiquwan de7iya ooninne Xoossaa giddon de7ees ; Xoossaikka a giddon de7ees .

text: Herein is our love made perfect , that we may have boldness in the day of judgment : because as he is , so are we in this world .
text2: Nu de7oi ha sa7an Kiristtoosi de7idoogaa mala gidiyo gishshau , pirddaa gallassi nuuni yayyenna mala , siiqoi nu giddon polettiis .

text: There is no fear in love ; but perfect love casteth out fear : because fear hath torment . He that feareth is not made perfect in love .
text2: Siiquwan yashshi baawa ; shin tumu siiqoi yashshaa kessi olees . Yashshainne qaxxayoi issippe biyo gishshau , yayyiya uraa siiqoi kumetta gidenna .

text: We love him , because he first loved us .
text2: Xoossai koiro nuna siiqido gishshau , nuuni a siiqoos .

text: If a man say , I love God , and hateth his brother , he is a liar : for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen , how can he love God whom he hath not seen ?
text2: Ooninne , “ Taani Xoossaa siiqais ” giidi ba ishaa ixxikko , i worddanchcha . Aissi giikko , be7ido ba ishaa siiqennaagee be7ibeenna Xoossaa siiqanau waani danddayii ?

text: And this commandment have we from him , That he who loveth God love his brother also .
text2: Qassi Kiristtoosi nuuyyo immido azazoi hagaa ; Xoossaa siiqiya urai ba ishaakka siiqanau bessees .

text: Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ is born of God : and every one that loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him .
text2: Kiristtoosa yaagidi , Yesuusa ammaniya ooninne Xoossaa na7a ; qassi Aawaa siiqiya ooninne a Na7aakka siiqees .

text: By this we know that we love the children of God , when we love God , and keep his commandments .
text2: Nuuni Xoossaa siiqiyoogaaninne a azazuwaa naagiyoogan , Xoossaa naata siiqiyoogaa eroos .

text: For this is the love of God , that we keep his commandments : and his commandments are not grievous .
text2: Aissi giikko , nuuni Xoossaa siiqiyoogee a azazuwaa naagiyoogaa ; a azazoikka deexo gidenna .

text: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world : and this is the victory that overcometh the world , even our faith .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa na7a gidiya ooninne ha sa7aa xoonanau danddayees ; nuunikka ha sa7aa xoonanaagee nu ammanuwaana .

text: Who is he that overcometh the world , but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God ?
text2: Ha sa7aa xoonanau danddayiyai oonee ? Yesuusi Xoossaa Na7aa gidiyoogaa ammaniyaagaa xalaalai xoonana .

text: This is he that came by water and blood , even Jesus Christ ; not by water only , but by water and blood . And it is the Spirit that beareth witness , because the Spirit is truth .
text2: Haattaaranne suuttaara yiidaagee hagaa ; ikka Yesuus Kiristtoosa ; haattaaranne suuttaara i yiidoogaappe attin , haatta xalaalaara yibeenna . Geeshsha Ayyaanai tuma gidiyo gishshau , hegee tuma gidiyoogaa i ba huuphen markkattees .

text: For there are three that bear record in heaven , the Father , the Word , and the Holy Ghost : and these three are one .
text2: Aissi giikko , heezzu markkati de7oosona .

text: And there are three that bear witness in earth , the spirit , and the water , and the blood : and these three agree in one .
text2: Hegeeti Geeshsha Ayyaanaa , haattaanne suuttaa ; ha heezzati issoi issuwaagaa phalqqokkona .

text: If we receive the witness of men , the witness of God is greater : for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son .
text2: Nuuni asai markkattiyoogaa ammanikko , Xoossai markkattiyoogee asaagaappe keehi aadhdhees ; aissi giikko , Xoossai ba Na7aayyo markkattido markkatettai hagaa .

text: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself : he that believeth not God hath made him a liar ; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son .
text2: Xoossaa Na7aa ammaniya uraa wozanan ha markkatettai de7ees . Xoossaa ammanenna urai ooninne Xoossai ba Na7aayyo markkattido markkatettaa ammanibeenna gishshau , Xoossaa worddanchcha oottiis .

text: And this is the record , that God hath given to us eternal life , and this life is in his Son .
text2: Simmi markkatettai hagaa ; Xoossai nuuyyo merinaa de7uwaa immiis ; he de7oikka a Na7an de7ees .

text: He that hath the Son hath life ; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life .
text2: Xoossaa Na7ai de7iyo ooyyoonne de7oi de7ees ; Xoossaa Na7ai bainna ooyyoonne de7oi baawa .

text: These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God ; that ye may know that ye have eternal life , and that ye may believe on the name of the Son of God .
text2: Xoossaa Na7aa sunttan ammaniya intteyyo merinaa de7oi de7iyoogaa intte erana mala , hagaa intteyyo xaafaas .

text: And this is the confidence that we have in him , that , if we ask any thing according to his will , he heareth us :
text2: Xoossai koyiyoogaadan , ainne nuuni a woossikko , i siyiyoogaa nuuni eriyo gishshau , a sinttan yayyokko .

text: And if we know that he hear us , whatsoever we ask , we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him .
text2: Nuuni woossiyo ubban i siyiyoogaa erikko , nuuni a woossidoogaa i immanaagaa eroos .

text: If any man see his brother sin a sin which is not unto death , he shall ask , and he shall give him life for them that sin not unto death . There is a sin unto death : I do not say that he shall pray for it .
text2: Ooninne haiqoi bessenna nagara ba ishai oottishin be7ikko , Xoossaa woossanau bessees ; haiqoi bessenna nagara oottidaageetuyyo Xoossai de7o immana . Haiqoi bessiyo nagari de7ees ; taani inttena hegau Xoossaa woossite giikke .

text: All unrighteousness is sin : and there is a sin not unto death .
text2: Mooro ooso ubbi nagara ; shin haiqoi bessenna nagari de7ees .

text: We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not ; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself , and that wicked one toucheth him not .
text2: Xoossaa na7i ooninne nagara ubba wode oottennaagaa nuuni eroos . Aissi giikko , Xoossaa na7ai a naagees ; qassi xalahee halaqaikka a qohanau danddayenna .

text: And we know that we are of God , and the whole world lieth in wickedness .
text2: Nuuni Xoossaageeta gidiyoogaanne ha mule sa7aikka xalahe halaqan haarettidoogaa eroos .

text: And we know that the Son of God is come , and hath given us an understanding , that we may know him that is true , and we are in him that is true , even in his Son Jesus Christ . This is the true God , and eternal life .
text2: Nuuni tumu Xoossaa eranaadan , Xoossaa Na7ai yiidoogaanne nuuyyo akeekaa immidoogaa eroos . Nuuni tumu Xoossaa giddon , a Na7aa Yesuus Kiristtoosa giddon de7eettees ; i tumu Xoossaanne merinaa de7uwaa .

text: Little children , keep yourselves from idols . Amen .
text2: Ta naatoo , eeqatuppe intte huuphiyaa naagite .

text: The elder unto the elect lady and her children , whom I love in the truth ; and not I only , but also all they that have known the truth ;
text2: Taani cimai , intteyyo doorettida godatteeyyoonne ne naatuyyo ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafais ; nu giddon de7iya qassi nunaara merinau de7ana tumatettaa gishshau , taani inttena tumu siiqais . Qassi ta xalaala gidennan , tumatettaa eriya ubbati inttena siiqoosona .

text: Grace be with you , mercy , and peace , from God the Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ , the Son of the Father , in truth and love .
text2: Xoossaa nu Aawaa aaro kehatettai , maarotettainne sarotettai a Na7aa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aaro kehatettai , maarotettainne sarotettai tumatettaaninne siiquwan nunaara issippe gido .

text: I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth , as we have received a commandment from the Father .
text2: Xoossai , Aawai nuna azazidoogaadan , ne naatuppe amaridaageeti , tumatettan de7iyoogaa be7ada taani daro ufaittaas .

text: And now I beseech thee , lady , not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee , but that which we had from the beginning , that we love one another .
text2: Siiqo godattee , ha77ikka nuuni ubbai issoi issuwaara siiqettana mala , taani nena woossais ; ha azazoi kaseesappe nunaara de7iya azazoppe attin , taani neeyyo ooratta azazo xaafikke .

text: And this is love , that we walk after his commandments . This is the commandment , That , as ye have heard from the beginning , ye should walk in it .
text2: Siiquwaa giyoogee nuuni Xoossaa azazuwaa naagiiddi de7iyoogaa giyoogaa . Qassi koiroosappe intte siyidoogaadankka , a azazoi aibee giikko , intte ubbai siiquwan de7anaagaa .

text: For many deceivers are entered into the world , who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh . This is a deceiver and an antichrist .
text2: Aissi giikko , Yesuus Kiristtoosi asa gididi yiidoogaa ammanokko giyaageeti , balettiya daro asati , dere giddo gelidosona . Hegaa mala urai ooninne asa balettiyaagaanne Kiristtoosa morkkiyaa .

text: Look to yourselves , that we lose not those things which we have wrought , but that we receive a full reward .
text2: Intte oottidoogau kumetta woituwaa ekkanaappe attin , intte oottidoogaa bashshenna mala , inttena naagite .

text: Whosoever transgresseth , and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ , hath not God . He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ , he hath both the Father and the Son .
text2: Kiristtoosa timirttiyaappe haakkiya uraunne qassi a timirttiyan de7enna urau Xoossai baawa . Kiristtoosa timirttiyan de7iya uraayyo Aawainne Na7ai de7oosona .

text: If there come any unto you , and bring not this doctrine , receive him not into your house , neither bid him God speed :
text2: Ooninne inttekko yiidi , ha timirttiyaa eheennan aggikko , intte soo a gelissoppite ; sarokka gooppite .

text: For he that biddeth him God speed is partaker of his evil deeds .
text2: Aissi giikko , a saro giya urai a iita oosuwaa aara shaakkees .

text: Having many things to write unto you , I would not write with paper and ink : but I trust to come unto you , and speak face to face , that our joy may be full .
text2: Taani intteyyo xaafanau koyido darobai de7ees ; shin woraqataaninne qalamiyan xaafanau koyabeikke ; shin nu ufaissai polettana mala , inttenaara doonan haasayanau inttekko baana gaada qoppais .

text: The children of thy elect sister greet thee . Amen .
text2: Xoossai doorido ne michchee naati nena saro saro yaagoosona .

text: The elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius , whom I love in the truth .
text2: Taani cimai , tumu siiqiyo ta siiquwaa Gaayoosayyo ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafais .

text: Beloved , I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health , even as thy soul prospereth .
text2: Ta siiquwau , neeni ayyaanan lo77o gidiyoogaa taani eriyoogaadan , nena aibinne waissenna malanne qassi neeni payya de7ana mala , Xoossaa woossais .

text: For I rejoiced greatly , when the brethren came and testified of the truth that is in thee , even as thou walkest in the truth .
text2: Aissi giikko , amarida ishantti yiidi , ubba wode neeni tumatettan de7iyoogaanne ne tumatettaabaa markkattido wode , taani daro ufaittaas .

text: I have no greater joy than to hear that my children walk in truth .
text2: Ta naati tumatettan de7iyoogaa siyiyoogaappe aadhdhidi , tana ufaissiyaabi baawa .

text: Beloved , thou doest faithfully whatsoever thou doest to the brethren , and to strangers ;
text2: Ta siiquwau , nu ishantti imatta gidikkokka , neeni etayyo oottiyo ooso ubban ammanettida ooso oottaasa .

text: Which have borne witness of thy charity before the church : whom if thou bring forward on their journey after a godly sort , thou shalt do well :
text2: Qassi eti ne siiquwaabaa woosa keettan markkattidosona ; eti biyo ogiyan Xoossai dosiyoogaadan , neeni eta maaddikko , lo77obaa oottaasa .

text: Because that for his name ' s sake they went forth , taking nothing of the Gentiles .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa ammanennaageetuppe ainne ekkennan , Kiristtoosa sunttaa gishshau kiyidosona .

text: We therefore ought to receive such , that we might be fellowhelpers to the truth .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , nuuni tumatettaa etaara issippe oottana mala , hageetu mala asata maaddanau bessees .

text: I wrote unto the church : but Diotrephes , who loveth to have the preeminence among them , receiveth us not .
text2: Taani woosa keettaayyo dabddaabbiyaa xaafaas ; shin eta halaqa gidanau koyiya Diyotirefeesi nuuni giyoogaa ekkenna .

text: Wherefore , if I come , I will remember his deeds which he doeth , prating against us with malicious words : and not content therewith , neither doth he himself receive the brethren , and forbiddeth them that would , and casteth them out of the church .
text2: Hegaa gishshau , taani yaa biyo wode , i nu bollan haasayiyo iita haasayaanne i oottido oosuwaa intteyyo yootana ; qassi i hegee guuxxiis giidi , nu ishantti yiyo wode mokkenna ; harai atto eta mokkanau koyiyaageetakka diggidi , woosa keettaappe kessees .

text: Beloved , follow not that which is evil , but that which is good . He that doeth good is of God : but he that doeth evil hath not seen God .
text2: Ta siiquwau , lo77obaappe attin , iitabaa milatoppa . Lo77obaa oottiya ooninne Xoossaa asa ; shin iitabaa oottiya ooninne Xoossaa be7ibeenna .

text: Demetrius hath good report of all men , and of the truth itself : yea , and we also bear record ; and ye know that our record is true .
text2: Dimexiroosi lo77o gidiyoogaa asai ubbai markkattees ; tumatettai ba huuphenkka abaa markkattees . Nuunikka qassi abaa markkattoos ; nu markkatettai tuma gidiyoogaa inttekka ereeta .

text: I had many things to write , but I will not with ink and pen write unto thee :
text2: Taani neeyyo xaafanau koyido darobai de7ees ; shin qalamiyaaninne biiriyan xaafanau koyikke .

text: But I trust I shall shortly see thee , and we shall speak face to face . Peace be to thee . Our friends salute thee . Greet the friends by name .
text2: SHin taani matan nenaara gaittanau qoppais ; he wode nuuni gaittidi haasayana .

text: Jude , the servant of Jesus Christ , and brother of James , to them that are sanctified by God the Father , and preserved in Jesus Christ , and called :
text2: Taani Yesuus Kiristtoosa ashkkarai Yihudai , Yaaqooba ishai , Xoossai xeegidoogeetuyyo , Xoossai Aawai siiqiyoogeetuyyo , qassi Yesuus Kiristtoosi naagiyoogeetuyyo , ha dabddaabbiyaa xaafais .

text: Mercy unto you , and peace , and love , be multiplied .
text2: Maarotettai , sarotettainne siiqotettai inttenan kumo .

text: Beloved , when I gave all diligence to write unto you of the common salvation , it was needful for me to write unto you , and exhort you that ye should earnestly contend for the faith which was once delivered unto the saints .
text2: Ta dabbotoo , nuuni issippe shaakki ekkana atotettaabaa intteyyo xaafanau taani daro daafuriyo wode , Xoossai geeshshatuyyo naa77anttennan issitoo immido ammanuwau intte baaxetana mala , inttena zorada xaafanau koshshiyoogaa akeekaas .

text: For there are certain men crept in unawares , who were before of old ordained to this condemnation , ungodly men , turning the grace of our God into lasciviousness , and denying the only Lord God , and our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Aissi giikko , Xoossaa erenna issi issi asati ooninne be7ennan intte giddo gelidosona . Hegeeti nu Xoossaa aaro kehatettaabaa yootiya kiitaa shaaramuxatettau geellayi tamaarissoosona ; eti nu issi Kawuwaa , nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa erokko yaagoosona ; qassi eti pirddaa ekkanaagaa Xoossaa maxaafati daro wodeppe kase yootidosona .

text: I will therefore put you in remembrance , though ye once knew this , how that the Lord , having saved the people out of the land of Egypt , afterward destroyed them that believed not .
text2: SHin intte ha ubbabaa eriyaabaa gidikkokka , Godai Israa7eela asaa Gibxxe biittaappe waati ashshidaakkonne qassi ammanibeennaageeta guyyeppe waati xaissidaakko , taani inttena hassayissanau koyais .

text: And the angels which kept not their first estate , but left their own habitation , he hath reserved in everlasting chains under darkness unto the judgment of the great day .
text2: Qassi bantta de7iyoosaa aggidi , banttau imettida halaqatettaa naagibeenna kiitanchchati pirddaa ekkiyo gita gallassai gakkanaassi Xoossai eta naagiyoosan , xumaappe garssan merinau qashettidi de7oosona .

text: Even as Sodom and Gomorrha , and the cities about them in like manner , giving themselves over to fornication , and going after strange flesh , are set forth for an example , suffering the vengeance of eternal fire .
text2: Hegaadan Sadoomanne Gamoora giyo katamatuuninne eta heeran de7iya katamatun de7iya asai he kiitanchchatudan shaaramuxidosonanne shaaramuxanau keehi qaaqqatidosona ; hegeeti merinaa taman eexxidi , haratuyyo leemiso gididosona .

text: Likewise also these filthy dreamers defile the flesh , despise dominion , and speak evil of dignities .
text2: Hegaadan qassi he aimottiya asati bantta asatettaa tunissoosona ; Xoossaa godatettaa karoosona ; bonchcho meretatakka cayoosona .
